en: Members of the three highest varnas are called "twice-born" because they have gone through a ceremony entailing spiritual rebirth.

zh: 对种姓制度进行这样的描述，尽管并非是不正确的，却过于简单化并最终可能引起误解。
en: Such a description of the caste system, although it is not incorrect, is simplistic and ultimately misleading.

zh: 首先，必须注意到，也有一些非印度教信徒被包括在种姓制度之内：印度大约有1.3亿穆斯林有他们自己的种姓（通常是低级的），还有许多异教徒的群体被认为是“部落的”常常被归类为贱民。
en: First, it should be noted that there are also non-Hindus who belong to castes; India's approximately 130 million Muslims have their own castes (usually low ones), and the many ethnic groups sometimes called "tribals" tend to be classified and treated as Untouchables.

zh: 其中一些人，部分地正是出于这个原因，已经转向基督教或佛教。
en: Some of them, partly for this very reason, have converted to Christianity or Buddhism.

zh: 移民群体中的种族复兴可以从这个视角加以理解，利用乡愁和一种疏离感，这些复兴行动设法重新灌输一种对过去的延续感、本体论的安全感（Giddens 1990）和个体的安全感。
en: Ethnic revitalisation among migrant groups may be understood within this perspective.Drawing on nostalgia and a sense of alienation, such movements contrive to re-instil a sense of continuity with the past, ontological security (Giddens 1990) and personal security.

zh: 虽然已经获得人类学家和社会学家的重视，复兴只体现了硬币的一面。
en: Although it has received intense attention from anthropologists and sociologists, revitalisation represents only one side of the coin.

zh: 很清楚，那些有时激发了复兴的进程，却也会导致相反的结果（也就是不确定、双重人格和个体主义），值得注意。
en: Clearly, the processes which sometimes inspire revitalisation, but which may also lead to the opposite (namely uncertainty, ambivalence and individualism), merit attention.

zh: 这些过程是全球化的进程，由此，人们为有时规模惊人的社会和文化网络的变化所裹挟；根据齐格蒙特·鲍曼（Zygmunt Bauman）的观点，也因为这种全球化的进程，社会“宣布所有对自由的限制均为非法，同时消灭社会的确定性而使种族的不确定性合法化”（Bauman 1992，p.XXIV）。
en: These are the processes of globalisation, whereby people become embedded in shifting social and cultural networks of sometimes staggering scale, where society, in Zygmunt Bauma's view, "proclaims all restrictions on freedom illegal, at the same time doing away with social certainty and legalizing ethical uncertainty" (1992, p. xxiv).

zh: 在美国，这一研究的动力来自许多方面。

en: The impetus for work in the United States came from a number of sources.

zh: 1920年代，一些美国机构开始着手解决与种族关系有关的问题。
en: In the 1920s some American foundations were beginning to address problems of race relations.

zh: 弗兰兹·博厄斯的学生梅尔维尔·赫斯柯维茨受资助对美国黑人生活的“种族混合”（race crossing）及其他方面进行了研究（Herskovits 1928）。
en: Franz Boas's student Melville Herskovits was funded to study "race crossing" and other aspects of the lives of blacks in the United States (1928).

zh: 发生在最近历史上的最广为人知的种族灭绝，是德国纳粹在种族优越的名义下杀害欧洲犹太人和吉普赛人的事件。
en: The most widely known act of genocide in recent history was the Nazi German attempt to wipe out European Jews and gypsies in the name of racial superiority.

zh: 不幸的是，把这一事件称为“大屠杀”的寻常做法——似乎这件事是独一无二的，或至少是例外的——往往使我们看不见这样一个事实:这一无比恐怖的事件只是再常见不过的现象的又一实例罢了。
en: Unfortunately, the common practice of referring to this as "holocaust"-as if it were something unique or at least exceptional-tends to blind us to the fact this thoroughly monstrous act is simply one more example of an all too common phenomenon.

zh: 从1945年到1987年，至少有680万人（也许多达1630万）死于国内的种族灭绝，而与之相比，从1945年到10年，死于国家之间战争的人数只有334万。
en: From 1945 to 1987, a minimum of 68 million, but perhaps as many as 16.3 million, people were victims of internal (within state) genocide, as compared to the 334 million people who have died in wars between different countries from 1945 to 1980.

zh: 对种族偏见和种族冲突的心理学解释之所以会使人误解和缺乏根据，是因为这类问题属于社会和文化领域，而不是心理学领域。
en: Psychological interpretations of race prejudice and inter-racial antagonisms are misleading and unsound because these problems are sociological and cultural rather than psychological.

zh: 正如我们己经指出的，对与某种制度相关的主观心理经验的描述，并构成对这种制度的说明。
en: As we have pointed out, a description of subjective psychological experience correlated with an institution does not constitute an explanation of the institution.

zh: 自我经验只是制度的功能，而不是制度的起因。
en: The experience of the ego is a function of the institution, not its cause.

zh: 对于制度只能从文化上予以解释。
en: And, the institution must be explained culturologically.

zh: 由于对塞尔维亚少数民族进行了彻底的种族清洗，克罗地亚现在基本上就是一个族裔方面同质的民族-国家。
en: Thanks to its efficient ethnic cleansing of its Serbian ethnic minority,Croatia is now very nearly an ethnically homogenous nationstate.

zh: 在这种情况下，在构成民族自豪感诸多的要素中，族裔要素注定压倒公民要素。
en: In these conditions, the ethnic is bound to dominate the civic in the components of national pride.

zh: 事实上，对少数民族的清除会削弱克罗地亚民族的公民要素，其民主可能处于危险之中。
en: Indeed, the removal of its ethnic minority may so weaken the civic components of Croatian identity that its democracy may be in danger.

zh: 一个进行种族清洗以获得自由的国家并不是真正民主国家，而只是由多数派独裁的国家，这并不意外。
en: It is not accidental that a nation which engages in ethnic cleansing in order to make itself free ends up not as a true democracy but as a plebiscitary dictatorship.

zh: 有一个“会议野人”或“流浪委员会之熊”，他从来不换洗衣服，参加听有的会议，跟白种女人睡觉，作为一种“脏熊种族主义实验”。
en: There is the "conference savage," or "nomadic committee bear, "who never washes or changes his clothes, goes to all the conferences, and sleeps with white women as a kind of "foul bear racism test."

zh: 还有一个跛子的故事，他卖他的木腿换酒喝（木腿上有一个标签好让人寄回来）。对此，白人的道德是“停止喝酒”，而印第安部落的道徳是用一条木腿换免费的酒喝。
en: And there is the story of the cripple who sells his wooden leg for a drink (the leg has a label on it to be mailed back), for which the white moral is "stop drinking," but the tribal moral is to find free booze with a wooden leg.

zh: 无疑还有“滑流上的卡斯特”，一个印第安人事务局的雇员和卡斯特的转世，他苦于自己在印第安人手中受羞辱的噩梦，因而把所有的时间都消磨在他的软垫椅上。
en: No wonder there is thus also "Custer on the Slipstream," a Bureau of Indian Affairs employee and rein carnation of Custer, who suffers his own nightmares of humiliation at the hands of the Indians, and so spends all his time in his padded chair.

zh: 从某些方面来说，当代递过记忆重新创造族群身份之举绝不是什么新鲜事。
en: In some ways, the contemporary reinvention of ethnic identity through remembering is nothing new.

zh: 毕达哥拉斯的记忆概念（让柏拉图很是着迷）也把世界想象为一个遗忘的世界，现实隐藏在它的表面之下。
en: The Pythagorean notion of memory (which fascinated Plato) also conceived of the world as one of oblivion, of superficial appearances behind which lay the hidden realities.

zh: 只有那参与记忆的活动，会回忆，在奔向另一个世界的时候保存这一世界的知识，从天界返回这一世界的时候避开遗忘之河的水的灵魂，才能逃脱再生的循环、起起落落的无意义重复，和将人类简化为机械或野兽之符号的墒。
en: Only the soul that engaged in memory exercises, in recollections, in preserving the knowledge of this world when proceeding to the next and avoiding the waters of Lethe (or Ameles) when returning to this world from the celestial realms would be able to escape the cycles of rebirth, the flux of meaningless repetitions, and the entropy toward reductions of human beings into mechanical or bestial ciphers.

zh: 只有通过记忆，为经常的训练和努力所打磨的记忆，一个人才能洗清过去生活的罪，净化灵魂，从遗忘的重复之渊上升和逃脱。
en: Only through memory, honed by constant exercise and effort, could one purge the sins of past lives, purify the soul, ascend and escape from oblivious repetitions.

zh: 这类观点似乎要么夸大要么轻描淡写个体经验的独特性、主体的复杂性以及形式和意义之间的关系所具有的那种丰富的微妙之处。
en: What the above line of argument appears to overlook or underplay is the uniqueness of individual experience, the complexities of subjectivity and the rich subtleties of the relationship between form and meaning.

zh: 从这一角度出发，无论存在多少所谓惯常的、悠久的叙事形式，个体在运用它们时，将不容分辨地发现他们自己在认知上与这些形式有所不同。
en: On this view, whatever the seeming habituality and longevity of narrative forms, the individuals partaking of them (animating them by their mental and bodily, verbal and behavioural presence) willy-nilly find themselves cognitively apart from those forms as such.

zh: 也就是说，在惯常的叙事形式、文化模式、组织方式、叙述方式、阐释以及评价方式中，不可避免地会引发意义的个体性。
en: That is, within the conventional forms of narrative, its cultural patterns of framing, organization, recitation, interpretation and evaluation, an individuality of meaning is an inevitable product.

zh: 一个普遍的假定是，主位观察是错误的，而客位观察是正确的。
en: It is a common assumption that emic perspectives are wrong, whereas the etic perspectives are correct.

zh: 这是一种令人遗憾的建构问题的方式。
en: This is an unfortunate way of framing the issue.

zh: 问题不在于正确的是“本地人”还是“科学家”，而在于社会科学家有其专业的兴趣，而他们追求的那种洞察力常常与田野点本地人的兴趣是不一致的。
en: The point is not whether the "natives" or the "scientists" are correct, but rather that social scientists have specialised interests and that the kinds of insight they aim at are frequently not identical with the interests of their hosts in the field.

zh: 有很多种同样正确的方式去描述一种社会和文化的系统：你的兴趣决定你的选择。
en: There are a number of equally correct ways of describing a cultural and social system; one's choice must depend on one's interests.

zh: 一个关于主位-客位的区别的更深误解是，主位的观念是“具体的”而客位的观念是“抽象的”。
en: A further misunderstanding regarding the emic–etic distinction amounts to the idea that emic notions are "concrete" whereas etic notions are "abstract".

zh: 这也许是事实，但并非天生正确。
en: This may be the case, but it is not inherently true.

zh: 多数民族-少数民族关系的大多数经验性案例都出现了种族隔离、同化和整合。
en: Most empirical cases of majority–minority relationships display a combination of segregation, assimilation and integration.

zh: 同化很可能发生在个体层面上，即使主要的趋势可能是种族隔离或种族合并。
en: Assimilation may well take place at an individual level, even if the chief tendency might be segregation or ethnic incorporation.

zh: 尽管斯堪的纳维亚北部的萨米人在最近几十年向着更强烈的种族合并和有选择的种族隔离的趋势发展，仍然有一些个体被一种多数民族的种族身份所同化（如挪威人、芬兰人或瑞典人）。
en: Despite the fact that the Sami of northern Scandinavia have in recent decades moved towards a stronger ethnic incorporation and chosen segregation, there are still individuals who are assimilated to a majority ethnic identity (Norwegian, Finnish or Swedish, as the case may be).

zh: 但“无产阶级专政”是一种错觉，它也宣称“人民”的统治，但并非全体人民，而仅仅是一个特殊阶级、即“挑选出的人民”的统治。
en: But a "dictatorship of the proletariat" is a delusion.It, too, declares that "the people" rule; not all the people, but only a particular class —a "chosen people."

zh: 近年来社会进化的过程已经表明这个口号是多么不现实。
en: The course of social evolution in recent years has shown how unrealistic this slogan is.

zh: “无产阶级专政”在逻辑上与社会学上都是矛盾的术语。
en: "The dictatorship of the proletariat" is both a logical and a sociological contradiction of terms.

zh: 作为从我们的灵长目动物祖先那里遗传来的东西，我们的姿势一呼叫系统的许多声音和姿势，与语言相比，在更大程度上取决于遗传规定。
en: As features we have inherited from our primate ancestors, many sounds and gestures of our gesture-call system are subject to greater genetic determination than language.

zh: 这就解释了各种各样的哭泣和面部表情具有普遍性的原因，也说明了人们用姿势一呼叫来虚张声势,或者——尤其是——说谎具有极大困难的原因。
en: This accounts for the universality of various cries and facial expressions, as well as for the great difficulty people have bluffing or especially lying through gesture-calls.

zh: 这不是说，该系统完全不受控制，因为它不是那样的；这只是说，与口语相比，它不太易于控制。
en: This does not mean the system is entirely immune to deliberate control, for it is not; it is merely less subject to control than spoken language.

zh: 在其他的一些情况中，唯物主义被认为是文化现代化的不可缺少的一个部分——无论是基于公众公共体制的、标准化书本教育的动态社会还是公众阅读的兴起。对于前者，厄内斯特·盖尔纳认为书本教育是至关重要的，而针对后者，本尼迪克特·安德森（Benedict Anderson）强调“印刷资本主义”技术的普及孕育了公众阅读的兴起。
en: In other cases, materialism is conceived as part and parcel of cultural processes of modernisation – be it the mobile society based on a public system of mass, standardised literary education which Ernest Gellner regards as critical, or the rise of reading publics engendered by the spread of the technology of "printcapitalism" stressed by Benedict Anderson.

zh: 在所有这些情况下，不管民族和民族主义的结果会如何让人感到遗憾。二者或多或少被认为是现代工业社会不可避免的产物，
en: In all these cases, nations and nationalisms are viewed as more or less inevitable outgrowths of a modern, industrial society, however regrettable their consequences may be.

zh: 出于某种原因，所有这一切让我联想到一个在脱衣舞夜总会外厮混的少年，为了把他移交给警察，先将其逮进再将其逐出——这将给他以教训。
en: For some reason, it all made me think of a teenager hanging around outside a strip joint who gets dragged inside in order to be turned over to the police and kicked out again—that'll teach him.

zh: “规训”因此经常被执。如果在脱衣舞夜总会未必如此，但在学术界必定如此。
en: So "disciplining" is often done, if not at strip joints, then certainly in academies.

zh: 多内尔所做的明显是写了一本令人恼怒和模棱两可的书，它是否“真实”？是否属于民族志？是否可归为自传？是否宣称了它在专业或学术上的权或？
en: What Donner clearly did was write an infuriatingly ambiguous book, which may or may not be "true," is and is not ethnography, is and is not autobiography, does and does not claim professional and academic authority, is and is not based on fieldwork, and so on.

zh: 是否基于田野工作？
等等这类问题都没有定论。

遵守科学修辞之教规的迫切愿望，使得博物学式的简单的现实主义成为了民族志散文中占据支配地位的模式，但那已是一种虚幻的现实主义。一方而，这一现实主义宣扬“描写”诸如“文化”或“社会”这样的非实体的谬论，就好像它们完全是可以被观察的，尽管它不太优雅、有些缺陷；另一方而，同样可笑的行为主义者主张“措写”与话语——被行动者用来构或并定位其行动——相隔绝的行动的重复模式。他们都在天真地保证，观察者的基本话语本身是一个足以完成描写行动任务客观形式。
en: The urge to conform to the canons of scientific rhetorich as made the easy realism of natural history the dominant mode of ethnographic prose, but it has been anillusory realism, promoting, on the one hand, the absurdity of "describing" nonentities such as "culture" or "society" as if they were fully observable, though somewhat ungainly, bugs, and, on the other, the equally ridiculous behaviorist pretense of "describing" repetitive patterns of action in isolation from the discourse that actors use in constituting and situating their action, and all in simpleminded surety that the observers' grounding discourse is itself an objective form sufficient to the task of describing acts.

zh: 就其他方面而言，对非洲宗教的学术处理显然受到了限制性认同的殖民主义假想的影响。
en: As with everything else, scholarly treatments of African religion have been influenced by the colonial assumption of bounded identity.

zh: 非洲宗教被认为是微观的，处理面对面关系，并最多延伸至单一“部落”。
en: African religion has been regarded as microcosmic, dealing with face-to-face relations, and extending at most to a single "tribe".

zh: 事实上，非洲宗教表达了各个层面上的认同，从家庭到朝拜区域。
en: In fact, African religion expressed identities at every level from the household to the cult region.

zh: 也有一些其他类型的冲突存在于以合作团体的面貌出现的不同族群之间，比如，土著民族和移民群体向优势群体要求文化生存的权利和大多数人平等的权利，通常没有要求建立自己的国家。
en: There are also other kinds of conflicts where ethnic groups emerge as corporate groups.Indigenous peoples and immigrant groups may, for example, demand the right to cultural survival and the right to equality with the majority, usually without demanding their own state.

zh: 还有一些其他的种族冲突无法通过制度化的政治表达。
en: Other ethnic conflicts are not expressed through institutional politics.

zh: 德国的本地人和移民之间的冲突，或者美国的黑人和白人之间的冲突，通常在日常情境中上演。
en: Clashes between natives and immigrants in Germany, or between blacks and whites in the USA, are usually enacted in day-to-day situations.

zh: 也就是说，复杂社会中的族群划分可以表现在许多不同的层次上。
en: In other words, ethnicity may be articulated at many levels in complex societies.

zh: 族群划分并不必然具有冲突的含义：它可以用非常平淡无奇的方式来表达——通过日常情境定义、通过印象管理、用宗教崇拜和其他和平的现象。
en: Ethnicity does not necessarily entail conflict: it may be expressed in quite undramatic ways through everyday definitions of situations, through impression management, in religious cults and other peaceful phenomena.

zh: 它可以在不同的规模水平上被鉴别出来——从双重互动到内战。
en: It can be identified at different levels of scale – from dyadic interaction to civil war.

zh: 换句话说，族群性的现象是一个复杂的现象。
en: The phenomenon of ethnicity is, in other words, a complex one.

zh: 在日常语言中，“族群”的概念通常会用来描述从文化上可以与多数人区别开来的少数群体，而这样的话，这一术语就包含了非常不同的情境里的一些群体——可以包括从纽约的犹太人到巴西的雅诺马马人。
en: In everyday language, the concept "ethnic group" is normally used to describe a minority group which is culturally distinguishable from the majority, and as such the term encompasses groups in very different situations – ranging from New York Jews to the Yanomamö in Brazil.

zh: 在一个著名的综述中，他宣称，宗教在其最深刻的水平上，意味着社会对它本身的崇拜。
en: In a famous statement, he claimed that religion at its most profound level means society's worship of itself.

zh: 这个观点有它自己的问题（尤其是功能主义者的解释难题），比如，它不能解释一个社会的居民为什么信仰祖灵，而他们的邻居却信仰丛林精神，如果承认两者都是具备社会整合能力的信仰的话。
en: This view has its problems (notably the problems of functionalist explanation), for example in not explaining why the inhabitants of one society believe in ancestral spirits whereas their neighbours believe in forest spirits, granted that both would be socially integrating beliefs.

zh: 一种更加不同的研究宗教的方法以格尔茨的一篇影响深远的论文《作为一种文化系统的宗教》为代表。
en: A rather different approach to religion is represented in an influential essay by Geertz, "Religion as a Cultural System".

zh: 如表9一1所示，社会生活的时间可以分为三个层次，每一个层次都与其他两个相关联。社会生活的长时段（longueduree)属于制度（法律、家庭等）的历史发展范围。
en: As suggested by Figure 9.1, the temporality of social life can be broken out into three levels, each of which is interrelated to the others.The longue durée of social life is bound up with the historical development of institutions (the law, the family, etc.).

zh: 在短时段（dasein)中（或预期寿命期间），社会生活受到个人和家庭生命周期的影响，也受到特定时代社会条件特征的影响（与长时段相互作用）。
en: Within the dasein, or lifespan, social life is influenced by the life cycle of individuals and families and (interacting with the longue durée) by the social conditions characteristic of their particular generation.

zh: 在日常生活时段上，个人的惯常性既与社会的制度框架结构也与个人的生命周期节奏相互作用。
en: And within the durée of daily life, individual routines interact with both the structure of institutional frameworks and with the rhythm of their life cycle.

zh: 这个背景有助于我们认识地方的“中间状态”(‘betweenness’ of place): 即地方对观念的依赖。
en: In this context it is helpful to recognize the 'betweenness' of place: that is, the dependence of place on perspective.

zh: 地方存在于并且被构建于观念的主观方面；同时它被局外者看做并构建为一种外部的“其他部分”。
en: Places exist, and are constructed, from a subjective point of view; while simultaneously they are constructed and seen as an external ‘other’ by outsiders.

zh: 正如尼古拉斯•恩特里金指出的，“我们的邻里不仅是一块以我们自己和我们家庭为中心的地域，同时也是一块从外部或局外者的角度来看包含房屋、街道和人口的地域。因此，地方既是意义的核心又是我们行为的外部背景’。
en: As Nicholas Entrikin put it, ‘Our neighborhood is both an area centered on ourselves and our home, as well as an area containing houses, streets and people that we may view from a decentered or an outsider’s perspective. Thus place is both a center of meaning and the external context of our actions’.

zh: 另外，“局外者”的认识在从一个特殊具体的地方向实质上“不从属于任何地方”的情形转变时，往往变得很抽象。
en: In addition, views from ‘outside’ can vary in abstraction from being in a specific place to being virtually ‘nowhere’ (i.e.an abstract, perspectiveless view).

zh: 我们中那些来自东部和中西部所谓“真正”城市的人过去还嘲笑洛杉矶。
en: Those of us from the "real" cities of the East and Midwest used to scoff at Los Angeles.

zh: 而现在事实是，我们大多数人出于非常实际的目的也在类似洛杉矶的环境中生活和工作。
en: Nowadays, however, the fact is that most of us for all practical purposes live and work in LA-like environments.

zh: 我在波士顿地区的大多数朋友在为128公路附近的高技术公司工作；他们每天从近郊的公寓出发到波士顿周围那些“边缘城市”上班，在美国每一个古老的大都市周围，都出现了这样一些“边缘城市”。
en: Most of my friends in the Boston area work for the high-technology companies along Route 128; they commute outward from their inner-suburb homes to the "edge cities" that have grown up around Boston, as they have around every old U.S. metropolis.

zh: 一个表现消费者优越性的观念——地位商品被广泛地接受了。
en: The concept of a positional good --- one that displays the superiority of the consumer --- is well established.

zh: 不过，有人认为，在后现代时期已经假设消费活动具有十分重要的意义。
en: However, it is argued that in postmodern society the act of consumption has assumed much greater significance.

zh: 地位不再是与生俱来的了：相反，人们能够通过他们消费的商品来选择各种身份。
en: No longer is position ascribed by birth: rather, people are able to choose various types of identity through the goods they consume.

zh: 这个过程被描述为消费的美学化（aestheticization of consumption).
en: This process has been described as the aestheticization of consumption.

zh: 在负偏态曲线中，曲线向高测量值周围倾斜[参见图9-8
en: In negatively skewed curves, the scores are skewed around the upper values being measured (see figure 9.8

zh: (b)]。在正偏态曲线中，数值集中在低测量值周围[参见图9-8
en: (b)), and in positively skewed curves, the scores are clustered around the lower values (see figure 9.8

zh: 另一种极端的分布类形是J形分布，这种分布是由于频数分布中的高数值极差的内含引起的[参见图9-8
en: A further type of distribution is a J-shaped distribution, which results from the inclusion of a large range of high-value scores in the frequency distribution (see figure 9.8

zh: 所列举的方法并不相互排斥——例如，单个案例研究也可以是本质性的或工具性的案例研究方法。
en: This list is no t mutually exclusive — for example, a single case study can also be an intrinsic or an instrumental case study.

zh: 同样，多案例研究或集合案例研究也可能属于本质性的或工具性的案例研究方法。
en: Similarly, a multiple case study (or a collective case study) can also be an intrinsic or an instrumental case study.

zh: 而且，案例研究方法也与案例研究类型有关，比如本质性单案例研究可以是探索性研究，而工具性的多案例研究 可能属于解释性研究。
en: Furthermore, the research approach can also be linked into the case study type, such as a single intrinsic case study that is exploratory or a multiple and instrumental case study that is explanatory.

zh: 郊区的兴起是十足由美国领导的社会转变过程，代表了一种有时被称为美国霸权周期的元素。
en: The rise of the suburb was very much a US-led process of social change and represents an element of what is sometimes called the American hegemonic cycle.

zh: 这是沃勒斯坦主义周期性意识形态时空概念的一部分。
en: This is part of a Wallersteinian cyclical-ideological TimeSpace.

zh: 在世界系统分析中，现代世界已经通过3个霸权周期而发展，每个周期都是以世界性霸权国家经济上的成功为基础的。
en: In world-systems analysis, the modern world-system has developed through three hegemonic cycles each based upon the economic successes of a world hegemonic state.

zh: 半结构化访谈属于谈话范畴，但采访者事先已就交流关注的主题拟定了问题提纲。
en: Semi-structured interviews remain within the genre of a conversation; however, the interviewer has a prompt list of issues that focus the interaction.

zh: 这个提纲使得访谈具备了一定结构性，尽管提纲上所讨论的事项的次序可能在访谈中有变动。
en: The list adds some structure to the interview , although the ordering of the discussion about the issues on the list may vary between interviews.

zh: 同非结构化访谈一样， 半结构化访谈本质上具有一定灵活性而且遵循受访者的思维过程。
en: As with unstructured interviews, semi-structured interviews are fluid in nature and follow the thinking processes of the interviewee.

zh: 换句话说，个体化和物、特殊性或事件的定义总是在时空中产生的。
en: In other words, individuation and the definition of things, particulars or events always occurs in space-time.

zh: 但是，哪一种时空呢?
en: But which space-time?

zh: 只有定义的样态才是有趣的，对怀特海来说，那种样态总是相关性的。
en: It is only the modality of the definition that is interesting and that modality is, for Whitehead, always relational.

zh: 结果便消除了作为基础原则的单一位置观点。
en: The effect is to eliminate the idea of simple location as a grounding principle entirely.

zh: 时间和空间现在被解释为“只是对包容性统一之总体性的抽象，是彼此在对方之中成形的……时空只不过是把集合体组成统一体的体系”。
en: Space and time are now construed as "simply abstractions from the totality of prehensive unifications as mutually patterned in each other ... space-time is nothing else than a system of pulling together of assemblages into unities."

zh: 因而，“事件”这个词便指“这些时空统一体中的一个”。
en: The word "event" is then defined to mean "one of these spatiotemporal unities."

zh: 暴雨流量分析和USLE都使用到了监测过程中收集到的数据。
en: Both the stormflow analysis and USLE used data collected as part of monitoring programmes.

zh: 在单一地点观测的一个问题是要知道如何去概括空间的情况。
en: One problem with observations from a single site is knowing how to generalize across space.

zh: 到目前为止，所讨论样本都是单一变量的，如土壤流失或径流形成。
en: The examples discussed so far relate to single variables such as soil loss or runoff response.

zh: 在今天，人们常常自觉地且有意识地努力唤起一种地方感和往昔感。
en: The effort to evoke a sense of place and of the past is now often deliberate and conscious.

zh: 但这里面包含着一种危险。
en: But herein lies a danger.

zh: 对本真性的追逐创造了一些传统和一种商业化的遗产文化。
en: The quest for authenticity, invented traditions and a commercialized heritage culture.

zh: 既然我们不可能回到黑森林的小屋，那么我们能回到什么地方呢？
en: We cannot turn back to the Black Forest farmhouse, but what is it that we might turn to?

zh: 再如，地方（以及地方中的自然）经验的本真性(根)这个问题就是一个难题。
en: The issue of authenticity (rootedness) of the experience of place (and nature in place) is, for example, a difficult one.

zh: 多威评论道，从一开始，本真性难题自身就是现代的问题。只有当现代工业化把我们同生产过程割裂开来，我们遭遇到作为已完成商品的环境时，本真性问题才出现(Dovey，1989：43)。
en: To begin with, as Dovey (1989: 43) observes, the problem of authenticity is itself peculiarly modern.Only as modern industrialization separates us from the process of production and we encounter the environment as a finished commodity does it emerge.

zh: 下面我们提供一个使用暗喻做编码的例子，它选自詹宁斯（1999)所进行的一个关于长期海洋巡游者的研究。
en: An example of the use of a metaphor for coding is drawn from a study oflong-term ocean cruisers by Jennings (1999).

zh: “镣铐束缚”是航海者用来描述三种不同情况的航海术语。
en: 'Caught in the irons' is anautical ter m used by sailing folk to describe three types of situations.

zh: 第一，这个术语描述了船只驶入“禁区”的情况，也就是说，船必须逆风而行。
en: First, the term describes a situation where a boat has moved into a 'no go' zone — that is, the boat has come up to face the same direction from which the wind is coming.

zh: 因此，应该使风斜掠过帆，以使得船可以朝任何方向前进或驶离有风区。
en: As a result, the wind passes over the sails at an insufficient angle to enable the boat to make any forward motion or to move off the direction of the wind.

zh: 第二，这一术语代表使用脚镣作为惩罚，以使得航行的船只行动一致。
en: Second, the term means the use of a leg shackle as punishment to encourage conformity aboard vessels.

zh: 第三，这一术语是指陷入一种难以摆脱的关系中。
en: Third , the term refers to being stuck in a relationship in which one 'cannot' get out.

zh: 为了保持分析过程的 “自然主义”，“镣铐束缚”这一暗喻被从最初产生的情景中剥离出来，用于对相互之间关系错综复杂的文章进行编码。
en: To maintain the 'naturalism' of the analysis, the metaphor 'caught in the irons' was derived from the setting in which it emanated and was used to code text that identified relationships that were at odds with each other.

zh: 编码簿是由与调査问卷相对应的答案选项的所有代码组成的。
en: Code books consist of a record of all the codes assigned to response set categories for each question in a survey.

zh: 图9-1是一个编码簿节选的例子。
en: Figure 9.1 provides an example of an excerpt of a code book.

zh: 为了避免原编码簿的丢失，Neuman(2000)建议做编码簿的复制本。
en: Neuman (2000) suggests making a copy of the code book in case the original is misplaced.

zh: 这样能保证你有一个备份并且不必总是重新开始编码的过程。
en: This ensures that you have a backup and do not have to commence the coding process all over again.

zh: 尤其是当不止一人参与数据输人过程时，做编码簿的备份更显得重要：参与的人越多，资料错位的可能性就越大，除非所有的参与者都能适时规范地遵守清晰的程序。
en: Having copies of code books is especially important if more than one person is involved in data entry: the more people involved, the greater the possibility of materials being misplaced, unless there are very clear procedures in place that are followed prescriptively by all involved.

zh: 因果关系研究可能源于探索性研究或描述性研究。
en: Causal research may be generated from either exploratory or descriptive research.

zh: 因果关系研究与定量研究方法之间的联系并不是模棱两可的，为了支持或推翻两个或多个变量之间的因果关系，运用这一研究方法时通常涉及变量的使用和假说的建立。
en: Causal research is unambiguously linked to the use of a quantitative methodology and involves the use of variables and the construction of hypotheses to support or reject causal relationships between two or more variables.

zh: 例如，研究者可能论证以下命题：在淡季由于通往省会城市的机票价格下降而可能会提高该城市的游览率。
en: For example, a researcher may consider the following statement: the lowering of airfares to capital cities in the low season will increase visitation rates to those cities.

zh: 在正、负偏态曲线中，中位数是集中趋势量数中比较好测量的，因为它更接近于大多数的数值，平均值并不代表典型的个案（Tilley 1999，p.125）。
en: In the case of negatively and positively skewed curves, the median is a better measure of central tendency because it is closer to the majority of the scores and the mean does not represent the 'typical' case (Tilley 1999, p. 125).

zh: 在J-形分布 中，众数是比较适合的，因为它比中位数或者平均值更接近于大多数的数值（Tilley 1999，p.125）。
en: In the case of J-shaped curves, the mode is more appropriate as it is closer to the majority of scores than either the median or the mean (Tilley 1999, p. 125).

zh: 关于分布的讨论引发了对于变异量数的探讨。
en: A discussion of distribution leads into a discussion of measures of variation.

zh: 生物地理学家和生态学家还经常通过“遍历假说”把空间和时间联系起来。该项假说作为 一种权宜的研究策略，把空间上不同区域视为时间上不同阶段（Chorley and Kennedy, 1971; Bennett and Chorley, 19788）。
en: Biogeographers and ecologists also often link space and time through the ‘ergodic hypothesis’ whereby, as an expedient research strategy, different areas in space are taken to represent different stages in time (Chorley and Kennedy, 1971; Bennett and Chorley, 1978).

zh: 演替过程研究就是经典例子：在局部地区内某一时刻，选取不同地点或空间单位代表该地区长期物种变化序列。
en: Classic examples are in the study of vegetation successional processes, where differing locations or spatial units within a local area at one point in time are taken to represent the sequences of species changes that would occur in that area over long periods of time.

zh: 这些东西的出现绝非一日之功，而是渐进的标准化与协同研究的对象，历经几个世纪才得以投入使用。
en: They didn’t suddenly come into existence over night but were the subject of progressive standardizations and co-ordinations that have taken centuries to put into place.

zh: 而且此类事物还需海量的投资。
en: And they required extraordinary investments too.

zh: 它们需要研制专门化设备，能够在相同地点测量相同的事物，今天基于卫星的全球定位系统(GPS)就是其最终产物。
en: They required the invention of specialized devices that could measure the same things at the same places, culminating in today’s satellite-based global positioning system (GPS).

zh: 表面效度是指对于某一概念的测量看似十分恰当，那就是“可以从表面上判断”（Saramakos 1998，P.79)。
en: Face validity refers to the fact that the concept being measured is being done so appropriately, that is 'on the face of it ' (Sarantakos 1998, p . 79).

zh: 例如，一份由旅游者自己完成的调查表，要实施游客对某一具体旅游吸引物的满意度调査，如果采访者设计问题时涉及对设施、舒适、服务和吸引物本身的满意度，那么我们说它具有表面效度。
en: For example, an interviewer-completed questionnaire intending to establish  tourist satisfaction at a specific tourist attraction is said to have face validity if the interviewer poses questions relating to levels of satisfaction with the facilities, amenities, services and the attraction itself.

zh: 如果没有涉及满意水平，则调査表就不具有表面效度。
en: If no questions are asked about satisfaction levels, then the questionnaire has little face validity.

zh: 我看见两个约12岁的小孩坐在史蒂文森城的一个椅子上，他们正在热烈地交谈着什么，他们的行为很规范——他们是波多黎各人。
en: I noticed two boys about 12 years old sitting on a Stuyvesant Town bench.

zh: 突然，两个保安走来一个从北，另一个从南。
en: They were deep in conversation,  quiet, well-behaved-and Puerto Rican.Suddenly two Stuyvesant Town guards were approaching --- one from the north and one from the south.

zh: 其中一个指着那两个小孩向另一个打手势。
柯布西耶写道:“我们快速行驶的小车驶上一条特殊的、位于壮观的摩天大楼间的高架桥;当我们驶近时，可以看见层摩天大楼顶着的蓝天时隐时现，在我们的左右的每个单个区域的外部是一些政府和行政楼;而最外层是博物馆和大学楼群。整个城市是一个公园。”
en: Le Corbusier wrote, "Our fast car takes the special elevated motor track between the majestic skyscrapers: as we approach nearer, there is seen the repetition against the sky of the twenty-four skyscrapers; to our left and right on the outskirts of each particular area are the municipal and administrative buildings; and enclosing the space are the museums and university buildings. The whole city is a Park."

zh: 使用数学概念带来的一个使思维清晰的重要好处就是，随机模型可以替代定数模型（Lewis，1965）。
en: A very important benefit to clarity of thought resulting from the use of mathem  atical concepts is that deterministic models can be replaced by stochastic models (Lewis, 1965).

zh: 自从1927年德国物理学家沃纳•海森堡（Werner K. Heisenberg）提出物理学中的不确定原则以来，这一基本概念就已经传播到其他研究领域。
en: Since 1927, when Wemer K. Heisenberg, a German physicist, formulated the principle of indeterminacy in physics, the basic concept has spread to other fields of study.

zh: 在物理学中，这一原则论证了要同时完全准确地测出电子的位置和速度是不可能的事情。
en: In physics this principle demonstrates that it is impossible to measure with full accuracy at the same time both the position and the velocity of an electron.

zh: 能够用这种方法驯服的自然系统称为有弹性的系统——即通过建立新平衡的方法对管理造成的干扰作出反应。
en: A natural system that can be managed in this way is said to be resilient – that is, it responds to management perturbations by adopting a new equilibrium.

zh: 说明这种原理的例子很多，但主要有两种不确定性使其受到损害。
en: There are abundant examples of this kind of philosophy, but there are two major types of uncertainty that undermine it.

zh: 首先是极端事件能完全消除美好的意图（一场大洪水就能冲毁代表平衡状态的沙石坝）。
en: The first is that extreme events can obliterate the good intentions (a great flood can simply remove all the gravel bars that represent equilibrium conditions).

zh: 其次，存在着未知的和未能预见的复杂情况（包括隐藏的阈限），使得对系统过分简化的看法格外危险。
en: Second, there are unknown and unforeseen complications (including hidden thresholds) that make an oversimplified view of the system exceptionally dangerous.

zh: 部分和整体相互构成对方。“部分创造了整体，同时整体创造部分”(Levins and Lewontin, 1985)。
en: Parts and wholes are mutually constitutive of each other."Part makes whole, and whole makes part" (Levins and Lewontin, 1985).

zh: 这是吉登斯在有关构成理论著作中提倡的原则(行动创造了结构，同时结构创造了行动)，并且这当然也是在马克思全部著作中发挥作用的根本原则。
en: This is a principle that Giddens (1984) promotes in some of his writings on structuration theory (agency makes structure and structure makes agency) and it is, of course, a fundamental principle which operates across the whole breadth and range of Marx's work.

zh: 说部分和整体相互构造对方，不只是说在它们之间存在着一种反馈循环。
en: To say that parts and wholes are mutually constitutive of each other is to say much more than that there is a feedback loop between them.

zh: 草根理论分析在本章的前面略有涉及（在第三章也有过介绍），在这里将对这种研究方法进行详细阐述。
en: Grounded theory analysis was referred to briefly earlier in the chapter (and in chapter 3), and here we elaborate further on this research method.

zh: 具体而言，草根理论是一种系统的定性研究方法 (Strauss & Corbin 1990，p.24)，它使得研究人员能够从所研究的现象中归纳出理论。
en: Specifically, grounded theory is a systematic qualitative research method(Strauss & Corbin 1990, p. 24) that enables the researcher to inductivelygenerate theory from the phenomenon being studied.

zh: 草根理论依据四条标准：适用性、可理解性、普遍性、可控制性（Strauss & Corbin 1990，p.23)。
en: Grounded theorydepends on four criteria: 'fit, understanding, generality, and control'(Strauss & Corbin 1990, p. 23).

zh: 但是，与所有的定性研究一样，“最终所创建的理论受限于这些分类、各个类别的特性和维度以及存在于所收集的真实数据中的对于它们之间关系的说明”（Strauss & Corbin丨990 , p. 112)。
en: However, like all qualitative research,' [y]our final theory is limited to those categories, their properties and dimensions, and statements of relationships that exist in the actual data collected' (Strauss & Corbin 1990, p. 112).

zh: 因此，草根理论是表意的，它提供的是象征性说明或“深描”；同时“确保其具有有限的普遍性”（Wolcott 1990，p.30)。
en: Consequently, grounded theory is ideographic — it provides a symbolic representation or 'thick' description; and 'limited generalisation is warranted' (Wolcott 1990, p. 30).

zh: 重新考虑一下图2.6，这些实验数据似乎颇有说服力，但后来生长的差异是部分地取决于时间系列上较早出现的、可能是异常的原因。同时还有基质与地下水位下降相互作用的效应。
en: Consider Figure 2.6 again; these experimental data appear reasonably convincing, but later differences in growth are determined in part by those that arise early in the time series, possibly for abnormal reasons.There is also an interaction between the effects of substrate and rate of water-table lowering.

zh: 所有这些问题都意味着实验检验必须基于对背后的理论以及容许产生可检验的假设的逻辑含义的清楚了解。
en: What all of these problems imply is that experimental tests must be based on a clear understanding of underlying theory, and the logical implications that allow the generation of testable hypotheses.

zh: 这样一个世界中会出现我们实际上看到的空间分布非常不均匀的经济活动吗？在实际世界中，大多数人聚居在面积很小的城市里，而城市本身也是高度专业化的。
en: Would such a world give rise to the highly uneven spatial distribution of economic activity we actually see, in which most people live on the small urbanized fraction of the land, and in which urban areas themselves are highly specialized?

zh: 答案当然是否定的。
en: The answer, of course, is that it would not.

zh: 因为这是一个不存在任何扭曲的帕累托有效的世界，因而有效的结果（同时也是市场结果）必然是在整个平原上每一种产品的生产都均匀分布，这样无须运输。
en: The efficient thing (and also the market outcome, since this would be an undistorted, Pareto-efficient world) would be to have production of every commodity spread evenly across the plain, so that no transportation is necessary.

zh: 在这些费用中有运输费用，所以初始命题中有一个就是制造业的配置要把运输费用减至最少。
en: Among these costs are those of transport, and so among the initial propositions was one that the location of manufacturing industry is undertaken so as to minimize transport costs.

zh: 从这些命题中可以发展工业分布的模型，并可得出关于特定区位的假设。
en: From such propositions, models of the distribution of industry could be developed, and hypotheses about particular locations could be derived.

zh: 这个理论主体已被应用于多种多样的关联域中，越愈重视各产业间在货流、服务和信息流上联系的重要性，以及把这些联系扩大为对区位的主要影响因素的要求。
en: The body of theory was applied in a variety of contexts, increasingly emphasizing the importance of linkages between industries in the flow of goods, services and information, and the desire to maximize these links as a major influence on location.

zh: 这种循环模型直接暗含在现代性的作品之中（Taylor, 1999）。
en: This cyclical model is directly implicated in the creation of modernities (Taylor, 1999).

zh: 如前所述，现代性状态经历着不断的转变和三个盟主——新商业主义、新产业主义、新消费主义——引起的经济剧变，加剧了社会转变的程度。
en: As previously noted, the condition of modernity is experienced as incessant change and the economic upheavals caused by the three hegemons – new mercantilism, new industrialism, new consumerism – intensified the degree of social change.

zh: 现代性造就了大量机会与风险，寻常百姓不得不对此作出反应。

en: Worlds of new opportunities and dangers were created to which ordinary people were forced to respond.

zh: 常人方法论是以加芬克尔（Garfinkel.1967)以及齐默曼（Zimmerman 1971)的著作为基础，而加芬克尔创造了这个专有名词。
en: Ethnomethodology is grounded in the work of Garfinkel (1967), who alsocoined the term, and Zimmerman (1971).

zh: 常人方法论将舒茨的观点扩展到了日常生活中。
en: Ethnomethodology is an extension of the work of Schutz applied to everyday life.

zh: 常人方法论的观点认为，社会生活中并无秩序可言，所谓的秩序是由社会行动者们创造的。
en: From an ethnomethodological perspective, there is no order to social life, only that ascribed by the social actors.

zh: 城市经济学中有大量丰富的文献，它们大部分源自亨德森（1974）的工作，在这些文献中，一个城市系统就从这样的较量过程中产生。
en: There is a well-developed literature in urban economics, largely deriving from the work of Henderson (1974), in which a system of cities evolves from such a tension.

zh: 在亨德森那类模型中， 向心力来自生产中假设的当地化外部经济；离心力是城市地租。
en: In Henderson-type models, the centripetal force arises from assumed localized external economies in production; the centrifugal force is urban land rent.

zh: 再加上一些有关城市形成过程的假设条件，运用亨德森的方法就可建立一个决定城市数量和规模的模型（虽然它没有给出城市之间的相对位置）。
en: Together with assumptions about the process of city formation, Henderson's approach yields a model of the number and sizes of cities (though not of their location relative to one another).

zh: 在地方政府撤出而留下的真空地带，自愿主义（voluntarism)开始成为满足穷人需要的主要手段，而在较富裕的社区，各种各样“偷偷摸摸的”、“私下的”政府（如业主协会）大行其道。
en: In the vacuum left by the retreat of the local state, voluntarism has become a principal means of providing for the needs of the indigent, while in more affluent communities various forms of ‘stealthy’, ‘private’ governments, such as homeowner associations, have proliferated.

zh: 与此同时，地方政府本身越来越转向私人部门，通过各种形式的公共-私人之间的合作去寻找资本 以进行经济和社会投资，并更加注重经济开发，而不是转向传统的地方政府提供服务和调控的职能。
en: Local governments have turned increasingly to the private sector for capital for economic and social investment through public–private partnerships of various kinds, and now give much greater priority to economic development than to the traditional service-providing and regulating functions of the local state.

zh: 这种“城市企业家化"（‘civic entrepreneurialism’）导致了某种投机性的、零敲碎打的方法盛行于城市管理中，过多地强调固定项目的建设，如闹市区的商业中心、繁华热闹的市场、会议和展览中心，凡此种种，即那些被看做能够最大限度地提高不动产的价值（因而能重振地方的税基）、带来零售业的兴旺和就业增长的项目。
en: This ‘civic entrepreneurialism’ has fostered a speculative and piecemeal approach to the management of cities, with a good deal of emphasis on setpiece projects,  such as downtown shopping centres, festival market places, conference and exhibition centres and the like, that are seen as having the greatest capacity to enhance property values (and so revivify the local tax base) and generate retail turn-over and employment growth.

zh: 持续比较分枓使研究人员得以创建草根理论。
en: Constant comparative analysis allows the researcher to develop groundedtheory.

zh: 草根理论是在研究中 通过归纳而创立的理论。
en: A grounded theory is one inductively derived from the study.

zh: 数据收集、分析与理论之间是相互联系的。
en: Data collection, analysis, and theory are related reciprocally.

zh: 依据从研究参与者的有关信仰的言论和行为中所获得的数据构建理论……这与定量范式中理论的应用截然相反。
en: One grounds the theory in the data from statements of belief and behavior of participants in the study . . . It is basically opposite to the use of theory in the quantitative paradigm.

zh: 与证明理论不同，定性研究人员对环境进行历时研究，并依据数据创建理论(Janesick 1994，pp.218 ~ 219)。
en: Instead of proving a theory, the qualitative researcher studies a setting over time and develops theory grounded in the data (Janesick 1994, pp. 218-19).

zh: 作为对日益增长的其他城市分析之合唱的回应，他们认为，城市是不断增长的各种经济和社会生活网的交点，尽管许多城市并不相互连接。
en: Echoing a growing chorus of other urban analysts, they argue that cities are increasingly intersections of multiple webs of economic and social, life, many of which do not interconnect.

zh: 他们称这一城市为多元城市（multiplex city), “一个矛盾和差异的并存体，它自己生活的舞台”。
en: This they call the multiplex city ‘a juxtaposition of contradictions and diversities, the theatre of life itself’.

zh: 博耶（1995）在美化城市（figured city)(为富人单独规划的城市）和丑化城市（disfigured city)(由穷人居住的、被忽视的、失控的城市空间）之间进行了相同的区分。
en: Boyer (1995) makes a similar distinction between the  ‘figured city’ – the isolated planned city for affluent groups – and the ‘disfigured city’ – the neglected, unmanaged, spaces of the city inhabited by poorer groups.

zh: 因此，关于城市我们越来越不能一般化了。
en: Increasingly, then, we cannot generalize about the city.

zh: 出生日期方法：在这种方法中，抽样框由参与者的出生日期构成，并采用和名称方法同样的程序进行样本单元的抽取，只是用出生日期代替了名称。
en: Date of birth method With this method, the sampling frame is constructed using participants' date of birth and selection follows the same procedure as the name method, only birth dates are used instead.

zh: 出生日期是随机抽取的，在抽样框中的那个日期的所有记录被确定为一个数字，接着用简单随机抽样程序(抽签方法、随机数表或电脑方法)抽取样本单位。
en: A birth date is randomly selected, and all records for that date listed in the sampling frame are then assigned a number and the simple random sampling procedure (the lottery method, a table of random numbers or computer generation) is repeated.

zh: 同样，这个程序的选取也可能需要重复。

en: Again, there may be several iterations of this process.

zh: 答案选项在本质上应该是穷尽的、互斥的和单一尺度的。
en: Responses sets should be exhaustive, mutually exclusive and unidimensional in nature.

zh: 答案选项的种类包括使用对照表、排序量表、李克特量表、语义差异量表和情景法。
en: Response sets include the use of checklists, ranking scales, Likert scales, semantic differential scales and scenarios.

zh: 为确定问卷设计的合理应该使用前测研究。
en: Pilot studies should be used to ensure that the survey is well constructed.

zh: 马克思指出，推动货币产生的社会交换过程表明货币是社会必要劳动时间的代表，价格是“价值的货币名称”。
en: The social processes of exchange which give rise to money, Marx concluded, show that money is a representation of socially necessary labor time and price is "the money name of value."

zh: 但过程是矛盾的，因此货币总是并不可信和并不可靠的社会劳动价值代表。
en: But the processes are contradictory and money is therefore always a slippery and unreliable representation of value as social labor.

zh: 货币贬值、通货膨胀、投机狂潮等，所有这些都说明货币在作为价值代表时总是高度地不稳定。
en: Debasement of the coinage, extraordinary rates of inflation in certain periods and places, speculative rages, all illustrate how money can itself be seriously unstable as a representation of value.

zh: 描述性统计能够使调查人员以数字术语来描述收集的原始数据（Neuman 2000，p.317)。
en: Descriptive statistics enable researchers to describe the aggregation of raw data in numerical terms (Neuman 2000, p. 317).

zh: 描述性统计包括使用单变量分析、双变量分析及多变量分析。
en: Descriptive statistics involve the use of univariate, bivariate and multivariate analysis.

zh: 这些分析方法包括使用频数分布、百分比表格以及集中趋势量数。
en: These methods of analysis incorporate the use of frequency distributions, percentage tables and measures of central tendency.

zh: 同时也包括使用变异量数，例如：单变量分析中的极差、百分位点及标准差；双变量分析的交叉表、散点图以及相关性的测量，如卡方检验X2、系数9、Spearman等级相关系数及皮尔森积差(r)相关系数；多变量分析的X2、方差分析和多元回归分析。
en: They also incorporate the use of measures of variation, such as: ranges, percentiles and standard deviation for univariate analysis; cross-tabulation, scattergrams and measures of association such as chi-square, the phi coefficient, Spearman's rho and Pearson's r for bivariate analysis; and chi-square, analysis of variance and multiple regression analysis for multivariate analysis.

zh: 在《单子论》这本接近其生命终点的著作中，莱布尼茨提出一种建立在单子概念上的形而上学，单子把存在的一切都内在化了。
en: In the Monadology, written towards the very end of his life, Leibniz proposes a metaphysics founded on the concept of a monad that internalizes everything there is.

zh: 每一个单子都反映宇宙:“对应”法则内在地把每一单子指派成宇宙的镜子。
en: Each monad mirrors the universe: a principle of "correspondence" internally constitutes each monad as that mirror of the universe.

zh: 莱布尼茨在两个方面限定这种对应法则。
en: Leibniz restricts this correspondence principle in two respects.

zh: 在此，我们达及了古丁所称的绿色价值理论的核心(Goodin，1992: chapter 2)。
en: We arrive here at the core of what Goodin (1992: chapter 2) calls a green theory of value.

zh: 它是这样一种情感和主张，提供了一种“统一的道德想象”，这种想象以各种方式贯穿于几乎全部生态的和绿色的政治思维。
en: It is a set of sentiments and propositions which provides a "unified moral vision" running, in various guises, throughout almost all ecological and green political thinking.

zh: 如我们不久将看到的，它拥有激进的、自由主义的和相当保守的表现形式。
en: It has radical, liberal and quite conservative manifestations as we shall shortly see.

zh: 并且由于它的道德共同体强烈地依赖于地方经验，它常常指导环境政治学去保护并增进特定地方的既有品质。
en: And by virtue of its strong attachment of moral community to the experience of place, it frequently directs environmental politics towards a preservation and enhancement of the achieved qualities of particular places.

zh: 申请道德审查如若与研究计划的准备工作同步进行，就将拥有足够的时间等待道德审査的通过，进而也提高了通过审查的成功率和工作效率。
en: When preparing a research proposal, it is sometimes expeditious tosimultaneously apply for ethical approval for your research, so that there is enough time for the ethical clearance to be processed and hopefullyapproved.

zh: 同时，如果研究计划获批，这种方式也将避免整个研究进程因为等待道德审查的通过而受到影响。
en: By doing this, should your proposal be accepted, your research will not be held up waiting for ethical approval.

zh: 道德审査对于有关人类或非人类的研究而言都是必需的，这一点务必牢记。
en: Remember,ethical clearance is needed for research involving human and/or non-human participants.

zh: 地标(landmarks )，就像其名字表明的那样，是主要的方向指示物。
en: Landmarks, as their name says, are prime orientation clues.

zh: 但是，好的地标(landmarks )在城市里还可以发挥阐明城市秩序的两个作用。
en: But good landmarks in cities also perform two other services in clarifying the order of cities.

zh: 首先，它们可以起到强调城市的多样性(并且增加这种强调的意义)的作用;通过表明它们与其邻居的差异，可以把人们的注意力吸引过来，而且因为有差异，所以它们才显得重要。
en: First, they emphasize(and also dignify)the diversity of cities; they do this by calling attention to the fact that they are different from their neighbors, and important because they are different.

zh: 时间和空间概念影响着我们理解世界的方式。
en: Concepts of space and time affect the way we understand the world to be.

zh: 它们也提供了一种参照体系，借助于这个体系，我们定位自己与世界的关系(或者用第三章的语言来说，定义自己的“情境性”和“位置性”)。
en: And they also provide a reference system by means of which we locate ourselves (or define our "situatedness" and "positionality," to use the language of chapter 3) with respect to that world.

zh: 因此，进一步讨论时间和空间而不使用“位置”(place)这个术语，这是不可能的。
en: It is therefore impossible to proceed far with a discussion of space and time without invoking the term "place."

zh: 这反过来会影响我们“安置”(place)事物，特别是思考事物秩序中的“我们的位置”。
en: This in turn has implications for how we "place" things and how we think of "our place" in the order of things in particular.

zh: 但是,把一个三维实体(地景)压扁成一维尺度损失了大量信息,而且这些一维变量被证明同样是不精密和不十分准确的。
en: However, the collapse of a three-dimensional entity (the landscape) into one- dimensional measurements loses a great deal of information, and these variables proved equally imprecise, and not very accurate.

zh: 测量河流流速的例子也把吸引力导向许多地理学测量中的维度变化问题。
en: The example of measuring flow velocity in rivers also draws attention to the change in dimensionality of much measurement in geography.

zh: 在利用电动机械流速仪测量一个方向主流方向)时间平均流速的地方,以高频率进行测量的现代仪器还测量两个或三个正交的方向。
早在有文字记载之前，人们即使只是离开居住地较短的距离，也会发现不同地区之间的差异。
en: Long before the dawn of written history, men who explored even just a short distance from home were aware of differences that distinguished one place from another.

zh: 这就产生了地区差异的概念。
en: The concept of areal differentiation had been bom.

zh: 其中一些人试图将当时人们认知以外地区的景象抽象成意像（mental images），并告诉其他人。
en: Some people were drawn to the challenge of forming mental images of what it was like beyond the horizon and communicating these images to others.

zh: 这种地球表面的差异就是约翰•赖特（John K. Wright）所说的“地理多样性”（geodiversity）。
en: The differentiation of the face of the earth is what John K. Wright called “geodiversity.”

zh: 最近几年，人们提出了这样一种与众不同但却相当普及的主张:“空间”规定了差异、他性、没有管束、不可预见、意外等等领域，因此也规定作用地点和解放政治支点。
en: In recent years, the extraordinary, but now quite widespread claim, has been advanced that "space" defines the realm of difference, of otherness, the uncontrolled, the unpredictable, the unexpected, and, hence, the locus of agency and the leveraging point for emancipatory politics.

zh: 空间为全部有关社会过程的元理论规定了不可驯服的残余。
en: Space defines the untamable residual to all metatheories of the social process.

zh: 这些非常强烈的主张值得我们批判性详察。
en: These are very strong claims that deserve critical scrutiny.

zh: 它们预示了这个问题，如何理解有关行动和社会决定问题的差异地理学和理论化的空间性。
en: They presage the question of how to understand the geography of difference, the spatiality of theorizations, in relation to the issues of agency and social determination.

zh: 迄今为止，地理学史都是以一种狭隘的、非批判性的方式编写的，而且通常被用以证明当前各种地理学支持者的活动和观点都是合理的。
en: Until recently, the history of geography was written in narrow, uncritical terms and was usually invoked to legitimize the activities and perspectives of different geographical constituencies in the present.

zh: 本学科的历史是在知识真空中进行研究，与外部的经济、社会、政治和文化势力隔离开来。
en: The discipline’s past was presented in an intellectual vacuum, sealed off from external economic, social, political or cultural forces.

zh: 然而，近年来地理学史呈现为一种较少内省、较少为自我服务和较少目的论的研究方式。
en: More recently, however, the history of geography has been presented in a less introspective, self-serving and teleological fashion.

zh: 在地统计学领域中近期的发展包括空间自相关技术和克里格法等方法，最初是为了把矿体中矿物浓度的变化绘制成图。
en: More recent developments in the field of geostatistics include spatial autocorrelation techniques and methods such as kriging, originally developed to map variation in mineral concentrations within ore bodies.

zh: 克里格法能够帮助识别出哪些尺度其过程是重要的，不同的现象是怎样在空间中显示出连贯性的。
en: Kriging helps identify the scales over which certain processes remain important and how different phenomena show continuity in space.

zh: 这些方法大大改进了传统的制图技术——过去，当遇到空间中分散的观测物时，需要综合运用知识、判断和纯粹的猜测在图上画出等值线。
en: Such methods provide a real improvement on traditional mapping techniques – in the old days, when faced with a scatter of observations in space, one used a mixture of knowledge, judgement and pure guesswork to draw the isolines on a map.

zh: 描述频数分布的其他方法有折线图、直方图、地图绘制法以及人口锥形图。
en: Other methods of representing frequency distributions are polygons, histograms, cartographs and population pyramids.

zh: 折线图是由直线连接的点构成的，大多用于离散数据。
en: Polygons consist of dots joined by lines and are mostly used with interval data.

zh: 直方图是由彼此挨着的垂直长方条构成的。
en: Histograms are graphs with vertical bars adjoining each other.

zh: 连接这些长方条的中点，就能够制成频数的折线图。
en: These can be made into a frequency polygon by joining the midpoints of the bars.

zh: 地图绘制法在地图上描述频数,形象地确定了所描述变量的位置和重要性(Sanmtakos 1998)。
en: Cartographs demonstrate frequencies on a map to visually identify the location and magnitude of the variable being represented (Sarantakos 1998).

zh: 人口锥形图通常描述两个变量（例如，性别和年龄）来彼此互相对比，它是使用水平位置的线条来描述频数的。
en: Population pyramids usually portray two variables (such as sex and age) in comparison to each other using horizontally positioned bars to represent the frequencies.

zh: 柏拉图在《蒂迈欧篇》（Timaeus）和《克利蒂亚斯篇》（Critias）中提及了亚特兰蒂斯城。
en: Plato also related the story of Atlantis in the Timaeus and the Critias.

zh: 他说到，希腊世界在公元前9000年曾遭到来自西部某个地区并有着高度文明的民族的入侵。
en: The Greek world, he said, was about to be invaded in the year 9000b.c. by a highly civilized people who lived somewhere to the west.

zh: 希腊军队经过激烈的斗争，才获得胜利，但是恰恰在入侵者被击败的同时，他们的家乡发生了强烈的地震，然后沉人大海。
en: The Greek armies, after a fierce struggle, were victorious, but just as the invaders were defeated, their homeland suffered a disastrous earthquake and sank beneath the sea.

zh: 在1932年，李克特发明了一种等级测量法以衡量态度。
en: In 1932, Likert developed a rating scale to measure attitudes.

zh: 李克特量表的格式包括一系列与研究课题相关的项目——比如海滨城镇的娱乐场所发展对社会影响的各个方面。
en: The construction of Likert scales involves the generation of a number of items related to a research topic — for example, items related to the social impact of a casino development in a coastal town.

zh: 首先，收集大量关于课题的项目；然后围绕这些项目设计问题，并准备五种答案，如：非常赞同、赞同、不确定、不赞同、非常反对。
en: Initially, a large number of items are generated in relation to the topic.Statements using those items are then prepared with a five-point response set using, for example, strongly agree, agree, undecided, disagree, strongly disagree.

zh: 传统城市模型的做法是：假定对厂商而言，规模报酬递增是完全外生的，从而允许建模者继续使用完全竞争的假设。
en: Traditional urban models do so by assuming that increasing returns are purely external to firms, allowing the modeler to continue to assume perfect competition.

zh: 不过这里采用的方法避免了对外部经济的任何直接假定：以单个厂商水平上的规模经济为基础，厂商们在市场上相互影响的结果就会产生外部性。
en: The approach taken here, however, involves avoiding any direct assumption of external economies: externalities emerge as a consequence of market interactions involving economies of scale at the level of the individual firm.

zh: 因此我们必须设法模型化一个不完全竞争的市场结构。
en: Thus we must somehow model an imperfectly competitive market structure.

zh: 这一类模型中最实用的当然是迪克西特一斯蒂格里茨（1977）的垄断竞争模型。
en: The workhorse model of this kind is, of course, the Dixit-Stiglitz (1977) model of monopolistic competition.

zh: 迪斯尼哲学的最终目标是在奥兰多创造一个庆典城市，一个完整的、私有的居住社区，在这里，伴随社会极化的紧张关系能够被排除。
en: The ultimate extension of the Disney philosophy is the creation of Celebration City in Orlando, an integrated, privatized, residential community in which the tensions associated with social polarization can be excluded.

zh: 然而，索金认为在后现代时代，城市作为一个整体正在变成一个巨大的 “主题公园”，各种模拟物表现出一个髙度扭曲的世界观（一个他称作非地理化（ageographia) 的空间）。
en: Sorkin argues that in a postmodern era the city has a whole is becoming one big ‘theme park’ in which a variety of simulations present a highly distorted view of the world (a space he terms ageographia).

zh: 其结果是，当代城市中各种各样的后现代主义建筑代表了文化的肤浅表面（这可以称之为迪斯尼化（Disneyfication））。
en: The result is that the diverse postmodern buildings of the contemporary city present a shallow facade of culture (sometimes termed Disneyfication).

zh: 第一种方法是数置方法（quantitative approach)，它试图通过使用以地图、图表和数学公式的形式表现出来的统计数据来描述城市的地理结构。
en: First there is the quantitative approach, which attempts to provide descriptions of the geographical structure of cities using statistical data represented in the form of maps, graphs, tables and mathematical equations.

zh: 采用这种方法很大程度上是受到新古典经济学（neo-classical economics)和功能主义社会学（functionalist sociology)的启发。
en: Much of the inspiration for this approach has come from neoclassical economics and functionalist sociology.

zh: 这些方法的目标是希望能够“科学地”，也就是通过使用一种不会受到观察者的价值和观点影响的分析方法来客观地描述城市。
en: These approaches aim to be ‘scientific’, providing objective descriptions of cities in such a way that the values and attitudes of the observer do not influence the analysis.

zh: 这种试图将观察者和观察物分开的方法被称为笛卡儿法（Cartesian approach)。这种方法是以哲学家笛卡儿的名字命名的。
en: This attempt to separate the observer from the observed is often termed the Cartesian approach, after the philosopher Descartes.

zh: 把万物都还原为洪流和潮流，随后对全部形式和位置之短暂性的强调便有自身的限制。
en: The reduction of everything to fluxes and flows, and the consequent emphasis upon the transitoriness of all forms and positions has its limits.

zh: 如果全部固定的东西总是瞬间就烟消云散，那么做成什么事都是很困难的，甚至做出什么决定也都很难。
en: If everything that is solid is always instantaneously melting into air, then it is very hard to accomplish anything or even set one's mind to do anything.

zh: 面对这种困难，回到简单的基本信仰(不管它们是右派对家庭的崇拜，还是左派对“抵抗”的崇拜)，以及抛弃无法控制的以过程为基础的论证，都是很强的诱惑。
en: Faced with that difficulty the temptation is strong to go back to some simple foundational beliefs (whether these be a fetishism of the family on the right or of something called "resistance" on the left) and dismiss the process-based arguments out of hand.

zh: 因此，在城市化过程中，似乎没有任何一个地方能够发动为系统转型提供动力的战斗的特殊主义。
en: There seems then to be no place within the urbanization process from which to launch any kind of militant particularism capable of grounding the drive for systemic transformations.

zh: 特别是最近20年来，“全球化”辞令已经变得特别重要，甚至在激进思想中代替了更具政治性的帝国主义、殖民主义和新殖民主义等概念。
en: In the last 20 years in particular, the rhetoric of "globalization" has become particularly important, even replacing within segments of radical thought the more politicized concepts of imperialism, colonialism, and neo-colonialism.

zh: 这种话语转向的意识形态结果特别地剥夺了各种形式的地方、城市甚至国家的政治行动的能力。
en: The ideological effect of this discursive shift has been extra-ordinarily disempowering with respect to all forms of local, urban, and even national political action.

zh: 二手资料总是存在信度问题。
en: There is always a question of reliability with secondary documents.

zh: 第“二”个研究者并不总是知道初始资料是为什么或怎么样产生的，也不很了解它们究竟属于哪种文化环境。
en: The 'secondary' researcher does not always know how and why the original documents were produced or the cultural setting in which they were produced.

zh: 正如塔茨曼（Tuchman 1994, p. 321）所评论的那样：要知道，所有的资料，不论是原始资料还是二手资料来源，都是有问题的。不要梦想着存在“自然的”、可预期的甚至是真实的资料。
en: As Tuchman (1994, p. 321) comments: 'Ask questions of all data, primary and secondary sources. Do not assume that anything about data is "natural," inevitable, or even true.'

zh: 第二类多样性是指那些为回应第一种用途而发展起来的商业(商店和服务设施），主要是服务于被首要用途吸引来的人群。
en: Secondary diversity is a name for the enterprises that grow in response to the presence of primary uses, to serve the people the primary uses draw.

zh: 如果这第二类多样性（secondary diversity）只单一地服务于首要用途，那么不管这是什么形式的用途，注定是无效的。
en: If this secondary diversity serves single primary uses, no matter what the type of use, is innately inefficient.

zh: 如果要想产生内在的有效的作用，那就需要服务于多个的混合首要用途，如果其他的三个生发多样性的条件也被充分注意的话，那么这种有效性则会是惊人的。
en: Serving mixed primary uses, it can be innately efficient and --- if  the other three conditions for generating diversity are favorable also --- it can be exuberant.

zh: 电话调査主要是结构式访谈，采用封闭式问题。访问者使用电话技术与受访者交流，并记录答案。
en: Telephone surveys are primarily structured interviews using closed questions, with an interviewer recording the respondent's answers.Contact with respondents is made using telephone technology.

zh: 计算机技术可以协助电话技术，在这种情况下，使用软件程序可以迅速记录受访者的回答，分析程序也有助于整合应答访谈数据。
en: Telephone technology may be further assisted by computer technology, in which case the responses are immediately recorded using software programs that integrate the responses with analysis procedures.

zh: 访员直接输入数据一般是与电话采访和“计算机辅助电话访谈”（CATI）设施 相关的。
en: Direct entry of data is generally associated with telephone interviewing and computer-assisted telephone interview (CATI) facilities.

zh: 通过使用“计算机辅助私人访谈”（CAPI）技术，直接的编码也是有可能的。
en: Direct coding is also possible through the use of computer-assisted personal interview (CAPI) technology.

zh: 这种技术允许访员以及受访者自己直接输入。
en: This technology allows direct entry by the interviewer as well as by respondents themselves.

zh: 计算机辅助电话访谈设施 （CATI）的使用在下面的行业透视中将会被讨论。
en: Use of CATI facilities is discussed in the following Industry Insight.

zh: 电脑方法：随机抽样可以由电脑程序产生。
en: Computer method Random samples may be generated by computer programs.

zh: 这时,研究者必须能够获得抽样框，如旅客名单、旅馆名录、景区名册、俱乐部名单或组织成员名单。
en: The researcher has to have access to a sampling frame, such as a passenger list, an accommodation listing, an attractions list, or a list of club or association members.

zh: 在抽样框中每个对象被指定一个号码。
en: Each individual entry on the sampling frame is assigned a number.

zh: 将要抽取的随机号码的总数是确定的，接着计算机程序就可以识别抽样单位。
en: The number of random numbers to be selected is determined and then the sample units are identified by the computer program.

zh: 数据输入可以采用转换表、页缘编码、直接的数据输入、调査者直接输入数据以及扫描仪（Babbie 1995，pp.369 ~ 372)。
en: Data can be entered using: transfer sheets; edge-coding; direct data entry; direct data entry by interviewers; scanners (Babbie 1995, pp . 369-72).

zh: 数据也可以使用电子数据表进行输入，或者使用笔、记录纸单进行人工输入。
en: It can also be entered using spreadsheets, as well as being entered manually using pen and paper recording sheets.

zh: 在讨论数据编码的第三阶段——数据整理——之前，我们先简要地概括各种数据输入的方法。
en: Each method is briefly overviewed prior to discussing the third phase of data coding, that is data cleaning.

zh: 电子问卷是最近涌现的一种收集数据的调查法。同邮寄调査一样，调査员与受访者之间没有直接的互动。
en: E-questionnaires are a more recent way of collecting data using surveys, in this case questionnaires, e-questionnaires are similar to mail surveys as there is no direct interaction between the researcher and the respondent.

zh: 然而，我们可以利用在线和实时谈话频道组织更多的交流和开放性访问，当然也能集中群组讨论。
en: However, undernets and real time chat channels can be used to conduct more interactive and open-ended 'interviews', as well as focused group discussions.

zh: 此外，还可使用公告板来研究有相似兴趣的群体。
en: Furthermore, bulletin boards can be used to study a group with similar interests.

zh: 加利福尼亚学派中的另一个重要研究主题是，在一个充满暴力和犯罪的环境里社会中较富裕阶层所使用的防御措施的发展。
en: Another important theme associated with urbanization under a regime of flexible accumulation is increasing social polarization and the development of protective measures by the more affluent sections of society in an environment in which violence and crime are routine.

zh: 这可以看做是对前文提到的不断增加的社会极化的一个回应。这些防范措施的一个典范是一种被称为碉堡式建筑（bunker architecture)(也称为“城堡式”、“增强式”或者“妄想狂式”建筑）的增多：城市的发展伴随着院门、栅栏和围墙、保安、红外感应器、行动监视器、与警察局的快速反应联系以及诸如有线电视这样的监视装置。
en: One manifestation of these defensive measures is the growth of so-called bunker architecture (also termed ‘citadel’, ‘fortified’ and ‘paranoid’architecture): urban developments with gates, barriers and walls, security guards, infra-red sensors, motion detectors, rapid response links with police departments and surveillance equipment such as CCTV.

zh: 资料三角校正是指研究者在研究过程引入多种资料来源。
en: Researchers concerned with data triangulation draw on various sources of data in the research process.

zh: 调查者三角校正是指研究中雇用若干个研究者或评论者。
en: Investigator triangulation refers to the employment of several researchers or evaluators in a study.

zh: 理论三角校正是指研究者用几种方法或视角分析资料。
en: Theory triangulation involves researchers using several theories or perspectives to analyse data.

zh: 方法论的三角校正是指研究者使用多种方法收集与研究相关的资料。
en: Methodological triangulation involves researchers using several methods to gather data relevant to a study.

zh: 定比测量法根据升序或降序分类，具有相同的间隔距离，特别的是最低单位可以是0。
en: Ratio measures have classificatory categories based on ascending or descending rank order, equal interval spaces and the addition of a zero point as the lowest unit.

zh: 当然定比测量没有必要从0开始（Kumar 1996）。
en: Interval measures do not necessarily commence at zero (Kumar 1996).

zh: 定距测量用于人口统计分类，比如年龄、收入水平或旅游团的人数。
en: Ratio measures are used with demographic variables such as age or income levels or number of people in a travel group.

zh: 定距测量法是定序测量法的拓展。
en: Interval measures are a further development of the ordinal measure.

zh: 定距测量保持类别间相等的间隔，如：0-15岁，16-30岁，31-45岁，46-60岁。
en: Interval measures are a further development of the ordinal measure.Interval measures contain equal separations between categories, such as 0-15 years, 16-30 years, 31-45 years and 46-60 years.

zh: 每一类别的上下限之间都相差15岁。
en: Each category has an interval of 15 years separating the upper and lower limits.

zh: 定距测量也用于日历时间，例如日、周、月、旅行距离和停留时间。
en: Interval measures are also used with calendar time, such as days, weeks and months, distance travelled and duration of stay.

zh: 封闭式问题有四种不同的测量层次:定类、定序、定距及定比层次。
en: Closed-ended questions are measured at different levels: nominal, ordinal,interval and ratio levels.

zh: 定类测量法使用名词等语词对答案选项加以分类。
en: The nominal measure is associated with the use of words or nouns to classify response sets.

zh: 它通常使用“其他”选项，以此保证包括所有的类别。
en: Nominal measures usually include the use of 'other' to ensure all categories have been included.

zh: 若成立，该假说则会成为解释所研究的现象的理论框架。
en: If accepted, the hypothesis becomes the theoretical construct to explain the phenomenon being studied.

zh: 定量研究方法把来源于被调查者的信息抽象成统计资料，而不是对现象做简单的文字描述。
en: A quantitative methodology abstracts data from the participants into statistical representations rather than textual pictures of the phenomenon.

zh: 整个研究过程是客观的，且结果对研究总体具有代表性。
en: The entire research process is objectively constructed and the findings are usually representative of the population being studied.

zh: 在1960年代，学界的兴趣和重点放在用这些地层事件推断第四纪地质事件发生的历史序列。
en: In the 1960s, the interest and emphasis lay in using these stratigraphic events to infer the historical sequence of events in the Quaternary period.

zh: 断代方法多种多样，从沉积岩简单的叠置规则(越深越老)到放射性同位素定年。
en: Dating methods ranged from the simple rule of superimposition for sedimentary rocks (deepest are oldest) to radio-isotope dating.

zh: 随着断代方法的改进，历史序列的精度也在改进。
en: As the methods of dating improved, so the precision of the historical sequence could also be improved.

zh: 人文地理学中时间以两种不同方式概念化(见第七章对自然地理学中时间的论述）。
en: In human geography, time has been conceptualized in two distinct ways (see Chapter 7 on time in physical geography).

zh: 对时间的一种看法是将之作为一种物理维度，能够精确测量的东西。
en: One view of time is as a physical dimension, something that can be measured precisely.

zh: 例如，地理学家可能把“时间维”加到聚落模型中，以表明在某个时期内这些模型是如何发展的。
en: Thus a geographer might add a ‘time dimension’ to a model of, say, settlements to show how patterns have developed over a given period.

zh: 这样的模型称为“动态模型”(与之相对的是描述某一时间事物状态的静态模型），此类模型依靠时间序列数据与分析。
en: Such models are called dynamic models (in contrast to ‘static models’ that describe a situation at one point in time) and rely on time-series data and analysis.

zh: “动态平衡”包括因不断侵蚀而导致的渐进性地形发育。
en: A ‘dynamic equilibrium’ involves progressive evolution of landform as a response to ongoing erosion.

zh: 很多能够影响区域尺度地貌的重大气候变化也是在这种时间尺度上进行的——例如，整个大陆冰盖的进退。
en: This is also the timescale at which major changes in climate can affect landforms at the regional scale – for example, advances and retreats of ice sheets over entire continents.

zh: 乔利等（Chorley et al., 1984）深入讨论了地貌中的尺度问题，而索恩斯（Thornes）则详细探讨了时间问题（第七章）。
en: Chorley et al. (1984) provide further discussion of the scale issue in geomorphology, while time is discussed in more detail by Thornes (Chapter 7)

zh: 读者因素准备研究计划时还需要了解目标读者。
en: Audience considerationsWhen preparing a research proposal, you need to be aware of your audience.

zh: 读者可能是普通大众、旅游组织/协会、政府机关、商业管理者、其他研究者或学者。
en: The audience may be the general public, tourism organisations and associations, government agencies, business managers, other researchers or academics.

zh: 不同的读者对写作形式有不同的要求（语调、音调、语气和风格）。
en: Each audience will require a specific style of writing (tone, tenor, mode and genre).

zh: 以上问题将于本章的报告部分进行详细讨论。
en: This is discussed in detail in the report section later in the chapter.

zh: 在《单子论》这本写于晚年的著作中，莱布尼茨提出一种建立在单子概念上的形而上学，单子把存在的一切都内在化了。
en: In the Monadology, written towards the very end of his life, Leibniz proposes a metaphysics founded on the concept of a monad that internalizes everything there is.

zh: 每一个单子都反映宇宙：“对应”法则内在地把每一单子指派成宇宙的镜子。
en: Each monad mirrors the universe: a principle of "correspondence" internally constitutes each monad as that mirror of the universe.

zh: 莱布尼茨在两个方面限定这种对应法则。
en: Leibniz restricts this correspondence principle in two respects.

zh: 在随机抽样中，研究者可以使用多种表格来帮助决定样本容量。
en: There are various tables available to researchers to assist in decision making regarding sample size in probability samples.

zh: 本章后边罗列了一些这样的表格。随机抽样方法较多，包括简单随机抽样（simple random sampling)、系统抽样（systematic sampling)、分层随机抽样（stratified random sampling)和多阶整群抽样（multistage cluster sampling) 。
en: Examples of such tables are presented later in the chapter.There are a number of random sampling approaches: simple random sampling, systematic sampling, stratified random sampling and multistage cluster sampling.

zh: 这些可憎的思想反映了一种占优势的正统，但同时也激起了热烈的辩论。
en: Such distasteful ideas reflected a prevailing orthodoxy but they also provoked spirited debate.

zh: 尽管环境决定论和科学种族主义常常互相强化，但也可能互相矛盾。
en: While environmental determinism and scientific racism were often mutually reinforcing ideas, they could also contradict one another.

zh: 有些种族论者假定，各“种族”均被固定在一个不变的“天然”级序，这个级序就是从不同起点出发的截然不同的发育系列中当前的表现(多元发生论)。
en: Some racial theorists assumed that different ‘races’ were fixed in an unchanging ‘natural’ hierarchy, the contemporary manifestation of quite distinct evolutionary sequences from different points of departure (polygenesis).

zh: 城市也对主观性有重要影响，因为它使不同的人群在很小的范围内同时存在。
en: Urban environments also have a crucial impact upon subjectivities because they tend to bring together in close juxtaposition many different types of people.

zh: 这样的混合就要求部分城市居民做出反应，不管这种反应是漠不关心、害怕、不情愿、不了解、尊敬，还是妒忌。
en: This mingling requires a response on the part of the city dweller, whether this is indifference, fear, loathing, incomprehension, admiration or envy.

zh: 有时，这些比较是建立在被讨论人群的原型基础上的，这些原型是通过夸张、简化或歪曲的描述得来的。
en: Sometimes these comparisons are based on stereotypes ---exaggerated, simplified or distorted interpretations --- of the group in question.

zh: 当然，对于二元论(binaries两分法）的应用通常集中在对这些差异的创造上（即男性/女性，健康/疾病，正常/发疯，异性恋/同性恋，本国人/外国人，真实/欺骗）。
en: Indeed, the use of binaries --- two-fold divisions --- is often central to the creation of these differences (e.g.male/female, healthy/sick, sane/mad, heterosexual/homosexual, non-foreigner/foreigner, authentic/fake).

zh: 第二个就是行动问题。

en: Secondly, there is the related problem of agency.

zh: 由于不再把工人阶级当作当代历史当事人，法兰克福学派在寻求替代性的行动地点时就存在着困难。
en: Having laid aside the working class as the agent of contemporary history, the Frankfurt School had difficulty in finding an alternative locus of action.

zh: 固然，有几个人发现了某种替代，如马尔库塞信任(由爱欲武装起来的)青年造反派，哈贝马斯在新社会运动中致力于建构一种交往行动的伦理学。
en: To be sure, several of them found some sort of alternative — Marcuse put his faith in youthful rebellion (powered by Eros) and Habermas in new social movements dedicated to the construction of an ethics of communicative action.

zh: 也许公共部门在城市形态重构上的最著名实例要数精神健康服务的反机构化（deinstitutionalization)导致城市无家可归者的方式。
en: Perhaps the best-known example of public sector restructuring upon urban form is the way that the deinstitutionalization of mental health services has contributed to urban homelessness.

zh: 反机构化包括关闭为诸如精神病人、学习障碍者、老年人或者严重残疾者这样的有需求群体提供长期服务业的大型机构，以及发展基于社区的各种形式的服务业。
en: Deinstitutionalization involves the closure of large institutions that provide long-term care for needy groups --- such as the mentally-ill, those with learning difficulties, the elderly or severely disabled --- and the development of a variety of community-based forms of care.

zh: 后者包括小型专门设施，或者也可以包括在基于社区的诸如家庭护士、医生、社会工作者和见习官员等专业服务队提供帮助的情况下，由家庭成员或朋友进行的私人家庭照料。
en: The latter include smaller purpose-built facilities or it can involve care within private households by families or friends supplemented by teams of community-based professionals such as home nurses, doctors, social workers and probation officers.

zh: 下面举例说明把一般事务转化为可研究问题的困难：欧洲以至全球许多河谷平原森林的衰退。
en: An example will illustrate this difficulty of turning a general issue into a researchable problem: the decline of floodplain woodland in many river valleys in Europe and, indeed, globally.

zh: 河流的渠道化和流量管理把这些河流与泛滥平原相隔离，导致洪水频率、河道迁移速率以及泛滥平原沉积物含水层充水的速率都降低了。
en: Channelization and river-flow management have separated rivers from their floodplains, leading to reductions of flood frequency, of rates of channel migration, and of recharge of floodplain sedimentary aquifers.

zh: 这些变化又导致河边木本树种繁殖机会降低、生境损失和生物多样性降低。
en: In turn, this has caused reduced opportunities for the regeneration of woody riparian species, a loss of habitat, and a reduction in biodiversity.

zh: 这些发展的一个主要结果就是公司变得更小了。
en: A major consequence of these developments is that firms are becoming much smaller.

zh: 其主要原因是现有公司的细分（有时被称作垂直分化（vertical disintegration))，以及新的小公司的快速增长。
en: This has arisen because existing firms have been subdivided (sometimes known as vertical disintegration) as well as through the rapid growth of new small firms.

zh: 与福特制支配下的内部规模经济不同，后福特制企业建立在外部范围经济上。
en: Rather than the internal economies of scale dominant under Fordism, neo-Fordist firms are therefore based on external economies of scope.

zh: 范围经济 (Economies of scope)是这样一些因素，它们使得生产系列产品成为可能，而不是生产单个产品。
en: Economies of scope are factors that make it possible to produce a range of products rather than to produce an individual item on its own.

zh: 当企业所属的产业做大时（例如，有大量的生产者），外部范围经济（External economies of scope)就得到增长。
en: External economies of scope arise when the industry to which the firm belongs to is large (i.e.there are a large number of producers).

zh: 推断统计需要使用概率抽样，它对检验假设及其与所研究总体之间的关系有重要意义。
en: Inferential statistics require the use of probability sampling and are important to test a hypothesis and its relationship to the overall population being studied.

zh: 推断统计的检验包括X2(用于定类测量层次)及方差分析(ANOVA)(用于定距测量层次）。
en: Tests of inferential statistics include chi-square (used with nominal levels of measurement) and ANOVA (used with interval levels of measurement).

zh: 推断统计也包括研究人员检验统计显著性、考虑统计显著性水平以及一类错误、二类错误。
en: Inferential statistics also involve researchers in tests of statistical significance, consideration of levels of significance, and Type I and Type II errors.

zh: 特别要说明的是，巡游者的民族志研究使用了五种形式的三角校正：资料三角校正、调查者三角校正、理论三角校正、方法的三角校正（Denzin 1978）和跨学科三角校正（Janesick 1994，p.251）。
en: Specifically, the ethnographic study of cruisers used five forms of triangulation: data triangulation, investigator triangulation, theory triangulation, methodological triangulation (Denzin 1978) and interdisciplinary triangulation (Janesick 1994, p. 251).

zh: 本文将只对与旅游动机相关的调查结果进行讨论。
en: Only the findings from the study that have relevance to travel motivations will be discussed in this paper.

zh: 这些调查结果将按照前面讨论过的四种理论分类进行组织。
en: These findings are organised using each of the four 'theoretical' groupings previously discussed.

zh: 一旦根据研究项目的信息需要确定了研究方法，就必须选择一种合适的方法论和资料收集（分析）工具。
en: Once the approach (or approaches) has been determined in regard to the information needs of a research project, an appropriate methodology has to be selected and suitable tools for data collection (and analysis) have to be chosen.

zh: 在前一节中提到了定性、定量和两者结合的研究方法。

en: In the previous section, reference was made to qualitative, quantitative and mixed method methodologies.

zh: 这些研究方法由一些特定的范式（实证主义、解释社会学、批判理论、女性主义视角、后现代主义和混沌理论）所指导，这些范式将在第二章进行详述。
en: These methodologies are governed by specific paradigms (positivism, interpretive social sciences, critical theory, feminist perspectives, postmodernism and chaos theory) that will be discussed in detail in chapter 2.

zh: 我提出的方法可以叫做房租担保法。
en: This method I am proposing can be called the ganranteed-rent method.

zh: 这个方法涉及的是单幢房子或楼房，而不是那些成片廉租住宅房，这些房子坐落在其他楼房之间，有新的，也有旧的。
en: The physical units involved would be buildings, not projecters----buildings to go among other buildings, old and new, on city streets.

zh: 那些进人这个房租担保方法的房子其样式和大小应该都是各色各样的，考虑的因素有街区和所处地方的大小的不同，房子的类型跟常见的平常房子该考虑的因素没有什么两样。
en: These guaranteed-rent buildings would be of different kinds and sizes, depending on their kind of neighborhood, the size of the plot, and all such considerations as normally influence the size and type of more or less average buildings.

zh: 为了探寻本质， 批评理论研究者主要使用定性研究法。
en: To get below the surface, the critical theorist researcher will predominantly use a qualitative methodology.

zh: 此外，如上所述，该研究过程是主观的，这就使得研究结果在很大程度上会受到研究者价值观的影响。
en: Furthermore, as outlined above, the process is subjective and, as a consequence, the process is also value laden.

zh: 批评理论研究者所采用的具体方法包括参与观察法、深度访谈、焦点群体法、德尔菲法以及评价调査法，他们用这些方法揭露被研究的少数群体所承受的压迫和剥削。
en: Methods used by a critical theorist researcher would include, for example, participant observation, indepth interviewing, focus groups, Delphic panels and appreciative inquiry in order to expose the oppression, subjugation and exploitation of the minority group being studied.

zh: 访问者完成问卷需要访问者在现场，而自填式问卷则不需要。
en: Interviewer-completed questionnaires require the presence of an interviewer, whereas self-completion questionnaires do not.

zh: 与访问者完成问卷相比，自填式问卷的回答率较低。这是因为在问卷完成过程中缺乏面对面的交流。
en: Response rates are lower for self-completion questionnaires compared with interviewer-completedquestionnaires due to lack of face-to-face interaction during questionnaire completion.

zh: 思里夫特(Thrift, 1999:318)坚称文化地理学“常常似乎把代表性作为其中心问题，对自身造成了损害”，并提出关于舞蹈和其他具体化实践的“非代表性理论”。
en: Thrift (1999: 318) argues that cultural geography ‘often seems to have taken representation as its central focus to its detriment’ and proposes a ‘non-representational theory’ of dance and other embodied practices.

zh: 如纳什(Nash, 2000: 656)所述：“思里夫特鼓吹惯常的、背离解构代表性的微观地理学(microgeographies)，去探索非代表性。”
en: As Catherine Nash (2000: 656) writes: ‘Thrift is advocating a new and demanding direction for cultural geography, away from the analysis of texts, images and discourses, and towards understanding the micro-geographies of habitual practices, departing from deconstructing representations to explore the non-representational’.

zh: 迪斯尼哲学的最终目标是在奥兰多创造一个庆典城市，一个完整的、私有的居住社区，在这里，伴随社会极化的紧张关系能够被排除。
en: The ultimate extension of the Disney philosophy is the creation of Celebration City in Orlando, an integrated, privatized, residential community in which the tensions associated with social polarization can be excluded.

zh: 然而，索金认为在后现代时代，城市作为一个整体正在变成一个巨大的 “主题公园”，各种模拟物表现出一个髙度扭曲的世界观（一个他称作非地理化 ageographia的空间）。
en: Sorkin  argues that in a postmodern era the city has a whole is becoming one big  ‘theme park’ in which a variety of simulations present a highly distorted view of the world (a space he terms ageographia).

zh: 其结果是，当代城市中各种各样的后现代主义建筑代表了文化的肤浅表面（这可以称之为迪斯尼化（Disneyfication））。
en: The result is that the diverse postmodern buildings of the contemporary city present a shallow facade of culture (sometimes termed Disneyfication).

zh: 非概率抽样包括就近抽样、目标式抽样、滚雪球抽样和专家抽样。
en: Non-probability sampling includes convenience, purposive, snowball sampling and expert sampling.

zh: 概率抽样包括简单随机抽样（抽签方法、名称方法、出生日期或电脑生成方法）、系统抽样、分层抽样和多阶整群抽样。
en: Non-probability sampling includes simple random sampling (lottery method, first name, date of birth or computer-generated methods), stratified sampling, cluster sampling and multi-stage sampling.

zh: 另外还有配额抽样，属于准随机抽样的方法。
en: Quota sampling, a quasi-random sampling method, is also used.

zh: 从结构化访谈到非结构化访谈，访谈类型各有不同。
en: There are various types of interviews, ranging from structured interviews to unstructured interviews.

zh: 表6-2概述了不同类型访谈的区别。
en: Table 6.2 outlines the differences between the types of interviews.

zh: 每种类型的访谈都有其独特的本体论、认识论和方法论，本章讨论了两种侧重定性方法的访谈：非结构化访谈（或深度访谈）及半结构化访谈。
en: Each type of interview has its own particular ontological, epistemological and methodological position.This chapter discusses the two qualitative-oriented types of interviews: unstructured interviews (or depth or in-depth interviews) and semi-structured interviews.

zh: 在随机抽样中，研究者可以使用多种表格来帮助决定样本容量。
en: There are various tables available to researchers to assist in decision making regarding sample size in probability samples.

zh: 本章后边罗列了一些这样的表格。随机抽样方法较多，包括：简单随机抽样（simplerandom sampling）、系统抽样（systematic sampling）、分层随机抽样（stratified random sampling）和多阶整群抽样（multistage cluster sampling）。
en: Examples of such tables are presented later in the chapter.There are a number of random sampling approaches: simple random sampling, systematic sampling, stratified random sampling and multistage cluster sampling.

zh: 对旅游者（或旅行者）进行分类的理论已非常之多。

en: A plethora of typologies exist that describe the range of tourist and/or traveller types.

zh: 这些理论主要有两种模式：互动模式和认知标准化模式(Murphy 1985)。
en: There are interactive models and the cognitive-normative models (Murphy 1985).

zh: 互动模式的理论包括：库恩(1972)关于旅游体验和旅游角色类型的四分法——有组织的大众旅游者、无组织的大众旅游者、探险家和流浪者；史密斯（1978)的七分法——探险家、精英、非传统旅游者、非常规旅游者、初级大众旅游者、大众旅游者和包租旅游者；皮尔斯（1982)对旅行者的十五分法——旅游者、旅行者、休假者、飞机旅行者、商人（原文如此）、移民、环保主义者、探险家、传教士、留学生、人类学家、嬉皮士、国际运动员、驻海外记者和宗教朝圣者。
en: Examples of interactive models include: Cohen's (1972) fourfold typology of tourist experiences and roles — the organised mass tourist, the individualised mass tourist, the explorer and the drifter; Smith's (1978) sevenfold classification including the explorer, elite, off- beat, unusual, incipient mass, mass and charter tourist; and Pearce's (1982) 15 traveller types — tourist, traveller, holiday maker, jetsetter, businessman [sic], migrant, conservationist, explorer, missionary, overseas student, anthropologist, hippie, international athlete, overseas journalist and religious pilgrim.

zh: 如格伦德曼抱怨的那样，马克思有时会认为，当“生产力导向一种不断增加的不确定性、风险和不可控性以及生产过程中不必要的压迫”时，生产力的发展意味着一种不断增长的支配自然的力量。
en: As Grundmann complains, Marx, at times, seems to assume that growth of productive forces implies an increasing power to dominate nature, when "there may be productive forces which do not lead" in that direction "but, rather, to an increasing uncertainty, risk, and uncontrollability as well as to unnecessary oppression in the production process."

zh: 这并非暗示对自然环境的关注同普罗米修斯式观点是不相容的。
en: This does not imply that concern for the natural environment is incompatible with a Promethean view.

zh: 实际上，“人类中心主义和对自然的奴役，非但没有引起生态难题，反而是处理这些难题的出发点”。
en: Indeed, "anthropocentrism and mastery over nature, far from causing ecological problems, are the starting-points from which to address them."

zh: 电话调査主要是结构式访谈，采用封闭式问题。访问者使用电话技术与受访者交流，并记录答案。
