en: Telephone surveys are primarily structured interviews using closed questions, with an interviewer recording the respondent's answers.Contact with respondents is made using telephone technology.

zh: 计算机技术将进一步协助电话技术，在这种情况下，使用软件程序可以迅速记录应答，同时通过分析程序整合应答。
en: Telephone technology may be further assisted by computer technology, in which case the responses are immediately recorded using software programs that integrate the responses with analysis procedures.

zh: 封闭式问题有四种不同的测量层次：定类、定序、定距及定比层次。
en: Closed-ended questions are measured at different levels: nominal, ordinal,interval and ratio levels.

zh: 定类测量法使用词语或名词来对答案选项加以分类（前文有关对照表的例子和紧跟其后的行业透视展现了定类测量法）。
en: The nominal measure is associated with the use of words or nouns to classify response sets (nominal measures were presented in the checklist on page 249 and in the Industry Insight opposite).

zh: 它通常使用“其他”选项，以此保证包括所有的类别。
en: Nominal measures usually include the use of 'other' to ensure all categories have been included.

zh: 在封面上应该写明报告的标题、作者（们）的姓名及研究主持单位。
en: On the cover, you should identify the title of the report, the author (s) andthe host institution.

zh: 以上是封面的一般标准格式。当然，也可以根据委托人的不同要求采用不同的格式。
en: Generally, this is the norm for covers; however, clients may have different requirements by which you must abide.

zh: (5)制度是生产出来的多少具有持久性空间。
en: 5. Institutions are produced spaces of a more or less durable sort.

zh: 在最显见的意义上，它们是领土化-控制和监禁的领地、管辖的地形、组织和管理的领域。
en: In the most obvious sense they are territorialization — territories of control and surveillance, terrains of jurisdiction, and domains of organization and administration.

zh: 但是，它们亦带来了象征空间的组织化(纪念碑、圣地、围墙、大门、房屋的内部空间)和符号体系的空间控制，这些东西支撑和指导着各种形式的制度实践和忠诚。
en: But they also entail the organization of symbolic spaces (monuments, shrines, walls, gates, interior spaces of the house) and the spatial orchestration of semiotic systems that support and guide all manner of institutional practices and allegiances.

zh: 对象征空间秩序的干预以及学习解读制度化景观的语言学，这是权力作用于个体的结果，这种结果在保障社会秩序方面具有主要的作用。
en: Insertion into the symbolic spatial order and learning to read the semiotics of institutionalized landscapes is an effect of power upon the individual that has a primary role in guaranteeing subservience to the social order.

zh: 混沌理论被认为是一种显范式（与女性主义视角和后现代主义相似），尤其是在旅游调查中。
en: Chaos theory can also be classified as an emergent paradigm (like feminist perspectives and postmodernism), particularly within tourism inquiry.

zh: 然而，混沌理论很快就遭到了复杂理论的挑战。
en: However, chaos theory is very quickly being challenged by complexity theory.

zh: 两者都起源于自然科学、数学和人工智能等领域。
在进行假设检验的过程中，通常至少涉及两个变量——自变量和因变量。
en: If you are testing a hypothesis, there will be at least two variables —an independent variable and a dependent variable.

zh: 实际上，“定量研究的语言就是变量以及变量间关系的语言”（Neuman 2000, p.126)。
en: In fact, 'the language of quantitative research is a language of variables and relationships among variables' (Neuman 2000, p. 126).

zh: 自变量有时也被称为原因变量（Neuman 2000)或改变变量（Kumar 1996)。
en: The independent variable is sometimes referred to as the causal variable (Neuman 2000) or change variable (Kumar 1996).

zh: 因变量也可称为结果变量（Kumar 1996)。
en: The dependent variable is also referred to as the outcome variable (Kumar 1996).

zh: 案例研究的优点有：结果通过三角校正和成员间相互核对而产生，且研究结果所依据的是被研究的整个旅游环境。
en: The advantages of case studies include that the findings are generated through the use of methodological triangulation and member checking, and the findings are grounded in the tourism setting being studied.

zh: 缺点是研究者缺乏客观性，研究结果不能够进一步概化，也可能存在研究者偏误。
en: The disadvantages arise from the lack of objectivity of the researcher, the lack of generalisability of the findings and the possibility of researcher bias.

zh: 另外，案例研究还较为耗时。
en: In addition, case studies are time-consuming.

zh: 自然科学的题材常常局限在实验室中，从而，就有一种提出此类问题的传统，即如果已知的方法既可用在这样的背景下，又能够提供答案，则这些问题是可以回答的。
en: In the physical sciences, the subject-matter can often be controlled in the laboratory, and accordingly there is a tradition of posing questions which are answerable, given the methods known to be both available in such a context, and capable of providing answers.

zh: 因此，科学真正成功的部分取决于其提出“好问题”(反对“坏问题”)的特有传统。
en: Part of the very success of science therefore lies in its characteristic tradition of asking ‘well-posed’ (as opposed to ‘ill-posed’) questions.

zh: 从概率论应用中可以找到这样的例子。
en: An example of this can be drawn from an application of probability theory.

zh: 自然的改变——例如， 通过培植景观而产生的自然人性化——成为一种优先的手段，不仅可以重新获得似乎在其他地方失去的东西，而且可以为人类定义未来。在那种未来中，只有通过解放人类的感觉使之达及崇高和超验的存在经验，自我实现才能完成。
en: The transformation of nature — its humanization through landscape gardening, for example — became one privileged means of not only regaining what seemed to be lost elsewhere, but of defining a future for humanity in which self-realization could only be achieved by liberating the human senses to the sublime and transcendental experience of being at one with the world.

zh: 但是，如果感觉的解放通过美学而成为启蒙规划至关重要的方面，那么结果就不只是伊格尔顿所称的“通过感觉生活而发生的大规模的抽象理性内投”，而且产生了对理性自身起源的内部对立：
en: But if the liberation of the senses became a crucial aspect of the Enlightenment project through the rise of esthetics, then the effect was not only to achieve what Eagleton (1990: 42, 49) calls "a massive introjection of abstract reason by the life of the senses" but to produce an internal opposition to the very provenance of reason itself:

zh: 她非常珍惜能够自己赚钱的机会，在贫民窟外的一个中产阶级家庭里担任女管家（这座贫民窟就围绕在内罗毕主要的高尔夫球场外围）。
en: She relished the chance to earn her own money and went to work as a housekeeper in one of the middle-class houses outside the slum (which is wrapped around Nairobi’s main golf course).

zh: 往后几年，她得以把孩子一起接过来。现在，尽管城市里有许多暴力掠夺的现象，他们还是决定在这里扎根发展。
en: Over the next few years, she was able to bring her children, and now they are determined to make the city their home and their future, despite its many depredations.

zh: 事实上，最大的威胁来自一条高速公路(expressway)，它要斜穿过这个市场。在市政厅里似乎没有人关心这件事。
en: Nobody has encouraged it.The biggest threat, in fact, is the expressway which will cut diagonally across.Nobody at City Hall seems at all concerned about it.

zh: 我希望炒一炒这件事，让大家投点注意力……
en: I hope to stir up some interest.. .

zh: 不同层次和种类的抽象之间的张力即个体为了理解他们与世界的关系而必然诉诸的那种张力,在他的小说中特别生动，常常被内化到主角的冲突情感之中。
en: This tension between the different levels and kinds of abstractions to which individuals necessarily appeal in order to understand their relation to the world, is particularly vivid in his novels, often internalized within the conflicting emotions of the protagonists.

zh: 在《边远的乡村》中，马太在更大的世界中叫他父亲取的名字，但是在格林玛威，他总是被称为威尔。
en: In Border Country, Matthew takes the name given by his father into the wider world, but in Glynmawr he is always known as Will, the name his mother wanted.

zh: 这种身份的双重性——他到底是马太还是威尔呢?
en: The duality of that identity — who is he, Matthew or Will?

zh: ——贯穿于整部小说。
en: — is perpetually at work throughout the novel.

zh: 这个问题同对理性/非理性的探讨紧紧地联系在一起。
en: This question was tightly coupled with considerations of rationality/ irrationality.

zh: 法兰克福学派挑战了工具理性的霸权，并且寻求一种替代性理性，这种理性有能力赋予生活一种深刻的意义，有能力恢复人类与外部自然之间敏感而开放的辩证关系，而不会向浪漫主义愤怒，宗教意识形态、自然崇拜和邪恶神话之盲目力量屈服。
en: The Frankfurt School challenged the hegemony of instrumental rationality and sought in its place an alternative rationality that had the power to give a deeper sense of meaning to life, to recuperate a sensuous and open dialogical relation between human beings and external nature without giving in to what they saw as the blind forces of romantic fury, religious ideology, nature idolatory and satanic myth.

zh: 当然，如何做到这一点仍然是一个未决的问题。
en: How to do that is still, of course, a very open question.

zh: 尽管传统和现代部门使用同样的生产要素，但要素报酬并不相同。
en: Although the same factor of production is used in the traditional and modern sectors, it is not paid the same wage.

zh: 劳动从传统部门转移到现代部门，工资必然会上升。
en: Labor must be paid a premium to move from traditional to modern employment.

zh: 用W>1表示工人在现代部门得到的工资率与在传统部门得到的工资率之比。
en: Let w › 1 be the ratio of the wage rate that must be paid in the modern sector to that in the traditional sector.

zh: 种族歧视有两种形式：就业歧视和工资歧视。
en: Racial discrimination takes two forms: employment discrimination and wage discrimination.

zh: 就业歧视指，尽管实际上：两类人具有同等的生产能力并且被支付等量的工资，但雇主仍有组织地雇用某一类人超过另一类人的行为。
en: Employment discrimination refers to the practice of systematically hiring one group over the other, despite the fact that both groups are equally productive and are paid the same wage.

zh: 工资歧视指，对具有同等生产能力的工人支付不同工资的行为。
en: Wage discrimination refers to the practice of paying different wages to equally productive workers.

zh: 人行道生活的社会结构部分地依赖于那些可谓自我任命的公共人物(public characters)。
en: The social structure of sidewalk life hangs partly on what can be called self-appointed public characters.

zh: 公共人物是经常与众多人群接触的人，而且对于做公共人物有着足够的兴趣。要成为一位公共人物用不着特殊的才能和智慧——尽管有很多公共人物都颇具才能和智慧。
en: A public character is anyone who is in frequent contact with a wide circle of people and who is sufficiently interested to make himself a public character.A public character need have no special talents or wisdom to fulfill his function---although he often does.

zh: 市民的概念因此一直被扩大了，不仅包括获得利益的资格，而且还包括以自力更生和有偿工作为目的的相互义务。
en: The notion of citizenship has therefore been expanded beyond the realm of entitlements to benefits to include reciprocal obligations to aim for self-reliance and paid work.

zh: 正在整个西方世界传播的这一战略与“工作利益”的概念相联系，这将在第十三章中有更详细的讨论。
en: This strategy, which is spreading throughout the Western world, is bound up with notions of  ‘workfare’ that are discussed in greater detail in Chapter 13.

zh: 愤世嫉俗的人会说这种市民身份的定义只是为了通过强迫不适合者去就业以减少福利预算而已。
en: Cynics would argue that this new version of citizenship is simply a way of saving welfare budgets by coercing unsuitable people into employment.

zh: 但是不管怎样，关于社会排斥的新焦点认识到，市民身份涉及的不仅仅是物质方面的因素，而且还包括归属感和民主政治权利的问题。
en: Nevertheless, the new focus on social exclusion recognizes that citizenship involves more than just material factors and also includes senses of belonging and democratic empowerment.

zh: 当我们把有关“自然”和“自然的”话语看成社会过程的环节，它们就不那么令人困惑了。在那些社会过程中，社会权力的冲突形式出于特殊目的而努力获得对制度、社会关系和物质实践的控制。
en: Discourses about "nature" and the "natural" become less confusing when taken as moments in a social process in which conflicting forms of social power struggle to gain command of institutions, social relations and material practices for particular purposes.

zh: 这并不必然暗示，统治的权力结构只推广一种话语而压抑另一种话语(尽管依附于公司资本主义和现代国家的占统治地位的功利主义与普罗米修斯主义—被实用主义的马尔萨斯主义所修正—几乎毋庸置疑）。
en: This is not necessarily to suggest that dominant power structures promote one and only one discourse rather than another (though the dominant utilitarianism and Prometheanism — modified by a dose of convenient Malthusianism — that attaches to corporate capitalism and the modern state is hardly in doubt).

zh: 一些功能中心是在活跃的、多样化的地区里形成的，就像公园中的功能中心是在小规模的范围内产生的。如果这些中心同时还能拥有一个象征这个地区的地标或标志性建筑，那么就能成为这些地区的标志。
en: Centers of use grow up in lively, diverse districts, just as centers of use occur on a smaller scale in parks, and such centers count especially in district identification if they contain also a landmark that comes to stand for the place symbolically and, in a way, for the disrrict.

zh: 但是，中心不能单靠自己来承担代表地区的标志作用。不同的商业和文化设施以及不同的景观都会在这个地区里接二连三地冒出来。
en: But centers cannot carry the load of district identification by themselves; differing commercial and cultural facilities, and different-looking scenes, must crop up all through.

zh: 在这种情况下，一些具体的障碍，如宽广的交通干道，很大的公园、庞大的办公机构楼群等都会在功能上产生破坏性的作用，因为它们阻碍了交叉使用。
en: Within this fabric, physical barriers, such as huge traffic arteries, too large parks, big institutional groupings, are functionally destructive because they block cross-use.

zh: 你过去怎样看待共产主义，你现在怎样看待自然，只不过是投你所好东西。
en: What you thought about communism, what you now think about nature, is no more than a projection of what suited you.

zh: 对其他人来说，每一信仰都是真实的，这个事实只不过让你来欺骗他们。
en: The fact that for others each belief is substantial merely enabled you to deceive them.

zh: (Loyalties，364)
en: (Loyalties, p. 364)

zh: 个人商品，如热狗，只能被一个人消费。
en: A private good (a hot dog) can be consumed by only one person.

zh: 相反，某公共产品可同时供许多人消费。
en: In contrast, a pubic good can be consumed by many people at the same time.

zh: 例如，成百上千的公民可以在互不干扰的情况下观赏游行，所以该游行属于共同消费品（joint consumption）：每个人可消费同一产品。
en: For example, hundreds of people can watch a parade without interfering with each others' enjoyment of the parade.In other words, a parade is subject to joint consumption: everyone can consume the same good.

zh: 在思考经济发展的理论和实践问题时，关联效应是最容易引起困惑的思想之一。
en: The idea of linkages is one of the greatest sources of confusion in thinking about both the theory of  development and development in practice.

zh: 赫希曼（1958）引入了这一术语，并把它作为新鲜事物介绍给大家。
en: Hirschman (1958) introduced the term and presented it as something quite new.

zh: 后来的评论者们接受了他的观念。
en: Later commentators have taken him at his word.

zh: 因此，李特尔（Little, 1982）认为因为其他学者已在某种程度上探究过（可能有些混乱）金融外部经济可能的作用，赫希曼的关联效应概念肯定包含了一个非金融的因素。
en: Thus Little (1982) insists that since other authors  had already explored at some length (if with some confusion) the possible role of pecuniary external economies, Hirschman's linkage concept must have crucially involved a nonpecuniary element.

zh: 工业城市之所以发展是因为满足了两个条件。
en: The factory city develops because two conditions are satisfied.

zh: 首先，农业工人（小麦种植者）的生产力足够高，他们生产的小麦 不仅能满足他们自身的需要，而且还有剩余，能满足城市中毛纺工业工人的需要。
en: First, the productivity of agricultural workers (wheat growers) is high enough that they can feed themselves and have enough left over to feed the cloth workers in the city.

zh: 换句话说，农业剩余养活了城市工人。
en: In other words, the agricultural surplus feeds city workers.

zh: 第二，规模经济相对于交通费用而言足够大，毛纺厂的毛料生产价格低于家庭生产的价格。
en: Second, scale economies are large relative to travel costs, so the cloth factory can underprice homemade cloth.

zh: 福特式体制中利润的决定性因素是成本的控制，尤其是劳动力成本的控制。
en: Crucial to profitability in the Fordist system was control of costs, especially those of labour.

zh: 但是，一般认为，工厂之间的竞争越来越多地依靠诸如可信度、经营风格和创新等因素，而对成本的依赖性大幅度减少。
en: However, it is argued that firms compete less on the basis of cost and increasingly on the basis of factors such as reliability, style and innovation.

zh: 因此，研发、产品创新和市场营销在后福特主义社会开始变得越来越重要。
en: Research and development, product innovation and marketing have therefore become much more important in a neo-Fordist society.

zh: 在福特主义下，成本还可以利用内部规模经济（internal economies of scale) 来减少。
en: Under Fordism, costs were also reduced by taking advantage of internal economies of scale.

zh: 这些因素使得制造一种产品的平均成本下降到等同于输出增加的水平。
en: These are factors that decrease the average cost of manufacturing a product as the level of output increases.

zh: 由于专业化机器的高初始成木，在福特主义下是通过产品的大量输出而获得巨额利润的。
en: Because of the high start-up costs of specialized machinery, it took high volumes of output to make big profits under Fordism.

zh: 一方面，回到作为全部经验源泉(包括时间和空间源泉）的身体成为挑战整个抽象网络(科学的、社会的、政治经济的网络）的手段(在今天越来越具有优先地位），借助于那些网络，社会关系、权力关系、制度和物质实践得以定义、再现和调节。
en: On the one hand, to return to the human body as the fount of all experience (including that of space and time) becomes a means (increasingly privileged in these times) to challenge the whole network of abstractions (scientific, social, political—economic) through which social relations, power relations, institutions, and material practices get defined, represented, and regulated.

zh: 另一方面，人类身体能脱离不在时空规定的社会过程。
en: But on the other hand, no human body is outside of the social processes of determination of space—time.

zh: 回到身体或许证实了那些据说正受到反抗的社会过程的时间和空间。
en: To return to it may well be to instanciate the space and time of the very social processes being purportedly rebelled against.

zh: 例如，如果工人被转化为资本的附属物(如马克思在《资本论》中阐明的），无论是在工厂还是在消费领域( 或者，如福柯更喜欢说的那样，由于18 世纪以来强有力的规训机构的兴起，身体被改造成温驯的身体），那么他们的身体又如何能够脱离资本循环或者各种规训他们的机器，而成为万物之尺度呢？
en: If, for example, workers are transformed (as Marx suggests in Capital) into appendages of capital in both the workplace and the consumption sphere (or, as Foucault prefers it, bodies are made over into docile bodies by the rise of a powerful disciplinary apparatus from the eighteenth century on) then how can their bodies be a measure of anything outside of the circulation of capital or of the various mechanisms that discipline them?

zh: 滚雪球抽样还有其他一些名称，如连环引介、名声或网络抽样(Newman 2000, p. 199)或根莲抽样(Stehlik 1999)。
en: Snowballing sampling has several other names — chain referral , reputational or network sampling (Neuman 2000 , p . 199 ) or rhizome sampling (Stehlik 1999) .

zh: 滚雪球抽样适合于难以找到参与者的时候，因为研究者可能没有正式的或非正式的“网络联系”。
en: Snowball sampling is used with difficult to reach participants because the researcher may not be informed about formal or informal 'net work connections' .

zh: 一旦研究人员发现了总体中的一个研究对象，其他的成员就会通过顺藤换瓜的方式被发现，直到找到全部参与者。
en: Once the researcher has identified one member of the population, other members are identified by this member and then by the next participants contacted until all the participants have been contacted.

zh: 奈斯，深度生态学的领军人物，他坚持一种相关的答案：“人并非环境之中的一个物，而是时空中没有规定边界的相关系统中的一个接合点”（Naese，1989:79）。
en: Naess (1989: 79), the leading figure in deep ecology, insists on a relational answer: "a human being is not a thing in an environment, but a juncture in a relational system without determined boundaries in time and space."

zh: 这是一个极为重要的定义，与我的全部论证都有重要关系。
en: This is an extremely important definition that has a significant bearing on my whole argument.

zh: 首先，它注意到怀特海的过程哲学、内部关系的辩证概念(参阅本书第二章)，并且特别融合了这种观点，即“整体和部分是内在相关的”（Naese，1989:59）。
en: To begin with, it picks up on the process philosophy of Whitehead and the dialectical conceptions of internal relations (see chapter 2) and specifically incorporates the view that "whole and part are internally related" (Naess, 1989: 59).

zh: 如奥尔曼指出的那样，对现象多样性和相关性的理解，其目标是识别极少的基本过程，这些过程使现象形成统一性同时又使它们区分开来。
en: The purpose of multiple and relational approaches to phenomena is, as Oilman points out in his commentary on this passage, to try to identify a restricted number of very general underlying processes which simultaneously unify and differentiate the phenomena we see in the world around us.

zh: 这也正是怀特海关注的焦点。
en: This was very much the focus of Whitehead's concerns.

zh: 在这一意义上，辩证法就是要寻求一条通往某种本体论安全或还原主义的道路——不是把什么东西都还原为“物”而是还原为普通的生成过程和关系。
en: In this sense, dialectics does seek a path towards a certain kind of ontological security, or reductionism — not a reductionism to "things" but to an understanding of common generative processes and relations.

zh: 特殊的坡度形式(山坡刻面)和一定的土壤与植被(生态系统)类型相联系，而这种联系又反过来决定了土地利用活动，形成生境/生态系统类型图的一种形式。
en: Particular types of slope form (slope facets) were linked to certain soil and vegetation (ecosystem) types and these in turn determined land-use activity, resulting in a form of habitat/ecosystem-type mapping.

zh: 近来沃伦(Warren，2001)提倡在研究谷坡过程时重新评价这些思想，为保育管理提供理论基础。
en: Warren (2001) called for a re-evaluation of these ideas in relation to valley-side slope processes to provide a basis for conservation management.

zh: 如今航空摄影、遥感、GIS和数字化地形模型是这类评价不可缺少的部分，不过地形类型或山坡刻面之间界限的勾绘问题仍然是研究的重点(Townshend, 1981; Barrough and Frank, 1996; Barrough and MeDonell, 1998)。
en: Aerial photography, remote sensing, GIS and digital terrain modelling are now an essential part of such evaluation and yet again problems of boundary delimitation between different terrain types or slope facets represent a major research focus for the subject (Townshend, 1981; Burrough and Frank, 1996; Burrough and McDonnell, 1998).

zh: 合成理论（compositional theory)是从芝加哥决定论派生出的另一学派之产物。
en: Compositional theory is the product of another school of thought that has developed out of the writings of the Chicago determinists.

zh: 合成论者强调，不同社会群体的凝聚是基于民族、亲缘、邻居、职业或者生活方式，而这种社会网络并不会被城市生活削弱。
en: Compositionalists emphasize the cohesion and intimacy of distinctive social worlds based on ethnicity, kinship, neighbourhood, occupation or lifestyle, rejecting the idea that these social networks are in any way diminished by urban life (e.g.

zh: 他们同时也认为，人类行为受城市生活的心理影响极小，它基本上是由经济地位、文化特征和家庭地位等决定的，而这些因素也决定了人们从属于哪个社会群体。
en: Gans, 1962).They also minimize the psychological effects of city life on people’s behaviour, suggesting, instead, that behaviour is determined largely by economic status, cultural characteristics, family status and so on: the same attributes that determine which social worlds they live in.

zh: 确实，每一个卓越的理论家都倾向诉诸一种特殊的“永恒”(环节) 结构，把各种“环节”之间的关系固定下来，从而使社会获得结构化秩序。
en: Each major theorist, it is true, tends to appeal to a particular structure of permanences" (elements) that transfix relations between the various moments" to give a structured order to a society.

zh: 常常会出现这种情况：使这种或那种环节具有优先地位，成为社会变迁的核心。

en: And there is often some sort of privileging of one or other moment as the locus of social change.

zh: 这样一种结构化的系统似乎把社会过程囚禁在再生产的循环因果关系的铁笼之中(如马克思的“资本的逻辑”、韦伯的“官僚制的-技术的合理性”，或者斯潘德的“语言的牢笼”)。
en: Such a structured system seems to imprison the social process in an iron cage of reproductive circular causality (such as Marx's "logic of capital," Weber's "bureaucratic—technocratic rationality" or Spender's "prisonhouse of language").

zh: 统一的地理学分化为自然地理学和人文地理学，导致了W.威廉-奥尔森与卡尔•汉纳伯格（Carl D. Hannerberg）之间关于人文地理学的争论。W.
en: The division of institutional geography into physical and human branches led to a debate between W. William-Olsson and Carl D. Hannerberg concerning human geography.

zh: 威廉-奥尔森支持传统的全局的视角，而汉纳伯格则认为地理学是专门学科的综合体。
en: W. William-Olsson argued for a traditional holistic view, while Hannerberg explained the field as a complex of special disciplines.

zh: 当时，乌普萨拉大学的森德伯格（A.Sundborg）正在进行河流变化过程的实验工作。
en: At this time A. Sundborg at Uppsala was undertaking experimental work on fluvial processes.

zh: 当然，随着时间的推移，经济学已越来越数学化了。
en: Economics has, of course, become vastly more mathematical over time.

zh: 不管怎么说，即使在那个时代发展经济学的风格也很落伍。
en: Nonetheless, development economics was archaic in style even for its own time.

zh: 在超发展理论最著名的四篇论文中，罗森斯坦一罗丹的那篇文章基本上与萨缪尔森 （Samuelson）将赫克歇尔一俄林理论模型化的工作属于同一时期，而刘易斯、缪尔达尔和赫希曼的文章几乎与索罗对增长理论的最初论述同时问世。
en: Of the four most famous high development works, Rosenstein-Rodan's was approximately contemporary with Samuelson's formulation of the Heckscher-Ohlin model, while Lewis, Myrdal,and Hirschman were all roughly contemporary with Solow's initial statement of growth theory.

zh: 上千人一次又一次回来再看。我们认识的一个人说他遇到了一批黑人（negro）小孩，他们告诉他已看了五次《罗密欧与朱丽叶》。许许多多迷上了艺术的人的生活视野被扩大了，生活内容大大丰富了；具有同样感觉的还有美国未来戏剧的观众们。
en: Hundreds came back again and again; a fellow weknow says he met a group of Negro children who told him they had been to Romeo and Juliet five times.The lives of a lot of these converts have been enlarged and enriched;so has the audience for the American theater of the future.

zh: 这需要“培训前（before）”和“培训后（after）”资料的收集（用于前测和后测的两组不同资料），以确定培训计划是否有实际效果。
en: There needs to be a 'before' and 'after' set of data collected (that is pre- and post-test/data sets) in order to determine if any change has occurred as a result of the training program.

zh: 最后，研究者可能想要用历时数年收集的资料来确定或预测未来的游览方式（预测性的研究）。
en: Finally, the researcher may wish to draw on data that has been collected over a period of years to determine or forecast future visitation patterns (predictive research).

zh: 研究方法因此也可能具有某种时间上的性质：之前的、之后的；过去的、现在的或将来的资料收集需求。
en: Subsequently, approaches to research can also have a temporal nature, pre- or post-, or past, present and future data collection requirements.

zh: 我们的“全球化”时间主要特征之一是我们对强烈的社会转变非常自信。
en: One of the prime characteristics of our ‘globalizing’ times is that we are very self-conscious of intensive social change.

zh: 人文地理学和社会科学文献都被新事物所充斥。
en: The human geography and social sciences literatures are awash with descriptions of things being new.

zh: 许多宣告最近的往昔正在消逝的新词汇表明了这一点:后殖民主义、后工业主义、后福特主义、后发展、后马克思主义、后结构主义等，当然，最常见的还有后现代主义。
en: This is indicated by the many terms that proclaim the passing of a recent past: postcolonialism, post- industrialism, postFordism, postdevelopment, post-Marxism, post-structuralism and, of course, postmodernism are most common.

zh: 对于后现代主义和后结构主义理解社会正义所陷入的僵局，存在着大量不满的迹象。
en: There are abundant signs of discontent with the impasse into which post-modernism's and poststructuralisms approach to the question of social justice has fallen.

zh: 并且出现了许多不同的策略，试图恢复关于正义论证的动员力量。它们不是诉诸有限但却普遍的原则，就是更加雄心勃勃地试图在所谓现代主义的普遍主义和后结构主义的解构所产生的分裂的特殊性之间建造一座桥梁。
en: And a number of different strategies have emerged to try to resurrect the mobilizing power of arguments about justice in ways which either permit appeal to carefully circumscribed, but nevertheless general, principles or which, more ambitiously, try to build a bridge between the supposed universalisms of modernism and the fragmented particularities left behind by post structuralist deconstruction.

zh: 我们的“全球化”时间主要特征之一是我们对强烈的社会转变非常自信。
en: One of the prime characteristics of our ‘globalizing’ times is that we are very self-conscious of intensive social change.

zh: 人文地理学和社会科学文献都被新事物所充斥。
en: The human geography and social sciences literatures are awash with descriptions of things being new.

zh: 许多宣告最近的往昔正在消逝的新词汇表明了这一点：后殖民主义、后工业主义、后福特主义、后发展、后马克思主义、后结构主义等，当然，最常见的还有后现代主义。
en: This is indicated by the many terms that proclaim the passing of a recent past: postcolonialism, post-industrialism, postFordism, postdevelopment, post-Marxism, post-structuralism and, of course, postmodernism are most common.

zh: 当从工业生产技术到市中心的每一种事物成为主要的关注课题，在这样的时代里，(社群生活、技能和生活方式等方面的)创造性破坏、不断增长的碎片化、瞬间化等等主题已经越来越显著地出现在文化和哲学话语中。
en: Themes of creative destruction, of increased fragmentation, of ephemerality (in community life, of skills, of lifestyles) have become much more noticeable in literary and philosophic discourse in an era when restructuring of everything from industrial production techniques to inner cities has become a major topic of concern.

zh: 通往后现代主义预示的“感觉结构”的转型，与近二十多年中发生的政治经济实践转变有着密切的联系。
en: The transformation in "the structure of feeling" which the move towards postmodernism betokens has much to do with the shifts in political-economic practices that have occurred over the last two decades.

zh: 它似乎特别折射出交流手段非物质化的方式。
en: It seems to refract in particular the way in which means of communication have been dematerialized.

zh: 与女性主义范式相同，在使用后现代主义范式这个术语时应当注意，这个术语是一个统称。
en: Therefore, as was the case of the feminist perspectives paradigm, you need to be aware that in using the term postmodern paradigm, the term is used generically.

zh: 之所以使用这个统称性的术语，是因为正如后现代主义自己所宣称的那样，不存在什么真正唯一的后现代主义理论，后现代主义的定义也不止一个。
en: It is generically applied because as postmodern positions assert, there is no one truth and no one definition of postmodernism.

zh: 相反，存在着“很多种后现代主义理论和立场”（Kellner 1990，P.257）。
en: Instead, there is a 'plurality of different postmodern theories and positions' (Kellner 1990, p. 257).

zh: 幻觉的虚拟世界的建设者们的话语充斥着想象的身体形象，摆脱了肉体强加的限制。
en: The discourse of visionary virtual world builders is rife with images of imaginal bodies, freed from the constraints that flesh imposes.

zh: 赛伯空间的开发者预见了他们能够忘记身体的一种时间。
en: Cyberspace developers foresee a time when they will be able to forget about the body.

zh: 后结构主义（poststructuralist)方法分享了很多根本方法的假设。总之，它强烈反对将世界解释为像基于阶级冲突这样单一的、隐含的、根本的结构的观点。
en: Poststructuralist approaches are strongly opposed to the idea that the world can be explained by a single, hidden, underlying structure, such as class-based conflict.

zh: 相反，它认为社会中存在不平等的大量变数和维度。
en: Instead, it is argued that there are numerous shifting and unstable dimensions of inequality in society.

zh: 此外，它还认为这些不平等在各种表现形式中得到了反映，这些形式包括语言、知识理论（intellectual theories)、广告、流行音乐和城市景观。
en: In addition, it is argued that these inequalities are reflected in various forms of representation, including language, intellectual theories, advertising, popular music and city landscapes.

zh: 所有这些表现形式都包含一组共有的意义——我们称之为话语（discourses)。
en: All of these forms of representation involve sets of shared meanings --- what are called discourses.

zh: 但是，对自然的统治和对他者的统治之间的这种联系还有更多的维度。
en: But this connection between the domination of nature and the domination of others has a further dimension.

zh: 任何种类的“改造自然”计划都具有分布性后果，许多此类明显不公正研究都是急烈冲突的根源。
en: "Nature-transforming" projects of any sort have distributional consequences and the patent inequity of many of these has been the source of powerful conflicts.

zh: 当前，在环境正义运动和名为“穷人的环境保护主义” 运动的多国组织中，这些都成为斗争的焦点(参阅本书第十三章)。
en: These are now the focus of struggle in the environmental justice movement and within a polyglot group of movements known as "the environmentalism of the poor" (see chapter 13).

zh: 这些可憎的思想反映了一种占优势的正统，但同时也激起了热烈的辩论。
en: Such distasteful ideas reflected a prevailing orthodoxy but they also provoked spirited debate.

zh: 尽管环境决定论和科学种族主义常常互相强化，但也可能互相矛盾。
en: While environmental determinism and scientific racism were often mutually reinforcing ideas, they could also contradict one another.

zh: 有些种族论者假定，各“种族”均被固定在一个不变的“天然”级序，这个级序就是从不同起点出发的截然不同的发育系列中当前的表现(多元发生论)。
en: Some racial theorists assumed that different ‘races’ were fixed in an unchanging ‘natural’ hierarchy, the contemporary manifestation of quite distinct evolutionary sequences from different points of departure (polygenesis).

zh: 这个框架的核心就是环境控制（environmental conditioning）作用。
en: Central to this whole perspective is the idea of environmental conditioning.

zh: 纽森在婴儿护理模式的论述中提供了经典的例子：贫困邻里的特征直接表现为贫穷的外观、拥挤的环境，以及抚养孩子的愚昧态度。
en: A classic example is provided by Newson and Newson’s (1965) work on patterns of infant care.Impoverished neighbourhoods, they argued, are characterized by a poverty of sensory stimulation, by crowded environments that inhibit play, and by unenlightened attitudes towards child rearing.

zh: 结果，这种环境下的孩子经过环境的作用成长为难以社会化的个体，他们倾向于融入离自己生活很近的社会群体，而无法应对其生活之外的各种竞争。
en: The net result, they concluded, is that the environmental conditioning experienced by children growing up in such settings produces ‘under-socialized’ individuals with a competitive nature attuned only to the immediate social group, leaving them ill-equipped to cope with the more subtle forms of competition that prevail in the world beyond.

zh: 7.2社会和环境影响评估法使用定量研究方法能够评估社会和环境影响。
en: 7.2 Social and environmental impact assessmentsBoth social and environmental impact assessments can be determined using a quantitative methodology.

zh: 主要的数据收集方法包括观察法、调査法、历时研究法、案例研究、德尔菲法、文献或档案法、预测法、实验和准实验法。
en: The chief methods of data collection include observation, surveys, longitudinal studies, case studies, the Delphic method, the documentary or archival method, forecasting and experimental and quasiexperimental methods.

zh: 这些方法的优缺点已经在本章中的其他部分讨论过，但是在此再次提及有关定量研究方法论的优缺点是很有用的。
en: The advantages and disadvantages of each of these methods have been discussed elsewhere in the chapter, but it useful to note here the advantages and disadvantages of the overriding methodology.

zh: 20世纪中叶环境变化与历史断代方法的结合大放光彩，那时发明、发展、改进了这种技术并应用于环境重建。
en: The coupling of environmental change and historical dating methods flowered in the middle of the twentieth century when techniques were invented, developed, improved and applied to environmental reconstruction.

zh: 这些技术中最重要的是放射性碳（Libby, 1955)和氧同位素温度估测与断代(Shackleton，1977)。
en: Among the most important of these were radiocarbon dating (Libby, 1955) and oxygen-isotope temperature estimations and dating (Shackleton, 1977).

zh: 这些方面阐明了哈里（Harré，1969)的论点:科学的进步常常是因技术发明造成的。
en: These illustrate the point made by Harré (1969) that scientific progress is often made by technical innovation.

zh: 会议论文的目的是使听众(研究同行）了解你的书面研究内容。
en: The purpose of a conference paper is to inform a gathered audience of peers about the contents of your written research.

zh: 听众参会的目的乃是为了倾听你对研究及其关键组成部分的介绍。
en: The audience hasassembled to hear you speak about your research and its key components.

zh: 会议论文不能以直接朗读你的研究/会议论文的形式表达。
en: Conference papers should not be presented as a direct 'reading' of your research/conference paper.

zh: 通篇朗读你将在会议期间散发的材料，或者已经收录在会议论文集当中的文章全文，这对听众来说是一种侮辱。
en: It is an insult to audiences to present your paper by reading out what you are going to hand out or what already appears in the conference proceedings.

zh: 随着时间的推移，绘制地图的工艺水平和用来绘制地图的信息质量有了稳步提高。
en: Over time, the art of mapmaking and the quality of information used to make maps got steadily better.

zh: 有人首次沿非洲的海岸线进行了考察，因此，绘制出的地图更加精确了。到了18世纪，绘制出的海岸线已基本与现代地图中的海岸线看起来难分伯仲。
en: The coastline of Africa was first explored, then plotted with growing accuracy, and by the eighteenth century that coastline was shown in a manner essentially indistinguishable from that of modern maps.

zh: 沿海城市和人口也相当详实地展现在地图上。
en: Cities and peoples along the coast were also shown with great fidelity.

zh: 在这些范式视角的指导之下，定性方法论将会取得对于所研究的旅游现象的深层理解。
研究结论的描述和分析也必然是深入而翔实的。
en: The resultant data provide rich and thick descriptions for analysis.

zh: 定量方法是基于实证主义和混沌理论范式的，该范式将旅游现象的本质或者视为线性因果联系，或者视为非线性复杂联系，而且是可以用数字测量的。
en: The use of a quantitative methodology is predicated to positivist and chaos theory paradigms, wherein tourism phenomenon are considered to be either linear-causal or non-linear chaotic in nature and able to be numerically measured.

zh: 纯理论研究有时也指基础研究。
en: Pure research is sometimes referred to as basic research.

zh: 它是构建理论、框架、模式的研究。
en: It is research from which theories, frameworks and models are constructed.

zh: 纯理论或基础性的研究增进了我们对世界的了解。
en: Pure or basic research advances our knowledge of the world.

zh: 这种不平等的结构化地理可以用简单的方式得到解释，用下面一个最近发生的、不为人知但有趣的事件来说明：中美洲的小国哥斯达黎加试图通过销售“基因资源”来挣钱。
en: This uneven geography of structuration can be illustrated, in simple terms, by the following interpretation of a recent, little-known but fascinating event: the attempt by the small, central American country Costa Rica to make money by selling off its ‘genetic resources’.

zh: 像其他中美洲国家一样，从全球来看哥斯达黎加是一个相对贫穷的国家，属于“发展中国家”。
en: Like other central American counties, Costa Rica is relatively poor in global terms and classed as a ‘developing country’.

zh: 它的主要收人来源是靠出口咖啡豆和香蕉。
en: Its principal means of income is the export of coffee beans and bananas.

zh: 在著名的《法的精神》中，孟德斯鸠把某种近似于科学的方法应用于社会的比较研究。
en: Montesquieu in his famous text on The Spirit of the Laws applied something loosely akin to scientific method to the comparative study of societies.

zh: 他揭示出支撑人类历史表面混乱和纷繁复杂的统治形式的根本原因,把土地和气候作为基本原因之一。
en: He set out to uncover the fundamental causes that underlie the seeming chaos of human history and the enormous diversity of governmental forms.And one of the fundamental causes identified was soil and climate.

zh: 他写道：“精神和激情在不同的气候中是完全不同的，如果这是真的，那么法就必须对应于激情的差异和精神的差异。
en: "If it is true," he wrote, "that mentalities and passions are extremely different in different climates, then the laws must correspond to the difference of passions and to the difference in mentality."

zh: ”这种差异地理学的环境基础并没有使他陷入纯粹的环境决定论，因为好政府的任务是使法律和道德秩序适应主导的物质环境(Cassirer，1968:214;Glacken, 1967, 572—581)。
en: This environmental foundation to the geography of difference did not lead him to pure environmental determinism, for it was the task of good government to bring about an adjustment of laws, and of moral order, to prevailing physical circumstances (Cassirer, 1968: 214; Glacken, 1967: 572—81).

zh: 有了上述对种族主义和种族歧视的说明，我们可以这样解释少数群体居住的集聚（congregation)与隔离（segregation) 过程 ，它们与被东道主社会同化（assimilation) 这一过程相反。同化过程本身是由各种形式的群体行为控制的，这些行为是为了将来自外部群体真实的和预期的威胁最小化。
en: Given these caveats about racism and discrimination, we can interpret minority group residential congregation and segregation as being inversely related to the process of assimilation with the host society, a process that is itself governed by various forms of group behaviour designed to minimize real or perceived threats to the group from outsiders.

zh: 不过，在深人分析这种行为及其空间结果之前，首先有必要明确“少数群体”、“东道主社会”、“隔离”和“同化”这几个术语的含义。
en: But before going on to examine this behaviour and its spatial consequences in detail, it is first necessary to clarify the meaning of terms such as ‘minority group’, ‘host society’, ‘segregation’ and ‘assimilation’.

zh: 在城市社会内部，存在着一些可以解释城市社会空间集聚和隔离的积极原因。
en: There are several rational reasons for segregation within urban society.

zh: 不同“社区”的空间隔离有助于减少各社会群体之间的冲突并加强社会管理，同时赋予特定社会群体更具凝聚力的政治声音。
en: The spatial segregation of different ‘communities’ helps to minimize conflict between social groups while facilitating a greater degree of social control and endowing specific social groups with a more cohesive political voice.

zh: 社会群体在居住上形成集群的另外一个重要原因是，其成员希望以此来维护该群体的身份认同或生活方式。
en: Another important reason for the residential clustering of social groups is the desire of its members to preserve their own group identity or lifestyle.

zh: 群体规范是上述隔离现象得以形成的基本机制之一，这种规范支持群体内的通婚，反对不同社会、宗教、种族及人种背景的群体之间通婚。
en: One of the basic mechanisms by which this segregation can be achieved is through group norms that support marriage within the group and oppose marriage between members of different social, religious, ethnic or racial groups.

zh: 定量研究方法包括：问卷调查法、结构化访谈法、历时研究法、案例研究法、文献档案法、模型法、观察法、准试验法和影响评估法等。
en: Quantitative methods include questionnaires and structured interviews, longitudinal studies, case studies, the documentary method, modelling, observation, the quasi-experimental method and impact assessment methods.

zh: 定量分析包括：包含集中趋势量数的描述性统计、相关性测量和推断性统计。
en: Analysis involves descriptive statistics including measures of central tendency, measures of association and inferential statistics.

zh: 计算机为研究的设计和分析提供了附加工具和一些用于定量分析的软件包，例如Methodologist’s Toolchest、 SphinxSurvey、SPSS、Minitab、SAS 和 winMAX 等。
en: Computers provide an additional tool in research designing and analysis, and some quantitatively based software packages include Methodologist's Toolchest, SphinxSurvey, SPSS, Minitab, SAS and winMAX.

zh: 电子问卷的主要优点是联系的范围和速度。
en: The main advantages of e-questionnaires are the scope and speed of contact.

zh: 而最主要的限制是它只能研究使用信息技术的人群。

en: The major limitation is the extent to which the population being studied uses IT.

zh: 主要优点与以下几个方面相关：采用电子问卷进行调查很省心（像计算机辅助电话调查一样，问卷与资料分析程序相连;然而，电子问卷不需要操作者记录数据,它是由受访者完成的）；管理费用低；收集数据的速度比邮寄、电话、访问调查法都要快。
en: The key advantages relate to: the ease of conduct of an e-questionnaire (questionnaires can be linked to data analysis programs, as is the case with computer-assisted telephone interviews; however, e-questionnaires do not require the data recording to be completed by an operator — the respondent does that); the cost of conduct is minimal; the speed of data collection is faster than mail, telephone or interceptsurveys.

zh: 数据编码包括编码的形成、数据输入及数据整理。
en: Coding data involves the development of codes, data entry and datacleaning.

zh: 数据输入可使用转换表、页缘编码、直接数据输入、扫描仪、电子数据表以及人工记录单。
en: Data entry can be undertaken using transfer sheets, edge-coding, direct data entry, scanners, spreadsheets and manual tally sheets.

zh: 数据的整理是与编码式整理和逻辑整理相关联的。
en: Data cleaning is associated with code cleaning and contingency cleaning.

zh: 这使得进一步深究下述问题成为可能，为什么地方在当代世界中正变得越来越重要而非相反。
en: This permits a second cut at why place is becoming more rather than less important in the contemporary world.

zh: 海德格尔的主张，以及其后许多作家从他那里吸收的，是有可能抵抗或拒绝地方建设之任何简单的资本主义(或现代主义)逻辑。
en: What Heidegger holds out, and what many subsequent writers have drawn from him, is the possibility of some kind of resistance to or rejection of any simple capitalist (or modernist) logic of place construction.

zh: 由此可以推断，技术合理性、商品化、市场价值和资本积累不断增强的对社会生活(或者如包括哈贝马斯在内的许多作家所称“生活世界”)的渗透，加之时空压缩，将激发一些抵抗，这些抵抗越来越强地聚集于地方(在这个词的最广泛意义上来理解)的替代性建造上。
en: It would then follow that the increasing penetration of technological rationality, of commodification and market values, and capital accumulation into social life (or into what many writers, including Habermas, call "the life world") together with time-space compression, will provoke resistances that increasingly focus on alternative constructions of place (understood in the broadest sense of that word).

zh: 推论统计需要使用概率抽样，对检验假设及其与所研究总体之间的关系有重要意义。
en: Inferential statistics require the use of probability sampling and are important to test a hypothesis and its relationship to the overall population being studied.

zh: 推断统计的检验包括卡方检验（用于定类测量）及方差分析（用于定距测量）。
en: Tests of inferential statistics include chi-square (used with nominal levels of measurement) and ANOVA (used with interval levels of measurement).

zh: 推论统计也包括研究人员检验统计显著性、考虑统计显著性水平以及一类错误、二类错误。
en: Inferential statistics also involve researchers in tests of statistical significance, consideration of levels of significance, and Type I and Type II errors.

zh: 任何研究中都有可能在假设检验中出现错误。
en: In any study, there is always a possibility of error being introduced in the testing of hypotheses.

zh: 错误可分为一类错误和二类错误两种类型。
en: The errors may be described as one of two types — Type I or Type II .

zh: 一类错误指零假设被证伪，而事实上该假设成立。
en: Type I errors occur when the null hypothesis is rejected when in fact i t is true.

zh: 二类错误指当零假设事实上不成立但却被证实。
en: Type II errors occur when the null hypothesis is accepted when in fact it is false.

zh: 表9 - 8概括了假设检验中产生的错误类型。
en: Table 9.8 outlines the types of error that may arise in hypothesis testing.

zh: 对我来说，离开对土地的爱、尊敬和赞扬以及对其价值的高度重视，还能够与土地保持一种伦理关系，这是不可想象的。
en: It is inconceivable to me that an ethical relation to land can exist without love, respect and admiration for the land, and a high regard for its value.

zh: 提到价值，我当然是指远比经济价值更广泛的东西；我指的是哲学意义上的价值。所以，当一件东西趋向于保护生命共同体的完整性、稳定性和美的时候，它才是对的。
en: By value, I of course mean something far broader than mere economic value; I mean value in the philosophical sense so that a thing is right when it tends to preserve the integrity, stability, and beauty of the biotic community.

zh: 反之，它则是错的。
en: It is wrong when it tends otherwise.

zh: 随着“永久地”让渡的合法边界的抽象而来的是价格的抽象（和租金）、以单一标准衡量的财产价值的尺度。
en: To the abstraction of legal boundaries alienated "in perpetuity" was added the abstraction of price (and land rent), a measurement of property's value assessed on a unitary scale.

zh: “最重要的是，把土地和财产当成商品拿到市场上买卖，这一点正是英国人在所有权理解上与印第安人的不同”。
en: "More than anything else, it was the treatment of land and property as commodities traded at market that distinguished English conceptions of ownership from Indian ones."

zh: 殖民者的价值体系建立在社会地建构起来的时空母体上，这一母体与印第安共同体的母体完全不一样。
en: The value system of the colonizers was set in a matrix of socially constructed space-time which was radically at odds with that of the Indian community.

zh: 非概率抽样包括就近抽样、目标式抽样、滚雪球抽样和专家抽样。
en: Non-probability sampling includes convenience, purposive, snowball sampling and expert sampling.

zh: 概率抽样包括简单随机抽样（抽签方法、名称方法、出生日期或电脑方法）、系统抽样、分层抽样和多阶整群抽样。
en: Non-probability sampling includes simple random sampling (lottery method, first name, date of birth or computer-generated methods), stratified sampling, cluster sampling and multi-stage sampling.

zh: 另外还有配额抽样，它属于一种准随机抽样的方法。
en: Quota sampling, a quasi-random sampling method, is also used.

zh: 尽管地理研究显然要对广大区域进行归纳，但是分析的焦点也可以向相反的方向转移。
en: Despite an obvious geographical need to generalize over wide areas, the focus of analysis often moves in the opposite direction.

zh: 这种简化法曾经是科学的标志，在有些情况下确实是要用显微镜来观察隐含的结构和过程。
en: Such reductionism has been the hallmark of science, in some cases quite literally using the microscope to examine underlying structures and processes.

zh: 因此，安德森和伯特(Anderson and Burt, 1978)研究的基础是对土壤水分在土壤中运动的深入观察，以便更好地了解水文曲线中径流滞后形成的原因。
en: Thus, the basis of Anderson and Burt’s (1978) study was a detailed examination of soil moisture movement in soil, in order to better understand the way in which delayed throughflow hydrographs were generated.

zh: 但是，在大多数研究城市的著作中，居民能够行动自如被认为是理所当然的，而伊姆里指出这其实是一种健全者地理学（ableist geography)。
en: In most writing on cities the able-bodied character of citizens is taken for granted and this, Imrie argues, amounts to an ableist geography.

zh: 因此，帕克等人指出，“人文地理学中过去很少有研究残疾人的空间”。
en: Park et al. note that ‘Human geography has in the past found little room for studies of disability'.

zh: 作为一位因风湿性关节炎而残疾的教授，维拉•乔伊纳德深刻地揭露了这一问题的本质。
en: The character of the problem has been movingly revealed by Vera Chouinard, a professor disabled by rheumatoid arthritis.

zh: 双变量分析考虑两个变量之间的关系，两个变量间或者彼此相关，或者彼此无关。
en: Bivariate analysis considers the relationship between two variables,which may or may not be related to each other.

zh: 相关的变量可描述为证明共变，无关的变量在任何情况下都可描述为独立相关。
en: Variables that arerelated are described as demonstrating covariation; variables that arenot related in any way are described as having an independent relationship.

zh: 判定两个变量间的关系有很多种方法：交叉表、散点图和相关性测量。
en: There are a number of ways to determine relationships between two variables: cross-tabulation, scattergrams and measures of association.

zh: 其他作者认为关注压迫的等级结构——假设某种社会关系比其他社会关系更重要——已经导致一种新的实在论的危险，它把某些社会定位，如阶级、性别等，置于多种压迫的核心位置，而不是谨慎地将在什么样的条件下哪种差异更重要的问题理论化。
en: Other writers have argued that focusing on hierarchies of oppression – assuming that particular social relations matter more than others – has instead instigated what has threatened to become a new form of essentialism, valorizing particular social locations, such as class or gender, at the heart of multiple oppressions rather than theorizing carefully which differences matter under what conditions.

zh: 更具建设性的是，其他一些学者还发展出了交叉性的概念，以便于对多重身份的理解。

en: More productively, others still have developed the notion of intersectionality as a means of understanding multiple identifications.

zh: （Crenshaw，1995）
en: (Crenshaw, 1995)

zh: 一种新的社会主义理论必须以“地方”为中心。
en: A new theory of socialism must now centrally involve place.

zh: 人们牢记的论点是，无产阶级没有祖国，不占有把它与有产阶级区分出来的那些要素。
en: Remember the argument was that the proletariat had no country, the factor which differentiated it from the property owning classes.

zh: 但是，因为国际经济的爆炸性增长和老式共同体非工业化的破坏性后果，地方巳经成为联合过程的至关重大的因素——对无产阶级或许比占有资本的阶级更重要。
en: But place has been shown to be a crucial element in the bonding process — more so perhaps for the working class than the capital-owning classes — by the explosion of the international economy and the destructive effects of deindustrialization upon old communities.

zh: 当资本流动时，地方的重要性就更清晰地显现出来。
en: When capital has moved on, the importance of place is more clearly revealed.

zh: （Williams，1989a：242)
en: (Williams, 1989a:242)

zh: 北端区不仅紧邻于工业区，更糟的是里面有各种各样的工作和商业场所，它们与住宅错综复杂地混在一起。
en: Not only is the North End bumped right up against industry, but worse still it has all kinds of working places and commerce mingled in the greatest complexity with irs residences.

zh: 与波士顿任何一个可居住单元相比，这儿的密度是最高的，也许是美国所有城市中最高的。
en: It has the highest concentration of dwelling units, on the land that is used for dwelling units, of any part of Boston, and indeed one of the highest concentrations to be found in any American city.

zh: 它的公园用地很少孩子们在街上玩耍。
en: It has little park-land.Children play in the streets.

zh: 那儿没有超级街区(车辆禁行街区），甚至连像样一点的大街区也没有，有的只是非常小的街区；用规划的行话来说就是“支离破碎，街道浪费。”
en: Instead of super-blocks, or even decently large blocks, it has very small blocks; in planning parlance it is "badly cut up with wasteful streets."

zh: 弗兰克•哈韦是北端协会，当地的一个街区服务中心(settlement house)的主任。他说，“我在北端已经有28年了，在这么长的时间里，我还从没有听说过一件强奸、抢劫、骚扰孩子和其他类似的街头犯罪。如果有的话，在上报前，我肯定会有所耳闻。
en: Frank Havey, director of the North End Union, the local settlement house, says, "I have been here in the North End twenty-eight years, and in all that time I have never heard of a single case of rape, mugging, molestation of a child or other street crime of that son in the district. And if there had been any, I would have heard of it even if it did not reach the papers."

zh: 电话调査主要是结构式访谈，采用封闭式问题。访问者使用电话技术与受访者交流，并记录答案。
en: Telephone surveys are primarily structured interviews using closed questions, with an interviewer recording the respondent's answers.Contact with respondents is made using telephone technology.

zh: 计算机技术可以协助电话技术，在这种情况下，使用软件程序可以迅速记录受访者的回答，分析程序也有助于整合访谈数据。
en: Telephone technology may be further assisted by computer technology, in which case the responses are immediately recorded using software programs that integrate the responses with analysis procedures.

zh: 正如第二章所介绍的那样，这种新制度的特征是通过专门化产品的范围经济来实现持续不断的可获得全球竞争力的创新。
en: As introduced in Chapter 2, this new regime is characterized by continuous innovation to achieve global competitiveness via economies of scope in specialized products.

zh: 有人认为，在解除管制的全球金融体系下，这种方法是补偿大众市场饱和以及政府参与凯恩斯主义需求管理政策的能力不足所必需的。
en: This approach, it is argued, is necessary to compensate for the saturation of mass markets and the inability of states to engage in Keynesian policies of demand management in a deregulated global financial system.

zh: 这就要求一种新型的管制方式，而其中的福利利益让位于商业利益。
en: This requires a new mode of regulation in which the interests of welfare are subordinated to those of business.

zh: “自我实现”的理想广泛存在于生态学文献。
en: Ideals of "self-realization" are widespread in the ecological literature.

zh: 它们在某种意义上接近马克思通过研究人类的创造力来关心人类解放和自我发展，特别是他在《1844年经济学哲学手稿》以及《政治经济学批判草稿(大纲)》中相关的讨论。
en: They parallel in certain ways Marx's concerns, particularly in The Economic and Philosophic Manuscripts of 1844 but also in later works such as the Grundrisse, for human emancipation and self-development through the working out of our creative powers.

zh: 然而，马克思主义传统一如既往地关注贫困和匮乏，生产力的解放最终成为通往更广泛的人类自我实现目标之主导的且在某种程度上唯一的手段。
en: In the Marxist tradition, however, quite properly concerned as it has been with impoverishment and deprivation, the liberation of the productive forces came to be seen as the privileged and to some degree exclusive means towards the broader goal of human self-realization (see Grundmann, 1991b: 54).

zh: 这样，它就成为目标本身。
en: As such, it became a goal in itself.

zh: 以排他性的和老生常谈的方式来定义“他者”是通往自我定义的第一步。
en: Defining the "other" in an exclusionary and stereotypical way is the first step towards self-definition.

zh: 重新发现地方，如海德格尔例子所表明的，对于建构任何类型的进步政治来说，危险与机会一样多。
en: The rediscovery of place, as the case of Heidegger shows, poses as many dangers as opportunities for the construction of any kind of progressive politics.

zh: 如萨义德在其《东方学》(Said，1978)中示范的那样，解构和后现代冲动确实提供了一种工具，可以用来反对令人震惊的对其他地方的模式化，但是，在文化大众的总体工作中，存在着巨大的公共视角、再现和政治学的困难，这是急需正视的。
en: Deconstruction and the postmodern impulse, as Said (1978) demonstrates in his study of Orientalism, certainly provide a means to attack the appalling stereotyping of other places, but there is a huge problem of public perspectives, representation, and politics within the overall work of the cultural mass in this regard that desperately needs to be confronted.

zh: 由于水、太阳辐射和养分均可能受限制，克莱门茨（Clements,1928）的演替概念曾被解释为导致气候顶极植被。
en: Because any of water, radiation and nutrients can be limiting, the succession concept of Clements (1928) has been interpreted as leading to the climate climax vegetation.

zh: 气候植被顶极和演替概念暗含着植被达到这个容量取决于增长极限的假设。
en: The assumption that the vegetation reaches the capacity determined by the limits of growth is implicit in the climatic climax vegetation and the concept of succession.

zh: 它形成了从气候方面解释植被覆盖的历史证据（例如在古生物学上）， 以及重建全球气候变化造成过去植被变化的基础。
en: It forms the basis of the interpretation of historical evidence of vegetation cover in climatic terms (for example, in palynology) and the reconstruction of past vegetation shifts resulting from global climate change.

zh: 解释社会学范式、冲突理论范式和女性主义范式都采用定性的内容分析。
en: Qualitative content analysis is used by the interpretive social sciences paradigm, the critical theory paradigm and the feminist perspectives paradigm.

zh: 同样，在使用这些范式进行旅游研究时，当然也可以进行定性内容分析。
en: It can also be used in tourism research informed by these paradigms.

zh: 与定量内容分析一样，定性内容分析的方法也有一些科学规则。
en: As with quantitative content analysis, the method of qualitative content analysis has scientific protocols.

zh: 这些规则与德伊（1993）所提出的那些关于定性资料的分析原则相似。
en: The protocols are not unlike those Dey (1993) notes in regard to qualitative data analysis.

zh: 解释性调査法目的在于检验假设（一种因果关系）。
en: Explanatory surveys are designed to test a hypothesis (a causal relationship).

zh: 举例来说，为了验证到维多利亚(Victoria)菲利浦岛(Philip Island)游览的本地居民多于非本地居民，研究者就会进行调査设计，来收集到此参观的游客的居住地和旅游类型的数据资料。
en: For example, to test the hypothesis that more locals visit Phillip Island in Victoria than non-locals, the researcher would design a survey to collect data on place of residence and visitation patterns to Phillip Island.

zh: 通过数据分析，研究者就可以确定到该地参观的游客居住地和其旅游类型之间存在的所有关系，然后证实或推翻假设。
en: Through data analysis, the researcher would determine the existence of any relationship between place of residency and visitation patterns to Phillip Island, then either accept or reject the hypothesis.

zh: 正如纯理论研究可以采用探索性的、描述性的和解释性的研究方法一样，应用性研究也可采用这样一些研究方法。
en: Just as pure research draws on several approaches, that is exploratory, descriptive and explanatory research, so too does applied research.

zh: 但是，应用性研究涉及了更多的研究方法：探索性的、描述性的、解释性的、因果关系的、比较性的、评价性的、预测性的 (所有这些方法都将在下面予以解释）。
en: However, applied research draws on a wider range of approaches: exploratory, descriptive, explanatory, causal, comparative, evaluative and predictive (all of these terms are explained below).

zh: 但这些方法并不是互相排斥的。

en: This does not mean to imply that each of these approaches is mutually exclusive.

zh: 揭示人们对“地方感”需要“感情投入”地探究感觉、情绪和价值观的领域。
en: Disclosing people’s ‘sense of place’ requires ‘empathetic’ enquiries into the realms of feelings, emotions and values.

zh: 在像利这样的学者向人文地理学界推出所谓“解释学方法”后大约30年间，对地方的主观依恋或对地方的主观理解显然仍和以往一样重要。
en: Some three decades after the likes of Ley launched this so-called ‘hermeneutic approach’ in human geography, it’s clear that subjective attachments to, or interpretations of, place matter as much as ever.

zh: 尽管有全球性的互相依赖，但大多数人还是生活在若干平方千米的范围内。
en: Global interdependency notwithstanding, most people live their lives within just a few square kilometres.

zh: 我们在这条街道上的居民们做了一切能做的事。
en: We people on the street did what we could.

zh: 印刷店的老板把他手头一份急活停了下来，专门在星期六的早上赶印了很多紧急请愿书，这样在孩子们放学时，可以帮助分发。
en: The job printer stopped his press, took off of it work on which he had an urgent deadline, and printed emergency petitions on a Sarurday moring so the children, out of school, could help get them around.

zh: 邻近街区的人们也拿走了请愿书散发到更远的地方。
en: People from overlapping street neighborhoods took petitons and spread them farther.

zh: 经费预算表同工作进度表一样，在形式上与引言、文献综述和方法论部分均不同。
en: The budget section, like the time line, differs in style from the introduction, literature review and methodology sections.

zh: 经费预算部分不包含大量的文字描述，只是在这部分的开始通常会概括性说明经费总额及在附件中是否包含引注。
en: The budget section does not contain a lot of textual description.You should commence the section with an overview statement that indicates the complete budget amount and indicate if any quotes have been included in the appendices.

zh: 采用线形项目经费预算法是个体经费预算项目当中最为简单易行的方式。
en: Organising the budget into a simple line item budget is the easiest representation of the individual budget items.

zh: 通常，为了降低整个项目的成本，资助方通常会减少经费预算，因而在制订投标书的过程中，最好按照急需资助的优先顺序对经费预算项目进行排列。
en: When completing tenders, you may be asked to rank the budget items as to their priority for funding, as often budgets will be cut by the tender receivers to reduce the overall cost of the project.

zh: 一种新的社会主义理论必须以“地方”为中心。
en: A new theory of socialism must now centrally involve place.

zh: 人们牢记的论点是，无产阶级没有祖国，不占有把它与有产阶级区分出来的那些要素。
en: Remember the argument was that the proletariat had no country, the factor which differentiated it from the property owning classes.

zh: 但是，因为国际经济的爆炸性增长和老式共同体非工业化的破坏性后果，地方已经成为联合过程的至关重大的因素——对无产阶级或许比占有资本的阶级更重要。
en: But place has been shown to be a crucial element in the bonding process — more so perhaps for the working class than the capital-owning lasses — by the explosion of the international economy and the destructive effects of deindustrialization upon old communities.

zh: 在人文地理学内部，引入系统分析和模拟复杂相互关系的尝试已是某些经济地理学领域的特点，尤其在与国际、区域或城市范围内经济增长有关的那些领域。
en: Within human geography, attempts to introduce systems analysis and the modelling of complex interrelationships have characterized certain areas of economic geography, notably those concerned with economic growth in an international, regional, or urban context.

zh: 一个典范实例是普雷德（Pred，1977a）关于城市增长动力学的研究，其基础在于用输入-输出公式表示一种经济结构。
en: (A good example is the work of Pred, 1977a, on the dynamics of urban growth, whose basis lies in the input-output formulation of the structure of an economy.

zh: 因为要获取数据来检验作为整体而不是作为一系列分离假设的模型，很多关于各种系统的这种研究一直停滞在建模阶段，然而系统方法的引入已使人文地理学在专门技术上有了重大收获。
en: Much of this work on systems has stopped at the model building stage, because of problems of obtaining data to test the models as wholes rather than as series of separate hypotheses.Hence the introduction of a systems approach has led to considerable acquisition of technical expertise by the discipline.

zh: 理解住房市场的一个有效方法是，把住房市场看做一系列“参与者”在各种政治及制度制约下的集中行动，这些集中行动的结果体现在空间上，就表现为土地利用的变化、所有权模式、社区的变迁、住房价格和住房质量等方面（图6—1)。
en: In general it is useful to think in terms of housing markets as the focus for a variety of ‘actors’ operating within the various constraints of political and institutional contexts, the result of which are spatial outcomes that can be identified in terms of land use changes, occupancy patterns, social area changes, housing prices and housing quality (Fig. 6.1).

zh: 传统的住房子市场的定义表述为住房的存量特征（房屋类型、租赁形式和价格）、家庭类型（家庭地位、经济地位、种族）或者是区位（图 6—2)。
en: Traditional definitions of housing submarkets have been couched in terms of the attributes of housing stock (type of dwelling, type of tenancy and price), household type (family status, economic status and ethnicity) or location (Fig. 6.2).

zh: 不过，在任何给定的城市中，住房子市场通常都不可能划分得如此整齐和清晰。
en: But it is unusual for housing submarkets to form such neat, discrete compartments within any given city.

zh: 现在让我们回到现代性的现实情况。
en: Now let’s return to the reality that is modernity.

zh: 事后我们能够看到富国经济发展不是真正的终点;这些国家的经济转变是跳跃式前进的，而且与髙科技工业分不开。
en: In hindsight, we can see that economic development in the rich countries is not actually an end-point, economic change in these countries has proceeded in leaps and bounds with new high-tech industries.

zh: 相反，往昔的“发展中国家”却在经济上越来越落后。
en: In contrast, most of the erstwhile ‘developing countries’ are economically falling further and further behind.

zh: 另一个较大的争议是围绕决定城市模式因子中经济因子与文化因子孰轻孰重的问题。
en: Another big controversy has surrounded the relative importance of economic and cultural factors in determining the form of cities.

zh: 其中的一个极端是，一些研究陷人了经济决定（economic determinism)的陷阱，认为变化中的城市经济结构决定相应的社会和文化模式；而另一个极端最近占了上风，它被认为是“文化决定论”的一种形式，因为文化问题已经成为现代经济中的关键问题。
en: At one extreme, some studies have fallen into the trap of economic determinism, assuming that the changing economic structure of cities determines the accompanying social and cultural forms.The other extreme, which has come to the fore more recently, might be seen as a form of ‘cultural determinism’, since it assumes that cultural issues have become crucial in contemporary economies.

zh: 因此，它讨论文化影响生产什么（日益增加的电视、电影、音乐和软件）以及如何生产（在公司中“工作文化”问题要比过去更加严重）。
en: Thus, it is argued that culture affects what is produced (increasingly videos, films, music and software) as well as how it is produced (in firms that take issues of ‘work culture’ much more seriously than in the past).

zh: 而且，需要仔细测量污染和资源损耗的成本，因为第二个约束认为经济增长(资本积累)和环境质量之间存在着一个零和均衡。过度顾虑后者就不必要地放弃前者的利益。
en: And it also requires careful measurement of costs of pollution and resource depletion because the second constraint is that there is thought to be a zero-sum trade-off between economic growth (capital accumulation) and environmental quality.To be overly solicitous with respect to the latter is to forgo unnecessarily the benefits of the former.

zh: 这是货币化成本效益分析的领域，这种分析现在对于塑造标准观点中的环境政治学发挥着非常重要的作用。
en: This is the domain of monetized cost—benefit analysis which now plays such an important role in shaping environmental politics under the standard view.

zh: 把红色对我们感官产生的影响还原成它的纯粹物理概念，就如同把景观的意义还原成对它的地理要素的描绘，都会丧失美学经验追求的本质。
en: To reduce the impact of the color red upon our senses to its purely physical concept was to lose something in exactly the same way that the reduction of a landscape's meaning to a description of its geological components was to lose the essence of what esthetic experience was about.

zh: 因此，必须在表象和直接效果层次上，更重要的是在总体性层次上来维持美学。
en: Esthetics therefore had to remain at the level of surface appearance, immediate impact and, most important of all, at the level of the totality.

zh: 如果不诉诸某种类似于莱布尼茨式奇想的东西，美学知识是很难达及的。
en: And esthetic knowledge was very hard to come by without resort to something akin to the Leibnizian conceit.

zh: 筛选数据是指对大量的数据进行提炼，按现有类别、主题和概念分门别类。
en: Data reduction is associated with the distillation of rich data into identifiable categories, themes and concepts.

zh: 展示数据是指将上述的类别、主题和概念以表意的形式加以呈现。
en: Data displays are the ideographic presentations of the categories, themes and concepts.

zh: 展示的方法包括：图示法、分类法、 矩阵法和对在大量数据中持续反复出现的主题、主旨、相互关系和程序进行可视的（文本性的）描述。
en: These may range from maps, taxonomies, matrices and models to visual (and textual) portrayals of the distillation of constantly reoccurring themes and motifs and relationships and processes found in the rich data.

zh: 对具化的研究反映出另外一种努力，即避免笛卡尔在论述世界时明确的思想与身体的分离。
en: This work on embodiment represents another attempt to avoid the mind/body split that is evident in Cartesian reasoning about the world.

zh: 正如我们在第一章所见，这种分离的观点是基于这样一个错误假设，即作者“没有特定的历史背景，是一个无社区、无身体的成员”。
en: As we saw in Chapter 1, this detached view is based on the mistaken assumption that the writer ‘. . . has no particular history, is member of no community, has no body’ (Young, 1978, cited in Duncan, 1996, emphasis added).

zh: 相反，“具体知识”（‘ embodied knowledge’）的概念（也被称为地方知识或根植性知识）公开认同了观点、概念和分析都是来源于处在特定时间和特定地点中的人。
en: In contrast, the concept of embodied knowledge (also termed local or situated knowledge) explicitly acknowledges that ideas, concepts and analyses emerge from people in specific places at particular times.

zh: 从理论上说，专家的专业技能是“现成的”而不是“顶尖的”，但是有很多人（如马克思•韦伯）认为，政府程序的极端复杂性已经带来了“官员垄断”。
en: In theory, the expert professional is ‘on tap’but not ‘on top’, but there are many who believe, like Max Weber, that the sheer complexity of governmental procedure has brought about a‘dictatorship of the official’.

zh: 例如，莱恩伯里认为专业人士的影响是如此巨大，而且他们所操纵的决策规则（decision rules)是如此复杂，以至于他们能够有效地将许多公共服务业配置从哪怕是最强大的政治权力组织的控制中夺过来。
en: Lineberry, for instance, argued that the influence of professional personnel can be so great and the decision rules by which they operate so complex as to effectively remove the allocation of most public services from the control of even the strongest political power groups.

zh: 这里至关重要的一点是，专业化官员的目标和动机并不总是与公众的最大利益相一致，或者与他们的选举代表的意见相一致。
en: The crucial point here is that the objectives and motivations of professional officers are not always coincident with the best interests of the public nor in accordance with the views of theirelected representatives.

zh: 目标读者为决策者的报告，内容应该包括关于研究是如何进行的简短总结。
en: The content of reports for decision makers should include a short summary of how the study was conducted.

zh: 主要焦点应该落在研究结果上，还应该使用图像帮助理解研究结果，如曲线图和图表(Neuman 1994, p. 473)。
en: The main focus should be on the results.Visual inputs should be used to assist the communication of the results, such as graphs and tables (Neuman 1994, p. 473).

zh: 研究结构及研究结果的细节可以放在附录中，这样，那些对这两部分感兴趣的读者就能够找到它们（Neuman 2000)。
en: Specifics of research design and findings can be situated in the appendices so that those who are interested in reading these sections will be able to access them (Neuman 2000).

zh: 目标读者为决策者的技术性报告，一般会采用前面已经详细介绍过的科学实验报告的结构。
en: Technical reports for decision makers will generally follow the structure of the scientific research report detailed earlier.

zh: 这些决定论（determinist theory)观点可在几个方面得以论证。
en: Evidence to support these tenets of determinist theory has been assembled on several fronts.

zh: 心理超载（psychological overload)观点便是有利的论据之一。该观点来自环境心理学家的调査研究。后来托夫勒推广了这个观点。他认为：在此情形下对于其他信息的寻求相处理会导致“未来-簾惊”：一种对于过分刺激的人类反应。
en: The idea of psychological overload resulting from complex or unfamiliar environments has been investigated by environmental psychologists and popularized by Alvin Toffler (1970), who suggested that the need to ‘scoop up and process’ additional information in such situations can lead to ‘future-shock’: the human response to overstimulation.

zh: 虽然我们假定仅仅对某些参数值会出现多重均衡，但我们很难从这个模型中得出这样的结论：存在多重均衡的可能性很大。
en: One would hardly conclude from this model that the existence of multiple equilibria is highly likely, even given the assumptions that such multiple equilibria will occur only for some parameter values.

zh: 另外，人们很容易对这些假定的正确性提出怀疑。
en: And it is easy to critique the plausibility of the assumptions.

zh: 不过这个模型仍可作为考察发展模型的一个有用出发点。
en: Yet the model can serve as a useful jumping-off point for thinking about development models.

zh: 烤鸡业的普遍工作条件对健康非常不利。
en: The conditions prevailing within the chicken broiler industry are less than salubrious.

zh: 沙门氏菌污染是一种地方性问题，污染问题也很普遍，对生产条件的描述很可能会激起那些只对动物权利略微敏感的人的愤怒。
en: Salmonella contamination is an endemic danger, pollution problems are rife, and descriptions of production conditions are liable to stir the ire of those only mildly sensitive to animal rights.

zh: 烤鸡产业的附属业是鸡肉加工业，250个工厂内雇佣15万名工人，它们主要位于非常小的城镇或贯穿于“烤鸡地带”的乡村环境中。
en: Ancillary to broiler-chicken production, is a chicken-processing industry employing 150,000 workers in 250 or so plants, mostly located in very small towns or rural settings throughout the "Broiler Belt."

zh: 按照实证主义范式的观点，研究者与研究对象或客体之间的关系是客观且价值中立的。
en: The relationship between the researcher and the subjects or objects is one that is objective and value free.

zh: 研究者被默认为不会影响研究的结果或发现。
en: The researcher is assumed not to impact on or influence the results or findings in a research project.

zh: 研究过程遵循严格的程序以确保对结果的客观性和价值中立的解释。
en: The conduct of research follows strict procedures to ensure objectivity and value-free interpretations.

zh: 正因为如此，其他研究者才能够重复该研究并取得一致的研究结果。
en: As a consequence, other researchers should be able to replicate the same piece of research and obtain the same findings.

zh: (3)社会关系总是空间的，并且存在于某种生产出来的空间性框架中。
en: 3. Social relations are always spatial and exist within a certain produced framework of spatialities.

zh: 换句话来说，无论在哪个方面，社会关系都是某种绘制的地图，无论是象征的、比喻的，还是物质的。
en: Put another way, social relations are, in all respects, mappings of some sort, be they symbolic, figurative, or material.

zh: 组织社会关系需要一种绘制行动，以便人们知道他们的位置。
en: The organization of social relations demands a mapping so that people know their place.

zh: 革命行动需要对社会关系和当事人进行重新绘制，那些当事人不再承认他们先前被分配的位置。
en: Revolutionary activity entails a re-mapping of social relations and agents who no longer acknowledge that place to which they were formerly assigned.

zh: 由此得出的结论是，空间关系(以及那些空间关系的话语)的生产是社会关系的产物，改变一种就是改变另一种。
en: From this it follows that the production of spatial relations (and of discourses about space relations) is a production of social relations and to alter one is to alter the other.

zh: 地理学家——尤其是第二次世界大战后培养的那些——被这些模式所吸引。他们将其作为能够被检验的假设的基础，用严密的基于数量化方法的表面区位决策在经济上是合理的，新设施和道路规划能够以此类模式为基础。
en: Geographers – especially those trained after the Second World War – were attracted to these models, as foundations for hypotheses that could be tested, using rigorous, quantitatively-based procedures to show both that locational decisionmaking was economically rational and that planning for new facilities and routes could be based on such models.

zh: 此外，他们还重新发现了芝加哥大学社会学家和其他学者开发的有关“自然区域”中城市内部空间组织的模式。
en: In addition, they ‘rediscovered’ models of the internal spatial organization of cities into ‘natural areas’ developed by sociologists and others at the University of Chicago.

zh: 至于全球性和本土性的问题，与唯心主义者不同的是，唯物主义者所持的观点是，所有这些尺度都是在各种社会行动主体的积极作用下才被创造出来的。像全球性这样的尺度不是单纯地存在着，等待着被使用，而是要让其显现化。
en: In contrast to idealists, then, materialists maintain that such scales as the local and the global are actively created through the practices of various social actors – scales do not just exist, waiting to be utilized, but must instead be brought into being.

zh: 因此，跨国公司不仅仅是将它们的活动扩大到了早已存在的、地质意义上的以地球为边界的全球性尺度，而且必须积极地打造它们自己全球性尺度的运作方式。
en: Thus, transnational corporations do not simply adapt their activities to a pre-made global scale defined by the Earth’s geologically given limits but must, instead, actively build their own global scale of operation.

zh: 实际上，它们必须变成“全球性”的。
en: They must, in effect, become ‘global’.

zh: 很可能，每个人(除了这些场所的主人)都会同意这一类的用途大煞风景。
en: Probably everyone (except possibly the owners of such objects) is agreed that this category of uses is blighting.

zh: 但这并不意味着垃圾场(junk yards)以及诸如此类的事因此就是城市多 样性必然带来的威胁。
en: But it does not follow that junk yards and their like are therefore threats which accompany city diversity.

zh: 成功的城市地区从来就不会有这儿一个，那儿一个的垃圾场(junk yards)，但这并不是这些地区成功的原因。
en: Successful city districts are never dotted with junk yards, but that is not why these districts are successful.

zh: 恰恰相反，这些地方找不到乱七八糟的垃圾场(junk yards)是因为它们很成功。
en: It is the other way around.They lack junk yards because they are successful.

zh: 案例研究需要弄清事情的来龙去脉——特定的机制与所研究地点特殊情况相作用造成可观察的事件，为我们提供了自然界运行方式的线索。
en: A case-study experiment requires recontextualization – particular mechanisms interact with the specific contextual character of the location under study, to cause observable events which give us clues about the way nature works.

zh: 一个例子是1850年以后观察到的美国西北部南普拉特河(South Platte River)河道格局变化的事件:河流上游水库蓄水以后，河流从辫状水系变成了曲流的形式。
en: An example is the observed event of a change in channel pattern on the South Platte River after 1850, from a braided to a meandering form, following reservoir impoundment in its headwaters.

zh: 流量控制降低了年平均洪水位时河流的动力。
en: This control of flow reduced the stream power at the mean annual flood.

zh: 把红色对我们感官产生的影响还原成它的纯粹物理概念，就如同把景观的意义还原成对它的地理要素的描绘，都会丧失美学经验追求的本质。
en: To reduce the impact of the color red upon our senses to its purely physical concept was to lose something in exactly the same way that the reduction of a landscape's meaning to a description of its geological components was to lose the essence of what esthetic experience was about.

zh: 因此，必须在表象和直接效果层次上维持美学，更重要的是在总体性层次上来维持美学。
en: Esthetics therefore had to remain at the level of surface appearance, immediate impact and, most important of all, at the level of the totality.

zh: 如果不诉诸某种类似于莱布尼茨式奇想的东西，美学知识是很难达及的。
en: And esthetic knowledge was very hard to come by without resort to something akin to the Leibnizian conceit.

zh: 在资本主义制度下，劳动是一种被在市场上买卖的商品，并由此与工人异化。
en: Labor under capitalism, is a commodity to be bought and sold, in the market place, and as such is alienated from the worker.

zh: 当劳动分工变细后，异化也随之增加。
en: Alienation is increased as the division of labor becomes finer.

zh: 这种非人性化影响资本主义社会的两大阵营(资产阶级和无产阶级）。
en: Such dehumanization affects both parties in a capitalist society (i.e.bourgeoisie and proletariat).

zh: 我会在下面的三章里谈到这个问题。在四个生发多样性的条件中，有两个比较容易对付，主要是解决灰色地带的问题——老建筑都已经在那儿，随时可以发挥潜能;另一个条件是需要增加街道，这也不是办不到的难事。
en: However, I shall anticipate the discussion in the next  three chapters to say this: Of the four generators of diversity, two represent easy problems to deal with in curing the troubles of gray areas --- aged buildings are usually already present to do their potential share; and additional streets where they are needed are not innately difficult to acquire.

zh: （与大规模的土地清空相比(我们已经在这方面浪费了很多资金，这仅仅是一个小问题。）
en: (They are a minor problem compared with the large scale land clearance we have been taught to waste our money on.)

zh: 对于马克思来说，对物质社会实践世界的分析，对货币循环、商品生产和交换的分析，定义了一种复杂的社会关系和普遍评价的时空世界，在这个世界中，地方必然作为构造性因素存在于资本积累的历史地理之中。
en: For Marx, analysis of the world of material social practices, of money circulation and commodity production, and exchange defines a spatio-temporal world of intricate social relations and universal valuations, within which places necessarily have their being as constitutive elements within the historical geography of capital accumulation.

zh: 但是，这种时空世界也为我们“类存在物”定义了同样普遍的道德、经济和政治责任的领域。作为“类存在物”，尽管我们的特点是异化和剥削，但不得不通过阶级斗争的全球政治-经济战略来拯救。
en: But this spatio-temporal world also defines an equally universal sphere of moral, economic, and political responsibility for our "species being" which, though characterized by alienation and exploitation, has to be rescued by a global political—economic strategy of class struggle.

zh: 当群落可利用的所有资源(水、太阳辐射、养分)均被消费以生产生物量时,就达到了这个上限。
en: The upper limit is reached when all the resources available to the community (water, radiation and nutrients) are consumed in producing biomass.

zh: 同样,稳定的下限会被固定于任何资源的限制—李比西定律。
en: Likewise, a lower stable limit would be fixed by any limitation on resources – Liebig’s Law.

zh: 其中任何一种都可能是“限制的”,而且在1960年代和1970年代,这些问题在“新生态学”中被重新解释为容量或潜力。
en: Any one of them might be ‘limiting’ and, in the 1960s and 1970s, they were reinterpreted in the ‘new ecology’ as the capacity or potential.

zh: 资料三角校正是指研究者在研究过程引入多种资料来源。
en: Researchers concerned with data triangulation draw on various sources of data in the research process.

zh: 调查者三角校正是指研究中雇用若干个研究者或评论者。
en: Investigator triangulation refers to the employment of several researchers or evaluators in a study.

zh: 理论三角校正是指研究者用几种方法或视角分析资料。
en: Theory triangulation involves researchers using several theories or perspectives to analyse data.

zh: 方法论的三角校正是指研究者使用多种方法收集与研究相关的资料。
en: Methodological triangulation involves researchers using several methods to gather data relevant to a study.

zh: 整个18世纪就是在这种意义上理解理性的，即不是把它看作知识、原理和真理的容器，而是把它视为一种能力或一种力量，这种力量只有通过它的作用和结果才能充分理解。
en: The whole eighteenth century understands reason ... not as a sound body of knowledge, principles, and truths, but as a kind of energy, a force which is fully comprehensible only in its agency and effects.

zh: 理性的性质和力量，仅从结果是无法充分衡量的，只有根据功用才能看清。
en: What reason is and what it can do, can never be known by its results but only by its function.

zh: 理性最重要的功用，是它有结合和分解的能力。
en: And its most important function is to bind and to dissolve.

zh: 对于那些对地理学思想史感兴趣的人来说，值得一提的是，奥尔森和我都同样被奥尔曼论“异化”的著作所打动，该著作强调内部关系，初版于1972年。不过，奥尔森后来采纳了语言学和唯心主义导向，这一点无论如何与我采取的历史的—地理的唯物主义立场都不一样。
en: For those interested in the history of geographical thought, it is worth noting that Gunnar Olsson and I were both equally impressed with Oilman's book on Alienation and its emphasis on internal relations when it was first published in 1972, but that the linguistic and idealist direction in which Olsson subsequently took the idea is in all other respects quite at odds with my own work in historical-geographical materialism.

zh: 或许因为同样的原因，巴斯卡(1993)在他付出了巨大努力和深刻思考的著作中展开了自己的辩证现实主义观点，他注意到自己和奥尔曼的著作之间具有某种交叉点，尽管他批评奥尔曼倾向于把辩证法理解成纯粹的认识论而不是一种有力的本体论立场。
en: Perhaps for similar reasons Bhaskar (1993), in laying out his own version of dialectical realism in a book of intimidating difficulty and intensity, notes both a certain convergence between his own work and that of Oilman's, while criticizing Oilman for tending to treat dialectics as pure epistemology rather than as a powerful ontological position.

zh: 在辩证的/关系的视野中，事实与价值之间的分离是不可能实现的(除非通过阴谋诡计，或者在某些极为有限的领域中。在这些领域中，人们合理地接受这个观念，即价值是或可能被视为恒定的)。
en: In the dialectical/relational view, the separation of facts and values is impossible to achieve (except by sleight of hand or within certain strictly limited domains where it may reasonably be held that values are or can be held constant).

zh: 如我们所见，在某些科学领域中，这种必然融合事实和价值的辩证的/关系的观点已经开始复兴，例如，在“如何解释量子理论”这个问题上的广泛争论。
en: In some areas of science, as we shall see, this dialectical/relational view of the inevitable fusion of facts and values has undergone a revival of sorts, as multiple contestations have arisen over, for example, how to interpret quantum theory.

zh: 一类错误和二类错误与陈述假设的研究项目相关。
en: Type I and Type II errors are associated with research projects that state hypotheses.

zh: 在研究项目的分析阶段，通过数据收集汇总，研究者能够进行假设检验。
en: In the analytical phase of a research project, having aggregated the data, the researcher is able to test hypotheses.

zh: 研究者使用的假设有许多的类型，主要包括零假设和备择假设。
en: There are several types of hypotheses that the researcher uses, primarily the null hypothesis and the alternative hypothesis.

zh: 就如同我们可以想象空间同特定身份相联系、排除或包容一样，我们同样可以把身份看成是因空间而形成和发挥作用的。
en: Just as we can imagine spaces associated with, excluding or embracing particular identities, we can also see identity as spatially formed and enacted.

zh: 流散身份(diasporic identity)就是这样一种概念(见 Anderson, 1991; Gilroy, 1993)。
en: The idea of diasporic identity is one such idea (see Anderson, 1991; Gilroy, 1993).

zh: 流散的意思指的是某一人群从他们发祥地扩散或分散出去，流散到各地。但是现在这个词出现了引申的用法，用来代表人们有多个地方作为归属地的复杂感受，他们可能把这些地方都看成是自己的家乡(Clifford, 1994)。
en: Diaspora literally refers to the dispersal or scattering of a population from an original homeland, but it is now used more loosely to capture the complex sense of belonging that people can have over several places, all of which they might think of as home (Clifford, 1994; see Mavroudi, 2007, for more on different the orizations of diaspora).

zh: 只要现代部门有不可耗尽的规模经济——这对整个论证至关重要——我们就必须将现代部门模型化为不完全竞争的部门。
en: As long as there are unexhausted economies of scale in the modern sector, which are crucial to the whole argument, one must face up to the necessity of modeling the modern sector as imperfectly competitive.

zh: 墨菲等人的模型，通过假设存在多个定价受到限制的垄断者来引入不完全竞争。
en: In the Murphy et al. formulation, imperfect competition is dealt with by assuming a set of limit-pricing monopolists.

zh: 尽管（我们很快会看到）它不是万能的，但用在这里还是一个不错的方法。
en: This works well here, although (as we will see) it is not always an adequate device.

zh: 调査者完成问卷调査同样可被细分为中途拦截式调查（intercept)和上门调査。
en: Interviewer-completed questionnaires can also be subdivided intointercept surveys and household interviews.

zh: 针对旅游研究，这里有两种基本的中途拦截式调查类型：路访和现场调査（见本章后面的讨论）。
en: Within tourism studies, there are essentially two types of intercept surveys: en-route surveys and on-site surveys (see discussion later in the chapter).

zh: 因为受访者是从一个活动中（Frey 1989)被中途拦截，所以这里使用“中途拦截调査”这一术语。这种情况既能发生在来往一个或多个目的地的旅游途中，也能发生在一个目的地的某点。
en: The term 'intercept' is used since the respondent is 'intercepted' in the course of an activity (Frey 1989) — in this case either travelling to or from a destination or several destinations or while on-site at a destination.

zh: 上门调査收集的数据通常是有关旅游者对旅游和旅游产品及其未来发展的态度和意见方面的。
en: Household surveys usually collect data regarding attitudes and opinions about travel and tourism products and developments.

zh: 它同时方便监控社会经济变化以及旅游趋势和方式。
en: They also facilitate the monitoring of changes in socioeconomic profiles and travel and tourism trends and patterns.

zh: 上门调查的优缺点与自填式问卷调查和调查者完成问卷调查的一样。
en: The advantages and disadvantages of household surveys are the same as for interviewer completed and self-completion questionnaires.

zh: 我们还要对莱恩·斯蒂芬森以及所有约翰·威利出版杜的成员所不断给予的帮助表示衷心地感谢。
en: We would like to give a great deal of thanks to lain Stevenson and everyone at John Wiley for their continued support.

zh: 编辑们对南极旅游工作国际协会为允许前往南极的旅游者和旅游工作人员重新制定组织指导方针表示由衷感谢。
en: The editors would also like to give special thanks to the International Association of Antarctica Tour Operators (IAATO) for permission to reproduce lAATO's guidelines for tour operators and visitors to Antarctica.

zh: 最后，我们向所有为此项目提供帮助，做出贡献的所有同仁表达最诚挚的谢意，因为你们的无私奉献而使得研究工作得以顺利进行！
en: Finally, we would like to thank ail the contributors for their support of the project and making the job of the editors that much easier.

zh: 早期对旅游的研究即旅游研究主要是建立在数量计算和经济效益确定的基础上。
en: Initially, the study of tourism — that is, tourism research — was predicated to the counting of numbers and the determination of economic benefits.

zh: 这是因为旅游业这种服务性的产业在国内和国际层面上都被视为经济发展的工具，对于那些只有很少或根本没有基本的技术资源的地区或国家来说更是如此。
en: This occurred because tourism, a service industry, was viewed as an economic development tool both at a national and international level, particularly for those regions or nations with minimal or no primary or technological resources.

zh: 许多年来，振兴主义和经济传统(Getz 1987)是用于旅游发展规划的主要方法，而这两者都是以经济学范式为基础的。
en: For many years, boosterism and the economic tradition (Getz 1987) were the predominant planning approaches adopted for tourism development.Both are founded on economic paradigms.

zh: 原始资料或二手资料的使用取决于研究项目本身、使用的范式和一些外部因素诸如时间金钱等的限制。
en: The use of primary or secondary data depends on the research project, the overlying paradigm and any external factors such as time and monetary constraints.

zh: 对于旅游研究者来说，资料来源是很广泛的。
en: For tourism researchers, data sources are extensive.

zh: 原始资料可以通过观察法、访谈法、专家小组或问卷调查法等方式收集。
en: Primary data may be gathered by using observation, interviews, panel groups or questionnaires.

zh: 二手资料可以通过由私人、公共和非营利部门提供的文化文件和著作来收集。
en: Secondary data may be gathered from cultural documents and artefacts accessible in the private, public and non-profit sectors.

zh: 所有表格、图表和附录的标记都要清晰、简明地表达它们的内容。
en: All labels for tables, graphs and appendices should clearly and succinctly describe their contents.

zh: 例如：“旅游者数量”就不如“2000年南澳洲的洲际旅游者数量”传递的信息量更大。
en: For example, 'Tourist numbers' is not as informative as 'Interstate tourist numbers in South Australia in 2000'.

zh: 要注意， 一些表格和图表是可以脱离其背景而存在的，且可用于他处，这样，相应的标记和题目就要能够保证它们在脱离了原来的使用环境之后仍然是完整而切题的。
