en: Remember that some tables and graphs may be removed from their context and used elsewhere, so the labels or titles should enable them to stand alone from the document from which they were drawn.

zh: 旅游组织既可以由公共部门的代表或私有部门的代表组成，或由公共部门的代表和私有部门的代表共同组成。
en: Tourism bodies may consist entirely of public or private representatives or a mixture of personnel from the public and private sectors.

zh: 旅游组织可在本地、地区、州、国内或国际等不同的组织层面上运作（Mill and Morrison 1998)。
en: They can also operate at several levels — local, regional, state, national or international ( Mill & Morrison 1998).

zh: 旅游组织对研究的要求与我们上面提到的几个部门对研究的要求基本相同。
en: The research requirements of tourism bodies are not dissimilar to those of the sectors noted above.

zh: 表4-2列出了研究者对社会所承担的伦理责任。
en: Table 4.2 provides a checklist of the researcher's ethical responsibilities to Society.

zh: 在使用这个表格的时候，如果回答与提示不同的话，就表明研究设计需要重新考虑伦理的问题。
en: When using the checklist, if any responses differ from those indicated, then the research design needs to be reconsidered with respect to its ethical framework.

zh: 在有的情况下，特别是对于那些贯穿（尽管并不绝对）批评理论范式或女性主义范式的研究更是如此。
en: In some cases, there may be political ramifications, and this may be especially true of research informed by either (though not exclusively) a critical theory or feminist paradigm.

zh: 如果研究涉及不同的政治流派，那么就有必要讨论研究的社会“利益”。
en: If there are political ramifications, then there also needs to be some discussion regarding the social 'good' of the research.

zh: 以《纽伦堡法典》、《人权宣言》和《赫尔辛基宣言》为基础，人们又制定了很多的伦理准则。
en: Many codes of ethics are founded on the Nuremberg Code, the Universal Declaration of  Human Rights and the Declaration of Helsinki.

zh: 保护个体的权利是道德和社会的责任，已经被西方世界公认，并且受国际准则和宣言的约束。
en: The protection of individual rights is a moral and social responsibility that is internationally recognised in the Western world, and is guided by these international code and declarations.

zh: 因此，研究者有责任确保他能保护作为被研究者的人类和非人类参与者的权利。
en: Therefore, it is expected that every researcher has a responsibility to ensure that they protect the rights of individuals (and non-human subjects) participating in their research.

zh: 数据的整理包括两种方式：可能编码式整理和逻辑整理(Babbie 1995)。
en: Data cleaning involves two types of cleaning — possible-code cleaning and contingency cleaning (Babbie 1995).

zh: 数据的整理是很有必要的，因为数据输入包含人员介入，不管人们在输入资料时如何地小心翼翼,但错误依然难以避免。
en: Cleaning data is necessary because of the fact that data entry involves humans and humans are prone to make errors despite their best intentions not to do so.

zh: 数据输入中的错误一般是指编码员编排了错误的编码或调査对象犯了错误，如写了两个答案的编码而不是一个。
en: Errors in data entry are associated with coders assigning the wrong codes and respondents making mistakes such as coding two responses instead of only one.

zh: 这种“马赛克”世界观在哈特向所处的时代就已经过时但依然存在。

en: This ‘mosaic view’ of the world was already outliving its usefulness in Hartshorne’s time.

zh: 到1940年代末，地方不再是孤立的这种情况逐渐变得清楚了，这就是向哈特向的“区域分异”观点提出挑战的事实。
en: By the 1940s it was becoming clear that places were no longer isolated, a fact that posed a challenge to Hartshorne’s idea of ‘areal differentiation’.

zh: 60年后，如卡斯特尔斯所认为的那样，在世界范围内地方之间的相互联系比以前任何时候都更紧密了。
en: Over 60 years later, places worldwide are, as Castells argues, more intimately interlinked than ever before.

zh: 他们的一般性理论作为环境变化后弹性与适应性循环的模式而出现。
en: Their general theory emerges as a model of the cycle of resilience and adaptation following change.

zh: 这可以想象为麦比乌斯带(Mobius strip)随时间变化的轨迹，如图7.4所示。
en: This is envisaged as a Mobius strip trajectory through time, as shown in Figure 7.

zh: 如果我们从条带左下方一次扰动(比如打击)开始，新情况的特征是有机体的重组和短期的外貌或向外扩展——先锋期(或生态学上的r相)。
en: 4. If we start following a major perturbation (say a shock) at the bottom left of the strip, the new situation is characterized by reorganization and the transient appearance or expansion of organisms – the pioneer stage (or r-phase in ecology).

zh: 这就意味着要研究发展理论，你必须有勇气犯错误，为了得出令人信服的非凡见解，写模型时必须不拘小节。
en: This means that to do development theory, one must have the courage to be silly, writing down models that are implausible in the details in order to arrive at convincing higher-level insights.

zh: 这不是什么新教训。
en: This is not a new lesson.

zh: 大约十几年前贸易理论家们就碰到了这个问题，他们发现为了重建贸易理论，要考虑报酬递增，必须不能受所谓普遍性的约束；几年后增长理论家们得到了同样的教训。
en: Trade theorists learned it more than a dozen years ago, when they realized that a reconstruction of trade theory to take account of increasing returns would necessarily involve abandoning all pretense of generality; growth theorists learned the same lesson a few years later.

zh: 描述性统计能够使调查人员以数字术语来描述收集的原始数据（Neuman 2000，p.317)。
en: Descriptive statistics enable researchers to describe the aggregation of raw data in numerical terms (Neuman 2000, p. 317).

zh: 描述性统计包括使用单变量分析、双变量分析及多变量分析。
en: Descriptive statistics involve the use of univariate, bivariate and multivariate analysis.

zh: 这些分析方法包括使用频数分布、百分比表格以及集中趋势量数。
en: These methods of analysis incorporate the use of frequency distributions, percentage tables and measures of central tendency.

zh: 第一张是乔治•埃尔加•希克斯（George Elgar Hicks）绘制的一幅图画，题为“古老英格兰的原动力”(图4.1)。该画表现一家人，站在家庭与外部世界之间的门槛上。
en: The first is a painting called ‘The sinews of old England’ by George Elgar Hicks (Figure 4.1).It shows a family positioned on the threshold between home and world.

zh: 这幅画及其题目以明晰的形象化语言表现出英国的民族特性，即力量与工作的中心是男人。
en: The title and the painting represent English national identity in clearly embodied terms that centre on the strength and work of the man.

zh: 术语“在位”和“出位”源自人类学学科领域，尤其是与民族志的定性方法的研究工具相关。
en: The terms 'emic' and 'etic' are founded in the discipline of anthropology and are especially associated with the qualitative methodological tool of ethnography.

zh: 民族志是“描述某一群体或者某一文化的艺术和科学”（Fetterman 1989, p. 11)。
en: Ethnography is 'the art and science of describing a group or culture' (Fetterman 1989, p. 11).

zh: 派克（Pike）（1954）最早创造了在位和出位这两个术语（Pelto & Pelto 1978, p. 54）。
en: Pike (1954) is credited with coining the terms emic and etic (Pelto & Pelto 1978, p. 54).

zh: 民族志报告的显著特点是运用了大量描述（Geertz 1973)和逐字引述 (Fetterman 1989)。
en: The distinguishing features of ethnographic reports are the use of thickdescriptions (Geertz 1973) and verbatim quotations (Fetterman 1989).

zh: 报告还采用“民族志的现在”（the ethnographic present)及研究者的角色或研究者的“社会立场”（social situatedness) (Fetterman 1989)等方法。
en: Ethnographic reports also use 'the ethnographic present' and the role of the researcher or the researcher's 'social situatedness' is also presented (Fetterman 1989).

zh: 大量的描述使民族志学者为读者清晰地再现了所研究的现象，这些描述都来自于野外记录和转录。
en: Thick descriptions enable the ethnographer to recreate the phenomenon being studied with clarity for the reader.Thick descriptions are developed from field notes and transcriptions.

zh: “明智利用”运动事实上利用了环境激进主义的长期传统—虽然正如我们将要看到的那样，它利用的是一种非常特殊的传统。
en: The "wise use" movement draws in fact on a long tradition of environmental activism – though, as we shall see, of a very special sort.

zh: “明智利用”这个术语的运用并非机会主义反对政府干预或调控的修辞手法。
en: The appropriation of the term "wise use" is not merely an opportunistic rhetorical device with which to counter any form of governmental intervention or regulation.

zh: 这个传统来源于古典自由主义理论，特别是那些通常归之于洛克的理论，以及它们向政治—经济实践的转化，特别是在具有杰斐逊式民主传统的美国。
en: The tradition has its origins in classical liberal theories, particularly those generally attributed to Locke, and their translation into political–economic practices most particularly in the United States with its tradition of Jeffersonian democracy.

zh: 经济地理学——活动在空间的区位——显然是一门具有重要实际意义的学科，学术界应该会对它很有兴趣。
en: Economic geography---the location of activity in space---is a subject of obvious practical importance and presumably of considerable intellectual interest.

zh: 但在整个标准的经济学理论中儿乎完全看不到它的身影。
en: Yet it is almost completely absent from the standard corpus of economic theory.

zh: 在过去的几年中，我的主要目标就是用我所知道的惟一的方式来补救这种遗漏，也就是构建巧妙且有说服力的模型，以吸引更多的学生和同仁来研究经济地理学。
en: My main objective over the past few years has been to remedy that omission the only way I know how: by producing clever, persuasive models that in turn help inspire students and colleagues to work on the subject.

zh: 这个任务完全不同于小城镇或郊区的街道和人行道应有的用途。
en: This task is totally unlike any service that sidewalks and streets in little towns or true suburbs are called upon to do.

zh: 大城市不是小城镇，区别不仅仅在于比其更大，也不是郊区，区别不在于比其更稠密。
en: Great cities are not like towns, only larger.They are not like suburbs, only denser.

zh: 它们有着一些基本的不同，其中之一是城市顾其思义有着许许多多的陌生人。
en: They differ from towns and suburbs in basic ways, andone of these is that cities are by definition full of strangers.

zh: 对任何一个人而言，在大城市中碰到的陌生人比他认识的人要多得多，不仅在公共场所如此，更为常见的是在家门口。
en: To any one person, strangers are far more commmon in big cities than acquintances.More common not just in places of public assembly, but more common at a man's own doorstep.

zh: 原始资料最重要的优点是该资料是为了研究者当前项目的特定目的而收集的。
en: The key advantage of primary data is that the data have been collected for the specific purposes of the researcher's current project.

zh: 所以，如果信息收集过程严格遵循相关的科学规则和程序的话，该信息就将具有一定的相关性和及时性。
en: Subsequently, if the relevant scientific guidelines and protocols have been followed correctly, the data will have relevance and recency.

zh: 原始资料收集也使研究者直接面向研究所需要的具体的目标群体（或研究单元)，而不像在使用二手信息时可能通过扩大、缩减或调整目标群体(或研究单元）而做出妥协。
en: Primary data collection also enables the researcher to target the specific population (study units) desired for the study rather than making compromises by widening, narrowing or adjusting the target population or study units as sometimes occurs when using secondary data sources.

zh: 纯理论或基础性的研究增进了我们对世界的了解。
en: Pure or basic research advances our knowledge of the world.

zh: 在旅游学领域里，这类理论或理论框架包括：目的地生命周期理论（Butler 1980)、德克西（Doxey)的恼怒指数（irridex)模型（1975)、克劳森（Clawson)的休闲体验理论（1963)(后来被奇利安（1992)修正用以说明旅行体验），以及推—拉动机模式等准理论，例如我们所看到的戴恩(Darm, 1977)和格雷（Gray, 1970)的追求漫游（wanderlust)与追求阳光（sunlust)的分类方法。
en: In the field of tourism, examples of theories or theoretical constructs include the destination life cycle (Butler 1980), Doxey's irridex (1975), Clawson's recreation experience (1963), which was later modified by Killion (1992) to demonstrate the travel experience, and the quasi-theoretical push-pull motivation models (see, for example, Dann (1977) or Gray's (1970) wanderlust and sunlust classification).

zh: 纯理论研究耗费时间并提出比较宽泛的结论，而这些结论很可能并不直接应用于旅游业。
en: Pure research takes time and addresses broad issues that may have no immediate application by the tourism industry.

zh: 目录页需列出以下几项：报告摘要（executive summary)、序言/前言、致谢、表格和图表目录、章节标题、参考文献和附录。
en: The contents page lists the following items: executive summary, preface/foreword, acknowledgments, list of tables and list of figures, chapters, subsections, references and appendices.

zh: 从报告摘要到致谢部分需要使用罗马数字标注页码。
en: Roman numerals are used for pages from the executive summary through to the acknowledgments section.

zh: 目录页不必列在其中，但各章要分成多个小节(参见图10-6)。
en: The contents page itself is not listed on the contents page, and chapters are organised into subsections (see figure 10.6).

zh: 对于住宅市场而言，住宅的耐久性具有三重含义。
en: The durability of housing has three implications for the housing market.

zh: 首先，业主通过花钱维修或维护，可以降低住宅物理性折旧的速度。
en: First, the landlord can control the rate of physical deterioration by spending money on repair and maintenance.

zh: 其次，每年市场上都有大量的二手住宅出售。
en: Second, there is a large supply of used housing on the market every year.

zh: 社会学家倾向于使用“内容分析”这一术语，历史学家则使用“档案研究”，哲学家和文学专业的学生使用“文本分析”或“文学批评”。
en: Sociologists tend to use the term 'content analysis', historians the term 'archival research', and philosophers and students of literature the term 'textual analysis' or 'literary criticism'.

zh: 不同学科也将不同的解释框架应用到文化作品分析当中来。
en: Different disciplines also apply different interpretive frameworks to the analysis of cultural artefacts.

zh: 话语分析、修辞分析和解构是考察文本时也会提到的术语（Reinharz 1992, p. 148)。
en: Discourse analysis, rhetoric analysis, and deconstruction are additional terms that refer to the examination of texts (Reinharz 1992, p. 148).

zh: 对地理学家来说,这一框架中最广为人知的是关于日常生活的时间地理学，它由特斯腾•哈格斯特朗提出并给予了详细说明。
en: The best-known element of this framework to geographers is the time–geography of daily life that has been elaborated by Torsten Hägerstrand.

zh: 他的基本模型描述了日常个人活动的空间制约和时间制约，说明了人们为了达到特定目的（或“计划”）而从一个地方 (或“停留点”）向另一个地方移动而产生时空间“路径”的方式。
en: His basic model captures the constraints of space and time on daily, individual spatial practices.It illustrates the way that people trace out ‘paths’ in time and space, moving from one place (or‘station’) to another in order to fulfil particular purposes (or ‘projects’).

zh: 通过三种制约的界定而将这种移动概念化：（1)能力制约（capability constrains)——主要的制约，受可用移动时间以及可用交通方式速度的限制；（2)权威制约（authority constrains) 制度和习俗对移动和可达性的影响；（3)组合制约（coupling constrains) 限定时段内必须完成某特定计划而产生的制约。
en: This movement is conceptualized as being circumscribed by three kinds of constraint: (1) capability constraints – principally, the time available for travelling and the speed of the available mode of transportation, (2) authority constraints --- laws andcustoms affecting travel and accessibility, and (3) coupling constraints --- resulting from the limited periods during which specific projects are available for access.

zh: 与城市社会地理相关的一个主要现象是在欧洲和北美工业化核心地带的许多城市和城市地区出现了逆工业化（deindustrializatimi)。
en: One of the major outcomes in relation to urban social geography has been the deindustrialization of many of the cities and urban regions of the industrial heartlands in Europe and North America.

zh: 另一个现象是大都市地区中制造业和服务业就业岗位的加速分散化（decentralization)。
en: Another has been the accelerated decentralization of both manufacturing and service employment within metropolitan regions.

zh: 第三个现象是一小部分特大城市变成了“世界城市”(也称作全球城市），它们在专业化信息和知识的生产、处理与贸易中日益专业化（见第二章）。
en: A third has been the transformation of a few of the largest cities into world cities (also termed global cities) specializing in the production, processing and trading of specialized information and intelligence (see Chapter 2).

zh: 第四个现象是髙等级的生产者服务业就业岗位的再集中化（recentralization)。
en: And a fourth has been the recentralization of high-order producer-service employment.

zh: 我们现在需要谈论的是这种方法中一些具有普遍意义的因素。
en: All that we need to talk about now are a few general aspects of the approach.

zh: 我想像一个由几个分离的区位构成的经济。
en: I imagine an economy with a number of separate locations.

zh: （地区连续分布的情况也可以处理；事实上，讨论在一个连续的空间经济中的聚集现象有一些非常有趣的方法，不过此处我略过不谈。
en: (It is possible to deal with a continuum of locations as well; indeed, there are some very interesting ways of looking at agglomeration in a continuous spatial economy, but I won't go into them here.)

zh: ）有两个部门：农业，它的地理位置固定不变，和制造业，它的地理位置随时间推移而变化。
en: There are two sectors: agriculture, which is geographically immobile, and manufacturing, which is mobile over time.

zh: 52个地理学专业组织中，其中有些受到新方法的影响很大，有些受到的影响则较小。
en: Some of the 52 geographies have been much affected by the new methods, while others have been little affected.

zh: 后者中较典型的是新形成的女权主义地理学和地理学思想史的研究。
en: The latter were typified by the newly wrought genre of feminist geography and studies in the history of geographical thought.

zh: 这些后面还要作简要的介绍。
en: These are briefly introduced below.

zh: 在植物群落和动物群落数据中进行格局研究，通常包括多元分析法的应用（Kent and Coker, 1992; Waite, 2000）。
en: The search for pattern in plant and animal community data routinely involves the application of multivariate analysis (Kent and Coker, 1992; Waite, 2000).

zh: 正如盖特里尔（Gatrell, 1983）所指出的，生物学家业已设计出无数(不)相似系数，用以评估群落组成样本之间匹配的程度（degree of matching）。
en: As Gatrell (1983) points out, numerous (dis)similarity coefficients have been devised by ecologists to assess the degree of matching between samples of community composition, often described as ‘ecological distance’.

zh: 其中许多具有“公制”的性质（即基于欧几里得空间概念）——丝毫不是欧氏距离系数本身（Kent and Coker, 1992; Waite, 2000）。
en: Many of these are described as having ‘metric’ properties (i.e.they are based on concepts of Euclidean space) – not least the coefficient of Euclidean distance itself (Kent and Coker, 1992; Waite, 2000).

zh: 但是，没有什么证据能够表明通过INBio挣来的300万美元中有任何一点用在了哥斯达黎加的土著人保留地上。
en: However, there’s little evidence that any of the $5 million earned through INBio has made its way into Costa Rica’s native reserves.

zh: 这个国家的土著人被禁锢在一种没有给他们多少权力或机会的政治组织中，他们被排除在INBio的活动之外就能说明问题。
en: The country’s indigenous peoples are locked in a political structure that offers them little power or opportunity, and their exclusion from INBio’s operation illustrates this graphically.

zh: 另外，他们所居住的位置从地方来看远离哥斯达黎加的政治权力中心，即首都，这就使他们的声音更难以被听到。
en: On top of this, their physical location in places distant from the capital city, the centre of political authority in Costa Rica, makes it doubly difficult to be heard.

zh: 批评理论范式植根于卡尔•马克思（Karl Marx)的著作。这种理论认为，从事科学研究的必要性在于将受压迫群体从压迫下解放出来，并因而改变其社会环境。
en: The critical theory paradigm is grounded in the work of Karl Marx and the need to conduct research that will free oppressed groups from oppression and thereby change their social circumstances.

zh: 批评理论与解释社会学范式有某种共同之处,但却与实证主义不同。
en: Critical theory has synergies with the interpretive social sciences paradigm but not with positivism.

zh: 直方图是由彼此挨着的垂直长方条构成的。
en: Histograms are graphs with vertical bars adjoining each other.

zh: 连接这些长方条的中点，就能够制成频数的折线图。
en: These can be made into a frequency polygon by joining the midpoints of the bars.

zh: 地图绘制法在地图上描述频数，形象地确定了所描述变量的位置和重要性（Sanmtakos 1998）。
en: Cartographs demonstrate frequencies on a map to visually identify the location and magnitude of the variable being represented (Sarantakos 1998).

zh: 单变量分析是一次只对一个变量进行的分析。
en: Univariate analysis involves the analysis of one variable at one time.

zh: 单变量分析很容易通过描述与变量相关的频数分布来实现。
en: This is easily achieved by representing the frequency distribution associated with a variable.

zh: 频数分布可以使用本章以前所讨论的数据输入及编码的任一方法来实现。
en: Frequency distributions can be developed using any of the methods of data entry and coding discussed previously in this chapter.

zh: 从本质上讲，频数分布描述了答案选项中与每个种类相关的答案的数量。
en: Essentially, the frequency distribution portrays the number of responses associated with each of the categories in a response set.

zh: 频数分布能够用于定类、定序及定距测量层次的变量。
en: Frequency distributions can be used with variables measured at the nominal, ordinal and interval level.

zh: 评价性研究主要是应用研究而非构建理论的研究，因为研究者的兴趣在于确定策略、实践活动、计划和法律机制改进的效果。
en: Evaluative research is primarily applied research rather than theory-building research, as the researcher is interested in determining the outcomes of changes in strategies, practices and planning, and legislative mechanisms.

zh: 评价性研究可能是以总结性或过程性的评价(summative evaluation & formative evaluation)为基础。
en: Evaluative research may be based on either summative or formative evaluation strategies.

zh: 过程性评价通常是在一项活动的进行当中实施的，而总结性评价主要是在这项活动的尾声进行， 它的目的是为了确定某策略的成败，或者意在引入一项变革机制或行动。
en: Formative evaluation is undertaken as an ongoing activity, whereas summative evaluation is primarily undertaken at the end of the process to determine the success or otherwise of a strategy or the introduction of a change mechanism or activity.

zh: 评价性研究依赖于定量、定性或混合的研究方法。
en: Evaluative research draws on quantitative, qualitative or mixed method methodologies.

zh: R. J. 乔利（1962）是第一位在地理学研究团体中引入系统理论，即“地貌学”和普遍系统论”的学者。
en: R. J. Chorley (1962) was first to bring systems theory before the geographical community with “Geomorphology and General Systems Theory.”

zh: 在美国，爱德华A.阿克曼被认为是第二次世界大战之后第一位指出系统研究正在整个科学界兴起的学者。
en: In America Edward A. Ackerman was arguably the first geographer to point to the rise of systems research throughout the scientific world after World War II.

zh: 阿克曼认为，所有的科学都关注着四个“压倒一切”的问题。
en: All science, said Ackerman, is concerned with four “overriding” problems.

zh: 在思考与澳大利亚有关的主要二手资料信息来源之前，我们应该先讨论一下统计资料的运用尤其是人口普查资料运用的缺点。
en: Before moving on to consider key sources of secondary data relevant to the Australian setting, some additional disadvantages of working with statistical data, especially census data, should be discussed.

zh: 读者可能想知道哪些人口普査资料与旅游研究有关。
en: You may be wondering what census data have to do with tourism research.

zh: 人口普查资料是全国性的资料库，它可以为研究者提供全国性的人口统计信息。
en: Census data are national data sets that provide researchers with information about the national population.

zh: 所收集资料的范围有很多项目，包括性别、年龄、宗教信仰、婚姻状况、国籍、出生地、目前居住地、教育背景和资质、雇用情况、居住细节、收人和车辆拥有状况等。
en: The data collected span many criteria, including gender, age, religious affiliation, marital status, nationality, birthplace, current place of residence, educational background and qualifications, employment details, dwelling details, income and vehicle ownership.

zh: 当目标读者为普通公众时，报告就应尽量使用简单易懂的语言，避免出现晦涩的术语和冗长的叙述。
en: For the general public, the language used needs to be easily understood, soyour text should be free from jargon and wordy statements.

zh: 第八章关于问题设计的相关要求也可应用于此：尽量使用简单精练的语言，避免使用技术性或模棱两可的术语。
en: The directionsnoted in chapter 8 for question design also apply here: use simple and succinct language and avoid technical or ambiguous terms.

zh: 在为普通公众编写报告时，语言水平应与普通报纸所使用的语言水平大致相当。
en: In preparingreports for the general public, the level of the language should be equivalent to the language level in most tabloid newspapers.

zh: 而拥有技术知识的特殊利益集团可能要求更具技术性、内容更为翔实的论文。
en: Special interest groups with technical knowledge may require more technical and detailed texts.

zh: 但这绝不是指普通公众缺乏语言技能。
en: This is not to suggest that the general public have poor language skills.

zh: 当然，提供这些指导是为了通过适当阅读水平和清晰明确的语言风格帮助作者获得报告的最大覆盖面。
en: Rather, these guidelines are offered to help you gain the maximum coverage for your report by ensuring that the reading level is appropriate and that the language is clear and unambiguous.

zh: 要理解这种“反常的”行为，我们或许可以做这样一种分析，即，把城市的用地分成两种形式。第一种形式可以称为是普通用地(general land )，主要是为步行的普通大众的人群的流动之用。
en: It helps to understand this "perverse" behavior if, in our minds, we divide all of the land of a city into two types.The first type, which can be called general land, is used for general public circulation by people on foot.

zh: 在这些用地上，人们可以自由行走，自己选择，想到哪儿就到哪儿。
en: It is land over which people move freely, and by choice, on their way from here to yonder,and from yonder back again.

zh: 这包括街道、一些小的公园，有时候也包括一些建筑的走廊区，这些地方可以用做街道，供人们自由行走。
en: It includes the streets,many of thesmaller parks, and sometimes it includes the lobbies of buildings when they are used freely as streets.

zh: 知情同意要求正在进行研究的参与者们完全知晓此研究的性质。
en: Informed consent requires that research participants are fully apprised ofthe nature of the research in which they are participating.

zh: 当参与者被研究活动的某些方面所蒙蔽时，就等于出现欺骗。
en: Deception occurs when participants are deceived about some aspect of the research.

zh: 举个例子来说，发起人的真实身份被伪装，或者用一些含糊的术语来表述整个研究的目的，或故意扭曲研究目的。
en: For example, the true identity of the sponsor may be masked or the overall research purpose may be couched in ambiguous terms or purposefully misrepresented.

zh: 发生此种欺骗行为的原因，通常前提是研究参与者们已熟悉发起人的真实身份或研究的真正意图，继而他们的反应就会受到这种认识的影响。
en: The reason for such deception is usually based on the premise that had the participants been made aware of the real identity of sponsor or the purpose of the research, then their responses would have been influenced by that knowledge.

zh: 这种欺骗行为，一定要经研究同行、科学研究团体和道德评价团体认可。
en: Deception of this nature must be approved by research peers, the scientific community and/or ethics review panels.

zh: 道德评价团体负责审核从事研究的道德许可申请。
en: Ethics review panels are involved in reviewing applications for ethical clearance for the undertaking of research.

zh: “启发式询问的独特之处在于它特别注重研究者个人的经验、感受以及洞察力”（Patton 1990，P.72）。
en: The uniqueness of heuristic inquiry is the extent to which it legitimizes and places at the fore [the] personal experiences, reflections, and insights of the researcher' (Patton 1990, p. 72).

zh: 启发式研究的过程包括6个阶段：事先约定、逐步进入、深思熟虑、阐述、详细解释以及创造性地综合（Moustakas 1990）。
en: The process of heuristic research involves six phases: initial engagement, immersion, incubation, illumination, explication and creative synthesis (Moustakas 1990).

zh: 启发式研究所用的方法包括口头访谈、半结构化访谈、标准化的开放式访谈（Moustakas 1990, P. 47）。
en: Methods used in heuristic research include conversational interviews, semi-structured interviews and standardised open-ended interviews (Moustakas 1990, p. 47).

zh: 访谈法也需要个人资料作为补充，比如期刊报道或个人的日记（Moustakas 1990,p.49）。
en: Interviews are also supplemented with the use of personal documents such as journals and diaries (Moustakas 1990, p. 49).

zh: 空间为全部有关社会过程的元理论规定了不可驯服的残余。
en: Space defines the untamable residual to all metatheories of the social process.

zh: 这些非常强烈的主张值得我们批判性详察。
en: These are very strong claims that deserve critical scrutiny.

zh: 它们预示了这个问题，如何理解有关行动和社会决定问题的差异地理学和理论化的空间性。
en: They presage the question of how to understand the geography of difference, the spatiality of theorizations, in relation to the issues of agency and social determination.

zh: 例如，诺尔-塞替(1994)指出，社会学中的某种运动““暗示着同启蒙运动思想的决裂”，“否定了许多同现代联系在一起的既定特点” 。
en: Here, for example, is Knorr-Cetina's (1994) description of those movements within sociology that "imply a rupture with Enlightenment thinking" and "a negation of many of the definitive features that have been associated with the modern."

zh: 对环境的动态部分历来存在争议，表示气候学的空间单位是气团及其数不清的各种性质以及表征气团间边界特征的锋。
en: As arguably dealing with the most dynamic part of the environment, the spatial units of climatology are represented by air masses and their numerous different characteristics and the fronts that characterize the boundaries between them.

zh: 气团和锋二者在空间和时间上均处于永恒变化之中。
en: Both air masses and fronts are constantly changing in space and time.

zh: 不过，地球上主要气团和锋带业已得到充分认识(Briggs et al., 1997; Barry and Choley, 1998; Goudie, 2001)。
en: Nevertheless, the major air mass and frontal zones of the planet are widely recognized (Briggs et al., 1997; Goudie, 2001; Smithson et al., 2002; Barry, 2003).

zh: 下面是来自气象学的另一个例子。
en: Here's another story from meteorology.

zh: 民间传说认为你可以根据天空的状况预测未来的天气，而且声称某种云朵预示着风暴即将到来。
en: Folk wisdom has always said that you can predict future weather from the aspect of the sky, and had claimed that certain kinds of clouds presaged storms.

zh: 然而，随着19世纪和20世纪早期气象学的发展，即随着一些重大的发现，如在一次风暴中，风沿环形的路径吹等——民间传说完全不了解这些知识——人们基本上不再注意天空的状况。
en: As meteorology developed in the nineteenth and early twentieth centuries, however, as it made such fundamental discoveries, completely unknown to folk wisdom, as the fact that the winds in a storm blow in a circular path, it basically stopped paying attention to how the sky looked.

zh: 关于增加公路容量既不能减少交通拥挤，也不能提高高峰期行车速度的说法有很多种。
en: There are many anecdotes about increases in highway capacity that did not result in less congestion and faster travel during the rush hour.

zh: 原因在于高峰期行车的需求是高弹性的，最初很多通勤者因交通拥挤公路的速度慢而放弃。
en: The reason is that the demand for rush-hour travel is highly elastic, with many commuters initially deterred from using the congested highway because of slow travel speeds.

zh: 这就是“潜在需求”现象。
en: This is the phenomenon of "latent demand."

zh: (1)建构任何种类的知识，“绘制空间”的话语行为都是先决条件。
en: 1. The discursive activity of "mapping space" is a fundamental prerequisite to the structuring of any kind of knowledge.

zh: 离开对情境、区位和位置在其中发生的空间的绘制，任何有关“情境性”、“区位”和“位置性”的谈论都是无意义的。
en: All talk about "situatedness," "location and positionality" is meaningless without a mapping of the space in which those situations, locations, and positions occur.

zh: 而且，不管空间绘制是比喻的还是真实的，这都同样正确。
en: And this is equally true no matter whether the space being mapped is metaphorical or real.

zh: 首先考虑我的模型中经济在某一时刻的情况，也就是说给定制造业在空间上的分布时的情况。
en: Consider first a snapshot of my model economy at a point in time, which is to say with some given distribution of manufacturing across space.

zh: 当然，我们会发现制造业选择其中一些区位比另一些区位更有利。
en: We will, of course, find that some locations are more desirable for manufacturing than others.

zh: 而且，不难发现可以用一个地点的市场潜力指数来衡量该地点是否理想，这个指数虽然比社会物理学家用的指数复杂得多，但仍能看得出来它们是有关系的。
en: And we will not be surprised to find that the desirability of sites can be measured by a market potential index that is rather more complicated than the ones used by the social physicists but still recognizably related.

zh: “动态平衡”包括因不断侵蚀而导致的渐进性地形发育。
en: A ‘dynamic equilibrium’ involves progressive evolution of landform as a response to ongoing erosion.

zh: 很多能够影响区域尺度地貌的重大气候变化也是在这种时间尺度上进行的——例如，整个大陆冰盖的进退。
en: This is also the timescale at which major changes in climate can affect landforms at the regional scale – for example, advances and retreats of  ice sheets over entire continents.

zh: 乔利等(Chorley et al.，1984)深入讨论了地貌中的尺度问题，而索恩斯(Thornes)则详细探讨了时间问题。
en: Chorley et al. (1984) provide further discussion of the scale issue in geomorphology, while time is discussed in more detail by Thornes.

zh: 学界并没有一部统一的“地理学”史，只有林林总总、令人眼花缭乱的不同版本,彼此差异很大，而且往往是百家争鸣。
en: There is no single history of ‘geography’, only a bewildering variety of different, often competing versions of the past.

zh: 因为地理学本身就处在不断变化之中：从现代早期（early-modern)的航海，到18世纪启蒙运动的地理探险，再到19世纪晚期的“新”地理学，直至两次世界大战之间的区域地理学。
en: One such interpretation charts the transition from early-modern navigation to Enlightenment exploration to the ‘new’ geography of the late nineteenth century and the regional geography of the interwar period.

zh: 本文所述的种种——就像所有其他地理学史一样——只不过反映了作者的偏好。
en: This contextualist account – like all other histories of geography – reflects the partialities of its author.

zh: 在第一次世界大战的几年中，1914年以前出现的“新”地理学已经发展为一门复杂而通俗的学科，在各级教育系统中都很突出。
en: By the interwar years, the ‘new’ geography that had arisen before 1914 had evolved into a sophisticated and popular discipline, prominent at all levels in the educational system.

zh: 大学里产生了众多的二级学科，其中许多延续至今，唯二次大战之间有两种倾向值得一提。
en: In the universities, a host of new subdisciplines arose, most of which continue to the present, but two wider interwar trends are worthy of special mention.

zh: 其一是坚信地理学应该是一门综合性的区域科学。
en: The first was the conviction that geography should be an integrative, regional science.

zh: 在时间序列分析中，用技术去除小尺度的噪声（系统输出中的快速波动），借以强调像周期性循环和趋势这样的大尺度格局，以及像重大干扰或阈值改变这样的事件。
en: In time-series analysis, techniques are applied to remove small-scale noise (rapid fluctuations in system output) in order to emphasize larger-scale patterns such as periodic cycles, trends, major perturbations and threshold changes.

zh: 趋势面分析也被应用到空间研究中，用点状尺度的数据来归纳区域格局。
en: Trend-surface analysis has been applied in spatial studies too, generalizing regional patterns from point-scale data.

zh: 这两种情况下滤波器都要留下某种频率的成分而排除其他频率。
en: In both cases, the filter passes components of certain frequencies while excluding others.

zh: 由于以上这五种原因，如果认为全球化就等于同一化和均质化就是一种误解。
en: For the five reasons mentioned above, it is simply misconceived to think that globalization equals sameness and homogeneity.

zh: 相反，人文地理学家已经证明地方之间的联系越多，地方之间的差异就越多，并会被改造。
en: On the contrary, human geographers have shown that the more linked places become, the more place differences endure and are remade.

zh: 在斯温盖道（Swyngedouw, 1989）新创造的词汇中，我们需要少谈论一些全球化，多谈论一些不平衡的“全球本土化”进程 。
en: In Swyngedouw’s (1989) apt neologism, we need to talk less about globalization and more about an uneven process of ‘glocalization’.

zh: 需要研究的第二个问题是将一个尺度的分析结果应用到不同尺度上去。
en: The second question relates to the need to apply the results of one scale of analysis at different scales.

zh: 这涉及把结果从小尺度到大尺度的尺度放大——例如把小流域的研究结果推广到大河流域。
en: This may involve upscaling of results from smaller to larger areas – for example, extending results from small catchment studies to large river basins.

zh: 也可能在有些情况下是尺度缩小——例如，将通用循环模型（全球尺度）的结果应用到某个区域。
en: It may also in some circumstances involve downscaling – for example, applying the results of general circulation models (global scale) to particular regions.

zh: 这些东西的出现绝非一日之功，而是渐进的标准化与协同研究的对象，历经几个世纪才得以投入使用。
en: They didn’t suddenly come into existence over night but were the subject of progressive standardizations and co-ordinations that have taken centuries to put into place.

zh: 而且此类事物还需海量的投资。
en: And they required extraordinary investments too.

zh: 它们需要研制专门化设备，能够在相同地点测量相同的事物，今天基于卫星的全球定位系统（GPS）就是其最终产物。
en: They required the invention of specialized devices that could measure the same things at the same places, culminating in today’s satellite-based global positioning system (GPS).

zh: 话语表达人类思想、幻想和欲望。
en: Discourses express human thought, fantasy, and desire.

zh: 它们也在制度上依据于、在物质上受制于、在经验上植根于社会和权力关系的表现形式。
en: They are also institutionally based, materially constrained, experientially grounded manifestations of social and power relations.

zh: 因为同样的原因，话语的效果充满并浸透了社会过程中的所有其他环节(例如，影响信仰、实践，并被它们影响)。
en: By the same token, discursive effects suffuse and saturate all other moments within the social process (affecting, for example, beliefs and practices as well as being affected by them).

zh: 然而，《人口原理》第一版被先验普遍原则的演绎强有力地歪曲了。那个原则主张，食物对于人的生存是必要的，两性之间的激情是必需的和永恒的。
en: Yet the first edition of the Essay is strongly colored by deduction from a priori universal principles: namely that food is necessary to the existence of man and that the passion between the sexes is necessary and constant.

zh: 他把这两个基本原理置于资源有限性的世界语境中，并推论出著名的“自然法”:人口增长(几何序列)对生存手段(代数扩张)的压力不可避免地产生贫穷、疾病、饥荒、战争以及“人口过剩”的普遍趋势。
en: He places these two postulates in the context of a world of finite resources and deduces the famous "natural law" in which population growth (a geometric series) places pressure on the means of subsistence (an arithmetic expansion) inevitably producing poverty, disease, famine, war, and a general tendency towards "overpopulation."

zh: 人口普查资料是全国性的资料库，它可以为研究者提供全国性的人口统计信息。
en: Census data are national data sets that provide researchers with information about the national population.

zh: 所收集资料的范围有很多项目，包括性别、年龄、宗教信仰、婚姻状况、国籍、出生地、目前居住地、教育背景和资质、雇用情况、居住细节、收入和车辆拥有状况等。
en: The data collected span many criteria, including gender, age, religious affiliation, marital status, nationality, birthplace, current place of residence, educational background and qualifications, employment details, dwelling details, income and vehicle ownership.

zh: 这些信息可以帮助旅游研究者确定旅游目的地社区人口的社会经济特征，还有助于市场营销中的市场细分，特别是制订广告战略。
en: This information can assist tourism researchers in determining the sociodemographics of host communities at (potential) tourism destinations.It can provide information concerning population characteristics that can then be used in developing market segments to assist with marketing, particularly advertising strategies.

zh: 但是，可以从这样几个方面对这种方法提出批评，包括把几个不同方面的剥夺指标进行合并的必要性和在总体指数中给它们以同样权重的正确性（参看对生活质量指标的讨论）。
en: This kind of approach can be criticized on several grounds, however, including the desirability of aggregating indicators of several different aspects of deprivation and the validity of assigning them equal weight in the overall index (recall the discussion of quality-of-life indicators).

zh: 还需要注意预防人类生态学方法错误（ecological fallacy)的危险（即用以人的集合体为基础的数据对个人作出推断）。
en: It is also necessary to guard against the dangers of the ecological fallacy (i.e.making inferences about individuals with data based on aggregates of people).

zh: 因此并不是每个居住在贫困区的人都是受到剥夺的，也并不是每个处于“多重剥夺”地区的贫困人口都必然是受多重剥夺的。
en: Thus not everyone in a deprived area is necessarily deprived and not every deprived person in an area of ‘multiple deprivation’ is necessarily multiply deprived.

zh: 在20世纪，地理学在总体上，特别是人文地理学，已经与主要学术生活部门一起进入各大学之中。
en: Geography in general, and human geography in particular, has moved among the major divisions of academic life within universities over the last century.

zh: 1970年代以前，罕有人文地理学家认为自己的专业属于社会科学，20年以后，他们中大多数人改变了看法。
en: Before the 1970s, very few human geographers identified their discipline as a social science: two decades later, most did.

zh: 这种转变既不是“自然的”，也不一定是明显的，而是该学科的身份与“社会科学”想把地理学家纳入其轨道的意愿之间的矛盾造成的。
en: That shift was neither ‘natural’ nor necessarily obvious: it resulted from conflicts over the discipline’s identity and over the willingness of ‘the social sciences’ to accept geographers within their orbit.

zh: 人文地理学通常因其多样的热烈争论而引人瞩目。这些争论并非仅集中于人文地理学的主题上，而是更多地集中在人文地理学的哲学上，即其主题的倾向上，最近几十年来尤其如此。人文地理学者们由于涉足自然科学尤其是社会科学而正面临着哲学领域内的争辩。
en: Human geography is currently characterized by a great deal of lively debate which focuses not so much on its subject matter as on its philosophy: its orientation to its subject matter.Much more than was so in previous decades, human geographers are being exposed to debates within philosophy as they refer to the natural and, in particular, the social sciences.

zh: 在城市里，除了承载交通外，街道还有许多别的用途。城市中的人行道(sidewalks)——街道中行人走路的部分——除了承载行人走路外，也有其他很多用途。
en: Streets in cities serve many purposes besides carrying vehicles,and city sidewalks --- the pedestrian parts of the streets --- serve many purposes besides carrying pedestrians.

zh: 这些用途是与交通循环紧密相关的，但是并不能互相替代，就其本质来说，这些用途和交通循环系统一样，是城市正常运转机制的基本要素。
en: These uses are bound up with circulation but are not identical with it and in their own right they are at least as basic as circulation to the proper workings of cities.

zh: 意境地图结构的深层便是意象元素之间的认知距离（cognitive distance)，它是意境地图的又一个重要方面，引发了众多学者的研究兴趣，经过研究还发现了许多重要的规律。
en: Underlying the organization of people’s mental maps is the cognitive distance between image elements, and this is another aspect of imagery that has been shown to exhibit interesting and important regularities.

zh: 认知距离是贮存于环境认知表述中的空间信息的基础，产生于一系列机制，包括人脑对可视物之间距离的感知、可视环境的结构和使用方式以及地图或路标等环境的符号表示物的影响。
en: Cognitive distance is the basis for the spatial information stored in cognitive representations of the environment.It is generated from a variety of mechanisms that include the brain’s perception of the distance between visible objects, the use-patterns and structure of the visible environment, and the impact of symbolic representations of the environment such as maps and road signs.

zh: 对大多数人而言，城市内部的认知距离通常要大于其客观距离，并且这与城市规模及使用交通方式无关，虽然也有证据表明，随着物理距离的增加总体估计会有所下降。
en: For the majority of people, intra-urban cognitive distance is generally greater than objective distance, regardless of city size and their usual means of transport, although there is evidence to suggest that this overestimation declines with increasing physical distance.

zh: 描述性统计包括使用单变量分析、双变量分析及多变量分析。
en: Descriptiv e statistics involve the use of univariate, bivariate and multivariate analysis .

zh: 这些分析方法包括使用频数分布、百分比表格以及集中趋势量数。
en: These methods of analysis incorporate the use of frequency distributions, percentage tables and measures of central tendency.

zh: 同时也包括使用变异量数，例如：单变量分析中的极差、百分位点及标准差；双变量分析的交叉表、散点图以及相关性的测量，如卡方检验X2、系数9、Spearman等级相关系数及皮尔森积差(r)相关系数；多变量分析的X2、方差分析和多元回归分析。
en: They also incorporate the use of measures of variation, such as : ranges , percentiles and standard deviation for univariate analysis; cross-tabulation , scattergrams and measures of association suc has chi-square , the phi coefficient, Spearman' s rho and Pearson's r for bivariate analysis ; and chi-square , analysis of variance and multiple regression analysis for multivariate analysis .

zh: 扫描仪能够使调査者直接将参与者的答题纸扫描进入计算机系统进行随后的分析。
en: Scanners enable researchers to scan participants' response sheets directly into a computer system for subsequent analysis.

zh: 答题纸的设计得能够通过扫描，且通过适当软件程序能够直接编码以进行随后的分析。
en: The response sheet has to be designed so that scanning is possible and to enable direct coding and subsequent analysis by appropriate software programs.

zh: 扫描比编码员（人工编码员）的直接数据输入快得多。
en: Scanning is faster than direct data entry by coders (i.e.human coders).

zh: 又假设关于这个题目有一种思想，它看起来似乎言之成理，对实际工作也很有启发，但是我们现在不能很好地把它纳人完备的微观动机和宏观行为模型中去。
en: And suppose that there is a body of thinking about that subject that seems to make considerable sense, shed a fair amount of empirical light, but that doesn't seem to be something we are currently able to wrap up neatly into fully specified micromotives-and-macrobehavior models.

zh: 我们应该完全忽略那种思想吗？
en: Should we completely ignore that body of thinking?

zh: 我不这么认为，这样做对我们这个职业的很誉很不好，有人会说我们心胸狭隘。
en: I don’t think so, and it speaks badly of our profession that we are so narrow-minded.

zh: 我很想和经济学的另一个领域：商业周期的研究，做一个比较。
en: I can't resist a parallel with another area of economics, the study of business cycles.

zh: 这种循环模型直接暗含在现代性的作品之中(Taylor,1999)。
en: This cyclical model is directly implicated in the creation of modernities (Taylor, 1999).

zh: 如前所述,现代性状态经历着不断的转变和三个盟主——新商业主义、新产业主义、新消费主义——引起的经济剧变,加剧了社会转变的程度。
en: As previously noted, the condition of modernity is experienced as incessant change and the economic upheavals caused by the three hegemons – new mercantilism, new industrialism, new consumerism – intensified the degree of social change.

zh: 现代性造就了大量机会与风险,寻常百姓不得不对此作出反应。
在每个霸主国内转变的压力增加造成了叫做常规现代性的日常生活新方式(Taylor,1999)。
中途拦截式调査既可使用自填式问卷也可使用调査者完成问卷。
en: Intercept surveys use either interviewer-completed questionnaires or self-completion questionnaires.

zh: 上门调査发生在受访者的住所。
en: Household surveys occur at the residence of the respondent.

zh: 综合性调査通过上门调査的方式实施，既可使用电话方式也可使用面对面方式进行。
en: Omnibus surveys are conducted through household surveys either using face-to face surveys or telephone surveys.

zh: 持续时间更长的少数群体集群一般是由于外部歧视和内部凝聚力的相互作用而产生的。
en: Minority clusters that persist over the longer term are usually a product of the interaction between discrimination and internal cohesion.

zh: 当后者在动力作用中成为主导时，所产生的居住集群被称为少数群体飞地（enclaves)；而当外部因素成为主导作用时，所产生的居住集群一般被称为特殊人群聚居区。
en: Where the latter is the more dominant of the forces, the resultant residential clusters may be termed enclaves; and where external factors are more dominant, the residential clusters are generally referred to as ghettos.

zh: 当然，实际上要区分究竟到何种程度隔离才算自愿或者到何种程度为非自愿是很困难的，更为现实的做法是将其作为连续统一体而非两种类型来考虑。
en: In reality, of course, it is often difficult to ascertain the degree to which segregation is voluntary or involuntary, and it is more realistic to think in terms of a continuum rather than a twofold classification.

zh: 关于违法犯罪行为的空间变量的大量研究都支持拥挤理论、社会无序化、社会反常状态及设计决定论等理论。但还没有系统而有效的证据显示其中某个理论居于主导地位。
en: Empirical studies of spatial variations in crime and delinquency have lent support, variously, to theories of crowding, social disorganization, anomie, design determinism and deviant subcultures; but it is difficult to assemble evidence in support of any one theory in preference to the rest.

zh: 既然没有能兼容并包的理论选择，那么这种折中的多因素方法必然成为一种流行的理论框架。
en: In the absence of any alternative all-embracing theoretical perspective, an eclectic multifactor approach thus becomes an attractive framework of explanation.

zh: 例如，地理学家可能把“时间维”加到聚落模型中，以表明在某个时期内这些模型是如何发展的。
en: Thus a geographer might add a ‘time dimension’ to a model of, say, settlements to show how patterns have developed over a given period.

zh: 这样的模型称为“动态模型”(与之相对的是描述某一时间事物状态的静态模型），此类模型依靠时间序列数据与分析。
en: Such models are called dynamic models (in contrast to ‘static models’ that describe a situation at one point in time) and rely on timeseries data and analysis.

zh: 对时间的第二种看法是将之视为社会变化，其重点在于“时间的内容”。
en: The second view of time is as social change, where the emphasis is upon the ‘content of time’.

zh: 话语表达人类思想、幻想和欲望。
en: Discourses express human thought, fantasy, and desire.

zh: 它们也在制度上依据于、在物质上受制于、在经验上植根于社会和权力关系的表现形式。
en: They are also institutionally based, materially constrained, experientially grounded manifestations of social and power relations.

zh: 因为同样的原因，话语的效果充满并浸透了社会过程中的所有其他环节(例如，影响信仰、实践，并被它们影响)。
en: By the same token, discursive effects suffuse and saturate all other moments within the social process (affecting, for example, beliefs and practices as well as being affected by them).

zh: 计算机非常有助于定量数据分析。
en: Computers have assisted greatly in the analysis of quantitative data.

zh: 现今，大多数的定量数据都被转变成“机读”的形式，即可以被计算机或类似的机器读取和操作的形式（Babbie 1995, P. 363)。
en: Nowadays, most quantitative data are turned into 'machine-readable form — a form that can be read and manipulated by computers and similar machines' (Babbie 1995, p. 363).

zh: 可供研究者选用的定量数据分析软件包可供研究者选用有很多。例如Methodologist’s Toolchest 3.0 ，SphinxSurvey，SPSS(社会科学统计软件包) ，Minitab, SAS (统计分析系统）以及WinMAX。
en: There are a number of quantitative software packages available to assist researchers, such as the Methodologist's Toolchest Version 3.0, SphinxSurvey, SPSS (Statistical Package for the Social Sciences), Minitab, SAS (Statistical Analysis System), and winMAX.

zh: 其中有些软件包甚至能够辅助研究设计而不再只是局限于数据分析。
en: Several of these software packages are aids for research design rather than solely analytical packages.

zh: 下文对这些软件包进行了简要的描述，读者据此能够对使用的类型有一个全面了解，而不是仅对各个软件包的特点的概要性理解。
en: A brief description of these packages follows, so that you have an understanding of the diversity available to you, rather than a comprehensive summary of all the features of each package.

zh: 文学艺术以三种主要途径为地理学服务。
en: Literary art serves the geographer in three principal ways.

zh: 文学艺术就像对人类体验与关系实验的可能模式一样，它提供这样的线索：一个地理学家在进行研究时可能寻求什么（例如，社会空间）。
en: As though experiment on possible modes of human experience and relationship, it provides hints as to what a geographer might look for when he studies, for instance, social space.

zh: 文学艺术作为一种人工产物，它揭示了一种文化对环境的理解与价值……
en: As artifact it reveals the environmental perceptions and values of a culture.…

zh: 当文学理论向社会理论渗透的时候，一个剧烈冲突的舞台就形成了，一方面是广泛的实证主义、经验主义和历史唯物主义传统，另一方面是现象学、解释学和辩证法传统。
en: As literary theory permeates social theory, the stage is set for strong confrontations between broadly positivist, empiricist, and historical materialist traditions on the one hand and a vast array of phenomenological, hermeneutic, and dialectical traditions on the other.

zh: 因此，很可能对辩证地建构的论证进行非辩证的解读。尽管出发点是好的，但结果却是广泛的曲解。
en: It is then very likely that nondialectical readings, however well intentioned, of dialectically constructed arguments will generate widespread misinterpretations.

zh: 时间和空间构成宇宙的基本物理维度。
en: Time and space form the basic physical dimensions of the universe.

zh: 这样，我们用时间量度变化，包括社会变化。
en: As such, time is used to measure change, including societal change.

zh: 社会时间表示含有内容的时间：变化过程中的人文现象。
en: Social time indicates time with content: human phenomena in the process of change.

zh: 社会时间与社会空间作为“时空”而永恒地联系在一起。
en: Social time is invariably linked to social space as ‘time-space’.

zh: 一个是“业余”科学时期，这时医生和教士起着自然历史学家的重要作用，这是18世纪和19世纪的显著特征，此后当科学进入发展中的大学时，在性质上越来越变得具有“学术性”。
en: A period of ‘amateur’ science, in which doctors and clergymen played significant roles as natural historians, characterizes the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries, after which science increasingly became ‘academic’ in nature as it moved into the developing universities.

zh: 然后，20世纪中叶，当政府、工业界和军事界主宰着科学日程时，它变得“职业化”起来。
en: Then, in the mid-twentieth century it became ‘professional’ as government, industry and the military dominated scientific agendas.

zh: 科学的目的已经改变了，其社会学性质已经改变了，因此不仅难以追究个别“传统”的来源，而且这样的追究也是很不适当的。
en: The purpose of science has changed, its sociology has altered, and the extraction of a single ‘tradition’ is accordingly not only difficult, but even quite inappropriate.

zh: 对于后现代主义和后结构主义理解社会正义所陷入的僵局，存在着大量不满的迹象。
en: There are abundant signs of discontent with the impasse into which post-modernism's and poststructuralism's approach to the question of social justice has fallen.

zh: 并且出现了许多不同的策略，试图恢复关于正义论证的动员力量。它们不是诉诸有限但却普遍的原则，就是更加雄心勃勃地试图在所谓现代主义的普遍主义和后结构主义的解构所产生的分裂的特殊性之间建造一座桥梁。
en: And a number of different strategies have emerged to try to resurrect the mobilizing power of arguments about justice in ways which either permit appeal to carefully circumscribed, but nevertheless general, principles or which, more ambitiously, try to build a bridge between the supposed universalisms of modernism and the fragmented particularities left behind by post structuralist deconstruction.

zh: 在第十二章，我们将再次遇到这个难题，在那里我采纳了身份政治学的某些前提。
en: We will encounter this difficulty again in chapter 12, where I take up some of the groundings of identity politics.

zh: 如果我把存在着的万物(包括每一种“他性”)都内在化了，那我必定就要代表每一人，这等于根本上什么也没说。
en: If I internalize everything (including every "otherness") there is, then I am under the necessity to speak for everyone there is which is equivalent to saying nothing particular at all.

zh: 同样严肃的是，“内部关系学说不可能把‘变化’视为任何实际实体的属性”(Whitehead, 1969:74)。
en: Equally serious, is that "the doctrine of internal relations makes it impossible to attribute 'change' to any actual entity" (Whitehead, 1969: 74).

zh: 人依赖自然环境，且他不能把环境理解为自己能够从外边施加影响的客体，在人这个“小宇宙”和世界那个“大宇宙”之间内在相似性的观念中，我们发现这种依赖性的文化映像。那两个宇宙具有相同的结构，并由同样的要素组成。我们也可以在“宇宙的”人的身体形象上发现这一文化映像，那是不完整的身体，不能清楚区别于它所融入的周围世界，易受这个世界影响并将之吸收进自身。
en: Man's dependence on the natural environment, and his incapacity to apprehend it as an object upon which he could act from outside, finds its cultural reflection in the idea of the inner analogy between man the "microcosmos" and world the "megacosmos" which have the same structure and consist of the same elements; and also in the image of the "cosmic" human body — incomplete, not clearly differentiated from the surrounding world into which it merges, open to this world and absorbing it into itself.

zh: （Gurevich，1985：32)
下面举例说明把一般事务转化为可研究问题的困难：欧洲以至全球许多河谷平原森林的衰退。
en: An example will illustrate this difficulty of turning a general issue into a researchable problem: the decline of floodplain woodland in many river valleys in Europe and, indeed, globally.

zh: 河流的渠道化和流量管理把这些河流与泛滥平原相隔离，导致洪水频率、河道迁移速率以及泛滥平原沉积物含水层充水的速率都降低了。
en: Channelization and river-flow management have separated rivers from their floodplains, leading to reductions of flood frequency, of rates of channel migration, and of recharge of floodplain sedimentary aquifers.

zh: 这些变化又导致河边木本树种繁殖机会降低、生境损失和生物多样性降低。
en: In turn, this has caused reduced opportunities for the regeneration of woody riparian species, a loss of habitat, and a reduction in biodiversity.

zh: 对我来说，离开对土地的爱、尊敬和赞扬以及对其价值的高度重视，还能够与土地保持一种伦理关系，这是不可想象的。
en: It is inconceivable to me that an ethical relation to land can exist without love, respect and admiration for the land, and a high regard for its value.

zh: 提到价值，我当然是指远比经济价值更广泛的东西；我指的是哲学意义上的价值。所以，当一件东西趋向于保护生命共同体的完整性、稳定性和美的时候，它才是对的。
en: By value, I of course mean something far broader than mere economic value; I mean value in the philosophical sense so that a thing is right when it tends to preserve the integrity, stability, and beauty of the biotic community.

zh: 反之，它则是错的。
en: It is wrong when it tends otherwise.

zh: 科学研究作为一种解放力量的作用被质疑。
en: The role of scientific enquiry as a liberatory force is called into question.

zh: 霍克海默和阿多诺并没有抛弃科学（虽然他们确实提出了一种相当有说服力的方法来理解为什么在生态运动中会有如此众多的人—尤其是自然浪漫主义家— 抛弃了科学）。
en: Horkheimer and Adorno did not abandon science (though they did provide a reasonably compelling way to understand why so many in the ecological movement - particularly the nature romanticists - do).

zh: 他们认为批判研究的核心任务是：改革科学本身，试图重新捕获人类意义和目标，把“返魅” 于世界的努力（有时被描绘成克服“与自然疏远” ）内在化进科学本身，这种努力与作为启蒙思想中的“他者” 而嵌入到自然创造物中的“去魅” 相对。
en: They took it as the key task of critical enquiry to reform science itself, to try and recapture some sense of humanity and purpose and to internalize within science itself some effort at a "re-enchantment" with the world (sometimes depicted as overcoming "alienation from nature") as opposed to the "disenchantment" embedded in that creation of nature as "other" in Enlightenment thought.

zh: 城市化动力和城市构造存在于一种基本的创造性张力，它为探究不同的物种存在模式提供联系。
en: The dynamic of urbanization and the construct of the city exist in a fundamental creative tension that provides the nexus to explore different modes of species being.

zh: 不同时空秩序和结构的生产是社会过程中的积极因素。
en: The production of different spatio-temporal orderings and structures are active moments within the social process.

zh: 我们通过城市化（过程）和城市（物）之间辩证关系所理解的东西，建构了一种至关重大的社会生态转型观点，并且因此建构了一种根本的反资本主义和亲社会主义斗争的观点。
en: What we understand by the dialectical relation between urbanization (the process) and the city (the thing) constitutes a critical point of socio-ecological transformation and, consequently, a fundamental point of anti-capitalist and pro-socialist struggle.

zh: 如表9一1所示，社会生活的时间可以分为三个层次，每一个层次都与其他两个相关联（西蒙森，1991）。
en: As suggested by Figure 9.1, the temporality of social life can be broken out into three levels, each of which is interrelated to the others (Simonsen, 1991).

zh: 社会生活的长时段（longue duree)属于制度（法律、家庭等）的历史发展范围。
en: The longue durée of social life is bound up with the historical development of institutions (the law, the family, etc.).

zh: 在短时段（dasein)中（或预期寿命期间），社会生活受到个人和家庭生命周期的影响，也受到特定时代社会条件特征的影响（与长时段相互作用）。
en: Within the dasein, or lifespan, social life is influenced by the life cycle of individuals and families and (interacting with the longue durée) by the social conditions characteristic of their particular generation.

zh: 在日常生活时段上，个人的惯常性既与社会的制度框架结构也与个人的生命周期节奏相互作用。
en: And within the durée of daily life, individual routines interact with both the structure of institutional frame-works and with the rhythm of their life cycle.

zh: 空间和时间既不是绝对的也不外在于过程，而是偶然的并包含在过程之中。
en: Space and time are neither absolute nor external to processes but are contingent and contained with them.

zh: 存在着多种多样的空间和时间（以及时空)，它们包含在物理、生物和社会等不同过程之中。
en: There are multiple spaces and times (and space-times) implicated in different physical, biological, and social processes.

zh: 这些过程全都生产——用列斐伏尔的术语——自己的时空形式。

en: The latter all produce to use Lefebvre's (1991) terminology—-their own forms of space and time.

zh: 当然，在所研究的空间和时间尺度之间有很密切的联系。
en: There is, of course, a strong relationship between the spatial and temporal scales of study.

zh: 一般意义上说，随着空间尺度的增加，时间尺度也会增加。
en: In general, as spatial scale increases, so does the timescale of interest.

zh: 因此，奈顿提出了研究河流地貌所用的尺度之间的近似关系，如表11.
en: Thus, Knighton suggests the approximate linkage between scales in studies of fluvial landforms, as shown in Table 11.

zh: 1所示。
历时研究是对同一或相似样本进行纵向的研究。
en: Longitudinal studies examine the same sample of people or a similarsample of people over time.

zh: 历时研究的类型包括小样本多次调査、时间序列研究、趋势研究、世代分析以及案例研究。
en: Types of longitudinal study include panelstudies, time series studies, trend studies, cohort analysis and case studies.

zh: 数据可通过焦点群体法、参与观察法、访谈法和文献法获得。
en: Data may be collected using focus groups, participant observation, interviews and the documentary method.

zh: 过去25年来非线性、混沌、复杂和平衡稳定性问题的重要性主导着随时间变化现象的研究。
en: In the last 25 years the importance of non-linearities, chaos, complexity and issues of the stability of equilibria have dominated the study of phenomena through time.

zh: 传统的时间序列分析是以经验为基础的。
en: Conventional time-series analysis is empirically based.

zh: 需要特殊的技术来识别非线性现象。
en: Special techniques are needed to identify the non-linearities.

zh: 通过社会地创建时空的社会-文化实践，穆恩追踪了有关价值的意义的象征体系的形成。
en: Munn tracks the formation of symbolic systems of meanings – of values – through the socio-cultural practices which socially construct space and time.

zh: 不同的时空形式源自不同的社会实践。
en: Different forms of space–time derive from different social practices.

zh: 这意味着，加瓦人的空间和时间是多维度的和等级的，取决于被观察的各种社会实践的类型。
en: This means that space–time in Gawan society is multidimensional and hierarchical depending upon the sorts of social practices being looked at.

zh: 在不到20年时间里，他们伐木、砍柴、放牧和耕种的土地扩大到了原来的1600倍。
en: In less than two decades the area they drew on to cut wood, produce charcoal, graze animals and cultivate had grown exponentially.

zh: 我将这种现象称为时空扩展。
en: I called this phenomenon time–space expansion.

zh: 通过这样一种弹性的空间战略，年轻人能够继续生活在村子里，他们偶尔也到附近的城镇里工作。
en: Through this spatial strategy of resilience, young people were able to remain in the village even if their work trajectories included occasional stints in nearby towns.

zh: 第一种是时空收敛（time-space convergence）。
en: The first of these is time-space convergence.

zh: 由于注意到本世纪内穿越距离所需时间的急剧减少，世界好像在一定程度上“变小”了。
en: Through noting that the time it takes to transverse distances has fallen dramatically in recent centuries, it is sometimes suggested that the world is becoming somehow ‘smaller’.

zh: 这种“缩小着的世界”的想法对地理学家并不是独特的，但作为时空收敛的精确测量则很独特。
en: This idea of a ‘shrinking world’ is not unique to geography but its precise measurement as time-space convergence is.

zh: 实施研究设计集中体现在两个主要的活动上：资料收集和资料分析。
en: Implementing the research design is focused on two major activities: data collection and data analysis.

zh: 两种活动都涉及研究的伦理问题，也与资料收集和分析过程中的研究者行为的伦理相关。
en: Both activities are associated with ethical issues relating to permission to conduct the study and to the researcher acting ethically during data collection and analysis.

zh: 在这一阶段中，研究者也需要组织一次前测。

en: Also in this phase, the researcher will be involved in running a pilot of the study.

zh: 自然科学中有些成就是千百年长期孕育的产物，所采用的方法及其赖以支撑的哲学框架亦已因新出现的知识而改变。
en: Some of the successes of the physical sciences have been the product of lengthy gestation over hundreds of years, and the methods employed and the philosophical frameworks underpinning them have changed in response to emerging understandings.

zh: 因此， 除了多元论之外并不存在什么单一的传统。
en: Thus there is no single tradition, except that of pluralism.

zh: 在这种“传统”之中，地理学从观察、测量、各种实验、理论改进和试验中汲取了丰富的方法。
en: Within this ‘tradition’, there is a rich source for geography of methods drawing on observation, measurement, various forms of experimentation, theory development, and testing.

zh: “测试法”这个方法不全是数学方法。
en: The testing method — this method is not a fully mathematical method.

zh: 它是一种实验法，试图确定某一个市场分区，使之先于其他市场区域作出变革。
en: It is an experimental method that attempts to determine a market section that changes ahead of other market sections.

zh: 这个方法用于中期到长期的预测。
en: The method is used for medium to long-term forecasts.

zh: 乔利（Chorley, 1978）对比了地貌研究中实用主义和现实主义方法的差别。
en: Chorley (1978) has drawn the distinction between functional and realist approaches in geomorphology.

zh: 实用主义理论就是进行统计归纳，而关注过程动力学就意味着要作更为现实的理解。
en: Functional theories involve statistical generalizations whereas a focus on process dynamics implies greater realism of understanding.

zh: 这样就出现两个问题：小尺度的研究结果——不论是实用主义的还是现实主义的——能不能应用到更大的尺度上？
en: Two questions arise: can the results of small-scale studies, whether functional or realist, be applied to the larger scale?

zh: 地方研究在何种程度上能够代表更大的区域范围，还是只能作为一个独特案例研究？
en: And to what extent are local studies representative of the wider region or merely unique case studies?

zh: 很难设想身体以外的地方。
en: It is difficult to think of places outside the body.

zh: 例如，设想一次乡间散步，地方不仅是由两眼所见的景色所组成的，而且还有在山谷中登高趋低，树林中的风吹鸟鸣，触摸围墙和树枝，以及被践踏的野草和肥料的气味。
en: Think, for example, of a country walk and place consists not just of eye surveying prospect but also the push and pull of walking up hill and down dale, the sound of birds and the wind in the trees, the touch of wall and branch, the smell of trampled grass and manure.

zh: 或者设想一次城市中的散步，地方也不仅是由两眼所见的其他人或广告牌或楼宇所组成，而且还有交通与谈话的噪声，同售票机与扶手的接触，以及废气与烹调食物的气味。
en: Or think of a walk in the city and place consists not just of eye making contact with other people or advertising signs or buildings, but also the sound of traffic noise and conversation, the touch of ticket machine and hand rail, the smell of exhaust fumes and cooking food.

zh: 历时研究是指对同一或相似样本在一定时间段内进行研究。
en: Longitudinal studies involve the study of the same people or a similarsample of people over a set period of time.

zh: 这种研究的数据可能通过访谈、焦点群体法、参与观察法和文献法(在本章后面进行解释)得到。
en: Data may be collected usinginterviews, focus groups, participant observation and the documentarymethod (explained later in the chapter).

zh: 历时研究也可用于定量方法，但因为本章关注的是定性研究方法，因此只讨论有关整体归纳范式的方法。
en: Longitudinal studies may also beconducted using quantitative methods; however, as this chapter focuses on qualitative methods, only those methods associated with a holistic-inductive paradigm are discussed.

zh: 纽曼（2000)曾划分出历时研究的不同类型.小样本多次调查、时间序列研究、趋势研究以及世代分析。
en: Neuman (2000) identifies several types of longitudinal studies: panel studies, time series studies, trend studies and cohort analysis.

zh: 他认为案例研究也是历时研究的一种数据收集方法。
en: He also includes case studies as a method of data collection for longitudinal studies.

zh: 20世纪之初掀起了一场关于“大国”前途的充满焦虑的辩论。
en: The onset of the twentieth century provoked a rather anxious debate about the future of the ‘great powers’.

zh: 许多人认为1900年标志着世界历史的转折点，是欧洲持续扩张400年的终结。
en: Many believed that 1900 would mark a turning point in world history, the end of a 400-year period of continuous European expansion.

zh: 世界地图上未探查过和未被认领的“空白”空间在迅速减少，或者看来是如此，“世界封闭”（global closure）之意呼之欲出。
en: The unexplored and unclaimed ‘blank’ spaces on the world map were rapidly diminishing, or so it seemed, and the sense of a ‘global closure’ was palpable.

zh: 发展经济学和经济地理学致命的问题是该领域的先驱没有明确地说明市场结构，即在他们所描述的假想经济中的竞争状况。
en: In both development and geography the crucial problem, in particular, was the inability of the field's pioneers to be explicit about market structurethat is, about the conditions of competition in the hypothetical economies they were describing.

zh: 这是一个很微妙的问题；事实上，对于不从事严肃的经济学建模工作的人，不可能向他们解释清楚这为什么竟然成为一个难题。
en: It's a subtle problem; indeed, it is virtually impossible to explain why it is an issue at all to anyone who has not tried to engage in serious economic modeling.

zh: 但是对于把发展经济学和经济地理学纳入主流经济学理论的诸多努力而言，市场结构的难题却被证明是致命的。
en: And yet the market structure issue proved fatal to efforts to integrate both development and geography into the mainstream of economic theory.

zh: 本章中提出的市民身份、家长式统治、种族歧视、集体消费、法律、政府和市民社会等问题，都以某种方式来自于城市中的社会公正问题。
en: The issues of citizenship, patriarchy, racism, collective consumption, the law, the state and civil society reviewed in this chapter all raise, in one way or another, the question of social justice in the city.

zh: 哈维在恩格尔之后认识到公正的概念不仅随时间和地方而变化，而且还因人而异。
en: David Harvey, following Engels, recognizes that conceptions of justice vary not only with time and place, but also with the persons concerned.

zh: 因此，最根本的是考察创造生活世界的物质及道德基础，各种不同的社会公正概念正是由此而生。
en: It follows that it isessential to examine the material and moral bases for the production of the lifeworlds from which divergent concepts of social justice emerge.

zh: 我们会在随后的几章中进行考察。
en: This we shall do in subsequent chapters.

zh: 但是，如果在建公园的过程中不考虑将人聚集起来的原因，而是把公园作为人的替代品，那么把公园建立在有人的地方就毫无意义。
en: But there is no point in bringing parks to where the people are, if in the process the reasons that the people are there are wiped out and the park substituted for them.

zh: 这是在住宅项目、市政和文化中心的设计中存在的根本错误之一。
en: This is one of the basic errors in housing-project and civic-and cultural-center design.

zh: 从任何形式上说，街区公园都不能代替城市的多样性。
en: Neighborhood parks fail to substitute in any way for plentiful city diversity.

zh: 那些成功的街区公园从来就没有干扰过周围复杂和多样化的城市功能或对其构成障碍。
en: Those that are successful never serve as harriers or as interruptions to the intricate functioning of the city around them.

zh: 相反，那些公园将周边地区多样化的功能贯穿在一起，起了一种很和谐的组织作用。
en: Rather, they help to knit together diverse surrounding functions by giving them a pleasant joint facility.

zh: 大约与此同时，出现了另一个重要地标。
en: Another important landmark appeared about the same time.

zh: 这就是“攀级范例” (panrarchy paradigm)，它是因霍林(Holling, 1973)创造性的工作建立起来的，他发展了对稳定性和弹性的隐喻，承认多稳态(multiple stable states)的存在，并将其应用到对人为系统和自然系统转化的理解中。
en: This is the panarchy paradigm that builds on the original work of Holling (1973) in developing the metaphor of stability and resilience, admitting the existence of multiple stable states and applying it to understanding transformations in human and natural systems.

zh: 霍林和冈德森(Holling and Gunderson，2002)发展了受干扰后适应性循环的概念。
en: In particular, Holling and Gunderson (2002) developed the concept of adaptive cycles following disturbance.

zh: 教育的需承量在一定时期内发生变化基于两个原因。
en: The quantity of education demanded raises over time for two reasons.

zh: 首先是收入效应（income effect)。
en: The first is the income effect.

zh: 制造业生产率的提高带来了实际经济收入的提高：经济总产量提高了，居民购买力也得以提高。
en: The increase in manufacturing productivity increases the real income of the economy: the total output of the economy increases, increasing the purchasing power of its citizens.

zh: 盗窃的社会总成本等于受害成本与防止成本之和。
en: The total social cost of burglaries equals the sum of the cost incurred by victims and the cost of prevention.

zh: 若每个犯罪成本不变，那么受苒成本增加率也是不变的。
en: Victim cost increases at a constant rate if the cost per crime is constant.

zh: 由于边际收益的滅少，防止成本随着盗窃次数的减少而快速增加，盗窃总成本在B上最小（点G）。
en: The prevention cost increases rapidly as the number of burglaries decreases, a result of diminishing marginal returns.Total cost is minimized with B burglaries (point G).

zh: 城市开发公司是一系列准自治非政府组织 (quangos)之一（其他还有英格兰和威尔士的培训与企业理事会TECs以及苏格兰的地方企业理事会），它们近年来在英国承担了很多治理职能。
en: The UDCs are one of a series of quangos that have taken over many aspects of governance in the UK in recent years (Peck andJones, 1995).

zh: 广义的类似政策在美国也实施过。
en: Broadly similar policies have been enacted in the United States.

zh: 例如，授权区（empowerment zones)的目的也在于吸引私人部门资金投人到缺乏投资的地区，但是在这个案例中，存在着保证任何新的动议都得到 地方社区支持的明显考虑。
en: For example, empowerment zones are also intended to attract private sector funds into deprived areas but in this case there is a much explicit concern to secure local community support for any new initiatives.

zh: 到目前为止，授权区一直都集中在底特律这样的东北部工业衰落城市中，80个地方项目都是致力于增加培训和改善社会住房。
en: So far empowerment zones have been concentrated in the deindustrializing cities of the Northeast such as Detroit, where 80 local projects are aimed at improving training and social housing (Hall, 1998).

zh: 采用实证主义范式的研究者通常主要使用定量研究方法。
en: A researcher operating from a positivist paradigm will primarily use quantitative methods.

zh: 具体的数据收集的方法包括问卷法、观察法、文档分析法以及实验和准实验的方法（这些方法将在第三章和第八章中做出解释）。
en: The methods of data collection include questionnaires, observation, documentary analysis and experiments and quasi-experiments.(These methods are explained in chapters 3 and 8.)

zh: 数据分析通常采用统计方法，由此得出由数字表示的研究结论。
en: Analysis will be conducted using statistical calculations and the units of study will subsequently become numeric representations.

zh: 数据编码包括三个步骤：编码的形成（此过程可以发生在数据收集过程之前，也可以包括在数据收集的工具中）；数据输入；数据整理。
en: Coding data involves three steps: the development of codes (which mayoccur prior to the data collection process and which may appear on datacollection tools); data entry; and data cleaning.

zh: 读者一定记得定性数据分析也涉及数据编码，并且第七章也描述了大量的给定性数据编码的方法（例如：描述性、解释性及模型编码、开放式编码、轴心式编码及选择式编码）。
en: You will recall that qualitative data analysis also involves data coding and chapter 7 described a number of ways to code qualitative data (descriptive, interpretive andpattern-based codes, and open, axial and selective coding, for example).

zh: 如果需要回顾以上内容，请参考第七章。
en: Refer back to chapter 7 if you need to refresh your memory.

zh: 数据的整理包括两种方式：可能编码式整理和逻辑整理 (Babbie 1995)。
en: Data cleaning involves two types of cleaning — possible-code cleaning and contingency cleaning (Babbie 1995).

zh: 数据的整理是很有必要的，因为数据输入包含人员介入，不管人们在输入资料时如何地小心翼翼,但错误依然难以避免。
en: Cleaning data is necessary because of the fact that data entry involves humans and humans are prone to make errors despite their best intentions not to do so.

zh: 数据输入中的错误一般是指编码员编排了错误的编码或调査对象犯了错误，如写了两个答案的编码而不是一个。
en: Errors in data entry are associated with coders assigning the wrong codes and respondents making mistakes such as coding two responses instead of only one.

zh: 就像上文提到的，数据输入有多种方法可资使用。
en: As already noted above, there are a number of ways that data can beentered.

zh: 数据输入的轻松与否将取决于在调査设计阶段，调查者是否对数据分析过程给予了全面的考虑。
en: The ease of data entry will depend on the researcher giving fullconsideration to the data analysis phase in the research design stage.

zh: 举个例子，如果调查问卷的设计包含了数据编码，那么就有可能立刻输入数据；否则，就需要准备编码簿，并且数据输入还要求数据输入人员在调查问卷和计算机程序之间互相参照（这也增加了在数据输人过程中犯错误的概率）。
en: It ispossible, for example, to enter data immediately from the questionnaire ifdata codes are included in the questionnaire design.Otherwise, code books need to be prepared and data entry will require some cross-referencing between the questionnaire and the computer program by the data entry person (which also increases the chances of possible errors in data entry).

zh: 许多地貌图的绘制是为了咨询报告和应用项目。
en: Many geomorphological maps are produced for consultancy reports and in applied projects.

zh: 这些图常常是专门为某个地点或某种问题而绘制的，而且经常不在国有土地上。
en: These are often site- and problem-specific and may often not be in the public domain.

zh: 现在广泛应用GIS绘制的数字化地形模型，成为地貌学家的重要工具(DeMers, 2005)。
en: Digital terrain modelling using GIS is now widely applied and is an important tool for geomorphologists (DeMers, 2005).

zh: 在这方面再次证明GPS的价值是无法衡量的（Longley et al., 2001)。
en: Again GPS has proved invaluable in this respect (Longley et al., 2005).

zh: 单一税的另一变通就是双比率税（two-rate tax)或分割税（split tax)。
en: Another alternative to a pure land tax is the two-rate tax, or the split tax.

zh: 根据传统的财产税，土地和改良土地而增加的价值按同样的比率征税。
en: Under the conventional property tax, land and improvements are taxed at the same rate.

zh: 3%的财产税实际上就是对土地征收3%的税并对改良土地而增加的价值征收3%的税。
en: A 3 percent property tax is actually a 3 percent tax on land and a 3 percent tax on improvements.

zh: 本章进一步详尽地描述了建立在这些要点之上的分析方法，以及所有那些由沃斯（de Vaus） （1995）在开篇引文中描述的方法。
en: This chapter describes in further detail the methods of analysis that arefounded in these points as well as those described by de Vaus (1995) in the opening quote.

zh: 本章将为读者介绍单变量分析、双变量分析和多变量分析，还将使读者熟悉各种分析方法的适用条件，这些条件源自于所调査的各种变量的测量层次(定类、定序、定距及定比）。
en: You will be introduced to univariate analysis, bivariate analysis and multivariate analysis.You will also be familiarised with the conditions regarding the use of the various methods of analysis.These conditions are derived from  the level of measurement of the variable (s) being investigated (nominal, ordinal, interval and ratio).

zh: 此外，读者也将了解到沃斯并未提及但却被列入本章学习目标中的其他分析方法。
en: You will also be introduced to additional methods of analysis not described by de Vaus but listed in the objectives for this chapter.

zh: 正如法伊夫指出的，这些定性方法通常（可能有些错误地）被认为较之定量方法要容易一些。
en: These qualitative methods are often ---somewhat mistakenly --- thought of as less useful than quantitative methods.

zh: 但实际上，如果使用精确，研究者能通过定性方法对支撑定量方法的假设条件进行更严谨的定义。
en: However, if used rigorously, qualitative methods can enable the researcher to take a serious look at the assumptions underpinning the methods being used in the analysis.

zh: 特别是，由定性方法引起的关于被观察人和观察人共同价值观的数据选择的内在价值问题（即被安东尼•吉登斯称为“双重解释"(double hermeneutic)的问题），
en: In particular, qualitative methods raise questions about the values inherent in the choice of data being collected together with the values of those being observed and those undertaking the observation --- what has been termed by Anthony Giddens the double hermeneutic.

zh: 第一种做法是对理论解释能力的判断。
en: The first is a judgement about the explanatory power of a theory.

zh: 这就提出了解释与预测之间的不对称性问题；正如任何统计学预测模型在经济学或水文学中所展示的那样，解释的能力并不意味着预测的能力。
en: This introduces the asymmetry between explanation and prediction; the capacity to predict does not imply an ability to explain, as any statistical forecasting model in economics or hydrology demonstrates.

zh: 所以，对旨在提供解释的理论的预测检验生来就是自相矛盾的，而且还需要某些东西。
en: A predictive test of a theory that purports to provide explanation is inherently inconsistent, therefore, and something is required in addition.

zh: 第二，正如利科(Ricoeur，1991)所言，自我感和身份感部分地通过我们用以描述自己与世界暂时关系的叙事手段来建立，并因此呈现相对持久的结构。
en: Secondly, as Ricoeur (1991) notes, our own sense of self-hood and of identity in part gets constructed through the narrative devices which we use to describe our temporal relation to the world, and so assumes relatively durable configurations.

zh: 虽然身份并不依靠同一性或本质，但根据我们讲述自身历史和地理——简言之，我们在物之秩序中的位置——的故事，它确实获得了持久性和永恒性。
en: While identity does not rest upon sameness or essence, it does acquire durability and permanence according to the stories we tell ourselves and others about our history and our geography, about, in short, our place in the order of things.

zh: 虽然身份使他性内在化了，但它仍然为起作用的“他性”的(常常是空间的)领域以及他者与特殊自我感之间的关系划定界限，并使这两者相对持久。
en: Although identity internalizes othernesses, it nevertheless delimits and renders relatively durable both the (often spatial) field of "othernesses" brought into play and the relation of those others to a particular sense of self-hood.

zh: 当所要调查研究的旅游现象的资料不存在或只有很少时通常采用探索性研究方法。
en: Exploratory research is conducted when very little or no data exist on the tourism phenomenon being investigated.

zh: 从探索性研究中得出的结果可用于拓展出一个更为深入的研究项目。
en: Findings from exploratory research can be used to develop a more extensive research project.

zh: 一般来讲，探索性研究是不公开的，其主要作用是帮助建立适合于将来研究使用的类目和概念；用于确定某个主要研究的可行性或了解研究论题相关领域中存在的有关问题。
en: Generally, exploratory research is not published.Rather, it serves to establish possible categories and concepts suitable for use in further research, in determining the feasibility of a major study or in understanding that which exists in areas related to the study topic.

zh: 在这个意义上，少数群体包括美国城市中的非裔美国人、波多黎各人、意大利人、犹太人、墨西哥人、越南人和（亚洲）印度人；英国城市中的加勒比黑人、亚洲人和爱尔兰人；法国城市中的阿尔及利亚人和西班牙人；德国城市中的土耳其人和克罗地亚人等等。
en: Minority groups in this sense therefore include African-Americans, Puerto Ricans, Italians, Jews, Mexicans, Vietnamese and (Asian) Indians in American cities; Afro-Caribbeans, Asians and Irish in British cities; Algerians and Spaniards in French cities; Turks and Croats in German cities; and so on.

zh: 当然，东道主社会不一定是均质的，它通常包含一个占主导地位的特权群体（charter group)，也正代表了新的少数群体所进人的母体。
en: While the host society may not be homogeneous, it always contains a charter group that represents the dominant matrix into which new minority groups are inserted.

zh: 在北美、澳大利亚和英国的大部分城市中，特权群体是带有“盎格鲁-撒克逊”文化的白人。
en: In North America, Australia and Britain the charter group in most cities is white, with an ‘Anglo-Saxonn culture.

zh: 根据各个城市所包含的人群，其少数群体与特权群体的空间隔离程度在不同城市之间也有很大差异。
en: The degree to which minority groups are spatially segregated from the charter group varies a good deal from city to city according to the group involved.

zh: 第二类的用地形式可以是特殊用地（special land），通常不是当做步行用的大街。
en: The second type of land, which can be ca1led special land, is not commonly used as public thoroughfare by people on foot.

zh: 在这上面可以建房也可以不建，可以是公共场所也可以不是，可以让人们进入到里面也可以不让进人。
en: It can be built on or not; It can be publicly owned or not; it can be physically accessible to people or not.

zh: 但这不是问题的所在。
en: This is beside the point.

zh: 关键的问题是人们要绕过它走，或沿着它的边走，但不是在其中穿行。
en: The point is that people walk around it, or alongside it, but not through it.

zh: 研究者可以用条形图或者饼状图来描述表格中的数据。
en: The researcher could present the data from this table as a bar graph or a pie chart.

zh: 条形图使用垂直的长方条来描述每个种类以及他们的频数，这些长方条是分离的，表示每个测量变量之间都没有数量关系（Saramakos 1998)。
en: Bar graphs portray each of the categories and their frequency using vertical bars that are separated to show there is no quantitative relationship between each of the measures (Sarantakos 1998).

zh: 饼状图能够用所测量单位的百分比大小来描述数据(Sarantakos 1998)。
en: Pie charts enable representation of data to be proportionate to the size of the unit being measured (Sarantakos 1998).

zh: 铁轨（railroad tracks）就是一个典型交界地带的例子。很久以前，轨道也代表了一种社会交界地带的意思。“轨道的另一边”，此话的含义一般是指与大城市接壤的小城镇地区。
en: Railroad tracks are the classic examples of borders, so much so that they came to stand, long ago,for social borders too --- "the other side of the tracks" --- a connotation, incidentaly, associated with small towns  rather than with big cities.

zh: 我们现在要谈的不是这种含义的交界处，而是指它对周边区域带来的实际的和功能上的影响。
en: Here we shall be concerned not with the social connotations of areas demarcated by borders, but rather with the physical and functional effects of their borders on their immediate city surroundings.

zh: 需要研究的第二个问题是将一个尺度的分析结果应用到不同尺度上去。
en: The second question relates to the need to apply the results of one scale of analysis at different scales.

zh: 这涉及把结果从小尺度到大尺度的尺度放大——例如把小流域的研究结果推广到大河流域。
en: This may involve upscaling of results from smaller to larger areas – for example, extending results from small catchment studies to large river basins.

zh: 也可能在有些情况下是尺度缩小——例如，将通用循环模型（全球尺度）的结果应用到某个区域。
en: It may also in some circumstances involve downscaling – for example, applying the results of general circulation models (global scale) to particular regions.

zh: 隔离和集聚在空间的表现是由歧视、组织作用和群体内部凝聚力的相互作用而决定的。
en: The spatial expression of segregation and congregation, then, is determined by the interplay of discrimination, fabric effects and the strength of internal group cohesion.

zh: 如果一个地方少数群体和特权群体之间的感知社会距离较近，那么特权群体的歧视和少数群体内部凝聚力的作用就会减弱，而少数群体的居住集群很可能只是被广泛的城市社会空间组织同化的一个暂时阶段。
en: Where the perceived social distance between the minority group and the charter group is relatively small, the effects of both charter group discrimination and internal cohesion are likely to be minimized and so minority residential clusters are likely to be only a temporary stage in the assimilation of the group into the wider urban sociospatial fabric.

zh: 这种集群有可能被称为侨民区。
en: Such clusters may be termed colonies.

zh: 它们像河口港一样，有效地为自己群体的成员提供了一个基地，使他们在这里受到文化的同化，并从这里再分散到其他空间。
en: They essentially serve as a port-of-entry for members of the group concerned, providing a base from which group members are culturally assimilated and spatially dispersed.

zh: 因此，随着时间的推移，它们的存留取决于其少数群体新成员的不断输人。
en: Their persistence over time is therefore dependent on the continuing input of new minority group members.

zh: 家庭环境和同龄人效应。
en: Home Environment and Peer Group Effects.

zh: 研究者也赞同同龄人对成绩的影响，如果一个学生的周围都是聪明好学的学生，那么他就会学到更多。
en: Researchers also agree about the effects of the peer group on achievement: a student learns more if she is surrounded by smart and motivated students.

zh: 一些证据表明成绩差的同学受同龄人的影响最大，班级里聪明好学的学生增加，成绩最差的学生受益最大。
en: There is some evidence that the largest peer group effects are experienced by low achievers: the students at the bottom of the class have the most to gain from adding smart and motivated students to the class.

zh: 有时，研究者们选择同时采访夫妻二人。
en: Sometimes, researchers choose to interview heterosexual couples together.

zh: 人们对这种数据收集方法的恰当性持有不同的意见。
en: There are varying attitudes to the appropriateness of this for data collection.

zh: 瑞纳兹(1992，p.41)的报道称，“社会学家黎丽安•鲁宾曾写道，参与到妇女运动之后她才意识到，采访夫妻最好分别进行，因为‘当男人不在场时，女人更容易自由地谈论她们对于生活、角色以及婚姻（关系）的感觉’”。
en: Reinharz (1992, p. 41) reports that the 'sociologist Lillian Rubin wrote that involvement in the women's movement showed her the need to interview husbands and wives separately and privately because "women tend to discuss their feelings about their lives, their roles, and their marriages [relationships] more freely when men are not present'".

zh: 计算机非常有助于定量数据分析。
en: Computers have assisted greatly in the analysis of quantitative data.

zh: 现今，大多数的定量数据都被转变成“机读”的形式，即可以被计算机或类似的机器读取和操作的形式（Babbie 1995, P. 363)。
en: Nowadays, most quantitative data are turned into 'machine-readable form — a form that can be read and manipulated by computers and similar machines' (Babbie 1995, p. 363).

zh: 可供研究者选用的定量数据分析软件包有很多。例如Methodologist’s Toolchest 3.0 ，SphinxSurvey，SPSS(社会科学统计软件包) ，Minitab, SAS (统计分析系统）以及WinMAX。
en: There are a number of quantitative software packages available to assist researchers, such as the Methodologist's Toolchest Version 3.0, SphinxSurvey, SPSS (Statistical Package for the Social Sciences), Minitab, SAS (Statistical Analysis System), and winMAX.

zh: 其中有些软件包甚至能够辅助研究设计而不再只是局限于数据分析。
en: Several of these software packages are aids for research design rather than solely analytical packages.

zh: 下文对这些软件包进行了简要的描述，读者据此能够对使用的类型有一个全面了解，而不是仅对各个软件包的特点的概要性理解。
en: A brief description of these packages follows, so that you have an understanding of the diversity available to you, rather than a comprehensive summary of all the features of each package.

zh: 地理学理论的总体是什么？
en: What are the populations for geographical theories?

zh: 在很多情况里总体的所指远不清楚。
en: They are far from clear in many cases.

zh: 那么样本又指什么？
en: Thus what do the samples refer to?

zh: （在设想应用中心地理论的场合，一个地方的样本是对包括有200个聚落的农村威尔特郡的研究呢？还是对200个聚落中样本的研究？在第二种情形下，它肯定不适宜构成一个随机样本。
en: (Is a study of rural Wiltshire, comprising 200 settlements, a sample of one area in which central place theory is supposed to apply? Or is it a sample of 200 settlements, in which case it is surely not a properly constituted random sample?)

zh: ）如果无论总体还是样本的性质都不清楚，那么统计意义上之检验的合理性必然会有问题。
en: If the nature of neither population nor sample is clear, then the validity of statistical significance tests must be very much in doubt.

zh: 时间和空间现在被解释为“只是对包容性统一之总体性的抽象，是彼此在对方之中成形的……时空只不过是把集合体组成统一体的体系”。
en: Space and time are now construed as "simply abstractions from the totality of prehensive unifications as mutually patterned in each other ... space-time is nothing else than a system of pulling together of assemblages into unities."

zh: 因而， “事件”这个词便指“这些时空统一体中的一个”。
en: The word "event" is then defined to mean "one of these spatiotemporal unities."

zh: 当然，此处有趣的是把各种成分集合成统一体从而使得时空性得到定义的实际过程。
en: What is interesting here, of course, is the actual process of putting together assemblages into unities so as to define spatio-temporalities.

zh: 只有当河流动力足以携带该粒级时含沙量才会增加。
en: Only when the stream power is sufficient to entrain that grain size can the sediment load increase.

zh: 随着平均粒径对分选(X2)的比率增大，携带的阈限(搬运某一粒径开始的数值)也增大。
