en: The threshold of entrainment (the value at which transport of a given particle size begins) increases as the ratio of mean grain size/sorting (x2) increases.

zh: 超过这个阈限以后河流动力微小的增大就会使泥沙搬运量产生一个跳跃。
en: This produces a jump in the amount of sediment transported after the tiny increase in stream power that crosses the threshold.

zh: 这个跳跃成为突变(catastrophe)(法语中意为台阶)，不要与意为灾难的灾变(catastrophic)相混淆。
en: This jump is called a catastrophe (French for step), not to be confused with catastrophic, meaning disaster.

zh: 非线性突变的发现导致被称为突变论的非线性科学整个领域及其专门的数学主体(specialized body of mathematics)的出现。
en: The discovery of non-linear catastrophes has led to a whole area of non-linear science called catastrophe theory with its own specialized body of mathematics.

zh: 这种变化能够联系到另一种情形，其中我们对图像空间的想法正在改变。
en: This change can be linked to another way in which our thinking about image space is changing.

zh: 在过去，某种图像常常创造出与其相似的空间。
en: In the past, particular kinds of image very often created spaces in their likeness.

zh: 例如，某种空间对称性观念帮助产生了帕拉第奥式（Palladian）的景观，而某种现代主义的敏感性则帮助产生那种布局严谨而而秩序井然的景观，至今在许多城市居住区中仍能找到。
en: So, for example, a particular notion of spatial symmetry helped to produce the Palladian landscape while a particular kind of modernist sensibility helped to produce the kinds of strictly laid out and ascetically ordered landscapes still to be found lingering on in many urban housing estates.

zh: 贫穷是显而易见的，而富裕也极尽招摇。
en: Poverty is manifest, affluence is ostentatious.

zh: 绅士化区位就位于贬值的老房地产旁边。
en: Gentrification sits beside the devalorization of old property.

zh: 到警察局的布告栏去寻找信息，发现又发生了一次种族袭击，而布告栏上的涂鸦则显示了对地方警察局调查能力的信任状况。
en: The appeals for information in the police posters tell of yet another racist attack, just as the graffiti with which they are decorated demonstrate the credence given locally to the powers of police investigation.

zh: 因此,约翰•弗雷泽•哈特(John Fraser Hart,1982)等地理学家吸收了康德的唯心主义哲学观点,认为尺度不过是为了将世界条理化而信手拈来的概念化机制,而其他地理学家则根据马克思主义的唯物主义理论认为尺度是真实存在的社会产物(也就是说尺度在这个世界上确实存在),而且同样有其构建的政治方式。特别是史密斯认为尺度的产生源自资本内部的矛盾[5]。通过案例分析,他研究了1980年代美国经济的重组如何导致其工业景观尺度的重新确定(Smith and Dermis,1987; Smith,1988)。
en: Hence, while geographers such as John Fraser Hart (1982: 21) drew upon Immanuel Kant’s idealist philosophy to suggest that scales were no more than handy conceptual mechanisms for ordering the world (‘subjective artistic devices ... shaped to fit the hand of the individual user’), others drew upon Marxist ideas of materialism to argue that scales were real social products (that is to say, that scales really exist in the world) and that, as such, there was a politics to their construction – Neil Smith, for instance, contended that the production of scales emerged out of contradictions within capital, showing, by way of example, how restructuring in the US economy during the 1980s was leading to a rescaling and reregionalization of its industrial landscape (Smith and Dennis, 1987; Smith, 1988).

zh: 最近，关于嵌在特殊话语之中的“主体位置”或“立场”亦有很多有益的讨论。
en: There has also been much salutary discussion recently on the "subject positionality" or the "standpoint" embedded in particular discourses.

zh: 人们开始注意隐蔽的位置性和权力游戏，它们隐藏于甚至在表面上最无害和在道德上中立的话语中。
en: Attention has been drawn to the hidden positionalities and power plays that lie buried within even the most seemingly innocuous and ethically neutral discourses.

zh: 在今天，提出任何“真理”或者甚至“相关性”和“政治学”主张而不提供这些主张的原始根据(包括“主体位置”声明)，是很困难的。
en: It is difficult now to advance any claims to "truth" or even "relevance" or "politics" without providing some initial grounds (including declarations of "subject positionality") upon which to base such claims.

zh: 全球化也与更大范围的全球文化的发展相联系。
en: Globalization is also associated with the development of a broader global culture.

zh: 这是一个颇受争议的观点，但基本上包含了西方唯物论价值观的广泛传播。
en: This is a controversial idea but essentially involves the widespread diffusion of Western values of materialism.

zh: 全球化也可从好莱坞电影在全世界的普及和“世界音乐”的日益流行中看到。
en: Globalization can also be seen in the popularity of Hollywood films throughout the world and the increased popularity of ‘world music’.

zh: 因此，一般认为，全球化包括了文化的均化，即全球范围内文化内部联系的发展。
en: It is therefore argued that globalization involves the homogenization of the culture --- the development of cultural interrelatedness throughout the globe.

zh: 物质实体和文化之间的关系可以用目的性（intenticmality)这个概念来加以概括。
en: The relationship between material objects and culture may be encapsulated by the notion of intentionality.

zh: 这个概念使大家注意到这样一个事实，即物质实体本身是没有意义的，它们只有通过人们的使用才被赋予了意义。
en: This concept draws attention to the fact that objects have no meaning in themselves but only acquire meaning through the uses that people put them to.

zh: 总之，文化包含的内容远远超过了高雅艺术。事实上，在文化研究中，文本包含了任何一种有意义的表述（representation)形式，可以是广告、大众电视节目、电影、流行音乐甚至食品。
en: To sum up, culture involves much more than high art; indeed, in cultural studies a text comprises any form of representation with meaning and can include advertising, popular television programmes, films, popular music and even food.

zh: 城市美化运动的目的是建立城市标志性建筑。
en: The aim of the City Beautiful was the City Monumental.

zh: 一些建造系统林阴大道的宏大计划被制定出来，但大部分却没有任何结果。
en: Great schemes were drawn up for systems of baroque boulevards,which mainly came to nothing.

zh: 这个运动真正产生的结果是仿照芝加哥展览会的中心标志物，一个又一个城市建造了市中心，或文化中心(cultural center )。
en: What did come out of the movement was the Center Monumental, modeled on the fair.City after city built its civic center or its cultural center.

zh: 这些建筑物沿着一条林阴大道，就像费城的本杰明•富兰克林公园大道;或靠着 一个商场，就像克利夫兰的市政中心;或比邻公园，就像圣路易的市中心;或与公园交错在一起，就像旧金山的市政中心。
en: These buildings were arranged along a boulevard as at Benjamin Franklin Parkway in Philadelphia, or along a mail like the Government Center in Cleveland, or were bordered by park, like the Civic Cemer at St. Louis, or were interspersed with park, like the Civic Center at San Francisco.

zh: 因此很明显，词汇不是中立的，而是具有很强的根本假设和含义的。
en: Clearly, then, words are not neutral but have powerful underlying assumptions and meanings.

zh: 这表明要理解支撑语言的话语，很重要的一点就是文化（culture)的分析。
en: This means that analysis of culture is crucial to understanding the language and discourse.

zh: 后结构主义思想对城市社会地理学的影 响十分显著，这反映在分支学科明显的“文化转向”（‘culture turn’）之上。
en: The effect of poststructuralist thinking on urban social geography has been substantial, to the point where the subdiscipline has taken a clear ‘cultural turn’.

zh: 应当强调的是，这不是文化地理学中传统文化观念的转变（有时也被称为“超有机体”观点；参见邓肯，1980），而是向文化作为一个具有共同意义的系统的人类学观点的转变。
en: This, it should be emphasized, is not a turn toward the traditional notion of culture within cultural geography (sometimes termed the ‘superorganic’ view; see Duncan, 1980), but to the anthropological idea of cultures as systems of shared meanings.

zh: 问题的确认乃是科学工作中十分重要的部分，而且常常是十分困难的劳心之举。
en: Problem recognition is a very important part of scientific endeavour, and often a very difficult intellectual exercise.

zh: 任何一个想提出一项研究计划的人都要明白引文中最后一句话的重要性。
en: Anyone who has tried to develop a research project will know the significance of the final phrase in this quotation.

zh: 找到一个有兴趣乃至有价值的一般研究领域并不难，但是很难把这种兴趣转变为一套可以进行研究的问题。
en: It is often easy to find a general area in which research would be interesting, even valuable, but less straightforward to turn that interest into a researchable set of questions.

zh: 这就是问题表述的精髓，也是使科学成为如此成功的事业之所在。
en: This is the essence of problem formulation, and a scientific tradition which has made science such a successful enterprise.

zh: 人所皆知，马克思憎恶乌托邦思想。因此，把他拖进这样一种争论似乎是奇怪的。
en: In view of Marx's well-known antipathy to Utopian thinking, it may seem strange to indude him in a discussion of this sort.

zh: 不过，他确实提出了某种乌托邦理想，并十分急切地使之与其他乌托邦理想区别开来。
en: But Marx produced a certain kind of Utopianism that he was most anxious to keep separate from other varieties.

zh: 反机构化最极端的结果发生在加利福尼亚州。
en: The most extreme consequences of deinstitutionalization are to be found in California.

zh: 该州精神病院的迅速关闭导致服务依赖型集聚区的出现（也被称为无墙庇护所 (asylum-without-walls) 沃尔科， 1981）。
en: The rapid closure of psychiatric hospitals in the state led to the creation of service-dependent ghettoes (also termed the ‘asylum-without-walls’, Wolch, 1981).

zh: 从前的隐性精神病人被限制在环境恶劣的邻里中，而规划立法则将基于社区的设施规划在更加富裕的地区。
en: Former in-patients have become restricted to poorer-quality neighbourhoods as zoning legislation has kept community-based facilities outside more affluent areas.

zh: 为了获得利益，基于社区的服务业已经得到了发展，但是其中一些服务业相对规模较大，拥有一百多名从业者，并且已经开始具有一些老的精神病院的机构特征。
en: For-profit community-based services have been developed but some of these are now relatively large with over a hundred occupants and are beginning to reproduce some of the institutional features of the older mental hospitals.

zh: 由于财政紧缩限制了在基于社区形式的服务业上的投资，这使得精神病人的问题更加严重化。
en: Fiscal retrench-ment has served to exacerbate the problems of mentally-ill persons by restricting funds for community-based forms of care.

zh: 此外，一些内城地区的绅士化和城市更新也制约了基于社区设施的发展。
en: In addition, the gentrification and urban renewal of some inner city areas have led to curbs on these community-based facilities.

zh: 其结果导致了无家可归者的增加，他们睡在街边“棚户区”。
en: The consequence has been increased homelessness, with people sleeping on the streets in ‘cardboard cities’.

zh: 有时汽车载着满车的精神病患者或者显性精神病患者在医院或者监狱之间穿梭——这是一个再机构化的过程。
en: Sometime the wheel has turned full circle with mentally-ill or ex-psychiatric patients ending up in hospital or prison – a process of reinstitutionalization.

zh: 吸引物和目的地包括旅游景点吸引物、自然吸引物、建筑吸引物以及人类文化、遗产吸引物，它们可以为旅游者提供各种不同的旅游体验。
en: Attractions and destinations offer a plethora of  travel experiences ranging from  site-specific attractions to natural attractions, built attractions and human cultural/heritage attractions.

zh: 在复合而成的旅游体验中有许多交织在一起的相关利益者：旅游供应商、接待供应商、居民和旅游者以及政府机构和部门。
en: There is a mix of interested stakeholders within the composite experience: travel suppliers, hospitality suppliers, residents and tourists, and government agencies and departments.

zh: 研究旅游吸引物和目的地应该采用多学科的视角，同时存在跨学科研究的潜力。
en: Research into tourism attractions and destinations enables a multidisciplinary perspective to be adopted, as well as the potential for interdisciplinary research.

zh: 在随机抽样中，研究者可以使用多种表格来帮助决定样本容量。
en: There are various tables available to researchers to assist in decision making regarding sample size in probability samples.

zh: 本章后边罗列了一些这样的表格。随机抽样方法较多，包括：简单随机抽样（simplerandom sampling）、系统抽样（systematic sampling）、分层随机抽样（stratified random sampling）和多阶整群抽样（multistage cluster sampling）。
en: Examples of such tables are presented later in the chapter.There are a number of random sampling approaches: simple random sampling, systematic sampling, stratified random sampling and multistage cluster sampling.

zh: 我们迫切需要一种社会主义的先锋运动来表达那种政治学。
en: We badly need a socialist avant-garde movement to express that politics.

zh: 但是，它不可能是那种强制推行单一目标的老式先锋政党。
en: But it cannot be an old-style avant-garde party that imposes a singular goal.

zh: 它也不可能仅仅以德里达那种“终极的后结构幻象”作为武装，那是一种“没有特权、资格和头衔……没有政党、国家、民族共同体的新国际”之幻象。
en: Nor can it function armed only with Derrida 's "ultimate post-structuralist fantasy" of a "New International without status, without title and without name ... without party, without country, without national community" (of above, p. 8).

zh: 以解放方式来塑造社会生态和政治经济变迁，需要的不只是思想和话语(不管思想和话语有多重要）。
en: It will take much more than thought and discourse (however important these may be) to shape socio-ecological and political-economic change in emancipatory ways.

zh: 那种版本的先锋派——现在盘踞于学院，在那里，潜心于对思想和理想之流不知怎地被想象为本身就是激进的和革命的——失去了实质性优势。
en: That version of avant-gardism, now so entrenched in the academy, in which immersion in the flows of thought and ideality is somehow imagined to be radical and revolutionary in itself has no material purchase.

zh: 显著性检验能够使研究者从统计上判定在样本中变量间的关系是否偶然，从而决定是否将这种关系推论至总体（Neman 2000, p. 338; Babbie 1995, PP. 431 ~436)。
en: Tests of significance enable the researcher to determine statisticallywhether a relationship between variables is a chance one in the sample as opposed to being probable in the population (Neuman 2000, p. 338;Babbie 1995, pp. 431-6).

zh: 萨兰塔克斯（1998)在表9-7中说明了非参数检验和参数检验。
en: Sarantakos (1998) refers to non-parametric and parametric tests in table 9.

zh: 参数检验假定所研究的变量在总体中表现为正态分布。
en: 7. Parametric tests assume that the variable being studied reflects a normal distribution in the population.

zh: 非参数检验假定所研究的变量在总体中并不表现为正态分布。
en: Non-parametric tests assume that the variable being studied does not reflect a normal distribution in the population.

zh: 基本上，在定量研究中，研究者既试图接受（支持、证实）假设，又试图拒绝（不支持、证伪)假设。
en: Essentially, in quantitative research, the researcher attempts to either accept (support, confirm) or reject (not support, not confirm) hypotheses.

zh: 但永远也不存在最终的证据(Neuman 2000，p.129)。
en: There is never an ultimate proof (Neuman 2000, p. 129).

zh: 假设被接受或是拒绝取决于显著性水平及被认定是一类错误还是二类错误（Bums 1997，pp.107-111)。
en: Hypotheses are accepted or rejected depending on the levels of significance and consideration of Type I or Type II errors (Burns 1997, pp. 107-111).

zh: 本章将侧重于对时间的第二种看法。
en: This chapter will focus on this second view of time.

zh: 内容包括3部分：第一，描述地理学家研究时间的方法；第二，讨论不同的时间格局；最后，解释我们怎样用关于时间的思想来解释现在。
en: The argument consists of three parts: first, the ways in which geographers have studied time are described; second, different patterns of time are discussed; and, finally, we interpret how we use our ideas about time to interpret the present.

zh: 但是，在介绍两种基本关系——时间与空间和时间与现代性状态——之前，我们还不能切入主题。
en: We cannot begin the argument, however, without introducing two basic relations: time and space, and time and modernity.

zh: 但是不断变化的时空秩序安排也是文化、美学和政治激烈争论的焦点。
en: But changing spatio-temporal orderings have also been the focus of intense cultural, esthetic, and political debate.

zh: 反思这个观点有助于我们理解资本主义时代文化和政治生产领域中产生的某些混乱。
en: Reflection on this idea helps us under-stand some of the turmoil that has occurred within the fields of cultural and political production in the capitalist era.

zh: 回过头来看看，想一想以现代主义(后现代主义被假定为对其的反动)而知名的复杂的文化运动。
en: Consider, glancing backwards, that complex cultural movement known as modernism (against which postmodern-ism is supposedly reacting).

zh: 盖特里尔（Gatrell, 1983)强调这就是“绝对空间”的概念。
en: Gatrell (1983) stresses that this is the concept of absolute space.

zh: 人文地理学家迅速发展了关于空间与距离的新概念——例如，“时间距离”、“费用或经济距离”、“认知距离或感知距离”和“社会距离”等——所有这些都把距离视为一种相对的现象(“相对空间”）。
en: Human geographers quickly developed new ideas about space and distance – for example, ‘time-distance’, ‘cost or economic distance’, ‘cognitive or perceptual distance’ and ‘social distance’  – all of which treat space as a relative phenomenon (relative space).

zh: 最后，这些进展导致了人文地理学家对空间分析的反对，其中许多人现在把空间视为一种社会结构。
en: Ultimately, these developments have led to widespread rejection of spatial analysis by human geographers, many of whom now regard space as a social construct.

zh: 正是从这种内部关系出发，他反对牛顿的思想：时空天生就存在，它们是内容中立的容器，并不关心放置在其中的东西是什么。
en: It was from this standpoint of internal relations that he opposed the Newtonian view that space and time existed in their own right, that they were content neutral containers indifferent with respect to whatever it was that was placed within them.

zh: 相反，他主张，空间总是视实体或物质而定，不过并不是以相对论所理解的那种方式来决定。当地理学家们使用“相对空间”来表明空间如何根据穿其而过的物质而弯曲或变形时，空间也不是由它们来决定的。
en: He argued instead that space was always contingent on substance or matter, not, however, in the way understood in relativity theory or by geographers when they use the term "relative space" to indicate how space gets bent or warped depending on the matter being traversed.

zh: 美国环境正义运动产生的这些条件说明了它的一些主要特点。
en: These conditions of production of an environmental justice movement in the United States account for some of its central features.

zh: 首先，对某些特殊污染——有毒物和危险的污染物——的集中关注把讨论压到了象征问题上，清楚说明了，就如污染那样，这个问题也是有关“地位的诉求和反诉求”的(Douglas，1984:3)。
en: To begin with, the focus on particular kinds of pollution — toxics and dangerous contaminants — loads the discussion towards symbolic questions, making clear that the issue is as much about "claims and counter-claims to status" (cf. Douglas, 1984: 3), as it is about pollution per se.

zh: 这就是使运动具有如此巨大道德力量和道德义愤能量的东西。
en: This is what gives the movement so much of its moral force and capacity for moral outrage.

zh: 但是，如萨兹(Szasz，1994)指出的那样，必然结果是，这项运动严重地依赖污染事件的符号政治学和强有力的媒体肖像。
en: But the corollary, as Szasz (1994) points out, is that the movement relies heavily upon symbolic politics and powerful media icons of pollution incidents.

zh: 我们可以来看一看《纽约时报》1960年8月对一场火灾的报道，这场火灾烧伤了一个出租房里的六个人，这个房子的所有者是市政府。
en: Consider this item from the New York Times in August 1960 about a fire which had injured six persons in a tenement owned by the city.

zh: 报道说,“在2月份消防部门(fire department)给住房部门的一份报告中就指出这个住房处有火灾隐患。”
en: The tenement, reports the paper," had been described as a firetrap in February in a Fire Department report to the Department of Buildings."

zh: 随着分配的变动，例如，随着资本的积聚，随着城乡人口的不同的分配等等，生产也就发生变动。
en: A change in distribution changes production, e.g.concentration of capital, different distribution of the population between town and country, etc.

zh: 最后，消费的需要决定着生产。
en: Finally, the needs of consumption determine production.

zh: 不同要素之间存在着相互作用。
en: Mutual interaction takes place between the different moments.

zh: 在自然提供的其他时间体系中，将有一种绵延性。它为全部感觉事件的次要部分提供最平均的协同。
en: Amid the alternative time-systems that nature offers there will be one with a duration giving the best average cogredience for all the subordinate parts of the percipient event.

zh: 这种绵延将是整个自然总体，它是感知所设定的终点。
en: This duration will be the whole of nature which is the terminus posited by sense-awareness.

zh: 因此，感觉事件的特点决定着直接在自然中呈现的时间体系。
en: Thus the character of the percipient event determines the time-system immediately evident in nature.

zh: 私有化最明显的形式是资产变卖（asset sales),即将公共部门资产卖给私人部门。
例如，英国最重要的、也是最引人注目的资产变卖是在第六章所讨论的地方当局住房的变卖。
en: For example, one of the most important manifestations of asset sales in the United Kingdom has been the sale of local authority housing, as discussed in Chapter 6.

zh: 私有化也可能采用协议出让(comracting-om)的形式，将原先由公共部门承担的责任转给私人组织。
en: Privatization can also take the form of contracting-out – awarding tasks that were previously undertaken by the public sector to private sector organizations.

zh: 通常这样的转让是基于被称为竞争性投标（competitive tendering)的私下协议。
en: Often these contracts are awarded on the basis of secret bidding known as competitive tendering.

zh: 在所有情况下（以阴影曲面表示)泥沙搬运随河流动力加大而增加（图中平行于X轴从前向后）。
en: In all cases (represented by the shaded curved surface), sediment transport increases as stream power increases (going from front to back of the figure, parallel to x ).

zh: 在X2的低值区（分选不好）总有一些泥沙与河流动力相匹配因而能被携带（拾起），因此曲线相对地平滑。
en: At low values of x (poorly sorted), there is always some sediment that matches the available stream power and which, therefore, can be entrained (picked up), so the curve is relatively smooth.

zh: 随着分选程度增加（沿X2轴向右），颗粒大小变得更集中于某一个粒级。
en: With better sorting (further along the x2 axis) the grain size becomes more concentrated at one size group.

zh: 只有当河流动力足以携带该粒级时含沙量才会增加。
en: Only when the stream power is sufficient to entrain that grain size can the sediment load increase.

zh: 随着平均粒径对分选（X2）的比率增大，携带的阈限（搬运某一粒径开始的数值）也增大。
en: The threshold of entrainment (the value at which transport of a given particle size begins) increases as the ratio of mean grain size/sorting (x2) increases.

zh: 研究是一个双重行为。
en: Conducting research is a twofold activity.

zh: 首先，进行研究是为了收集资料或信息。
en: First, you undertake the research process in order to gather data or information.

zh: 其次，通过写作，可使研究从与信息需要有关的研究目标或假说，转向信息收集方法的而促进研究成果报告的完成。
en: Second, you use the writing process to move you from the construction of research aims or hypotheses related to your information needs to the development of your data collection tool(s) and then to the reporting of your findings.

zh: 对一个城市地区的信贷封杀(credit blacklisting )针对的不是个人而是地方本身。
en: Credit blacklisting of city localities is impersonal.

zh: 它并不是作用于单个的居民或经商者,而是整个街区。
en: It operates not against the residents or businessmen, as persons, but against their neighborhoods.

zh: 比如，我认识一个纽约东哈莱姆的一个商人，这个地区刚好是被信贷封杀的地方，这位商人因此得不到用来拓展他正红火的业务和翻新营业场所需要的15,000美元的贷款，但同样是他，在长岛却能很轻松地拿到30,000美元贷款建起一幢住宅房。
en: For example, a merchant with whom I am acquainted in the blacklisted district of East Harlem in New York, unable to get a $15,000 loan for expanding and modernizing his successful business there, had no difficulty raising 30,000 to build a house on Long Island.

zh: 首先，本章重点强调了定量（实证论的或推理演绎的）与定性（非实证论的或整体归纳的）研究方法的主要区别。
en: Initially, this chapter highlights the major differences between the quantitative (positivistic or hypothetico-deductive) and the qualitative (nonpositivistic or holistic-inductive) approaches to research.

zh: 同时探讨了混合方法的运用。
en: It also considers the use of mixed methods.

zh: 接着本章讨论抽样方法以及关于定量与定性研究的信度和效度问题.
en: The chapter then moves on to discuss sampling, and reliability and validity issues associated with qualitative and quantitative research.

zh: 从泽尔纳开始，汉诺领导了两次向南的远征。
en: From Ceme Hanno led two expeditions farther to the south.

zh: 在第二次远征中，他到达了歇尔布罗岛，位于今天塞拉利昂弗里敦之南，距离赤道只有七度。
en: On the second of the two voyages he reached Sherbo Island, south of the present site of Freetown in Sierra Leone, almost seven degrees from the equator.

zh: 在这里他们看到了“身上长满毛的男人和女人”，他们被告知这些人被称为猩猩。
en: Here the explorers came upon “wild men and women with hairy bodies,” who, they were told, were called gorillas.

zh: 结果是，家庭将住房搜索活动集中在有限的搜索空间内，并且因对不同地区的熟悉程度不同而发生空间上的偏向。
en: The upshot is that households concentrate their house-hunting activities within a limited search space that is spatially biased by their familiarity with different districts.

zh: 在行为主义者的术语中，搜索空间是更宽泛的意识空间的子集。意识空间通常被认为是以下二者的产物：人们的活动空间（activity space)或行动空间（即人们在日常活动中经常到达的地方的集合）；和通过诸如广播、电视、报纸甚至口头传播所获得的信息。
en: In behaviouralist terminology, this search space is a subset of a more general awareness space, which is usually regarded as a product of: people’s activity space or action space (the sum of all the places with which people have regular contact as a result of their normal activities); and information from secondary sources such as radio, television, newspapers and even word-of-mouth.

zh: 推动组织的变革有许多途径。
en: There are various ways to instigate change in an organisation.

zh: 变革是一个过程，但也同时与特殊的研究方式——行动研究有关。
en: Change is a process, but it is also associated with a particular research approach — action research.

zh: 行动研究首先是一种解决问题的方法（Burns 1990，1997; Kemmis & Me Taggart 1988; Whyte 1989)。
en: Action research is primarily grounded in a problem-solving approach (Burns 1990, 1997; Kemmis & McTaggart 1988; Whyte 1989).

zh: 从本质上看，行动研究是由同一组织内部具有共同兴趣的一群人设计一个计划，用以改进运营或实践的某些方面。
en: In essence, action research involves a group of people with a common interest within an organisation devising a plan to improve some aspect of operation or practice.

zh: 该计划继而被执行、监督和反馈，这可能导致对于行动研究过程的另一个循环。
en: The plan is subsequently implemented, monitored and reflected upon , which may result in another iteration of the action research process.

zh: 从事行动研究的研究者可能选择使用书面形式、口头形式或可视化的报告。但是对于其中的一些研究者来说，对研究对象做出改变可能是研究的唯一要求，而不需要报告研究结果。
en: Researchers who engage in action research may choose to use written, oral or visual reports, and, for some, the change in the issue being studied may be the only outcome required and no report eventuates.

zh: 但是，这里仍然为行动研究报告提供了一种建议性格式。
en: However, a suggested format for action research reports is provided here.

zh: 就像案例研究一样，行动研究报告可以以科学实验报告的结构为模型（引言、文献综述、方法、结果分析及未来研究计划），也可选择其他不同的模型。
en: As with case studies, the report may be based on the scientific experimental model (introduction, literature review, method, findings and analysis, and future action plans), but there are alternative models.

zh: 在城市里，除了承载交通外，街道还有许多别的用途。城市中的人行道——街道中行人走路的部分——除了承载行人(pedestrians)走路外，也有其他很多用途。这些用途是与交通循环紧密相关的，但是并不能互相替代，就其本质来说，这些用途和交通循环系统一样，是城市正常运转机制的基本要素。
en: Streets in cities serve many purposes besides carrying vehicles,and city sidewalks---the pedestrian parts of the streets---serve many purposes besides carrying pedestrians.These uses are bound up with circulation but are not identical with it and in their own right they arc  at least as basic as circulation to the proper workings of cities.

zh: 作为少数的移民群体能否保持他们“特殊的社会和空间实体”则取决于同化所发生的程度。
en: The maintenance of the minority immigrant group as a distinctive social and spatial entity will depend on the degree to which assimilation occurs.

zh: 这过程依据该群体和特权群体之间所感觉的社会距离，在不同群体中产生不同的同化速度。
en: This process can take place at different speeds for different groups, depending on the perceived social distance between them and the charter group.

zh: 而且，行为同化（behavioural assimilation,即少数群体获得与特权群体一致的文化生活），可能要比结构同化（structural assimilation, 指少数群体的成员扩散到特权群体社会的各种社会和职业阶层中）更快。
en: Moreover, behavioural assimilation --- the acquisition by the minority group of a cultural life in common with the charter group --- may take place faster than structural assimilation --- the diffusion of members of the minority group through the social and occupational strata of the charter group society.

zh: “生态现代化”(Hajer, 1992;Weale, 1992:第3章)就是这种政治学的意识形态口号。
en: "Ecological modernization" (Hajer, 1992; Weale, 1992: chapter 3) is the ideological watchword for such a politics.

zh: 保护自然资源和环境调控(国家以及全球规模)在此将被解释成为可持续未来进行既理性又有效的资源管理。
en: Conservation and environmental regulation (at global as well as at national scale) would here be interpreted as both rational and efficient resource management for a sustainable future.

zh: 例如，公司资本的某些部门，特别是通过提供对地球健康进行监视所必须的技术而持续获益的那些部门，它们发现全球管理意象或者“地球医学”很有吸引力(参阅本书第十三章)。
en: Certain sectors of corporate capital, particularly those which stand to benefit from providing the technology necessary for global monitoring of planetary health, find the imagery of global management or "planetary medicine" very attractive, for example (see below, chapter 13).

zh: 行政文件这些文件产生于商业领域，与公共或私人部门以及非营利组织相关。
en: Administrative documents These documents are generated in the business environment and are associated with the public and private sectors as well as the non-profit sector.

zh: 行政文件包括年度报告、备忘录、会议记录和会议议程、商业信函和内部文件。
en: Administrative documents include annual reports, memoranda, meeting notes and agenda, business correspondence and in-house documentation.

zh: 通常，这些文件需经所有者或“管理者”的允许方能获得。
en: Usually, these documents are accessed by permission f rom  the auspicating body or via a 'gatekeeper'.

zh: 同样，获得和使用它们可能也需要成本，有些文件可能被禁止使用。
en: Again, there may be costs associated with accessing and using these documents.There may also be sanctions against their use.

zh: 在拟稿和修订阶段，作者的主要目标是确保文章淸楚地表达了他们的意图。
en: During the drafting and the revising stages, the writer's key focus should be on clarifying their intent to ensure that the text clearly conveys their meaning.

zh: 在定稿阶段，作者旨在检査标点、句法和语法的问题。
en: In the proofing stage, the writer attends to the issues of punctuation, syntax and grammar.

zh: 在出版阶段，作者应以个人或专业的方式完成最终文本,并进行润饰而将其展示给合适的读者。
en: The publishing stage involves the writer producing either personally or professionally the final document in polished form for dissemination to the appropriate audiences.

zh: 表5-2提供了计算商店均衡数量的数字示例。
en: Table 5-2 provides a numerical example that shows bow to compute the equilibrium number of stores.

zh: 人均需求4张CD，人口密度为每平方英里50人，则需求密度（demand density)(每平方英里CD需求量，等d乘以e)是200。
en: Per capita demand is four CDs and population density is 50 people per square mile, so demand density (CD demand per square mile, equal to d times e) is 200.

zh: 如果该地区面积为300平方英里，那么总需求最是60000张CD（200乘以300)。
en: The region has an area of 300 square miles, so total demand is 60,000 CDs (200 times 300).

zh: 在这些方面，权力常被概念化为“纪律性权力”，是一种到处扩散的、不确定位置的力量，它渗透到各个层次的社会阶层，并且在多重的、调解斡旋的网络中以间接的而且往往让人捉摸不定的方式被重新创造出来。
en: Power is conceptualized as a diffuse and unlocatable force, that permeates all levels of society and that is reproduced in indirect and often erratic ways through multiple mediatory networks.

zh: 这样，所有个体都处于既运用权力又受制于权力的地位。
en: In this way, all individuals are both in a position of simultaneously exercising power but also being subject to it.

zh: 对抗强调的是，个人或小团体在这些或其他来源的权力和压制之下，对其处境进行改造的方式。
en: Resistance places the emphasis on the way individuals and groups find ways of reworking their situation in the face of power and oppression.

zh: 人类行为被看做是基于“实践知觉”之上的，这意味着我们对自身的行为和他人的行为产生感知的方式，以及我们概括世界意义的方式，都根植于H复一H的惯常化实践中，而这些时间占据着我们头脑中有意识与非意识之间的某个地方。
en: Human action is seen as being based on ‘practical consciousness’, meaning that the way in which we make sense of our own actions and the actions of others, and the way we generate meaning in the world is rooted in routinized day-to-day practices that occupy a place in our minds somewhere between the conscious and the unconscious.

zh: 个人实践与社会实践通过惯常化行为 (时空惯常化）重复而持续地再生产，对社会一体化以及特定地方行为主体之间的社会系统与结构的发展做出贡献。
en: Recursivity, the continual reproduction of individual and social practices through routine actions (time–space routinization), contributes to social integration, the development of social systems and structures among agents in particular locales.

zh: 另外，结构和社会系统可以通过系统一体化跨越更广阔的空间和时间而发展。这种系统一体化是通过时空延展而发生：随着理念、态度和概念等通过印刷品和电子媒介的广泛传播，
en: In addition, structures and social systems can be seen to develop across broader spans of space and time through system integration, which takes place through time–space distanciation: the ‘stretching’ of social relations over time and space as ideas, attitudes and norms are spread through print and electronic media, for example.

zh: 正如自然环境中有各种表征单个地方的方式一样，对相互关联的地区也有各种表征方法——用系统模型来表示。
en: Just as there are ways of characterizing individual places in physical environments, there are also ways in which adjacent places are interrelated, expressed in system models.

zh: 这种关联可能表现为构成相互嵌套的级序系统一部分的流域，也可能通过能流互相联系，像一系列小瀑布那样，从一个子系统的输出变成下一个子系统的输入。
en: Such relationships may arise as drainage basins forming part of a nested hierarchy, or they may be linked by energy flows in the way that cascading systems have been recognized as structures with output from one subsystem forming input to the next.

zh: 能够鉴别出气候（气候序列）、地形（地形序列）、岩石（岩石序列）、生态（生态序列）和时间（时间序列）等方面地方特征的序列。
en: Sequences of the character of places can be identified for climate (climosequences), relief (toposequences), lithology (lithosequences), ecology (biosequences), and time (chronosequences).

zh: 研究是一种运用科学的严谨性和学术的敏锐性去收集关于某些现象信息的活动。
en: Research is an activity that gathers information on a phenomenon using scientific rigour and academic acumen.

zh: 在社会科学中有用以描述可操作的研究类型的各种分类系统。
en: Within the social sciences, various classification systems exist to describe the types of research that can be undertaken.

zh: 例如，研究可被分为纯理论的和应用性的研究；或分为探索性的、描述性的、解释性的、因果关系的、比较性的、评价性的和预测性的研究。
en: For example, research may be described as pure or applied; or as exploratory, descriptive, explanatory, causal, comparative, evaluative or predictive.

zh: 研究也可被分为定性研究和定量研究，或两相结合(混合性）的研究。
en: Research can also be described as being qualitative or quantitative or mixed method research.

zh: 以上这些分类会使刚刚接触学术论文的人感到困惑。
en: All these descriptors can be confusing to a person who is engaging with research literature/texts for the first time.

zh: 正如你所看到的，上述引文与本章开头的引言之间存在着某些相似性。通过学习旅游研究方法，你将对提升澳大利亚整体旅游研究水平作出贡献。
en: As you can see, there is some similarity between this quote and the quote at the start of the chapter, and by studying tourism research you are contributing to the improvement of the research capabilities of Australian tourism.

zh: 接下来的行业透视，探讨了一些能对澳大利亚旅游发展作出贡献的其他途径。
en: The following Industry Insight discusses another way you can contribute to the development of tourism within Australia.
To enable the research to go 'public'.

zh: 使研究结果公布于众：在进行旅游研究时，研究者是对公众或影响公众的现象进行研究，所以研究者应该将研究结果反馈给公众。
en: In conducting tourism research,researchers are studying the public or phenomena that impact on the public, so researchers should give something back.

zh: 研究结果的公布与研究道德，特别是与互惠性有关。
en: Disclosure of research findings is associated with research ethics, particularly reciprocity.

zh: 研究报告也使研究者将他们的研究结果传播给范围更广的读者。
en: Research reports also enable researchers to disseminate their findings to a wider audience.

zh: 《纽伦堡法典》的两个最直接的贡献就是研究参与者的自愿参与和知情同意。
en: Two direct outcomes of the Nuremberg Code are voluntary participation and informed consent by research participants.

zh: “知情同意是研究中最基本的伦理准则。参与者应该完全了解研究的目的和本质，并且是在不受强制情况下同意参与”（Burns 1997, p.18)。
en: ' [Informed consent] is the most fundamental ethical principle that is involved [in research]. Participants must understand the nature and purpose of the research and must consent to participate without coercion' (Burns 1997, p. 18).

zh: 旅游研究中可以使用的不同研究方法。
en: The different research methodologies that can be used in tourism research.

zh: 基本上，有两种类型的研究方法：定性方法和定量方法。
en: Primarily, there are two classifications for research methodologies: qualitative and quantitative methodologies.

zh: 定性研究通常用于解释社会学，批评理论，女性主义视角和后现代主义范式。
en: Qualitative methodologies are predicated to the interpretive social sciences, critical theory, feminist perspectives and postmodern paradigms.

zh: 总而言之，解释社会学范式是建立在社会行为的真实世界背景之上的。
en: To summarise, the interpretive social sciences paradigm is founded in the real-world setting of social action.

zh: 这种范式要求研究者成为被研究的社会群体的一部分，保持主观性并使用定性研究方法论。
en: The paradigm requires the researcher to become part of the social group being studied, to be subjective and to use a qualitative research methodology.

zh: 因此，这种范式所构建的有关世界的理论借助的是归纳的方法。

en: As a result, knowledge of the world is thereby constructed inductively.

zh: 在研究计划的准备过程中，务必确保信息的完整性，提供包括引言、文献综述、方法论、工作进度表、经费预算表、参考文献和简历等方面的信息。
en: When preparing your research proposal, ensure that you provide information on all sections: the introduction, literature review, methodology, time line, budget, references and curriculum vitae.

zh: 保证准时提交研究计划，过晚提交的计划一般不会被接受。
en: Ensure that the pro- posal is submitted on time, as late submissions are generally not accepted.

zh: 同时确保研究计划整体形式的专业性，所有必要的附件一应俱全。
en: Furthermore, ensure that the proposal has been professionally presented and all attachments have been included.

zh: 在计划书最后，还需附求职信一封，说明申请者的兴趣、核心能力及具体联系方式。
en: To complete the overall proposal, prepare a covering letter indicating your interest, key skills and contact details.

zh: 实施研究设计集中体现在两个主要的活动上：资料收集和资料分析。
en: Implementing the research design is focused on two major activities: data collection and data analysis.

zh: 两种活动都涉及研究的伦理问题，也与资料收集和分析过程中的研究者行为的伦理相关。
en: Both activities are associated with ethical issues relating to permission to conduct the study and to the researcher acting ethically during data collection and analysis.

zh: 在这一阶段中，研究者也需要组织一次前测。
en: Also in this phase, the researcher will be involved in running a pilot of the study.

zh: 从某种意义上来说，前测是就最终要进行调査研究的同一个总体进行的实验性资料收集和分析过程。
en: The pilot is in a sense a trial run of the data collection tools (and analysis) using the same sample population that will be used in the final study.

zh: 研究设计的实施包括“田野工作”和收集资料（在前面的例子中，进行焦点群体调查或进行电话调査以及进行资料分析，都属于这种情况）。
en: Implementing the research design involves 'field work' and completing the data collection (in the above examples, either running a focus group or conducting a telephone survey, and commencing and completing the data analysis).

zh: 在探讨未来所要进行的旅游研究之前，本章对旅游和接待部门当前以及潜在的研究需要加以关注。
en: Prior to discussing tourism research in the future, the chapter focuses on the current and potential research needs of the travel and hospitality sectors.

zh: 在这两个部门中存在大量的项目有待研究，下面将列举部分例子。
en: There is a large variety of research projects to be undertaken in both sectors.Some examples are presented below.

zh: 这些例子还都仅仅是一些建议，并不能代表每一部门中所能确定的所有研究问题。
en: The examples are suggestions only and do not represent a comprehensive listing of all research opportunities within each of the sectors identified.

zh: 在阅读每一部分的时候,还需思考其他的研究问题。
en: As you read through each sector, you should be able to think of other research opportunities.

zh: 所有研究的开展都必须要遵守一定的伦理规范。
en: All research must be undertaken in an ethical manner.

zh: 对应用性研究来说更是如此，因为委托人可能会在研究设计或报告中倾向于某种偏见。
en: This is especially relevant for applied research, as the client may angle for a bias in the research design or reporting.

zh: 研究者是受道德标准约束的，因而这种倾向是不可接受的。
en: Researchers are bound by ethical standards and such angling is not acceptable.

zh: 研究者在进行符合道德规范的研究时，必须对他们自己、学术界、公众和发起人负责。
en: Researchers must be responsible to themselves, the scientific community, the public and their sponsors in conducting ethical research.

zh: 时间是一个框架，其中地貌事件常常被用以推断因果关系。
en: Time is a framework in which geomorphological events are often placed to infer cause-and-effect relationships.

zh: 历史地貌学（historic geomorphology）用这个框架重构过去。演化地貌学（evolutionary geomorphology）试图根据过程演绎来论证地形如何随时间而发育——时间的轨迹是什么?
en: Historic geomorphology uses this framework to recon- struct the past.Evolutionary geomorphology attempts to argue from process deduc- tions about how landforms develop in time – what are the trajectories through time?

zh: 研究者一般总是始于某个假设，这个假设是运用演绎法得出的，建立在经验事实的基础之上。
en: The researcher usually commences with a hypothesis, which has been deductively derived and based on empirically validated facts.

zh: 演绎的过程包括对关于自然界和社会运转方式的理论的检验。
en: The process of deduction involves the testing of theories about the way the natural and social worlds operate.

zh: 利用一个理论，研究者将提出一种假设，这一假设随后将被检验，以测定提出这一假设所依据的理论解释某种具体行为或现象的准确性。
en: Using a theory, the researcher will generate a hypothesis that is then tested to determine the veracity of the theory for explaining a specific behaviour or phenomena.

zh: 换句话说，理论是经过演绎得出的，并在经验领域得到检验。
en: That is, theory is deduced and then tested in the empirical world.

zh: 其他学者如纳克斯（1952）则强调有弹性的资本供给。
en: Other authors, such as Nurkse (1952), stressed the elasticity of capital supply.

zh: 特别值得一提的是，赫希曼（1958）不厌其烦地强调投资机会可以在多大程度上带来更多的储蓄。
en: In particular, Hirschman (1958) emphasized at length the extent to which investment opportunities could bring forth additional savings.

zh: 再说句题外话，20世纪50年代，许多发展经济学家大概已经意识到有弹性的要素供给对发展过程中的外部经济而言也十分重要。
en: Again it may be stretching the point, but many development theorists in the 1950s seem to have been aware that elasticity of factor supply was also crucial to an external economy story of development.

zh: 在考虑测量问题的同时又产生若干问题，即分辨率、仪器设备、准确度和精密度、维度等问题，这些问题对自然科学和地理学的对比而言，都是相互联系的。
en: Several further issues arise when considering measurement; those of resolution, instrumentation, precision and accuracy, and dimensionality all provide interrelated grounds for comparison of the physical sciences and geography.

zh: 科学上的简化论者（reductionist）倾向于把科学推向研究越来越小尺度的、要求观察测量技术分辨率越来越高的现象。
en: The reductionist tendency in science has driven it to examine phenomena of ever-smaller scale, demanding increasing resolution of techniques for observation and measurement.

zh: 与此相联系的是把观察中视觉的感知和开发一些仪器帮助“观看”这些现象置于首要地位。
en: Linked with this is the primacy of the visual sense in observation, and the development of instruments to assist in ‘seeing’ these phenomena.

zh: 我们能够理解“物”之(矛盾的)质和量属性的唯一方式是理解构造它们的和内在于它们的过程和关系。
en: The only way we can understand the (contradictory) qualitative and quantitative attributes of "things" is by understanding the processes and relationships which constitute them and which they internalize.

zh: 除了通过内在于我的新陈代谢的、社会的和其他的过程，否则就不能理解作为个体的我。
en: I, as an individual, cannot be understood except by way of the metabolic, social, and other processes which I internalize.

zh: 无论如何，这暗示着，我必然使异质性以及一系列关联在一起的矛盾内在化。
en: This implies, however, that I necessarily internalize heterogeneity and a bundle of associated contradictions.

zh: 多元回归分析是多元分析的另一种形式。
en: Multiple regression is another form of multivariate analysis.

zh: 多元回归分析调査研究了几个自变量对因变量的影响。
en: Multiple regression investigates the effect of several independent variables on a dependent variable.

zh: 它用于定距和定比测量层次的数据，且通常使用统计软件包进行计算。
en: It is used with data measured at interval and ratio levels and is generally calculated using statistical software packages.

zh: 同样，许多批评主流经济学狭隘的人并不理解这个领域是什么或能做什么。
en: It is also the case that many of those who criticize mainstream economics for its narrowness don't understand what the field is or can do.

zh: 在最粗浅的水平上，他们根本不了解经济学是什么：杰伊•福雷斯特（Jay Forrester) 是系统动力学的创始人，他曾经在给一个批评其工作的经济学家的回答中称“诺德豪斯（Nordhaus）和所有的经济学家一样，只从单向因果关系来思考问题——他不明白变量之间可能同时相互影响。”
en: At the crudest level, they simply have no idea what economics is about: Jay Forrester, founder of system dynamics, once replied to an economist who criticized his work by asserting that "Nordhaus, like all economists, only thinks in terms of one-way causation, he doesn't understand that variables may simultaneously affect each other."

zh: 确实，每一个卓越的理论家都倾向诉诸一种特殊的“永恒”（环节）结构，把各种“环节”之间的关系固定下来，从而使社会获得结构化秩序。
en: Each major theorist, it is true, tends to appeal to a particular structure of permanences" (elements) that transfix relations between the various moments" to give a structured order to a society.

zh: 常常会出现这种情况：使这种或那种环节具有优先地位，成为社会变迁的核心。

en: And there is often some sort of privileging of one or other moment as the locus of social change.

zh: 这样一种结构化的系统似乎把社会过程囚禁在再生产的循环因果关系的铁笼之中（如马克思的“资本的逻辑”、韦伯的“官僚制的一技术的合理性”，或者斯潘德的“语言的牢笼”）。
en: Such a structured system seems to imprison the social process in an iron cage of reproductive circular causality (such as Marx's "logic of capital," Weber's "bureaucratic-technocratic rationality" or Spender's "prison-house of language").

zh: 隐私(privacy)在城市中是很珍贵的、不可缺少的。
en: Privacy is precious in cities.

zh: 也许在任何地方它都是非常珍贵和不可缺少的，但是在很多地方，人们得不到隐私。在一些小地方，每个人都知道别人的事情。
en: It is indispensable.Perhaps it is precious and indispensable everywhere, but in most places you cannot get it.In small settlements everyone knows your affairs.

zh: 另一方面，当参与者不被告知或者压根没觉察（意识）到他们已经被研究时，就属于隐性研究。
en: Covert research, on the other hand, involves research in which the participants are not informed or aware of their participation.

zh: 帕顿(1990)提到，关于隐性研究的使用，学术界存在两种截然相反的观点。
en: As Patton (1990) notes, there are two diametrically opposing opinions regarding the use of covert research in the scientific community.

zh: 一种观点反对使用隐性研究，另一种观点则持支持的态度。
en: One opinion rejects the use of covert research and the other supports it.

zh: 相应的，这些观点在史尔斯（1959, in 1990)和道格拉斯（1976, in Patton 1990)的文章中得到了充分的描述，在没有得到被观察者明确允许的情况下，史尔斯不主张对私人行动进行观察，尽管这在技术上是可行的，因为这属于一种“缺乏道德考虑的操作”（Shils 1959, in Patton 1990, p. 210)。
en: These views are best portrayed by the opinions of Shils (1959, in Patton 1990) and Douglas (1976, in Patton 1990), respectively.Shils rejects the use of 'observations of private behavior, however technically feasible, without the explicit and fully informed permission of the person to be observed', as it is 'morally obnoxious . . . manipulation' (Shils 1959, in Patton 1990, p. 210).

zh: 应用性研究是用来收集与某些问题、论题或规划有关的信息的一般性研究。
en: Applied research is generally research that is designed to gather information relating to a problem, issue or planning need.

zh: 这类研究的操作主体一般包括:学术机构、学者、研究机构、政府部门和本地、州、国家等各层次的实体、旅游业组织和协会、旅游经营商、旅游业部门协会、社区。
en: This type of research is undertaken by academics, scholars, research agencies, government agencies and bodies at the local, regional and national level, tourism organisations and associations, tourism operators, tourism industry sector associations, and the community.

zh: 为了从事应用性研究而收集信息的研究者，也可能是受某些赞助人或委托人的委托而进行此项研究，下面的行业透视就可以说明这一点。
en: Researchers who engage in data collection for applied research may be working for a sponsor or a client, as is illustrated by the following Industry Insight.

zh: 在这个模型中产生外部经济有两个必要条件。
en: Two conditions are necessary to generate external economies in this model.

zh: 第一，生产中必须存在规模经济。
en: First, there must be economies of scale in production.

zh: 这很直观：如果现代部门没有固定成本，那么现代厂商是否获利并不取决于采用现代技术的其他厂商的数量。
en: This is obvious from the geometry: if there were no fixed costs in the modern sector, the profitability of modern firms would not depend on how many other firms were using modern techniques.

zh: 卡尔霍恩（1962）在他著名的鼠类行为研究中论述到，拥挤会导致进攻倾向以及失聪、同性恋和撕咬幼崽等。
en: Calhoun (1962), for example, in his celebrated studies of rat behaviour, showed that crowding led to aggression, listlessness, promiscuity, homosexuality and the rodent equivalent of juvenile delinquency.

zh: 将这类观点直接用来解释人类行为，就会导致人们认为拥挤是“杀人狂”。
en: Projecting these ideas directly to human behaviours leads to the idea of crowded urbanites as ‘killer apes’.

zh: 反对拥挤理论的批评认为，将动物行为直接扩展到人类本身就犯了很明显的错误：人类不是鼠类；人类是否天生有领地感觉尚不能确定；现实中最拥挤的贫民窟也达不到试验中动物所处的拥挤程度。
en: Critics of crowding theory have emphasized the obvious dangers involved in extending animal behaviour to humans: people are not rats; it is by no means certain that humans possess any innate sense of territoriality; and in any case even the most crowded slums do not approach the levels of crowding to which experimental animals have been subjected.

zh: 结构化系统以及作为其组成部分的单个物，它们的辩证概念完全建立在对过程和关系理解之上，借助这些过程和关系，物和结构化系统才得以构造。这个观点在直觉上并非自明的，因为我们总是处在“物”的包围之中，这些物似乎具有永久的和固定的特点，很难想象它们是流动的。因此，我们不能轻视怀特海(1985:137)所言“永恒”之物的意义，即我们每天会遇到无数的“实际上不灭的物体”，离开它们，物质和生物生命可能不再如我们现在所知的那样存在。
en: A dialectical conception of both the individual "thing and the structured system of which it is a part rests entirely on an understanding of the processes and relations by which thing and structured system are constituted. This idea is not intuitively self-evident since we are surrounded by "things" that seem to have such a permanent and solid character that it is difficult to imagine them as somehow in flux. We cannot downplay, therefore, the significance of what Whitehead (1985: 137) calls "permanences" – the innumerable "practically indestructible objects" that we daily encounter in the world and without which physical and biological life would not and could not exist as we now know it.

zh: 1914年，怀特海发表了一篇题为“相关性空间理论”的论文。
en: Whitehead published a paper entitled "La Théorie Relationniste de l'Espace" in 1914.

zh: 他的主要评注者和传记作者维克多•洛威认为论文写得又臭又长，但它在怀特海从早期向后期的过渡中占据了关键的位置。早期是与罗素合作写《数学原理》的怀特海，后期则是对过程和有机论哲学进行详细解释的怀特海。
en: Judged poorly written and overlong by his primary expositor and biographer Victor Lowe (1962: 178), it nevertheless occupied a pivotal transitional role between the early Whitehead that collaborated with Russell on Principia Mathematica and the later Whitehead that expounded upon a philosophy of process and organism.

zh: 第一种做法是对理论解释能力的判断。
en: The first is a judgement about the explanatory power of a theory.

zh: 这就提出了解释与预测之间的不对称性问题；正如任何统计学预测模型在经济学或水文学中所展示的那样，解释的能力并不意味着预测的能力。
en: This introduces the asymmetry between explanation and prediction; the capacity to predict does not imply an ability to explain, as any statistical forecasting model in economics or hydrology demonstrates.

zh: 所以，对旨在提供解释的理论的预测检验生来就是自相矛盾的，而且还需要某些东西。
en: A predictive test of a theory that purports to provide explanation is inherently inconsistent, therefore, and something is required in addition.

zh: 预测法包括预言的使用。
en: Forecasting involves the use of prediction.

zh: 预言的质量取决于建构或应用预言机制的人的技巧和专门技术(Mill & Morrison 1992)。
en: The quality of the predictions is dependent on the skill and expertise of those who have constructed or applied the mechanisms for making the predictions (Mill & Morrison 1992).

zh: 基本上，预测法可以使用数学方程、统计法或专家估测(Mill & Morrison 1992)。
en: Essentially, forecasting can be conducted using mathematical formulae, statistical methods or expert guesstimates (Mill & Morrison 1992).

zh: 域分析由詹姆斯•斯普莱德雷提出（Neuman 2000)。
en: Domain analysis is founded in the work of James Spradley (Neuman 2000).

zh: 斯普莱德雷（Spradley 1980)使用域作为描述文化环境主要的分类单元。
en: Spradley (1980) used domains as the main classifying unit for describing cultural settings.

zh: 文化环境中包含着各种不同的域。
en: Within cultural settings, various domains can be determined.

zh: 域主要用于组织构想或概念。
en: Domains are primarily organising ideas or concepts.

zh: 在进行假设检验的过程中，通常至少涉及两个变量——自变量和因变量。
en: If you are testing a hypothesis, there will be at least two variables —an independent variable and a dependent variable.

zh: 实际上，“定量研究的语言就是变量以及变量间关系的语言”（Neuman 2000, p.126)。
en: In fact, ' the language of quantitative research is a language of variables and relationships among variables' (Neuman 2000, p. 126).

zh: 自变量有时也被称为原因变量（Neuman 2000)或改变变量（Kumar 1996)。
en: The independent variable is sometimes referred to as the causal variable (Neuman 2000) or change variable (Kumar 1996).

zh: 因变量也可称为结果变量（Kumar 1996)。
en: The dependent variable is also referred to as the outcome variable (Kumar 1996).

zh: 在位：术语“在位”、“出位”建立于人类学的基础上，意指关于一个现象的数据收集方法。
en: Emic: The terms emic and etic are founded in anthropology and refer to ways of gathering data about a phenomenon.

zh: 在位视角以研究背景为基础。
en: An emic perspective grounds the study in the setting being studied.

zh: 有时候是指研究者成为一个研究群体/背景的一员或“局内人”，运用基于背景的相关知识，并利用被研究的群体的视角和语言来描述所研究的现象。
en: It is sometimes referred to as 'insider' research as the researcher becomes as one with the research setting/group and uses the knowledge bases of the setting, the people and the latter's explanations and language to describe the phenomenon being studied.

zh: 它代表了一种“主观的”认识论，并且与整体一归纳范式（holistic - inductive)相关联。
en: This represents a 'subjective' epistemology and is associated with the holistic-inductive paradigm.

zh: 目前，会议论文的体裁发生了变化，因为会议论文的目的已经超越其初衷，人们更加注重于提供书面文本。
en: Now, however, conference papers are moving beyond the original purpose of the genre, and there is a heavier focus on providing a written text document.

zh: 从全国的范围看，这种关键性的改变，其动力是政府对大学的资助，以及各种研究机构对不同的论文体裁的奖掖方式的变化。
en: Nationally, the change in focus is being driven by government funding to universities and the awarding of varying research points for different research genres.

zh: 一些研究机构更加鼓励提交完整的、经过双盲评审的会议论文，也很关注能否在会议论文集中发表。
en: Greater points are earned for a conference paper that is a full paper and has been peer reviewed, as well as being published in conference proceedings.

zh: 而一份很简短的摘要而且没有在会议论文集中发表的会议论文是不能获得经费资助的。
en: No points are earned for a conference paper that has been accepted based only on a short abstract and has not been published in conference proceedings.

zh: 时间使得在一个年代里成本昂贵的建筑成为另一个年代里价格廉租的抢手货。时间可以帮助付清最初的成本，折旧(depreciation)费可以在建筑所应有的产出中体现出来。
en: Time makes the high building costs of one generation the bargains of a following generation.Time pays off original capital costs, and this depreciation can be reflected in the yields required from a building.

zh: 对某些企业来说，时间使得建筑的一些结构过时了，但对另一些企业来说则正好有用。
en: Time makes certain structures obsolete for some enterprises, and they become available to others.

zh: 问题非常清楚了，我是在不同层次上使用不同抽象概念来操作的。
en: I was operating, it became plain, at a different level and with different kinds of abstraction.

zh: 但是，运动、研究和那本书的动力都不是来自我。
en: But the impetus for the campaign, the research, and the book did not come from me.

zh: 它源自工厂战斗性工会传统的奇特力量。
en: It arose out of the extraordinary strength and power of a tradition of union militancy emanating from the plant.

zh: 这种传统具有自己的国际主义理解和普遍真理的假设，尽管这也可能陷入这种情形：由于相当狭溢的托洛茨基式修辞，它面临着自己的困境并相当僵化，这种困难与我和哈特尔视角之间的更为根本的冲突差不多。
en: This tradition had its own version of internationalism and presumptions to universal truth, although a case could be made that its capture and ossification by a rather narrow Trotskyist rhetoric was as much a part of the problem as the more fundamental conflict between Hayter's and my perspective.

zh: 后殖民地研究对真实性（authenticity)这个概念提出了置疑。真实性观点认为，存在一种基础的、纯粹的、根本性的文化。
en: Postcolonial studies therefore dispute the notion of authenticity --- the idea that there is some basic, pure, underlying culture.

zh: 文化不可避免地会混合，而真实性这个错误的概念却刺激了（并将继续刺激）许多民族主义运动的产生。
en: Cultures are inevitably hybrid mixtures and yet the mistaken notion of authenticity is one that has fuelled (and continues to fuel) many nationalist movements.

zh: 在另一个不同的领域，可以认为，对于反映了一些纯粹的、根本的、没有被西方社会重商主义所玷污的文化的“真实的”、“种族的”音乐的错误渴求，解释了所谓的“世界”音乐广为流行的原因。
en: In a different realm, it can be suggested that the mistaken desire for‘authentic’, ‘ethnic’music reflecting some pure, underlying, culture, untainted by the commercialism of Western society, explains much of the popularity of so-called  ‘world’music.

zh: 抽样基本上分为概率抽样和非概率抽样。
en: Sampling is primarily either non-probability or probability based.

zh: 非概率抽样包括就近抽样、目标式抽样、滚雪球抽样和专家抽样。
en: Non-probability sampling includes convenience, purposive, snowball sampling and expert sampling.

zh: 概率抽样包括简单随机抽样（抽签方法、名称方法、出生日期或电脑方法）、系统抽样、分层抽样和多阶整群抽样。
en: Probability sampling includes simple random sampling (lottery method, first name, date of birth or computer-generated methods), stratified sampling, cluster sampling and multi-stage sampling.

zh: 使用集中趋势量数以及频数分布的图形描述，调査者能够陈述频数分布的本质。
en: Using the measures of central tendency and graphical representation of frequency distributions, researchers can make statements about the nature of frequency distributions.

zh: 既有正态分布也有偏态分布。

en: Distributions can be normal or skewed.

zh: 在正态分布中，平均值、中位数及众数集中在同一点上,用一个钟形曲线表示[参见图9 - 8(a)]。
en: In normal distributions, the mean, median and mode are clustered around the same point and represent a bell-shaped curve (see figure 9.8(a)).

zh: 误解是由下述假设产生的，即对“成功”的衡量要看预测与观察之间是否密切相关。
如同上文所阐释的那样，这样一种实验结果只不过导致另一种实验，直至一种证伪能够带来对基础理论的修正为止；因此，正是经验主义的失败带来成功理论的发展。
en: As explained above, such an outcome of experimentation merely leads to another experiment, until a falsification can bring about modification of the underlying theory; it is therefore empirical failure that brings successful theoretical development.

zh: 波珀主义者对实验成功含义的修正意味着对某种理论真实性的主张，在科学上（正如它在其他知识分支上那样）是一种更加微妙和复杂的过程。
en: This Popperian revision of the meaning of experimental success implies that warranting the truth claims of a given theory is a much more subtle and complex process in the sciences, just as it is in other branches of knowledge.

zh: 这并不是说，解放了的空间是不可能建构的，不可能在真实的或比喻的意义上把空间的社会建构用作革命政治战略的要素。
en: This is not to say that liberated spaces are impossible to construct, that social constructions of spatiality cannot be used, in either a real or metaphorical sense, as strategic elements within revolutionary politics.

zh: 需要特别强调的是，它也不意味着，“来自边缘的声音”不值得倾听，或与反资本主义统治的政治斗争无关。
en: Nor, most emphatically, does it mean that "voices from the margin" are not worth listening to or irrelevant to political struggle against capitalist domination.

zh: 事实上，如我将在下文试图表明的那样，政治战略的空间化(地理政治学)对于任何形式的解放政治学来说都是至关重要的。
en: Indeed, as I shall later hope to show, a spatializing of political strategies (geopolitics) is crucial for any form of emancipatory politics.

zh: 18世纪政治经济学的一个副作用是，把统治自然看作解放和自我实现的必要条件。
en: One side-effect of eighteenth century political economy was that the domination of nature was viewed as a necessary prerequisite to emancipation and self-realization.

zh: 为了按照人的意图来控制自然，为了市场交换而开采自然，甚至根据人的设计来教化自然(并出售它的质量)，就需要复杂的自然知识。
en: Sophisticated knowledge of nature was required in order to manipulate the natural world to human purposes, to exploit it for market exchange, even to humanize it (and sell its qualities) according to human design.

zh: 但是，统治命题绝非故意包含对自然世界的破坏和掠夺。
en: But the thesis of domination never deliberately embraced the destruction and despoliation of the natural world.

zh: 管制理论在初期发展阶段所关注的一个焦点，是民族国家之间不断变化的关系。
en: A key focus of regulation theory as it was originally developed is the changing relationships between national states.

zh: 因此，可以认为，福特主义体系是以第二次世界大战之后一段时期内美国对世界经济的支配为基础，正如其构建于布雷顿森林金融系统一样（莱森和思里夫特, 1997）。
en: Thus, it is argued that the Fordist system was based around the dominance of the United States over the world economy in the period immediately after the Second World War, as structured by the Bretton Woods financial system (Leyshon and Thrift, 1997).

zh: 该系统以美元为交换中介的基础建立起货币间的固定汇率。
en: This system created fixed exchange rates between currencies, based around the US dollar as the medium of exchange.

zh: 《纽伦堡法典》的两个最直接的贡献就是研究参与者的自愿参与和知情同意。
en: Two direct outcomes of the Nuremberg Code are voluntary participation and informed consent by research participants.

zh: “知情同意是研究中最基本的伦理准则。参与者应该完全了解研究的目的和本质，并且是在不受强制情况下同意参与”（Burns 1997，p.18)。
en: ' [Informed consent] is the most fundamental ethical principle that is involved [ in research]. Participants must understand the nature and purpose of the research and must consent to participate without coercion' (Burns 1997, p. 18).

zh: 描述频数分布的其他方法有折线图、直方图、地图绘制法以及人口锥形图。
en: Other methods of representing frequency distributions are polygons, histograms, cartographs an population pyramids.

zh: 折线图是由直线连接的点构成的，大多用于离散数据。
en: Polygons consist of dots joined by lines and are mostly used within terval data.

zh: 直方图是由彼此挨着的垂直长方条构成的。
en: Histograms are graphs with vertical bars adjoining each other.

zh: 连接这些长方条的中点，就能够制成频数的折线图。
en: These can be made into a frequency polygon by joining the mid points of the bars.

zh: 气候植被顶极和演替概念暗含着植被达到这个容量取决于增长极限的假设。
en: The assumption that the vegetation reaches the capacity determined by the limits of growth is implicit in the climatic climax vegetation and the concept of succession.

zh: 它形成了从气候方面解释植被覆盖的历史证据(例如在古生物学上)，以及重建全球气候变化造成过去植被变化的基础。
en: It forms the basis of the interpretation of historical evidence of vegetation cover in climatic terms (for example, in palynology) and the reconstruction of past vegetation shifts resulting from global climate change.

zh: 有时它还用以预测未来可能发生的气候变化。
en: Sometimes it is used to predict the potential of future climate changes.

zh: 对于身份形成过程的一些重要观点都来源于个与文化密切相关的研究领域，这个领域就是后殖民地理论（postcokmial theory)。
en: Some of the most important insights into this process of identity formation have come from a field of study closely related to cultural studies: postcolonial theory.

zh: 在讨论这个问题之前，我们需要区分一下殖民主义和帝国主义根据爱德华•赛德的论述，殖民主义（colonialism)可以被定义为一个国家通过强行在另一个国家建立新的定居地而对这个国家进行的直接统治。
en: Before discussing this work we need to make a distinction between colonialism and imperialism.Colonialism may be defined as the direct rule of one country by another through the imposition of new settlements.

zh: 帝国主义（Imperialism)，与之相对应，可以被定义为对一个远离本国领土的控制中心的态度和行为。
en: Imperialism, in contrast, is defined by the attitudes and actions of a domineering centre upon a distant territory.
Neocolonialism refers to the economic and political domination of previously colonized nations by Western powers after the ending of formal colonialism.

zh: 地理学这门学科的定位意味着它和社会科学没有什么联系。
en: Where was geography when all this was going on?

zh: 20世纪上半叶本学科在多数大学中设立的只有经济地理，但其理论方法和地理学家所关心的问题之间并没有多少联系。
en: What was its contribution to the war effort and to the burgeoning demand for social science expertise thereafter?

zh: 新古典经济学寻求通过演绎模型的构建来说明市场操作:地理学家对经济活动的模式进行制图，并将其与自然环境联系起来。
en: With regard to the former, geographers were involved in a range of intelligence-gathering and provision activities – much of it in the UK associated with mapping, air-photo interpretation, and the production of handbooks on countries where military operations were likely (Balchin, 1987; Clout, 2003).

zh: 致谢是指向在研究过程和报告编写过程中所有那些对研究者给予帮助的人表示感谢。
en: Acknowledgments are a polite way to extend a vote of thanks to all those who have assisted in the research process and reporting.

zh: 特别是对参与研究的人员表示感谢。
en: It is a courtesy to thank, in particular, those who participated in the study.

zh: 但是，也需要顾及到那些曾经为研究做出贡献的人，即所有相识或不相识的数据收集人员、提供参考文献者和资金资助者、办事员和技术助理以及管理者和同行评议人员。
en: However, you need to consider all those who contributed to your research: people who assisted in data collection, access to references and funding , clerical and technical assistance, and supervisors, as well as peer reviewers, known and unknown.

zh: 在随机/概率抽样中，研究总体的每一个体被抽取作为研究对象的机会是相等的——即对象的选取具有偶然性，每一个体被随机地选取。
en: In random/probability samples, each unit of the population being studied has an equal chance of being included in the sample — that is, the selection of units is determined by chance and each unit is therefore randomly selected.

zh: 样本容量的确定基本上要看研究者想要得到的关于总体的一般性结论的置信度水平，也会受研究者的可用时间、经费和人力资源多少的影响。
en: The decision regarding how many units to include in the study is primarily determined by the level of confidence the researcher wishes to achieve in regard to generalising their findings to the wider population.The decision can also be influenced by the amount of time, money and human resources the researcher has available.

zh: 在随机抽样中，研究者可以使用多种表格来帮助决定样本容量。
en: There are various tables available to researchers to assist in decision making regarding sample size in probability samples.

zh: 中位数是指位于分布中间的数值或者分布中间的那一点，这个点可以这样判断：一半的个案（cases）在它之下，一半在它之上。
en: The median is the middle score of a distribution or the point in a distribution that is identified as having half the cases below it and half above it.

zh: 中位数可以用两种方法来判断： 按顺序排列原始数据或者是使用条形图。
en: The median can be determined in two ways: by organising the raw data into rank order or by using a bar graph.

zh: 需要注意的是中位数与定序、定距或者是与定比测量层次有关，但是与定类测量层次没有关联。
en: Remember that the median is associated with ordinal, interval or ratio levels of measurement but not nominal levels.

zh: 通常人们把这个传统分为两个部分。
en: It is usual to divide this tradition into two subsets.

zh: 一个是阿尔弗雷德•韦伯和他的追随者提出的，他们分析了一家厂商的定位决策，该厂商靠一个或多个供应商提供投入品，为一个或多个市场提供产品，涉及的相关区位不少于三个。
en: First came Alfred Weber and his followers, who analyzed the location decision of a firm serving one or more markets and relying on one or more sources of supply, with the total number of such relevant points not less than three.

zh: 另一个是“中心地方”理论，它分析了制造/市场营销等中心的定位和作用，这些中心服务于假设均匀分布的农业人口。
en: Then came the tradition of central-place theory, which analyzed the location and roles of manufacturing/marketing/etc.centers serving a hypothetical evenly spread agricultural population.

zh: 居中选址原则也解释了一些工业企业为什么位于中转点的原因。
en: The principle of median location also explains why some industrial firms locate at transshipment points.

zh: 中转点是指这样一个地点，在这一地方一件货物的运输方式由一种转变为另一种。
en: A transshipment point is defined as a point at which a good is transferred from one transport mode to another.

zh: 原先用卡乍或火车运送货物，在港口变为用轮船运输，在火车站，货物改由火车运输，而不再使用卡车。
en: At a port, goods are transferred from trucks or trains to ships.At a railroad terminal, goods are transferred from trucks to the train.

zh: 社会关系环节描述了人类卷入其中的各种社会性形式，以及由这种社会性引起的多少具有稳定性的社会关系秩序安排。
en: The moment of social relations describes the various forms of sociality human beings engage in, and the more or less durable orderings of social relations to which this sociality may give rise.

zh: 它聚焦于人类相互联系的方式——“社会联系的模式”——如他们过自己的生活、共同生产和交往等等。
en: It focuses on the way human beings relate to each other — modes of social relating" — as they live their lives, produce together, communicate, etc.

zh: 协作结构，劳动分工和阶级、种族、年龄、性别等社会等级，或者能够进入物质和符号行动以及社会权力的具有细微差异的个人或集体，都是包含在这个环节中的问题。
en: Cooperative structures, divisions of labor, social hierarchies of class, race, age, and gender, or differentiated individual or group access to material and symbolic activities and social power, are some of the issues encompassed within this moment.

zh: 在资本循环的情形中(它自身是马克思研究的一个具有松散边界的领域)，问题是揭示生成和改造原理如何发挥作用、它的作用形式和范围。
en: In the instance of capital circulation (itself a loosely bounded domain of Marxist enquiry) the problem is to explore the forms and domains of operation, the how of generative and transformative principles at work.

zh: 这必然需要一种特殊的唯物主义研究策略。
en: This implies a particular materialist research strategy.

zh: 例如，把民族国家视为同质性实体，而根据一套经济指标来检验其行为和作用，这只具有有限的价值。
en: Treating nation states, for example, as homogeneous entities and examining their behaviour and performance according to a set of economic indicators is of limited value.

zh: 沃勒斯坦确定了事件发生直接场所的地缘政治空间作为空间的对等物，由此创造了短期地缘政治时空(episodic-geopolitical TimeSpace)。
en: Wallerstein identifies geopolitical space, the immediate locales of events, as the spatial equivalent thus creating episodic-geopolitical TimeSpace.

zh: 布劳德尔的第二个跨度是一种更一般的摹制时间(patterned time)（趋势和周期），沃勒斯坦把意识形态空间——例如冷战时期把世界划分为东方/西方这样不同的场所——加入其中。
en: Braudel’s second span is a more general patterned time (trends and cycles) to which Wallerstein adds an ideological space, locales of different divisions of the world, such as East/West during the Cold War.

zh: 这就产生了一个周期性的意识形态时空(cyclical-ideological TimeSpace)。
en: This produces a cyclical-ideological TimeSpace.

zh: 主持会议的方法：作为会议发言者、会议出席者，你很可能被要求主持某个分组会议。
en: Tips for conference chairs: As well as presenting a conference paper, as a conference participant, you may be asked to chair a conference session.

zh: “会议的成功更多地依赖于各个分组会议的主持水平。如果这项任务交给你，你就有责任做好。这项工作包括三类任务——对组织者的责任、对发言人的责任及对受众的责任（Newbie & Cannon 1989, p.35)。
en: 'Much of the success of a conference will depend on the quality of the chairing of individualsessions. Should this task fall to you, there are many responsibilities tofulfil . There are three categories of the task — responsibilities to theorganizers, to the speaker, and to the audience' (Newble & Cannon,1989, p. 35)

zh: 专家抽样仅仅包括那些被研究者定义为“专家”的人。
en: Expert sampling only involves people who the researcher identifies as 'experts'.

zh: 这些人凭借其特有专业知识发表深刻的意见或评论。
en: These people have specialist knowledge with which to make informed opinions or comments.

zh: 这样的抽样在焦点群体法或德尔菲法中使用（这些类型的方法将在第六章详细讨论）。
en: Such samples are used in focus groups and Delphic sessions (these types of methods are discussed in detail in chapter 6).

zh: 转换表与数据卡的使用相关（Babbie 1995)。
en: Transfer sheets are linked to the use of data cards (Babbie 1995).

zh: 通过在同样型号的卡片中使用打孔系统，数据卡能使研究人员确定数据集的模式。
en: Data cards use a system of hole-punching in same-sized cards to enable the researcher to determine patterns in data sets.

zh: 该模式是这样确定的:将一根杆（或一系列杆）穿过数据卡集以确定哪些卡片符合由那个孔（一个变量）或那些孔（多变量）所确定的可以供研究之用的模式。
en: The patterns are determined by pushing a rod (or series of rods) through the data card sets in order to determine which cards fit the pattern determined by the hole (a variable) or holes (variables) selected for examination by the researcher.

zh: 资本的地理生产了一种模糊联系的景观。
en: The geography of capital produced a landscape of obscured connections.

zh: 城市市场越集中，它的腹地越开阔，就越容易忘记买卖之物的最终起源。
en: The more concentrated the city markets became and the more extensive its hinterland, the easier it was to forget the ultimate origins of the things it bought and sold.

zh: 为什么会产生这种运动？
en: Why this movement?

zh: 因为已经在其他地方详细地探讨了其根源（Harvey，1982，1989a），在此我只是概述主要论点。
en: Since I have explored its roots in greater detail elsewhere (Harvey, 1982, 1989a) I simply summarize the principal argument.

zh: 时间是资本主义条件下的重要量度，因为社会劳动是价值的尺度，剩余社会劳动时间是利润的源泉。
en: Tune is a vital magnitude under capitalism because social labor is the measure of value and surplus social labor time lies at the origin of profit.

zh: 此外，资本周转时间也很重要，因为（生产、流通和资本周转的）加速是单个资本家追逐利润最强有力的竞争手段。
en: Furthermore, the turnover time of capital is significant because speed-up (in production, in marketing, in capital turnover) is a powerful competitive means for individual capitalists to augment profits.

zh: 这种“右翼乌托邦理想”与政治权力和实践之间的联系具有重要的意义。
en: The connection between this "right-wing Utopianism and political power and practice is significant.

zh: 即使它完全不是占统治地位的观点（甚至在右派内部），它亦是一种对抗反资本主义阵营的有力的亲资本主义武器。那些反资本主义阵营，以平等、正义、道德或仅仅是通俗易懂的政治经济和生态常识的名义，试图抑制、管制或取消所有明显的暴行，有充分理由说，资本主义在这些暴行上是臭名昭著的。
en: Even if it is a far from dominant argument (even within the right) it is a potent pro-capitalist weapon with which to go to work against a whole array of forces that would, in the name of equality, justice, morality, or just plain political-economic and ecological common sense, seek to curb, regulate, and diminish all the manifest excesses for which capitalism is justy infamous.

zh: 私有化是公共部门重构的另一个重要形式。
en: Privatizationis another important form of public sector restructuring.

zh: 如表13—1所列，这是一系列复杂的过程。
en: This involves a complex set of processes, as revealed by Table 13.

zh: 私有化最明显的形式是资产变卖（asset sales),即将公共部门资产卖给私人部门。
en: 1. The most obvious form of privatization is asset sales, when public sector assets are sold to the private sector.

zh: 研究者能够获得两种类型的资料：原始资料和二手资料。
en: Researchers are able to access two types of data sources: primary and secondary.

zh: 原始资料是指那些为了他们研究项目的使用目的而由研究者第一手收集的资料。
en: Primary data sources are those that are collected first-hand by the researcher for use in their research project.

zh: 原始资料来源包括诸如问卷调査、访谈文本和观察。
en: Primary data include, for example, responses to questionnaires, interview texts and observations.

zh: 二手资料是指那些因其他人的初始使用目的而产生但后来被与初始项目不相关的另外的研究者使用的资料。
en: Secondary data sources are those that have been produced by someone else for primary usage and are then used by another researcher not connected with the first project.

zh: 二手资料来源包括诸如统计记录、政府文件、日记和信件以及其他研究者取得的研究成果。
en: Secondary data include, for example, statistical records, government documents, diaries and letters, and research data conducted by other researchers.

zh: 例如，研究者可能论证以下命题：在淡季,飞往省会城市的机票价格下降可能会提高该城市的游览率。
en: For example, a researcher may consider the following statement: the lowering of airfares to capital cities in the low season will increase visitation rates to those cities.

zh: 在这一命题中，研究者假设了前往省会城市的机票价格和游览率之间存在关联。
en: In this statement, the researcher has hypothesised a relationship between the cost of airfares and visitation rates to capital cities.

zh: 这是一个描述两个变量之间因果关系的假说，两个变量中一个是自变量：机票价格降低，另一个是因变量游览率的上升。
en: The statement is a hypothesis describing a causal relationship between two variables, an independent variable, the lowering of airfares (the cause variable), and the dependent variable, the increase in visitation rates (the effect variable).

zh: 但没有证据显示其中任何一项工作综合了人文地理学和自然地理学两方面(Johnston, 1983d)。
en: But there is no evidence that either body of work integrates human and physical geography (Johnston, 1983d).

zh: 实际上，综合派学者的呼吁似乎是基于不同的语义。

en: Indeed, the claims of the integrationists appear to be based on differences in semantics.

zh: 地理这个词具有两个主要含义：一个是口语化的，指的是环境；而另一个是学术性的，指的是对环境的研究。
en: The word geography has two major definitions: one is vernacular, and refers to the environment; the other is academic, and refers to the study of  the environment.

zh: 坚持认为热力学第二定律和生态动力学法则是所有人类社会存在的必要条件，这是一回事，不过，把这些定律或法则看作是理解人类历史的充分条件，则是完全不同的另一回事了。
en: It is one thing to argue that the second law of thermodynamics and the laws of ecological dynamics are necessary conditions within which all human societies have their being, but quite another to treat them as sufficient conditions for the understanding of human history.

zh: 后一种观点暗示，整个人类历史是一种违反自然法的不可持续的运动。
en: To propose the latter would imply that the whole of human history is an exercise in unsustainability in violation of natural law.

zh: 这是一种大而空的主张。
en: This is so grand an assertion as to be pointless.

zh: 在对环境进行研究时，地方的描述是不可或缺的。然后对这种描述进行比较，得出地方的分类系统，结果可以进一步在通用模型的背景下对地方进行评价。
en: The description of places was essential as environments were explored; such descriptions were then compared, leading to systems of categorization of places, so that places could subsequently be evaluated against the background of general models.

zh: 现在自然地理学将自己的研究领域扩展到环境管理，地方应该得到自然地理学家更多的重视，因为这关系到自然环境的可持续管理，城市地区就是一个例证。
en: As physical geography now extends to environmental management, place warrants greater explicit attention by physical geographers in relation to the management of sustainable physical environments as exemplified by urban places.

zh: 不过真实世界不是一个同质的平原。
en: Now it is true that the real world isn't a homogeneous plain.

zh: 我童年时在地图上看到的那些麦穗和采矿车也说明了同样的道理。
en: Those sheaves of wheat and little mining carts on my childhood maps tell us as much.

zh: 然而，很少有人会认为自然资源能解释大部分经济活动在空间的不均匀分布——究竟什么资源可以解释为什么在大洛杉矶居住着1100万人，而圣保罗却1700万人呢？
en: Yet few would argue that natural resources explain more than a fraction of the observed unevenness of economic activity across spacewhat exactly is the resource that explains why 11 million people are in Greater Los Angeles, or 17 million in São Paulo?

zh: 因此，作为社会事务认识之源的“自我”和“他人”之间的关系总是时空性构造。
en: The relations between "self" and "other" from which a certain kind of cognition of social affairs emanates is always, therefore, a spatio-temporal construction.

zh: 对于理解(个人的和政治的)同一性的形成，这是一个至关重要的问题。
en: This is a crucial issue for understanding how identities (personal and political) get formed.

zh: 时空框架中的变迁影响自我-他人的关系(例如，要么完全消灭自我-他人的区别，要么重新定义在赋予自我以价值的过程中谁是或不是重要的他者)。
en: Changes in spatiotemporal frame affect self–other relations (by, for example, either dissolving the self–other distinction entirely or redefining who are or are not significant others in assigning value to the self).

zh: 中途拦截式调査既可使用自填式问卷也可使用调査者完成问卷。
en: Intercept surveys use either interviewer completed questionnaires or self-completion questionnaires.

zh: 上门调査发生在受访者的住所。
en: Household surveys occur at the residence of the respondent.

zh: 综合性调査通过上门调査的方式实施，既可通过电话方式也可使用面对面方式进行。
en: Omnibus surveys are conducted through household surveys either using face-to-face surveys or telephone surveys.

zh: 显著性检验能够使研究者从统计上判定在样本中变量间的关系是否是偶然的，从而决定是否将这种关系推论至总体（Neman 2000, p. 338; Babbie 1995, PP. 431 ~436)。
en: Tests of significance enable the researcher to determine statistically whether a relationship between variables is a chance one in the sample as opposed to being probable in the population (Neuman 2000, p. 338; Babbie 1995, pp. 431-6).

zh: 萨兰塔克斯（1998）在表9-7中涉及了非参数检验和参数检验。
en: Sarantakos (1998) refers to non-parametric and parametric tests in table 9.

zh: 参数检验假定所研究的变量在总体中表现为正态分布。
en: 7. Parametric tests assume that the variable being studied reflects a normal distribution in the population.

zh: 非参数检验假定所研究的变量在总体中并不表现为正态分布。
en: Non-parametric tests assume that the variable being studied does not reflect a normal distribution in the population.

zh: 它们的存在是因为它们没有被住宅划分列入在内，否则的话早就算是违反了划分的规则。
en: These are generally present by exemption from existing residential zoning, or are in violation of the zoning.

zh: 每个人都喜欢这些小场所的存在，对于这个问题没有任何争议。
en: Everybody likes their presence, and no arguments arise over their desirability.

zh: 如果说有争议的话，则是集中于这样一个问题，即什么类别的场所在新的划分方案中最不可能会与实际生活的需要产生冲突，因为包括在这个方案中的每一类场所都会产生不可克服的问题。
en: The arguments, rather, revolve around the question of what kind of categories in the new zoning will be least at odds with the needs of real life.The drawbacks of each offered category areformidable.

zh: 阿尔贝蒂的设计不应理解为早已作为私人之物存在的性欲的私密化。
en: Alberti's design should not be understood as the privatization of a preexisting sexuality as that-which-is-private.

zh: 被私密化的身体是在最近被性别化的。
en: The body that is privatized is newly sexualized.

zh: 实际上，它就是一个新的身体。
en: Indeed, it is a new body.

zh: 新的性别正是在它被私密化的那一刻才产生的。
en: The new sexuality is produced at the very moment of its privatization.

zh: 定义和建造房子的全部战略机制都参与了这种性别本身的生产。
en: All of the ensemble of strategic mechanisms that define and constitute the house are involved in the production of this sexuality as such.

zh: 乔利(Chorley，1978)对比了地貌研究中实用主义和现实主义方法的差别。
en: Chorley (1978) has drawn the distinction between functional and realist approaches in geomorphology.

zh: 实用主义理论就是进行统计归纳，而关注过程动力学就意味着要作更为现实的理解。
en: Functional theories involve statistical generalizations whereas a focus on process dynamics implies greater realism of understanding.

zh: 这样就出现两个问题:小尺度的研究结果—不论是实用主义的还是现实主义的—能不能应用到更大的尺度上？
en: Two questions arise: can the results of small-scale studies, whether functional or realist, be applied to the larger scale?

zh: 地方研究在何种程度上能够代表更大的区域范围，还是只能作为一个独特案例研究？
en: And to what extent are local studies representative of the wider region or merely unique case studies?

zh: 一个案例研究使用定量方法还是定性方法取决于表现方法论的范式以及这些占统治地位范式的内在本体论、认识论、方法论的视角的显著特征。
en: The distinguishing feature that determines whether a case study is quantitative or qualitative is founded in the paradigm that informs the methodology and the inherent ontological, epistemological and methodological perspectives of those governing paradigms.

zh: 此外，研究者还可以选择混合方法。
en: Furthermore, a researcher may choose to mix methods.

zh: 方法论和方法的选择与研究项目的目的、对象、假设有着直接联系。
en: The choice of methodology and methods is directly linked to the aims, objectives and hypotheses of the research project.

zh: 为了对排斥性问题做出反应，许多城市提出了包含性分区制（inclusicionary zoning）政策。
en: In response to the exclusion problem, many cities have developed inclusionary zoning policies.

zh: 按照包含性房屋计划，地方政府迫使开发商为低收人家庭修建住宅。
en: Under an inclusionary housing program, the local government forces local developers to build dwellings for low income households.

zh: 这些住宅一般以低于建造成本的价格销售给低收入家庭。
他在家具行里工作了两年，接着到一家保险公司的地方办公室上班，后来又接手经营一所学校里的自助餐厅。
en: He worked in the furniture store for two years, then in an insurance company’s branch office.Then he took a job managing a school cafeteria.

zh: 他的太太原本从事秘书工作，后来转而担任会计。
en: His wife worked as a secretary, then as an accountant.

zh: 科莫这一代的土耳其人不论背景多么传统，都已认识到夫妻两人都必须工作。
en: No matter how traditional their background, Turks of Kemal’s generation have learned that husband and wife both must work.

zh: 定量内容分析包括确定与研究者所选择研究变量相关的频数、指向、强度和空间。
en: Quantitative content analysis involves determining the frequency, direction, intensity and space associated with the variable(s) the researcher has selected for study.

zh: 根据这四个方面来收集和分析资料，然后编纂报告。
en: Data are gathered and analysed in regard to these four aspects, and then a report is compiled.

zh: 定性内容分析包括寻找资料、根据资料进行分类、评估分类的相关性和强度、报告调查结果。
en: Qualitative content analysis involves locating the data, developing categories arising from the data, assessing the relevance and strength of the categories and reporting the findings.

zh: 在一些报告中要求给出报告摘要(executive summary)。
en: In some reports, an executive summary may be required.

zh: 报告摘要的长度可视报告篇幅而定。
en: Executive summaries can vary in length depending on the length of the overall report.

zh: 例如20页的报告通常有1页或2页的报告摘要，50页的报告可以有3~4页，100 页报告有5页或6页(Ticehurst & Veal 1999, p.237)。
en: For example, 20-page reports usually have an executive summary of one or two pages, 50-page reports three or four pages and 100-page reports five or six pages (Ticehurst & Veal 1999, p. 237).

zh: 超过100页的报告可以总结出大约6页报告摘要——任何超过6页的摘要都可以视为一篇关于报告本身的短文。
en: Reports longer than 100 pages have an executive summary of approximately six pages ——anything over six pages is moving into a short article on the report itself.

zh: 事实上，备忘录对研究人员的辅助贯穿研究的全过程。
en: Essentially, memos serve to assist the researcher throughout the analysis phase.

zh: 备忘录可以记录为了确定新的研究方向或数据收集、分析方向所作的观察、思考或评论。
en: Memos can record an observation, a reflection or a comment to pursue a new direction of questioning or data collection/analysis.

zh: 备忘录也可以用来记录“意外”的发现——在野外工作或分析工作中不期而至的发现或偶得的概念。
en: Memos can also record a 'eureka' discovery — an unexpected finding or concept arising during field and analytical work.

zh: 例如，下面是引自詹宁斯（1999）在一项研究工程中记录在练习簿上的备忘录。
en: For example, the following memo was noted in an exercise book from a research project conducted by Jennings (1999).

zh: 一类错误和二类错误是与陈述假设的研究项目相关的。
en: Type I and Type II errors are associated with research projects that state hypotheses.

zh: 在研究项目的分析阶段，通过数据收集汇总，研究者能够进行假设检验。
en: In the analytical phase of a research project, having aggregated the data, the researcher is able to test hypotheses.

zh: 研究者使用的假设有许多的类型，主要包括零假设和备择假设。
en: There are several types of hypotheses that the researcher uses, primarily the null hypothesis and the alternative hypothesis.

zh: 然而，公社的排他政治是很强大的。
en: The exclusionary politics of the commune were, however, very strong.

zh: 在内部，它被表现并想象成精神和物质衰败的海洋中一个具有德行和真实的岛屿。
en: Internally it was represented and imagined as an island of virtue and authenticity in a sea of spiritual and material decay.

zh: 外人看它是嵌人美国乡村中心的一个致癌异物。
en: Outsiders saw it as a cancerous foreign body inserted into the heart of rural United States.

zh: 在今天，人们常常自觉地且有意识地努力唤起一种地方感和往昔感。
en: The effort to evoke a sense of place and of the past is now often deliberate and conscious.

zh: 但这里面包含着一种危险。
en: But herein lies a danger.

zh: 对本真性的追逐创造了一些传统和一种商业化的遗产文化。
en: The quest for authenticity, invented traditions and a commercialized heritage culture.

zh: 麦康纳指出，现代性的最终胜利并非是非现代世界的消失，而是它的人为保存和重构(MacCannell，1976:8)。
en: The final victory of modernity, MacCannell (1976: 8) suggests, is not the disappearance of the non-modern world but its artificial preservation and reconstruction.

zh: 边际威慑原则可以用一个简单的例子来说明。
en: The principle of marginal deterrence can be explained with a simple example.

zh: 假定一个国家对盗窃规定的刑期为1年，而武装抢劫的刑期是2年。
en: Suppose that a state initially has a one-year penalty for burglary and a two-year penalty for armed robbery.

zh: 对抢劫的处罚较重是由于抢劫的社会成本较大：抢劫的受害者通常会造成伤亡，而盗窃的受害者只是财产的损失。
en: Robbery carries a greater penalty because robbery has a higher social cost: the victims of robbery are often injured or killed, while the victims of burglary simply lose their property.

zh: “永恒性”作为一种“广泛联系”的体系源自过程。
en: A "permanence" arises as a system of "extensive connection" out of processes.

zh: 实体在它们的边界内以及它们创造空间之过程的内在秩序安排中获得相对稳定性，这是暂时的。
en: Entities achieve relative stability in their bounding and their internal ordering of processes creating space, for a time.
