zh: 这些永恒以排他的方式最终占据一块空间（暂时的），并因此定义一个位置——它们的位置(暂时的）。
en: Such permanences come to occupy a piece of a space in an exclusive way (for a time) and thereby define a place — their place — (for a time).

zh: 因此，后现代文化的分裂和变化在城市景观的物质结构中表现得十分明显。
en: The fragmentation and diversity of post-modern culture is therefore manifest in the physical structure of the landscape.

zh: 星云型大都市（galactic metropolis)这个词就是用于描述这样的城市。
en: The term galactic metropolis has also been coined to describe such cities.

zh: 用这个词来标志这些城市的原因在于，城市的商业中心看起来像一个广阔星系中散布的星星，而不是一个可识别的中心。
en: The reason for this label is that the commercial centres in such cities look more like stars spread about a wider galaxy rather than a single recognizable centre.

zh: 将城市最极端地描述成一种元素的分散随机表现，这就是迪尔和弗卢斯特的富有想像力的概念—— 基诺资本主义（keno capitalism)。
en: The most extreme portrayal of the city as a decentralized random expression of elements is Dear and Flusty’s (1998) highly imaginative notion of keno capitalism.

zh: 在这个模型中，城市结构在边缘城市、消费、展示、防护社区及全球需求中心等要素之间以一种随机的方式而变化(这更像基诺游戏中的选牌）。
en: In this model the city structure varies between elements of edge cities, consumption, spectacle, gated communities and global command centres in a random manner (rather like the selection of cards in the game of keno)

zh: 在对原始数据进行编码之前，研究者需要确保正确地搭配编码以及保证其有效。
en: Before coding all the raw data, the researcher needs to ensure that thecodes have been correctly assigned and that they work.

zh: 正如研究者需要对问卷进行前测，或对调查问卷或其他数据收集工具进行前测一样，研究者也必须对编码簿进行检査核对。
en: Just as theresearcher has to engage in pre-testing or running a pilot of theirquestionnaire or other data collection tool, so too do they have toundertake a check of the code book.

zh: 检査要从调查问卷(或其他的数据收集工具）中提取样本，然后使用编码簿中的编码输入答案。
en: This check is achieved by taking asample of the questionnaires (or other data collection tool), thenentering the responses using the codes in the code book.

zh: 在检查过程中，研究者要保证赋予答案选项的编码没有不规则的编码，同时还要确保为其他类型开放式问题赋予适当的编码。
en: During thischeck, the researcher should ensure that there are no anomalies in thecodes assigned to response sets, as well as ensuring that appropriatecodes have been ascribed to any 'other' categories and open-endedquestions.

zh: 在这一命题中，研究者假设了前往省会城市的航空费用和游览率之间存在相关关系。
en: In this statement, the researcher has hypothesised a relationship between the cost of airfares and visitation rates to capital cities.

zh: 这是一个描述两个变量之间因果关系的假说，两个变量中一个是自变量：航空费用降低；另一个是因变量：游览率的上升。
en: The statement is a hypothesis describing a causal relationship between two variables, an independent variable, the lowering of airfares (the cause variable), and the dependent variable, the increase in visitation rates (the effect variable).

zh: 研究者将设计收集和分析资料的工具，从而支持或推翻该假设，并因此支持或推翻两个变量之间的因果关系。
en: The researcher would design data collection and analysis tools to either support or reject the hypothesis and thereby support or reject the proposed causal relationship between the two variables.

zh: 同时，人类自身又逐渐适应了自然环境和周围的人。
en: Yet at the same time people themselves gradually accommodate both to their physical environment and to the people around them.

zh: 因此，存在着一个连续的双向过程，一种社会空间辩证法（sociospatial dialectic)，即人们在创造和改变城市空间的同时又被他们所居住和工作的空间以各种方式控制着。
en: There is thus a continuous two-way process, a sociospatial dialectic, in which people create and modify urban spaces while at the same time being conditioned invarious ways by the spaces in which they live and work.

zh: 邻里和社区被创造、维系和改造；同时，居民的价值、态変和行为也不可避免地被其周围的环境以及周围的人的价值、态度和行为所影响。
en: Neighbourhoods and communities are created, maintained and modified; the values, attitudes and behaviour of their inhabitants, meanwhile, cannot help but be influenced by their surroundings and by the values, attitudes and behaviour of the people around them.

zh: 初稿应该用A4型号或美国规格的纸张来打印，正文采用两倍间距，使用 Times，Times Roman，American Typewriter，Courier的字体，字号用12镑。
en: Manuscripts should be prepared on A4 or US letter-sized paper, and text should be double-spaced using Times, Times Roman, American Typewriter or Courier in 12 point size.

zh: 初稿采用2.5厘米的页边距，除非投稿指南或说明中有明确规定时，此格式有待商榷外，一般不采用其他格式。

en: The manuscript should have 2.5 cm margins on all sides, the type should be left justified and no format characters should be used unless specified in directions or instructions to contributors.

zh: 初稿的内容应该依照以下的顺序排列:封页、摘要、正文、参考文献、附录、脚注、表格和图解。
en: Text should be organised in the following order: title page, abstract, text, references, appendices, footnotes, tables and figures.

zh: 标准差比极差和百分位点需要更高的算术技能（Neuman 2000）。
en: Standard deviation involves a higher level of arithmetic skill than the calculation of range and percentiles (Neuman 2000).

zh: 虽然它的计算更加复杂，但仍是最常用的变异量数。
en: Although it is more involved in its calculation, it is the most used measure of variation.

zh: 标准差适用于定距和定比测量层次，且使用平均值。
en: Standard deviation requires measurement at the level of interval and ratio and uses the mean.

zh: 从本质上来讲，标准差求出了所有数据和平均值之间的差异。
en: Essentially, the standard deviation identifies the difference between all scores and the mean.

zh: 《来自波多黎各》一书描述了纽约一个贫穷、肮脏区域中的波多黎各人的生活。此书的作者，人类学家埃琳娜•帕迪利亚讲述了人们互相间了解多少的情况——谁是可以信赖的，谁不是，谁蔑视法律，谁坚守法律，谁能力很强而且信息量大，谁很笨拙又无知——以及这些情况是怎样从人行道上的公共生活中和相关的店铺中得知的。
en: Anthropologist Elena Padilla, author of Up from Puerto Rico, describing Puerto Rican life in a poor and squalid district of New York, tells how much people know about each other --- who is to be trusted and who not, who is defiant of the law and who upholds it, who is competent and well informed and who is inept and ignorant --- and how these things are known from the public life of the sidewalk and its associated enterprises.

zh: 这些情况带有公共特性。
en: These are matters of public character.

zh: 还有一个问题，就是因为这种方法表面上具有科学与管理的基础，加上硬性指标的附加条件，因而造成一种虚假的安全感。
en: A further problem is that this approach engenders a false sense of security because of its apparent basis in science and engineering and the attachment to hard targets.

zh: 冈德森和霍林在对理解人文与自然系统转变问题的流畅而清新的评价中抨击了环境系统控制概念的简单处方：“它们似乎用意识形态上似是而非的确定性、精密的数字或行动取代固有的不确定性。
en: In an easily read and refreshingly honest appraisal of the problems of understanding transformations in human and natural systems, Gunderson and Holling  attack the simple prescriptions of the concept of environmental systems control because ‘[t]hey seem to replace inherent uncertainty with the spurious certainty of ideology, precise numbers or action. The theories implicit in these examples ignore multiple stable states.’ They note the problem imposed by non-linearities of the types described above.

zh: ”他们注意到了上述非线性现象所提出的问题，进而指出，“这些理论忽视了起关键性支配过程的缓慢侵蚀能够突然把一个生态系统或一种经济转变为或许根本不可逆的另一种状态。”
en: They go on to say that: ‘The theories ignore the possibility that the slow erosion (meaning change) of key controlling processes can abruptly flip an ecosystem or economy into a different state that might be effectively irreversible.’

zh: 部分和整体的相互交叉状态必然导致“主体与客体以及原因与结果之间的互换性”(Levins and Lewontin, 1985:274)。
en: The interdigitation of parts and wholes entails "the interchangeability of subject and object, of cause and effect" (Levins and Lewontin, 1985: 274).

zh: 例如，我们必须把个体理解成社会变迁过程的主体和客体，同样必须把有机体看作既是进化的主体又是进化的客体。
en: Organisms, for example, have to be looked at as both the subjects and the objects of evolution in exactly the same way that individuals have to be considered as both subjects and objects of processes of social change.

zh: 原因和结果的可逆性使特定模式(即使用反馈循环来描述)不再适用。
en: The reversibility of cause and effect renders causally specified models (even when endowed with feedback loops) inappropriate.

zh: 正由于它在持续过程之流中的嵌入性以及流的再现，辩证法有限地诉诸因果观点，并因此将之视为一种特殊的有限情形。
en: Precisely by virtue of its embeddedness in and representation of the flow of continuous processes, dialectics makes limited appeal to cause and effect argument and then only as a particular limiting case.

zh: 在新英格兰，殖民者拥有的是笛卡儿式固定财产权利观和抽象空间边界观，他们“创造了霸道的地名，这些名称或者使人想起他们家乡，或者直接就是它的所有者的名字”。
en: In New England, the colonists had a Cartesian vision of fixed property rights, of boundaries in abstract space, and they "created arbitrary place-names which either recalled localities in their homeland or gave a place the name of its owner."

zh: 对于印第安人来说，英国人的时空体系及其产生的地名在根本上是无用的，而对于英国人来说，印第安人的地名同样如此。
en: To the Indians the English spatio-temporal system and the placenames it generated were essentially useless and to the English the Indian placenames were equally so.

zh: 两种社会的和生态的体系之间的冲突是围绕命名的冲突，也是围绕在价值定义中运用的相关时间和空间概念的冲突(参阅Mignolo, 1994)。
en: The dash between these two social and ecological systems was a dash over naming as well as over the relevant conceptions of space and time to be deployed in the definition of value (see also Mignolo, 1994).

zh: 在泰勃特社会里，住宅消费的增加并不影响财产税。
en: In the Tiebout world, an increase in housing consumption does not affect property taxes.

zh: 假设有几个富有、高支出的家庭决定购买价值20万美元的旁产，他们将形成一个新的高支出群体。
en: Suppose that a few of the wealthy, high-spending households decide to buy $200,000 homes.

zh: 该群体拥有价值20万美元的房产，同时以1%的财产税资助2000美元的公园计划。
en: They will form a new community of high-spending households with $200,000 houses, and finance their $2,000 park program with a 1 percent property tax.

zh: 开始收集相关文献和文件时，应该建立一个文献目录索引、目录卡片或文献图书系统。
en: As you commence gathering relevant literature and documents, you should start a bibliographic index, or a bibliographic card/book system.

zh: 这个系统可以通过手写或使用诸如Endnotes的软件程序来建立。
en: The system can be created manually by handwritten methods or by using software programs such as Endnotes.

zh: 这些程序非常有用，可以将文献目录程序与文字处理程序整合起来。
en: Such programs are very useful, as you can integrate and merge text between the bibliographic program and your word processing program.

zh: 简言之，正是金钱力量的普遍性和社会性允许各种他性独立地生存或存在下去。
en: It is, in short, precisely the universality and sociality of money power that allows all kinds of othernesses to take on an independent existence and to survive.

zh: 那本身并没有什么特别的不对(如果我们有那种办法，为什么不像詹克斯或利奥塔建议的那样做一个折衷派呢)。
en: There is nothing in itself particularly wrong with that (if we have the resources why not be as eclectic as Jencks or Lyotard suggest we should).

zh: 但是，它确实迫使我们考虑当代世界中差异和他性的生产与政治经济权力的组织和分配之间的关系。
en: But it does force us to consider the relation between the production of difference and otherness in the contemporary world and the organization and distribution of political-economic power.

zh: 少数种族聚居的市郊遭受重击，不仅有些经济状况较佳的拉丁裔人口丧失了房子，最穷的新进移民也因为高度仰赖建筑及房地产产业谋生，而突然失去了就业的主要来源。
en: The ethnic suburbs were hit hard.Not only did some better-off Latinos lose their houses but the poorer new arrivals, who were often dependent on the building and property-maintenance industries for their livelihoods, found themselves without their main source of employment.

zh: 不过，经济衰退对于落脚城市的基本运作逻辑并没有影响。
en: The downturn, however, did not affect the basic logic of the arrival city.

zh: 在2008年底至2009年之间，拉丁美洲移民虽然大幅减少了寄回家乡的钱财数目，但没有人迁返家乡。
en: Latin American migrants sharply reduced their flow of remittances to villages in late 2008 and in 2009, but there was no return migration.

zh: 和这些差异性在一起的，也存在着足够多的相似性，使我们能够鉴别日常生活中普遍存在的现代性，在当前高消费世界中有其本身达到高潮的发展轨迹。
en: Alongside the differences there are enough similarities for us to identify a generic ordinary modernity of everyday life that has its own trajectory of development culminating in contemporary mass consumption.

zh: 当前现代世界的社会变化是作为社会时间的周期与趋势的复杂的混合物。
en: Social change in our modern world is a complex mix of cycles and trends as social times.

zh: 无论如何，这终究可能是一些对我们前途至关重要的趋势。
en: Ultimately, however, it may be that it is the trends that are all-important to our futures.

zh: 作为现代人，在规划短期、中期和长远未来的时候，我们通过许多个别项目或一组项目来安排我们的生活。
en: As modern people, we live our lives through many individual and group projects as we plan our short-, medium- and long-term futures.

zh: 现代机构通过各种规划手段来运行。
en: Modern institutions operate through various planning instruments.

zh: 例如，在20世纪某些时段，下述所有“大规划”活动至少在一 个时期内取得了成功：城市规划、企业规划、冷战时期军事工业联合体的军事规划、福利国家的凯恩斯经济规划、第三世界国家发展规划和共产主义国家的五年计划等。
en: For instance, during parts of the twentieth century all of the following ‘grand planning’ activities prospered for at least a period: the urban planning of cities, the corporate planning of firms, the military planning of the Cold War military–industrial complexes, the Keynsian  economic planning of welfare states, the development planning of third world states, and the five-year industrial planning of communist states.

zh: 此书是对当下城市规划（city planning）和重建理论的抨击。
en: This book is an attack on current city planning and rebuilding.

zh: 同时，更主要的也是尝试引介一些城市规划和重建的新原则，这些原则与现在被教授的那些东西——从建筑和规划的流派到周末增刊以及女性杂志——不同，甚至相反。
en: It is also, and mostly, an attempt to introduce new principles of cityplanning and rebuilding, different and even opposite from those now taught in everything from schools of architecture and planning to the Sunday supplements and women's magzines.

zh: 我所进行的抨击不是对重建改造方法的一些不痛不痒的批评，或对城市设计形式的吹毛求疵。
en: My attack is not based on quibbles about rebuilding methods or hairsplitting ahout fashions in design.
It is an attack, rather, on the principles and aims that have shaped modern, orthodox city planning and rebuilding.

zh: 毕竟，城市化的漫长历史只是最近世界历史中发生的全部环境变迁过程的最重大方面之一。
en: The long history of urbanization is, after all, one of the most significant of all the processes of environmental modification that have occurred throughout recent world history.

zh: 在19世纪，那一过程就显现出爆炸性发展，创造了一系列前所未闻的全球生态条件。
en: In the last century that process has become explosive, creating a set of global ecological conditions that have never been seen before.

zh: 环境问题也浮出水面，这是我们城市化行动所创造的生态关系所特有的。
en: And environmental issues have emerged that are wholly specific to the ecologies our urbanizing activities have created.

zh: 图1-1表示的是大城市地区可能的最简单形式。
en: Figure 1-1 shows the simplest possible arrangement of a metropolitan area.

zh: 大城市地区包含城市化地区的县区。
en: The MA is the county containing the urbanized area.

zh: 这个简单的例子使我们看到关于大城市地区的一个问题。
en: This simple case shows one of the problems with the MA concept.

zh: 那么，做一个总结，城市经济学文献提供了清晰和明确的分析，但是没有把城市间的空间关系模型化。
en: In summary, then, the urban economics literature offers clear and explicit analysis, but does not model the spatial relationship of cities to each other.

zh: 地理学传统虽然很有见地，但缺乏微观经济学基础，所以也没有我们希望的从理论分析中得出的犀利洞察力。
en: The geographical tradition, while rich in insight, lacks a microeconomic foundation and as a result lacks the sharp edges we want from a theoretical analysis.

zh: 接下来我们将介绍一个正式的模型，它捕捉并阐明了地理学传统的见地，而且有完整的微观经济学基础。

en: What we want to do next is introduce a formal model, with complete microfoundations, that captures and clarifies the insights of the geography tradition.

zh: 公共部门会从两个方面影响城市劳动市场。
en: The public sector can influence both sides of the urban labor market.

zh: 例如，地力公共服务设施的供给，如学校、公园和公共安全，会增强城巾的相对吸引力，导致移民涌入，使劳动供给增加。
en: For example, the provision of local public services such as schools, parks, and public safety increases the relative attractiveness of the city, causing in- migration that increases the supply of labor.

zh: 在需求方而，工业基础设施（如道路、排水系统）的供给，降低了生产成本并吸引厂商。
en: On the demand side, the provision of industrial infrastructure such as roads and sewer systems decreases production costs and attracts firms.

zh: 城镇(towns)、郊区或小城市的功能与大城市的完全不同。
en: Towns, suburbs and even little cities are totally different organisms from great cities.

zh: 试图从小城镇的行为或者说想像的行为来理解大城市已经使我们陷入了足够的麻烦之中。
en: We are in enough trouble already from trying to understand  big cities in terms of the behavior, and the imagined behavior, of towns.

zh: 而试图从大城市的角度去理解小城镇则更会加剧混乱。
en: To try to understand towns in terms of big cities will only compound confusion.

zh: 一位英国妇人位于画面中央，怀抱一个婴儿，另一个孩子在一旁玩耍，家庭平静的气氛被两个印度叛军的人侵所打破。
en: With a young child playing next to her and a baby at her breast, a British woman is located at the centre of domestic and familial calm that has just been shattered by the invasion of two Indian insurgents.

zh: 这两个男子的暴力举止只是一种标志，说明这个家庭是在印度而不是在英国。
en: The violent presence of these men is the only indication that the home is in India rather than Britain.

zh: 叛军好像是要破坏这个毫无防御能力的妇女、她的孩子们以及这个家庭。
en: The rebels appear set to destroy the defenceless woman, her children and the home itself.

zh: 而且躺椅上盒子标 签的“英国”字样表明该民族与帝国力量的脆弱性。
en: Moreover, the box labelled ‘England’ on the chaise-longue suggests the vulnerability of national and imperial power.

zh: 不过，马克思预期“科学和技术将创造一个容易理解和可以操控的世界”，同时预期“只有资本主义关系才会妨碍”我们与自然的代谢关系之间合理调节。他的这些预期必然受到质疑。
en: Nevertheless, Marx's expectation that "science and technology would create an intelligible and controllable world as well as the expectation that only capitalist relations stand in the way of a rational regulation of our metabolism with nature, have to be questioned.

zh: 这意味着对历史—地理唯物主义某些假设的挑战。
en: And this implies a challenge to some of the presumptions of historical–geographical materialism.

zh: 单变量分析是一次只对一个变量进行的分析。
en: Univariate analysis involves the analysis of one variable at one time.

zh: 单变量分析很容易通过描述与变量相关的频数分布来实现。
en: This is easily achieved by representing the frequency distribution associated with a variable.

zh: 频数分布可以使用本章以前所讨论的数据输入及编码的任一方法来实现。
en: Frequency distributions can be developed using any of the methods of data entry and coding discussed previouslyin this chapter.

zh: 从本质上讲，频数分布描述了答案选项中与每个种类相关的答案的数量。频数分布能够用于定类、定序及定距测量层次的变量。
en: Essentially, the frequency distribution portrays the number of responses associated with each of the categories in a response set.

zh: 这种“右翼乌托邦理想”与政治权力和实践之间的联系具有重要的意义。
en: The connection between this "right-wing Utopianism'' and political power and practice is significant.

zh: 即使它完全不是占统治地位的观点(甚至在右派内部)，它亦是一种对抗反资本主义阵营的有力的亲资本主义武器。那些反资本主义阵营，以平等、正义、道德或仅仅是通俗易懂的政治经济和生态常识的名义，试图抑制、管制或取消所有明显的暴行，有充分理由说，资本主义在这些暴行上是臭名昭著的。
en: Even if it is a far from dominant argument (even within the right) it is a potent pro-capitalist weapon with which to go to work against a whole array of forces that would, in the name of equality, justice, morality, or just plain political—economic and ecological common sense, seek to curb, regulate, and diminish all the manifest excesses for which capitalism is infamous.

zh: 但是，道德共同体的观念同样被证明是有问题的。
en: But the notion of a moral community also proves problematic.

zh: 我们可以看一看，它是如何在沙勾夫的著作中起作用的(Sagoff，1988)。
en: Consider, for example, how it plays in the work of Sagoff (1988).

zh: 尽管个人常常表现为追求自己目标的纯粹利己主义的及原子式地构成的经济人，但他主张，他们不仅会而且往往确实在以完全不同的方式作为与环境问题密切相关的“道德共同体”的成员而行动(由此立法保护濒危物种)。
en: While individuals often act as purely self-interested and atomistically constituted economic agents selfishly pursuing their own goals, he argues, they not only can but frequently do act in completely different ways as members of a "moral community" particularly with respect to environmental issues (hence legislation to protect endangered species).

zh: 让我们先来看一看地标作为多样性的“发布者”和“扩大者” 所起的作用。
en: Let us first consider the role of landmarks as announcers and dignifiers of diversity.

zh: 当然，一个地标(landmarks )之所以能起到标志作用是因为它 处在一个突出的位置。
en: One reason a landmark can be a landmark is, of course, that it is in a spot where it shows to advantage.

zh: 但是，除此以外，另外一个必要条件是地标本身还应该有突出的特征，我们现在要谈论的正是这一点。
en: But in addition, it is necessary that the landmark be distinctive as a thing itself, and it is this poiot with which we are now concerned.

zh: “位置”这个词也承载着过多的意义。
en: But the word "place" also carries a surfeit of meanings.

zh: 首先，存在着各种各样的词，如环境、地点、位置、场所、邻里、地区、领土等等，它们都是指地方的一般特性。
en: To begin with, there are all sorts of words such as milieu, locality, location, locale, neighborhood, region, territory, and the like, which refer to the generic qualities of place.

zh: 也存在另外一些术语，如城市、乡村、集镇、都市以及国家等，它们指明某类特殊的地方，再者，如家、家庭、“帮会”、社区和民族等，它们具有同样强烈的地方内涵，这使得我们在谈论一个术语时很难不涉及其他术语。
en: There are other terms such as city, village, town, megalopolis, and state which designate particular kinds of places and still others, such as home, hearth, "turf," community, and nation, which have such strong connotations of place that it would be hard to talk about one without the other.

zh: 当形成一种地理多样性的意像之后，就需要我们去进行解释。
en: Along with the formation of a mental image of geodiversity, however, has existed our need to explain it.

zh: 学者们建立了多种多样的解释方式，以求这种意像看似真实或者可以被接受。
en: Scholars formulated many different explanations to make the mental images seem plausible or acceptable.

zh: 反过来，他们的解释又决定了他们选择进行深入观察的特点。
en: Their explanations, in turn, often determined the features they chose to observe.

zh: 地理定位系统（GPS）和地理信息系统（GIS）的出现极大地改善了成果表述的精度（DeMers, 2000; Raper, 2000; Longley et al., 2001）。
en: The advent of geographical positioning systems (GPS) and geographical information systems (GIS) has greatly improved accuracy and presentation of results (Raper, 2000; DeMers, 2005; Longley et al., 2005).

zh: 许多地貌图的绘制是为了咨询报告和应用项目。
en: Many geomorphological maps are produced for consultancy reports and in applied projects.

zh: 这些图常常是专门为某个地点或某种问题而绘制的，而且经常不在国有土地上。
en: These are often site- and problem-specific and may often not be in the public domain.

zh: 因此，在提出概念、抽象和理论的时候，给空间、时间、规模和环境设置边界就成了主要的战略性考虑因素。
en: Setting boundaries with respect to space, time, scale, and environment then becomes a major strategic consideration in the development of concepts, abstractions, and theories.

zh: 这些边界的任何实质性变化都将彻底地改变概念、抽象和理论的本质，这是常见的情况。
en: It is usually the case that any substantial change in these boundaries will radically change the nature of the concepts, abstractions, and theories.

zh: 在地理学中，我们常常会遇到由生态关联的不同规模所致的以悖论形式出现的难题。
en: In geography we often encounter this problem in the form of the paradoxes generated by different scales of ecological correlation.

zh: 在下文中，我们将经常遇到这种规模难题。
en: We will frequently encounter this scale problem in what follows.

zh: 学界并没有一部统一的“地理学”史，只有林林总总、令人眼花缭乱的不同版本，彼此差异很大，而且往往是百家争鸣。
en: There is no single history of ‘geography’, only a bewildering variety of different, often competing versions of the past.

zh: 其中一种阐释记录了如下的历史变迁：从现代早期（early-modern）的航海，到18世纪启蒙运动的地理探险，再到19世纪晚期的“新”地理学，直至两次世界大战之间的区域地理学。
en: One such interpretation charts the transition from early-modern navigation to Enlightenment exploration to the ‘new’ geography of the late nineteenth century and the regional geography of the interwar period.

zh: 本文所述的种种——就像所有其他地理学史一样——只不过反映了作者的偏好。
en: This contextualist account – like all other histories of geography – reflects the partialities of its author.

zh: 电话调查可以与受访者进行个人交流；并且，与面对面的家庭访问调查相比，它能以较小成本从广泛的地区中抽取样本。
en: Telephone surveys enable personal contact to be made with respondents and samples may be drawn from a range of geographical regions for a lesser cost than face-to-face interviews conducted by household visits.

zh: 另外，邮件调查只需一位研究者即可展开，而电话调查需要许多的调查者。
en: On the other hand, whereas mail surveys can be conducted by one researcher, telephone surveys require a number of interviewers.

zh: 而且这些调查者需要接受培训和监督以保证操作合理、规范，同时还需要支付他们工资，这就增加了总体的调查成本。
en: These interviewers require training and supervision to ensure proper and ethical conduct, as well as having to be paid, which adds to the cost of the overall survey.

zh: 位于昆士兰州罗克汉普顿（Rockhampton）的社会科学研究中心 (C4SSR），建有一个人口研究实验室（PRL）。
en: The Centre for Social Science Research (C4SSR), Rockhampton (Qld), has a Population Research Laboratory (PRL).

zh: 这个实验室是专门围绝进行社会调查而建立起来的。
en: This laboratory is solely organised around the conduct of social surveys.

zh: 该实验室配备了计算机辅助电话访谈（CAT1）技术和计算机辅助私人访谈（CAPI）软硬件技术。
en: The laboratory uses computer-assisted telephone interview (CATI) and computer-assisted personal interview (CAPI) hardware and software.

zh: 在1999年，社会科学研究中心进行了首次的昆士兰州中心区社会调查（CQSS）一个综合性调查。
en: In 1999, the Centre for Social Science Research conducted the first Central Queensland Social Survey (CQSS), an omnibus survey.

zh: 将前向关联模型化要稍难一些。
en: Forward linkages are a little harder to model.

zh: 它们通常在生产中间产品的行业中出现（正如下文所述，虽然并不总是这样）；这意味着为了模型化前向关联，需要一个比墨菲、施莱佛和维什尼等人的大推进模型更复杂的结构。
en: They ordinarily arise in the context of industries producing intermediate goods (although not always, as described below); this means that a more complex structure than the Murphy, Shleifer, Vishny version of the Big Push is necessary.

zh: 而且，为了使不完全竞争易于处理，大推进模型假设厂商的定价受到限制，因而排除了任何前向联系的可能性，因为成本的节省不会传递给下游的消费者。
en: Also, the limit-pricing assumption that makes imperfect competition easy in the Big Push model immediately rules out any forward linkage, since cost savings are never passed on to downstream consumers.

zh: 定量研究报告与定性研究报告的不同之处在于所使用的主要写作方式和类型上。
en: The difference between qualitative and quantitative research reports is thestyle of writing and key genres used.

zh: 定性研究报告采用叙述的文体形式，而定量研究报告使用科学报告的写作方式。
en: Qualitative reports adopt a narrativestyle, whereas quantitative reports use the style of scientific writing.

zh: 尽管并不总是按照相同的次序，但两者都包含了下列构成要素：引言、文献 综述、研究结果、讨论、结论和/或建议。
en: Bothinclude the following structural elements, though not always in the sameorder: introduction, literature review, findings, discussion, conclusion and/or recommendations.

zh: 具体的数据收集的方法包括问卷法、观察法、文档分析法以及实验和准实验的方法（这些方法将在第三章和第八章中做出解释）。
en: The methods of data collection include questionnaires, observation, documentary analysis and experiments and quasi-experiments.(These methods are explained in chapters 3 and

zh: 数据分析通常采用统计方法，由此得出由数字表示的研究结论。
en: 8.) Analysis will be conducted using statistical calculations and the units of study will subsequently become numeric representations.

zh: 如何运用定量的研究方法对收集的数据进行分析，我们将在第九章中讨论。
en: Analysis of data gathered using a quantitative methodology is discussed in chapter9.

zh: 定性研究方法植根于解释社会学范式，且与最近兴起的女性主义的研究方法相一致。
en: The qualitative approach is grounded in the interpretive social sciences paradigm and sits comfortably with the more recently espoused feminist approaches to the conduct of research.

zh: 定性研究方法收集信息以形成许多个文本单元，这些文本单元再现了正在研究的旅游现象的社会现实、背景和特征。
en: The qualitative methodology gathers information as text-based units, which represent the social reality, context and attributes of the tourism phenomenon under study.

zh: 这种研究从方法论的角度看，其本质是归纳性的。
en: The methodology is inductive in nature.

zh: 身份是一个既复杂又有争议的词，是关于我们如何理解和塑造我们自己的。
en: Identity is a complex and contested term that concerns how we understand who we are.

zh: 身份是相互关联的，也就是说，自我总是通过它不是什么——用理论术语来说,就是“他人”——来定义的。
en: Identities are relational, the Self is always defined in terms of the Other, that is in terms of difference, what it is not.

zh: 换句话说，社会结构——自我和他人——是通过社会关系的认同和差异而产生的。
认同和差异的问题必定导致权力与对抗问題。
en: Questions of identification and difference necessarily entail issues of power and resistance.

zh: 海姆继续评论道，单子可能“没有窗户，但它们的确具有终端”，并因此能够创建自己的对应原则，脱离身体的存在去建造网络、BBS和虚拟社区，成为社会原子主义的解药。
en: Monads, Heim (1991: 67.-73) goes on to remark, may "have no windows, but they do have terminals" and they are thereby able to construct their own correspondence principles, breaking free from a bodily existence to build networks, bulletin boards and virtual communities as:computer antidotes to the atomism of society.

zh: 它们使单子聚集起来。
en: They assemble the monads.

zh: 它们起到社会节点的作用，为那些变动不居的单子培育多重可以随意选择的亲和关系。事实上，日常的城市几乎不支持这种亲和关系。
en: They function as social nodes for fostering those fluid and multiple elective affinities that everyday urban life seldom, in fact, supports.

zh: 研究者应该确保他们的调查问卷收集的数据是为了研究目的需要。
en: Researchers should ensure that their questionnaire collects the data theyrequire for their research purpose.

zh: 问题的措辞很重要——研究者应该使用简单的语言；做到用语简练、单意，避免引导性、含糊不清的问题；采用过滤性问题；恰当定义；适当的时间性框架;合理分类。
en: The wording of the questions is important — researchers should use simple language; short, single-focused, nonleading, unambiguous questions; filter questions; definitions; temporal frames when appropriate; and categories.

zh: 答案选项在本质上应该是穷尽的、互斥的和单一尺度的。
en: Responses sets should be exhaustive, mutually exclusive and unidimensional in nature.

zh: 答案选项的种类包括使用对照表、排序量表、李克特量表、语义差异量表和情景法。
en: Response sets include the use of checklists, ranking scales, Likert scales, semantic differential scales and scenarios.Pilot studies should be used to ensure that the survey is well constructed.

zh: 描述性统计能够使调查人员以数字术语来描述收集的原始数据（Neuman 2000，p.317）。
en: Descriptive statistics enable researchers to describe the aggregation of raw data in numerical terms (Neuman 2000, p. 317).

zh: 描述性统计包括使用单变量分析、双变量分析及多变量分析。
en: Descriptive statistics involve the use of univariate, bivariate and multivariate analysis.

zh: 这些分析方法包括使用频数分布、百分比表格以及集中趋势量数。
en: These methods of analysis incorporate the use of frequency distributions, percentage tables and measures of central tendency.

zh: 物种和活动对特殊小环境的适应和多样化也是一种既合作又竞争 的形式，结果就是以那种使合作形式多样化而不是单一化的方式改造环境。
en: Adaptation and diversification of species and activities into special niches is also a form of both competition and collaboration and the effect is to transform environments in ways that may make the latter more rather than less diverse.

zh: 物种或许会多样化，进一步创造更加多样的合适环境。
en: Species may diversify further creating more diversified niches.

zh: 一个更加多样化的自然的生产反过来生产了更大的物种多样性。
en: The production of a more diversified nature in turn produces greater diversity of species.

zh: 没有城市，它们就根本不可能 存在。
en: Without cities, they would simply not exist.

zh: 它们依赖于城市中的其他形式各样的企业，同时也为这种多样性添砖加瓦。
en: Dependent on a huge diversity of other city enterprises, they can add further to that diversity.

zh: 这一点是最应该让我们记住的地方。
en: This last is a most important point to remember.

zh: 城市的多样性(diversity)本身就会带来和刺激更多的多样性的产生。
en: City diversity itself permits and stimulates more diversity.

zh: 通常研究者借助多变量分析来证明任何双变量的关系并不是“假的”（Neuman 2000, p. 333)。
en: Researchers use multivariate analysis to ensure that any bivariate relationship is not 'spurious' (Neuman 2000, p. 333).

zh: 三个变量的分析可以使用表格或者多元回归分析来进行。
en: Trivariate analysis may be conducted using tables or multiple regression analysis.

zh: 三元表格由控制变量每一个类别的自变量值和因变量值的二维表格构成。

en: A trivariate table is made up of bivariate tables that represent the values 'of the independent and dependent variables for each category of the control variable' (Neuman, 2000, p. 333).

zh: 有关“承认政治”和“多元文化主义”的那些激烈辩论已经用另一种方式提出了这些问题。
en: These questions have been posed in another way in the contested and often testy debates on the "politics of recognition" and on "multiculturalism."

zh: 在此，我从沃尔泽(Walzer, 1983:314)的“彻底的特殊主义”理论表述开始讨论。那一理论认为，“分配正义的每种实质性解释都是局部的”。
en: I begin here with Walzer's (1983: 314) formulation of a "radically particularist" theory in which "every substantive account of distributive justice is a local account.

zh: 罗森斯坦一罗丹和刘易斯强调有弹性的劳动供给是发展过程中的关键因素。
en: Rosenstein-Rodan and Lewis stressed the elasticity of labor supply as a key factor in development.

zh: 其他学者如纳克斯(1952)则强调有弹性的资本供给。
en: Other authors, such as Nurkse (1952), stressed the elasticity of capital supply.

zh: 特别值得一提的是，赫希曼（1958)不厌其烦地强调投资机会可以在多大程度上带来更多的储蓄。
en: In particular, Hirschman (1958) emphasized at length the extent to which investment opportunities could bring forth additional savings.

zh: 在前面两次讲座中，我就两个领域的思想史讲了一些个人的看法，奇怪的是它们都没能对经济学中的主流思想产生什么影响。
en: In the previous two lectures I offered personal views of the history of thought in two fields that were strangely unsuccessful in influencing mainstream thought in economics.

zh: 发展经济学，或者更确切地说被我称为“超发展理论”的那些思想最初曾有过巨大的影响。
en: Development economics, or more specifically the set of ideas that I call ''high development theory," had a huge initial influence.

zh: 但是它日渐衰落，事实上正在从经济学文献中消失。
en: But it then faded away, virtually disappearing from economic discourse.

zh: 在所有发展经济学文献中，最著名的莫过于阿瑟•刘易斯的《劳动无限供给下的经济发展》（1954)。
en: Probably the most famous paper in all of development economics is Arthur Lewis's "Economic Development with Unlimited Supplies of Labor" (1954).

zh: 但现在想起来，原因并不那么清楚。

en: In retrospect, it is hard to see exactly why.

zh: 对刘易斯观点的一种解释是在发展中国家从农业部门中吸引过来的劳动的影子价格为零或至少很低，这样在工业部门投资的社会收益超过了个人收益。
en: One interpretation of Lewis's argument is that the shadow price of labor drawn from the agricultural sector in developing countries is zero or at least low, so that the social return to investment in industry exceeds its private return.

zh: 由于被剥夺了任何自主的生命力，自然容易根据人类的意志没有节制地被操纵。
en: Deprived of any autonomous life force, nature was open to be manipulated without restraint according to the human will.

zh: 如海德格尔后来抱怨的那样，自然成为人类开采的“巨大的加油站”。
en: Nature became, as Heidegger later complained, "one vast gasoline station" for human exploitation.

zh: 按照法兰克福学派的意见，这种分析所忽略的是内部关系的辩证法，其中，自然“既是某种外在于人类的东西又是一种内部现实" (Jay，1973: 267)。
en: What this analysis elided, according to the Frankfurt School, was the dialectics of internal relations in which nature was both "something external to man but also an internal reality" (Jay, 1973: 267).

zh: 出于人道和进步的原因，引入反机构化是想洗清与许多大型机构相关的污名和恶劣环境。
en: Deinstitutionalization was introduced for humane and progressive reasons in an attempt to overcome the stigma and poor conditions associated with many large institutions.

zh: 然而，在经济衰退期，这个政策也常常被看做是节约开支的一种方式。
en: However, in an era of fiscal retrenchment, the policy has often been seen as a way of saving money.

zh: 因此，大型机构被迅速关闭，可是又没有建立起足够的基于社区的设施。
en: As a result, large institutions have been closed very rapidly without the development of sufficient community-based facilities.

zh: 该政策也基于这样一个假设，即有大量后备自愿者（通常是女性）准备为那些从大机构出来的人服务，但这个假设通常是错误的。
en: The policy was also based on the assumption that there was a large reserve of volunteers (usually women) who were prepared to care for those released from large institutions --- an assumption that was often mistaken.

zh: 那些没有家庭支持的人常常会租房子住，且倾向于在内城地区租房子，因而这些地区常常有显性精神病患者。
en: Those without family support have often ended up in rented accommodation and, since this tends to be located in inner-city areas, these display the greatest concentrations of ex-psychiatric patients.

zh: 反身性不仅是女性主义范式所关注的问题，也是解释社会学范式（特别是民族志研究）、批评理论以及后现代主义的后结构“形式”所关心的问题。
en: As well as being a feminist issue,  reflexivity is also a concern of the interpretive social sciences (especially ethnographic studies), critical theory and the poststructuralist 'form' of postmodernism.

zh: 哈丁（1991)解释说，反身性对于实证主义科学家来说是一个难题，因为他们的理解被“人为地限制在实验室和研究团队的微观过程”。尤为突出的是，实证主义者倾向于“将研究群体从其所处的更广泛的社会、政治、经济现实中分离出去”（Harding 1991，p.162）
en: Harding (1991) also posits that reflexivity is a problem for those scientists operating within a positivist paradigm, as their understanding is 'artificially restricted to the micro processes of the laboratory and research community', particularly because of the positivist tendencies to 'isolat[e] research communities from the larger social, economic, and political currents in their societies' (Harding 1991, p. 162).

zh: 这样的干扰因素可能会掩盖一个人的心理类型。
en: Such intervening conditions may mask a person's psychographic type.

zh: 对巡游者进行的研究没有采用普劳格用来确定心理类型的五个问题（参见 Plog 1990）。
en: The study of cruisers did not draw on the five questions Plog uses to determine psychographic type (see Plog 1990).

zh: 但是，如果普劳格的个性特征得以完善，然后对从巡游者身上、同时从在位和出位的视角出发收集到的数据使用方法的三角校正， 应该能够得出相似的结果。
en: However, if Plog's characteristics are well founded then methodological triangulation using both etically and emically gathered data collected on cruisers should achieve a similar outcome.

zh: 在研究计划的准备过程中，务必确保信息的完整性，提供包括引言、文献综述、方法论、工作进度表、经费预算表、参考文献和简历等方面的信息。
en: When preparing your research proposal, ensure that you provide information on all sections: the introduction, literature review, methodology, time line, budget, references and curriculum vitae.

zh: 保证准时提交研究计划，过晚提交的计划一般不会被接受。
en: Ensure that the proposal is submitted on time, as late submissions are generally not accepted.

zh: 同时确保研究计划整体形式的专业性，所有必要的附件一应俱全。
en: Furthermore, ensure that the proposal has been professionally presented and all attachments have been included.

zh: 研究者可以通过参与观察和深度访谈来解释由于跨国企业对接待地社区旅游企业的干预所造成的负面效应。
en: Through participant observation and indepth interviewing the researcher will be able to determine the negative impacts of the involvement of the multinational corporations in tourism enterprises upon the host community.

zh: 研究成果可以应用在进行与接待地社区和旅游相关的重大实践变革中。
en: The findings from the research would then be used to effect transformational changes to current practices in relation to the host community and tourism.

zh: 一般而言，此种研究需要为支持和许可接待地社区的变革寻找理由。
en: Basically, the researcher in such a study would be required to champion the cause of the host community to facilitate change and empower the host community.

zh: 原始资料或二手资料的使用取决于研究项目本身、使用的范式和一些外部因素诸如时间、金钱等的限制。
en: The use of primary or secondary data depends on the research project, the overlying paradigm and any external factors such as time and monetary constraints.

zh: 对于旅游研究者来说，资料来源是很广泛的。
en: For tourism researchers, data sources are extensive.

zh: 原始资料可以通过观察法、访谈法、专家小组或问卷调查法等方式收集。
en: Primary data may be gathered by using observation, interviews, panel groups or questionnaires.

zh: 调査者完成问卷（或面对面访问）可能耗时办小时，而问题可多达10页。
en: Interviewer-completed questionnaires (or face-to-face interviews) can be from half an hour in duration or up to 10 pages of questions.

zh: 调査者完成问卷的结构与第六章提到的访问法类似。
en: Interviewer-completed questionnaires are akin to structured interviews mentioned in chapter 6.

zh: 在问题的排序和问题答案的甄选方面极为严密。
en: As a consequence, the interviews are rigid in the order of question framing and in the choice of question responses.

zh: 为避免任何的研究者偏见，问题大多是封闭型的。
en: Questions are generally closed questions to remove any researcher bias.

zh: 访谈的目的是引导受访者表述观点，因而采访者不应控制谈话。
en: The interviewer should not dominate the conversation, as the purpose is to elicit the views of the interviewee.

zh: 然而采访者可能不得不准备好与受访者一同成为研究主体，尤其当整个研究所依据的是女性主义视角的方法论或受访者有交流的需要时更是如此。
en: However, the interviewer may have to be ready to become a subject together with the interviewee, especially if the research has a feminist methodological basis or the interviewee makes reciprocity demands.

zh: 在非结构化访谈中，采访者对访谈的控制程度最小，因为受访者实际上有时也用他们的想法引导着访谈。
en: In unstructured interviews, control by the interviewer is minimal, as the interviewee is really leading the interview with their thoughts.

zh: 在分层随机抽样中，研究者必须考虑在确定样本容量时是釆用比例抽样还是非比例抽样的方式。
en: In stratified random sampling, a researcher has to remember to consider proportionate or disproportionate sample sizes.

zh: 在上面的例子中，七个交换台的抽样比例都是相等的——如果我们按不同的比例抽样，结果就不能反映总体。
en: The above example sampled seven exchanges in proportions equal to the population — had we been sampling disproportionately, the results would not have represented the population.

zh: 有时，当一个层次的结果可能会产生没有意义的结论时，我们就使用不同比例的抽样规模。
en: Sometimes, disproportionate sample sizes are used when the results of a strata may yield insignificant results.

zh: 坦率地说，当这种大众主体转向与任何一种内部关系哲学结合起来的时候，它便造成了严重的危险——它产生了最坏形式的“莱布尼茨式奇想”。
en: Plainly, this massive subjective turn poses acute dangers when coupled with any philosophy of internal relations – it produces the very worst forms of what I have already dubbed "the Leibnizian conceit."

zh: 不过，它亦推动了虽然危险但是有用的“我”与“它”之间的分离，这种分离为现代科学研究“在自然中”发挥作用的过程提供了基础。
en: But it also facilitates that useful though dangerous separation between "I" and "it" that grounds modern scientific enquiry into the processes at work "in nature."

zh: 那种分离是解开自然奥秘从而推动解放和自我实现的关键。
en: That separation was the key to unlocking the secrets of nature so as to facilitate emancipation and self-realization.

zh: 分区规划指对城市中每块土地的使用做出一套可被认可的规定。
en: A zoning plan designates a set of admissible land uses for each plot of land in a city.

zh: 从理论上讲，分区制的目的是为了提高公众健康，安全和福利水平。达到这些目的的基本手段是将使用目的互不相容的土地分离开来。
en: In theory, the purpose of zoning is to promote public health, safety, and welfare- The principal means of promoting health, safety, and welfare is the separation of incompatible land uses.

zh: 调査者完成问卷（或面对面访问）可能需要半小时才能完成或者问题可多达10页。
en: Interviewer-completed questionnaires (or face-to-face interviews) can befrom half an hour in duration or up to 10 pages of questions.

zh: 调査者完成问卷的结构与第六章提到的访问法类似。
en: Interviewercompleted questionnaires are akin to structured interviews mentioned in chapter 6.

zh: 在问题的排序和问题 答案的甄选方面极为严密。
en: As a consequence, the interviews are rigid in the order of question framing and in the choice of question responses.

zh: 为避免任何的研究者偏见，问题大多是封闭型的。
en: Questions are generally closed questions to remove any researcher bias.

zh: 借由空间秩序安排而进行的社会控制的复杂性(以及相反，社会秩序因为空间边界越轨而受到挑战的复杂方式)需要深人分析。
en: The intricacy of social control by spatial ordering (and, conversely, the complex ways in which social orders get challenged by the transgression of spatial boundaries) requires sophisticated analysis.

zh: 例如，象征空间和空间秩序安排的符号学创建了各种必须依据社会条件阅读的文本。
en: Symbolic spaces and the semiotics of spatial orderings, for example, create texts that have to be read in social terms.

zh: 家庭、工厂和城市的内部时空组织是相反的社会力量为争取稳定或打破社会意义而进行的斗争的结果。
en: The internal spatio-temporal organization of the household, of workplaces, of cities, is the outcome of struggles to stabilize or disrupt social meanings by opposed social forces.

zh: 因父权制的权力关系所导致的差异也有空间性。
en: The differences produced by patriarchal relations of power are spatialized as well.

zh: 与父权制有关的空间分异最有意义的形式之一就是私密空间和公共空间的差异。
en: One of the most significant forms of spatial difference associated with patriarchy is that between private and public space.

zh: 如女性主义者和其他理论家所阐明的那样，这种通常采纳的特性(这个常见的习惯成自然的划分) 是政治性的典型产物，并不那么容易保持；这两种空间和它们所代表的范围边界是模糊的、相互交叉的。
en: As feminist and other theorists have made clear, this commonly naturalized distinction is a political artefact and not so easily maintained; the two spaces and the spheres they represent blur and intersect.

zh: 目录页需列出以下几项：报告摘要、序言/前言、致谢、表格和图表目录、章节标题、参考文献和附录。
en: The contents page lists the following items: executive summary, preface/foreword, acknowledgments, list of tables and list of figures, chapters, subsections, references and appendices.

zh: 从报告摘要到致谢部分需要使用罗马数字标注页码。
en: Roman numerals are used for pagesfrom  the executive summary through to the acknowledgments section.

zh: 目录页不必列在其中，但各章要分成多个小节(参见图10-6)。
en: Thecontents page itself is not listed on the contents page, and chapters areorganised into subsections (see figure 10.6).

zh: 在某种意义上，存在着另外一些相互之间完全不同的可能世界。
en: These are alternative possible worlds in some sense fundamentally different from each other.

zh: 这些可能世界并非完全存在于人类经验之外，虽然莱布尼茨可能合理地主张，在某种意义上，他们描述的世界外在于物质性的感觉世界。
en: Such possible worlds are not entirely outside of human experience, though Leibniz might reasonably claim that in some sense the worlds they depict are outside of the material world of sense perception.

zh: 莱布尼茨对多种可能的时空世界的研究只是一种逻辑构造。
en: Leibniz's findings on multiple possible worlds of space and time are purely logical constructs.

zh: 不过，我们可以将之作为一种工具来进一步研究实际时空秩序安排——这种安排是在不同的生产方式和社会构型之中和之间进行的——的差异。
en: But they can be used as a means to look more closely at the differentiation of actual spatial and temporal orderings within and between different modes of production and social formations.

zh: 时空的生产不可避免地同身体的生产联系在一起。
en: The production of space—time is inextricably connected with the production of the body.

zh: 列斐伏尔抱怨，“随着笛卡儿逻辑的出现，空间进人了绝对王国……空间最终通过容纳它们而统治全部的感觉和身体”(Lefebvre，1991:1)。
en: "With the advent of Cartesian logic," Lefebvre (1991: 1) complains, "space had entered the realm of the absolute ... space came to dominate, by containing them, all senses and all bodies."

zh: 列斐伏尔和福柯(特别是在《规训和惩罚》中)在此从事着共同的事业：把感觉和人类身体从人为的时间和空间世界的绝对主义中解放出来，这是他们解放战略的中心。
en: Lefebvre and Foucault (particularly in Discipline and Punish) here make common cause: the liberation of the senses and the human body from the absolutism of that produced world of space and time becomes central to their emancipatory strategies.

zh: 自变量有时也被称为原因变量（Neuman 2000)或改变变量（Kumar 1996)。
en: The independent variable is sometimes referred to as the causal variable (Neuman 2000) or change variable (Kumar 1996).

zh: 因变量也可称为结果变量（Kumar 1996)。
en: The dependent variable is also referred to as the outcome variable (Kumar 1996).

zh: 此外还有其他一些变量，比如：外生变量（表示因变量受自变量影响的变化程度的变量）和干涉变量（使自变量对因变量发生影响的变量）。
en: There are other variables, such as extraneous variables (variables that influence the degree of impact of the independent variable on the dependent variable) and intervening variables (variables that need to be present for the independent variable to influence the dependent variable).

zh: 其他用于问卷设计的量表当属瑟斯东和哥特曼量表了。
en: Other scales that may be used in questionnaire construction are Thurstone scales and Guttman scales.

zh: 瑟斯东量表用于测量态度，但该量表需由专家决定其结构且较为耗时，并且还要求为纳入此量表的项目做出相关评判（Babbie 1990)。
en: Thurstone scales are used to measure attitudes; however, the scale is dependent upon experts for its construction.Thurstone scales are time-consuming and demanding in judging items relevant for inclusion (Babbie 1990).

zh: 哥特曼量表用于测量社会距离，特别是测量受访者所接受的与其他类型人的社会距离（Sarantakos 1998)。
en: Guttman scales measure social distance, particularly how close a respondent will allow another type of person to be to them (Sarantakos 1998) .

zh: 瓦解过程总是发挥着作用，挑战对资本积累施加政治压力那些特殊“永恒”。
en: And processes of dissolution are always at work, bringing into question the particular "permanences" shaped to bring political pressure to bear upon capital accumulation.

zh: 这就是阶级过程所包含的全部内容。
en: This is what the process of class is all about.

zh: 某些“永恒”(诸如工会)在特定时间和地方形成，多少都会对某一空间内的资本积累过程暂时产生影响。
en: Certain "permanences" (such as trade unions) form in a given place and time and are more or less effective in relation to processes of capital accumulation across a certain space for a time.

zh: 为回答这个问题，法兰克福学派决定仔细审视美学传统。
en: To do this, the Frankfurt School chose to pay very close attention to the esthetic tradition.

zh: 但是，阿多诺问，奥斯威辛之后，什么样的美学是可能的呢?
en: But what kind of esthetic was possible after Auschwitz, asked Adorno?

zh: 那个问题同样受到了考验，而答案则是五花八门。
en: That question is also put to the test and the answer is as nuanced as it is problematic.

zh: 解放感官的生命从而鼓励回到那些被工具理性和启蒙理性压抑的东西，那总是好的。
en: It is all very well to liberate the life of the senses to foster the return of all that had been repressed by instrumental rationality and Enlightenment reason.

zh: 传统的歧视理论认为市场力量限制了工资歧视的程度（Becker, 1957）：假设某市冇两种类型的工人——黑人和白人，两者有着相同的边际收益产品（MRP），即劳动力的边际实物产品与该产品的市场价格之乘积。
en: The traditional theory of discrimination suggests that market forces limit the extent of wage discrimination (Becker, 1957).Consider a city with two types of workers, black and white, who have the same marginal revenue product (MRP), defined as the marginal physical product of labor times the market price of the product produced.

zh: 假定白人的工资按照他们的(6美元)被支付，而黑人仅仅被支付5美元。
en: Suppose that white workers are paid their MRP ($6) but blacks are paid only $5.

zh: 如果你是一个追求利润最大化的厂商，你会怎么做？
en: If you were a profit-maximizing firm, what would you do?

zh: 工作进度有多种形式:可以选择使用矩阵的形式通过日、周、月来观察任务的进展情况，也可以选择使用重要事件法。
en: Time lines can be presented in several ways.You may choose to use a matrix to gain an overall view of the tasks by days, weeks or months, or you may choose to use a milestone technique.

zh: 图10-4对两种方法都做了举例说明。
en: Both techniques are illustrated in figure 10.

zh: 准备工作进度时，需提供充分的细节——有时所给的计划太笼统，不能让读者明确你计划能力的整体有效性。
en: 4. When preparing a time line, ensure that you provide enough detail — sometimes the tasks noted are very general and do not enable a reader to determine the overall effectiveness of your planning ability.

zh: 当然，也不应该过于严苛而为研究项目制定过分细致的时间表。
en: On the other hand, you should not be so prescriptive that you are presenting a minute-by-minute account of the timing for the project.

zh: 就生态运动中强烈的马尔萨斯主义那一翼来说，加雷特•哈丁可能是最重要的代表，他诉诸的极权主义方案明显是“公地悲剧”唯一可能的政治解决办法。
en: In the case of the strongly Malthusian wing of the ecological movement, and Garrett Hardin is probably the best representative, the appeal to authoritarian solutions is explicit as the only possible political solution to the "tragedy of the commons."

zh: 大多数这种类型的文本都假设，资源匮乏（以及随之产生的增长极限）和人口压力是环境—生态问题的核心。
en: Most of the writing in this genre presumes that resource scarcities (and consequent limits to growth) and population pressure lie at the heart of the environmental—ecological issue.

zh: 因为这些在20世纪70年代早期是最重要的问题，这种类型的辩论也因此在那时达到高峰。
en: Since these issues were paramount in the early 1970s, this style of argument was then also at its height.

zh: 在很多人口集中和用途多样化的城市地区，人们仍是以步行为主，但在郊区或大部分灰色地带，步行则根本行不通。
en: In dense, diversified city areas, people still walk, an activity that is impractical in suburbs and in most gray areas.

zh: 一个地方的多样性越是丰富多彩同时又有条不紊，人们就越会愿意 步行。
en: The more intensely various and close-grained the diversity in an area, the more walking.

zh: 即使是开车或通过公共交通(public transportation)从外面来到多样化的充满活力的地方，他们到达那里后也会步行。
en: Even people who come into a lively, diverse area from outside, whether by car or by public transponation, walk when they get there.

zh: 大多数人行道上的公共人物都会稳定地处于一些公共场所。
en: Most public sidewalk characters are steadily stationed in public places.

zh: 他们是店主或酒吧的主人或诸如此类的人。
en: They  are storekeepers or barkeepers or the like.

zh: 这些人是一些最基本的公共人物。
en: These are the basic public characters.

zh: 城市的其他公共人物都依赖于他们——哪怕只是间地，因为人行道的存在是通过这些小企业和商业及其它们的主人来体现的。
en: All other public characters of city sidewalks depend on them---if only indirectly because of the presence of sidewalk routes to such enterprises and their proprietors.

zh: 因此，纽约公共图书馆(public library)在这一地区接到投诉电话多于其他地方也就不足为奇了。电话自然都是在中午时分打过来的，问的都是同一个问题:“图书馆这里的分部在哪里？我找不到。”原本就没有，否则这就是一个最麻烦的问题了。
en: It is no accident that the New York Public Library gets more anguished telephone calls from this district than from any other --- at lunchtime, of course---asking, "Where is the library branch down here? I can't find it."

zh: 这是此地区最典型的现象了。
en: There is none, typically enough.

zh: 本部分把分区分为二种类型。
其中， 公害分区（nuisance zoning)的目的是把不相容的土地利用分离开来。
en: The purpose of nuisance zoning is to separate incompatible land uses.

zh: 城市通过财政分区（fiscal zoning)把那些不为当地政府分担费用份额的家庭排除在外。
en: Cities use fiscal zoning to exclude households that would not pay their share of the costs of local government.

zh: 1991年的马斯特里克条约致力于为欧盟国家的一体化铺平道路，其核心目标之一就是更大程度地提高社会和经济的凝聚性。
en: The promotion of greater social and economic cohesion was one of the key objectives of the 1991 Maastricht Treaty that paved the way for greater integration of the EU states.

zh: 不过，这一条约将欧洲移民分成两个阶层：一是与其他欧洲国家边境相邻的500万欧洲居民，他们有权在欧盟国家中迁移；二是来自欧盟国家之外的1000万非欧洲移民，他们虽已长期定居，但还没有取得完整的公民权，也无权迁往其他的欧盟成员国。
en: However, this treaty created two classes of immigrants within Europe: first, there are the 5 million European residents living in the boundaries of other European nations with the right to movement within the European Union; and second, there are the 10 million non-European immigrants from outside the European Union who, although long-settled, do not have full citizenship or the right to move to other EU member states.

zh: 这种划分的目的是创建一种“欧洲要塞”政策和抑制人口迁移，包括那些来自欧盟以外的难民和寻求避难的人士。
en: The aim of this division is to create a‘Fortress Europe’ policy and inhibit immigration, including that from refugees and asylum-seekers out-side the European Union.

zh: 在劳动阶层中引起的恐慌，造成了马克思称谓的陷入悲惨状况。
en: The havoc wreaked on the working class created what Marx termed its immiseration.

zh: 他相信是资本主义使工人变得卑微，虽然他们的生存物质状况可能得到改善。
en: He believed that capitalism degrades workers, even though their material conditions of existence may be improved.

zh: 他们日益变成一种可交换的商品，一种在复杂的劳动分工中微不足道的因素。
en: They become increasingly a commodity to be traded, a minute element in the complex division of labour.

zh: 异化是商品拜 物教的结果，资本主义就以商品拜物教为其特征：一切都被贬低成货币项目，而人的尊严却丧失了。
en: Alienation is the result of the commodity fetishism that characterizes capitalism: everything is reduced to monetary terms and human dignity is lost.

zh: 这种异化只有通过引人共产主义才能驱除。
en: Such alienation can only be removed by the introduction of communism.

zh: 我们的城市缺少一些小型的公园活动，它们可以起到小的“必需物品”的作用。
en: Cities lack minor park activities that could serve as minor "demand goods."

zh: 有些时候，当人们需要，才会发现这些活动的重要性。
en: Some are discoverable by observation of what people try to do if they can get away  with it.

zh: 比如，蒙特利尔附近一家购物中心(shopping centers)的经理发现每天早上他那做装饰用的水池都会神秘地变得很脏，经过秘密观察 一阵子后，他发现一些孩子们偷偷地在这里擦洗他们的自行车。
en: For instance,the manager of a  shopping center near Montreal found his ornamental pool mysteriously filthy every morning.Spying after closing hours he found that children were sneaking in and  washing and polishing their bikes there.

zh: 这些发展的一个主要结果就是公司变得更小了。
en: A major consequence of these developments is that firms are becoming much smaller.

zh: 其主要原因是现有公司的细分（有时被称作垂直分化（vertical disintegration))，以及新的小公司的快速增长。
en: This has arisen because existing firms have been subdivided (sometimes known as vertical disintegration) as well as through the rapid growth of new small firms.

zh: 与福特制支配下的内部规模经济不同，后福特制企业建立在外部范围经济上。
en: Rather than the internal economies of scale dominant under Fordism, neo-Fordist firms are therefore based on external economies of scope.

zh: 范围经济 (Economies of scope)是这样一些因素，它们使得生产系列产品成为可能，而不是生产单个产品。
en: Economies of scope are factors that make it possible to produce a range of products rather than to produce an individual item on its own.

zh: 当企业所属的产业做大时（例如，有大量的生产者），外部范围经济（External economies of scope)就得到增长。
en: External economies of scope arise when the industry to which the firm belongs to is large (i.e.there are a large number of producers).

zh: 例如，研究者可以使用滚雪球抽样来研究冒险旅游者。
en: The researcher could use snowball sampling, for example, to study extreme adventure tourists.

zh: 这些旅游者基本上是独立的，不依靠旅游企业来组织他们的极限冒险旅游活动。
en: These tourists are primarily independent tourists who are not dependent on the tourism industry to organise their extreme adventure travel experiences.

zh: 因此，根本无法获得现成的抽样框，而仅仅在极端冒险者之间存在非正式的联系。
en: Consequently, there are no readily available sampling frames, only informal networks of association between the extreme adventure tourists themselves.

zh: 浏览同类词辞典、关键词数据库及主题字典（例如，在文献中旅游者可能被描述成国内旅游者，国际旅游者、旅行者、参观者、一日游游客或短程旅游者。旅行的动机可能被记录为旅行的原因或参观、 旅行的目的。所以仅从字面来看，第一个关键词可能搜索不到任何信息，这样就需要使用不同的词来描述概念）。
en: Look in thesauri, key word databases and subject dictionaries.(For example, in the literature, tourist could be described a s domestic tourist, international tourist, traveller, visitor, daytripper or excursionist, and motivation for travel could be recorded as reasons for travel or purpose of visit/trip. So think laterally. Your first key word choice may draw a blank in a search, and you need to think of alternative ways of describing your concept.)

zh: 我们能够理解“物”之(矛盾的)质和量属性的唯一方式是理解构造它们的和内在于它们的过程和关系。
en: The only way we can understand the (contradictory) qualitative and quantitative attributes of "things" is by understanding the processes and relationships which constitute them and which they internalize.

zh: 除了通过内在于我的新陈代谢的、社会的和其他的过程，否则就不能理解作为个体的我。
en: I, as an individual, cannot be understood except by way of the metabolic, social, and other processes which I internalize.

zh: 无论如何，这暗示着，我必然使异质性以及一系列关联在一起的矛盾内在化。
en: This implies, however, that I necessarily internalize heterogeneity and a bundle of associated contradictions.

zh: 空间障碍的消除和“通过时间消灭空间”的斗争对于全部资本积累的动态来说都是根本性的，并且在资本过度积累危机时期更是剧烈。
en: The elimination of spatial barriers and the struggle to "annihilate space by time" is essential to the whole dynamic of capital accumulation and becomes particularly acute in crises of capital overaccumulation.

zh: 通过向新领域的地理扩张以及建构全新的空间关系来吸收剩余资本(有时是剩余劳动力)可以说是很显著的。
en: The absorption of surpluses of capital (and sometimes labor) through geographical expansion into new territories and through the construction of a completely new set of space relations has been nothing short of remarkable.

zh: 列斐伏尔(1974)敏锐地指出，空间关系以及全球空间体制的建构和重构是资本主义残存到20世纪的主要手段之一。
en: The construction and reconstruction of space relations and of the global space economy, as Henri Lefebvre (1974) acutely observes, has been one of the main means to permit the survival of capitalism into the twentieth century.

zh: 地貌学中的形态制图是从沃特斯(Waters, 1958)和萨维杰(Savigear, 1965)的工作发展起来的。
en: Morphological mapping in geomorphology developed from the work of Waters (1958) and Savigear (1965).

zh: 空间单位用坡折符号画出，特殊地貌特征用专门符号表示(Bakker, 1963)。
en: Spatial units are defined using symbols for breaks of slope, and particular geomorphological features are shown using specific symbols (Bakker, 1963).

zh: 制图可在野外完成，也可用航空照片完成(Verstappen, 1983)。
en: Mapping may be completed in the field as well as from aerial photography (Verstappen, 1983).

zh: 还可能包括更复杂的制图，例如利用物质发生与本性有关的信息(Demel et al., 1972)。
en: Further sophistication may be included, for example, by information on the genesis and nature of materials (Demek et al., 1972).

zh: 亚文化理论与合成理论紧密相联。
en: Subcultural theory is closely related to compositional theory.

zh: 像后者一样，亚文化理论也认为，有着特定社会人口统计特征和特定生活方式的社会群体会宣传鼓吹某种行为。
en: Like the latter, subcultural theory subscribes to the idea of social worlds with distinctive socio-demographic characteristics and distinctive lifestyles that propagate certain forms of behaviour.

zh: 另外，亚文化理论还认为，这些社会群体或被称为亚文化者的数量会因城市生活的矛盾和竞争而增多；并且大批移民的到来所形成的特殊群体，以及因工业化和城市化导致的结构差异所产生的特殊群体都会孵化出新的亚文化者，并逐渐达到维系稳定社会网络所需之“临界数量”的规模。
en: In addition, however, subcultural theory holds that these social worlds, or subcultures, will be intensified by the conflict and competition of urban life; and that new subcultures will be spawned as specialized groups generated by the arrival of immigrants and by the structural differentiation resulting from industrialization and urbanization reach the ‘critical mass’ required to sustain cohesive social networks.

zh: 在自然地理学中，动态分析开始流行，低地地貌学也被广泛接受。
en: In physical geography dynamic analysis became popular, and lowland geomorphology won wide acceptance.

zh: 计量方法被采纳，用于海岸地貌和河流变化过程的研究。
en: Quantitative approaches were adopted with regard to coastal landforms and fluvial processes.

zh: 与山地冰川有关的河流阶地研究，以及海平面变化等与气候变化有关的研究得到了更多的关注。
en: The work of river terraces in relation to mountain glaciation and changes in sea level and other matters relating to climatic change were more thoroughly investigated.

zh: 当然，现在仍然有许多优秀的学者致力于发展中国家的经济学研究。
en: There are, of course, many excellent people who work on the economics of developing countries.

zh: 他们提出的某些问题是各国都普遍存在的，但另外一些则是较贫穷的国家特有的问题，因此从这个意义上来说，现在仍然有一个集中研究欠发达国家的经济问题的领域。
en: Some of the problems they address are essentially generic to all countries, but there are also issues that are characteristic of poorer countries in particular, and in this sense there is a field that focuses on the economics of underdevelopment.

zh: 不过它是一个发散的领域：比如研究第三世界农业的经济学家与研究发展中国家制成品贸易的经济学家即使有共同的研究内容，也微乎其微，他们也与研究债务、恶性通货膨胀等宏观经济学问题的经济学家没有共同语言。
en: But it is a diffuse field: those who work on the economics of, say, Third World agriculture have little if any overlap with those who work on LDC trade in manufactures, and these in turn hardly talk to those who focus on the macroeconomics of debt and hyperinflation.

zh: 承认无限异质性和无限制性在一个松散过程和无限复杂流的世界中的重要性，直接就与对后结构主义的指控联系在了一起。这种后结构主义是一种“随波逐流”的思考方式，认为道德或伦理原则没有什么特别用途。
en: Affirming the importance of infinite heterogeneity and open-endedness in a world of unstructured processes and infinitely complex flows, directly connects to the charge against poststructuralism that it is an "anything goes" way of thinking within which no particular moral or ethical principles can carry any particular weight over any other.

zh: 怀特(1991: 133)说：“在某种意义上，人们必须具有这种思想：应该抑制一些东西，而不是无原则地鼓励所有的他性的表现形式。
en: "At some point," says White (1991: 133), "one must have a way of arguing that not all manifestations of otherness should be fostered; some ought to be constrained."

zh: ”这假定了某种普遍的权利或正义原则。
en: And this presumes some general principles of right or justice.

zh: 在现代主义往往追求的那种美学世界或可传达意义的世界中，不存在任何相互联系，甚至在同生产和交换的物质世界保持强大联系的背景中，情况也一样。
en: There can be no interlinkage in the world of esthetics or of communicable meanings of the sort that modernism often sought, even in a context of strong interlinkage in the material world of production and exchange.

zh: 从这一点出发，并不难理解，为什么后现代思想往往把海德格尔作为“解释性共同体”、碎片化的语言游戏等观点的先驱。
en: From this standpoint, it is not hard to see how Heidegger figures so often in postmodern thinking as a precursor of ideas concerning the creation of "interpretive communities," fragmented language games, and the like.

zh: 也不难理解，后现代主义之粗俗的和商业的一面如何利用这些情感，把本土当成市场、模仿本真，并发明遗产、传统，甚至已经商业化的“根”。
en: And it is not hard to see how the crass and commercial side of postmodernism could play upon these sentiments and market the vernacular, simulate the authentic and invent heritage, tradition, and even commercialized roots.

zh: 同过去一样，现在参与研究的人们，通常也不知道研究将带来何种结果。
en: As has happened in the past, some people who participate in studies and surveys today are often not appraised of the outcomes of the research findings.

zh: 继而，就产生了互惠性这一问题。
en: Subsequently, the issue of reciprocity has developed.

zh: 这是解释社会学范式、批评理论和女性主义范式所关注的问题，但并不是所有范式都关注。
en: This has certainly been an issue for interpretive social sciences, conflict theory and feminism paradigms, but has not always been the purveyance of all paradigms.

zh: 如今，人们总是想从参与研究中得到点什么。
en: In today's world, people want something back for participating in research.

zh: 因此很明显，词汇不是中立的，而是具有很强的根本假设和含义的。
en: Clearly,then,words are not neutral but have powerful underlying assumptions and meanings.

zh: 这表明要理解支撑语言的话语，很重要的一点就是文化（culture)的分析。
en: This means that analysis of culture is crucial to understanding the language and discourse.

zh: 后结构主义思想对城市社会地理学的影 响十分显著，这反映在分支学科明显的“文化转向”（‘culture turn’）之上。
en: The effect of poststructuralist thinking on urban social geography has been substantial, to the point where the subdiscipline has taken a clear ‘cultural turn’.

zh: 应当强调的是，这不是文化地理学中传统文化观念的转变，而是向文化作为一个具有共同意义的系统的人类学观点的转变。
en: This, it should be emphasized, is not a turn toward the traditional notion of culture within cultural geography, but to the anthropological idea of cultures as systems of shared meanings.

zh: 有些种族论者假定，各“种族”均被固定在一个不变的“天然”级序，这个级序就是从不同起点出发的截然不同的发育系列中当前的表现（多元发生论）。
en: Some racial theorists assumed that different ‘races’ were fixed in an unchanging ‘natural’ hierarchy, the contemporary manifestation of quite distinct evolutionary sequences from different points of departure (polygenesis).

zh: “外部”环境因素对这种先天的种族系统影响不大。
en: ‘External’ environmental factors could have only limited impact on this preordained racial system.

zh: 这种论调预示着永远需要有一些在智力上和种族上优秀的帝国统治者的存在，以便管理殖民地那些不可救药的劣等人及其环境（Livingstone, 1992: 216-60）。
en: This argument presupposed the need for a permanent imperial presence of intellectually and racially superior rulers in order to manage the irredeemably inferior peoples and environments of the colonial world (Livingstone, 1992: 216–60).

zh: 景观研究在1920年代由卡尔•索尔（Carl Sauer）介绍到美国地理学界，特别是通过他的“景观形态学”（The Morphology of Landscape, 1925[1963]）—文。
en: Landscape studies were introduced into American geography in the 1920s by Carl Sauer, especially with his ‘The Morphology of Landscape’ (1963 [1925]).

zh: 受奥托•施吕特（Otto Schluter）等德国地理学家和景观学派影响的索尔，在他的时代里反对环境决定论，主张人类对自然景观的改变产生了他所称的“文化景观”（见第十五章关于索尔的工作在自然地理学中应用方式的分析）。
en: Sauer, influenced by German geographers such as Otto Schluter and the Landschaft school, reacted against the environmental determinism of his day by arguing that it was collective human transformation of natural landscapes that produced what he called ‘cultural landscapes’.

zh: 索尔对地理学家研究景观长达50多年（至少是在美国）的显著影响不容低估。
en: Sauer’s phenomenal influence on geographers’ study of landscape over five decades (in the USA at least) cannot be understated.

zh: 另一派是区域论，也发端于经验主义传统中收集资料的意图……并且在某种程度上也是对环境决定论之过分的一种反动。
en: The other approach - that of regionalism - sprang also from contemplation of the material collected in the empiricist tradition, and was to some extent also a reaction to the excesses of environmental determinism.

zh: 地图的对照显示出某些现象的分布是重叠的，产生出地球表面的各种地方——区域。每一地方都有各种现象的特殊组合并造成独特的个性。
en: Map comparison showed that certain distributions of phenomena overlapped, creating areas of the earths surface - regions - with particular combinations of characteristics and producing a unique identity for each area.

zh: 在下文中，我将试图建立一种理论立场来理解一般所称的“环境问题”。
en: In what follows I shall try to establish a theoretical position from which to try and make sense of what are generally called "environmental issues."

zh: 藉此，我希望把这些问题与社会变迁以及“自然”和“环境”的评价方式联系起来。
en: In so doing, I want to connect those issues to questions of social change and the way in which "nature" or "environment" is valued.

zh: 我将试图说明：全部有关“环境”的提议都必然是社会变迁的提议，针对它们的行动总是需要用某种评价体制的“自然”来做具体的例证。
en: I seek to show that all proposals concerning "the environment" are necessarily and simultaneously proposals for social change and that action on them always entails the instantiation in "nature" of a certain regime of values.

zh: 但是，对自然的统治和对他者的统治之间的这种联系还有更多的维度。
en: But this connection between the domination of nature and the domination of others has a further dimension.

zh: 任何种类的“改造自然”计划都具有分布性后果，许多此类明显不公正研究都是急烈冲突的根源。
en: "Nature-transforming" projects of any sort have distributional consequences and the patent inequity of many of these has been the source of powerful conflicts.

zh: 当前，在环境正义运动和名为“穷人的环境保护主义” 运动的多国组织中，这些都成为斗争的焦点(参阅本书第十三章)。
en: These are now the focus of struggle in the environmental justice movement and within a polyglot group of movements known as "the environmentalism of the poor" (see chapter 13).

zh: 在闹市区，缺少足够的首要混合用途通常是最严重的一个问题。
en: In downtowns, lack of sufficient primary mixture is usually the most serious basic handicap.

zh: 而在大多数的住宅区域，尤其是在灰色地带(gray areas)，缺少首要混合用途通常只是问题之一，有时候并不是最严重的。
en: In most residential districts, and especially most gray areas, lack of primary mixture is usually only one handicap, and sometimes not the most severe.

zh: 事实上，很容易就能找到住宅与工作融合的例子，但问题是这种融合并不能在生发多样性和活力方面给予多少帮助。
en: Indeed, it is easy to find instances in which work is mixed with dwellings, yet to little avail in helping generate diversity or vigor.

zh: 会议论文由两部分组成：口头发表部分和书面文本部分。
en: Conference papers are composed of two elements: a performance and a written text.

zh: 口头发表部分是在作者发言过程中用来吸引听众的。
en: The performance is the element the audience will engage with at the time of the presentation.

zh: 书面文本部分是供听众带走的或收录在会议论文集当中的。
en: The written text is the element they take away with them or have already read in the conference proceedings.

zh: 切记勿将会议论文的这两个组成部分混为一谈，因为两者是截然不同的！
en: Ensure that you do not confuse the two elements of a conference presentation as being the same thing.They are not!

zh: 书面文本部分包括你想让听众了解但由于时间限制而使你不能通过口头表述的全部研究内容。
en: The written text paper contains everything you want the audience to know about your research that you are unable to address within the time constraints of your oral presentation of the research.

zh: 而口头发表的部分是以你研究中的一到两个亮点为主来激起听众的兴趣，使他们全神贯注投入到你的演讲中并且在演讲结束时提出问题。
en: The oral presentation focuses on one or two of the highlights of the research and stirs the audience's interest so that they will engage with you at the conclusion of the presentation and ask you questions.

zh: 当然，从事经济学研究，或者是进行任何学术研究也一样，其实都是在绘制地图。
en: Of course doing economics, or for that matter just about any kind of intellectual inquiry, is a kind of mapmaking.

zh: 理论经济学家掌握的经济信息一部分是实实在在的数据，相当于装备有六分仪的探险家的工作结果，一部分是逸事趣闻，相当于旅行者讲述的传说。
en: The economic theorist is in possession of information about the economy, some of it hard data, the equivalent of the work of men with sextants, some of it anecdotal, the equivalent of travelers' tales.

zh: 理论经济学家试图借助这些可靠与不可靠的证据，加上事先的信念（不但证据不足的时候用它来补充，而且有时用它来驾驭显而易见的证据），来描绘一幅经济运行的图画。
en: From this mixture of reliable and unreliable evidence, plus a priori beliefs that are used not only to fill in where evidence is lacking but also in some cases to overrule the apparent evidence, the theorist attempts to put together a picture of how the economy works.

zh: 在整体归纳和假设演绎范式之间，也存在着混合研究方法。
en: Between the holistic-inductive and hypothetico-deductive paradigms lies the mixed method approach.

zh: 混合研究方法在不同方面和程度上融合了定量与定性研究方法。
en: The mixed method approach merges, in different ways and degrees, the methods used by quantitative and qualitative methodologies.

zh: 所有这三种研究方法稍后都将进行细致深入的论述。
en: All three types of methodologies are discussed in further detail later in the chapter.

zh: 最后，货币几乎不能作为一种恰当手段来再现人类需求、欲望、激情和价值的力量和复杂性，即便它能够把欲望从社会限制中解放出来。
en: Money, lastly, hardly satisfies as an appropriate means to represent the strength or the manifold complexity of human wants, desires, passions, and values, even though it has the capacity to liberate desires from social constraints.

zh: “我们发现货币在实质上多少有点像卖淫”，席美尔(1978:377)如是说，马克思(1973)也同样这么认为。
en: "We see in the nature of money itself something of the essence of prostitution," says Simmel (1978: 377) and Marx (1973) concurs.

zh: 弗洛伊德想得更远，他也像我们习惯做法那样，把货币说成某种肮脏的和不洁的东西(“不义之财”、“卑鄙的富人”是常见的说法)。
en: Freud took things even further, picking up on our penchant to describe money as something dirty and unclean ("filthy lucre" and "filthy rich" are common expressions).

zh: 在同化过程中，由于产生了新的身份混合形式，主流文化和少数文化都发生了改变（第三章）。
en: Both mainstream and minority cultures are changed by assimilation through the creation of new hybrid forms of identity (Chapter 3).

zh: 但是，总体而言，少数群体被同化的速度和程度依赖下列两组因素：（1)外部因素，包括特权群体的态度、制度性歧视和结构性作用等(2)群体内部的凝聚力。
en: Nevertheless, in general, the rate and degree of assimilation of a minority group will depend on two sets of factors: (1) external factors, including charter group attitudes, institutional discrimination and structural effects, and (2) internal group cohesiveness.

zh: 在少数群体和特权群体之间，上述这些因素不仅决定了它们之间冲突的特征和程度，而且决定了居住集聚和隔离的空间模式。
en: Between them, these factors determine not only the degree and nature of conflict between minority groups and the charter group, but also the spatial patterns of residential congregation and segregation.

zh: 通过将编码的数据组成频数分布，研究者得以使用集中趋势量数来进一步分析数据。
en: Having organised the coded data into frequency distributions, the researcher is able to comment further on the data by using measures of central tendency.

zh: 集中趋势量数能够使调查者以一个数字来报告结果（在此情况下指的是频数分布）。
en: Measures of central tendency are used to enable researchers to report on the results (in this case frequency distributions) as one number.

zh: 集中趋势量数——众数、中位数和算术平均数——与具体的测量层次有关。
en: The measures of central tendency — mode, median and mean — are associated with specific levels of measurement.

zh: 研究者可能放弃使用编码簿或者计算机软件来帮助进行数据分析，这取决于调査本身的特点。
en: Depending on your study, you may choose not to use code books or computer software to assist with your data analysis.

zh: 如果调査的样本很小或者只有为数不多的几个问题，并且该研究的目的是描述性的，那么就可以选择此种方法。
en: You may decide this if your sample is small, and/or you only have a limited number of questions, and the purpose of your study is descriptive.

zh: 然而，在大多数的旅游研究中，情况并非如此。
en: However, such a decision would usually not be the case in most tourism studies.

zh: 如果觉得采用电脑分析不能有所保证，研究者就可以采用人工编码及输人作为一种更好的选择。
en: Should you decide that engaging in computer analysis is not warranted, you may choose to use manual coding and entry as a better alternative.

zh: 在此情况下，研究者需要把数据输人记录单(参见表9-1),然后制定频数分布报告。
en: In this case, you would enter data into tally sheets (see table 9.1), which would then be developed into frequency distribution reports.

zh: 不过，马克思预期“科学和技术将创造一个容易理解和可以操控的世界”，同时预期“只有资本主义关系才会妨碍”我们与自然的代谢关系之间合理调节。他的这些预期必然受到质疑。
en: Nevertheless, Marx's expectation that "science and technology would create an intelligible and controllable world as well as the expectation that only capitalist relations stand in the way of a rational regulation of our metabolism with nature, have to be questioned.

zh: 这意味着对历史—地理唯物主义某些假设的挑战。
en: And this implies a challenge to some of the presumptions of historical–geographical materialism.

zh: 路访基本上是在旅游过程的往返阶段开展的，这些调查能捕捉到旅游市场上最新的趋势（Hurst 1994)。
en: En-route surveys are conducted during the travel experience, primarilythe travel-to phase or the return travel phase.These surveys enable trendsin travel markets to be kept up-to-date (Hurst 1994).

zh: 航空公司应用路访开展调查已达40年之久。
en: En-route surveyshave been used by airlines for some forty years.

zh: 路访虽然成本低廉，但是并不适用于人口普查。
en: They are cost-effective,but they do not achieve a census.

zh: 路访的程序包括选择时间和地点（比如每5年在国际机场进行调查）、制订时间表、调查出境的乘客、天数和时段。
en: The process involves selecting a placeand time, such as international airports every five years, as well as theschedules, outward-bound passengers, days and times.

zh: 最后，要考虑参与者的个性特征——包括诸如性别、年龄和/或家庭生命周期等。
en: Finally, consideration is given to the characteristics of the passengers who are to participate — selection may be by gender, age and/or family life cycle.

zh: 任何研究都有可能在假设检验中出现错误。
en: In any study, there is always a possibility of error being introduced in the testing of hypotheses.

zh: 错误可分为一类错误和二类错误两种类型。
en: The errors may be described as one of two types — Type I or Type II .

zh: 一类错误指零假设被证伪，而事实上该假设成立。
en: Type I errors occur when the null hypothesis is rejected when in fact it is true.

zh: 二类错误指当零假设事实上不成立但却被证实。
en: Type II errors occur when the null hypothesis is accepted when in fact it is false.

zh: 表9 - 8概括了假设检验中产生的错误类型。
en: Table 9.8 outlines the types of error that may arise in hypothesis testing.

zh: 泽勒（Zeller 1991)认为定性研究报告并不是对“数据”而是对“情景”的报道——是研究者与其周围的被调査者的历时性交往的记录……他进一步质疑定性研究领域是否不同于散文、小说或来自于新周刊的生活片段式案例研究。
en: Zeller (1991) suggests that qualitative studies don't report out 'data'; they report 'scenes' — that is accounts of researchers' engagements over time with informants in their surroundings....Zeller asks further whether qualitative field studies are different from the nonfictional novel, or from slice-of-life case studies from the New Journalism.

zh: 定性研究有其独特的报道方式吗？
en: Do qualitative studies have a distinctive reporting style?

zh: ……一组田野观察可以以不同的方式来诠释——以诗歌的形式或以连载短文或以戏剧或故事的形式。
en: ... a set of field observations can be rendered differently — in poetic form . . . or as a series of vignettes ... or as scenes or stories.

zh: 社会科学报告与美学素材的“象征”或“修辞”文体之间的界限已经变得模糊（Miles & Huberman 1994, pp. 298-9) 。
en: A blurring of the frontiers seems to occur between social scientific reporting and 'figurative' or 'rhetorical' renditions of aesthetic material (Miles & Huberman 1994, pp. 298-9).

zh: 定量研究方法植根于实证主义社会科学范式。这一范式主要反映了自然科学的研究方法，且在研究过程中主要采用演绎法。
en: Quantitative research is grounded in the positivist social sciences paradigm that primarily reflects the scientific method of the natural sciences.Such a paradigm adopts a deductive approach to the research process.

zh: 因此，就旅游研究而言，定量研究方法始于某一特定旅游现象的理论或假说，并通过对从现实世界中收集的信息进行分析，以支持或推翻该假说。
en: As such, it commences with theories or hypotheses about a particular tourism phenomenon, gathers data from the real-world setting and then analyses the data to support or rejecthypotheses.

zh: 结果产生了 “不同事务之不可比较的时空之间的复杂相互作用” ，而不是“由确定的历法框架所定义的同质性时空”。
en: The effect is to generate a "complex interplay of the incommensurable spacetimes of different transactions," rather than "any homogeneous spacetime defined by determinate calendric frames."

zh: 但是，不可比较并不意味着没有联系。
en: But incommensurable does not mean unconnected.

zh: 加瓦人的活动恰恰把一个时空和价值形态的领域同另一个领域联系在一起。
en: A lot of Gawan activity is precisely about linking one domain of space–time and value formation to another.

zh: 出生日期抽样法：在这种方法中，抽样框是由参与者的出生日期构成，并采用和名称方法同样的程序进行样本单元的抽取，只是用出生日期代替了名称。
en: Date of birth method: With this method, the sampling frame is constructed using participants ' date of birth and selection follows the same procedure as the name method, only birth dates are used instead.

zh: 出生日期是随机抽取的，在抽样框中的那个日期的所有记录被确定为一个数字，接着用简单随机抽样程序(抽签方法、随机数表或电脑方法)抽取样本单位。
en: A birth date is randomly selected, and all records for that date listed in the sampling frame are then assigned a number and the simple random sampling procedure (the lottery method, a table of random numbers or computer generation ) is repeated.

zh: 同样，这个程序的选取也可能需要重复。

en: Again, there may be several iterations of this process.

zh: 关于物理科学，很少有人反对为了研究复杂系统，必须建立简化模型的想法。
en: When it comes to physical science, few people have problems with the idea that to study complex systems it is necessary to build simplified models.

zh: 可是当我们讨论社会科学，整个建模的问题就会引起人们的不满。
en: When we turn to social science, however, the whole issue of modeling begins to raise people's hackles.

zh: 用一些简化（这个过程至少部分受已有技术的限制）的东西来代表相关系统的想法就一下子遭到强烈反对。
en: Suddenly the idea of representing the relevant system through a set of simplifications that are dictated at least in part by the available techniques becomes highly objectionable.

zh: 建议是以研究结果、研究假设及研究目标和目的为基础的。
en: Recommendations are grounded in the research findings and the research hypotheses and/or aims and objectives.

zh: 倘若建议被采纳，那么建议的执行首先就解释了实施该项研究的意义所在。
en: If the recommendations are adopted, then the reason for the research being conducted in the first place should be solved by the implementation of the recommendations.

zh: 建议应该包括一系列可供委托人选择的备选方案，影响建议选择的各种限制因素包括人才、资金及时间，等等。
en: Recommendations should include a range of alternatives from which the client can choose, as personnel, monetary and time constraints may influence which recommendations are adopted and why.

zh: 渐进法与持续比较分析十分相似，与草根理论分析所采用的开放式、轴心式和选择式编码等编码方法也十分相似（Neuman 2000)。
en: Successive approximation is similar to constant comparative analysis.It is also similar to open, axial and selective coding (Neuman 2000), themethods of coding used in grounded theory analysis.

zh: 根据纽曼(2000)的理论，研究人员能够通过如下方法对分析进行提炼：连续反复编码和分门别类；从假设性编码着手直到反复修改、检验作为概念、关系和“理论”出现的编码。
en: According to Neuman (2000), the researcher is able to refine their analysis by successively repeating the coding and categorising processes; commencing with the first tentative codes through to the repeatedly modified and examined codes that emerge as concepts, relationships and 'theory'.

zh: 通过渐进法，“证据和理论得以相互影响”（Neuman 2000,p.427)。
en: Through successive approximation, 'the evidence and theory shape each other' (Neuman 2000, p. 427).

zh: 交叉表能够使调査者同时展现两个变量的信息，且能够判断两个变量之间是否相关。
en: Cross-tabulation enables the researcher to present information on two variables simultaneously and to determine whether any relationship exists between the two variables.

zh: 这样的关系能用二元表格来求出，也就是说，二元表格能够使调查者采用交叉列表来表示两个变量。
en: Such relationships can be determined using bivariate tables — that is, bivariate tables enable the researcher to crosstabulate two variables.

zh: 任何测量层次的变量(定类、定序、定距和定比)都可以构造二元表格。
en: Bivariate tables can be constructed with variables measured at any level (nominal, ordinal, interval and ratio).

zh: 当制作二元表格时,通常自变量用列表示，因变量用行表示。
en: When preparing bivariate tables, the independent variable is presented in the columns and the dependent variable is presented in the rows.

zh: 外部行车成本(External trip cost)等于交通拥挤的外部性的货币价值。
en: The external trip cost equals the monetary value of the congestion externality.

zh: 假定行驶时间的机会成本为每分钟10美分。E栏数字就是在此基础上计算出的。
en: The figures in column E are based on the assumption that the opportunity cost of travel time is 10 cents per minute.

zh: 焦点群体法是一种集中的或半结构化的群体访谈(Minichiello, Aroni, Timewell& Alexander 1995)。
en: Focus groups may be described as focused or semi-structured group interviews (Minichiello, A r o n i , Timewell & Alexander 1995).

zh: 在这种调查过程中，研究对象的所有成员被同时采访，而不是逐个被采访。
en: Instead of interviewing participants individually, study participants are interviewed together.

zh: 焦点群体法通常在以下情况下采用：当采访者想要得到对于旅游相关概念的看法、意见和态度时，比如目的地形象、产品评价、关于主客关系的看法和价值取向以及当地居民对于旅游发展的看法和价值衡量。
en: Focus groups are used when an interviewer wants to determine points of view, opinions and attitudes towards tourism-related concepts such as destination image, product testing, attitudes and values associated with host-guest interactions, and the attitudes and values of local residents to tourism developments.

zh: 它的公园用地很少孩子们在街上玩耍。那儿没有超级街区(车辆禁行街区），甚至连像样一点的大街区(districts)也没有，有的只是非常小的街区;用规划的行话来说就是“支离破碎，街道浪费。
en: It has little park-land.Children play in the streets.Instead of super-blocks, or even decently large blocks, it has very small blocks; in planning parlance it is "badly cut up with wasteful streets."

zh: ”那儿的建筑都已老化。
en: Its buildings are old.

zh: 所有的东西在北端都像是搁错了位置。
en: Everything conceivable is presumably wrong with the North End.

zh: 结论可以分为第一结论和第二结论。
en: Conclusions may be described as first and second order conclusions.

zh: 第一结论是统计性叙述，例如“79%的一日游游客对马蹄海湾的设施表示满意”。
en: First order conclusions are statistical statements, such as '79% of daytrippers were satisfiedwith the facilities at Horseshoe Bay'.

zh: 第二结论将统计性叙述或事实叙述与其他研究结论联系在一起，例如“79%的一日游游客对马蹄海湾的可利用设施感到满意，这要高于格林绍1996年报告中的数字：47%的一日游游客对马蹄海湾的可利用设备感到满意”。
en: Second order conclusions link the statistical or factual statements to other research, such as 'While 79% of daytrippers were satisfied with the facilities available at Horseshoe Bay, this ishigher than the number identified by Grimshaw (1996), who reported that 47% of daytrippers were satisfied with the facilities available at Horseshoe Bay'.

zh: 总体而言，结论部分对报告进行总结并对未来研究方向进行评论。
en: The conclusion section summarises the report and comments on future directions.

zh: 研究结果/成果部分所占篇幅最大（Sarantakos 1993, p. 428)。
