en: The largest part of a report is the findings/results section (Sarantakos 1993, p. 428).

zh: 这一部分通常始于描述调查的回复率、无回复率及拒绝调查率，以此说明研究结果的代表性。
en: This section usually commences with the response rates, non-response and refusals.The representativeness of the results is also affirmed.

zh: 该部分对变量及其相互间的关系进行了描述。
en: This section includes a description of variables and their relationships.

zh: 对结果的描述包括文字叙述、表格、图表及曲线图。
en: The description of the results includes textual statements, tables, figures and graphs.

zh: 通常在图表和曲线图前后要用简短的文字加以介绍。
en: Tables and graphs are introduced with brief sentences both before and after the tables and graphs are presented.

zh: 该部分只描述研究成果和结果，而不对其进行分析、解释或讨论。
en: This section only presents the results and findings — it does not analyse, interpret or discuss results.

zh: 在揭示有关正义的主张时，后现代思想家们暗示，他们的工作服务于某个更加有效但却不确定的正义观念。
en: In unmasking such claims about justice, postmodem thinkers imply that their work serves some more valid but unspecified notion of justice.

zh: 人们在德里达有关“解构即正义”的主张中看到这一点，但也在他“人们既不能直接谈论正义也不能体验正义”的警告中看到这一点。
en: One sees this in Derrida's declaration that "Deconstruction is justice," but also in his cautioning that one can neither speak directly about nor experience justice.

zh: 在回应对他者的责任感时，人们服从正义，不过却感到这项任务具有无限的、开放的特点。
en: In answering the sense of responsibility to otherness, one serves justice but one does so with a sense of the infinite, open-ended character of the task.

zh: 降雨的小变化能够使植被系统从一种状态转为另一种状态。
en: Small shifts of rainfall can move the vegetation system to one or another of them.

zh: 当一个变化准备就绪，它就会转向一个稳定的状态。
en: Once a change is set in train, it moves towards one of the stable states.

zh: 这种看法也支持了霍姆格伦和谢弗（Holmgren and Scheffer, 2001）的论点，即在管理植被覆盖的时候，可能最好等待降水的变化以创造朝向我们所希望的稳定状态的条件。
en: This also supports the arguments of Holmgren and Scheffer (2001) that, in managing the vegetation cover, it might be best to wait until the turns in rainfall create the conditions that will lead towards a new desired stable state.

zh: 从第一点还可以理解，在植被对气候响应表现非线性性质的情况下，把地貌过程的变化（特别是土壤侵蚀）视为气候变化直接的线性结果的解释必须谨慎对待。
en: It also follows that the interpretation of shifts in geomorphological process (notably soil erosion) as a direct, linear consequence of climate change needs to be treated with caution, given the non-linear nature of vegetation responses.

zh: 在设计调查的过程中，首要的工作是识别研究目标或假设，然后确定试图研究的变量。
en: In constructing surveys, first you need to be cognisant of your aims or hypotheses, and then you need to consider the variables you are attempting to study.

zh: 比如，在描述性调查中，研究者将验证描述性假设(Saramakos 1998, P.134)。
en: For example, in descriptive surveys, researchers are testing descriptive hypotheses (Sarantakos 1998, p. 134).

zh: 这样，在描述性假设中你要试图弄清楚“是谁”、“是什么”、“怎么样”的问题。
en: Thus, in descriptive surveys, you want to determine the 'who', 'what' and 'how'.

zh: 在前期的讨论中，会涉及年龄、性别、目的地和旅游的原因——这些是描述性定量研究的关键变量。
en: In an earlier discussion, age, gender, destination and reason for travel were mentioned — these are key 'variables' in descriptive quantitative research.

zh: 在解释性调査中，研究者要验证相关性假设(Sarantakos 1998, p.134)并着手考虑因变量、自变量、外生变量和干涉变量。
en: In explanatory surveys, researchers are testing relational hypotheses (Sarantakos 1998, p. 134) and consideration of independent, dependent, extraneous and intervening variables needs to be undertaken by the researcher.

zh: 一些门口会聚集大批人群的地方，如学校和剧院以及一些商店的门前可以增加一些行人过路的空间，这些空间会向车辆行驶的马路空间延伸，这样就会产生“限制”作用，而且这种作用会是长期的而不是短暂的。
en: Spots of intense congregation outside schools,  some theaters, certain  store groupings, could be given outdoor lobbies intruding partially into the vehicular roadbed, thus making their attrition value permanent instead of ephemeral.

zh: 一些小的公园可以横跨街道，这样就可以截断某些街道的车辆通行。
en: Small parks could be carried across a street, thereby creating dead ends.

zh: 当然，与此同时，也还允许车辆到达这个街道，但是除了紧急情况外，这些地方不应是直通街。
en: These would still permit, from either direction, vehicular service access to a street.But they would prevent vehicular through traffic except in emergency.

zh: 合成理论（compositional theory)是从芝加哥决定论派生出的另一学派之产物。
en: Compositional theory is the product of another school of thought that has developed out of the writings of the Chicago determinists.

zh: 合成论者强调，不同社会群体的凝聚是基于民族、亲缘、邻居、职业或者生活方式，而这种社会网络并不 会被城市生活削弱。
en: Compositionalists emphasize the cohesion and intimacy of distinctive social worlds based on ethnicity, kinship, neighbourhood, occupation or lifestyle, rejecting the idea that these social networks are in any way diminished by urban life (e.g.

zh: 他们同时也认为，人类行为受城市生活的心理影响极小，它基本上是由经济地位、文化特征和家庭地位等决定的，而这些因素也决定了人们从属于哪个社会群体。
en: Gans, 1962).They also minimize the psychological effects of city life on people’s behaviour, suggesting, instead, that behaviour is determined largely by economic status, cultural characteristics, family status and so on: the same attributes that determine which social worlds they live in.

zh: 这就意味着，应该用一套更加系统的政治、制度安排以及调控实践来取代专门的、分裂的，及官僚的国家调控方法。
en: This means that the ad hoc, fragmented and bureaucratic approach to state regulation should be replaced by a far more systematic set of politics, institutional arrangements, and regulatory practices.

zh: 不能指望未来对自己负责，有必要设计从长远看来对可持续经济增长和经济发展来说是好的策略，这种说法有道理。
en: The future, it is argued, cannot be expected to look after itself and some sorts of calculations are necessary to configure what would be a good strategy for sustainable economic growth and economic development in the long run.

zh: 这个表达的关键词是“可持续性” 。
en: The key word in this formulation is "sustainability."

zh: 第一个例子来自社会性之流中全部“环节” 中最困难的，即有关人类信仰、欲望、幻想、恐惧、梦和价值等领域的环节。
en: The first case is drawn from that most difficult of all "moments" in the flow of sociality: that which concerns the realms of human belief, desires, fantasies, fears, dreams, and values.

zh: 弗洛伊德以来，这已经成为精神分析的主要领域。
en: Since Freud, this has become the privileged terrain of psychoanalysis.

zh: 精神分析对欲望及其实现/否定/压抑的理解现在常常作为一种不可还原的“自由”要素占据着优先地位，因此成为“真正的”变革地点。
en: A psychoanalytic understanding of desire and its realization/denial/repression is now frequently privileged as an irreducible "moment" of freedom and as, therefore, the "true" locus of change.

zh: 不过，地方之间的竞争不只是吸引生产的问题。
en: Inter-place competition is not simply about attracting production, however.

zh: 它也是吸引消费者(特别是那些富人)的问题，为此它创造了诸如文化中心、惬意的城市或地区风景等等这些令人愉快的设施。
en: It is also about attracting consumers (particularly the affluent) through the creation of amenities such as a cultural center, a pleasing urban or regional landscape, and the like.

zh: 对消费景观进行投资、出售地方形象、争夺文化和象征资本的定义、恢复作为消费吸引力的同地方有关的本国传统等等，所有这些都成为地方间竞争的一个部分。
en: Investment in consumption spectacles, the selling of images of places, competition over the definition of cultural and symbolic capital, the revival of vernacular traditions associated with places as a consumer attraction, all become conflated in inter-place competition.

zh: 文化理论学家因此强调身体特征的不稳定的和可塑的特征。
en: Cultural theorists stress the unstable and malleable character of bodily identities.

zh: 性别、性取向、文化以及人们之间的其他自然差异并不是自然存在的，而是与特定空间相联系的“文化表现”。
en: Gender, sexuality, cultural and other physical differences between people are not natural entities but ‘cultural performances’ related to particular spaces.

zh: 这种过程被称之为“具化”（‘embodiment’），身体由此而在更广泛意义体系中被社会化构造。
en: The processes through which the body is socially constructed in spaces by wider systems of meaning is also known as embodiment.

zh: 现代地理学家的工作不像人本主义地理学家那样赞美人类的创造力与个人特性，他们致力于更苛刻地从质疑政治身份与政治交叉点两方面研究身份问题（Rose, 1995）。
en: Unlike humanistic geographical work that celebrated human creativity, agency and individuality, other geographical work has engaged more critically with questions of identity by interrogating both the politics of identity and the political intersections of place and identity (Rose, 1995).

zh: 此类工作中最近的重要主题是以具体化语言对身份有所了解和进行解释（Butler, 1999; McDowell, 1999; Longhurst, 2000; Valentine, 2001）。
en: An important theme within such work has been to understand and interpret identities in embodied terms (Butler, 1999; McDowell, 1999; Longhurst, 2000; Valentine, 2001).

zh: 具体化的概念，不仅对身份的研究，而且更广泛地对知识的增进也具有重要意义。
en: Ideas about embodiment have important implications not only for studying identity but also for the production of knowledge more widely.

zh: 事实上，城市并不是模型中的核心概念。
en: Indeed, cities are not primitive concepts in the model.

zh: 相反，单个厂商生产能力的规模报酬递增，运输成本和要素流动性等因素之间的相互作用导致了聚集现像的出现。
en: Instead, agglomerations emerge from the interaction between increasing returns at the level of the individual production facility transportation costs, and factor mobility.

zh: 由于规模报酬递增，每一种产品在有限几处集中生产更有利。
en: Because of increasing returns, it is advantageous to concentrate production of each good at a few locations.

zh: 相形之下，在自然地理学范围内，距离的概念仍然是强烈的绝对空间、以欧氏几何术语定义的空间、米制的空间。
en: In comparison, within physical geography, concepts of distance have remained strongly absolute and defined in terms of Euclidean and metric space.

zh: 也许我们本应指望一贯强调绝对空间的自然地理学家接受这项挑战，更侧重于空间分析。
en: Perhaps physical geographers, with their ongoing emphasis on absolute space, could have been expected to take up the challenge and to focus more on spatial analysis.

zh: 但是，他们一般都选择反对这种途径，贬低或无视空间分析。
en: However, they have generally also chosen to reject this pathway and downgrade or neglect spatial analysis.

zh: 以上问题都是封闭式的，因为答案已经事先规定好了。
en: The above response sets are described as closed, because the answers have been predeter mined.

zh: 另外一种类型的问题是开放式问题，它在问卷上留出空白空间或给予受访者足够时间完成问卷。
en: Another type of question is the open-ended question, and it is posed with space on the questionnaire or sufficient time for the respondent to reply.

zh: 开放式问题可能要采用第三章描述的内容分析法进行分析，否则回答将可能简化为分类以及数字化的编码和分析。
en: The open-ended question might be analysed using content analysis procedures described in chapter 3, or the responses might be reduced to categories and numerically coded and analysed.

zh: 这些可憎的思想反映了一种占优势的正统，但同时也激起了热烈的辩论。
en: Such distasteful ideas reflected a prevailing orthodoxy but they also provoked spirited debate.

zh: 尽管环境决定论和科学种族主义常常互相强化，但也可能互相矛盾。
en: While environmental determinism and scientific racism  were often mutually reinforcing ideas, they could also contradict one another.

zh: 有些种族论者假定，各“种族”均被固定在一个不变的“天然”级序，这个级序就是从不同起点出发的截然不同的发育系列中当前的表现(多元发生论)。
en: Some racial theorists assumed that different ‘races’ were fixed in an unchanging ‘natural’ hierarchy, the contemporary manifestation of quite distinct evolutionary sequences from different points of departure (polygenesis).

zh: 时间理解上的对立是显而易见的(参阅本书第七章)。
en: The opposition in the sense of time is obvious (see chapter 7).

zh: 如果实践是资本主义性质的，那么时间范围就不可能是环境主义者坚持的那种。
en: If the practices are capitalistic, then the time horizon cannot be that to which environmentalists cleave.

zh: 可持续性修辞的目标在于使公共政策考虑市场之外的时间范围。
en: The purpose of the rhetoric of sustainability is to direct public policy towards thinking about time horizons well beyond those encountered in the market.

zh: 但是，莱布尼茨关心上帝的创造性和完美性。
en: But Leibniz is concerned with God's creativity and perfection.

zh: 他认为，牛顿把上帝置于时间和空间中，就好像上帝的行为是前定的，或者甚至好像时空的属性先于上帝。
en: He thought that the Newtonian view placed God in space and time as if either God's actions were predetermined or even as if the properties of space and time preceded God.

zh: 承认多种可能世界(每一个世界都具有自己的运动法则)中的时空多元性，就是承认，我们占据的物理世界是上帝的创造性选择和意志的表现。
en: The discussion of a plurality of spaces and times within multiple possible worlds (each with its own laws of motion) recognizes that the physical world we occupy is an expression of God's creative choice and will.

zh: 对莱布尼茨来说，上帝的完美性产生了“所有可能世界中最好的”。
en: For Leibniz, God's perfection delivers "the best of all possible worlds?

zh: 对相当不同的时间和空间之可能秩序进行探究是要阐明上帝选择的特殊性质。
en: The exploration of quite different possible orderings of space and time is meant to illuminate the particular qualities of God's choice.

zh: 克里格法能够帮助识别出哪些尺度其过程是重要的,不同的现象是怎样在空间中显示出连贯性的。
en: Kriging helps identify the scales over which certain processes remain important and how different phenomena show continuity in space.

zh: 这些方法大大改进了传统的制图技术——过去,当遇到空间中分散的观测物时,需要综合运用知识、判断和纯粹的猜测在图上画出等值线。现代的地统计学方法使得插值法的运用更为精确。
en: Such methods provide a real improvement on traditional mapping techniques – in the old days, when faced with a scatter of observations in space, one used a mixture of knowledge, judgment and pure guesswork to draw the isolines on a map.

zh: 显然，如果按照实证主义范式进行研究，那么在研究过程中是不应该出现这种互惠性，因为实证主义者认为这种互惠性改变了研究过程的客观本质。
en: Obviously, such involvement on the part of the researcher in the research process would not be condoned by researchers operating from a positivist paradigm, as this type of reciprocity would be considered to alter the objective nature of the research process.

zh: 从实证主义的观点看，这种指责是正确的。
en: And such an accusation would be correct from a positivist viewpoint.

zh: 然而，从解释社会学范式、批评理论、后结构主义/后现代主义，特别是从女性主义范式的视角来看，这种所谓的客观性与现实的社会结构是对立的。
en: However, from the interpretive social sciences, critical theory, poststructuralist/postmodern and especially feminist perspectives, such objectivity is the antithesis of the social construction of reality.

zh: 在人类身体上发挥作用的过程正在变化，并且人类身体的细微差别如其同质化那样显著。
en: The processes at work on the human body are changing and the differentiation of human bodies is as marked as its homogenization.

zh: 因此，我们的“万物尺度”自身是不稳定的且相互冲突的。
en: As a consequence, our "measure of all things" is itself unstable and conflictual.

zh: 它总是如此。
en: It has always been so.

zh: 20世纪之初掀起了一场关于“大国”前途的充满焦虑的辩论。
en: The onset of the twentieth century provoked a rather anxious debate about the future of the ‘great powers’.

zh: 许多人认为1900年标志着世界历史的转折点，是欧洲持续扩张400年的终结。
en: Many believed that 1900 would mark a turning point in world history, the end of a 400-year period of continuous European expansion.

zh: 世界地图上未探查过和未被认领的“空白”空间在迅速减少，或者看来是如此，“世界封闭”之意呼之欲出。
en: The unexplored and unclaimed ‘blank’ spaces on the world map were rapidly diminishing, or so it seemed, and the sense of a ‘global closure’ was palpable.

zh: 最近几年，人们提出了这样一种与众不同但却相当普及的主张：“空间”规定了差异、他性、没有管束、不可预见、意外等等领域，因此也规定作用地点和解放政治支点。
en: In recent years, the extraordinary, but now quite widespread claim, has been advanced that "space" defines the realm of difference, of otherness, the uncontrolled, the unpredictable, the unexpected, and, hence, the locus of agency and the leveraging point for emancipatory politics.

zh: 空间为全部有关社会过程的元理论规定了不可驯服的残余。
en: Space defines the untamable residual to all metatheories of the social process.

zh: 这些非常强烈的主张值得我们批判性详察。
en: These are very strong claims that deserve critical scrutiny.

zh: 它们预示了这个问题，如何理解有关行动和社会决定问题的差异地理学和理论化的空间性。
en: They presage the question of how to understand the geography of difference, the spatiality of theorizations, in relation to the issues of agency and social determination.

zh: 空间障碍的消除和“通过时间消灭空间”的斗争对于全部资本积累的动态来说都是根本性的，并且在资本过度积累危机时期更是剧烈。
en: The elimination of spatial barriers and the struggle to "annihilate space by time" is essential to the whole dynamic of capital accumulation and becomes particularly acute in crises of capital overaccumulation.

zh: 通过向新领域的地理扩张以及建构全新的空间关系来吸收剩余资本(有时是剩余劳动力)可以说是很显著的。
en: The absorption of surpluses of capital (and sometimes labor) through geographical expansion into new territories and through the construction of a completely new set of space relations has been nothing short of remarkable.

zh: 如列斐伏尔(Henri Lefebvre，1974)敏锐地指出的那样，空间关系以及全球空间体制的建构和重构是资本主义残存到20世纪的主要手段之一。
en: The construction and reconstruction of space relations and of the global space economy, as Henri Lefebvre (1974) acutely observes, has been one of the main means to permit the survival of capitalism into the twentieth century.

zh: “正在变成”的概念和对形成尺度的政治关注是唯物主义者全球性尺度论点的核心。
en: The notion of ‘becoming’ and the focus on the politics of producing scales have been central to materialist arguments concerning the global scale.

zh: 因此，他们把很多注意力都投在了研究跨国公司是如何“走向全球化”的，管理制度是如何“变成”超越国界的，工会是如何谋求其运作的“全球化”以适应日益“全球化”的资本运作。
en: Thus, there has been much attention paid to how transnational corporations have ‘gone global’, how institutions of governance have ‘become’ supranational and how labour unions have sought to ‘globalize’ their operations to match those of an increasingly ‘globalized’ capital.

zh: 在这种方法中，不能设想把社会行动主体和过程在其中运作的各种尺度同造就了这些尺度的行动主体与过程割裂开来。
en: In such an approach, the various scales at which social actors and processes operate cannot be conceived of as separate from the actors and processes that create them.

zh: 雷坡（1989）指出，有必要建立本学科的核心基础。
en: Leiper (1989) suggests there is a need for the establishment of a central ground.

zh: 该基础应建立在跨学科研究方法之上，因为利用多学科的研究方法而非跨学科的研究方法对旅游学的学科发展是无益的。
en: This ground should be interdisciplinary based, as the use of a multidisciplinary approach rather than an interdisciplinary approach is counterproductive to the development of a tourism discipline.

zh: 多学科的研究方法是零散片面的，由此所得出结论也是孤立分散的。
en: A multidisciplinary approach is fragmented with unconnected findings.

zh: 对一个城市的地区或街道来说，老建筑的惟一危害最终会来自建筑的老化——这种危害存在于任何年代久远的东西，任何衰老的东西里。
en: The only harm for aged buildings to a city district or street is the harm that eventually comes of nothing but old age --- the harm that lies in everything being old and everything becoming worn out.

zh: 但是，对于处在这种情况下的城市某个地区来说，并不是因为这个地方年代久了,就会遭遇失败。
en: But a city area in such a situation is not a failure because of being all old.

zh: 情况恰恰相反，这个地区变得又老又旧，是因为这个地方遭遇了失败。
en: It is the other way around.The area is all old because it is a failure.

zh: 围绕这些项目设计问题，并准备五种答案，如：非常赞同、赞同、不确定、不赞同、非常反对。
en: Statements using those items are then prepared with a five-point response set using, for example, strongly agree, agree, undecided, disagree, strongly disagree.

zh: 再就这些问题开展实验性的前测，以确保所列问题的单一尺度性和内部一致性（Samntakos 1998）。
en: A pilot test of the statements is then constructed to determine their unidimensionality and their internal consistency (Sarantakos 1998).

zh: 具有以上两种特性的问题才能用于构成问卷。
en: Those statements with unidimensionality and internal consistency are used in the construction of the questionnaire.

zh: 以下的行业透视给出了李克特量表的使用实例。
en: The following Industry Insight demonstrates the use of a Likert scale.

zh: 采用定性方法进行数据收集和分析的一个关键原则就是：“如果我们确实要理解人们的想法，必须基于他们的观念对其经历进行完整分析，而非基于我们的观念”（Boas 1943，p.314)。
en: The key principle of a qualitative approach to data collection and analysis is that  it is our serious purpose to understand the thoughts of a people, the whole analysis of experience must be based on their concepts, not ours' (Boas 1943, p. 314).

zh: 这要通过“理解”（Weber 1978） —移情式理解来达到（参见第二章）。
en: This is achieved through 'verstehen' (Weber 1978) — that is, empathetic understanding (see chapter 2).

zh: 在研究设计中，指导定性方法论运用的理论范式非常之多。
en: There are a number of theoretical positions that inform the use of a qualitative methodological framework in research design.

zh: 马克斯•韦伯的著作率先在定性数据分析中使用了理想型法（Neuman 2000，p.431)。
en: The use of ideal types in qualitative data analysis is founded in the work of Max Weber (Neuman 2000, p. 431).

zh: “理想型就是社会关系或发展过程的模型或心理抽象。
en: ‘Ideal types are models or mental abstractions of social relations or processes.

zh: 它们是纯粹的标准，以此作为数据或‘事实’的参照标准。理想型是进行比较的工具，因为没有任何事实会完全符合理想型”（Neuman 2000，p.431)。
en: They are pure standards against which the data or "reality" can be compared.An ideal type is a device used for comparison, because no reality ever fits an ideal type' (Neuman 2000, p. 431).

zh: 历时研究是指对同一或相似样本在一定时间段内进行研究。
en: Longitudinal studies involve the study of the same people or a similar sample of people over a set period of time.

zh: 这种研究的数据 可能通过访谈、焦点群体法、参与观察法和文献法（在本章后面进行解释）得到。
en: Data may be collected using interviews, focus groups, participant observation and the documentary method (explained later in the chapter).

zh: 历时研究也可用于定量方法，但因为本章关注的是定性研究方法，因此只讨论有关整体-归纳范式（holistic-inductive paradigm）的方法。
en: Longitudinal studies may also be conducted using quantitative methods; however, as this chapter focuses on qualitative methods, only those methods associated with a holistic-inductive paradigm are discussed.

zh: 联合主题发言是由几个从事相同或相似研究的研究者一起讨论他们的研究成果。
en: Panel sessions involve a group of researchers from the same research project or similar research projects discussing their research findings.

zh: 在这种发言中，研究课题展示了不同的视角，听众人数要比个人发言多，而且互动的效果也更充分。
en: Different perspectives on the overall research topic should be elicited from such discussions and audience engagement and interaction should be higher than during a stand-up presentation.

zh: 这种联合发言通常持续一个小时到一个半小时，其间会有热烈的讨论。
en: Panel sessions usually are allocated one to one-and-a-half hours to allow time for 'lively' debate.

zh: 但是，把笛卡儿的和辩证法的概念看成在各个方面都不相容，如卡普拉(1982)以及某种程度上莱文斯和莱温廷(1985)所做的那样，也是不对的。
en: But it would be wrong to view Cartesian and dialectical conceptions as fundamentally incompatible in all senses, as someone like Capra (1982) and to some degree Levins and Lewontin (1985) tend to do.

zh: 只要再从互补性角度来考察，他们就能为新观点提供丰富的资源。
en: Cast in a more complementary light they can provide a fecund source of new ideas.

zh: 在理论物理学中，19世纪被视为完全不可通约的命题——“物质在其本质上是由粒子组成的，或者是由波组成的”——最终在量子理论中被看作是一个整体。
en: In theoretical physics what were seen in the nineteenth century as radically incommensurable propositions "that matter is in its essence of a particle nature, or that it is of a wave nature," were ultimately treated as a unity under the conception in quantum theory.

zh: 零假设（Ho）——零假设是一种假定检验的变量间无关联的假设。
en: Null hypothesis (Ho) — the null hypothesis is a hypothesis that assumes that there is no relationship between the variables being tested for relationships.

zh: 备择假设——备择假设与零假设是对立的。
en: The alternate hypothesis — the alternate hypothesis states the opposite of the null hypothesis.

zh: 有许多用于备择假设的术语，例如研究假设或实验性假设（H1）。
en: There are a number of other terms that are used for the alternate hypothesis, such as the research hypothesis or the experimental hypothesis ( H1) .

zh: 领土性概念的多数地理学应用，一直基于一种与动物行为的一般类比，而不是作为现象学研究的结果。
en: Most of the geographical use of the concept of territoriality has been based on a general analogy with animal behaviour rather than as the outcome of phenomenological research.

zh: （参见：Tuan，1976, 论群集。）
en: (Though see Tuan, 1976, on crowding.)

zh: 按照这种观点，领土界定既表现为同一物种不同成员之间的竞争，又表现为他们的相互合作。
en: Territorial stakeouts, according to this account, are as much about mutual cooperation between members of a species as about competition.

zh: 实际上，竞争与合作之间是一种辩证关系，在某种条件下，竞争能够成为合作，反之亦然。
en: Indeed, the distinction between competition and cooperation collapses into a dialectical relation in which one can become the other and vice versa under certain conditions.

zh: 英格尔德指出，排他性领土状态只是一种稳定的和排他的财产权功能，这样的权利是社会的产物而非自然所固有的。
en: Exclusionary territoriality, Ingold points out, is solely a function of property rights of a settled and exclusionary sort and such rights are a product of society not inherent in nature.

zh: 但是这些研究和其他研究表明，流散的身份并没有因空间和时间而均质化。
en: But as these works and others make clear, diasporic identities are not homogenized across space and time.

zh: 相反，他们因地点的特殊性以及不同区位、不同尺度的社会生产和再生产关系不均衡地发挥作用的方式而被改变。
en: Rather, they are altered by particularities of place and the unevenness of the ways the social relations of production and reproduction are played out in different locations and at different scales.

zh: 换句话说，相对于早期的认为身份固定地植根于其本质的观点，虽然说空间性带来了某种流动性的概念和身份因社会构建而成的意义，但它也使得身份无限可变的观念成为不可能。
en: In other words, if spatiality confers a certain notion of fluidity and the social constructedness of identity against earlier ideas of fixed identity rooted in a given essence, it also makes impossible notions of identity as infinitely malleable.

zh: 相反，微观研究是抽象的和理论的，包括小样本和寻求查明宏观研究所揭示的产生这种格局背后的因果机制。
en: Intensive research, by contrast, is abstract and theoretical, involves small samples, and seeks to uncover the underlying causal mechanisms that generate the patterns revealed by extensive investigation.

zh: 随机性抽样的住户问卷和对关键答卷者的半组织性访谈就是对这两个要素的简明例子。
en: One simple illustration of these two elements is the randomly-sampled household questionnaire and the semi-structured interview with key respondents.

zh: 另一种例子是对小集水区排水中溶质浓度的监测，结合对山坡土壤间隙水中矿物质稳定场的分析，借以解释坡地排水化学的变化。
en: Another is the systematic monitoring of solute concentrations in the discharge of water from a small catchment, combined with analysis of the mineral stability fields for interstitial water in the hillslope soils in order to explain variation in the slope drainage water chemistry.

zh: 路访基本上是在旅游过程的往返阶段开展的，这些调查能捕捉到旅游市场上最新的趋势（Hurst 1994)。
en: En-route surveys are conducted during the travel experience, primarilythe travel-to phase or the return travel phase.These surveys enable trends in travel markets to be kept up-to-date (Hurst 1994).

zh: 航空公司应用路访开展调查已达40年之久。
en: En-route surveys have been used by airlines for some forty years.

zh: 路访虽然成本低廉，但是并不适用于人口普查。
en: They are cost-effective, but they do not achieve a census.

zh: 在旅游文献中，很多理论方法被用于研究旅游动机。
en: Within tourism literature, a variety of theoretical approaches has been used to study travel motivations.

zh: 这些方法大体上可以分为四类：准（社会）心理学理论、心理曲线图、内在动机理论和社会人口统计及经济背景分析。
en: These approaches may be broadly classified into four groupings: quasi-(socio)-psychological theories; psychographic profiles; intrinsic motivation theories; and socio- demographic and economic profiles.

zh: 对旅游动机研究的批判主要针对他们的一维测定法、后续一维原因分析法以及最主要的出位的（局外人的）视角。
en: The main criticisms of travel motivation studies relate to their unidimensional approach and subsequent unicausal analysis, as well as their predominantiy etic (outsider's) perspectives.

zh: 准备研究计划时还需要了解目标读者。
en: When preparing a research proposal, you need to be aware of your audience.

zh: 读者可能是普通大众、旅游组织/协会、政府机关、商业管理者、其他研究者或学者。
en: The audience may be the general public, tourism organisations and associations, government agencies, business managers, other researchers or academics.

zh: 不同的读者对写作形式有不同的要求（语调、音调、语气和风格）。
en: Each audience will require a specific style of writing (tone, tenor, mode and genre).

zh: 预测调査法根据过去和现在的数据推断未来的类型和趋势。比如：沃加沃加（Wagga Wagga）本地居民对整个地区旅游吸引物了解愈多，则本地居民以及拜访他们的朋友、亲属到访这些吸引物的次数就愈多。
en: Predictive surveys make extrapolations about future patterns and trends based on past and current data sets, for example the more Wagga Wagga residents know about regional tourist attractions, the greater the number of those attractions visited by the locals and their visiting friends and relatives.

zh: 估值调查法通过旧战略和新战略对比，以确定新战略的效果。
en: Evaluative surveys compare past strategies against newly implemented strategies to determine their effectiveness.

zh: 实际上，许多旅游研究都属于应用性研究，但是，这并没有弱化纯理论研究的作用。
en: Essentially, most tourism research is located in the applied research field; however, that is not to downplay the role of pure research.

zh: 正如上面提到的，纯理论研究才是旅游学或与旅游学相关的基础理论的基本来源。
en: As noted above, it is from pure research that the theories we use in tourism or tourism-related disciplines are primarily derived.

zh: 应用性研究是用来收集与某些问题、论题或规划有关的信息的一般性研究。
en: Applied research is generally research that is designed to gather information relating to a problem, issue or planning need.

zh: 例如，1999年，在邻国一个为人熟知的海岸旅游目的地，游客们遭遇到了那些貌似旅游研究者的轮番轰炸。他们不停地询问有关该旅游区域的各个角落甚至是附近街道的各种问题。
en: For example, during 1999, in a particularly popular coastal tourism location in a neighbouring country, tourists were bombarded by supposed tourism researchers on what seemed like every corner of the main precinct and into neighbouring streets.

zh: 为了得到足够多的资料，很多的竞争“研究团队”轮番询问，结果导致每个旅游者回答了无数的问题，甚至每走半公里就被三四个“研究者”拦住询问，为此他们变得愤怒、恼火、粗鲁，最终不得不放弃进人主景区。
en: The intensity of the data gathering by competing 'research teams' was so great that tourists were receiving multiple requests for participation in research and, as a consequence, were becoming aggressive, angry, rude and were choosing not to enter the precinct since in the course of walking half a kilometre they were being intercepted by at least three if not four 'researchers'.

zh: 这些研究者的行为给景区的经营者带来的后果是——他们丧失了游客。
en: The action of these researchers had ramifications for tourism operators in the precinct — they were losing customers.

zh: 第二个就是行动问题。

en: Secondly, there is the related problem of agency.

zh: 由于不再把工人阶级当作当代历史当事人，法兰克福学派在寻求替代性的行动地点时就存在着困难。
en: Having laid aside the working class as the agent of contemporary history, the Frankfurt School had difficulty in finding an alternative locus of action.

zh: 固然，有几个人发现了某种替代，如马尔库塞信任(由爱欲武装起来的)青年造反派，哈贝马斯在新社会运动中致力于建构一种交往行动的伦理学。
en: To be sure, several of them found some sort of alternative — Marcuse put his faith in youthful rebellion (powered by Eros) and Habermas in new social movements dedicated to the construction of an ethics of communicative action.

zh: 澳大利亚社会学协会和奥特亚罗瓦社会学协会的伦理准则发展而来。
en: The Code of Ethics of the Australian and New Zealand Association for Leisure Studies (ANZALS) (see appendix 5) was developed from the Australian Sociological Association and the Sociological Association of Aotearoa.

zh: 这些原则的目的是要涵盖在教学和研究中的伦理问题，同时也要包含与职业操守和出版伦理相关的一些准则。
en: The code aims to cover ethical issues in teaching and research as well as ethical issues associated with professional behaviour and the role of ethics in publications.

zh: 这些原则对伦理问题进行了阐述，是有关研究参与者、研究契约的执行、教学研究的伦理责任的具体方针。
en: The code posits an ethical statement, which is followed by specific guidelines regarding ethical responsibilities to research participants, the conduct of contractual research, teaching and student research.

zh: 旅游研究者不仅属于旅游接待业研究领域，它还属于一个包括更多学科的科学领域。
en: The tourism researcher belongs not only to the tourism and hospitalityresearch community but also to the larger scientific community comprising all disciplinary areas.

zh: 作为这两个团体的成员，旅游研究者有义务遵循研究的伦理规范。
en: As a member of both communities, the tourism researcher is obliged to follow rules for the ethical conduct of research.

zh: 任何与伦理原则相冲突的行为不仅会影响研究者本人，对整个组织成员的声誉也将造成很大的影响。因此，为了确保所有的研究者都按照伦理的原则行事,各个不同的学科领域也已构建了自己的伦理准则。
en: Any misconduct in relation to the rules of ethical conduct affects not only the individual tourism researcher but also the reputation of all members of the wider scientific community, in order to ensure that all researchers act in an ethical manner, various disciplinary areas have developed their own codes of ethics.

zh: 逻辑整理：这种类型的整理是与不遵循“如果——那么”框架/情节的答案的记录相关的(Babbie 1995)。
en: Contingency cleaningThis type of cleaning relates to the recording of responses that do not follow'if-then' scenarios (Babbie 1995).

zh: 巴比提供了一个例子:一个受访者被问及他们生了多少个孩子，如果一些男性登录了许多孩子，这就暗示着输入的错误。
en: Babbie provides the example that an interviewee may be asked how many children they have given birth to.If any men have recorded a number of children, this indicates an error in entry.

zh: “如果——那么”框架的想法就是“如果你是一个女人，那么你才有潜能生孩子”。
en: The 'if- then' scenario is ' if you are a woman, then you have the potential to givebirth to a child'.

zh: 当研究者想研究一个地理区域上的组群时，就使用这种研究方法。
en: This method of sampling is used when researchers want to study clusters in geographical areas.

zh: 举一个例子，假设我们研究居民对在特鲁安(Tourville)城建设赌场或度假地的态度。
en: As an example, assume another hypothetical study — the study of residents' attitudes to the development of a casino/resort in the city Tourville.

zh: 研究设计是使用随机抽样对成年居民进行面对面的访问。
en: The research design involves a face-to-face interview with adult residents using random sampling.

zh: 鉴于特鲁安城有1 000万人口，不能对所有的居民进行研究，所以我们必须进行抽样。
en: Since Tourville has a population of one million , not all residents can be included, so a sample must be undertaken.

zh: 但是这种形象化的、男性的和工人阶级的民族特性也有赖于女性的专心于家务。
en: But in this image such an embodied, masculine and working-class national identity also depends on feminized domesticity.

zh: 画面上男人和他的妻儿站在一起，通过门槛可以看到整洁有序的家。
en: The man is pictured with his wife and child, and the viewer can look into the tidy and well-ordered home beyond the threshold.

zh: 当男人从家中凝视远方并无视其妻子与观赏者的凝视时，他的妻子充满爱意地仰望着他。
en: While the man gazes into the distance away from home and beyond the gaze of both his wife and the viewer, his wife looks up at him lovingly.

zh: 案例研究法有时会与民族志或参与观察法相混淆（Yin 1994)。它们其实是不同的。
en: Case studies are sometimes confused with ethnography or participant observation (Yin 1994).
However, they are not the same.

zh: 实际上，案例研究可以综合运用参与观察法和民族志来收集某个案例或系列案例的数据。
en: In fact, case studies incorporate the use of pardcipant observation and ethnography as part of the repertoire of methods that may be used to gather data on a specific case or set of cases.

zh: 美国的“明智利用” 运动根源于一个长期的传统：反对联邦政府管制私有财产的权力。
en: The “wise use” movement in the United States has its roots in a long tradition of opposition to the powers of the federal government to regulate private property.

zh: 西部养牛场利益集团反对联邦政府控制美国西部大片土地而发动的所谓“sage-brush叛乱”只是那段历史中的一个事件。
en: The so-called "sage-brush rebellion" of western cattle-ranching interests against federal control over extensive tracts of land in the US west was just one incident in that history.

zh: 它诉诸大众常识，有效地利用有影响力的个人不公正传闻，他们深受政府管控之苦。
en: It appeals to popular common sense and makes effective use of powerful anecdotes of personal injustice on the part of individuals caught in the regulatory thickets of government action.

zh: 在这次讲座的前面部分，我们讨论了大推进模型，这个例子已经证明反映超发展理论精髓的模型并不需要非常复杂。
en: The example of the Big Push model discussed earlier in this lecture shows that models in the spirit of high development theory need not be very complicated.

zh: 但无论怎样它们必须处理市场结构的问题。
en: They must, however, deal somehow with the problem of market structure.

zh: 这实质上意味着我们需要做出一些特殊的假设，来利用产业组织理论家在20世纪70年代思考类似问题时开发出来的许多工具。
en: This essentially means making some peculiar assumptions that allow one to exploit the bag of tricks that industrial organization theorists developed for thinking about such issues in the 1970s.

zh: 住宅的耐久性对市场供给曲线也具有重要意义。
en: The durability of housing also has important implications for the market supply curve.

zh: 考察一下住宅需求增加所带来的效应。
en: Consider the response to an increase in the demand for housing.

zh: 从短期来看，住宅供给是固定的，需求的增加使均衡价格上升。
en: In the short run, the supply of housing is fixed, so the increase in demand increases the equilibrium price.

zh: 由于被剥夺了任何自主的生命力，自然容易根据人类的意志没有节制地被操纵。
en: Deprived of any autonomous life force, nature was open to be manipulated without restraint according to the human will.

zh: 如海德格尔后来抱怨的那样，自然成为人类开采的“巨大的加油站”。
en: Nature became, as Heidegger later complained, "one vast gasoline station" for human exploitation.

zh: 按照法兰克福学派的意见，这种分析所忽略的是内部关系的辩证法，在其中，自然“既是某种外在于人类的东西又是一种内部现实" (Jay，1973: 267)。
en: What this analysis elided, according to the Frankfurt School, was the dialectics of internal relations in which nature was both "something external to man but also an internal reality" (Jay, 1973: 267).

zh: 为了有效地进行内容分析，研究者必须明确地界定研究单元，以便在其解释中 不存在模棱两可的情况，并构造一个有效的编码系统。
en: For content analysis to be effective, the researcher has to clearly identifythe unit of study so that no ambiguity exists in its interpretation and develop an effective coding system.

zh: 这意味着所使用的分类必须是“互斥的”（每个研究单元只能被译成一种编码种类）并且是“穷尽的”（所有的研究单元必须有一个可译成编码的分类）。
en: This means that the categories used have to be 'mutually exclusive' (each unit can only be coded into one category) and exhaustive (all units must have a category into which they can be coded).

zh: 正如纽曼(2000)评论的那样，效度和信度的问题也是需要强调的。
en: As Neuman (2000) comments, there are also issues of validity and reliability that have to be addressed.

zh: 效度和信度问题将在第五章讨论。
en: Validity and reliability are discussed in chapter 5.

zh: 克兰戴尔（1994)提出了一个对文本文件和统计数据进行内容分析的概要性介绍，这将对你非常有用。
en: Crandell (1994) provides an overview of content analysis of text documents and statistics that you may find helpful.

zh: 在《为马诺特而战》中，这种资本主义价值在地方的内在化甚至更为明显。
en: In The Fight for Manoth this local internalization of capitalistic values becomes even more apparent.

zh: 彼得•欧文，一位激进社会生态学家，他被委派去调研在威尔士马诺特乡村河域附近建立一个新城镇可能有什么影响，他说:“实际的历史隐藏在那些嗜血中心的背后：伯明翰一杜塞尔多夫轴心，在伦敦、布罗塞尔、巴黎和罗马都有办公室。”
en: Says Peter Owen, the radical sociologist coopted to look at what a new town built in the rural backwater of Manod in Wales might mean, "the actual history is back there in the bloody centre: the Birmingham-Dusseldorf axis, with offices in London, Brussels, Paris, Rome."

zh: 所有研究绅士化的学者都认为，在这一过程中，经济的和文化的发展都产生了作用，因此，关键的问题是哪一个因素最为重要。
en: All writers on gentrification acknowledge that both economic and cultural processes are at work, so the crucial issue is which factor is most important.

zh: 这看起来似乎是不可思议的学术争辩，但是它确实对规划和政策制定有着重要的意义。
en: This might seem like some arcane academic debate but it has important implications for planning and political action.

zh: 如果将资本的作用看做是第一位的，就像马克思主义学派的分析一样，那么在资本市场的运作方式没有全面改革的情况下，人的能动性几乎毫无作用。
en: If the forces of capital are seen as overwhelmingly dominant, as in structuralist explanations, then human agency can achieve relatively little without wholesale reforms of the operation of capital markets.

zh: 公共部门的重新建立已经在诸如住房私有化和公共服务业方面给城市景观带来了一些重要影响（Pinch, 1997）。
en: The retrenchment of the public sector has already brought some important changes to the urban scene as, for example, in the privatization of housing and public services (Pinch, 1997).

zh: 从更广的角度看，这些影响可以被解释为从强调集体消费到资本积累转变的一部分。世界范围的主导经济试图通过这个机制使自己走出“滞涨”阶段。
en: In broader perspective, these changes can be interpreted as part of the shift in emphasis from collective consumption to capital accumulation that is in turn one of the mechanisms through which the lead economies of the world-system have attempted to steer themselves out of an episode of ‘stagflation’.

zh: 同时，逆工业化和经济衰退意味着悬殊的社会空间被强化。
en: Meanwhile, deindustrialization and economic recession mean that sociospatial disparities have been reinforced.

zh: 尽管如此，但考克斯的方法确实让我们思考，不同的社会行动主体是如何依赖于特定的空间而又谋求与其他运作于和他们自己迥异的依赖空间中的社会行动主体联合的。
en: Nevertheless, Cox’s approach does allow us to think about how different social actors may be dependent upon particular spaces yet may seek to engage with other social actors operating within their own, quite different, spaces of dependence.

zh: 通过这种途径，尺度的产生以一些不恰当的方式被概念化，其中社会行动主体建立起一些啮合空间，用以连接那些相互依赖的空间，或者它们必须与之打交道的空间。因此，对于考克斯来说，从本土性到全球性尺度的转变“不是从一个平台跳到另一个平台的运动”，而是一种形成共生体网络的过程，这种网络容许社会行动主体在不同的啮合空间进行切换。
en: For Cox, then, the production of scale is conceptualized as emerging out of the ways in which actors build spaces of engagement to link the various spaces upon which they, or those with whom they must deal, are dependent, such that moving from  the local to the global scale ‘is not a movement from one discrete arena to another’, but a process of developing networks of associations that allow actors to shift between various spaces of engagement.

zh: 罗斯着重研究了“新”文化地理学家的工作，认为有一种不稳定的紧张关系，存在于对景观的愉悦与对景观的认识之间，也存在于女性“自然”与 男性“文化”反复出现的深刻性别差异之间。
en: Focusing on the work of ‘new’ cultural geographers, Rose argues that there are uneasy tensions between pleasure in, and knowledge about, landscape that reflect and repeat profoundly gendered distinctions between a feminine ‘nature’ and a masculine ‘culture’.

zh: 如她所述：“景观中的愉悦常常被视为对科学凝视的一种威胁，人们主张地理学家不应让自己因其所见而上当。”（Rose, 1993: 72）
en: As she writes: ‘Pleasure in the landscape is often seen as a threat to the scientific gaze, and it is argued that the geographer should not allow himself to be seduced by what he sees’ (Rose, 1993: 72).

zh: 货币是男人支配女人的手段，领主控制附庸的手段，帝王统治臣民的手段，资本家控制劳动者的手段。
en: Money is a means for men to control women, for lords to control their vassals, for emperors to control their territories and for capitalists to control laborers.

zh: 但是，这种借由货币力量进行的社会控制形式假定了某种社会秩序安排，在其中，占有财富(不管如何定义)不可能通过其他手段来实现(例如，农民或农奴不可能迁至未开垦的无主之地，女人不可能独立谋生，劳动者被剥夺了成为私有财富的生产工具，等等)。
en: But such forms of social control via money power presume some sort of social ordering in which access to wealth (however defined) cannot be procured by other means (e.g., peasants and serfs cannot move out to unfilled land, women cannot make their own way in the world, laborers are deprived of the means of production which have become privatized, etc.).

zh: 因此，作为社会权力，货币至关重要地依赖自身成为一种控制财富占有的特权手段。
en: Money as social power therefore depends critically upon it being a privileged means to control access to wealth.

zh: 因此，就不难理解争论如何总被内化进入了话语环节。
en: As a consequence it is not hard to see how contestation is always internalized within the discursive moment.

zh: 反霸权和持不同政见的话语(例如，女权主义、反种族主义、生态主义、后殖民主义以及性别主题都是当代学院先锋的最爱)向霸权形式发出挑战。正是由于这些争论，社会变迁才得以发生。
en: Counter-hegemonic and dissident discourses (feminism, anti-racism, ecologism, postcolonialism, and the sexual subject are some of the contemporary favorites of the avant-garde in academia, for example) erupt to challenge hegemonic forms and it is out of such contestation that social change may flow.

zh: 女性主义范式是对充斥整个旅游研究的占统治地位的男权思想的一种挑战。
en: The use of a feminist perspectives paradigm will challenge the dominantpatriarchal hegemony that pervades tourism research.

zh: 直到最近，大部分旅游研究都被男性掌控，没有人意识到旅游研究中广泛存在的性别偏见。
en: Until recently, moststudies have been androcentric in nature and have not taken into accountthe gender bias prevalent in most tourism research.

zh: 人们缺乏对旅游中女性角色和体验的研究，女性处于被忽视的地 位(Cook & Fonow 1990)。
en: Women's roles orexperiences in tourism in the main have been understudied, and they havebeen generally rendered 'invisible' (Cook & Fonow 1990).

zh: 使用女性主义范式便可以改变这种情况并提供一种平衡的性别视角，从而有助于旅游知识体系的构建。
en: The use of a feminist perspectives paradigm will start to redress this situation and provide a balanced gender perspective to knowledge construction in tourism.

zh: 从另一个角度看，使用二手资料时这种误差将可能依然存在，尽管 “二手”使用者可能没有意识到这种误差。
en: On the other hand, the existence of such bias is a possibility when using secondary data sources, although the 'second-hand' user will probably not be aware of such biasing factors.

zh: 而在原始资料收集过程中，其他研究者误差的可能性被有效规避，因为“初始”研究者要对整个研究过程负责。并且，人们一般会认为这个研究者的操作遵循了一定的道德规范和适当的科学程序。
en: Consequentiy, the possibilityof bias by other researchers is countered in primary data collection as the 'primary' researcher is responsible for the entire research process, and it is assumed that this researcher is operating within an ethical framework and following the appropriate scientific protocols.

zh: 频数分布可使用两种方式来描述，第一种是原始计数频率表（raw count fre_x005f_x001f_quency table) ，第二种是百分比频数分布表。
en: Frequency distributions are portrayed in one of two ways.The first is as araw count frequency table and the second is as a percentage frequency distribution table.

zh: 然而，在给出每种表格的例子之前，很有必要考虑萨兰塔克斯对于（1998, p. 345)构建表格的建议。
en: However, before providing you with an example of each table, it is useful to consider Sarantakos' (1998, p. 345) advice regardingtable construction.

zh: 基本上，表格是由五个部分构成的:标题、表头、主体、旁注及脚注。
en: Primarily, tables consist of five components: titles, headings, bodies, marginals and footnotes.

zh: 就海洋运输对早期未开发的航海区域所产生的影响这一问题所进行的过程性评价，就是一个评价性研究的例子。
en: An example of evaluative research would be a formative evaluation of marine transportation impacts in a previously non-utilised marine area.

zh: 在旅游规划阶段，对公众参与旅游开发的作用这一问题所做的过程性评价和总结性评价也是一例证。诸如此类的例子还有：如果开发项目得到批准，对项目实施和最终完工阶段会进行过程性评价与总结性评价；对旨在提高某一住宿设施的前厅服务质量的员工发展计划进行的总结性评价；对引入了交叉路口和道路信号灯的旅游区的交通流量情况进行的总结性评价。
en: Other examples are formative and summative evaluations of public participation in tourism development in the planning phase and, if the development is approved, formative and summative evaluations of the implementation and establishment phases of the development; a summative evaluation of a staff development program to improve front-office service in a lodging facility; and a summative evaluation of traffic flows in a tourist enclave due to the introduction of roundabouts and improvements in road signage.

zh: 不幸的是，本顿、佩罗曼和奥康纳（Benton, 1989, 1992; Perelman, 1993; O’connor, 1988）等人向那种观点的回归姿态看起来常常是向资本主义论点的悲哀投降。
en: Unfortunately, the manner of that return by Benton (1989, 1992), Perelman (1993), and O'Connor (1988) often appears as a sad capitulation to capitalistic arguments.

zh: 当然，他们之中没有一个人会在任何情况下支持马尔萨斯使用（后来新马尔萨斯主义者持续使用）的具有恶劣影响的阶级区分。
en: Not, of course, that any of them would in any way support the class distinctions that Malthus used (and latterday neo-Malthusians continue to use) to such vicious effect.

zh: 但是，“自然极限”的普遍性和对“自然法”—满足人类欲望能力的固有限制—更深的依赖，现在已经越来越被视为人类生存的不证自明的限制条件。
en: But the universality of "natural limits" and the deeper appeal to "natural law" as inherently limiting to the capacity to meet human desires, is now increasingly treated as an axiomatic limiting condition of human existence.

zh: 报告的内容应该集中在客观事实、研究的实际应用以及研究结果可能带给公众的利益上。
en: The content of the report should be focused on the facts, and any practical application of the research and the possible benefits of the research findings for the public.

zh: 而不应过分关注报告的结构，除非公众代表一个特殊利益集团，并希望通过此报告来游说政府或商行。
en: The report should not focus on the overall research design in great detail unless the public represents a special interest group and may want to lobby government or business based on the report.

zh: 另外，在准备面向普通公众的报告时，切记不要做任何不能获得赞同的声明。
en: In preparing reports for the general public, do not make any unsupported claims.

zh: 作为一个研究者，关于是否要进行隐性研究和适当地利用某种欺骗性的手段，你得自己拿定主意。
en: As a researcher, you have to make your own decisions regarding covertresearch and the use of deception.

zh: 这需要针对该项研究可能对社会产生的道德价值和利用欺骗、隐性研究会在多大程度上损害人的权利两方面进行权衡。
en: This should be determined by weighingthe 'moral' good such research will do for society against how such covertactivities and deception infringe on the rights of humans.

zh: 同时也需要有一个来自你的学科、职业或组织的适当机构对此类行为予以许可。
en: It also needs tobe sanctioned by an appropriate body from your discipline, profession ororganisation.

zh: 显然，保护人类和非人类参与者的权利是研究者的首要责任。
en: Obviously, the protection of human and non-human rights is theresearcher's primary responsibility.

zh: 研究不应该给参与者带来任何身体上、法律上或其他的伤害。
en: Research should not cause physical, psychological, legal or other harm.

zh: 参与者的参与应该建立在自愿和知情同意的基础上。
en: Research participation should be voluntary and based on in formed consent.

zh: 在市中心区，公共政策不能直接要求私人企业到这里开业，这些企业可以在职员下班后为其提供服务，为本地区注人活力。
en: In city downtowns, public policy cannot inject directly that entirely private enterprises that serve people after work and enliven and help invigorate the place.

zh: 公共政策也不能用任何一种行政命令在中心区留住这些用途。
en: Nor can public policy, by any sort of fiat, hold these uses in a downtown.

zh: 但是，通过非直接的方式，公共政策可以促进这些用途的成长。用拋砖引玉的方式，它可以在适当的地方利用自己的“棋子”（chessmen）(建筑)和公共场所来间接地促进这种用途。
en: But indirectly, public policy can encourage their growth by using its own chessmen, and those susceptible to public pressure, in the right places as primers.

zh: 赏析式探询（appreciative inquiry, AI)是一种在推进组织变革过程中可以用来替代“行动研究” (action research)的方法。
en: Appreciative inquiry (Al) is an alternative method to action research for facilitating organisational change.

zh: 赏析式探询包括四个步骤：阅赏(appreciating)、瞻想(envisioning)、同构（co-constructing)、集思(sustaining a collective vision)。
en: Al involves four stages: appreciating, envisioning, co-constructing and sustaining a collective vision.

zh: 从赏析式探询在教育机构以及启发式研究中的应用情况来看，可以感受到在旅游业中应用这种方法的潜力，尤其是在转型问题、共同愿景、战略计划、团队开发、焦点群体的研究与评价等领域。
en: Use of appreciative inquiry in an educational organisation and heuristic research suggest that appreciative inquiry has the potential for application in the tourism industry, particularly in regard to transformational change, shared visioning, strategic planning, team development, focus group research and valuation.

zh: 我想说的并非是整整一个世纪对气候的研究仅仅再次确认了开始所有人就已经知道的事情。
en: The point is not that a century of research into the weather had only reaffirmed what everyone knew from the beginning.

zh: 1919年气象学已经认识到许多民间传说不知道的事情，并解开了许多疑团。
en: The meteorology of 1919 had learned many things of which folklore was unaware, and dispelled many myths.

zh: 我也不想说气象学家们在这么长的时间里没有观察云朵是一个过失。
en: Nor is the point that meteorologists somehow sinned by not looking at clouds for so long.

zh: 其实这样的事情是不可避免的。
en: What happened was simply inevitable.

zh: 用斯莫尔（1993年）的话说，存在着一种“未能如愿的预备队伍”。一旦公路容最增加，行驶速度就会提高，这个队伍就会转到以前交通拥挤的公路上来。
en: In the language of Small (1993), there is a "reserve army of the unfulfilled" that will switch to a previously congested highway as soon as an increase in capacity increases travel speeds.

zh: 这种潜在需求在高峰期占满大部分或全部新容量。
en: This latent demand will fill most or all of the new capacity during peak periods.

zh: 因此，忠诚问题由阐发政治问题的那种抽象概念的层次和种类同时来定义。
en: The question of loyalties is defined, then, both by the level and kind of abstraction through which political questions are formulated.

zh: 作为一种情感和情绪性政治力量，忠诚总是附属于某种确定的感觉结构。
en: As an affective and emotive political force, loyalties always attach to certain definite structures of feeling.

zh: 威廉斯全部小说中个性最丰富的那些角色，正是把冲突性忠诚内化到完全不同感觉结构之中的人——《忠诚》中的格温、《边远的乡村》中的马太•普雷斯以及《第二代》中的欧文•普雷斯。
en: The richest characters in all of Williams' novels are precisely those who internalize different and conflicting loyalties to radically different structures of feeling – Gwyn in Loyalties or Matthew Price in Border Country and Owen Price in Second Generation.

zh: 我用一个高度程式化的经济做了一些模拟实验，在这个经济中，各区位沿一个圆周对称排列。
en: I have carried out a number of simulation experiments with a highly stylized economy in which locations are lined up symmetrically around a circle.

zh: 在每次模拟的开始，制造业都是在各区位随机分布，然后让经济发展演化。
en: For each simulation I began with a random allocation of manufacturing across locations, then let the economy evolve.

zh: 当然，对于某些参数值，最终全部制造业都集中在一个区位。
en: For some parameter values, of course, all manufacturing ends up in a single location.

zh: 在有些案例中，取样的数量足够广泛，因此分析结果能用以指导很广大的地区。
en: In some cases, sampling has been sufficiently widespread for analyses to be conducted over very wide areas.

zh: 例如，休利特等用很多河流水文监测站的数据对美国东部河流产生的暴雨径流进行分类。
en: For example, Hewlett et al. used data from a large number of stream gauging stations to categorize the stormflow response of rivers in the eastern USA.

zh: 流域管理者了解流域因降雨产生的洪水流量是很重要的。
en: It is critical for river basin managers to understand the flood response of a river basin following rainfall.

zh: 这种方法与趋势面分析的不同之处是没有用回归分析法，但是两种方法都能为区域响应制图。
en: The approach differs from trend-surface analysis in that no use is made of regression-type techniques, but both methods allow regional responses to be mapped.

zh: 因此，在城市化过程中，似乎没有任何一个地方能够发动为系统转型提供动力的战斗的特殊主义。
en: There seems then to be no place within the urbanization process from which to launch any kind of militant particularism capable of grounding the drive for systemic transformations.

zh: 特别是最近20年来，“全球化”辞令已经变得特别重要，甚至在激进思想中代替了更具政治性的帝国主义、殖民主义和新殖民主义等概念。
en: In the last 20 years in particular, the rhetoric of "globalization" has become particularly important, even replacing within segments of radical thought the more politicized concepts of imperialism, colonialism, and neo-colonialism.

zh: 这种话语转向的意识形态结果特别地剥夺了各种形式的地方、城市甚至国家的政治行动的能力。
en: The ideological effect of this discursive shift has been extra-ordinarily disempowering with respect to all forms of local, urban, and even national political action.

zh: 确定实体这个问题又引起两个问题。
en: This issue of entitation raises two problems.

zh: 第一个涉及总体和样本。
en: The first concerns populations and samples.

zh: 如果地理学者对他们正在研究的是什么东西尚无把握，那么这对设计检验假设的试验就造成极大的困难。
en: If geographers are unsure what it is that they are studying, then this makes the design of experiments to test hypotheses extremely difficult.

zh: 第二，有一个统计合理性的问题。
en: Secondly, there is the question of statistical validity.

zh: 20世纪初，全球只有16个人口超过百万的城市。
en: At the beginning of this century, there were just 16 cities in the world with more than a million people.

zh: 其中多数都在发达资本主义国家，最大的伦敦也只有不到七百万人口。
en: Most were in the advanced capitalist countries and London, by far the largest of them all, had just under seven million.

zh: 那时，也只有不超过7%的世界人口能够合理地归入“城市”(Berry, 1990)。
en: At the beginning of this century, too, no more than 7 percent of the world's population could reasonably be classified as "urban" (Berry, 1990).

zh: 而到2000年，差不多将有500个人口超过百万的城市，其中最大的，如东京、圣保罗、孟买，可能还有上海(这份名单总是不停地变化)，都将拥有二千多万人口，还有20多个拥有一千多万人口的城市紧随其后，它们多数分布在所谓发展中国家。
en: By the year 2000 there may well be as many as 500 cities with more than a million inhabitants while the largest of them, Tokyo, Sao Paulo, Bombay, and possibly Shanghai (although the list is perpetually being revised both upwards and downwards), will perhaps boast populations of more than 20 million trailed by a score of cities, mostly in the so-called developing countries, with upwards of ten million.

zh: 按目前发展趋势，到21世纪早期，世界将有一半多人口生活在城市而不是乡村中。
en: Sometime early next century, if present trends continue, more than half of the world's population will be classified as urban rather than rural.

zh: 城市的人行道，孤立来看，并不重要，其意义很抽象。
en: A city sidewalk by itself is nothing.It is an abstraction.

zh: 只有在与建筑物以及它旁边的其他东西，或者附近的其他人行道(sidewalks)联系起来时，它的意义才能表现出来。
en: It means something only in conjunction with the buildings and other uses that border it, or border other sidewalks very near it.

zh: 同样的道理也可以放在街道上，即除了承载马路中间的交通外，它还有其他的目的。
en: The same might be said of streets, in the sense that they serve other purposes besides carrying wheeled traffic in their middles.

zh: 电话调査主要是结构式访谈，采用封闭式问题。访问者使用电话技术与受访者交流，并记录答案。
en: Telephone surveys are primarily structured interviews using closed questions, with an interviewer recording the respondent's answers .Contact with respondents is made using telephone technology.

zh: 计算机技术可以协助电话技术，在这种情况下，使用软件程序可以迅速记录[受访者的回答，分析程序也有助于整合访谈数据。
en: Telephone technology may be further assisted by computer technology, in which case the responses are immediately recorded using software programs that integrate the responses with analysis procedures.

zh: 散点图也可以描述成关系曲线图或者平面图。
en: Scattergrams can also be described as a graph or plot of a relationship.

zh: 在制作散点图过程中，调査者独立调査每一种情况，然后绘制在散点图上。
en: In generating a scattergram, the researcher investigates each case individually and plots it on the scattergram.

zh: 当准备一个曲线图来代表散点图的时候，要保证将自变量放在x轴(横轴），将因变量放在y轴(纵轴）。
en: When preparing graphs to represent a scattergram, ensure that you place the independent variable on the X axis (the horizontal axis ) and the dependent variable on the Yaxis (the verdcal axis) .

zh: 而且，变量的最小值设置在x轴和y轴相交的地方，最大值设置在轴的外端。
en: Furthermore, the lowest values for a variable are located a t the intersection of the X and Y axes, and the highest scores are located toward s the outer ends of the axes.

zh: 数据编码包括编码的形成、数据输入及数据整理。
en: Coding data involves the development of codes, data entry and data cleaning.

zh: 数据输入可使用转换表、页缘编码、直接数据输入、扫描仪、电子数据表以及人工记录单。
en: Data entry can be undertaken using transfer sheets, edge-coding, direct data entry, scanners, spreadsheets and manual tally sheets.

zh: 数据的整理是与编码式整理和逻辑整理相关联的。
en: Data cleaning is associated with code cleaning and contingency cleaning.

zh: (5)那么，社会变革的当代事人是谁，他们又在何方呢？
en: 5. So who and where are the agents of social change?

zh: 再一次地，最简单的答案是任何人，任何地方。
en: Again, the simplest answer is everyone, everywhere.

zh: 生活、行动和交谈着的每一个人都牵扯其中。
en: Everyone who lives, acts, and talks is implicated.

zh: 这正是威廉斯的观点，他认为，通过个人的使用，语言不断地发生着重构。
en: This is precisely Williams' point concerning the perpetual reconstitution of language through use by individuals.

zh: 因此地理学家可能研究作为工业化产物的某个聚落格局的发育。
en: Thus a geographer might study the evolution of a particular settlement pattern as an outcome of industrialization.

zh: 这样的方法侧重于社会过程:工业化是联系着许多相伴随的经济、政治与文化变化的一系列过程。
en: Such an approach focuses upon social processes: industrialization is a bundle of such processes relating to shifting work practices with many concomitant economic, political and cultural changes.

zh: 此类研究所采取的形式取决于用以界定社会变化性质的社会理论。
en: The form  that such study takes depends upon the social theory that is used to define the nature of social change.

zh: (3)社会关系总是空间的，并且存在于某种生产出来的空间性框架中。
en: 3. Social relations are always spatial and exist within a certain produced framework of spatialities.

zh: 换句话来说，无论在哪个方面，社会关系都是某种绘制的地图，无论是象征的、比喻的，还是物质的。
en: Put another way, social relations are, in all respects, mappings of some sort, be they symbolic, figurative, or material.

zh: 组织社会关系需要一种绘制行动，以便人们知道他们的位置。
en: The organization of social relations demands a mapping so that people know their place.

zh: 社会科学统计软件包(Statistical Package for the Social Sciences)，顾名思义，就是可以使研究人员对定量数据进行统计分析的程序包。
en: Statistical Package for the Social Sciences (SPSS ) is, as the name asserts, a package that enables researchers to conduct statistical analyses of quantitative data.

zh: 许多大学为SPSS设置了站点许可证。
en: Many universities hold site licences for SPSS.

zh: 该软件包是做定量数据分析最常用的软件包。
en: It is one of the most frequently used software packages for quantitative data analysis.

zh: 意义上的差异是下列两种做法之间的差异，在世界地图的30.03°S和51.10°W坐标那里做一个标记，或者把一个城市称为巴西的阿里格利港。
en: The difference in meanings is between putting down a marker such as 30.03°S and 51.10°W on a map of the globe or naming the city of Porto Alegre in the state of Rio Grande do Sul in Brazil.

zh: 在后一种情形中，被命名的实体表明了在一个特定地点上某种有界限的永恒(无论它是否具有政府、社会组织、人造形式、生态结构等)。
en: In the latter case, the named entity indicates some sort of bounded permanence (whether it be of government, social organization, built form, ecological structure, etc.) at a given location.

zh: 在这个和那个地方发挥作用的社会-生态过程可能会改变时空秩序安排，从而破坏、加强或侵蚀那些特别的永恒，比如说，阿里格利港已经获得的那种永恒。
en: The socio-ecological processes at work within that and other places may change spatio-temporal orderings in such a way as to undermine, enhance or erode the particular permanences that, say, Porto Alegre has achieved.

zh: 请注意，这是一种卓越的“社会时间”观念；这对同时代的个人或社会而言，并没有处于“真实”时间之前或之后的物理意义。
en: Note that this is pre-eminently a ‘social time’ idea; it makes no physical sense for contemporary individuals or societies to be in front or behind in ‘real’ time.

zh: 然而，在现代性方面对这种社会时间关切的结果，是现代性成为用以界定经历无休止的快速变化社会的标准。
en: However, a consequence of concerns for this social time in modernity is that the latter has come to define a society that experiences rapid and ceaseless social change.

zh: 因此，时间的概念就是现代性意义的中心以及地理学家试图了解这种情况的中心。
en: Thus the concept of time is central to the meaning of modernity and of geographers’ attempts to understand this condition.

zh: 这就把环境问题牢牢地置于社会主义轨道之上。
en: This places the environmental issue firmly within the socialist orbit.

zh: 因此，那些承认生态危机的社会主义者(参阅O’Conner, 1988;Foster, 1994)主张，社会主义的第二条道路是可行的，这一道路突出了生产的社会组织与生产(生态的)条件之间的矛盾，而不是阶级矛盾。
en: Those socialists (see O'Connor, 1988; Foster, 1994) who accept that there is an ecological crisis, then argue that a second route to socialism is available; one that highlights the contradiction between the social organization of production and the (ecological) conditions of production, rather than class contra-dictions.

zh: 因此，社会主义的必然性便在某种程度上获得了，因为只有在社会主义条件下，才能彻底地、永久地和公正地解决环境问题。
en: The necessity for socialism is then in part given because only under socialism can thorough, enduring, and socially just solutions be found to the environmental problems.

zh: 郊区女性的困境并非单纯地由城市分散化造成，它与本书在一开头所概述的整个变化趋势密切相关。
en: The predicament of suburban women is not simply a consequence of urban decentralization.It is intimately related to a whole nexus of the trends outlined at the beginning of this book.

zh: 例如，在以消费为导向并支配当代城市主义逻辑的郊区生活方式中，经济、人口、社会和文化趋势的相互交叉已经将女性放置到了一个关键的位置。
en: The intersection of economic, demographic, social and cultural trends, for example, has allocated to women a pivotal role in the consumption-oriented suburban lifestyles that dominate the logic of contemporary urbanism.

zh: 简言之，女性受到经济、社会、文化以及生态上的束缚。
en: In short, women are trapped economically, socially and culturally, as well as ecologically.

zh: 同时，郊区的环境已经以一种加强两性之间不平等的方式演化，并在其他的事物之间加人了情感限制和“社区”侵蚀。
en: Meanwhile, the suburban environment has evolved in ways that reinforce inequality between the sexes, contributing, among other things, to emotional strain and the erosion of ‘community’.

zh: “身体和世界之间全部障碍的夷平，以及两者之间转换的流动性”塑造了“中世纪大众文化的以及相应大众想象力的显著特点”。
en: The "characteristic traits of the medieval popular culture and, accordingly of the popular imagination" were constituted by "the levelling of all barriers between the body and the world, the fluidity of transition between them" (p. 54).

zh: 因此，没有什么比使“人成为万物尺度”更加“自然”，因为人们认为“人”与自然不可分离，并把万物内化到自身之中。
en: Nothing could be more "natural" therefore, than to make "man the measure of all things" because man was thought to be inseparable from nature and to internalize all things.

zh: 在此，我们与后来“莱布尼茨奇想”的中世纪起源不期而遇(参阅第三章）。
en: We here encounter the medieval origins of what later became the "Leibnizian conceit" (see chapter 3).

zh: 在一个被过去的开采所破坏和伤害的地区中，要学会在地方生存。
en: Learning to live-in-place in an area that has been disrupted and injured through past exploitation.

zh: 它涉及，通过知晓在某个地方的内部及周围产生影响的那些特殊生态关系而成为那里的本地人。
en: It involves becoming native to a place through becoming aware of the particular ecological relationships that operate within and around it.

zh: 它意味着理解活动和发展社会行为，这些将丰富那个地方的生活，恢复它的生命支持系统，并且在其中建立一种在生态上和社会上可持续的生存形式。
en: It means understanding activities and evolving social behavior that will enrich the life of that place, restore its life-supporting systems, and establish an ecologically and socially sustainable pattern of existence within it.

zh: 简单地说，它涉及充分活跃于一个地方的内外。
en: Simply stated it involves becoming fully alive in and with a place.

zh: 它涉及申请成为一个生命共同体的成员而不再是它的开发者。（转引自Alexander，1990：163)
en: It involves applying for membership in a biotic community and ceasing to be its exploiter.

zh: 例如，让我们看看1883年喀拉喀托火山爆发后重新拓殖的过程。
en: For example, consider the recolonization of the Indonesian volcano Krakatau after its famous 1883 eruption.

zh: 从一个尺度来说，现在岛上种植园的分布反映了当地的生态位——海岸线、坡地、湿地和其他的生境（habitats）。
en: At one scale, today’s plant distribution on the island reflects the local ecological niches – shoreline, slope, wetland, and other habitats.

zh: 但是，从更大的尺度来看，总体上的生物多样性取决于其他控制性因素。
en: However, at the larger scale, the general biodiversity is dependent on other controlling factors.

zh: 生物地理学中两个主要范例中的第一个是坦斯利（Tansley, 1935）所描述的生态系统的概念。
en: Two of the major paradigms of biogeography are, first, the ecosystem concept, originally described by Tansley (1935).

zh: 然而，生态系统概念的空间表述联系着第二个关键范例，即植物群落（plant community），或更一般的生境（habitat）。
en: The spatial expression of the ecosystem concept is, however, linked to the second key paradigm, which is that of the plant community or, more generally, the habitat.

zh: 在未经改造的环境中，植被或生境就是某种生态系统的“外部标志或可见标志”，因为正是在植被或生境之内或下面，生存着、供养着、繁殖着所有更高的营养级。
en: In unmodified terrestrial environments, vegetation or habitat is ‘the outward and visible sign’ of a particular ecosystem type because it is within or underneath vegetation or habitat that all higher trophic levels live, feed and reproduce.

zh: 在广泛的社会运动中，可以将环境问题分为两个主要观点。
en: Within this broad social climate it is possible to distinguish two main perspectives on environmental issues.

zh: 首先，这里有一个主要的概念，即技术中心方法（technocentric approach)(有时也被称为生态现代化(ecological modernization)方法）。
en: First there is the dominant conceptualization, the technocentric approach (sometimes also called the ecological modernization approach).

zh: 这种方法基于这样的假设，即环境问题的解决应当不扰乱当前领导世界发展的资本主义经济构架。
en: This approach is based on the assumption that environmental problems should be tackled without upsetting the broad capitalist economic frame-work that currently guides world development.

zh: 例如，让我们看看1883年喀拉喀托火山爆发后重新拓殖的过程。
en: For example, consider the recolonization of the Indonesian volcano Krakatau after its famous 1883 eruption.

zh: 从一个尺度来说，现在岛上种植园的分布反映了当地的生态位—海岸线、坡地、湿地等。
en: At one scale, today’s plant distribution on the island reflects the local ecological niches – shoreline, slope, wetland, and other habitats.

zh: 但是，从更大的尺度来看，总体上的生物多样性取决于其他控制性因素。
en: However, at the larger scale, the general biodiversity is dependent on other controlling factors.

zh: 假定格林基因先生(一位农民兼基因工程师）研制了一种种植玉米的新方法，使玉米种植成本每英亩减少了300美元。
en: Suppose that Mr. Greengenes, a farmer and genetic engineer, develops a new method for growing com that decreases the cost of growing com by $300 per acre.

zh: 格林基因的土地所有者欣喜不已，说：“根据剩余原则，你将多付给我300美元的租金。
en: Greengenes’s landlord rejoices, saying, according to the leftover principle, you will pay me $300 more in rent.

zh: ”土地所有者的话对吗？
en: Is the landlord correct?

zh: 正由于它在持续过程之流中的嵌入性以及流的再现，辩证法有限地诉诸因果观点，并因此将之视为一种特殊的有限情形。
en: Precisely by virtue of its embeddedness in and representation of the flow of continuous processes, dialectics makes limited appeal to cause and effect argument and then only as a particular limiting case.

zh: 例如，因果观点必然依赖绝对而非相对的时空概念。
en: Causal argumentation necessarily rests, for example, upon absolute not relational conceptions of space and time.

zh: 如怀特海证明的那样， “作为过程的自然”或时间之流逝，可能并不存在着对它的“解释” 。“所能够做的就是运用推测性说明（它们）的语言”。（Whitehead, 1920:50）
en: There can be, argues Whitehead (1920: 53), "no explanation" of "nature as process" or the passing of time."All that can be done is to use language which may speculatively demonstrate [them]."

zh: 历时研究是指对同一或相似样本在一定时间段内进行研究。
en: Longitudinal studies involve the study of the same people or a similarsample of people over a set period of time.

zh: 这种研究的数据可能通过访谈、焦点群体法、参与观察法和文献法(在本章后面进行解释)得到。
en: Data may be collected usinginterviews, focus groups, participant observation and the documentarymethod (explained later in the chapter).

zh: 历时研究也可用于定量方法，但因为本章关注的是定性研究方法，因此只讨论有关 整体归纳范式的方法。
en: Longitudinal studies may also beconducted using quantitative methods; however, as this chapter focuses on qualitative methods, only those methods associated with a holistic-inductive paradigm are discussed.

zh: 纽曼（2000)曾划分出历时研究的不同类型：小样本多次调查、时间序列研究、趋势研究以及世代分析。
en: Neuman (2000) identifies several types of longitudinal studies: panel studies, time series studies, trend studies and cohort analysis.

zh: 他认为案例研究也是历时研究的一种数据收集方法。
en: He also includes case studies as a method of data collection for longitudinal studies.

zh: 另一种适用于社区的“策略”则是顺从那些强加的负外部性（也被称为“忠诚”选择（‘loyally’option))。
en: Another option available to communities is that of resignation to the imposition of negative externalities (also termed the‘loyalty’option).

zh: 当社区感觉到发言权策略经常被忽视或被否决且参与无效时，上述情况就会变得犹为普遍。
en: This is especially common where communities feel that voicing strategies are regularly ignored or overruled and that participation is ineffective.

zh: 例如，许多不同意城市规划的人，不论个体还是团体，往往会由于感觉到无法对政策制定者施加影响而把这些规划当成是“无法避免的”。
en: Many people who disapprove of city plans, for example, simply resign themselves to the‘inevitabl’because they feel unable, individually or collectively, to exert any real influence on policy-makers.

zh: 最后一个策略是区位再选择（也被称为“退出”选择（‘exit’option)),这只是一个家庭策略而非社区策略，并且这也回到了实际领地的连续演化地理的观点。
en: The final strategy is that of relocation (also termed the‘exit’ option), which is a household rather than a community strategy, and which brings us back to the idea of a continually evolving geography of de facto territories.

zh: 霍克海默和阿多诺并没有抛弃科学(虽然他们确实提出了一种相当有说服力的方法来理解为什么在生态运动中会有如此众多的人——尤其是自然浪漫主义家——抛弃了科学)。
en: Horkheimer and Adorno did not abandon science (though they did provide a reasonably compelling way to understand why so many in the ecological movement --particularly the nature romanticists --do).

zh: 他们认为批判研究的核心任务是：改革科学本身，试图重新捕获人类意义和目标，把“返魅”于世界的努力(有时被描绘成克服“与自然疏远”)内在化进科学本身，这种努力与作为启蒙思想中的“他者”而嵌入到自然创造物中的“去魅”相对。
en: They took it as the key task of critical enquiry to reform science itself, to try and recapture some sense of humanity and purpose and to internalize within science itself some effort at a "re-enchantment" with the world (sometimes depicted as over-coming "alienation from nature") as opposed to the "disenchantment" embedded in that creation of nature as "other" in Enlightenment thought.

zh: 他们反对实证主义以及通常以牛顿/笛卡儿术语来解释的科学方法，开启了建设一种替代性科学的可能性。
en: They fought against positivism and the scientific method as usually construed in Newtonian/Cartesian terms but held open the possibility for the construction of an alternative science.

zh: 历时研究是对同一或相似样本进行纵向的研究。
en: Longitudinal studies examine the same sample of people or a similar sample of people over time.

zh: 历时研究的类型包括小样本多次调査、时间序列研究、趋势研究、世代分析以及案例研究。
en: Types of longitudinal study include panel studies, time series studies, trend studies, cohort analysis and case studies.

zh: 数据可通过焦点群体法、参与观察法、访谈法和文献法获得。
en: Data may be collected using focus groups, participant observation, interviews and the documentary method.

zh: 尽管有点牵强附会，但这个模式还是能够说明问题的。因为它表明为什么正是国际金融（通过世界银行）在今天对生态的可持性如此地感兴趣，以及他们怎样关注这个问题。
en: The model, though far-fetched, is illuminating, since it indicates why and how it is that international finance, via the World Bank, is these days so interested in ecological sustainability.

zh: 在此，生态和社会计划的两元性（参阅本书第八章）被有趣地扭曲了，因为即使如生态学家们论证的那样，债务偿还真的是许多生态难题的根本，那也正是债务拖欠的威胁迫使国际金融认识到存在着这样的生态难题。
en: The duality of ecological and social projects (see chapter 8) here takes some interesting twists for while it is true that debt repayment, as ecologists argue, is at the root of many ecological problems it is precisely the threat of debt default that forces international finance to recognize that such ecological problems exist.

zh: 先来考虑一个不参与国际贸易的封闭经济（这听起来有点老掉牙，而且与我们所处的这个出口创造了大量经济奇迹的时代相距十万八千里，也许如此——尽管后面我将证明通过修正，可以使它符合现代经济。不过，现在我们还是按原来的规则开始吧）。
en: Imagine, then, an economy that is closed to international trade.(This sounds archaic and way off the point in our current age of export-led economic miracles, and perhaps it is — although I'll argue later that we may be able to modify the story to make it relevant to modern economies. But in any case, for the moment let's play by the original rules.)

zh: 通过对要素供给、技术、需求和市场结构做出假设，我们就可以描述这个假想经济了。
en: Our hypothetical economy can be described by assumptions about factor supply, technology, demand, and market structure.

zh: 从市场潜力分析中可以立即得出的一个结论是可能存在某种循环关系。
en: One immediately obvious implication of the market potential analysis is the possibility of circularity.

zh: 厂商希望选择市场潜力大的区位，也即靠近大市场。
en: Firms want to locate where market potential is high, that is, near large markets.

zh: 但是许多厂商聚集的地区才会有大市场。
en: But markets will tend to be large where lots of firms locate.

zh: 所以我们自然而然地会考虑自我增强的地区增长或衰落的可能性。
en: So one is led naturally to a consideration of the possibility of selfreinforcing regional growth or decline.

zh: 社会理论学家朱尔根•哈伯马斯认为，公共领域和组成它的市民们可以被看做是现代社会所特有的四种基本社会组织之一。
en: According to social theorist Jurgen Habermas, the public sphere and the citizens who populate it can be seen as one of four fundamental categories of social organization characteristic of modern societies.

zh: 其他几种分别是经济、市民社会和政府。
en: The others are the economy, civil society and the state.

zh: 市民社会（civil society)的含义已经随时间而发生了变化，但它通常被理解为包含除政府以外的所有主要社会元素。
en: The meaning of civil society has changed over time but is generally understood to involve all the main elements of society outside government.

zh: 哈伯马斯指出，这些类别的出现，要求完成公共与私人生活领域相互关系的构建。
en: The emergence of these categories, Habermas points out, requires the working-through of an established relationship of the public to the private spheres of life.

zh: Event-structure analysis(ESA)代表事件结构分析（Neuman 2000, p.432）。
en: The acronym ESA stands for event-structure analysis (Neuman 2000, p. 432).

zh: 这种分析按照时间顺序组织数据，以此组成事件。
en: This type of analysis organises data into events following a chronological order.

zh: 但是，它与讲故事或叙事却有所不同，因为事件结构在事件发生之前就能够证明事件之间的联系，加之ESA还试图证明因果联系，所以，ESA比重述事件更具分析性。
en: However, it is different to storytelling or narratives, as event-structures demonstrate the linkages between events prior to their occurrence.Consequently, ESA is more analytical than a narrative retelling of events, because ESA attempts to identify the causal relationships.

zh: “数据分析是指对你所见、所闻、所读到的信息进行组织以便更好地理解所获信息。
en: Data analysis involves organizing what you have seen, heard, and read so that you can make sense of what you have learned.

zh: 通过分析这些数据，你可以描述状态、进行解释、提出假设、构建理论，并将你的结论与其他结论进行关联。
en: Working with the data, you describe, create explanations, pose hypotheses, develop theories, and link your story to other stories.

zh: 而要实现这一目标，就必须首先对所收集的资料进行分类、汇总、建模和解释。
en: To do so, you must categorize, synthesize, search for patterns, and interpret the data you have collected.

zh: 数据编码需要人工参与（除非原始数据答案纸是通过计算机扫描的；然而，即便是这样，仍然有可能犯错误，就像以下讨论的）。
en: Coding data requires human involvement (unless raw data responses arescanned using computers; however, even then there can be errors, asdiscussed below).

zh: 在输入资料的过程中，人们不管多细心，错误总是难免的。

en: Humans can make errors no matter how careful they are.

zh: 数据资料的核对和净化是指检查编码数据以防止出现错误编码，并且通过复查最初的数据，做出必要的更正。
en: Checking and cleaning the data involves examining the coded data for any incorrectly assigned codes and correcting these errors by reviewing theoriginal data.

zh: 数据编码包括编码的形成、数据输入及数据整理。
en: Coding data involves the development of codes, data entry and data cleaning.

zh: 数据输入可使用转换表、页缘编码、直接数据输入、扫描仪、电子数据表以及人工记录单。
en: Data entry can be undertaken using transfer sheets, edge-coding, direct data entry, scanners, spreadsheets and manual tally sheets.

zh: 数据的整理是与编码式整理和逻辑整理相关联的。
en: Data cleaning is associated with code cleaning and contingency cleaning.

zh: 双变量分析考虑两个变量之间的关系，两个变量间或者彼此相关，或者彼此无关。
en: Bivariate analysis considers the relationship between two variables,which may or may not be related to each other.

zh: 相关的变量可描述为证明共变，无关的变量在任何情况下都可描述为独立相关。
en: Variables that arerelated are described as demonstrating covariation; variables that arenot related in any way are described as having an independent relationship.

zh: 判定两个变量间的关系有很多种方法：交叉表、散点图和相关性测量。
en: There are a number of ways to determine relationships betweentwo variables: cross-tabulation, scattergrams and measures of association.

zh: 举一个例子，假设我们研究居民对在特鲁安(Tourville)城发展娱乐城/度假地的态度。
en: As an example, assume another hypothetical study — the study of residents' attitudes to the development of a casino/resort in the city Tourville.

zh: 研究设计是使用随机抽样对成年居民进行面对面的访问。
en: The research design involves a face-to-face interview with adult residents using random sampling.

zh: 鉴于特鲁安城有100万人口，不能对所有的居民进行研究，所以我们必须进行抽样。
en: Since Tourville has a population of one million, not all residents can be included, so a sample must be undertaken.

zh: 因此，差异永远不可能被刻画成“绝对的他性，关系或共性的一种完全缺乏”。
en: Difference can never be characterized, therefore, as "absolute otherness, a complete absence of relationship or shared attributes."

zh: 就如他性和差异本身的生产那样，用来衡量差异和他性的相似性也需要仔细探查(政治上的和理论上的)。
en: The similarity deployed to measure difference and otherness requires, then, just as dose an examination (theoretically as well as politically) as does the production of otherness and difference itself.

zh: 离开了一方，任何一方都不能成立。

en: Neither can be established without the other.

zh: 为了进行一项旨在增进参观者与展品之间互动的研究，研究者可能要在某个文化博物馆中对参观者参观各种展品的方式进行实地考察研究。
en: The researcher may wish to explore the patterns of visitation to various exhibits in a cultural museum in order to develop a large-scale research project to improve visitor interaction with exhibits.

zh: 因此，研究者将从事解释性的研究。
en: Consequently, the researcher would engage in exploratory research.

zh: 研究者可能想要描述某个特定时间段内参观某个景点或地区的旅游者的社会人口统计特征，从而制定合适的促销和营销策略。
en: The researcher may wish to describe the sociodemographics of visitors to an attraction or region over a specific time period in order to develop appropriate promotional and marketing materials.

zh: 这种类型的研究将会采用描述性的方法。
en: This type of research would adopt a descriptive approach.

zh: 导致特权群体的歧视以及在孤立、廉价住房地区的少数群体地区化的根本因素是他们在整个社会和经济结构中所处的位置。
en: Underlying both charter group discrimination and the localization of minority groups in particular pockets of low-cost housing is their position in the overall social and economic structure of society.

zh: 在这种背景之下，特权群体中的工人阶级成员对少数群体也有歧视，这种歧视与少数群体在丁作和住房市场中的角色有关，他们是竞争者，他们的存在导致了工资下降，并降低了生活质量。
en: In this context, discrimination by working-class members of the charter group is related to the role attributed to minority groups in job and housing markets as competitors whose presence serves to depress wages and erode the quality of life.

zh: 简而言之，少数群体成了经济体系缺陷的替罪羊。
en: In short, minority groups are treated as the scapegoats for the shortcomings of the economic system.

zh: 在我看来，这似乎就是雷蒙德·威廉斯通过望远镜的另一端所发现的“战斗的特殊主义”的命题。
en: This, it seems to me, is Raymond Williams' thesis of "militant particularism" seen through the other end of the telescope.

zh: 唯一被认可的普遍性形式是无限尊重建立在由于历史或地理原因产生的共享生活方式之上的特殊性，每一生活方式都有自己的独特“情感结构”。
en: The only permissible form of universality is infinite respect for that particularity founded on historically (and geographically) produced shared ways of life, each with its own distinctive "structure of feeling."

zh: 因为这些结构常常(尽管不是独特地)涉及地方的构造过程，我们发现自己至少被邀请参加一场地理上分裂的正义观念的真正盛宴，这些观念常常通过国家制度、立宪和法律以及风俗仪式呈现出区域性表达方式。
en: Since such structures are often (though not uniquely) implicated in processes of place construction, we find ourselves at the very minimum invited to a veritable feast of geographically fragmented notions of justice that frequently take on territorial expression through the institutions of state, constitutionality and law, and the rituals of custom.

zh: 从这个角度来看，城市里所有的特殊用地(special land)形式都会与普通的形式产生冲突，是对后者的一种干涉。
en: Looked at in this way, all the special land of a city is an interference with the use of the genenl land.

zh: 但是从另一个角度看，这种特殊的形式又会对普通的用地形式产生很大的促进作用。
en: But looked at in another way, this special land contributes greatly to the use of the general land.

zh: 它带来了人。
en: It contributes people.

zh: 假设一个地区经济增长到了关键时候，此时，以本地产品替代生产中具有规模经济的进口产品变得有利可图了。
en: Suppose that a regional economy grows to the critical point at which it becomes profitable to replace imports of some good subject to scale economies with local production.

zh: 这种进口替代会增加该地区就业，吸引其他地区的工人；这样又会进一步扩大当地市场。
en: This import substitution will expand regional employment, drawing in workers from other regions; and in so doing will further expand the local market.

zh: 而市场扩张反过来又会提供第二轮进口替代必须的市场规模，如此等等——这就是一个地区的增长流，它反映了市场规模和一个地区拥有的产业的范围之间的循环关系。
en: This market expansion may, in turn, provide the market size necessary to induce a second round of import substitution, and so ona cascade of growth reflecting the circular relationship between market size and the range of industries that a region possesses.

zh: 有了上述对种族主义和种族歧视的说明，我们可以这样解释少数群体居住的集聚与隔离过程，它们与被东道主社会同化（assimilation) 这一过程相反。同化过程本身是由各种形式的群体行为控制的，这些行为是为了将来自外部群体真实的和预期的威胁最小化。
en: Given these caveats about racism and discrimination, we can interpret minority group residential congregation and segregation as being inversely related to the process of assimilation with the host society, a process that is itself governed by various forms of group behaviour designed to minimize real or perceived threats to the group from outsiders.

zh: 不过，在深人分析这种行为及其空间结果之前，首先有必要明确“少数群体”、“东道主社会”、“隔离”和“同化”这几个术语的含义。
en: But before going on to examine this behaviour and its spatial consequences in detail, it is first necessary to clarify the meaning of terms such as‘minority group’, ‘host society’, ‘segregation’and ‘assimilation’.

zh: 在半结构化访谈中，一次可能同时采访很多人。
en: Sometimes, in semi-structured interviews, several or more people may be interviewed at the one time.

zh: 下面的小节将讨论对夫妻一起进行采访。
en: The following section comments about interviewing heterosexual couples together.

zh: 继而将在有关焦点群体法的小节中讨论大规模群体的访谈。
en: Larger groups are discussed later, in the section on focus groups.

zh: 在当今条件下，最强有力的政治-经济权力来源就是资本主义的生产方式、父权制度和种族主义。
en: Under contemporary conditions, the most formidable sources of political- economic power remain capitalist relations of production, patriarchy and racism.

zh: 这些统治性社会关系中的每一个都在相互作用——常常，但不总是——互相强化，并产生差异。
en: All of these social relations of domination interact – often, but not always, reinforcing each other – and produce difference.

zh: 与占统治地位的资本主义生产关系相伴的差异性包括阶级以及如下文所述的在不平衡发展过程中产生的地理差异，包括与帝国主义制度联系在一起的国与国之间的差异。
en: The differences associated with capitalist relations of production are those of class and, as discussed below, the geographical differences produced in the course of uneven development, including the differences of nation associated with imperialism.

zh: 为了达到他们的目标，资本家们必须将劳动力成本保持在和售价相比尽可能低的水平。
en: To achieve their ends, capitalists must hold the costs of labour as low as possible, relative to selling prices.

zh: 为此，对于任何特定的商品，他们都通过增加劳动生产率(每单位劳动成本产出的剩余价值量)来寻求降低单位劳动成本。
en: To do this, for any particular commodity, they seek to reduce the unit costs of labour by increasing its productivity (the amount of surplus value produced per unit of labour cost).

zh: 这是通过增加在死劳动（特别是比人力本身更有生产效率的机器）方面的投资来实现的。
en: This is achieved by increased investment in dead labour, in particular in machinery which is more productive than is human labour per se.

zh: 适应性循环模型仍处于幼年期，只有时间才能说明它是否足够强壮。
en: The adaptive cycle model is still in its infancy and only time will tell if it is sufficiently robust (see, for example, the discussion by Stafford Smith and Reynolds, 2002).

zh: 目前其弱点似乎在于对释放(崩溃)相的解释，它要求更多的是外部变量(风、火、干旱)而不是固有的内部动力学。
