en: The weakness at the moment seems to be in the explanation of the release (collapse) phase, which appeals more to external variables (wind, fire and drought) than to intrinsic internal dynamics.

zh: 周期性地从一种稳态跳到另一种稳态是“由慢速变量(突变论水平轴变量)的变化引起的，这种变化激发了快速变的响应，或者逃逸”(Holling et al.,2002:35)。
en: Periodic flips from one stable state to another are ‘mediated by changes in the slow variables (the horizontal axis variables in the catastrophe theory) that suddenly trigger fast variable response, or escape’ (Holling et al., 2002: 35).

zh: 如果现在存在着如此之多的空间以如此多样的形式环绕在我们周围，显然它们必须争相吸引我们的注意力。
en: If there are now so many image spaces swirling through us in so many different ways, it is clear that they must compete for our attention.

zh: 图像空间的这个问题正是我想在本节的结论中指出的。
en: And it is this aspect of image space that I want to point to in concluding this section.

zh: 因为很显然，注意力问题可能是今天图像地理学（geography of images）所面临的最紧迫的问题。
en: For what is clear is that the issue of attention is probably the most pressing one now facing the geography of images.

zh: 推断性统计需要使用概率抽样，对检验假设及其与所研究总体之间的关系有重要意义。
en: Inferential statistics require the use of probability sampling and are important to test a hypothesis and its relationship to the overall population being studied.

zh: 推断性统计的检验包括X2（用于定类测量层次）及方差分析（ANOVA）（用于定距测量层次）。
en: Tests of inferential statistics include chi-square (used with nominal levels of measurement) and ANOVA (used with interval levels of measurement).

zh: 推断性统计也涉及研究人员检验统计显著性、考虑统计显著性水平以及一类错误、二类错误。
en: Inferential statistics also involve researchers in tests of statistical significance, consideration of levels of significance, and Type I and Type II errors.

zh: 本土性即全球性，而地点则是社会关系的空间化网络中“某个特定的时刻”。
en: The local is global, and place is a ‘particular moment’ in spatialized networks of social relations.

zh: 就好像章鱼的足尖可能会触到海底的某个位置而章鱼的身体却在海中漂浮一样，这样的观点把本土性看成是全球性力量“触及”地球表面时的落脚点。
en: Much like the tips of an octopus’s legs might touch particular locations on the seafloor while the body of the octopus floats above it, in such an approach the local appears as the location where global forces ‘touch down’ on to the Earth’s surface.

zh: 反过来，本土性也不是一个地点，而是环绕整个地球的全球性潮流通向世界的切入点。
en: In turn, the local is not a place but is an entry point to the world of global flows which encircle the planet.

zh: 唯心主义和唯物主义在过去的二百年间是影响西方人思想最重要的实体论中的两种。
en: Idealism and materialism are two of the most significant epistemologies to have shaped Western thought during the past 200 years.

zh: 伊曼纽尔•康德的著作中阐释,唯心主义假定我们在世界上所看到的任何映像都是我们的思想对空间进行分类和排序的产物。
en: Exemplified by the writings of Immanuel Kant, idealism assumes that any pattern we see in the world is a result of how our mind categorizes and orders spaces.

zh: 实际上,康德仅仅把空间和时间看成是构建存在的精神框架,而不是可以观察到的现实。
en: Indeed, Kant viewed space and time as simply mental frameworks for structuring existence, rather than observable realities.

zh: 在利用电动机械流速仪测量一个方向（主流方向)时间平均流速的地方，以高频率进行测量的现代仪器还测量两个或三个正交的方向。这就意味着不会因为其他两个方向的流速被合并为单个速度组分而损失测量的精密度和准确度。
en: The example of measuring flow velocity in rivers also draws attention to the change in dimensionality of much measurement in geography.Where the electro-mechanical current meter measured a time-averaged velocity in one direction (the main flow direction), the modern instruments that measure at high frequencies also measure in two or three orthogonal directions.

zh: 所以，这个例子说明地理学接受新技术的严峻形势，新技术使得地理学更接近自然科学传统规范。
时间和空间概念影响着我们理解世界的方式。
en: Concepts of space and time affect the way we understand the world to be.

zh: 它们也提供了一种参照体系，借助于这个体系，我们定位自己与世界的关系(或者用第三章的语言术语来说，定义自己的“情境性”和“位置性”)。
en: And they also provide a reference system by means of which we locate ourselves (or define our "situatedness" and "positionality," to use the language of chapter 3) with respect to that world.

zh: 因此，进一步讨论时间和空间而不使用“位置”(place)这个术语，这是不可能的。
en: It is therefore impossible to proceed far with a discussion of space and time without invoking the term "place."

zh: 文化通常被认为是像绘画、雕刻、戏剧、古典音乐那样在展览馆、艺术馆、音乐厅或者剧院 里所看到的“髙雅艺术”。
en: Culture is popularly thought of as ‘high art’ in the form of paintings, sculpture, drama and classical music, as found in museums, art galleries, concert halls and theatres.

zh: 然而，在社会科学中，文化通常具有更广泛意义上的解释。
en: However, in the social sciences culture is usually interpreted in a much broader sense.

zh: 文化是一种复杂的现象，因此，很难对它进行简单地概括，但最好的解释认为它是“生活方式”的组成。
en: Culture is a complex phenomenon, and therefore difficult to summarize briefly, but may best be thought of as consisting of‘ways of life'.

zh: 这些生活方式包含了三个重要的因素：首先，它是人们所持的价值观（也就是人们的理想和愿望）。
en: These ways of life involve three important elements: Values that people hold.

zh: 这些价值观包括：对于拥有财富和物质的渴望；在世界范围内通过对世俗追求的克制所获得的精神满足；对家庭的关照；对朋友和邻居的帮助；或者参加政治变革。
en: These values could include: the desire to acquire wealth and material goods; seeking out risk and danger; attaining spirituality through abstinence from worldly pursuits; caring for a family; help friends and neighbours; or campaigning for political change.Norms that people follow (i.e.

zh: 其次，是人们要遵守的许多规范（也就是支配人们生活的规则和原则）。
en: the rules and principles that govern their lives).

zh: 这些规范包括：一些法律规范，如开车是否可以超速，是否可以非法避税。
en: These include legal issues such as whether to exceed speed limits when driving or whether to engage in illegal forms of tax evasion.

zh: 这些规范还包括一些个人行为，如是否对同伴忠诚，是否将个人的发展放在他人需求之上。
en: Norms also involve issues of personal conduct such as whether to be faithful to one’s partner or whether to put self-advancement over the needs of others.

zh: 再次，是人们所使用的物质实体。
en: Material objects that people use.

zh: 对于大多数物质生活柑对富裕的西方社会来讲，这些物质实体包括了从日常消费品到交通系统、建筑物和城市设施。
en: For most people in relatively affluent Western societies this is an enormous category, ranging from everyday consumer goods through to transportation systems, buildings and urban facilities.

zh: 如这两个例子所示，关于具体化和表述行为以及文化实践与感觉地理学的思想，正在激发大量多样而令人兴奋的地理工作。
en: As these two examples show, ideas about embodiment and performativity, cultural practices and sensual geographies are inspiring a diverse and exciting body of geographical work.

zh: 这些思想还提出了一些重要的理论上与实践上的挑战。
en: These ideas also pose some important theoretical and practical challenges.

zh: 在人本主义地理学领域内工作的地理学家，其中心任务是通过更全面更直接地参与方法论的辩论，在实践中检验他们自己的研究工作。
en: A central task for geographers working within a humanities tradition is to examine their own research in practice by engaging more fully and directly with methodological debates.

zh: 最近几年，给地方、空间和自然赋予含义已经成为社会、文化和文学理论辩论的至关重大事情（例如，参阅Carter et al，1993)，一当然，地理学家们参与了这些争论。(参阅Bird et al.，1993；Gregory and Urry，1985；Keith and Pile，1993)—方面是似乎突然浮现的全球资本主义文化，另一方面是以特定地方为基础的各种保守的同时也具有潜在进步性的“战斗的特殊主义”，再加上重申一种表面上严重的全球环境恶化的威胁，这两者之间的关系问题部分地推动了这些关注和兴趣。
en: In recent years the meanings to be attributed to space, place, and nature have become  a crucial matter of debate in social, cultural, and literary theory (see, for example, Carter et al., 1993) — a debate in which geographers have certainly participated (see Bird et al., 1993; Gregory and Urry, 1985; Keith and Pile, 1993).These sorts of concerns and interests have been impelled in part by the question of the relations between what appears to be an emergent global capitalist culture on the one hand and the reassertion of all sorts of reactionary as well as potentially progressive "militant particularisms" based in particular places on the other, coupled with a seemingly serious threat of global environmental degradation.

zh: 但是，这些关注在某种程度上也是威廉斯推动的文化研究传统的急剧膨胀所引起的，它强调感觉结构、价值、嵌人性、差异、反霸权话语的特殊性以及对立群体构造的社会关系。
en: But the concerns have also-in part been produced by a burgeoning tradition of cultural studies that Raymond Williams helped to define, with its emphasis upon structures of feeling, values, embeddedness, difference, and the particularities of the counterhegemonic discourses and social relations oppositional groups construct.

zh: 毫无疑问，近年来城市研究中最重要的变化是对文化问题的不断关注。
en: Without doubt the most important change in urban studies in recent years has been the increased attention given to issues of culture.

zh: 这一发展反映了 社会科学研究中的一个广泛趋势，即著名的“文化转向”（‘cultural turn’）。
en: This development reflects a broader trend in the social sciences that has become known as the ‘cultural turn’.

zh: 文化转向的结果不仅在文化研究中成为一个迅速扩大的领域，而且对包括地理学、社会学和城市研究在内的其他学科同样产生了深远的影响。
就像社会空间辩证法认为的那样，文化一直对城市有着深刻的影响，同时，城市也影响着文化。
en: As suggested by the sociospatial dialectic, cities have long had a crucial impact upon, and have in turn been influenced by, cultures.

zh: 研究者能够获得两种类型的资料：原始资料和二手资料。
en: Researchers are able to access two types of data sources: primary and secondary.

zh: 原始资料是指那些为了他们研究项目的使用目的而由研究者第一手收集的资料。
en: Primary data sources are those that are collected first-hand by the researcher for use in their research project.

zh: 原始资料来源包括诸如问卷调査、访谈文本和观察。
en: Primary data include, for example, responses to questionnaires, interview texts and observations.

zh: 二手资料是指那些因其他人的初始使用目的而产生但后来被与初始项目不相关的另外的研究者使用的资料。
en: Secondary data sources are those that have been produced by someone else for primary usage and are then used by another researcher not connected with the first project.

zh: 其他用于问卷设计的量表当属瑟斯东和哥特曼量表了。
en: Other scales that may be used in questionnaire construction are Thurstonescales and Guttman scales.

zh: 瑟斯东量表用于测量态度，但该量表需由专家决定其结构且较为耗时，并且还要求为纳入此量表的项目做出相关评判（Babbie 1990)。
en: Thurstone scales are used to measure attitudes; however, the scale is dependent upon experts for its construction.Thurstone scales are time-consuming and demanding in judging items relevant for inclusion (Babbie 1990).

zh: 哥特曼量表用于测量社会距离，特别是测量受访者所接受的与其他类型人的社会距离（Sarantakos 1998)。
en: Guttman scales measure social distance, particularly how close a respondent will allow another type of person to be to them (Sarantakos 1998).

zh: 美国环境正义运动产生的这些条件说明了它的一些主要特点。
en: These conditions of production of an environmental justice movement in the United States account for some of its central features.

zh: 首先，对某些特殊污染——有毒物和危险的污染物——的集中关注把讨论压到了象征问题上，清楚说明了，就如污染那样，这个问题也是有关“地位的诉求和反诉求”的(Douglas，1984:3)。
en: To begin with, the focus on particular kinds of pollution — toxics and dangerous contaminants — loads the discussion towards symbolic questions, making clear that the issue is as much about "claims and counter-claims to status" (cf. Douglas, 1984: 3), as it is about pollution per se.

zh: 这就是使运动具有如此巨大道德力量和道德义愤能量的东西。
en: This is what gives the movement so much of its moral force and capacity for moral outrage.

zh: 相反，新的方法只是在原有基础上增加了一点新的内容，两个变数这种简单体系仍是城市秩序的目标。
en: Rather these new ideas were added.Simple, two-variable systems of order were still  the aim.

zh: 不同的是，在无序复杂性问题(disorganized complexity)这种新概念体系里，两个变数简单体系则更有了存在的理由。
en: But these could be organized even more "rationally" now, from our of  a supposed existing system of disorganized complexity.

zh: 简而言之，概率和统计分析这种新的方法使得人们有可能对所谓的城市问题进行鸟瞰式分析，提供更多的“准确性”和更广泛的分析范围。
en: In short, the new probability and statistical merhods gave more "accuracy," more scope, made possible a more Olympian view and treatment of the supposed problem of the city.

zh: 在我们中的许多人看来，科学研究中一个成功的领域就是基础物理学，从某种意义上说这是不幸的。
en: It is in a way unfortunate that for many of us the image of a successful field of scientific endeavor is basic physics.

zh: 大部分基础物理学的目标就是对发生的事情提供一个全面的描述。
en: The objective of the most basic physics is a complete description of what happens.

zh: 从原理上，尤其是从实践中看，量子力学完整地描述了一个氢原子内部发生的状况。
en: In principle and apparently in practice, quantum mechanics gives a complete account of what goes on inside, say, a hydrogen atom.

zh: 但是，我们希望分析的大多数事情，即使是物理科学中的事情，都达不到那样的全面和完整。
en: But most things we want to analyze, even in physical science, cannot be dealt with at that level of completeness.

zh: 然而，《太阳报》整个报道的宗旨暗示着，犯罪是非裔美国人和“下层阶级”的习惯。因此，构筑栅栏反对有色人种和低收入人群，尽管令人遗憾，但也许是正当的。构筑栅栏旨在确保可防御的“社区”空间的安全，这样做是合理的。否则的话，那些富有的白种中产阶级人口将会逃离城市。
en: The whole tenor of the Sun's report implied, however, that crime was an African–American and "underclass" habit and that therefore the construction of barriers against people of color and of low income, however regrettable, might be justifiable as a means to secure a defensible space of "community" for an affluent white middle-class population that might otherwise flee the city.

zh: 必须创造出组织、制度、学说、计划、形式化的结构以及诸如此类的东西。
en: Organizations, institutions, doctrines, programs, formalized structures and the like simply have to be created.

zh: 并且，这些政治行动必须牢牢地植根于人类行动得以展开的那些具体的历史和地理条件，并有能力改造它们。
en: And these political activities must be firmly grounded in and transformative of the concrete historical and geographical conditions through which human action unfolds.

zh: 在传统的共产党先锋派(列宁的幽灵)和理想化的先锋派(德里达的幽灵)之间存在一个政治组织和斗争的地带，它亟待培育。
en: Between the traditional avant-gardism of communist parties (the specter of Lenin) and an idealized avant-gardism (the specter of Derrida) there lies a terrain of political organization and struggle that desperately cries out for cultivation.

zh: 有许多有关统计显著性的检验。
en: There are a number of tests of statistical significance.

zh: 不同的检验有不同的应用，这取决于测量的层次及样本的数量和类型。
en: Different tests have different applications depending on the level of measurement and the number and type of samples.

zh: 萨兰塔克斯（1998, p. 403)对比较普遍的显著性检验进行了概括，如表9-7所示。
en: Sarantakos (1998, p. 403) provides a summary of the more common tests of significance, and this is illustrated in table 9.7.

zh: 统计显著性通常用显著性水平来描述（Neuman 2000)。
en: Statistical significance is generally described with respect to levels of significance (Neuman 2000).

zh: 在研究报告中常用的三个显著性水平是0.05、0.01及0.001(Babbie 1995；Neuman 2000)。
en: One of three levels of significance is usually reported: 0.05, 0.01, or 0.001 (Babbie 1995; Neuman 2000).

zh: 这些水平分别代表了由于抽样误差的原因使得测量到的相关概率是5%，1%，1‰。

en: Respectively, the levels refer to a 5 in 100, a 1 in 100 or a 1 in 1000 chance of an association between the variables being a result of sampling error.

zh: 我们生活在称之为“现代”的世界中。
en: We live in a world we call ‘modern’.

zh: 现代的想法是非常富含时间概念的一种思想。
en: The idea of modern is a very time-laden one.

zh: 要做到现代，就是要“与时俱进”，就是要赶上时代,就是要使用最新的小玩意儿或思想，就是要追随最时髦的服饰或游戏。
en: Being modern is to ‘move with the times’, to be ‘up to date’, to be a user of the newest gadgets or ideas, to be a follower of the latest fashions in clothes, furnishings or games.

zh: 总的来说就是现代社会人们定义的一种现代性(modernity)状态。
en: Collectively, a society of modern people defines a state of modernity.

zh: 如果可以从多种立场观察世界将更好地理解世界如何作为一个总体性运行的途径。
en: Learning to see the world from multiple positions — if such an exercise is possible — then becomes a means to better understand how the world as a totality works.

zh: 多种多样的投射(数学的和精神分析的)大体上可以相互转换。
en: Multiple projections (mathematical and psychological) are in principle trans-formable into each other.

zh: 那就是哈拉维(1991: 193) 所设想的方式。
en: That is how Haraway (1991: 193) visualizes it.

zh: 她把相对论和总体性作为“许诺通天之眼的上帝诡计”加以拒绝。
en: Rejecting both relativism and totalization as "god tricks promising vision from everywhere and nowhere equally."

zh: 与那些在英国经验论传统中成长起来的其他思想家一样，怀特海也致力于对相关性观点进行现实主义的而不是逻辑学的理解。因此，他反对莱布尼茨转向纯粹唯心主义的倾向。
en: To begin with, Whitehead, as befits someone raised in the traditions of British empiricism, pushed for a realist rather than a logical version of the relational view He thereby counters Leibniz's tendency to veer off into unalloyed idealism.

zh: 他还具备在爱因斯坦提出广义相对论之后的写作优势。
en: He also had the advantage of writing after Einstein published the general theory of relativity.

zh: 虽然他怀疑爱因斯坦的解释(因此打开了相对性和相关性观点之间的缺口)，但他绝不怀疑爱因斯坦的重要性和准确性。
en: While he disputed Einstein's interpretations (thereby opening a gap between the relative and relational views) he never doubted the importance or veracity of Einstein's discoveries.

zh: 双变量分析考虑两个变量之间的关系，两个变量间或者彼此相关，或者彼此无关。
en: Bivariate analysis considers the relationship between two variables, which may or may not be related to each other.

zh: 相关的变量可描述为证明共变，无关的变量在任何情况下都可描述为独立相关。
en: Variables that are related are described as demonstrating covariation; variables that are not related in any way are described as having an independent relationship.

zh: 判定两个变量间的关系有很多种方法：交叉表、散点图和相关性测量。
en: There are a number of ways to determine relationships between two variables: cross-tabulation, scattergrams and measures of association.

zh: 威廉斯指出，最后出现的是：“否定的政治学、差别的政治学、抽象分析的政治学。而且，不管我们是否喜欢，它们甚至对于理解正在发生的事情都是必要的。
en: It comes, Williams notes, "the politics of negation, the politics of differentiation, the politics of abstract analysis. And these, whether we liked them or not, were now necessary even to understand what was happening."

zh: ”就环境正义运动情况来说，不断寻求媒体的关注和事件的肖像学——象征政治学正是围绕它们而建立——承载着它自己的消极影响。
en: And in the case of the environmental justice movement the constant search for media attention and an iconography of events around which to build a symbolic politics carries its own negative freight.

zh: 所有这些又都再次指出了第三章中所提到的日常生活的消费和审美化（aesthetidzation)的重要性。
en: All this points once again to the importance of consumption and of the aestheticization of everyday life introduced in Chapter 3.

zh: 消费“旨在消除陌生人之间存在的恐惧。
en: Consumption purports to dispel the dread of being in a world of strangers.

zh: 广告告诉我们应该期待的事物、可接受的或不可接受的事物，以及为了获得它们我们需要去做的事情。
en: Advertisements tell us what to expect, what is acceptable and unacceptable, and what we need to do in order to belong.

zh: 它们是生产和传播文化符号的主要载体”。
en: They are primary vehicles for producing and transmitting cultural symbols.

zh: 消费“不仅仅有生产和循环的意义，它……交织着并改变着力量和观点，并使得我们能够在日常生活中改变我们的文化，改造自然，并创造地方”。
en: [Consumption] not only produces and circulates meaning, it . . . interweaves and alters forces and perspectives, and it empowers us in our daily lives to change our culture, to transform nature, and to create place.

zh: 对消费者选择问题的分析可以分成两个部分。
en: The analysis of the consumer-choice problem can be divided into two parts.

zh: 无差异曲线（indifference curve)总结了消费者对可选择的消费品的主观偏好。
en: An indifference curve summarizes tbe consumer‘s subjective preferences about alternative consumer goods.

zh: 预算线（budget line)表示对消费者的约束（限制）。
en: The budget line shows the limits (constraints) imposed on the consumer.

zh: 系统性的轨迹并不难识别。
en: Traces of systematicity are not hard to identify.

zh: 货币、商品、信息、人造制品、技术、象征体系的流动，都是日常生活的一部分，它们都对身体的感觉表现产生了影响，都在价值关系的定义中发挥着独持的作用，都提供把全球时间和空间协同起来的共同凝聚力。
en: Flows of money, commodities, information, cultural artefacts, technologies, symbolic systems, all are part of daily life, have their effects upon the sense presentation of the body, play their role in defining value relations and provide some sort of common glue of cogredience across a global space and time within which multiple cartographies (embodied understandings) get defined.

zh: 在那种时空中，各种各样的绘图法(具体化的理解)得到定义。
河床泥沙搬运的突变论表述。
en: Catastrophe theory representation of bed-load sediment transport.

zh: 在C点，当河流携沙力达到阈限值时携带底质的能力突然提高。
en: At C, there is suden high entrainment of bed material as stream power reaches a threshold value, leading to high bed-load transport.

zh: 在D点发生大量沉积，因为随着河流携沙力下降超过了携带该分选粒级迁移的阈限。
en: At D, there is general deposition as stream power falls.

zh: 虚线表示短命河道中洪水涨落的历程。
en: The dotted line represents the passage of a flood wave in an ephemeral channel

zh: 默里(1982, p. 15)指出了写作过程的三个步骤：构思、写作、修改。
en: Murray (1982, p. 15) has identified three stages in the writing process — pre-writing, writing and rewriting.

zh: 格瑞伍斯(1984)也指出了写作过程的三个阶段：构思 (预写）、撰写和写作之后（首稿完成后的所有活动）。
en: Graves (1984) also uses three phases — rehearsal (pre-writing), composing and post-writing (all activities after the first draft is completed).

zh: 麦克罗瑞（1980, P. 297)提出了四个阶段的模型：收集、模仿、修正和写作。
en: Macrorie (1980, p. 297) uses a four-phase model — collecting, imitating, revising and writing.

zh: 从某种意义上说，他们所描述的是同一过程，该过程并非一蹴而就的。
en: In a sense, they are all describing the same process, one in which one-shot writing is rarely the norm.

zh: 在进行研究时，无论使用定性方法还是定量方法，研究者都必须要同时保证信度和效度问题。
en: When engaging in research, whether it is research that uses a quantitative or a qualitative methodology, the researcher must address issues of reliability and validity.

zh: 从本质上说，研究者必须清楚收集资料所使用的问题和方法是可靠的和有效的。
en: Essentially, the researcher must check that the questions and measures being used to gather data are reliable and valid.

zh: 虽然信度和效度往往同时使用，但是两者有着不同的含义，正如下面的探讨中概括的。
en: Although used together, reliability and validity have quite different meanings, as outlined in the following discussion.

zh: 你过去怎样看待共产主义，你现在怎样看待自然，只不过是投你所好东西。
en: What you thought about communism, what you now think about nature, is no more than a projection of what suited you.

zh: 对其他人来说，每一信仰都是真实的，这个事实只不过让你来欺骗他们。
en: The fact that for others each belief is substantial merely enabled you to deceive them.

zh: (Loyalties，364)
en: (Loyalties, p. 364)

zh: 这二种元素都通过大脑过滤和编码，并形成一系列意象，构成了个人意识空间的运作部分。
en: Both elements are subject to a mental filtering and coding that produces a set of imagery that constitutes the operational part of the individual’s awareness space.

zh: 意识空间中构成搜索空间的子集仅仅是家庭认为与期望区域有关的地区，并且搜索空间具有空间偏向性是由于包括活动空间和意境地图所具有的内在偏向性。
en: The subset of this space that constitutes the search space is simply the area (or areas) that a household feels to be relevant to its aspiration region, and it is spatially biased because of the inherent bias in both activity spaces and mental maps.

zh: 而且，不同类型的家庭，由于活动空间和意境地图的不同，其住房寻找行为也倾向于表现出不同的空间偏向。
en: It follows that different subgroups of households, with distinctive activity spaces and mental maps, will tend to exhibit an equally distinctive spatial bias in their search behaviour.

zh: 这种方法与创造了 “行动研究” 一词的赖文（Lewin 1948)的观点不一致。
en: Such an approach is at odds with Lewin (1948), who first coined the term 'action research'.

zh: 在行动研究中，研究与行为间的界限已经相当模糊(Patton 1990，p.157)。
en: In action research, the 'distinction between research and action becomes quite blurred' (Patton 1990, p. 157).

zh: 这会妨碍行动研究获得赖文所谓的行动研究的利益对于知识（理论）以及改善人类状况（实践）的贡献。
en: This can militate against allowing action research to achieve what Lewin described as the benefits of action research — a contribution to knowledge (theory), as well as the betterment of human conditions (practice) (Lewin 1948).

zh: 同样，你可能会认为保守经济学家们会替供给学派中他们的政治同盟说说好话，或许还会任命几位供给学派的忠实信徒在他们的系里任职。
en: Similarly, one might have expected to find conservative economists willing to say nice things about their political allies in the supply-side camp, and perhaps to appoint a few supply-side true believers to their departments.

zh: 但实际上即使在明尼苏达或卡内基—梅隆这样相当保守的经济学系，他们也没有这样做。
en: But in fact they do not, even at fiercely conservative departments like those at Minnesota or Carnegie-Mellon.

zh: 那么这仅仅是行会思想吗？
en: So is it just guild mentality?

zh: 你只有获得博士学位才有发言权吗？
en: Do you have to have a Ph.D. to be listened to?

zh: 但是，获得博士学位——甚至拥有卓著的学术声誉——并不能保证你的经济学观点会受到尊敬。
en: Well, having a Ph.D.even having an established professional reputation is no guarantee that your economic ideas will be treated with respect.

zh: 对此的反应是所谓“行为地理学”的发展。行为地理学具有：过程指向。
en: The reaction to this was the development of what became known as 'behavioural geography' which was：the process oriented.

zh: 所强调的过程……是诸如学习、感知、认识、 态度形成等等的人类行为过程（P.1327)。
en: The processes emphasized ... are human behavioural processes such as learning, perception, cognition, attitude formation, and so on ...(p. 1327).

zh: 这一段话既直率又令人吃惊，它表明，各种各样的限制如何以环境名义被强加到“他者”权利之上，同时又把各种权利(以及义务)赋予那些据说拥有知识和技术的人，让他们来控制这个难题。
en: Both blunt and startling, this statement illustrates how, in the name of the environment, all kinds of restrictions should be put upon the rights of "others" while conferring rights (and obligations) on those who supposedly have the knowledge and the high technology to control the problem.

zh: 尽管在今天极少有人敢如此嚣张，但是，在世界银行的论证中，甚至像《布伦特兰报告》这样表面进步的文件，仍然存在着这种思维方式的强烈色彩。
en: While few would now dare to be so blatant, there is a strong strain of this kind of thinking in World Bank arguments and even in such a seemingly progressive document as the Brunddand Report.

zh: 以地球健康、可持续性或阻止环境恶化的名义控制他人资源，这种做法绝不会在西方全球环境管理目标中消失。
en: Control over the resources of others, in the name of planetary health, sustainability or preventing environmental degradation, is never too far from the surface of many western proposals for global environmental management.

zh: 有一些二手资料可能本身也不够完整。
en: Some secondary documents may not be in complete sets or may be incomplete.

zh: 尤其是一些行政文件更是如此。
en: This is especially true of administrative documents.

zh: 例如，对于非营利机构来说，获得完整的资料可能是有困难的。
en: In nonprofit associations, for example, accessing complete data sets may be problematic.

zh: 有时，在执行行政管理任务时由于缺乏人手，有些文件就可能根本没有归档。
en: Sometimes, the lack of personnel to carry out administrative tasks may mean that some documentation is not undertaken.

zh: 有时由于人事更迭而导致文件无法找到或者调离人员无意中带走一部分文件，就更难以收集到完整的行政管理资料了。
en: Alternatively, documentation may be incomplete because it has been misplaced during a changeover of new executive members and/or unexpected departures of executive members who may accidentally take any documentation with them.

zh: 工人阶级政治在美国自20世纪70年代中期以来的削弱可以追溯到很多原因，不能在这里详细展开，但是一个推波助澜的因素就是围绕特殊问题的“进步”政治越来越分裂，以及那些所谓新社会运动的兴起。
en: This weakening of working-class politics in the United States from the mid-1970s on can be tracked back to many causes which cannot be examined in detail here.But one contributory feature has been the increasing fragmentation of "progressive" politics around special issues and the rise of the so-called new social movements focusing on gender, race, ethnicity, ecology, sexuality, multiculturalism, community, and the like.

zh: 这些运动聚焦于性别、种族、种族划分、生态、性、多元文化主义、社群等等方面，它们常常成为传统阶级政治的实用而有效的替代方案。而且在某些情况下，它们对这些政治会表现出彻头彻尾的敌意。
en: These movements often become a working and practical alternative to class politics of the traditional sort and in some instances have exhibited downright hostility to such class politics.

zh: 在400个回复者中，有256人表示曾经在肖尔沃特湾及其附近水域进行过休闲活动，142人表示他们去肖尔沃特湾并不是出于休闲的目的，2人没有提供有关研究区域使用情况的数据。
en: Of the 400 respondents to the survey, 256 indicated that they were users of the area, while 142 indicated that they did not use the area for recreational purposes and 2 respondents did not provide data regarding usage of the study area.

zh: 在256个该区域的使用者中，245人曾进行过休闲垂钓，也就是说97.5%的回复者都是该区域的垂钓者。
en: Of the 256 users of the area, 245 respondents engaged in recreational fishing, that is 95.7% of respondents were fishers of the area.

zh: 一些使用者还指出，他们也进行例如划船、露营和观光等其他活动。
en: Some users indicated that they also engaged in other activities such as boating, camping and sightseeing.

zh: 修订阶段：请一位“挑剔”的读者阅读文章并提出改进建议，或作者本人通读全文，以确保文章内容衔接自然流畅，保证写作目的和文章内容高度一致。
en: In the revising stage, you may allow a critical reader to respond to your text or you may re-read the text to ensure that all the sections are cohesively linked and your intent and content match.

zh: 在拟稿和修订阶段之间需要间隔一段时间，这样可以使作者以全新的视角来重新审视文章。
en: You need to allow time between the drafting and revising stages so that you can come to the text with fresh eyes.

zh: 通常，当我们集中一段时间完成一篇文章时，由于我们对它太过熟悉，当时可能认为它已经完全表达出我们的思想，但事实并非如此。
en: Often, when you have been working on a text for a period of time, you may think it says what you want when it does not, as you have become too close to the text.

zh: 而拟稿和修订阶段间隔的这段时间则可使作者更加严格地审视该文，所以，制订合理的工作进度表非常必要。
en: Time between drafting and revising enables you to look at the text more critically, and you need to plan your time schedule to allow this to happen.

zh: 戴维•哈维（David Harvey)的空间实践“网格”（表9一 1)为我们提供了一种适用于更广泛、更丰富的研究课题的方法，这些课题包括地方作为物质性人造物而被构建和体验的方式、 地方被表述的方式、地方作为空间符号在现代文化中被使用的方式。
en: David Harvey’s‘grid’of spatial practices (Table 9.1) provides one way of accommodating a broader, richer array of issues in addressing the ways in which places are constructed and experienced, how they are represented, and how they become used as symbolic spaces.

zh: 该矩阵有助于将我们的注意力集中到体验、感知和意象之间的辩证关系上，同时也有助于我们阐明地方的延展、地方的占用、地方的统治和地方的生产之间的关系。
en: The matrix is useful in focusing our attention on the dialectical interplay between experience, perception and imagination; and in clarifying the relationships between distanciation and the appropriation, domination and production of places.

zh: 但是，它并没有简化为一个理论：它仅仅是一个框架，我们可以通过它来解释阶级、性别、社团和种族的社会关系。
en: It does not, though, summarize a theory: it is merely a framework across which we can interpret social relations of class, gender, community and race.

zh: 断代方法多种多样，从沉积岩简单的叠置规则(越深越老)到放射性同位素定年。
en: Dating methods ranged from  the simple rule of superimposition for sedimentary rocks (deepest are oldest) to radio-isotope dating.

zh: 随着断代方法的改进，历史序列的精度也在改进。对气候断代的重视(如冰期和暖期与冷期)结合孢粉地层学使问题混淆了，研究重点从对过程的研究转移到地形断代，有时因缺乏明确的目标而陷入循环的争论。
en: As the methods of dating improved, so the precision of the historical sequence could also be improved.Emphasis on climatic dating (such as glaciations and warm and cold periods), coupled with pollen stratigraphy, confused the issue by shifting the emphasis to dating landforms and away from  the study of processes, sometimes leading to circularity of argument through a lack of clarity of objectives.

zh: 从事行动研究的研究者可能选择使用书面形式、口头形式或图像形式的报告。但是对于其中的一些研究者来说，对研究对象做出改变可能是研究的唯一要求，而不需要报告研究结果。
en: Researchers who engage in action research may choose to use written, oral or visual reports, and, for some, the change in the issue being studied may be the only outcome required and no report eventuates.

zh: 但是，这里仍然为行动研究报告提供了参考格式。
en: However, a suggested format for action research reports is provided here.

zh: 就像案例研究一样，行动研究报告可以以科学实验报告的结构为模型（引言、文献综述、方法、结果分析及未来研究计划），也可选择其他不同的模型。
en: As with case studies, the report may be based on the scientific experimental model (introduction, literature review, method, findings and analysis, and future action plans), but there are alternative models.

zh: 知情同意要求正在进行研究的参与者们完全知晓此研究的性质。
en: Informed consent requires that research participants are fully apprised of the nature of the research in which they are participating.

zh: 当参与者被研究活动的某些方面所蒙蔽时，就等于出现欺骗。
en: Deception occurs when participants are deceived about some aspects of the research.

zh: 举个例子来说，发起人的真实身份被伪装，或者用一些含糊的术语来表述整个研究的目的，或故意扭曲研究目的。
en: For example, the true identity of the sponsor may be masked or the overall research purpose may be couched in ambiguous terms or purposefully misrepresented.

zh: 联合主题发言是由几个从事相同或相似研究的研究者一起讨论他们的研究成果。
en: Panel sessions involve a group of researchers from the same research project or similar research projects discussing their research findings.

zh: 在这种发言中，研究课题展示了不同的视角，听众人数要比个人发言多，而且互动的效果也更充分。
en: Different perspectives on the overall research topic should be elicited from such discussions and audience engagement and interaction should be higher than during a stand-up presentation.

zh: 这种联合发言通常持续一个小时到一个半小时，其间会有热烈的讨论。
en: Panel sessions usually are allocated one to one-and-a-half hours to allow time for 'lively' debate.

zh: 准备使用混沌理论范式的研究者需要理解该范式及与其相关的研究含义。
en: Researchers intent on using the chaos theory paradigm need to understand the paradigm and its associated implications for research.

zh: 研究者和学生在以往的研究中借用某些词汇的隐喻义，创造了有关混沌理论的专用词汇，其中包括术语“混沌”。
en: In the past, researchers and students have appropriated the vocabulary for use in a metaphorical sense, including the term 'chaos'.

zh: 其实，理解混沌理论(混沌现象）中使用的术语或词汇的隐喻意义与专业定义之间的差别是很重要的。
en: It is important to understand the difference between the metaphorical and technical meanings associated with the terms and vocabulary used in chaos theory (Symptoms of Chaos, n.d.).

zh: 另外，混沌理论也受到复杂理论的挑战。做旅游研究的研究者要说明为何选用混沌理论而不是复杂论作为研究范式。
en: Furthermore, chaos theory is being challenged by complexity theory and researchers need to address this challenge when outlining their preference of chaos theory over complexity theory as a paradigm to inform tourism research.

zh: 随机抽样可以由电脑程序产生。
en: Random samples may be generated by computer programs.

zh: 这时,研究者必须能够获得抽样框，如旅客名单、旅馆名录、景区名册、俱乐部名单或组织成员名单。
en: The researcher has to have access to a sampling frame, such as a passenger list, an accommodation listing, an attractions list, or a list of club or association members.

zh: 在抽样框中每个对象被指定一个号码。
en: Each individual entry on the sampling frame is assigned a number.

zh: 要抽取的随机号码的总数是确定的，接着计算机程序就可以识别抽样单位。
en: The number of random numbers to be selected is determined and then the sample units are identified by the computer program.

zh: 第五栏是由本地每个前置号码中的居民号码的数量占居民号码总数（2800）的比率，结果以百分数形式表示。
en: Column 5 is determined by dividing the number of residential numbers in each prefix by the total number of residential numbers in Local town (2800), and expressing the answer as a percentage.

zh: 由此我们便了解了从每个前置号码（层次）中抽取的样本数占总样本数的比率。
en: We now know the percentage of our overall sample size that must be drawn from each of the prefixes (strata).

zh: 例如，如果我们的样本容量是1000，我们在前置号码49390内的呼叫电话就有36个号码，在 49391中呼叫71个号码等。
en: For example, if our sample size is 1000, we would call 36 numbers in the prefix 49390, 71 numbers in prefix 49391, and so on.

zh: 先来考虑一个不参与国际贸易的封闭经济（这听起来有点过时，而且与我们所处的这个出口创造了大量经济奇迹的时代毫不相关，也许如此——尽管后面我将证明通过修正，可以使它符合现代经济。不过，现在我们还是按原来的规则开始吧）。
en: Imagine, then, an economy that is closed to international trade.(This sounds archaic and way off the point in our current age of export-led economic miracles, and perhaps it is although I'll argue later that we may be able to modify the story to make it relevant to modern economies. But in any case, for the moment let's play by the original rules.)

zh: 通过对要素供给、技术、需求和市场结构做出假设，我们就可以描述这个假想经济了。
en: Our hypothetical economy can be described by assumptions about factor supply, technology, demand, and market structure.

zh: 事实上，城市并不是模型中的核心概念。
en: Indeed, cities are not primitive concepts in the model.

zh: 相反，单个厂商生产能力的规模报酬递增，运输成本和要素流动性等因素之间的相互作用导致了聚集现像的出现。
en: Instead, agglomerations emerge from the interaction between increasing returns at the level of the individual production facility transportation costs, and factor mobility.

zh: 由于规模报酬递增，每一种产品在有限几处集中生产更有利。
en: Because of increasing returns, it is advantageous to concentrate production of each good at a few locations.

zh: 页缘编码是指设计一份在每页的边缘都有编码数据的调査问卷。
en: Edge-coding involves designing a questionnaire with coding data along one side.

zh: 编码记录在调査表中事先设计好的页边空白处或编码框中。
en: Codes are recorded in spaces in the margin or in code boxes already organised in the questionnaire.

zh: 如图9 - 3所示，调查表的页边空白处印有编码框，此空白处用来提示编码员应把数据输人到哪一列。
en: The section of questionnaire shown in figure 9.3 has code boxes in the questionnaire and the margin is used to indicate to the coder into which column the data should be entered.

zh: 知道了具体的数据应当输入的列，会使数据输入过程变得容易，同时，由于可及时识别列中的错误，还可以使数据的“净化”和核对过程变得容易。
en: Knowing which column specific data have to be entered into assists the process of data entry.It also assists in the data cleaning and checking processes,as errors in columns can be identified quickly.

zh: 在确定了适当的问题后，编码员可返回原始数据以检查哪部分发生了错误，然后以初始数据为基础做适当的修改。
en: The appropriate question is determined and the coder returns to the original data to examine where the error occurred and subsequently makes the appropriate changes based on the original data.

zh: 我不得不离开那个自己称为家的空间，跨越边界流浪，然而我也需要回到那里……实际上，“家”的真正意义随着非殖民化和激进化的经验而发生变化。
en: I had to leave that space I called home to move beyond boundaries, yet I needed also to return there....Indeed, the very meaning of "home" changes with the experience of decolonization, of radicalization.

zh: 有时，家不是任何一个地方。
en: At times, home is nowhere.

zh: 有时，人们只知道极端的疏离与异化。
en: At times, one knows only extreme estrangement and alienation.

zh: 在进行假设检验的过程中，通常至少涉及两个变量——自变量和因变量。
en: If you are testing a hypothesis, there will be at least two variables — an independent variable and a dependent variable.

zh: 实际上，“定量研究的语言就是变量和变量间关系的语言”（Neuman 2000, p. 126)。
en: In fact, '[t]he language of quantitative research is a language of variables and relationships among variables' (Neuman 2000, p. 126).

zh: 自变量有时也被称为原因变量（Neuman 2000)或改变变量（Kumar 1996)。
en: The independent variable is sometimes referred to as the causal variable (Neuman 2000) or change variable (Kumar 1996).

zh: 因变量可解释为结果变量（Kumar 1996)。
en: The dependent variable is also referred to as the outcome variable (Kumar 1996).

zh: 因果关系研究可能源于探索性研究或描述性研究。
en: Causal research may be generated from either exploratory or descriptive research.

zh: 因果关系研究与定量研究方法之间的联系并不是模棱两可的，为了支持或推翻两个或多个变量之间的因果关系，运用这一研究方法时通常涉及变量的使用和假说的建立。
en: Causal research is unambiguously linked to the use of a quantitative methodology and involves the use of variables and the construction ofhypotheses to support or reject causal relationships between two or more variables.

zh: 例如，研究者可能论证以下命题：在淡季，飞往省会城市的机票价格下降可能会提高该城市的游览率。
en: For example, a researcher may consider the following statement:the lowering of airfares to capital cities in the low season will increase visitation rates to those cities.

zh: 在这一命题中，研究者假设了前往省会城市的机票价格和游览率之间存在关联。
en: In this statement, the researcher has hypothesised a relationship between the cost of airfares and visitation rates to capital cities.

zh: 这是一个描述两个变量之间因果关系的假说，两个变量中一个是自变量机票价格降低，另一个是因变量游览率的上升。
en: The statement is a hypothesis describing a causal relationship between two variables, an independent variable, the lowering of airfares (the cause variable), and the dependent variable, the increase in visitation rates (the effect variable).

zh: 建筑和规划文献从窗户、眺望处和视线的角度来对待隐私问题。这意思是说如果没有人能从外面窥视你的住处，那么你就拥有了隐私(privacy)。
en: Architectural and planning literature deals with privacy in terms of windows, overlooks, sight lines.The idea is that if no one from outside can peek into where you live---behold, privacy.

zh: 这是一种头脑简单的想法。
en: This is simple-minded.

zh: 窗户里的隐私(privacy)是世上能够得到的最简单的商品。
en: Window privacy is the easiest commodity in the world to get.

zh: 作为一个研究者，关于是否要进行隐性研究和适当地利用某种欺骗性的手段，你得自己拿定主意。
en: As a researcher, you have to make your own decisions regarding covertresearch and the use of deception.

zh: 这需要针对该项研究可能对社会产生的道德价值和利用欺骗、隐性研究会在多大程度上损害人的权利两方面进行权衡。
en: This should be determined by weighingthe 'moral' good such research will do for society against how such covertactivities and deception infringe on the rights of humans.

zh: 同时也需要有一个来自你的学科、职业或组织的适当机构对此类行为予以许可。
en: It also needs to be sanctioned by an appropriate body from your discipline, profession ororganisation.

zh: 例如，我们现在就来探讨使萨默斯处理有毒垃圾的观点成为可能的普遍内容。
en: Consider, for example, the general content in which Summers' version of what to do with toxic wastes becomes possible.

zh: 在这里，强调它是新古典主义经济逻辑的典型表现，这是不够的。它本身是一组吸引人的特殊隐喻，在其中，人们可以设想在资源匮乏条件下进行提高福利的垃圾交易。
en: It is not sufficient here to argue that it is a typical manifestation of neoclassical economic logic — itself an engaging set of particular metaphors — in which welfare-enhancing trade in waste can be envisaged under conditions of resource-scarcity.

zh: 所有研究的开展都必须要遵守一定的伦理规范。
en: All research must be undertaken in an ethical manner.

zh: 对应用性研究来说更是如此，因为委托人可能会在研究设计或报告中倾向于某种偏见。
en: This is especially relevant for applied research, as the client may angle for a bias in the research design or reporting.

zh: 研究者是受道德标准约束的，因而这种倾向是不可接受的。
en: Researchers are bound by ethical standards and such angling is not acceptable.

zh: 研究者在进行符合道德规范的研究时，必须对他们自己、学术界、公众和发起人负责。
en: Researchers must be responsible to themselves, the scientific community , the public and their sponsors in conducting ethical research.

zh: 人们讨论拥挤理论的同时，越来越关注城市设计与建筑给人类行为带来的负面影响。
en: In addition to the general debate on crowding theory, a growing amount of attention has been directed towards the negative effects of the built environment on people’s behaviour.

zh: 广义而言，这种影响是指建筑和空间的设计与构造有时会产生一种小环境，而这种小环境拒绝或否定社会互动的“正常形式”，而有助于各种各样的越轨行为。
en: In broad terms the suggestion is that the design and configuration of buildings and spaces sometimes creates micro-environments that discourage ‘normal’ patterns of social interaction and encourage deviant behaviour of various kinds.

zh: 有大量的证据证实了这种观点。
en: A considerable amount of evidence has been accumulated in support of this idea.

zh: 例如，有许多研究都论证到，高耸拥挤的楼房会对社会关系和孩子成长造成负面影响。
en: The inhibiting effects of high-rise and deck-access apartment dwellings on social interaction and child development, for example, have been documented in a number of different studies.

zh: 怀特海的“永恒性”学说牢牢地确定了这个观念。
en: Whitehead's doctrine of "permanences" firms up the idea.

zh: “永恒性”作为一种“广泛联系”的体系源自过程。
en: A "permanence" arises as a system of "extensive connection" out of processes.

zh: 实体在它们的边界内以及它们创造空间之过程的内在秩序安排中获得相对稳定性，这是暂时的。
en: Entities achieve relative stability in their bounding and their internal ordering of processes creating space, for a time.

zh: 这些永恒以排他的方式最终占据一块空间(暂时的)，并因此定义一个位置——它们的位置(暂时的)。
en: Such permanences come to occupy a piece of a space in an exclusive way (for a time) and thereby define a place — their place — (for a time).

zh: 位置形成过程是在创造空间的过程之流中开辟“永恒性”的过程。
en: The process of place formation is a process of carving out "permanences" from the flow of processes creating spaces.

zh: 但是“永恒性”——不管其看起来多么稳定一并非不灭的：它们总是作为“持续的消亡”而受时间支配。
en: But the "permanences" — no matter how solid they may seem — are not eternal: they are always subject to time as "perpetual perishing."

zh: 它们由创造、维持和消灭它们的过程而定。
en: They are contingent on the processes that create, sustain and dissolve them.

zh: “垃圾”，特别是有害垃圾为什么以及如何被生产出来的，当然，这个问题从没有在萨默斯这类人的讨论中提及过。
en: Questions of how and why "wastes" in general and hazardous wastes in particular are produced in the first place are, of course, never even mentioned in discussions of the Summers' sort.

zh: 然而，正如考摩纳(1990)和其他人一起反复强调的[]，预防无疑应该优先于对任何副作用的处理和补救。
en: Yet, as Commoner (1990) has, among others, again and again emphasized, the question of prevention surely should take precedence over disposal and cure of any side-effects.

zh: 但是，提出那个问题需要将话语转移到更加充满政治色彩的批评地带，批评我们生活于其中的生产及消费方式的普遍特性。
en: But posing that question requires a discursive shift to the far more politically charged terrain of critique of the general characteristics of the mode of production and consumption in which we live.

zh: 怀特海的最终目标是用“有机论哲学”代替牛顿的机械论观点，并且在《科学与近代世界》(1985:80)中，他通过重新研究时间和空间状况而开启了实现那个方案的道路。
en: Whitehead's ultimate objective is to replace the Newtonian mechanistic view with "a philosophy of organism" and in Science and the Modern World (1985: 80) he opens the way to that project through a reconsideration of the status of space and time.

zh: 他指出，物既是独立的，又是在时间和空间中绑在一起的。
en: He observes that things are both separated and bound together in space and time.

zh: 他把这种特点称为时空之“分离性的”和“包容性的”特点。
en: He calls these characters the "separative" and the "prehensive" characters of space-time.

zh: 因此在系统和有机体(参见第8页）之间作类比是贴切的。

en: Activation of the links (flows of some type between elements) operates the system, so that the analogy between system and organism (see p. 8) is a close one.

zh: 元素之间联系的性质不仅支配着系统的运转，而且在恰当的地方支配着系统的演化。
en: The nature of the links between the elements governs not only the operation of the system but also, where relevant, its evolution.

zh: 变化过程被纳入系统内部。
en: Processes of change are built into the system.

zh: 焦点群体法也可用于预测数据的收集。
en: Focus groups can also be used to gather data for forecasting.

zh: 预测过程通常包括收集数据，依据这些数据研究人员可以预测未来的事件及重大问题的发展。
en: Forecasting involves gathering data upon which the researcher is able to predict future events and issues.

zh: 正如本教材前面提到的，预测可能包括短期（1天至两年）、中期（2至5年）、长期（5至15年）以及未来（15年以上）的预测（Mill & Morrison 1998)。
en: As noted earlier in this textbook, forecasts can be short term (one day to two years), medium term (two to five years), long term (five to 15 years) and futuristic (more than 15 years) (Mill & Morrison 1998).

zh: 进行域分析包括以下步骤（Spradley 1980，pp.93 ~99):•选择语义关系，例如：(1)语义关系：严格包含；(2)形式:A是B的一种；举例：巴士观光是度假的一种。
en: There are a number of steps involved in conducting domain analysis (Spradley 1980, pp. 93-99):• choose a semantic relationship, for example:1.Semantic relationship: strict inclusion2.Form: A is a kind of B3.

zh: •制作一张域分析工作表(参见下面的例子）。•选择一组数据；•检验数据中符合“语义关系”的“概括性术语”和“内含性术语”；•重新检验数据，找出其他的语义关系；•为已确定的域做目录。
en: Example: a bus tour is a kind of holiday• organise a domain analysis worksheet (see example below)  • choose a selection of data• examine the data for 'cover terms' and 'included terms' that match the 'semantic relationship'• re-examine the data for other semantic relationships• prepare a catalogue of identified domains.

zh: 这样一个世界中会出现我们实际上看到的空间分布非常不均匀的经济活动吗？在实际世界中，大多数人聚居在面积很小的城市里，而城市本身也是高度专业化的。
en: Would such a world give rise to the highly uneven spatial distribution of economic activity we actually see, in which most people live on the small urbanized fraction of the land, and in which urban areas themselves are highly specialized?

zh: 答案当然是否定的。
en: The answer, of course, is that it would not.

zh: 因为这是一个不存在任何扭曲的帕累托有效的世界，因而有效的结果（同时也是市场结果）必然是在整个平原上每一种产品的生产都均匀分布，这样无须运输。
en: The efficient thing (and also the market outcome, since this would be an undistorted, Pareto-efficient world) would be to have production of every commodity spread evenly across the plain, so that no transportation is necessary.

zh: 当然，随着时间的推移，经济学已越来越数学化了。
en: Economics has, of course, become vastly more mathematical over time.

zh: 不管怎么说，即使在那个时代发展经济学的风格也很落伍。
en: Nonetheless, development economics was archaic in style even for its own time.

zh: 在超发展理论最著名的四篇论文中，罗森斯坦—罗丹的那篇文章基本上与萨缪尔森 （Samuelson）将赫克歇尔—俄林理论模型化的工作属于同一时期，而刘易斯、缪尔达尔和赫希曼的文章几乎与索罗对增长理论的最初论述同时问世。
en: Of the four most famous high development works, Rosenstein-Rodan's was approximately contemporary with Samuelson's formulation of the Heckscher-Ohlin model, while Lewis, Myrdal,and Hirschman were all roughly contemporary with Solow's initial statement of growth theory.

zh: 审查后的摘要也可拓展成文并最终发表在会议论文集中。
en: Refereed abstracts may also develop into full papers that are printed inconference proceedings.

zh: 一些会议论文集中的文章也可以在期刊上发表。
en: Some papers in conference proceedings may alsobe requested or submitted for consideration for publication in journals.

zh: 期刊论文的审查过程要比会议论文的过程更为严格和耗时。
en: Thejournal review process is more demanding and time-consuming than the process for conference papers.

zh: 然而，这些对真实性的十分错误的认识已经成为民族主义这一20世纪最强大和最危险的力量的基础。
en: Yet, such assumptions of authenticity have been the basis for feelings of nationalism --- one of the most powerful and dangerous forces of the twentieth century.

zh: 此外，在国家内部，种族主义观念继续作为城市冲突的根源而存在。
en: Furthermore, within nations, racist notions continue to be the basis for urban conflict.

zh: 因此，著作者们已经开始分析那些支撑种族主义在英国的一些内城地区存在的帝国主义话语。
en: Some writers have begun to analyze the imperialist discourses that underpin the racism that is found in some parts of British cities.

zh: 正如霍尔所说，那些反对亚洲人迁人的人们忽视了导致英国城市中这些群体发展的漫长的帝国历史。
en: As Hall points out, those who object to the influx of ‘Asians’ forget the long history of empire that has led to the evolution of these groups in British cities.

zh: 深度访谈本质上是主观的，这种方法能够收集到丰富而深人的资料，而且可能要分阶段进行。
en: In-depth interviews are subjective in nature, allow for rich and in-depth data to be collected and may involve several sessions.

zh: 非结构化访谈并没有正式的访谈程序表或事先预定的问题，持续时间长。
en: Unstructured interviews do not have a formal interview schedule or set of questions and are long in duration.

zh: 非结构化访谈类似于谈话。
en: Unstructured interviews are akin to a conversation.

zh: 非结构化访谈的优缺点与整体—归纳范式的本体论、认识论和方法论观点相关。
en: The advantages and disadvantages of unstructured interviews are related to the holistic-inductive paradigms' ontological, epistemological and methodological perspectives.

zh: 但是，对自然的统治和对他者的统治之间的这种联系还有更多的维度。
en: But this connection between the domination of nature and the domination of others has a further dimension.

zh: 任何种类的“改造自然”计划都具有分布性后果，许多此类明显不公正研究都是急烈冲突的根源。
en: "Nature-transforming" projects of any sort have distributional consequences and the patent inequity of many of these has been the source of powerful conflicts.

zh: 当前，在环境正义运动和名为“穷人的环境保护主义”运动的多国组织中，这些都成为斗争的焦点(参阅本书第十三章)。
en: These are now the focus of struggle in the environmental justice movement and within a polyglot group of movements known as "the environmentalism of the poor" (see chapter 13).

zh: 绘制是一种具体体现权力的话语行为。
en: Mapping is a discursive activity that incorporates power.

zh: 在所有方式中选定一种方式来绘制世界的权力是一种至关重要的政治斗争工具。
en: The power to map the world in one way rather than another is a crucial tool in political struggles.

zh: 因此，围绕绘制的权力斗争(同样，无论这些地图是所谓“真实的”还是比喻的空间)是话语生产的基本环节。
en: Power struggles over mapping (again, no matter whether these are maps of so-called real" or metaphorical spaces) are therefore fundamental moments in the production of discourses.

zh: 社会科学研究人类社会和人类活动。它包括像社会学、经济学和政治学这样的学科。
en: Social science is the study of human society and activity; its member disciplines include economics, political science and sociology.

zh: 战后时期该领域应用科学分析方法解决真实世界的问题，得到了迅速的扩展。
en: These social sciences expanded rapidly after 1945, using scientific methods to analyse problems and suggest how they may be solved.

zh: 1970年代以前罕有人文地理学家认为自己的研究领域属于社会科学，但是现在许多人改变了看法。
en: Before the 1970s few human geographers identified their discipline as a social science, but many now do.

zh: 其中，核心的概念之一就是个人之间为了城市中理想的区位而进行的非个人竞争（impersonal competition)。
en: One of the central concepts was that of impersonal competitionbetween individuals for favourable locations within the city.

zh: 这种竞争基本上通过市场机制进行 ，其结果就是使土地租金产生一种特征化的模式。不同地点和条件的土地租金不一样，又因为不同的人支付地租的能力不同，从而在不同类型的人群之间造成隔离（segregation)。
en: This struggle was acted out primarily through market mechanisms, resulting in a characteristic pattern of land rents and the consequent segregation of different types of people according to their ability to meet the rents associated with different sites and situations.

zh: 因此，经济分异被看做是导致居住隔离的基本原因，而特定群体在某些地区上的支配(dominance)被归因于其相对竞争力。
en: Economic differentiation was thus seen as the basic mechanism of residential segregation, and the local dominance of a particular group was ascribed to its relative competitive power.

zh: 首先来看一看美国工作场所安全和制定规章实践及实施的一般历史。
en: Consider, first, the general history of workplace safety and of regulatory practices and enforcements in the United States.

zh: 围绕着诸如三角女式衬衫公司火灾事件所引发的工人斗争极为重要地把职业安全和保健置入20世纪20年代的政治议程之中。在不放弃商业利益的前提下，努力满足某些最低限度的要求，这就是罗斯福新政联盟(包括工会)的一个根本特点。
en: Labor struggles around events such as the Triangle Shirtwaist Company fire put occupational safety and health very much upon the political agenda during the 1920s and it was a fundamental feature of Roosevelt's New Deal coalition, which included the labor unions, to try to satisfy some minimum requirements on his score without alienating business interests.

zh: 通过将编码的数据组成频数分布，研究者得以使用集中趋势量数来进一步分析数据。
en: Having organised the coded data into frequency distributions, the researcher is able to comment further on the data by using measures of central tendency.

zh: 集中趋势量数能够使调查者以一个数字来报告结果（在此情况下指的是频数分布）。
en: Measures of central tendency are used to enable researchers to report on the results (in this case frequency distributions) as one number.

zh: 集中趋势量数——众数、中位数和算术平均数——与具体的测量层次有关。
en: The measures of central tendency — mode, median and mean — are associated with specific levels of measurement.

zh: 郊区的兴起是十足由美国领导的社会转变过程，代表了一种有时被称为美国霸权周期的元素。
en: The rise of the suburb was very much a US-led process of social change and represents an element of what is sometimes called the American hegemonic cycle.

zh: 这是沃勒斯坦主义周期性意识形态时空概念的一部分。
en: This is part of a Wallersteinian cyclical-ideological TimeSpace.

zh: 在世界系统分析中，现代世界已经通过3个霸权周期而发展，每个周期都是以世界性霸权国家经济上的成功为基础的。
en: In world-systems analysis, the modern world-system has developed through three hegemonic cycles each based upon the economic successes of a world hegemonic state.

zh: 抽样基本上分为概率抽样和非概率抽样。
en: Sampling is primarily either non-probability or probability based.

zh: 非概率抽样包括就近抽样、目标式抽样、滚雪球抽样和专家抽样。
en: Non-probability sampling includes convenience, purposive, snowball sampling and expert sampling.

zh: 概率抽样包括简单随机抽样（抽签方法、名称方法、出生日期或电脑方法）、系统抽样、分层抽样和多阶整群抽样。
en: Non-probability sampling includes simple random sampling (lottery method, first name, date of birth or computer-generated methods), stratified sampling, cluster sampling and multi-stage sampling.

zh: 使用转换表很浪费时间。它先将数据转换成编码，然后输入到转换表上，再将编码输人到计算机软件程序中使用统计方法进行分析。
en: The use of transfer sheets takes some time, transferring data into codes and onto a transfer sheet and then entering the codes into a computer software program to statistically analyse the coded data.

zh: 这个过程包括了数据处理的三个阶段，随着每一个阶段的深人，编码发生错误的可能性也随之增加。
en: This involves three stages of data handling and the potential for coding errors increases with each stage of handling.

zh: 设想用(点)雨量计和(全面布设的)降雨雷达对降雨的测量；要用前者的测量值校正后者，在得到一个“真实”数值之前就需要进行大量的采样作业。
en: Consider the measurement of rainfall using (point) raingauge data and (spatially-distributed) rainfall radar; calibrating the latter with measurements from the former requires an extensive sampling exercise before an approximation to a ‘true’ value can be defined.

zh: 尽管如此，使用摄影测量法产生数字化地形模(DTMs)已经导致对精密度和准确度的重视。
en: Nevertheless, the use of photogrammetric methods to derive digital terrain models (DTMs) has led to increasing emphasis on precision and accuracy.

zh: 由于DTM提供有关地球表面地形的三维信息，所以它也是很有意义的。
en: The DTM is also interesting because it provides three-dimensional information on the morphology of the earth’s surface.

zh: 作为劳动价值的表现形式，货币承担着这些价值流通的尺度和媒介功能。
en: As an expression of labor values, money operates as both measure and as medium of circulation of those values.

zh: （抽象的）交换价值不同于货币的(具体的)使用价值方面，但将之内化了。
en: The (abstract) exchange value differs from but internalizes the (concrete) use value aspects of money.

zh: 只有一部分货币才能被直接用作资本(尽管大多数货币迟早会被带入其轨道）
en: Only a portion of the total money is used directly as capital (though most money at some time or another is brought within its orbit).

zh: 在马克思主义者看来，不能将理论与实践分离开来；认识引导变革的程序。
en: To Marxists, theory cannot be separated from practice; understanding leads to a programme for change.

zh: 但马克思主义地理学家应该如何工作以实现从资本主义到社会主义的革命，对此很多人并不清楚。
en: How Marxist geographers should work to achieve a revolution, from capitalism to socialism, is not made clear by many.

zh: 批判理论认为，对此的认同显然应该是渐进的过程（见下文），马克思主义分析所指出的对现实作正确评价，将增强自我反映的力量并导致从控制中解放出来。
en: The consensus would appear to be the gradualist one suggested by critical theory (see below), whereby appreciation of reality as depicted by Marxist analysis will increase the powers of self-reflection and lead to emancipation from domination.

zh: 例如，英国最重要的、也是最引人注目的资产变卖是在第六章所讨论的地方当局住房的变卖。
en: For example, one of the most important manifestations of asset sales in the United Kingdom has been the sale of local authority housing, as discussed in Chapter 6.

zh: 私有化也可能采用协议出让的形式，将原先由公共部门承担的责任转给私人组织。
en: Privatization can also take the form of contracting-out --- awarding tasks that were previously undertaken by the public sector to private sector organizations.

zh: 通常这样的转让是基于被称为竞争性投标的私下协议。
en: Often these contracts are awarded on the basis of secret bidding known as competitive tendering.

zh: 资料三角校正是指研究者在研究过程引入多种资料来源。
en: Researchers concerned with data triangulation draw on various sources of data in the research process.

zh: 调查者三角校正是指研究中雇用若干个研究者或评论者。
en: Investigator triangulation refers to the employment of several researchers or evaluators in a study.

zh: 理论三角校正是指研究者用几种方法或视角分析资料。
en: Theory triangulation involves researchers using several theories or perspectives to analyse data.

zh: 方法论的三角校正是指研究者使用多种方法收集与研究相关的资料。
en: Methodological triangulation involves researchers using several methods to gather data relevant to a study.

zh: 实际上，“定量研究的语言就是变量以及变量间关系的语言”（Neuman 2000, p. 126)。
en: In fact, 'the language of quantitative research is a language of variables and relationships among variables’(Neuman 2000, p. 126).

zh: 自变量有时也被称为原因变量（Neuman 2000)或改变变量（Kumar 1996)。
en: The independent variable is sometimes referred to as the causal variable (Neuman 2000) or change variable (Kumar 1996).

zh: 因变量可解释为结果变量（Kumar 1996)。

en: The dependent variable is also referred to as the outcome variable (Kumar 1996).

zh: 因此，把马克思主义同那种相当自负的统治自然的观点剥离开来，被证明十分困难。
en: It has subsequently proven hard to wean Marxism away from a rather hubristic view of the domination of nature thesis.

zh: 此外，马克思主义同多数资产阶级社会科学一样都普遍地厌恶那种观点，即“自然”能够控制、决定甚或限制任何形式的人类努力。
en: In addition, Marxism has shared with much of bourgeois social science a general abhorrence of the idea that "nature" can control, determine, or even limit any kind of human endeavor.

zh: 这样，它要么完全回避对任何根本性的自然观的定义，要么诉诸一种过于简化的修辞——“自然的人性化”，这种修辞得到辩证的和历史的唯物主义的支持，后者总是通过诉诸一系列认识论的/本体论的原则来理解那个难题。
en: In so doing it has either avoided a definition of any foundational view of nature altogether, or resorted to a rather too simplistic rhetoric about "the humanization of nature" backed by a dialectical and historical materialism that somehow absorbed the problem by appeal to a set of epistemological/ontological principles.

zh: 邮寄调査采用自填式问卷。与上门调査相比，它可以使研究者以较小的成本收集地域范围更广的数据。
en: Mail surveys are self-completion questionnaires that enable the researcher to target a wide geographical area for a lesser cost than a household survey.

zh: 邮寄调査需要使用封面信、指导语、问卷本身和用于寄回的信封。
en: Mail surveys involve the use of a covering letter, an ethics consent form, the questionnaire itself and a return envelope .

zh: 解放(常常是一种集体计划)和自我实现(多半是个人化的)是一对不可分离但常常矛盾的孪生目标。
en: The twin aims of emancipation (often a collective project) and self-realization (for the most part individualized) were inseparable but frequently contradictory.

zh: 因为统治自然的主题从属于这两者，它也使矛盾内在化了。
en: Since the thesis of domination of nature attached to both, it, too, internalized contradictions.

zh: 这一点要经过很长一段时间才变得清晰可见。
en: But it took time for them to become apparent.

zh: 最初，人们把公共领域的解放当成自我实现的前提，同时把个体解放视为集体解放目标的适当手段。
en: Initially, emancipation in the public sphere was quite properly viewed as a precondition for self-realization, while individual self-realization was viewed as a proper means to collective emancipatory ends.

zh: 并且假设理性总是能够把两者统一起来。
en: And it was presumed that reason could always unite the two.

zh: 11.探究“可能世界”是辩证思维的有机组成部分。
en: 11. The exploration of "possible worlds" is integral to dialectical thinking.

zh: 在某种意义上，这种观念回到了被17世纪科学广泛拒斥的亚里士多德的观念，即“一个自然存在的生成是其潜能实现的持续过程”(Leclerc，1986:21)。
en: In some ways this idea goes back to Aristotle, broadly rejected by seventeenth-century science, that "the becoming of a natural being is a constant process of actualization of its potentiality" (Leclerc, 1986: 21).

zh: 马克思辩证思维的根本主题是探究各种潜能：变化、自我实现，建构新的集体认同和社会秩序，以及新的总体性(如社会生态系统)等潜能。
en: The exploration of potentialities for change, for self-realization, for the construction of new collective identities and social orders, new totalities (e.g., social ecosystems), and the like is a fundamental motif in Marxism dialectical thinking.

zh: 这种情况出现在20世纪50年代的纽约，其时纽约出台了一项新法规，要求在出租房和公寓中提供集中供暖。
en: This was discovered in New York City during the 1950's, after new laws required central heating in tenement buildings.

zh: 如果房东和业主改善条件的话，他们可以通过提高租费和退税来得到补偿。
en: Landlords were to be recompensed for the improvements by renting increases or tax abatements.

zh: 但是这项条例遭遇了意想不到的障碍，尤其是那些本不该有问题的地方。
en: The arrangement ran into unexpected obstacles, and precisely in places where no particular obstacles would have been anticipated.

zh: 对于阿多诺来说，世界完全是相对的。
en: For Adorno the world is thoroughly relational.

zh: 每一个物都是它同其他物的关系的“结晶”。
en: Each thing is a "crystallization" of its relation with others.

zh: 然而，“结晶”这个术语在此与“关系”一样重要。
en: Yet the language of "crystallization" is as important here as that of "relation".

zh: 相对的世界并非一个纯粹流动与和谐的世界，而是这样一个世界：物在其中结晶成高密度的、无限特殊的、往往非常顽固的实体，它们抵制着自己诞生于其中的周围世界。
en: The relational world is not one of pure fluidity and harmony, but one where things crystallize into highly dense, infinitely specific, and often very recalcitrant entities that resist the surrounding world in which they are born.

zh: 阿尔贝蒂以两种方式拓展了色诺芬的观点。
en: Alberti extends Xenophon's argument in two ways.

zh: 首先，“封闭”和控制全部身体功能，这有助于保证单个身体的边界，创造一种不被渗透的纯粹性和个体性的空间。古列维奇对中世纪自我的研究说明了该问题。
en: First, the "closeting off" and control of all bodily functions helps secure a boundary of the isolated body, establishing spaces of purity and individuality that are protected from the porosity that characterized, for example, Gurevich's account of the medieval self.

zh: 其次，性欲在家庭（内部的卧室空间）中的私密化变得重要。
en: Secondly, the privatization of sexuality within the household (the interior space of bedrooms) becomes important.

zh: 在整体-归纳范式和假设-演绎范式指导下的案例研究，其数据收集的方法种类繁多。
en: Data collection for case studies operating within the holistic-inductive paradigm and the hypothetico-deductive paradigm are based on multiple methods.

zh: 具体而言，基于整体-归纳范式的案例研究通常采用文献法、参与观察法以及访谈法来收集资料。
en: Case studies informed by the holistic-inductive paradigm use the documentary method, participant observation and interviewing.

zh: 相应地，定性的案例研究往往采用方法论三角校正。
en: Subsequently, qualitative case studies use methodological triangulation.

zh: 这个问题同对理性/非理性的探讨紧紧地联系在一起。
en: This question was tightly coupled with considerations of rationality/ irrationality.

zh: 法兰克福学派挑战了工具理性的霸权，并且寻求一种替代性理性，这种理性有能力赋予生活一种深刻的意义，有能力恢复人类与外部自然之间敏感而开放的辩证关系，而不会向浪漫主义愤怒，宗教意识形态、自然崇拜和邪恶神话之盲目力量屈服。
en: The Frankfurt School challenged the hegemony of instrumental rationality and sought in its place an alternative rationality that had the power to give a deeper sense of meaning to life, to recuperate a sensuous and open dialogical relation between human beings and external nature without giving in to what they saw as the blind forces of romantic fury, religious ideology, nature idolatory and satanic myth.

zh: 当然，如何做到这一点仍然是一个未决的问题。
en: How to do that is still, of course, a very open question.

zh: 霸权周期及其相关的常规现代性，是社会时间形态的经典例子。
en: Hegemonic cycles with their associated everyday modernities are a classic example of a morphology of social time.

zh: 作为一种周期性变化的模式，霸权周期反对简单的进步模型，后者假定一种线性发展的格局。
en: As a cyclical model of change they counter simple progress models that assume a linear pattern of advancement.

zh: 但是，这并非不连续性优于连续性的案例。
en: However, this is not a case of discontinuity over continuity.

zh: 生态党的（Eco-cratic)观点喜欢普遍主义的生态规则，正像发展主义者喜欢普遍主义的经济学规则一样。
en: The eco-cratic view likes universalist ecological rules, just as the developmentalist liked universalist economic rules.

zh: 两者都忽视当地社群管理他们的资源并建造一个有意义社会的权利。
en: Both pass over the rights of local communities to be in charge of their resources and to build a meaningful society.

zh: 保护自然[应该]与下列这些权利密切相关：公有产权、传统认识方式、文化自主、宗教仪式，以及不受以国家为中心的发展的束缚。
en: The conservation of nature [should be] intimately related to rights of communal ownership, traditional ways of knowing, cultural autonomy, religious rivals, and freedom from state-centered development.

zh: （Sachs，1993)
房地产代理商负责与居住房产的交换和管理相关的各种各样的活动。
en: Real estate agents are responsible for a wide range of activities connected with the exchange and management of residential property.

zh: 他们为购买者寻觅房屋，有时还替他们安排资金；他们为出售者吸引买家，替他们处理文书工作。
en: They find houses and sometimes arrange finance for buyers; they attract purchasers and transact paperwork for sellers.

zh: 另外，他们也可能做一些调査、拍卖、评估、房地产管理和保险的业务。
en: In addition, they may also be involved in surveying, auctioneering, valuation, property management and insurance.

zh: 另一方面，这种公司组织有钱，因此有能力取代他们的竞争对手，占有他们想要的地方。
en: In the second place, such organizations have money, and thus are able to supplant most rivals for the space they want.

zh: 因此，在圆丘上安顿下来这种愿望和能力在银行和保险公司以及著名公司的办公间上得到了最有效的体现。后者可以 从银行和保险公司(insurance companies)那里很方便地借到钱。
en: The wish and the ability to settle on the knoll are thus combined most effectively in banks and insurance companies, and in prestige offices---which borrow readily from banks and insurance companies.

zh: 弗林德斯(1992, in Miles &Huberman 1994, P. 289 )提出了另一种关于伦理学方法的观点。
en: Flinders (1992, in Miles & Huberman 1994, p. 289) presents another view regarding approaches to ethics.

zh: 他给出了四种类型的伦理学方法：关系伦理学（与附属、尊敬和照顾相关）；功利伦理学（也适用于实证主义）；义务伦理学（认为研究者与被研究者之间是一种合作关系）；生态伦理学（与了解当地文化和避免背离相关）。
en: Flinders identifies four types of approaches to ethics: relational ethics (associated with attachment, respect and caring); utilitarian ethics (as applied in positivism); deontological ethics (viewing the researcher and the researched as collaborators); and ecological ethics (associated with understanding the local culture and avoiding detachment).

zh: 这四种方法对研究过程的三个主要领域——接近参与者、收集资料和报告调查结果——持有不同的观点（参见表4-5)。
en: Each of these four approaches has ramifications for three main areas of the overall research process: accessing participants, collecting the data and reporting the findings (see table 4.5).

zh: 研究人员应该注意，编码可能被过度使用。
en: Researchers need to be aware that coding can be overdone.

zh: 特别是在编码的过程中，如果没有使用备忘录记录想要实现的目标，编码过于细致会导致“只见树木，不见森林”。
en: You can code to such a micro level of detail that you 'cannot see the forest for the trees', especially if you have not been keeping memos of what you are trying to achieve with the coding process you are conducting.

zh: 因此，为便于追踪，不要忘记制定一张路径图（将在本章的制图法部分进行详细介绍）。
en: Therefore, make sure you keep a map of the path you are trying to follow with your codes (this is addressed in more detail in the section on mapping later in the chapter).

zh: 在研究围绕雅典卫城的竞争性论述和想象时，洛卡奇(1967)实施的恰恰就是这样一个步骤。
en: This is exactly the move that Loukaki (1967) makes in her study of competing treatments and visions of the Acropolis over time.

zh: 就“谁的精神定义哪个场所的性质”而进行的政治权力斗争贯穿于希腊历史。在这种斗争面前，建筑师、考古学家和艺术史家围绕“如何理解场所精神”的话语争论就渐渐消退了。
en: Discursive controversies among architects, archeologists, and art historians over how to understand the genius loci here fade before the political power struggle coursing through Greek history as to whose genius gets to define the qualities of which loci.

zh: 如洛卡奇表明的那样，那种争论不只是围绕着正确地解释过去以及这种或那种集体记忆的本真性进行，而且也是围绕全部的未来希望进行。
en: And that contest, as Loukaki shows, is not simply about the proper interpretation of the past, the authenticity of this or that collective memory, but it is also about all hopes for the future.

zh: 比较优势的概念可以用发生在地区内两部分之间的贸易模型来解释。
en: The notion of comparative advantage can be explained with a simple model of trade between two parts of the region.

zh: 假设西部地区比东部地区具有更高的生产力。
en: Suppose that the western half of the region is more productive than the eastern half.

zh: 在表2-1中，西部在生产小麦和毛料上均具有绝对优势（absolute advantage）。西部居民每小时生产的小麦是东部居民的2倍，生产的毛料是东部居民的6倍。
en: In Table 2-1, the West has an absolute advantage in producing both wheat and cloth: western residents produce twice as much wheat per hour and six times as much cloth per hour.

zh: 贝尔•胡克斯强调:“这不是一种神秘的边缘性观点。它来自活生生的经验”。
en: "This is not," Bell Hooks insists, "a mythic notion of marginality. It comes from lived experience."

zh: 边缘不只是一种比喻，而且是一种具有真实基础的想象。
en: The margin is not simply a metaphor, but an imaginary that has real underpinnings.

zh: 从那个地点出发，人们可以有力地谴责那些在中心地带形成的所谓的解放性话语。
en: From that location a powerful condemnation of supposedly emancipatory discourses shaped at the center can be launched.

zh: 研究人员应该注意,编码可能被过度使用。
en: Researchers need to be aware that coding can be overdone.

zh: 特别是在编码的过程中，如果没有使用备忘录记录想要实现的目标，编码过于细致会导致“只见树木，不见森林”。
en: You can codeto such a micro level of detail that you 'cannot see the forest for the trees',especially if you have not been keeping memos of what you are trying to achieve with the coding process you are conducting.

zh: 因此，为便于追踪，不要忘记制定一张路径图（将在本章的制图法部分进行详细介绍）。
en: Therefore, make sure you keep a map of the path you are trying to follow with your codes (this is addressed in more detail in the section on mapping later in the chapter).

zh: 就像上文提到的，数据输入有多种方法可资使用。
en: As already noted above, there are a number of ways that data can beentered.

zh: 数据输入的轻松与否将取决于在调査设计阶段，调查者是否对数据分析过程给予了全面的考虑。
en: The ease of data entry will depend on the researcher giving fullconsideration to the data analysis phase in the research design stage.

zh: 举个例子，如果调查问卷的设计包含了数据编码，那么就有可能立刻输人数据；否则，就需要准备编码簿，并且数据输人还要求数据输入人员在调查问卷和计算机程序之间互相参照（这也增加了在数据输入过程中犯错误的概率）。
en: It ispossible, for example, to enter data immediately from the questionnaire ifdata codes are included in the questionnaire design.Otherwise, code booksneed to be prepared and data entry will require some cross-referencingbetween the questionnaire and the computer program by the data entryperson (which also increases the chances of possible errors in data entry).

zh: 通过“把面对面直接交流的社会设定成理想，社群主义理论家制造了未来‘本真的，社会和我们生活其中的‘非本真’社会之间的二元论，后者只体现为异化、官僚化和堕落”。
en: By positing "a society of immediate face-to-face relations as ideal, community theorists generate a dichotomy between the `authentic' society of the future and the `inauthentic' society we live in, which is characterized only by alienation, bureaucratization and degradation."

zh: 扬对海德格尔传统的批判是非常激烈的。
en: Young's criticism of the Heideggerian tradition is strong.

zh: “种族主义、种性沙文主义和阶级贬值……部分地是由对社群的渴望发展起来的”。
en: "Racism, ethnic chauvinism, and class devaluation ... grow partly from the desire for community."

zh: 正如派菲伦（1999，P.3)所言，“在把口头叙述整理成文本的过程中，可能会丢失大量信息，因此对于口头资料来源一定要明确注明属于口头资料来源”。
en: As Pamphilon (1999, p. 3) comments, 'so much can be lost when an oral account is transcribed into text, it is crucial that oral sources are always acknowledged as oral sources'.

zh: 在口头互动中，研究人员的角色非常重要。
en: The role of the researcher in oral inter- actions is important.

zh: 正如本书前面所提到的，在非实证主义范式中，研究人员需要确定在研究过程中自身的个人和“政治”角色（MacKinnon 1982, P. 20)。
en: As mentioned earlier in this textbook, in non-positivist paradigms, researchers need to identify their personal and 'political' role (MacKinnon 1982, p. 20) in the research act.

zh: 变焦模型法的互动层次要求研究人员把自己也写进文本中。
en: The interactional level of the zoom model demands that researchers must write themselves into the text.

zh: 标准差也用于计算z分数和t分数。
en: Standard deviation is also used to calculate z-scores and f-scores.

zh: 这两个值使用标准化的数据计算，能够使不同的原始数据进行比较。
en: Both of these enable the comparison of raw scores from different distributions using calculations that standardise the scores.

zh: 具体而言，“标准数据或者Z分数将原始数据从不同的分布变成同样的分布，它们有同样的平均值（平均值0），同样的标准差（标准差 l）”（Sarantakos 1998，p.3800）。
en: Specifically, '[s]tandard scores or (z-scores) transform raw scores from different distributions into a common distribution, which has the same mean (a mean of zero) and the same standard deviation (a standard deviation of 1)' (Sarantakos 1998, p. 380).

zh: 地理学中的常见问题是如何将小尺度试验结果推广到更大的尺度。
en: A common problem in geography is how to generalize the results of small-scale experiments at the larger scale.

zh: 布雷克兰德的例子显示了详细的空间取样的好处，但是由时间或者纯粹是由于过程研究的成本等原因，并不总能够这样做。
en: The Breckland example showed the advantage of detailed spatial sampling but this may not always be possible, for reasons of time or the sheer cost of process studies.

zh: 当然，从某一项研究中所得到的结果——实际上，是一个样本定要谨慎对待，这就导致了现场实验推广的某种不确定性。
en: Of course, results from a single study – in effect, a sample of one – must always be treated with great caution, and this has led to some uncertainty about the wider value of field experiments.

zh: 作为话语，生态现代化把冲突内在化了。
en: As a discourse, ecological modernization internalizes conflict.

zh: 它具有大众优势，严肃地关注环境—生态问题，特别是捜集环境影响人口的科学证据，但它并不挑战与环境问题对立的资本主义经济体系。
en: It has a radical populist edge, paying serious attention to environmental-ecological issues and most particularly to the accumulation of scientific evidence of environmental impacts on human populations, without challenging the capitalist economic system head on.

zh: 不过，它确实暗示了对私有财产权的严格调控，并且，只要它付诸行动，通过调控，就能实际地抑制不受控制的资本积累的潜能。
en: It does imply strict regulation of private property rights, however, and in so far as it leads to action it can de facto, through regulatory action, curb the possibilities for uncontrolled capital accumulation.

zh: 对于实证主义范式，文献综述要在资料收集之前进行。
en: In a positivist paradigm, the literature review will be undertaken prior to any data collection.

zh: 资料收集在文献综述的指导下进行。
en: The data collection will be guided by the literature review.

zh: 然而，对于解释社会学范式或女性主义范式来说，文献综述可能在资料收集后进行。
en: However, in an interpretive social sciences paradigm or a feminist perspective paradigm, the literature review may be undertaken after data collection.

zh: 当研究者使用草根理论进行分析时更是如此，因为这种分析“植根于”（来自于）被研究者的日常生活，是对那些存在问题或值得研究的日常生活的分析。
en: This would be especially the case if the researcher were using grounded theory analysis, which is 'grounded' (derived) in the everyday world of the people being studied and what they perceive as issues or worth researching.

zh: 在运用草根理论进行分析之前，研究者应该对有关的方法论文献进行评述。
en: Prior to conducting grounded theory analysis, the researcher would conduct a methodological literature review.

zh: 场所精神是一个罗马概念。
en: Genius loci is a Roman concept.

zh: 根据古罗马的信仰，每一个“独立的”存在都具有自己的精神特色，它的守护神。
en: According to ancient Roman belief every "independent" being has its genius, its guardian spirit.

zh: 这种神使人和地方具有生命，伴随着它们从出生到死亡，并决定着它们的个性或本质。
en: This spirit gives life to people and places, accompanies them from birth to death, and determines their character or essence.

zh: 关系的内在化并不意味着这些关系的非异化形式，虽然它确实引起了对全部异化理论的质疑。异化理论总是假定一个事先就获得的自我本质，我们违背并且需要返回这个本质（参阅本书第八章）。
en: The internalization of relations does not imply a nonalienated form of such relations, though it does throw into question any theory of alienation that presupposes some preformed essence of self that gets violated and which needs to be returned to (cf chapter 8).

zh: 虽然身体可以把这种过程的结果内化，但它恰恰因为自己的异化而不能独自地衡量、评价和理解它自己通过城市化而进行的生产的动态。
en: While the body may internalize the effects of such process it is not by itself able to measure, assess, and understand the dynamics of its own production through urbanization precisely because of its alienation.

zh: 城市化经济导致来自不同产业的企业在城市里集聚。
en: Urbanization economies cause firms from different industries to cluster in cities.

zh: 城市里的企业可以利用提供商务服务（机械修理、银行、保险、运输、就业代理）和地方公共服务（运输机构、学校）的规模经济效应。
en: The firms in cities exploit scale economies in the provision of business services (machine repair, banking, insurance, transportation, employment agencies) and local public services (transportation facilities, schools).

zh: 城市里的企业同样也可以从市场共享和知识外溢效应中获益。
en: Firms in cities may also benefit from labor-market pooling and knowledge spillovers.

zh: 第二次把空间纳入经济学的重大努力有一个更为谨慎的目标，因而相应地它在迈入经济学领域时也更为成功；不过最终它还是失败了。
en: The second big effort to bring space into economics was more modest in its goals, and correspondingly far more successful in its initial entry into the field; yet in the end it, too, failed.

zh: 我指的是在20世纪60年代末和70年代初曾风光一时的“新城市经济学”。
en: I refer to the "new urban economics" that flourished in the late 1960s and early 1970s.

zh: 这方面的文献研究的是城市的内部空间结构。

en: This was a literature that concerned itself with the internal spatial structure of cities.

zh: 那么主流经济学是如何对待空间问题的呢？置之不理。
en: And so how did the mainstream cope with spatial issues?

zh: 主流经济学家从不考虑区位问题在我们的日常生活中一直很重要，也不考虑在现实世界中，城市系统像经济学中其他任何系统一样有章可循。
en: By ignoring them.Never mind that the importance of location confronts us continually in daily life, or for that matter that urban systems exhibit empirical regularities as strong as any in economics.

zh: 正如地理学家们因为知道手中没有可以解释山脉成因的模型，所以不会认真研究山脉的位置那样，经济学家们也因为知道无法把空间因素模型化，而不去研究经济的空间方面的问题。
en: Like geologists who could not really look at where mountain ranges are located because they knew they had no model of mountain formation, economists avoided looking at the spatial aspect of economies because they knew they had no way to model that aspect.

zh: 霍华德对美国城市规划的影响集中在城镇(小城市)和区域规划者以及建筑师两个方面。
en: Howard's influence on American city planning converged on the city from two directions: from town and regional planners on the one hand, and from architects on the other.

zh: 帕特里克•格迪斯爵士这位苏格兰生物学家和哲学家沿着这种规划思路，不把花园城市概念看成是一种吸引人口增长的方法(而原本这些人口注定是要涌向 大城市的），而是看成是一种通向更庞大的、容纳更多的方式的起点。
en: Along the avenue of planning, Sir Patrick Geddes, a Scots biologist and philosopher, saw the Garden City idea not as a fortuitous way to absorb population growth otherwise destined for a great city, but as the starting point of a much grander and more encompassing pattern.

zh: 他是从整个区域规划的角度来考虑城市的规划的。
en: He thought of the planning of cities in terms of the planning of whole regions.

zh: 持续比较分析使得研究人员能够通过持续比较已编码的数据来建立范畴。
en: Constant comparative analysis enables researchers to develop categories through constantly comparing coded data.

zh: 结果，通过反复出现的频率和理论抽样的方法可以识别和检验与编码相似的数据。
en: As a result, like-coded data are identified and verified through their repetitive presence and by the process of theoretical sampling.

zh: 在对已编码数据概念命名时，斯特劳斯和考宾（1990, PP. 68 ~ 69)建议研究人员不要使用“外来语'”因为它们常常含有先入为主的或特定的含义，因而推荐使用“本土的”概念。
en: When naming coded data concepts, Strauss and Corbin (1990, pp. 68-9) advise researchers not to use 'borrowed concepts' as they often carry preconceived or loaded meanings.Instead ' in vivo' concepts are recommended.

zh: 格雷泽(1978，P.70)和斯特劳斯（1987，p.33)提出了“本土”这一术语,意味着研究的参与者应用自己的语言构建概念术语，而不是由研究人员来创造概念术语。
en: Glaser (1978, p. 70) and Strauss (1987, p. 33) coined the term ' in vivo', meaning concepts that are named by the study participants themselves in their own words, rather than researcher-contrived concept terms.

zh: 持续比较分析与渐进法非常相似。
en: Constant comparative analysis is not unlike successive approximation.

zh: 抽样基本上分为概率抽样和非概率抽样。
en: Sampling is primarily either non-probability or probability based.

zh: 非概率抽样包括就近抽样、目标式抽样、滚雪球抽样和专家抽样。概率抽样包括简单随机抽样（抽签方法、名称方法、出生日期或电脑方法）、系统抽样、分层抽样和多阶整群抽样。
en: Non-probability sampling includes convenience, purposive, snowball sampling and expert sampling.Probability sampling includes simple random sampling (lottery method, first name, date of birth or computer-generated methods), stratified sampling, cluster sampling and multi-stage sampling.

zh: 在大都会区域(metropolitan areas),“大都会政府”经常会作为一个提案交给选民表决。
en: Every so often in a metropolitan area, Metropolitan Government is put up to the voters.

zh: 但是，选民总是加以否决，根本没有商量余地。选民们当然有他们自己的理由，虽然在很多大都会区域的 问题上，存在着共同行动和协调一致的需要(包括金融方面的支持），但是更加需要的是这个区域内的各个地方政府间这种那种的协调。
en: The voters inexorably and invariably turn it down.The voters are right, in spite of the fact that there is great need for common and coordinated action (and financial support) on many metropolitan area problems, and  still more need for localized coordination here and there among different governmental units within a metropolitan area.

zh: 我们所采用的分析方法取决于研究问题的复杂程度。
en: The method of analysis adopted depends on the complexity of the research question.

zh: 如果它只包含一个变量，则选择一种适用于单变量分析的方法。
en: If it involves only one variable, select a method of analysis appropriate for univariate analysis.

zh: 如果问题包括两个 变量，我们将使用双变量的分析方法。
en: If the question involves two variables we will use a method designed for bivariate analysis and so on .

zh: 在每种分析水平上（单变量、双变量、多变量），都有一系列的分析方法。
en: Within each level of analysis (univariate, bivariate, multivariate) there is a range of methods of analysis.

zh: 不过，如果我是一个单子，并且把万物都内在化了，那我在理解宇宙时要做的所有事情就是注视内在自我。
en: But if I am a monad and I internalize everything there is then all I need to understand the universe is to contemplate my own inner self.

zh: 确实，我的位置和视角以及反映能力的敏锐性将限制我的学习。
en: To be sure, what I learn will be conditioned by my positionality and perspective as well as by the acuity of my mirroring capacity.

zh: 但是，如莱布尼茨实际上做的那样，坚持下列立场仍然是合理的，即“我是万物的尺度”，并且对自己内在状况的深入反思是获得全部宇宙知识所必需的。
en: But it is still reasonable to argue, as Leibniz indeed did, that "I am the measure of all things" and that deep reflection on my own internal conditions is all that is required to achieve full knowledge of the universe.

zh: 他们的一般性理论作为环境变化后弹性与适应性循环的模式而出现。
en: Their general theory emerges as a model of the cycle of resilience and adaptation following change.

zh: 这可以想象为麦比乌斯带(Mobius strip)随时间变化的轨迹，如图7.4所示。
en: This is envisaged as a Mobius strip trajectory through time, as shown in Figure 7.

zh: 如果我们从条带左下方一次扰动 (比如打击)开始，新情况的特征是有机体的重组和短期的外貌或向外扩展——先锋期。
en: 4. If we start following a major perturbation (say a shock) at the bottom left of the strip, the new situation is characterized by reorganization and the transient appearance or expansion of organisms – the pioneer stage.

zh: 道德审查对于有关人类或非人类的研究而言都是必需的。研究者在研究主题中需陈述研究的目的、目标或提出的假设，研究的方法论和方法，控制和维护数据集的程序以及保密或匿名事件。
en: Ethical clearance for research involving human and non-human participants/subjects usually involves researchers in stating the research aims and objectives or hypotheses, the methodology and methods of the research, protocols foradministering and maintaining data sets and confidentiality or anonymityissues.

zh: 还需说明获得准许的方式（口头的或书面的）及与研究相关的互惠性。
en: The type of consent (informed or written), and aspects of reciprocityassociated with the research, may also be required.

zh: 一些道德审核小组还要求在此部分附有问卷或访谈时间计划表，口头准许原文和书面准许表。
en: Some ethical panels desirethe inclusion of questionnaire or interview schedules, informed consent textsand written consent sheets.

zh: 最好在提交研究计划时就开始申请道德审査，这样就可及时获得审批了。
en: It is best to apply for ethical clearance when theresearch proposal is submitted, so that the processing of the clearance is timely.

zh: 不是所有的城市地标都是房屋建筑形式。
