en: Positivists believe that the world can be understood ‘objectively’.

zh: 另一方面，后实证主义认为永远也不可能全面地了解世界，我们对事物的理解总是片面的。
我们建立正义行动——在其中，“剥夺者被剥夺了”——犹豫不决，就是因为暴力因素会永远留下其痕迹(直到被下一步的暴力行动所消除)。
en: We shrink from any founding act of justice in which "the expropriators are expropriated" precisely because it is a moment of violence that will forever leave its trace (until expunged by some further act of violence).

zh: 我们拒绝制度化的法律专制，因为它形成一个顽固的“永恒性”，阻止社会变革的流动性。
en: We refuse the institutionalized arbitrariness of law because it forms as a recalcitrant "permanence" in the face of the fluidity of social change.

zh: 而且，我们把物还原为流，拒绝思考那些“永恒性”的结构——它们可以给社会存在以秩序并给社会生成以方向。
en: And, reducing everything to flows, we refuse to contemplate the construction of those "permanences" that can give order to social being and direction to social becoming.

zh: 定量研究方法包括：问卷调查法、结构化访谈法、历时研究法、案例研究法、文献档案法、模型法、观察法、准试验法和影响评估法等。
en: Quantitative methods include questionnaires and structured interviews, longitudinal studies, case studies, the documentary method, modelling, observation, the quasi-experimental method and impact assessment methods.

zh: 定量分析包括：包含集中趋势量数的描述性统计、相关性测量和推断性统计。
en: Analysis involves descriptive statistics including measures of central tendency, measures of association and inferential statistics.

zh: 计算机为研究的设计和分析提供了附加工具和一些用于定量分析的软件包，例如Methodologist’s Toolchest、SphinxSurvey、SPSS、Minitab、SAS和winMAX 等。
en: Computer s provide an additional tool in research designing and analysis, and some quantitatively based software packages include Methodologist's Toolchest , SphinxSurvey, SPSS , Minitab, SAS and winMAX .

zh: 时间和空间构成宇宙的基本物理维度。
en: Time and space form the basic physical dimensions of the universe.

zh: 这样，我们用时间量度变化，包括社会变化。
en: As such, time is used to measure change, including societal change.

zh: 社会时间表示含有内容的时间：变化过程中的人文现象。
en: Social time indicates time with content: human phenomena in the process of change.

zh: 社会时间与社会空间作为“时空”而永恒地联系在一起。
en: Social time is invariably linked to social space as ‘time-space’.

zh: 沃勒斯坦提出的世界系统分析为人文地理学中对时间与空间关系提供了一种可供选择的唯物主义解释。
en: World-systems analysis as developed by Wallerstein offers an alternative materialist interpretation of the relations between time and space in human geography.

zh: 为了强调这两个概念的永久性，他杜撰了“时空” —词来形容其特殊的综合。
en: To emphasize the indissolubility of the two concepts he coins the word TimeSpace to describe his particular integration.

zh: 从布劳德尔界定3类社会时间——短期、中期和长期——开始，沃勒斯坦通过把空间尺度添加到每个时间跨度上增加一个地理成分。
en: Starting with Braudel’s identification of three categories of social time – the short term, the medium term, and the long term – Wallerstein adds a geographical component by attaching a spatial scale to each temporal span.

zh: 环境话语和社会正义原则之间的对比暗示着它们之间的天然联系。
en: A comparison of environmental discourses and principles of social justice, suggests a crude set of pairings.

zh: 功利主义的正义理论与标准观点有着强大的联系。
en: Utilitarian theories of justice are strongly associated with the standard view.

zh: 在发达资本主义社会中，很明显并存着这两种话语，这成为调整制度行为、政治行动和物质实践方面最流行和最霸权的思考方式。
en: The intermingling of both these discourses in the advanced capitalist societies is fairly evident making this by far the most prevalent and hegemonic mode of thinking for regulating institutional behaviors, political action, and material practices.

zh: 社会主义事业必须包容并寻求从那种冷漠的商品化同质性中解放出来。
en: The socialist cause must encompass and seek emancipation from that bland commodified homogeneity.

zh: 这不是主张一种无拘无束的相对主义或者不受限制的后现代折衷主义，而是主张对共性/差异、一个人的特殊性和其他人的普遍性之间关系进行严肃讨论。
en: This is not a plea for an unchecked relativism or unconstrained postmodem eclecticism, but for a serious discussion of the relations between commonality/difference, the particularity of the one and the universalism of the other.

zh: 必须把社会主义理解成一种政治规划、一种有关社会如何运行的替代性视野、一种有关社会生态关系如何展开的别样洞见、一种有关人类潜能如何实现(尽管是在差异地理学之中)的标新立异想象。
en: Socialism has to be understood as a political project, as an alternative vision of how society will work, how socio-ecological relations will unfold, how human potentialities can be realized albeit within a geography of difference.

zh: 反机构化最极端的结果发生在加利福尼亚州。
en: The most extreme consequences of deinstitutionalization are to be found in California.

zh: 该州精神病院的迅速关闭导致服务依赖型集聚区（service-dependent ghettos)的出现也被称为无墙庇护所 (asylum-without-walls)。
en: The rapid closure of psychiatric hospitals in the state led to the creation of service-dependent ghettoes.

zh: 从前的隐性精神病人被限制在环境恶劣的邻里中，而规划立法则将基于社区的设施规划在更加富裕的地区。
en: Former in-patients have become restricted to poorer-quality neighbourhoods as zoning legislation has kept community-based facilities outside more affluent areas.

zh: 为了获得利益，基于社区的服务业已经得到了发展，但是其中一些服务业相对规模较大，拥有一百多名从业者，并且已经开始具有一些老的精神病院的机构特征。
en: For-profit community-based services have been developed but some of these are now relatively large with over a hundred occupants and are beginning to reproduce some of the institutional features of the older mental hospitals.

zh: 深度访谈采取半结构化的形式，辅以有关巡游和游艇的财产调查、旅游活动和预算等内容的调查问卷。
en: The in-depth interviews were semi-structured in nature and were supplemented by questionnaires relating to cruising and yacht inventories, tourism activities and budgetary items.

zh: 这些方法是对参与观察阶段的补充。
en: These methods were complemented with periods of participant observation.

zh: 1986-1992年间，研究人员是“完全的参与者”（Junker 1960；and Gans 1982），成为‘其中一员(Adler &：Adler 1983)。
en: During 1986 to 1992, the researcher was a 'complete'/'total participant' (Junker 1960; and Gans 1982) having 'complete membership' (Adler & Adler 1983).

zh: 因此，植物群落或生境以及生态系统的划分与随后的制图充满困难。
en: The process of defining and then mapping plant communities or habitats and hence ecosystems is thus fraught with difficulty.

zh: 能够具体表现的细节水平常常很低，植被类型降低为概括化的生境，生境之间界线的划分常常是武断的。
en: Often the level of detail that can be incorporated is low, and vegetation categories are reduced to generalized habitats and definition of boundaries between habitats is often arbitrary.

zh: 1980年代和1990年代英国所进行的植物群落制图工作中第一阶段的生境制图计划提供了一个出色的例子。
en: The phase 1 habitat mapping programme for the mapping of plant communities in Britain during the 1980s and 1990s provides an excellent example.

zh: 因此，植物群落或生境以及生态系统的划分与随后的制图充满困难。
en: The process of defining and then mapping plant communities or habitats and hence ecosystems is thus fraught with difficulty.

zh: 能够具体表现的细节水平常常很低，植被类型降低为概括化的生境，生境之间界线的划分常常是武断的。
en: Often the level of detail that can be incorporated is low, and vegetation categories are reduced to generalized habitats and definition of boundaries between habitats is often arbitrary.

zh: 1980年代和1990年代英国所进行的植物群落制图工作中第一阶段的生境制图计划提供了一个出色的例子。
en: The phase 1 habitat mapping programme for the mapping of plant communities in Britain during the 1980s and 1990s provides an excellent example.

zh: 概括化水平常常是如此之高，以致所制成的成果图相对地没有什么价值，出于各种实际理由，许多此类图件的精度因而受到质疑（Cherrill and McClean, 1999）。
en: The level of generalization was often so high as to render the final maps as of comparatively little value, and for various practical reasons, the accuracy of many of the maps has subsequently been questioned (Cherrill and McClean, 1999).

zh: 让我们来研究一下沃尔夫—萨皮尔假说。

en: Consider, for example, the implications of accepting what is known as the Whorf-Sapir hypothesis.

zh: 这个假说源自对土著美洲人文化的人类学研究，它认为，在对“同一种”现实进行感知、理解和行动时，本土美洲人与欧洲人完全不同。
en: This view arose out of anthropological studies of native-American cultures and the realization that there was a radical difference in how native-Americans and Europeans perceived, understood, and acted towards the "same" reality.

zh: 例如，从本土美洲人的观点看，空间和时间具有相当不同且不可同化的意义（这种观点在下文讨论中将被采纳）。
en: Space and time, for example, had quite different and unassimilable meanings from the standpoint of native-Americans (this point will be taken up later).

zh: 实验绝不是纯经验主义的，它取决于理论的深度与谨慎的逻辑。
en: Experimentation is never pure empiricism; it relies on theoretical depth and careful logic.

zh: 但其反面也是正确的; 理论也需要对照经验证据来评价，以展示其可供世人借鉴的价值。
en: But the converse is also true; theory requires evaluation against empirical evidence, to demonstrate its value as a mirror held up to the world.

zh: 从这些关于野外科学实验设计的书籍中吸取教训是一种极其艰巨的过程，在地理学某些领域中，应用必要的精密性的传统已被摈弃。
en: The lessons learnt from books on experimental design in the field sciences are that such empirical evaluation is an extremely arduous process, and in some areas of geography, the tradition of applying the necessary rigour has been abandoned.

zh: 反对统治团结和合并团结的理论和实践斗争，不仅摧毁了父权制、殖民主义、人道主义、实证主义、本质主义、科学主义以及其他无人惋惜的各种主义的正当性，而且全都要求有机的或自然的立场。
en: The theoretical and practical struggle against unity-through-domination or unity-through-incorporation ironically not only undermines the justifications for patriarchy, colonialism, humanism, positivism, essentialism, scientism, and other unlamented -isms, but all claims for an organic or natural standpoint.

zh: 我认为，激进的和社会主义/马克思主义的女权主义者也破坏了他们的/我们自己的认识论战略，而这是想象各种可能团结的重要步骤。
en: I think that our radical and socialist/Marxist feminisms have also undermined their/our own epistemological strategies, and this is a crucially valuable step in imagining possible unities.

zh: 如第六章提到的，历时研究可以分为小样本多次调查、时间序列研究、趋势研究、世代分析以及案例研究。
en: As noted in chapter 6, longitudinal studies can be described as panel studies, time series studies, trend studies and cohort analysis studies, as well as case studies.

zh: 历时研究方法也可以由这些类型混合而成。
en: Longitudinal studies may also constitute a mix of these types.

zh: 每种类型都由定量方法论指导（或一种定性方法论，参见第六章）。
en: Each type can be informed by a quantitative methodology (or a qualitative methodology, see chapter 6).

zh: 郊区的兴起是十足由美国领导的社会转变过程，代表了一种有时被称为美国霸权周期的元素。
en: The rise of the suburb was very much a US-led process of social change and represents an element of what is sometimes called the American hegemonic cycle.

zh: 这是沃勒斯坦主义周期性意识形态时空概念的一部分。
en: This is part of a Wallersteinian cyclical-ideological TimeSpace.

zh: 在世界系统分析中，现代世界已经通过3个霸权周期而发展，每个周期都是以世界性霸权国家经济上的成功为基础的。
en: In world-systems analysis, the modern world-system has developed through three hegemonic cycles, each based upon the economic successes of a world hegemonic state.

zh: 我在此所概述的各种立场绝不是相互排斥的，人们可以发现各种思想路线之间的相互征用。
en: The positions I have here outlined are by no means mutually exclusive and all kinds of cooptations from one line of thought to another can be observed.

zh: 世界银行对“可持续性”的关注（既在生态上又在金融上）收编了生态女权主义的观点，从而使妇女处于发展计划的最前沿。
en: The World Bank's concern with "sustainability" (both ecological and financial) has led to a cooptation of ecofeminist arguments to place women in the forefront of development projects.

zh: 同样，非中心化的绿色政治试图从高度中心化的全球环境管理科学中征用调查结果，甚至人员。
en: Decentralized green politics likewise seeks to coopt some of the findings if not some of the personnel from within a highly centralized science of global environmental management.

zh: 在这次讲座的前面部分，我们讨论了大推进模型，这个例子已经证明反映超发展理论精髓的模型并不需要非常复杂。
en: The example of the Big Push model discussed earlier in this lecture shows that models in the spirit of high development theory need not be very complicated.

zh: 但无论怎样它们必须处理市场结构的问题。
en: They must, however, deal somehow with the problem of market structure.

zh: 这实质上意味着我们需要做出一些特殊的假设，来利用产业组织理论家在20世纪70年代思考类似问题时开发出来的许多工具。
en: This essentially means making some peculiar assumptions that allow one to exploit the bag of tricks that industrial organization theorists developed for thinking about such issues in the 1970s.

zh: 如果我们从条带左下方一次扰动(比如打击)开始，新情况的特征是有机体的重组和短期的外貌或向外扩展—先锋期（或生态学上的γ相）。
en: If we start following a major perturbation (say a shock) at the bottom left of the strip, the new situation is characterized by reorganization and the transient appearance or expansion of organisms –the pioneer stage (or r-phase in ecology).

zh: 进而走向相对稳定K相的稳固合并，其特征是平衡状态下的保守行为（见Obando,2002)。
en: This leads to steady consolidation leading towards the relatively stable k-phase, which is characterized by conservative behaviour at equilibrium (again, see Obando, 2002).

zh: 系统的联通性增加直至系统崩溃为止，这也许是某些微小变化导致超越内部阈限而造成的。
en: The system’s connectedness increases until the system collapses, perhaps as a result of some small change leading to the crossing of an internal threshold.

zh: 接着走向作者们称之为释放的阶段并最后走向重组，重新开始适应性循环。
en: This, in turn, leads to what the authors call the release, and eventually to a reorganization that starts the adaptive cycle again.

zh: 思维导图以形象的方式展示了研究人员的思考和反馈过程。
en: Mind maps display the thinking and reflections of researchers in a visual pattern.

zh: 思维导图将思维联系起来并确定了数据间的关系。
en: Mind maps connect thoughts and identify relationships between data.

zh: 思维导图也被称为语义网状图。
en: Mind maps may be referred to as semantic webs.

zh: 语义网状图是由与相互联系的数据相关的术语所构成的，用以表示数据分析、关系或概念性思考的网状结构。
en: Semantic webs are associated with terms relevant to the data that are linked together to form a web-like construction of data analysis, relationships or conceptual thinking.

zh: 数据编码包括编码的形成、数据输入及数据整理。
en: Coding data involves the development of codes, data entry and datacleaning.

zh: 数据输入可使用转换表、页缘编码、直接数据输入、扫描仪、电子数据表以及人工记录单。
en: Data entry can be undertaken using transfer sheets, edge-coding, direct data entry, scanners, spreadsheets and manual tally sheets.

zh: 数据的整理是与编码式整理和逻辑整理相关联的。
en: Datacleaning is associated with code cleaning and contingency cleaning.

zh: 如果调査问卷设计得能够直接进行数据输入，那么数据输入就能够被迅速处理。
en: Data entry can be expedited if the questionnaire is designed to enable direct data entry.

zh: 在这种情况下，编码人员没有必要将数据输入到编码卡、转换表或者是编码表上——数据将直接从调査问卷答案纸上输入到指定的计算机程序中进入分析阶段。
en: In this case, there is no need for coders to transfer data onto code cards, transfer sheets or code sheets — the data are entered directly from the questionnaire response sheet into the computer program assigned for the analysis phase.

zh: 参考图9-2关于这方面的一个例子。正如读者所见，这些答案由调査者或调査助手预先编码，这样会使编码或输入变得更容易。
en: Refer back to figure 9.2 for an example of this — as you can see, the responses are pre-coded to facilitate coding and entry by the researcher or research assistant.

zh: 区域地理学最大的缺点就是把这些所谓的综合工作留给读者去完成。
en: The greatest limitation of regional geography was that the so-called integration was left to the reader to accomplish.

zh: 因此要寻找描述地方动态或过程和反映地方运行方式的一些参数。
en: Hence parameters were sought which described the dynamics or process of place and which reflected the way in which place functioned.

zh: 随着水文学的出现，用水沙传输的输出参数反映上游集水区综合特征的方式就是一个很好的例子。
en: With the advent of hydrology, this was exemplified by the way in which output parameters of water and sediment delivery reflected the integrated characteristics of the catchment areas upstream.

zh: 思维导图以形象的方式展示了研究人员的思考和反馈过程。
en: Mind maps display the thinking and reflections of researchers in a visual pattern.

zh: 思维导图将思维联系起来并确定了数据间的关系。
en: Mind maps connect thoughts and identify relationships between data.

zh: 思维导图也被称为语义网状图。
en: Mind maps may be referred to as semantic webs.

zh: 语义网状图是由与相互联系的数据相关的术语所构成的，用以表示数据分析、关系或概念性思考的网状结构。
en: Semantic webs are associated with terms relevant to the data that are linked together to form a web-like construction of data analysis, relationships or conceptual thinking.

zh: 我们必须根据辩论或辩论者的情境或位置批判性地评价全部有关社会行动的主张(或者社会正义的观念)。
en: All propositions for social action (or conceptions of social justice) must be critically evaluated in terms of the situatedness or positionality of the argument and the arguer.

zh: 但同样重要的是承认，发展这种情境化知识的个人本身并不是均质的实体，而是大量异质的冲动，有许多来源于自身之中“多重他性”的内在化。
en: But it is equally important to recognize that the individuals developing such situated knowledge are not themselves homogeneous entities but bundles of heterogeneous impulses, many of which derive from an internalization of "multiple othernesses" within the self.

zh: 这种主体观念使情境性(他们的位置)本身成为异质的和有差异的，高度依赖在相当不同的时空规模上运行的社会过程。
en: Such a conception of the subject, renders situatedness (their place) itself heterogeneous and differentiated, highly dependent upon social processes operating at quite different spatio-temporal scales.

zh: 最后，它是不同规模上的情境性(位置)的社会构造，而且在那种社会构造中，不管个人如何深地嵌在资本积累的宏观过程中，个人政治选择、承诺和忠诚还是极大地发挥作用。
en: In the last instance, it is the social construction of situatedness (places) at different scales which matters and in that social construction the agency of personal political choice and commitment, of loyalties, brooks large, however embedded individuals may be in macro-processes of capital accumulation on the world stage.

zh: 然而，少数群体向低层次职业结构的集中正是他们廉价住房地区化的最根本原因。
en: But it is the concentration of minority groups at the lower end of the occupational structure that is the more fundamental factor in their localization in poor housing.

zh: 由于少数群体成员缺乏技能和受教育的资格，他们通常会集中在难以吸引特权群体成员的职业中，这类职业从某些方面来看常常是不舒适的，或者不体面的，并且工资很低。
en: Because of their lack of skills and educational qualifications, members of minority groups often tend to be concentrated in occupations that are unattractive to members of the charter group, that are often unpleasant or degrading in one way or another, and that are usually associated with low wages.

zh: 大多数这种类型的职业处于CBD及其周围地区，而少数群体对集中的就业机会的依赖性被认为是决定他们居住集群区位的主要因素。
en: The majority of such occupations are associated with the CBD and its immediate surrounds, and the dependence of minority groups on city centre and inner-city job opportunities is widely cited as a prime determinant in the location of minority residential clusters.

zh: 反过来，这一因素又由于围绕CBD的内城邻里的廉价住房区位而得到强化。
en: This factor, in turn, is reinforced by the location of inexpensive accommodation in inner-city neighbourhoods surrounding the CBD.

zh: 绝对不能回避普遍性，那些试图这样做(如许多后现代和后结构主义表述中的情况)的人最终只能是掩盖而不是消灭这一条件。
en: The universality can never be avoided, and those who seek to do so (as is the case in many postmodern and poststructuralist formulations) only end up hiding rather than eliminating the condition.

zh: 但是，普遍性必须以它与特殊性的辩证关系来解释。
en: But universality must be construed in dialectical relation with particularity.

zh: 它们互相定义，从而使普遍性标准总是易于通过差异的特殊性进行协商。
en: Each defines the other in such a way as to make the universality criterion always open to negotiation through the particularities of difference.

zh: 因此，这两种土地使用形式都会对人群的流通做出贡献。
en: Both kinds of land thus contribute to,  circulation.

zh: 但是，在它们之间总会存在着某些紧张的关系。
en: But there is always a certain tension in their relationship.

zh: 在特殊用地形式的两个角色之间总是存在着一种通过相互牵制产生平衡的关系:一方面是土地的普通使用的促进者，另一方面是这种用途的干涉者。
en: There is always a pull and a counterpull between the special land's two roles: as a contributor to the use of general land on the one hand, and an interference with its use on the other.

zh: 有些交界处不允许两边的交叉使用。
en: Some borders halt cross-use from both sides.

zh: 非封闭的铁轨或高速公路就是最好的例子。
en: Open railroad tracks or expressways or water barriers are common examples.

zh: 有些交界处的使用率低，那是因为这个地方的单一用途的土地使用密度相对于其拥有的区域来说太低。
en: Some borders have cross-use from both directions, but it is limited, in appreciable amounts, to daylight or it falls off drastically at cernin times of year.

zh: 面积广阔的市政中心就是一个好例子。
en: Large parks are common examples.

zh: 对我们物种潜能的探究当然也涉及创造性研究和探究多样性和异质性。
en: The exploration of our species potentiality can presumably also be about the creative search for and exploration of diversity and heterogeneity.

zh: 那些与我们处理异化(和返魅)以及探寻自我实现多种可能性努力步调一致的，在根本上是社会主义未来的一部分。
en: Socio-ecological projects, much more in tune with confronting questions of alienation (and re-enchantment) and opening up diverse possibilities for self-realization, can be regarded as fundamentally part of some socialist future.

zh: 除了冷漠的、商品化的同质性的不平衡地理发展，资本主义不能生产更多的东西，这确实是它的最令人震惊的无能。
en: The failures of capitalism to produce anything other than the uneven geographical development of bland, commoditized, homogeneity is, surely, one of the most striking features of its failures.

zh: 关于无障碍空间的新思维牵涉到把世界重新描述为流与连续改革的困难任务。
en: New thinking about unblocking space involves the difficult task of redescribing the world as flow and continuous transformation.

zh: 当图像传播包括大量中间体的时候，关于图像空间的新思维要重新思考图像是如何传播与保持稳定。
en: New thinking about image space involves reconsidering how images are circulated and kept stable when that circulation involves large numbers of intermediaries.

zh: 关于地方空间的新思维要尝试理解日常生活韵律的间隙，通过这些间隙新的表演得以进行。
en: And new thinking about place space involves trying to understand the gaps in the rhythms of everyday life through which new performances are able to pass.

zh: 正如我们将要看到的，这些不同的位置性在环境正义运动的内部围绕着阶级、种族、性别和民族身份等问题制造了解释的张力。
en: Such different positionalities create, as we shall see, interpretive tensions within the environmental justice movement across the themes of class, race, gender, and national identity.

zh: 例如，许多证据表明：即使对社会地位和阶级问题进行控制，有色人种也还是更容易遭受环境危险。布拉德(Bullard，1993:21)概括了这些证据并得出结论：不公正从根本上来说是一个种族问题而不是阶级问题。
en: Bullard (1993: 21) summarizes evidence to show, for example, that people of color are much more vulnerable to environmental hazards even when controlling for social status and class and concludes that the injustice is fundamentally a race and not a class problem.

zh: 因此，文化研究的一个重要主题是多样性和差异性。
en: A key theme of cultural studies, then, is diversity and difference.

zh: 在社会主流价值中还有许多具有自己鲜明文化的小支流，它们被称为亚文化（subculture)(如果这个标准偏离主流文化很远，有时也被命名为“非正常”亚文化（‘deviant’ subcultures)。
en: There are, within the dominant values of a society, many smaller subgroups with their own distinctive cultures, known as subcultures (and sometimes termed ‘deviant’ subcultures if the norms are significantly at variance with the majority).

zh: 变种（atterity)这个术语有时被用来描述那些与它们所对立的文化完全不同的，并且在那些对立文化之外的文化。
en: The term alterity is sometimes used to denote a culture that is radically different from and totally outside that to which it is opposed.

zh: 社会中的文化价值差异性产生了身份（identity)问题（即人们对自己的看法）。
en: The diversity of cultural values in society raises issues of identity (i.e.the view that people take of themselves).

zh: 有一个可以追溯到哲学家笛卡尔的观点假设，人的身份是单一的、合理的和稳定的。
en: There is a perspective, stretching back to the philosopher Descartes, that assumes that people’s identities are single, rational and stable.

zh: 然而，这种假设遭到文化研究观点的反驳。
en: However, this assumption is disputed by a cultural studies perspective.

zh: 首先，它们认为我们的身份是多因素的，包括阶级、年龄、职业、社会性别、生理性别、国籍、宗教派别、出生地等等。
en: To begin with, it is argued that our identities are shaped by many factors such as class, age, occupation, gender, sexuality, nationality, religious affiliation, region of origin and so on.

zh: 围绕这些因素会有各种各样的关于性格和能力的话语，这些话语被称为主体地位（subject positions)，它影响我们的行为方式。
en: Surrounding these factors are various discourses about characteristics and abilities --- what are called subject positions --- that affect the way we behave.

zh: 第四个佩恩广场已经缩成一个小小的交通岛，位于富兰克林大道上的洛根圆形广场，一个按照城市美化运动规划的样板。
en: The forth of Penn's squares has been whittled to a small traffic island, Logan Circle, in Benjamin Franklin Boulevard, an example of City Beautiful planning.

zh: 广场上矗立着一个巨大的喷泉，点缀着漂亮的植物。
en: The circle is adorned with a great soaring fountain and beautifully maintained planting.

zh: 尽管要步行到那里面并不容易，而且对那些匆匆路过的人来说，这不过是高雅的装饰物而已，但在天气晴好的时候，此地还是能招引来三三两两的人。
en: Although it is discouraging to reach on foot,and is mainly  an elegant amenity for those speeding by, it gets a trickle of population on fine days.

zh: 紧邻这个纪念碑似的文化中心(cultural center )的地区曾衰败得不成样子，被当做贫民区拆迁，并被改建为如今这样的辐射性城区。
en: The district immediately adjoining the monumental cultural center  of which it is a part decayed terribly and has already been slum-cleared and converted to Radiant City.

zh: 但是，由于种种原因，要了解所谓的文化转向却又困难重重。
en: Understanding the so-called ‘cultural turn’ poses a number of difficulties, however, for a number of reasons.

zh: 首先，大量解释新概念的新名词如同洪流一般多得几乎让人迷惑。而且，这些概念具有高度的相关性，构成了观察社会的新方法。
en: There has been a bewildering flood of new terms to describe a large set of new concepts that are all highly interrelated and build up to form radically new ways of looking at society.

zh: 因此，如果单独拿出少数几个“文化”概念，很容易就忽视了这些概念的广泛意义。
en: Taking a few ‘cultural’ concepts in isolation therefore tends to neglect their wider significance.

zh: 被此论题吸引的人们为了得到启发而去查阅(过去的和现在的)文献。
en: Those attracted to this cause explored the literature (past and present) for inspiration.

zh: 他们发现在空间组织的一般概念上,这就是人类活动在空间上有序的安排。
en: They found it in the general concept of spatial organization, the spatially ordered arrangement of human activities.

zh: 其中最令人鼓舞的是德国地理学家沃尔特‧克里斯坦勒(Walter Christaller, 1966) 的工作,他在1930年代初期为了理解聚落的模式发展了中心地理论。
就像案例研究一样，行动研究报告可以以科学实验报告的结构为模型（引言、 文献综述、方法、结果分析及未来研究计划），也可选择其他不同的模型。
en: As with case studies, the report may be based on the scientific experimental model (introduction, literature review, method, findings and analysis, and future action plans), but there are alternative models.

zh: 这些模型基于凯米斯和迈克塔哥特（1988）对行动研究的讨论。
en: These models are based on the discussion of action research by Kemmis and McTaggart (1988).

zh: 另一种模型是按行动研究程序的时间顺序进行报道。
en: One alternative model involves the chronological reporting of the action research process.

zh: 原始资料或二手资料的使用取决于研究项目本身、使用的范式和一些外部因素诸如时间金钱等的限制。
en: The use of primary or secondary data depends on the research project, the overlying paradigm and any external factors such as time and monetary constraints.

zh: 对于旅游研究者来说，资料来源是很广泛的，原始资料可以通过观察法、访谈法、专家小组或问卷调查法等方式收集。
en: For tourism researchers, data sources are extensive.Primary data may be gathered by using observation, interviews, panel groups or questionnaires.

zh: 二手资料可以通过由私人、公共和非营利部门提供的文化文件和文物来收集。
en: Secondary data may be gathered from cultural documents and artefacts accessible in the private, public and non-profit sectors.

zh: 为了决定每个层次的起始呼叫号码，我们可以使用抽签、随机数表或电脑产生的办法。
en: To determine our starting number in each prefix or strata, we can use the lottery system, a table of random numbers or computer generation.

zh: 接着我们需要决定我们的抽样间隔（参见上文的系统抽样）。
en: Then we need to determine our sampling fraction (see systematic sampling above).

zh: 一旦抽样间隔和起始号码确定了，每个随后的号码的选取都依据前一个号码和抽样间隔得到。
en: Once the sampling fraction and starting number have been determined, each subsequent number that is selected is based on the corresponding previous number as a result of using the sampling fraction.

zh: 维尔（1992, p. 114)认为现场调查是在旅游研究中最常使用的调査方法。它既可以由受访者完成，也可以由调査者完成。
en: Veal (1992, p. 114) suggests that on-site surveys are the most used form of survey in tourism.On-site surveys may be either self-completed orinterviewer-completed.

zh: 其优缺点是以上讨论的自填式问卷调査和调査者完成问卷调査优劣的映照。
en: The advantages and disadvantages of on-site surveysreflect the advantages and disadvantages discussed above for selfcompletion questionnaires and interviewer-completed questionnaires.

zh: 但是在这两例中，地理学与文学研究——有时似乎在“真实性”与“想象”之间求得平衡——在很大程度上停留在彼此分离上。
en: But in both these examples, geography and literary studies – sometimes seeming to parallel ‘reality’ and ‘imagination’ – remained largely separate from each other.

zh: 虽然文学(尤其是小说)为地理分析提供了新的来源，但是分析本身常常仍然是社会科学的，未把注意力放在文学理论与文学批评上。
en: While literature (particularly novels) provided a new source for geographical analysis, the analysis itself often remained social scientific and paid little attention to literary theory and criticism.

zh: 地理学家不去研究文学的形式、惯例和语言，而是经常认为“文学就是感知”。
en: Rather than study literary forms, conventions and language, humanistic geographers often regarded ‘literature simply [as] perception’ .

zh: 其次，每一种语言游戏都与说话者特殊的社会的、交流的、经验的和感性的世界相关联。
en: Secondly, each language game attaches to the particular social, communicative, experiential, and perceptual world of the speaker.

zh: 结果使我们理解了有关文化、语言或话语的相对主义，尽管这种理解是基于主体的物质环境的。
en: The upshot is to bring us to a point of cultural, linguistic or discourse relativism, albeit based upon the material circumstances of the subject.

zh: 因此，我们也应该仔细地关注这些物质环境。
en: We should also, then, pay careful attention to those material circumstances.

zh: 社会是普遍性的，同时它也具体而有活力。
en: Society is the universal which, at the same time, is concretely alive.

zh: 由之产生了独特的意义，交换即是作为事物相对性的经济—历史的实现，是为社会而进行的，交换以其独特性为个体造就了特殊的对象及其意义，它的独特性并不在于抽象领域，而在于生动的相互作用领域，这就是经济价值的实质。
en: From this arises the unique significance that exchange, as an economic-historical realization of the relativity of things, has for society; exchange raises the specific object and its significance for the individual above its singularity, not into the sphere of abstraction, but into that of lively interaction which is the substance of economic value.

zh: 相关性测量将二元关系的信息用一个单独数字表示。
en: Measures of association reduce informadon about a bivariate reladonship into a single numerical representation.

zh: 相关性测量是指通过统计计算来判断两个变量之间是否存在关系。
en: Measures of association indicate whether there is or is not a relationship between the variables through the use of statistical calculations.

zh: 存在许多此类量数，例如，λ，γ，Τ， ρ以及卡方。
en: There are a number of measures such as lambda, gamma, tau, rho and chi-square.

zh: 表9-5对每个量数都进行了概述。
en: An overview of each is presented in table 9.5.

zh: 老实告诉你，我们雇用伯伦不为别的，就是因为他有影响。我们要等上几个月才能见到那些局长们——比如，卫生、消防((fire department))和警察部门——但是他要做的只是拿起电话，立马我们这边就会见效。”
en: "It would be fantastic to tell you we hired Baron for any other reason than his influence. We would wait months for meetings with Commissioners---like the Health, Fire, and Police Departments----but then he would go to the phone and immediately, we would have action."

zh: 如第六章提到的，历时研究可以分为小样本多次调查、时间序列研究、趋势研究、世代分析以及案例研究。
en: As noted in chapter 6, longitudinal studies can be described as panelstudies, time series studies, trend studies and cohort analysis studies, as wellas case studies.

zh: 历时研究方法也可以选用几种方法混合而成。
en: Longitudinal studies may also constitute a mix of thesetypes.

zh: 每种方法都由定量方法论指导（或一种定性方法论，参见第六章）。
en: Each type can be informed by a quantitative methodology (or aqualitative methodology, see chapter 6).

zh: 审稿人、编辑或大会主席的评论会帮助你改进文章的内容；这是写作的一部分，这也将有助于文章的修改。
en: The comments of the reviewers and the editors/chairs are there to help you to improve your text; they are part of the writing process and assistyou in your revision of your text.

zh: 他们的评论将确保你的文章所表达的意思对预期读者来说是清晰的。
en: Their comments are provided to ensure that your meaning is clear for the intended audience.

zh: 如果你对评论有异议，可以与编辑或主席进行讨论。
en: If you disagree with some points from reviewers or editors/chairs, then discuss them with the editor or chair.

zh: 再次呈交文章时，要准备一份封面信，表明所做的修改并说明未做修改之处的原因。
en: When you resubmit your text, indicate in a covering letter which changes have been made and, if some were not made, the reasons why this is the case.

zh: 和贫民区清空指示图一样，信贷封杀标示图的预言非常准确，因为他们(信贷者)用自己的实际行动去实践了这些预言。
en: Credit-blacklisting maps, like slum-clearance maps, are accurate prophecies because they are self-fulfilling prophecies.

zh: 而在北端和“后院”这些地方，这些图标示的预言却并不能得到验证。但是如果没有这些地区本身拥有的奇迹般的逃避 “死刑”的能力，那谁又会预料到那些预言会得不到验证？
en: In the cases of the North End and the Back-of-the-Yards, the blacklist maps were inaccurate prophecies.But no one would ever know they had been inaccurate estimates of the potentiality, were it for the miraculous ability of these places to  evade their sentences.

zh: 搜索空间内寻找空置住房时利用的信息来源可能同样具有显著的空间偏向性。
en: The information sources used to find vacant dwellings within the search space can also exert a significant spatial bias.

zh: 同时，因为不同类塑的家庭倾向于依赖不同信息来源的次序和组合，这可能导致进一步的社会空间排列过程。
en: Since different types of households tend to rely on different sequences and combinations of sources, this results in a further process of sociospatial sorting.

zh: 总体而言，最常使用的空房信息来源是报纸广告、房地产代理商、亲戚朋友和对“出售”标记的个人观察，尽管其相对重要程度和有效程度可因城市而不同。虽然对这些信息来源的研究还很少，但十分明显的是，每种信息来源都存在不同方式的偏向。例如，个人观察在很大程度上取决于个人的活动空间，而从亲朋好友处获得的信息的数量和质量则在很大程度上有赖于找房者的社会地位和社会网络结构。
en: Overall, the most frequently used sources of information about housing vacancies are newspaper advertisements, real estate agents, friends and relatives, and personal observation of ‘for sale’signs --- although their relative importance and effectiveness seems to vary somewhat from one city to another. Each of these information sources tends to be biased in a different way. Personal observation, for example, will be closely determined by people’s personal activity space, while the quantity and quality of information from friends and relatives will depend a lot on social class and the structure of the searcher’s social networks.

zh: 房地产代理商作为信息中介同样具有严重的空间偏向。
en: Real estate agents also exert a considerable spatial bias in their role as mediators of information.

zh: 然而，如史密斯（1992: 72）所评论的那样，“地理规模生产理论”(我将补充一点，时间的生产亦是如此)“在总体上是不发达的”。
en: Yet, as Smith (1992: 72) remarks, "the theory of the production of geo-graphical scale" (to which I would add also the production of temporalities) – "is grossly underdeveloped."

zh: 这似乎意味着，一种嵌套的规模等级(从全球到地方)的生产总是使我们陷入一种如何“在它们之间进行仲裁和翻译”的政治态学问题之中。
en: It seems to imply the production of a nested hierarchy of scales (from global to local) leaving us always with the political–ecological question of how to "arbitrate and translate between them."

zh: 生态辩论正是在这一点上令人难以置信地混乱。
en: The ecological argument is incredibly confused on exactly this point.

zh: 一方面，盖亚星球健康关怀行动的专家们在全球层次上思考和行动，而生态区域主义者和社会无政府主义者则在地方层次上思考和行动，他们相当错误地假设，无论什么对于地方有益的东西对于大陆或全球也都是有好处的。
en: On the one hand the Gaian planetary health care specialists think globally and seek to act globally, while the bioregionalists and social anarchists want to think and act locally, presuming, quite erroneously, that whatever is good for the locality is good for the continent or the planet.

zh: 在《单子论》这本接近其生命终点的著作中，莱布尼茨提出一种建立在单子概念上的形而上学，单子把存在的一切都内在化了。
en: In the Monadology, written towards the very end of his life, Leibniz proposes a metaphysics founded on the concept of a monad that internalizes everything there is.

zh: 每一个单子都反映宇宙：“对应”法则内在地把每一单子指派成宇宙的镜子。
en: Each monad mirrors the universe: a principle of "correspondence" internally constitutes each monad as that mirror of the universe.

zh: 莱布尼茨在两个方面限定这种对应法则。
en: Leibniz restricts this correspondence principle in two respects.

zh: 网格水平轴向上的四个维度必须被看做是相互依存的。
en: The four dimensions across the horizontal axis of the grid have to be seen as mutually interdependent.

zh: 可达性和延展化是一个硬币的两面：距离摩擦在人类事物中所扮演的角色。
en: Accessibility and distanciation are two sides of the same coin: the role of the friction of distance in human affairs.

zh: 距离，正如我们在第八章所见，既是社会相互作用的障碍，又是它的保护伞。
en: Distance, as we saw in Chapter 8, is both a barrier to and a defence against social interaction.

zh: 时空延展“只是为适应社会相互作用而超越空间摩擦的程度的一种 度量而已”。
en: Distanciation‘is simply a measure of the degree to which the friction of space has been overcome to accommodate social interaction’.

zh: 空间的占用指的是个人、社会团体、活动（如土地利用）和物体（房屋、工厂、街道）对空间的占据方式。
en: The appropriation of space refers to the way in which space is occupied by individuals, social groups, activities (e.g.land uses) and objects (houses, factories, streets).

zh: 空间的统治指空间和地方组织的生产能够被权力个人或团体所控制的方式，包括通过私人财产法、规划条例、限制条约、门限（包括暗指的门限）等方法实现。
en: The domination of space refers to the way in which the organization and production of spaces and places can be controlled by powerful individuals or groups: through private property laws, zoning ordinances, restrictive covenants, gates (and implied gates), etc.

zh: 空间的生产指地域组织、土地利用、交通与通讯等（实际的或想像的)新系统的出现方式，以及其新表达方式。
en: The production of space refers to the way in which new systems of territorial organization, land use, transport and communications, etc. (actual or imagined) arise, along with new ways of representing them.

zh: 研究报告拥有许多目标读者。
en: There are a number of audiences for research reports.

zh: Ticehurst和Veal （1999）将读者分成3类：普通公众、决策者及专业人家（专家）。
en: Ticehurst and Veal (1999) identify three: the general public, decision makers and professionals (experts).

zh: 纽曼（2000)将读者分为5类：指导者、学生、学者、从业者及普通公众。
en: Neuman (2000) identifies five: instructors, students, scholars, practitioners and the general public.

zh: 无论怎样分类，在撰写研究报告时都需要事先识别目标读者，因为读者将决定报告的语气、要旨及具体的写作类型（风格或写作形式）。
en: Regardless of how you classify audiences, in reporting your research you need to be cognisant of your audience, as this will influence the tone and tenor of your writing, as well as the specific genre (type or form of writing) that will be selected.

zh: 第一章中已经介绍了研究方法在本质上的两分法：定量研究方法与定性研究方法。
en: In chapter 1 you were introduced to an essentially binary classification of research methodologies: qualitative and quantitative methodologies.

zh: 其中也提到了第三种方法:混合研究方法。
en: A third type was also suggested: the mixed method approach.

zh: 到目前为止，你应该明白定量与定性方法是定位在世界观（即本体论观点）连续统一体的对立两极。
en: By now, you should be aware that qualitative and quantitative methodologies are located at opposite ends of a continuum regarding world views, that is ontological positions.

zh: 研究计划通常包括7个部分：引言、文献综述、方法论、工作进度、经费预算、参考文献及每位研究者的履历。
en: A research proposal consists of seven sections: an introduction, a literature review, a methodology section, a time line, a budget, a reference section and the attached curriculum vitae or résumé for each researcher.

zh: 研究计划的篇幅一般在1000~2000字之间。
en: Research proposals are generally between 1000 and 2000 words in length.

zh: 有时研究者在制订研究计划时必须采用由委托方、客户或相关利益集团提供的统一格式的申请书。
en: Sometimes, proformas are provided by granting agencies, clients or stakeholder bodies for use by researchers in the preparation of research proposals.

zh: 不同受众对研究计划的编写有不同的要求。
en: Depending on the audience, different requirements will be imposed on the writing of the research proposal.

zh: 如上所述，所有的研究都应该以一种符合伦理的方式来实施。
en: As already stated, all research must be undertaken in an ethical manner.

zh: 这在应用性研究中尤为重要，因为委托人或发起人在研究设计和报告中可能存在一种偏见。
en: This is especially relevant in undertaking applied research, as the client or sponsor may angle for a bias in the research design or reporting.

zh: 研究者受到伦理标准的约束，因此这种偏见是不能接受的。
en: Researchers are bound by ethical standards and such angling is not acceptable.

zh: 研究者必须对自己、学术界、公众和发起人承担相应的伦理责任。
en: Researchers must be responsible to themselves, the scientific community, the public and the sponsors for the conduct of ethical research.

zh: 研究者能够获得两种类型的资料：原始资料和二手资料。
en: Researchers are able to access two types of data sources: primary and secondary.

zh: 原始资料是指那些为了他们研究项目的使用目的而由研究者第一手收集的资料。
en: Primary data sources are those that are collected first-hand by the researcher for use in their research project.

zh: 原始资料包括诸如问卷调査数据、访谈文本和观察数据。
en: Primary data include, for example, responses to questionnaires, interview texts and observations.

zh: 二手资料是指那些因其他人的初始使用目的而产生但后来被与初始项目不相关的另外的研究者使用的资料。
en: Secondary data sources are those that have been produced by someone else for primary usage and are then used by another researcher not connected with the first project.

zh: 二手资料包括诸如统计记录、政府文件、日记、信件以及其他研究者取得的研究成果数据。
en: Secondary data include, for example, statistical records, government documents, diaries and letters, and research data conducted by other researchers.

zh: 使用字母作为样本单位选取的组织者，就像简单随机抽签方法一样，样本单位由字母顺序决定。
en: Using the alphabet as the organiser for the selection of the sample units, as well as the simple random lottery method, the alphabetical letter is determined for sample selection.

zh: 和字母相关的参与者或研究单元成为次级抽样框。
en: Participants or study units associated with that letter become the second sampling frame.

zh: 每个样本单位是用抽签方法、随机数表（参见附录6)或电脑产生名单的方式从次级抽样框中选取的。
en: From this second sampling frame, individual sample units are selected using either the lottery method, a table of random numbers (see appendix 6) or computer-generated listings.

zh: 也可能重复使用字母顺序抽样法获得研究样本。
en: There may be several iterations of the selection of alphabetical letters.

zh: 最后，我们考虑要素流动性。
en: Finally, we turn to factor mobility.

zh: 假定农民是完全不流动的。
en: Farmers are assumed completely immobile.

zh: 工人向提供更高工资的地区流动。
en: Workers are assumed to move toward locations that offer them higher real wages.

zh: （此处我们没有尝试明确地模型化工人的流动决策。
en: (No attempt is made here to model the moving decision explicitly.)

zh: ）我们将在下一个部分看到，对于任意时点可以求解模型得到每一个地区工人的实际工资。
en: As we will see in the next section, it is possible to solve the model at any point in time for the real wages paid to workers at each location.

zh: 数据编码包括编码的形成、数据输入及数据整理。
en: Coding data involves the development of codes, data entry and data cleaning.

zh: 数据输入可使用转换表、页缘编码、直接数据输入、扫描仪、电子数据表以及人工记录单。
en: Data entry can be undertaken using transfer sheets, edge-coding, direct data entry, scanners, spreadsheets and manual tally sheets.

zh: 数据的整理是与编码式整理和逻辑整理相关联的。
en: Data cleaning is associated with code cleaning and contingency cleaning.

zh: 尽管如此，但考克斯的方法确实让我们思考，不同的社会行动主体是如何依赖于特定的空间而又谋求与其他运作于和他们自己迥异的依赖空间中的社会行动主体联合的。
en: Nevertheless, Cox’s approach does allow us to think about how different social actors may be dependent upon particular spaces yet may seek to engage with other social actors operating within their own, quite different, spaces of dependence.

zh: 通过这种途径，尺度的产生以一些不恰当的方式被概念化，其中社会行动主体建立起一些啮合空间，用以连接那些相互依赖的空间，或者它们必须与之打交道的空间。因此，对于考克斯来说，从本土性到全球性尺度的转变“不是从一个平台跳到另一个平台的运动”，而是一种形成共生体网络的过程，这种网络容许社会行动主体在不同的啮合空间进行切换。
en: For Cox, then, the production of scale is conceptualized as emerging out of the ways in which actors build spaces of engagement to link the various spaces upon which they, or those with whom they must deal, are dependent, such that moving from  the local to the global scale ‘is not a movement from one discrete arena to another’, but a process of developing networks of associations that allow actors to shift between various spaces of engagement.

zh: 多变量分析是指同时对两个以上变量的分析。
en: Multivariate analysis involves the analysis of more than two variables at the one time.

zh: 研究者保持一个变量为常量 (作为控制变量），然后，检验一个自变量和一个因变量的关系。
en: The researcher holds one variable constant (as a control) and examines an independent and a dependent variable.

zh: 研究者可通过检验来判断自变量和因变量的关系对于另一变量的不同种类是否一致。
en: The researcher tests to see if the association between the independent and dependent variable is the same for different categories in a variable.

zh: 显然，保护人类和非人类参与者的权利是研究者的首要责任。
en: Obviously, the protection of human and non-human rights is the researcher's primary responsibility.

zh: 研究不应该给参与者带来任何身体上、法律上或其他的伤害。
en: Research should not cause physical, psychological, legal or other harm.

zh: 参与者的参与应该建立在自愿和知情同意的基础上。
en: Research participation should be voluntary and based on informed consent.

zh: 匿名和保密原则应该严格遵守。
en: Anonymity and confidentiality assurances must be honoured.

zh: 欺骗和隐性研究从本质上说是不道德的，同时也需要经过专家组织的认可。
en: Deception and covert research are essentially unethical and require sanctioning by an auspicating body or ethics panel.

zh: 正如纯理论研究可以采用探索性的、描述性的和解释性的研究方法一样，应用性研究也可采用这样一些研究方法。
en: Just as pure research draws on several approaches, that is exploratory, descriptive and explanatory research, so too does applied research.

zh: 但是，应用性研究涉及了更多的研究方法：探索性的、描述性的、解释性的、因果关系的、比较性的、评价性的、预测性的 (所有这些方法都将在下面予以解释）。但这些方法并不是互相排斥的。
en: However, applied research draws on a wider range of approaches: exploratory, descriptive, explanatory, causal, comparative, evaluative and predictive (all of these terms are explained below).This does not mean to imply that each of these approaches is mutually exclusive.

zh: 应用性研究既可以是描述性的，也可以是解释性的。
en: Research may be both descriptive and explanatory.

zh: 在对社会越轨行为进行研究的各种理论中，这种做法甚为普遍，但在对违法犯罪行为的研究中可能最具说服力。
en: This is common to all branches of social deviance research, although it is probably best illustrated in relation to crime and delinquency.

zh: 关于违法犯罪行为的空间变量的大量研究都支持拥挤理论、社会无序化、社会反常状态及设计决定论等理论。但还没有系统而有效的证据显示其中某个理论居于主导地位。
en: Empirical studies of spatial variations in crime and delinquency have lent support, variously, to theories of crowding, social disorganization, anomie, design determinism and deviant subcultures; but it is difficult to assemble evidence in support of any one theory in preference to the rest.

zh: 有害垃圾运动正在这个方向上形成清晰的姿态。
en: The hazardous wastes movement is making explicit gestures in this direction.

zh: 它逐渐从更大的社会批判角度来阐述自己的环境使命;它与其他运动的联合起来，并且宣布，最终，它们全都要 加入同一个斗争中。
en: It increasingly defines its environmental mission in terms of a larger critique of society; it makes common came with other movements and says that, ultimately, they are all joined in the same struggle.

zh: 它甚至设想了这样的未来:草根环境主义率先重构一种广泛的社会正义运动。
en: It even envisions a future in which grass-roots environmentalism spearheads the reconstitution of a broad social justice movement.

zh: 其一，与莱布尼茨不一样，怀特海承认时间可以与空间不同。
en: 1. Whitehead, unlike Leibniz, allows that time can be differentiated from space.

zh: 在他的早期著作中，他认为这种差别仅发生于“抽象过程的某个高级阶段”。
en: In his earlier writings he saw this differentiation only occurring "at a somewhat developed stage of the abstractive process" (Whitehead, 1920: 37).

zh: 但是在有机论哲学的发展中，他最终把差异视为一种产物，产生于把各种成分整合成持续存在的有机形式的整个过程。
en: But in developing his philosophy of organism he later came to see the differentiation as a product of the whole process of puffing together assemblages into organic forms that persisted over duration.

zh: 各种与旅游相关的学科和分支学科都试图采用实验法和准实验法了解旅行和旅游现象。
en: Various disciplines and sub-disciplines associated with tourism use experimental and quasi-experimental methods to understand travel and tourism phenomena.

zh: 下文考察了实验法和准实验法在预测和影响评估方面的应用。
en: The following section looks at forecasting and impact assessment, both of which use experimental or quasi-experimental methods.

zh: 在预测部分，举例说明了统计和数学模型在旅游经济效应研究中的应用。
en: In the forecasting section, examples of statistical and mathematical models are noted with regard to economic aspects of tourism.

zh: 类似的，有关社会和环境影响方面的研究也可采用实验法和准实验法。
en: Social and environmental impacts can similarly be studied using experimental and quasiexperimental methods.

zh: 域分析是一个不间断的过程——在研究人员收集新数据的同时，他们必须确保分析适用于所有相关的被研究环境。
en: Domain analysis is an ongoing process — as the researcher collects new data, they have to ensure that the analysis fits all contexts of the setting being studied.

zh: 域可以被看作使用了分类学的方法。
en: Domains can also be described using taxonomies.

zh: 本章将稍后介绍分类法。
en: Taxonomies are described later in the chapter.

zh: 文艺复兴时代全球地图绘制活动严格地说就是在西方支配下的这样一种实践。
en: Renaissance mapping of the globe was exactly such an exercise in western domination.

zh: “帝国的注视”根据自己的需要、要求和欲望绘制世界，强制推行一张世界地图，从而抑制了差异。
en: The "imperial gaze" mapped the world according to its own needs, wants and desires, imposing a map of the world in such a way as to suppress difference.

zh: 如苏哈特论证的那样，结果“剥夺了属下获得知识和身份的权力”（Shohat，1991)。
en: As Shohat (1991) argues, the effect was to disposess "the subaltern of authority over knowledge and identity."

zh: 当你准备一份会议论文摘要时，要确保提供给评论者详细的叙述而不是简单地说明意图。第十章关于摘要写作的规则也适用于会议论文发言的准备。
en: When preparing an abstract for consideration as a conference paper, youneed to ensure that you provide the reviewers with details, not intentions.The 'rules' for abstract writing noted in chapter 10 also hold true for conference presentations.

zh: 例如：图11-1上的两份摘要，摘要一为评论者提供了研究的事实资料，而摘要二仅仅提供了描述性的陈述和研究意图。
en: Consider, for example, the two abstracts shown infigure 11.1. Abstract 1 provides the reviewer with data about the research,whereas abstract 2 provides one statement that is informative and then discusses intentions.

zh: 这样，评论者不太可能倾向于摘要二，因为它没有充分证明研究者工作的有效性。换言之，虽然摘要讲究简洁精练，但也要提供足够的细节。
en: A reviewer would be less inclined to accept abstract 2since there is not enough evidence of the researcher's work available.Although abstracts are short, they must provide details.

zh: 因此，在城市化过程中，似乎没有任何一个地方能够发动为系统转型提供动力的战斗特殊主义。
en: There seems then to be no place within the urbanization process from which to launch any kind of militant particularism capable of grounding the drive for systemic transformations.

zh: 特别是最近20年来，“全球化”辞令已经变得特别重要，甚至在激进思想中代替了更具政治性的帝国主义、殖民主义和新殖民主义等概念。
en: In the last 20 years in particular, the rhetoric of "globalization" has become particularly important, even replacing within segments of radical thought the more politicized concepts of imperialism, colonialism, and neo-colonialism.

zh: 这种话语转向的意识形态结果特别地剥夺了各种形式的地方、城市甚至国家的政治行动的能力。
en: The ideological effect of this discursive shift has been extraordinarily disempowering with respect to all forms of local, urban, and even national political action.

zh: 但是，她认为这种折衷主义在两方面是不合理的。
en: But, she argues, such eclecticism is unjustifiable, on two grounds.

zh: 第一，马克思主义的抽象范畴不能等同于经验概念；它们的理论含义和语义含义 不一定相同。
en: First, Marxian abstract categories cannot be equated with empirical concepts; their theoretical and vernacular meanings are not necessarily synonymous.

zh: 第二，马克思主义工作具有某种明显的政治目的，而 运用马克思主义术语意味着接受这种目的。
en: Secondly, Marxist work has an explicit political purpose, and use of Marxian terms implies an acceptance of that purpose.

zh: 内部关系问题带来的难题是解释特殊真理如何可能。
en: The difficulty which arises in respect to internal relations is to explain how any particular truth is possible.

zh: 只要存在着内部关系，万物都必定依赖他物。
en: Insofar as there are internal relations, everything must depend upon everything else.

zh: 但是如果事实如此，那么我们就不能认识任何事物，除非我们同样地知道其他的事物。
en: But if this be the case, we cannot know about anything until we equally know everything else.

zh: 因此，显而易见，我们必然需要了解一切。
en: Apparently, therefore, we are under the necessity of saying everything at once.

zh: 大众文化中的一个很好的模拟物的例子是布鲁斯•斯普林斯廷的音乐。
en: A good example of simulcra in popular culture is the music of Bruce Springsteen.

zh: 他的音乐反映了美国蓝领男性的诉求，关注体力劳动、去工业化的城市环境、高速公路上飞驰的摩托车，当然还包括对异性的渴望。
en: This music is marketed as the ‘authentic’ voice of the blue-collar American male with references to manual work, deindustrialized urban environments, riding motorcycles of freeways and, of course, an all-consuming desire for the opposite sex.

zh: 全球的唱片销售记录创造了一个美国城市男性的神话。
en: Sales of his records across the globe have thus created an American urban male mythology.

zh: 这种音乐由于缺乏“真实性”已经遭到了批评，而且正是通过这样的神话和传说人们过着自己的生活。
en: This music has been criticized for its lack of ‘authenticity’ and yet such myths and legends can influence the ways people live their lives.

zh: 萨兰塔克斯（1998)在表9-7中涉及了非参数检验和参数检验。
en: Sarantakos (1998) refers to non-parametric and parametric tests in table 9.

zh: 参数检验假定所研究的变量在总体中表现为正态分布。
en: 7. Parametric tests assume that the variable being studied reflects a normal distribution in the population.

zh: 非参数检验假定所研究的变量在总体中并不表现为正态分布。
en: Non-parametric tests assume that the variable being studied does not reflect a normal distribution in the population.

zh: 有害垃圾运动正在这个方向上形成清晰的姿态。
en: The hazardous wastes movement is making explicit gestures in this direction.

zh: 它越来越从更大的社会批判角度来阐述自己的环境使命；它与其他运动的联合起来，并且宣布，最终，它们全都要加入同一个斗争中。
en: It increasingly defines its environmental mission in terms of a larger critique of society; it makes common came with other movements and says that, ultimately, they are all joined in the same struggle.

zh: 它甚至设想了这样的未来：草根环境主义率先重构一种广泛的社会正义运动。
en: It even envisions a future in which grass-roots environmentalism spearheads the reconstitution of a broad social justice movement.

zh: 这种理想主义政治论点的问题在于，它不能理解地方和文化是如何建构、维持和瓦解的。
en: The problem with this idealist political argument, is that it fails to understand how places and cultures are constructed, sustained, and dissolved.

zh: 过程和文化实体如何在地方中相互作用，这个根本性的辩证问题被回避了。
en: The fundamental dialectical question of how processes and cultural entities relate in place is averted.

zh: 保护所谓人类文化成就制高点的文化“永恒性”，这种政治斗争发生在历史紧要关头也许是可以理解的，此时，流和过程通过时空压缩迅速转向，威胁所有已经形成的地方特性。
en: The political struggle to protect supposed cultural "permanences" as highpoints of human cultural achievement may be understandable at a historical conjuncture when flows and processes are rapidly shifting through time-space compression, threatening the achieved qualities of all places.

zh: 地方政治、草根政治、地方身份和民族政治、地区和城市政治，长久地伴随着我们。
en: The politics of place and of turf, of local identity and nation, of regions and cities, has long been with us.

zh: 它在资本主义不平衡地理发展之中也具有极大的重要性。
en: It has also been of great importance within the uneven geographical development of capitalism.

zh: 在文化大众的修辞中，以及通过这种修辞进而在政治学修辞中，重新发现作为话语对象的地方，此时重要的是它的意义而不是这样的事实，即世界已经以某种方式发生变化，从而使地方的政治经济学或者文化政治学在当前比过去更为重要。
en: The rediscovery of place as an object of discourse within the rhetoric of the cultural mass and, through that, within the rhetoric of politics is what is here significant rather than the fact that the world has changed in some way to make the political economy or cultural politics of place more important now than in the past.

zh: 个人和社会群体之间的功能关系被看做是符号，并且，当这种关系被认定处于某特定的地理区域中时，人类生态学家就可以划分出社会区，或叫自然区域（natural areas):即“由于未受规划的生态和社会过程而导致的具备某种突出的自然、经济和文化特征的地域单元”。
en: Functional relationships between different individuals and social groups were seen as symbiotic and, where such relationships could be identified as being focused within a particular geographical area, the human ecologists identified communities, or natural areas: ‘territorial units whose distinctive characteristics – physical, economic and cultural – are the result of the unplanned operation of ecological and social processes’ .

zh: 随着时间的变化，不同群体的竞争力和不同区位的相对吸引力都会发生变化，因此，这些地域也处于变化之中。
en: As the competitive power of different groups altered and the relative attractiveness of different locations changed in the course of time, these territories were seen to shift.

zh: 再次，生态学的概念被用来描述这种过程，引用了植物群落研究中的侵入（invasion) 、支配和演替（succession) 的概念。
en: Once more, ecological concepts were invoked to describe the process, this time using the ideas of invasion, dominance and succession derived from the study of plant communities.

zh: 接着考虑经济是如何发展演化的。
en: Next consider how the economy evolves.

zh: 制造业会向更理想的地点转移，离开不太理想的地点，不过，在这个过程中，会改变市场潜力状况，通常会加强那些原来就受到青睐的区位的优势。
en: Manufacturing will move toward more desirable sites and away from less desirable ones, but in so doing it will change the market potential map, typically reinforcing the advantage of already-favored locations.

zh: 因此市场潜力也成为积累循环因果关系故事中的一个组成部分。
en: Thus market potential becomes part of a story of circular and cumulative causation.

zh: 专家提出了有关来自麦凯、沙里纳、圣劳伦斯、马尔堡、耶蓬、罗克汉普顿和格拉德斯通的休闲者对肖尔沃特湾的使用情况的建议，抽样框根据专家建议按比例分层。
en: The sampling frame was proportionately stratified based on experts' opinions regarding usage of the Shoalwater Bay area by recreationalists from Mackay, Sarina, St Lawrence, Marlborough, Yeppoon, Rockhampton and Gladstone.

zh: 确定了每一地区的调查比例之后，各地依城区进一步按比例分层。
en: After the proportions were determined for each of the locations, each location was further proportionally stratified by suburbs.

zh: 样本总体容量最终确定为1200,样本中50% 的置信区间为±3% ,置信度为95% (Veal 1992, p. 155)
en: The overall sample size was set at 1200 as this would provide a 95% confidence interval for a finding of 50% of +3.0% (Veal 1992, p. 155).

zh: 原先在城市里的人不是中产阶级，只有等到他们离幵城市——在城外购置上一个大房子，在屋外草地上可以做烧烤——由此变得显贵来，似乎只有这样，他们才可以称得上是中产阶级。
en: City officials today prate about "bringing back the middle cIass," as if nobody were in the middle class until he had left the city and acquired a ranch house and a barbecue and thereby become precious.To be sure, cities are losing their middle class populations.

zh: 城市根本不需要去请什么“中产阶级回来”，而且还要像保护贵重物品一样严加保护。城市原本就会产生中产阶级。
en: However, cities need not "bring back" a middle class, and carefully protect it like an artificial growth.

zh: 正如我们将要看到的，这些不同的位置性在环境正义运动的内部围绕着阶级、种族、性别和民族身份等问题制造了解释的张力。
en: Such different positionalities create, as we shall see, interpretive tensions within the environmental justice movement across the themes of class, race, gender, and national identity.

zh: 例如，许多证据表明：即使对社会地位和阶级问题进行控制，有色人种也还是更容易遭受环境危险。布拉德(1993:21)概括了这些证据并得出结论：不公正从根本上来说是一个种族问题而不是阶级问题。
en: Bullard (1993: 21) summarizes evidence to show, for example, that people of color are much more vulnerable to environmental hazards even when controlling for social status and class and concludes that the injustice is fundamentally a race and not a class problem.

zh: 在利用电动机械流速仪测量一个方向（主流方向）时间平均流速的地方，以高频率进行测量的现代仪器还测量两个或三个正交的方向。
en: Where the electro-mechanical current meter measured a time-averaged velocity in one direction (the main flow direction), the modern instruments that measure at high frequencies also measure in two or three orthogonal directions.

zh: 这就意味着需关注速度的垂直和横流分量以及二次循环的问题。
en: This means that attention can be given to the vertical and cross-stream components of velocity, and to questions of secondary circulation.

zh: 也意味着不会因为其他两个方向的流速被合并为单个速度组分而损失测量的精密度和准确度。
en: It also means that the accuracy and precision of the measurements is not contaminated by folding into a single velocity component the velocities in the other two orthogonal directions.

zh: 下文考察了实验法和准实验法在预测和影响评估方面的应用。
en: The following section looks at forecasting and impact assessment, both of which use experimental or quasi-experimental methods.

zh: 在预测部分，举例说明了统计和数学模型在旅游经济效应研究中的应用。
en: In the forecasting section, examples of statistical and mathematical models are noted with regard to economic aspects of tourism.

zh: 类似的，有关社会和环境影响方面的研究也可采用实验法和准实验法。
en: Social and environmental impacts can similarly be studied using experimental and quasiexperimental methods.

zh: 这样的关系能用二元表格来求出——也就是说，二元表格能够使调查者采用交叉列表来表示两个变量。
en: Such relationships can be determined using bivariate tables — that is, bivariate tables enable the researcher to crosstabulate two variables.

zh: 任何测量层次的变量(定类、定序、定距和定比)都可以构造二元表格。
en: Bivariate tables can be constructed with variables measured at any level (nominal, ordinal, interval and ratio).

zh: 在制作二元表格时，自变量出现在列，因变量出现在行。
en: When preparing bivariate tables, the independent variable is presented in the columns and tire dependent variable is presented in the rows.

zh: 马尔萨斯(Malthus，1970:101)认识到“不幸”必然会在某处降临，并且认为，积极阻止饥荒、疾病和贫穷的人必然是下层阶级。
en: Malthus (1970: 82) recognizes that "misery" has to fall somewhere and main-tains that the positive checks of famine, disease, and poverty will necessarily be the lot of the lower lasses.

zh: 他们的悲惨境地是自然法的结果，这一法则“绝对不受任何人类控制”而发挥作用。
en: Their miserable condition is the result of a natural law which functions "absolutely independent of all human regulation."

zh: 因此，他们的不幸被解释成“一种非人类灵性所能影响的深层罪恶” (Malthus，1970:101)。
en: Their distress is to be interpreted as "an evil so deeply seated that no human ingenuity can reach it" (Malthus, 1970: 101).

zh: 访问者完成问卷需要访问者在现场，而自填式问卷则不需要。
en: Interviewer-completed questionnaires require the presence of an interviewer, whereas self-completion questionnaires do not.

zh: 与访问者完成问卷相比，自填式问卷的回答率较低。这是因为在问卷完成过程中缺乏面对面的交流。
en: Response rates are lower for self-completion questionnaires compared with interviewer-completed questionnaires due to lack of face-to-face interaction during questionnaire completion.

zh: 访问者完成问卷可以借助更多的视觉辅助，例如演示卡片和有形画面。因此，相对于自填式问卷每个参与者需人手一份问卷，访问者完成问卷则只需一套问卷装置供访员使用即可。
en: More visual inputs can be used with interviewer-completed questionnaires, such as show cards and visual images, as the interviewer only needs one set as opposed to multiple copies for each participant in self-completion questionnaires.

zh: 但是，一种直觉意义上的内在的自然价值也得到了广泛的传播，在某种程度上肯定了这样的观点：“自我实现”(无论是在狭义的、自我本位的或“深层”的意义上)并非外在于自我与自然的亲密关系。
en: But an intuitive sense of intrinsic natural value is also widespread, partly in recognition of the idea that "Self-Realization" (whether it be in a narrow, egotistical, or "deep" sense) is not outside of some sort of intimate relation of self to nature.

zh: 对道德价值和环境伦理学的研究创造了社群政治学，并且把环境问题完全纳人文化政治学的框架。
en: The search for moral values and an environmental ethic evokes community politics and brings the environmental issue fully within the frame of cultural politics.

zh: 它同时把环境问题纳入官僚意见以及调节的/法律的/管理的制度话语的范围。
en: It also brings it within the purview of bureaucratic opinion and the regulatory/legal/administrative discourse of institutions.

zh: 但是，价值不仅取决于“我”与“他”在时空中的关系，而且也根据社会实践和社会/权力关系而改变。
en: But value is not only conditional on the relation between the "I" and the "other" in space and time; it also changes according to social practices and social/power relations.

zh: 因此，这种透视观点依靠社会实践的连续变化，融合成一种更为普遍的时间和空间相关性观点，这些实践通过在“我”和“他”之间创造一种特殊的时空纽带，而赋予其价值。
en: The perspectival view then merges into a more general relational view of space and time by virtue of the continuous shifts of social practices that put value upon both the "I" and the "others" by creating a particular space-time nexus between them.

zh: 这与穆恩的观点(参阅本书第九章)有点相似，穆恩认为，待客和库拉贝壳交换打开了新的自我-他人关系的时间/空间，价值便通过这种时空实践而产生。
en: There is a similarity here to Munds arguments (see chapter 9) concerning the production of value through spatiotemporal practices which open a new time/space of self-other relations through hospitality and kula shell exchanges.

zh: 对自治的要求以及实现这个目标的技术性问题，大城市和小地方是不同的。
en: Both the demands on self-government and the techniques for it differ in big cities from the demands and techniques in smaller places.

zh: 比如，存在着一个陌生人的问题。把城市的街区看成是城市自治或自我管理的机构，我们必须首先要抛弃关于街区的一些正统的但没有切中要害的观念，这些观念或许适用于小城镇的社区，但不适用于大城市。
en: For instance, there is the problem of all those strangers.To think of city neighborhoods as organs of city self-government or self-management, we must first jettison some orthodox but irrelevant notions about neighborhoods which may apply tocommunities in smaller settlements but not in cities.

zh: 出于同样的原因，象征之地的创造并非命中注定，而是一种辛苦的耕耘和斗争，因为地方能够凭想象存在。
en: By the same token, the creation of symbolic places is not given in the stars but painstakingly nurtured and fought over precisely because of the hold that place can have over the imaginary.

zh: 宗教在世俗社会中作为主要制度成功地生存下来部分是通过对象征之地的成功创造、保护和培育。
en: The survival of religion as a major institution within secular societies has been in part won through the successful creation, protection, and nurturing of symbolic places.

zh: 但是，想象并不那么容易被操纵和驯化，以服务于特定的政治经济目标。
en: But imaginations are not easily manipulated or tamed to specific political–economic purposes.

zh: 中位数能够使我们求出分布的中点，并且能够理解在中点两侧总体的分布。
en: The median enables us to determine the middle point of a distribution and to understand the distribution of the population on either side of the middle point.

zh: 平均值告诉我们所研究类别的近似可接受值——平均数值。
en: The average tells us an approximate acceptable value for a category being studied — that is, the average score.

zh: 总之，这三种量数能够告诉我们研究的样本所代表的分布类型。
en: Together, the three measures can tell us about the type of distribution being represented by the sample being studied.

zh: 公共住宅本身并不是一个目的，它只能是达到目的的一种手段，这个目的是把我们的城市变成适合居住的地方，只有这样，它才能证明自己是一种正确的手段。
en: Public housing is not properly an end in itself.It can only be justified as a means to an end of making our cities fit places in which to live.

zh: 公共住宅应该是一种什么样的形式呢？
en: What kind of public housing should it be?

zh: ……随着租房者收入的增加，房租应该增加，但不能因为他的收入增加很多而不被允许住在这里。
en: . . .The tenant's rent should be increased with his increase in income and he should not be evicted as an over-income tenant.

zh: 当租费上涨到一定的程度，可以抵消他的抵押贷款时（假如他可以购买而不是租赁他现在的住宅，而且从不太严格的抵押贷款的角度看），他所租的房产就应该以账面价格转让给他，而他的房租则可以支付贷款。
en: When his increasing rent reaches the point at which it will cover debt service, on liberal mortgage terms, then the property should be deeded to him at its book value and his rent converted into a mortgage payment.

zh: 直立，按照合桥（第九式）的运动过程，做出标准桥式（图104）。
en: Stand up straight and perform a closing bridge (Step 9) into a full bridge hold (fig. 104).

zh: 双臂伸直，同时弯曲膝盖，将体重转移至双腿。
en: From this position, shift your weight forwards through the thighs, and bend the knees as you straighten your arms.

zh: 双手（最后是手指）用力按压地面，使手掌离地，同时继续向前转移体重。
en: Continue gradually shifting your weight forwards as your press through the hands and finally the fingers, lifting the palms off the floor.

zh: 此时，如果你的后背足够柔韧以维持高度的弓形，腹部又足够有力，在你起身时手指会离地（图105）。
en: At this point, provided your back is flexible enough to maintain a high arch, and your stomach is powerful enough, your fingers will leave the ground as you start to straighten yourself up (fig. 105).

zh: 这个向上的运动过程应该是平缓向前转移体重的结果，而非用双手以爆发力推地面的结果。
en: This upwards motion should be the consequence of a smooth forwards transfer of your bodyweight, not the result of an explosive push off the floor with the hands.

zh: 继续向上运动，双手绕过肩部收回，颈部也收回，与身体成一直线。
en: Continue the movement, drawing your hands back over your shoulders and pivoting the neck up in line with the body.

zh: 最后，将髋部拉回，成直立姿势，双手回到身体两侧。
en: Finally, pull the hips in until you are standing straight with hands by your sides.

zh: 这是该动作的结束姿势（图106）。
en: This is the finish position (fig. 106).

zh: 从直立姿势做成标准桥式，然后把自己从下向上拉回成直立姿势，就是一次完整的铁板桥。
en: Going from standing up, down to a full bridge hold, then straightening yourself back up to the standing position again constitutes one full repetition of the stand-to-stand bridge.

zh: 重复练习，保持正常呼吸。
en: Repeat the exercise, breathing normally.

zh: 为了进一步分析尼卡宁的传媒表征，我们从德勒兹的视角出发，将现代主义自我建构的二元模式问题化（例如：男性化/ 女性化，男人/ 孩子，冠军/ 退役，好/ 坏，体育英雄/ 酗酒者，有决心的/ 迷失的，理性的/ 失控的）。
en: To further analyze the media representations of Nykanen, we draw on aDeleuzian perspective to problematize the dualistic scheme of modernistconstruction of the self (e.g., masculine/feminine, man/child, champion/retired, good/bad, athletic hero/alcoholic, determined/lost, rational/outof control).

zh: 德勒兹和瓜塔里（Deleuze & Guattari，1987 ) 使用术语“ 肖像特征” 来连接这些二元化的特征。
en: Deleuze and Guattari (1987) used the term "faciality trait" toconnect these binary characteristics.

zh: 在这种语境下，一个个体必须选择二元划分后的其中一侧站队：男性化的、好的一侧被德勒兹和瓜塔里加以“ 多数主义” 形象的标签。
en: In this context, an individual is required to take up a position on either side of the binary divide: the masculine, good side is labelled by Deleuze and Guattari as the "majoritarian" face.

zh: 本组也包括与5a-还原酶（Sot- reductase) 缺乏有关的各种综合征， 5a- 还原酶会将睾酮降解为二氢睾酮 (dihydrotestosterone)。
en: This group also includes the syndromes associated with deficiency of 5a-reductase, the enzyme that reduces testosterone to dihydro-testosterone.

zh: 来自多米尼加共和 国的一系列报告描述了一些家庭将染色体为46, XY的孩子喂养成为女子的情况， 这些孩子在青春期获得了可观程度的男性 第二特征。
en: A series of reports concerning patients in the Dominican Republic have described families with a 46, XY chromosomal complement raised as females, who underwent a  striking degree of virilization at puberty.

zh: 出生时的外生殖器具有女性的 外表，在整个童年只有一个会阴开口和很短的阴道。
en: The genitalia had a female appearance at birth and throughout childhood w ith a single perineal opening and a short vaginal pouch.

zh: 如果你经常从肺部咳出黏液 (并不是只有流鼻涕时才排出黏液，那通常是鼻窦炎引起的），那么请考虑补充N-乙酰半胱氨酸。
en: If you routinely cough up mucus from your lungs (rather than mucus coming out only when you blow your nose, which is usually from sinus conditions), consider N-acetylcysteine.

zh: 这种物质能够减少黏液分泌，促进谷胱甘肽的生成，有助于防止细胞受损。
en: It’s a substance that loosens mucus and boosts production of a substance called glutathione, which helps prevent damage in lung tissue.

zh: 我们建议每日补充N-乙酰半胱氨酸两次，每次600毫克。
en: We recommend 600 milligrams twice daily.

zh: （对重症监护病人，我们买际上使用的是一种与N-乙酰半胱氨酸有关的化合物。）
en: (By the way, we actually use a related compound with intensive care patients.)

zh: 比如，饱和脂肪会阻塞通往脑部的动脉血管，增大中风的发病几率。脂肪酸（存在鱼中）对人脑有益，因为omega-3脂肪酸能保持动脉血管的通畅。
en: Saturated fats, for example, clog arteries that lead to your brain, putting you at increased risk of stroke, while omega-3 fatty acids those fats found in fish—are helpful for your brain because they help keep your arteries clear.

zh: 它还能改变人体的神经递质，减少抑郁症的发生。
en: They also alter your neurotransmitters and reduce depression.

zh: 对普通训练者来说，这是个非常值得自豪的成就。如果你的训练就一直停在这个动作上，那也绝对不是什么丢脸的事。
en: The average athlete should be incredibly proud of such an achievement, and there’s absolutely no shame in leveling off your training at that point.

zh: 与健身房里的“行尸走肉”所能达到的成就相比，你已经领先了几光年。
en: It’s an accomplishment light years ahead of what the average gym-trained zombie could ever attain.

zh: 但是总有些人想要走得更远。
en: But some of you will want to go further.

zh: 如果你也属于这群精英，我建议你把眼光放在最强有力的中段练习动作——V字举腿——上。
en: If you are one of this elite group, I would advise setting your sights to the most powerful midsection exercise possible—the V raise.

zh: 根据第六章所介绍的,偏态系数与峰度系数主要是用以描述资料分布特性的咨询。
en: Recall from chapter 6 that skewness and kurtosis provide information about the nature of the distribution.

zh: 这边所采用的Z分数的方式来呈现，0.0 则表示为常态分布。
en: Here they are given in the form of a z score, where 0.0 indicates a normal distribution.

zh: 在肱二头肌皮下脂肪资料中，偏态系数大于1表示资料的分布是倾向右偏分布，峰值系数接近2，表示资料的分布是较集中的；而在前臂皮下脂肪的部分，资料的偏度一样是呈现右偏的分布情况，在峰度系数的部分，其资料分布呈现更集中的分布，由此可知两个数量似乎都不是常态的分布。
en: For the biceps skinfold, the skewness is above +1.0, indicating that the hump of the curve is shifted to the left.The kurtosis is nearly +2.0, indicating that the distribution is very peaked.For the forearm skinfold, the hump of the curve is also shifted left, and the curve is extremely peaked.Neither data set seems to be normal in its distribution.

zh: 应用Z评定方法，人们能够回答诸如一名纵跳得分48cm的14岁男孩，是否将在21岁时加入国家排球队的问题。
en: Applying the Z strategy, one can address questions such as whether a 14-year-old boy with a vertical jump score of 48cm will be on the national volleyball team at the age of 21.

zh: 为了回答这个问题，已知国家队平均纵跳得分是72cm。
en: To answer this, the mean vertical jump score of the national volleyball team is determined (72 cm).

zh: 通过将此数值与一般人群在该年龄的均值进行比较并除以标准差（3cm），我们得出Z值为4。
en: By comparing this value to the population mean for that age (60 cm) and dividing by the standard deviation (3cm) we obtain a Z value of 4.

zh: 若要获得线性关系中近似常态的样本分配，最佳的方法是将相关系数转换成Z值（Z value)，此方法通称为费雪尔Z转换(Fisher Z transformation)。
en: The most satisfactory method of approximating normality of a sampling distribution of linear relationships is by transforming coefficients of correlation to Z values.This is often called the Fisher Z transformation.

zh: (请注意，此Z不应该与用来表示常态曲线纵坐标高度的z搞混。）
en: (This Z should not be confused with the z used to refer to the height of the ordinate in the area of the normal curve.)

zh: 其他控制内在效度威胁的方式包括安慰剂、单盲及双盲设计。
en: Other ways of controlling threats to internal validity include placebos and blind and double­blind setups.

zh: 安慰剂 (placebo)是用来评估观察到的效果是来自实验处理或心理效果。
en: A placebo is used to evaluate whether the observed effect is produced by the treatment or is a psychological effect.

zh: 通常控制条件是研究对象接受到实验者的关注与互动程度一样，只不过采取的实验处理和依变项的表现无关。
en: Frequently, a control condition is used in which participants receive the same attention from and interaction with the experimenter, but the treatment administered does not relate to performance on the dependent variable.

zh: L-肉毒碱是一种氨基酸，它促进了人体细胞间能量的传递。在动物试验中，L-肉毒碱已被证实能抵抗动脉老化，提高记忆能力。
en: L-carnitine is an amino acid that helps transfer energy between our cells; and in animal studies, it s been shown to decrease arterial aging and improve memory.

zh: 对于60岁以上的人士，我们建议每日补充1500毫克L-肉毒碱。
en: For people over sixty, we recommend 1,500 milligrams daily of L-carnitine.

zh: 点燃悉尼奥运火炬台的过程并没有如计划中那样进行。
en: The lighting of the Sydney Olympic cauldron did not go exactly as planned.

zh: 一个反常的电讯信号导致控制从观众升起的火炬台的电脑出现运转失灵，这220秒能让组织者感到就像是永远那么长。火炬台在弗里曼的头顶卡住了，乐队不得不一遍一遍反复演奏柏辽兹的“赞主曲”（TeDeum），直到在体育场腹部工作的工程师们找到问题所在，启动备用救急装置。
en: A freak telecommunications signal caused a glitch in the computer that controlled the raising of the cauldron through the crowd.For 220 seconds, what would seem to the organisers like an eternity, the cauldron was stuck above Cathy Freeman's head, with the band playing the same musical chord of Berlioz’s Te Deum over and over again, until the engineers working in the bowels of the stadium were able to track the problem and override the safety mechanisms.

zh: 如果你在厨房窗户旁边煮着一锅面条，这扇窗户就会因蒸汽而模糊，你也就无法看到窗户外面。
en: If you boil a pot of pasta by the kitchen window, the window's going to steam up so you can't see out of it.

zh: 这就是白内障产生的影晌：遮蔽眼球的晶状体，造成你的视线模糊。
en: That's what cataracts do: cloud the lens of your eye to cause blurry vision.

zh: 许多物体，包括紫外线、香烟雾以及糖尿病人体内多余的葡萄糖（这些都是加快人体血管衰老的因素）都能够加大白内障的发病率。
en: Many things, including UV light, cigarette smoke, and extra glucose in people with diabetes (things that accelerate arterial aging), can increase the risk of cataracts.

zh: 这种救赎的叙事出现于体育和主流出版物之上，最终 “超越了美国体育世界”，在 1999年促生了一种新的白人男子气概。这种气概是“战略上同时女性化也男性化的...对于财富矛盾的...内部冲突的、家庭导向的，总的说来，尝试驾驭与社会特权之间的关系”。
en: This redemptive narrative appeared in both sports and mainstream publications and ultimately "transcended the American sports world", promoting a new, White masculinity beginning in 1999 that is "both strategically feminized.. .and musculinized.. .ambivalent toward wealth.. .internally confliceted, family oritented, and in general, attempting to manage its relationship to social privilege".

zh: 阿加西的传媒再现是一个关键，库茨将其称之为从20世纪90年代到21世纪的 “白色起义”:“对于白人在主流美国流行文化中所代表的意义的公开斗争。”
en: The media representation of Agassi was key in what Kusz termed the "white revolt" of the 1990s to 2000s, a "public struggle over the meanings assoicated with whiteness in mainstream American popular culture".

zh: 人体渴望伤口痊愈，用“有害”胆固醇填补患处，“灰泥”会用得过多，高出血管壁上的破裂口。
en: In its zeal to heal, it starts convering up the damage with the "bad" cholesterol, slapping it on like too much plaster over a hole in a wall.

zh: 而这还只是个开头，此举还会刺激免疫系统，吸引来白细胞试图实施保护，消除“有害”胆固醇，平复人体受到的伤害。
en: And that's only the beginning, since it stimulates the immune system to attract white-cell protsctors to try to smooth out and gobble up the rotten cholesterol.

zh: 白细胞会分泌有毒物质，这些物质通常情况下能对抗感染，而这时则会造成全面发炎。
en: Those, in turn, spill some of their toxic contents that normally attack enemy infections, which causes generalized inflammation.

zh: 但并不是所有的癌症都是肿瘤或肿块，这使得它们更难沴断。
en: But not all cancers are tumors or lumps—making them even more difficult to diagnose.

zh: 血液类癌症，比如白血病就不是通常意义上的肿瘤，而是在骨髓中所积累的不正常的白细胞。它们聚集茌一起，使得健康的白细胞和红细胞 瀕临饿死，即使你的身体无法保证不被感染，也不能输送你所需要的氧。
en: Blood-borne cancers such as leukemia are not like tumors in the usual sense.Instead, abnormal white blood cells accumulate in bone marrow and crowd or starve out healthy white and red blood cells making your body unable to protect itself against infection and unable to deliver as much oxygen as you need.

zh: 找一堵墙，双手手掌平放在距离墙根约15到25厘米的地面上，双手与肩同宽。
en: Approach a solid wall.Place your palms flat on the floor six to ten inches from the base of the wall, at about shoulder width apart.

zh: 手臂尽量伸直，蹬起成靠墙倒立姿势（第三式）。
en: Keeping your arms as straight as possible, assume the position and kick up into a wall handstand (Step 3).

zh: 你现在应该处于标准的靠墙倒立姿势——手臂伸直，身体收紧，背部略微向内弓，脚跟与墙壁轻轻接触。
en: You should now be in the classic wall handstand starting posture; your torso should be braced, your arms straight, and your body should curve backwards slightly to the point where your heels make a gentle contact with the wall.

zh: 这是半倒立撑的起始姿势（图113）。
en: This is the start position for the half handstand pushup (fig. 113).

zh: 跪在地板上，双手撑地，双腿向后蹬直。
en: From the kneeling position, place your palms on the floor and stretch your legs out behind you.

zh: 双手与肩同宽，并处于上胸部的正下方。
en: Your hands should be shoulder width apart, and directly below your upper chest.

zh: 双腿双脚并拢，使支撑肌肉绷紧，使后背、髋部和双腿成一条直线。
en: Your feet and legs should be kept together.Tighten your supporting muscles, so that your back, hips and legs stay locked in line.

zh: 先伸直手臂，然后降低身体到大约一半臂长的高度，或者直到肘部弯成直角。
en: Starting with the arms straight, lower yourself approximately half the length of your extended arms, or until your elbows form a right angle.

zh: 控制下降高度的绝佳方式就是使用篮球或橄榄球——该动作处于最高点时，将身体置于球之上。
en: An excellent way to establish how far to descend is to use a standard basketball or soccer ball.Position yourself over the ball at the top of the movement, so that the ball is directly below your hips.

zh: 这是半俯卧撑的起始姿势（图7）。
en: This is the start position of the half pushup (fig. 7).

zh: 这个动作需要借助一个篮球或足球来控制动作幅度。
en: The half bridge will require a basketball or soccer ball to monitor your form.

zh: 坐在地上，把球放在自己身后的地上（靠近自己）。
en: Sit down on the floor,placing the ball on the ground right behind you.

zh: 向后躺，只有双肩和双脚在地面上，双脚与肩同宽或略窄，球支撑着腰部。
en: Lay back so that you are lying down with only your shoulders and the soles of your feet on the floor.The feet should be shoulder width apart or a little closer, and the ball should be supporting the small of your back.

zh: 如果你感觉这种姿势不舒服，在开始前可以在球上放上毛巾或坐垫。
en: If you find this position uncomfortable, lay a folded towel or cushion over the ball before you begin.

zh: 双手撑在头部两侧的地板上，手指指向脚。
en: Place the hands alongside the head, with the palms flat on the floor and your fingers pointing towards your toes.

zh: 然后，用手把双肩和头部推离地板，只用双脚、球和手掌支撑身体。
en: Now press through the hands, pushing your shoulders and head off the floor so that only the soles of your feet, the ball, and your palms are supporting your bodyweight.

zh: 这是该动作的起始姿势（图91）。
en: This is the start position (fig. 91).

zh: 在这个姿势基础上髋部要尽力向上顶起，伸展手臂和双腿，抬起背部，直到背部完全离开球。
en: From here, push the hips as high as you can, extending the arms and legs and lifting the back up until it is well clear of the ball.

zh: 继续向上运动，直到背部形成完全的弧形。
en: Keep going until your back is fully arched.

zh: 这是结束姿势（图92）。
en: This is the finish position (fig, 92).

zh: 在最高处暂停一会，然后慢慢放低身体，回到起始姿势。
en: Pause for a moment at the top, before lowering yourself slowly to the start position.

zh: 在一组动作过程中，后腰只能轻轻接触球，而不能将整个身体的重量都压在球上。
en: After starting the set, only descend until the small of your back lightly touches the ball—don’t rest your bodyweight on it.

zh: 重复练习，尽量保持正常呼吸。
en: Repeat, breathing as normally as possible.

zh: 为了完整起见，还要提到半乳糖血症 (galactosaemia)问题。
en: For completeness, galactosaemia is mentioned.

zh: 也许，出生前或出生后卵巢功能衰竭是由异常的半乳糖代谢引起的，其后的表现是青春期的延迟。
en: Pre-or postnatal ovarian failure is caused, perhaps, by an abnormal metabolite of galactose, and is later manifested by delayed puberty.

zh: 这种疾病在出生时必须及时加以探察，可以通过强制性的筛检程序或围产期的各种症状来发现。
en: This condition should be detected at birth by the mandated screening procedure or by symptoms in the perinatal period.

zh: 与患特纳氏综合征的年轻女子的一样，该病可以采用性类固醇疗法进行治疗。
en: Gonadal steroid hormone treatment is the same as noted for young women with Turner's syndrome.

zh: 在半深蹲过程中，站立，双脚分开，与肩同宽或略宽。
en: In the half squats, stand with the feet shoulder width apart, or slightly wider.

zh: 脚尖不要完全平行伸向前方，而要略微向外。
en: Don’t keep your feet perfectly in line with one another; allow your toes to point very slightly outwards.

zh: 双手放在髋部、胸部、肩部都可以——以舒适为前提。
en: Place your hands in a comfortable position—on your hips, chest or shoulders is fine.

zh: 弯曲髋部和膝盖，直到膝关节弯曲成90°——换句话说就是大腿与地面平行。
en: Now bend at the hips and knees until your knees are angled at ninety degrees, or (in other words) your thighs are parallel to the floor.

zh: 刚开始你可以借助一面镜子或是找朋友帮忙，直到能够自如地控制动作幅度。
en: You can use a mirror or ask a friend the first few times until your body learns the right depth.

zh: 不要求快，也不要借助惯性起身，而要完全在肌肉控制下做整个动作。在最低点（半空中）坚持1秒钟，然后再回到起始姿势。
en: Don’t rush the technique, and never bounce; pause in mid-air at the bottom position for a one count before returning to the start position under full muscular control.

zh: 在整个动作过程中，背部始终要挺直，双脚脚跟始终不能抬离地面。
en: Keep the back straight throughout the motion, and keep your heels flat on the floor.

zh: 膝盖与脚尖应该始终朝向同一方向，深蹲时膝盖绝不要向内转，脚尖指向外有助于你做到这一点。
en: Your knees should always point in the same direction as your feet; don’t ever allow the knees to “track” inwards as you squat.The outwards angle of your toes will assist you with this.

zh: 瓣膜在心脏永不停止的血液循环活动中扮演的角色极普通又极关键：瓣膜是门卫，阻止血液回流进刚刚离开的心室。
en: The valves play a key and surprisingly basic role in the never-ending cycle of blood through the heart: They are doormen who keep the blood from retracing its journey, leaking backward into the chambers it has just left.

zh: 在心房与心室之间，在心室与离开心室的血管之间，都有瓣膜。
en: There are valves between each atrium and ventricle, and between each ventricle and the blood vessel that leaves it.

zh: 血液流过后，瓣膜就会合上，发出我们在电视上听到的心跳声。
en: As the blood swishes through, the valves slam shut, producing what we hear on TV as a heartbeat.

zh: 棒球中的击球被人视为是所有运动中最难的挑战。试想：投球手戴着橡皮手套， 鼓足劲，然后朝本垒投出一个70~100mi/h的快球，飞到60ft(1ft≈0.3048m)远的地方。
en: Hitting a pitched baseball has been regarded by some as the single most difficult challenge in all sports.Consider this: The pitcher toes the rubber, winds up, and delivers a 70 to 100 mph fastball toward home plate, 60 feet away.

zh: 那里站着一个击球手，手持击球棒，他最佳的触球点大约有3in(1in≈25.4mm)长。
en: There stands the batter, wielding a slab of lumber whose optimal point of contact with the ball is about 3 inches long.

zh: 以球飞行的速度，从球被投出的时间到接触球棒有效的触球点大约有450ms。
en: At the speed of the pitch, the time from the release of the ball to the hoped-for point of contact with the bat is about 450 milliseconds.

zh: 许多英国人不会定期检査保养牙齿，因为在全国卫生福利规定中，牙科项目不能免费。
en: Many people in Great Britain don't have regular dental care because it's not provided free by the National Health Service.

zh: 但是当他们因为胸痛去医院治疗时，医生会开给他们阿司匹林和抗生素治疗牙龈炎。医生们很清楚，心血管系统的老化和工作不畅与牙龈发炎有很大的关联。
en: But when people in Great Britain go to the hospital with chest pain, they're given an aspirin, and an antibiotic for gum disease—because doctors know there's a strong link between the inflammation of gum disease and an aging and unstable cardiovascular system.

zh: 其实，健美运动会让你暴饮暴食。

en: Conventional bodybuilding is conducive to overeating.

zh: 忘记你在杂志里看到的那些大块头吧，他们在大部分时间里都没办法保持那样的身材。
en: Forget the ripped pros you see in the magazines—no way do they look like that most of the time.

zh: 只有在近乎变态地控制饮食数月之后，他们才能在短暂的赛季内拍出那样的照片。
en: They only do their photo shoots during the brief competition season, after months of strict and unhealthy dieting.
