zh: 这是构成你的平衡系统的四种器官之一。（另外三个是你的视觉，它能帮你纠正平衡问题；你的本体感受，它负责告诉你身体器官相对的空间位置；还有你的小脑，它统合其他几部分为你提供平衡。）
en: It’s one of the four things that make up your balancing system (the other three are your vision, which helps correct balance problems; proprioception, which is responsible for telling you where your body parts are relative to space; and your cerebellum, which integrates all the other parts to give you balance).

zh: 近年来，相对选择性β2-激动剂（β2-agonists)的发展，具有使支气管平滑肌松弛的作用，而对心脏的作用较小。
en: Recent years have seen the development of relatively selective β-agonists, that have potent bronchial smooth muscle relaxant effect, with little cardiac stimulation.

zh: 这些药物，包括（美国）阿布特罗(albuterol)或（世界其他地方）沙丁胺醇 (salbutamol),奥西那林（metaproterenol)，特布他林（terbutaline)，比托特罗 (bitolterol),非诺特罗（fenoterol)和沙米特罗（salmeterol)是治疗哮喘中支气管痉挛的主要药物。不论是对慢性的或急性的支气管痉挛，也包括运动性哮喘有效。
en: These agents, including albuterol (USA) or salbutamol (rest of the world), metaproterenol, terbutaline, bitolterol, fenoterol and salmeterol, are the mainstay in the treatment of the bronchospastic component of asthma, be it chronic or acute, including EIA.

zh: 有一个这个过程的例子可以在运动学习和控制领域中找到，Adams在 1971年提出在运动技巧学习中的闭锁环理论(closed-loop theory) 。
en: An example of this process can be found in the motor learning and control area.Adams (1971) proposed a closed-loop theory of motor skill learning.

zh: 基本上，闭链式回路理论提出在运动学习中从运动中接受到回馈的讯息将与内部参考点(如记忆)进行一致性的比较，找出运动和预期的运动之间的差异。
en: Basically, the closed-loop theory proposes that information received as feedback from a movement is compared with some internal reference of correctness (assumed to be stored in memory).Then the discrepancies between the movement and the intended movement are noted.

zh: 最后，下次将尝试在运动时将动作调整为更接近运动的目标。
en: Finally, the next attempt at the movement is adjusted to approximate the movement goal more closely.

zh: “六艺”部分的每一章都以“变式”部分收尾。
en: Every Big Six chapter rounds off with a short section called simply variants.

zh: 六艺有许许多多不同的变式，并不是所有变式都囊括在十式中。
en: There are a great many different variations of the Big Six, and not all of these are included within the ten steps.

zh: 这一方面是因为不是所有变式都适合放在升级系列中，另一方面是因为没必要将某一动作的所有变式都囊括在一个计划中。
en: This is partly because not all variations are suitable, and partly because to include every possible variation of the movement in a single program would be overkill.

zh: 将指甲剪短、磨平，在向你自己的拇指和食指的皮脑加压力时，指甲只微微伸出。
en: Cut and file the nails so that they extend only slightly when applying pressure to the fleshy portion of your own thumb and index fingers.

zh: 这样可以确保受试者感到舒服。
en: This ensures subject comfort.

zh: 此外，当带领学生实验时，戴上橡皮手套，使用仔细修饰过的指甲也能进行标记和测量而不会失去精确性。
en: Moreover, with properly groomed nails, landmarking and measuring can be done wearing rubber gloves without appreciable loss in accuracy as determined in student experiments.

zh: 找一面墙，双手手掌平放在距离墙根约15到25厘米的地面上，双手与肩同宽。
en: Approach a solid wall and place your palms flat on the ground approximately shoulder width apart and about six to ten inches from the wall.

zh: 双膝曲，蹬起靠墙成倒立姿势。
en: Bend at the knees and kick up against the wall into a handstand position.

zh: 如果你从前几式一路练过来，那现在对此过程必然了如指掌。
en: If you have worked through the steps so far you will now be pretty expert at this.

zh: 如果你已经找到了适合自己的上墙技巧，那也很好。重要的是培养肌肉，而不是上墙的方式。
en: If you have developed your own technique, that’s fine—it’s the muscle-building portion of the exercise that’s of importance, not how you get there.

zh: 上墙之后，只有双脚脚跟与墙壁接触，背部略微向内弯曲成弓形，双臂伸直。
en: Once you have found the wall, keep contact with it through your heels, maintaining a slight backwards arch in your body.Your arms should be straight.

zh: 这是标准倒立撑的起始姿势（图115）。
en: This is the start position of the handstand pushup (fig. 115).

zh: 跪在地板上，双手撑地，双腿向后蹬直。
en: From the kneeling position, place your palms on the floor and stretch your legs out behind you.

zh: 双腿双脚并拢，双手与肩同宽，并处于上胸部的正下方。
en: Keep your thighs and feet together, and ensure that the hands are below your upper chest and shoulder width apart.

zh: 双臂伸直，臀部与脊椎成一条直线。
en: Straighten the arms.The hips and spine should be in line.

zh: 这是标准俯卧撑的起始姿势（图9）。
en: This is the start position of the full pushup (fig 9).

zh: 平躺在地上，弯曲膝盖，让双脚向臀部靠近，直至与其相距约15到20厘米。
en: Lie on your back.Draw your feet in, bending the knees until your heels are approximately six to eight inches from your glutes.

zh: 双脚与肩同宽或略窄，双手撑在头部两侧的地板上，手指指向脚，两肘指向天花板。
en: The feet should be shoulder width apart or slightly closer.Place the hands alongside the head, with the palms flat on the floor and your fingers pointing towards your toes.Your elbows should be angled towards the ceiling at this point.

zh: 这是该动作的起始姿势（图93）。
en: This is the start position (fig. 93).

zh: 尽量把髋部向上抬，从而使身体离开地板。
en: Now push the hips as high as you can, lifting the body from the floor.

zh: 手臂和双腿继续用力推，直到背部形成优美的弧形。
en: Continue pushing through your arms and legs until your back is well arched, and your hips are high.

zh: 在完美的桥中，手臂要完全伸直。
en: In the perfect bridge, your arms will be totally straight.

zh: 头部尽量后仰，从而看到后面的墙壁。
en: Allow the head to tilt backwards between the arms, so that you can look at the wall behind you.

zh: 这是标准桥的结束姿势（图94）。
en: This is the finish position of full bridges (fig. 94).

zh: 在最高处暂停一会儿，然后反向运动，有控制地放低身体——要平缓地降低，不要一下塌下来，这样你会受益更多。
en: Hold this top position for a moment, before reversing your motion.Control your descent—you will gain more benefit from the exercise if you lower yourself smoothly than if you simply collapse.

zh: 继续放低身体，直到髋部、背部和头部完全接触地面。
en: Continue going all the way back down until your hips, back and head are resting completely on the floor again.

zh: 这一连串动作就是一个标准的桥。完成相应的训练目标，整个过程尽量保持正常呼吸。
en: This sequence constitutes one rep. Push yourself back up again for your target reps, breathing normally throughout.

zh: 在标准深蹲过程中，直立，双脚分开，与肩同宽或略宽（取决于个人偏好）。
en: In the full squats, stand tall, with the feet shoulder width apart or a little wider, depending upon your preference.

zh: 双脚略微向外转，双臂随意摆放，只要舒服即可。
en: Turn the toes slightly out, and place the arms in a comfortable position.

zh: 髋部与膝关节弯曲，背部始终挺直。
en: Bend at the hips and knees, keeping the back straight.

zh: 当大腿达到几乎与地面平行时，把你的身体重心向后转移，就像要坐下一样。
en: When your thighs reach approximately parallel to the floor, shift your weight backwards as if you were about to sit down.

zh: 有控制地继续放低身体，直到大腿后侧紧贴小腿。
en: Continue descending at a controlled speed until the backs of your thighs are resting against your calves.

zh: 暂停一会，然后仅靠腿部发力将自己推回到起始姿势。
en: Pause for a moment before pressing yourself back up with leg strength alone.

zh: 起身过程和下蹲过程应该是完全相反的。
en: Your upward motion should be the reverse of your downward motion.

zh: 脚跟始终不要抬离地面，膝盖也不能向内转。
en: Don’t raise the heels, or allow the knees to track inwards.

zh: 在做标准引体向上时，以正握姿势握住横杆，双手与肩同宽或略宽——你可以试试看多大宽度对你来说最容易发力。
en: When doing full pullup, grab hold of a horizontal bar with a shoulder width overhand grip.A slightly wider grip is acceptable—experiment to find out which width feels strongest for you.

zh: 双脚离地，双膝微屈，脚踝交叠在一起并置于身后。
en: Bend at the knee and loop the ankles behind your body.

zh: 身体绷紧，双肩收紧，肘部略微弯曲（几乎看不出来），让肌肉而不是肘关节承担压力。
en: Your feet should be clear of the ground.Tense the body, keep the shoulders down tight and retain a very slight (almost unnoticeable) bend in the elbows to take the stress off the arm joints and place it on the muscles instead.

zh: 弯曲肘部，夹起肩部，直至下巴超过横杆。
en: Bend at the elbows and shoulders until your chin passes over the bar.

zh: 欣赏一下上面的风景吧！
en: Enjoy the view!

zh: 暂停一会，然后有控制地反向运动。
en: Pause for a moment, before reversing the motion under full control.

zh: 不要做爆发式动作，否则惯性就会参与进来。
en: Don’t be explosive—this means depending on momentum during the exercise.

zh: 平缓的动作是练出肌肉的完美技巧。
en: The perfect muscle-building technique is smooth.

zh: 试着用2秒钟将自己拉起来，再用2秒钟缓慢地放低身体，并在动作的最高点和最低点各停顿1秒钟。
en: Try to take two seconds up and two seconds down, pausing for a second at the top and bottom.

zh: 许多人用治疗的方法来区分细菌和病毒：细菌用抗生素治疗，病毒却不用。其实并非完全这样。对于艾滋病来说有许多抗病毒治疗方法。
en: Many people distinguish between bacteria and viruses by treatment: bacteria respond to treatment with antibiotics; viruses don't.But that's not entirely true—there are many antiviral medications for AIDS.

zh: 这两种有机体的主要区别跟它们的结构、大小和功能有关。
en: The main differences between the two types of organism have to do with their structure, size, and function.

zh: 细菌是更复杂的细胞，它们有能力复制自身，病毒却比它们小一百倍，结构更简单，无法复制自身。
en: Bacteria are complex cells that have the ability to replicate themselves; viruses are about a hundred times times smaller, much simpler on a cellular level, and without the tools to replicate themselves.

zh: 如果你眼睛中看到这些点，它们甚至会多到好像你在天文馆中看到的天上的星星。

en: If you have enough of them, it seems as if you can see a planetarium in your line of vision.

zh: 虽然你也许第一次注意到这些小黑点有干扰，它们实际上是无害的。
en: Though those little black dots can be disturbing the first time you noice them, they're actually harmless unless they're increasing in frequnecy.

zh: 它们是浮在你眼中的玻璃状流体周围的小斑点，这种现象通常是由于某种形式的外伤（例如车祸），或是过长地戴眼镜或是流泪、过度用眼、揉眼等造成的。
en: They're little specks that float around the vitreous fluid in your eye and are usually caused by some form of trauma (like a car accident), or through a lifetime of optical wear and tear——（破则号）lifting, traning, and rubbing your eyes.

zh: 从健康长寿的观点看，性对人类生活无比重要。因此我们不应该羞于谈论情欲亢进、射精和性无能这些事情。
en: Since sex is such an important part of our lives from a health and longevity standpoint, we shouldn't be embarrassed to talk about things like orgasm, ejaculation, and impotence.

zh: 日前，我们有了一些进步。
en: Recently, we have made some strides.

zh: 例如，身为伟哥形象代言人的棒球硬汉拉菲尔•帕尔梅洛曾说，有人和他讨论勃起功能障碍的问题。
en: For example，several spokesmen for Viagra said that they did it not for the money but because somebody had to come forward to talk about the problem of erectile dysfunction.

zh: 药物治疗之前最为普遍的降压步骤的第一步就是减少食物中盐的摄入量，因为盐能够阻碍身体中的水。
en: A common first step before trying medications is to reduce salt intake in your food since the salt traps water in the body.

zh: 但是只有一部分有高血压的人对盐极端敏感，因此这种方法经常无法完全解决问题。
en: But only a few people with hypertension are extremely salt-sensitive, so this approach often fails to correct the problem.

zh: 但是通过长期（很多年）严格限制饮食中的盐摄入量，或定期服用补水类药物或利尿剂（欧芹是天然的利尿剂）也能将盐分驱除出你的血管和身体。
en: Instead, the salt can be chased out of the artery wall—and thus the body—with long-term (years of) salt restriction in the diet or regular use of a water pill or diuretic (parsley is a natural diuretic).

zh: 在出生时和出生第一周内能够被诱发出来的并能够正常消失的反射动作称为简单反射（primitive)。
en: Reflexes that can be elicited at birth or during the first weeks of life and normally disappear were often called primitive.

zh: 有些姿势性反射（postural reflexes)也是在出生后的第一年里消失。
en: Some postural reflexes also disappear during the first year.

zh: 例如，不对称的张力性颈部反射（asymmetrical tonic neck reflex, ATNR)在出生后2-3个月时减弱，但是多数姿势性反射并不减弱，反而变成更复杂的成熟的动作行为。
en: For instance the asymmetrical tonic neck reflex (ATNR) declines at around 2 or 3 months of age.However, most postural reflexes do not decline, instead becoming integrated into mature motor behaviours.

zh: 不溶性纤维不易溶于水，也不会被肠道细菌分解。
en: Insoluble fiber doesn't easily dissolve in water and is not broken down by intestinal bacteria.

zh: （这种纤维不能降低人体的E固醇含量，但对消化系统还是有益的。
en: (This type doesn't lower your cholesterol but still has an effect on your digestive system.)

zh: ）不溶性纤维常见于葡萄柚、橙、葡萄干、果干、马铃薯、豌豆和绿皮西葫芦，特别是在全麦或全谷类面包中含量高（一定要全麦面包才含有足量纤维）。
en: Its found in grapefruit, orange, grapes, raisins, dried fruit, sweet potatoes, peas, and zucchini, but especially in whole-wheat or whole-grain bread (it has to be whole-grain, not five- or six-grain bread, to have enough fiber).

zh: 可溶性纤维溶于水，它能调节新陈代谢和消化作用，稳定人体血糖值。
en: Soluble fiber does dissolve in water; it regulates metabolism and digestion and stabilizes blood glucose levels.

zh: 女性购物时，她们是“逛街”。
en: When women shop, they browse.

zh: 她们比较各种商品，根据无数的外界因素做决定，她们走出商店的时候，“收获”有一大瓶布洛芬、最新一期《人物》杂志和给母亲的生日卡（虽然母亲的生日在六个月后）。没有一样东西是购物单上列过的。
en: They assess options, they make decisions based on numerous outside factors, and they could come out of the store with a large bottle of ibuprofen, the latest issue of People, and a birthday card for Mom (even though her birthday isn't for six months)—none of which was on the list to begin with.

zh: 这种现象并不说明一种性别比另一种更聪明，更有效率，这只是说明我们分析处理信息的方式是不同的。
en: It doesn't mean one's smarter or more efficient than the other; it just means we assess and process information differently.

zh: 节奏训练：“节奏”也就是步颇。理想的步频是每分钟180次 （意味着每分祌每只脚落地90次 ）。
en: Cadence training.“Cadence” refers to stride rate.The ideal cadence is 180 steps per minute (meaning that each foot touches the ground 90 times per minute).

zh: 为了记录步频，我们可以设置一个电子节拍器，节奏设定为每分钟180次，然后让脚步跟上这个节拍。
en: To track your cadence, set a small electronic metronome at 180 and match the beat.

zh: 刚开始训练步频时，你可能很难保持这个节奏，但是当神经系统和肌肉适应了更快的节奏以后，你的步频会更快，动作也会更自然。
en: When you start working on cadence, it can seem hard to sustain, but after you’ve exposed your nervous system and muscles to the faster pattern for a while, the new faster stride rate will come to feel natural.

zh: 运动还能促使血管扩张，让血管更有弹性，从而增强血管强度。
en: The exercise may also strengthen blood vessels by forcing them to dilate and perhaps making them more clastic.

zh: 如果你已有一段时间没运动，可以先从步行开始，直到能够做举重运动，然后再加入一些其他运动方式如骑自行车、游泳和使用简单运动器材，以提高心率（长期跑步往往会给关节施加过多压力）。
en: If you haven't exercised in a while, start with walking until you can do weight lifting and then add some kind of activity—cycling, swimming, using an elliptical trainer—to elevate your heart rate (running chronically often stresses your joints too much).

zh: 通过加入力量训练（我们会在第4章讨论这一点），然后再进行耐力训练，55岁男性平均生理年龄能年轻8岁，而55岁的女性能年轻9.1岁。
en: By adding strength training, which we'll discuss in Chapter 4, and then stamina training, the average fifty-five-year-old man becomes eight years younger in RealAge, and a fifty-five-year-old woman makes herself 9.1 years younger.

zh: 参数不变性表示由任何受试者的团体算出的项目难度都是相同的。
en: Parameter invariance means that the item difficulty remains constant regardless of the group of examinees.

zh: 而题目的鉴别能力则以曲线的陡峭程度来表示。
en: The discriminating power of the item is indicated by the steepness of the curve.

zh: 试题特征曲线可以用来分析题目的难度、题目的鉴别能力、以及猜测参数。
en: The Iconvict conditioning can be used to analyze the difficulty of the item, the discriminating power of the item, and a so-called guessing parameter.

zh: 图8.2表示此最佳适配线，可以看到分数并没有落在直线上，跟完美相关性的例子不同。
en: Figure 8.2 shows this line of best fit.You can readily see that the scores do not fall on the straight line, as they did with the perfect correlation example.

zh: 预测和实际Y分数之间的差异代表预测误差，称为残差分数。
en: These differences between predicted and actual Y scores represent the errors of prediction and are called residual scores.

zh: 如果计算所有的残差分数，所得到的平均值为零，且标准偏差为预测标准误。
en: If we compute all the residual scores, the mean is zero, and the standard deviation is the standard error of prediction.

zh: 我们处理外界信息，一般是将信息从感觉器官直接送至脑皮层，我们可以在这里处理感知到的信息。
en: We usually process outside information by passing it directly from the sensory organ to the cortex, where we process what we have learned.

zh: 人眼将图像信息送至丘脑，人耳将声音和平衡信息送至顶骨叶。
en: The eyes send images to the occipital lobe; and the ears send sound and balance information to the parietal lobe.

zh: 但是，嗅觉的情况比较特殊。
en: But smell is unique.

zh: 气味通过位于择梁顶端的槽状软骨，刺激嗅球神经。
en: An odor passes through the cribiform plate at the top of the nose and stimulates the olfactory nerve.

zh: 这种神经绕过能过滤信息的脑皮质，将信息送至人脑最初始的部分（杏仁核），在这里，情感反应几乎都是由潜意识产生的。
en: This nerve bypasses the cortex, which filters information, and sends the information to the most ancient part of our brain (amygdala), where emotional responses occur almost subconsciously.

zh: 测试者间信度( intertester reliability) 也是以上述相同的程序来决定。
en: Intertester reliability is determined by the same procedures we just outlined.

zh: 因此，不同评分者或施测者之间的客观性就以组内的R值来分析，其中评分者与评分者间的变异量则以和测试间变异量相同的方式来处理。
en: Thus, the objectivity of judges or different testers is analyzed by intraclass R, and judge-to-judge variance is calculated in the same way as trial-to-trial variance.

zh: 当然，可以用更复杂的ANOVA设计来辨识不同测试之间、不同日期之间、不同评分者之间的变异量来源。
en: Of course, more complex ANOVA designs can be used in which trial-to-trial, day-to-day, and judge-to-judge sources of variance all can be identified.

zh: Baumgartner ( 1989) 与 Satiit (1976)对。一些可以建立信度的模式有详细讨论。
en: Baumgartner (1989) and Safrit (1976) discussed some models that can be used for establishing reliability.

zh: 人们正在不断地开发着新的工具以发现癌症。
en: And new tools for detection are constantly being developed.

zh: 比如说常规乳房手术内窥镜检查（ROBE),是用窥镜放大乳房组织60倍，可以找到比乳房X线照片找到的小一百倍的肿瘤。
en: The routine operative breast endoscopy (ROBE), for instance, uses a viewing scope to magnify breast tissue up to sixty times its normal size and identify tumors 1/100th the size of what can be picked up on mammograms.

zh: 早期探测到乳腺癌的治疗通常可以由乳房肿瘤切除术进行，即摘除肿块。
en: With early detection of breast cancer, the treatment can usually be handled by a lumpectomy—the removal of the lump.

zh: 大部分的教科书中不会特别介绍常模调査。
en: The normative survey is not described in most research methods textbooks.

zh: 如同名称所指出的，这种调查的目的在于建立能力、表现、信念和态度等的参照基准。
en: As implied by the name, this method involves establishing norms for abilities, performances, beliefs, and attitudes.

zh: 所使用的是横断面的研究：即筛选并量测不同年龄、性别 、及其它特定类别的受试者。
en: A cross-sectional approach is used: Samples of people of various ages, both sexes, and other classifications are selected and measured.

zh: 抄袭(plagiarism) 指的是用别人的想法、概念、著作或制图当成你自己的。
en: Plagiarism means using the ideas, writings, or drawings of others as your own.

zh: 当然，在研究过程中这是完全不能接受的（包括写作）。
en: Of course, this is completely unaccpetable in research process (including writing).

zh: 抄袭在所有机构有着严厉的罚则。
en: Plagiarism carries severe penalties at all institutions.

zh: 做标准俯卧撑时，双手通常是在肩部或胸部正下方；而做超人俯卧撑时，你的双手则要平放在身体前方的地板上——超出你的头部，手臂几乎伸直。
en: Full pushups are usually done with the hands at shoulder level or in line with the chest.In Superman pushups you do your reps with your hands flat on the floor way out in front of you, at nearly arm’s length.

zh: 这时，你看起来就像是在飞翔，这个变式因此得名。
en: In this position, you’ll look a little like you’re flying— hence the name.

zh: 由于做这个动作时力臂变长，所以你的上胸部、胸小肌、背阔肌以及腋窝周围的肌腿将得到集中锻炼。
en: Due to the increased leverage of this technique, Superman pushups strongly work the upper pectorals and pec minor, as well as the lats and the tendons around the armpits.

zh: 由于手臂姿势如此，你放低身体时动作幅度减小了，这样一来肩部与肱三头肌得到的锻炼就比做标准俯卧撑时少多了。
en: On the downside, due to the arm position, the range of motion of the exercise is decreased, and the important shoulders and triceps get significantly less work than in classic full pushups.

zh: 因此，该练习（与宽距俯卧撑一样）并不会让你变得越来越强。如果不是为了强化胸部相对薄弱的区域，那你完全没必要练习这个动作。
en: For this reason, this exercise (like wide pushups) won’t make you stronger at doing pushups, so unless you’re trying to fix a relative weakness in yourchest area, I’d avoid them.

zh: 成熟过程按生物系统自身规律变化,但在对生长的研究中常使用的成熟指标标志已经相当完善，包括骨骼的成熟，性成熟，青春期生长高峰时间以及在特定年龄下占成年人身高的百分比。
en: Maturation varies according to the biological system used, but the more commonly used maturity indicators in growth studies are reasonably well related.They include maturation of the skeleton, sexual maturation, timing of the adolescent growth spurt and percentage of adult stature attained at a given age.

zh: 出牙和牙齿钙化偶尔也作为成熟期的标志，但不依赖其 他成熟期标志。
en: Eruption and calcification of the teeth are occasionally used as maturity indicators, but they are independent of other maturity indicators.

zh: 所以，牙成熟在运动科学中的应用较为局限，一般不予考虑（见 Demirjian, 1986)0
en: Dental maturation thus has limited utility in the sport sciences and will not be considered (see Demirjian, 1986).

zh: 比如，短暂性局部缺血(T1A)是一种轻度中风，在这种情况下，动脉血管堵塞只会持续很短时间。
en: A transient ischemic attack (TIA), for example, is a ministroke in which the arteries are blocked only a short time.

zh: TIA实际上是真正中风发作的前兆（虽然T1A较易治疗）。
en: A TIA is actually a precursor to a full stroke (though it's more easily treated).

zh: 轻度中风反复发作会产生长期性影响，比如痴呆症，但是康复情况常常取决于脑部因缺血而受损的程度。
en: Multiple small strokes can have long-term consequences, like dementia.But recovery always depends on how much brain injury occurred from the lack of blood supply to the braint.

zh: 所以必须尽快采取措施。
en: So act quickly.

zh: Rowland:在结束这个话题之前，我们应该把这点也加上去，即除了出生日期，出生地似乎也很重要。
en: Rowland: Before leaving this point, it should be added that in addition to birth date, location of birth also seems to be important.

zh: 如果你想成为一个明星运动员，那你需要在Austin (奥斯汀）长大，而不是在纽约或者Miller’s Comers (米勒斯•康勒斯）。
en: If you want to be a star athlete, grow up in Austin, not New York City or Miller’s Corners.

zh: 好吧，这是有一点夸张的成分，但是关键点是，研究显示了一个不成比例的专业运动员的数量，他们都出生在拥有少于500000而多于10000人口的城市。
en: Well, that’s a bit of hyperbole, but the point is that studies indicate a disproportionate number of professional athletes grow up in cities with populations less than 500,000 but greater than 10,000.

zh: 大量的研究都证明了这种影响。
en: Numerous studies have documented this effect.

zh: 青少年运动项目的参与者名单，特别是冰球等，相比于晚出生的人，则更倾向于早出生的人。
en: Rosters of participants in youth sports, particularly hockey, are biased toward those with birth dates in the first portion of the year, as compared to the last.

zh: 通常的解释是，那些年长一些的在生理上可能更成熟一些——更强壮，体重更大，身髙更髙——这在比赛中提供优势，这并不奇怪。
en: The usual explanation is that those who are chronologically older are also more likely to be more biologically mature—stronger, heavier, and taller—offering a competitive advantage.No surprises here.

zh: 但是这种对早出生的人的倾向，同样存在于那些青春期之后的很成功的年轻成人运动员中，这是很有趣的。
en: Yet it is intriguing that this same bias for early birth date is seen in highly successful young-adult athletes after puberty as well.

zh: 关于专业的棒球、冰球、足球和篮球的一些研究都显示了根据赛季划分后，出生日期的偏移分布。
en: Studies of competitors in professional baseball, ice hockey, soccer, and basketball have all indicated a skewing of birthdates toward the quarter of each year.

zh: 如果你达不到初级标准的目标，那就继续去做半深蹲。如果你感到自己变强了，那就增加几厘米的动作幅度。
en: If you cannot meet the beginner standard, return to doing half squats and slowly add an inch of depth to your technique whenever you get stronger.

zh: 不要心急，一定不要借助惯性起身、让脚跟离地或是摇晃前倾。
en: Don’t rush, and resist the urge to bounce or rock forwards onto your toes.

zh: 要纯粹使用肌肉力量，否则就别练了！
en: Use pure muscular power, or don’t bother!

zh: 传媒化的信息（例如新闻媒体报道） 并非事物的客观呈现。
en: Mediated messages (e.g., news media coverage) are not objective accounts of events.

zh: 相反地，媒体利用特定的阐释来误导他人（Fiske，1 9 9 6 )。
en: Instead, the media privilege certain interpretations while multaneously discouraging others (Fiske, 1996).

zh: 换句话说，那些包含在故事里的信息，更重要的是如何帮助“ 框架” 建构一个事件给读者或是观众的（Fiske, 1 9 9 6 )。
en: In other words, what is included in the story, and more importantly, how it is discussed help "frame" an event for the reader or viewer (Fiske, 1996).

zh: 在做垂直引体时，找一个可抓握且很稳固的竖直物体，门框和高一点的栏杆都是上好之选。
en: In the vertical pullups, find a vertical base you can hold on to.This base should be secure and allow you to grip it safely; a doorframe or high railings are excellent potential candidates.

zh: 靠近物体站立，脚尖与之保持约8厘米的距离。
en: Stand close to the base—the tips of your toes should be between three and six inches out.

zh: 以舒服的姿势抓住该物体，理想情况是双手与肩同宽，但不必要——只要双手对称即可。
en: Take hold of the object in a comfortable grip.Ideally your hands should be shoulder width but any symmetrical position will suffice.

zh: 由于你距离物体很近，所以手臂会弯曲。
en: Because of your proximity to the base, your arms will be well bent.

zh: 身体慢慢向后倾，在此过程中伸展手臂，直到手臂几乎伸直、身体后倾与地面成一定角度为止。
en: Now allow your bodyweight to shift back by leaning slightly.Extend your arms as you go, until they are very nearly straight, and your body is angled diagonally backwards.

zh: 此时，你的上背部应该有拉伸感，手臂可能也会有同感。
en: At this point you will feel a gentle stretch in your upper back, and possibly your arms.

zh: 暂停一会，再并拢肩胛骨并弯曲手臂，把身体拉回到起始姿势。
en: Pause momentarily before pulling yourself back to the start position, by contracting the shoulder blades and bending the arms simultaneously.

zh: 暂停，然后再重复该动作。
en: Pause and repeat.

zh: 坐骨神经经过人体的脊柱下部，直达双脚。突出的椎间盘压迫坐骨神经时，会导致腿疼，这一情况可以帮助我们解释背痛的起因和严重性。
en: The sciatic nerve passes from your lower spine to your feet; when a bulging disc compresses it, it causes leg pain, which helps indicate the cause and severity of back pain.

zh: 医生不愿意切除突出的椎间盘来使脊柱恢复正常，因为这样附近椎间盘会承担多余的重量，使磨损提前。
en: Doctors do not like removing a disc and fusing the spine becouse the extra pressure on surrounding discs can cause premature damage.

zh: 不过请注意：许多椎间盘突出患者并不会感到疼痛。有人感到关节痛和背痛，X光显示却是正常；还有人X光显示不正常，却一点也不觉得疼。
en: But be warned: Lots of folks have herniated discs without pain; many people have joint and back pain with normal X rays; others have abnormal X rays with no pain at all.

zh: 大多数女孩看医生只是为了放心。
en: Most girls will require only reassurance.

zh: 如果需要治疗，通常是用促性腺性类固醇激素治疗，每天5~20fxg,治疗几个月。最常用的是每天0.3~0.6 mg复合雌性激素或乙基雌二醇。
en: If therapy is needed, it is usually with gonadal steroid hormones, often 0 .3—o.6 mg daily conjugatedequine oestrogens or ethinyl oestradio l5 —20 gg daily for several months.

zh: 如果治疗需要延长，可以慎重使用醋酸甲孕酮（medroxyprogesterone acetate),每月 10~14 天，每天 10 mg,来诱导月经周期。
en: If prolonged therapy is necessary, the addition of medroxyprogesteroneacetate 10 mg daily for 10 —14 days of each month to induce menstrual periods is prudent.

zh: 后者极少用于体质性的发育延迟的女孩，但是必须用于低促性腺激素性功能低下症（hypogonadotrophic hypogonadism)的女孩（见后)。
en: The latter is rarely necessary for girls with constitutional delay, but is required for those with hypogonadotrophic hypogon adism (see below ).

zh: 随着我们年龄的增长，皮肤第三层脂肪细胞开始稀薄并变得崎岖不平。
en: As we age, our fat cells in that third layer of skin thin out and get a little bumpier.

zh: 这就是造成皮肤老化的外表会呈现像葡萄干形状的原因之一。
en: That's part of what causes the raisin-like appearance of older skin.

zh: 然而，鱼油中和鲑鱼中的脂肪酸有助于皮肤这一层变厚而且变光滑，以赶走皱纹使皮肤变得更饱满。(通常，你应避免饱和脂肪，因为与此相关联的厚重的油会促使造成痤疮。）
en: Somehow, the fatty adds (DHA specifically) in fish oil and salmon help make that layer a little thicker and smoother, so that wrinkles go away and the skin becomes fuller, (As always, you'll want to avoid saturated and trans fats because the heavy oils associated with them can promote acne.)

zh: 假如我们把自己的肠道拿出拉直 (我们当然不鼓励大家这样做），会从屋子前院延伸至二楼，一直通到阁楼窗户上。肠道一共有七八米长。小肠接在胃的后部，是吸收大部分食物的场所；大肠，或结肠，比小肠宽且短，吸收水分，产生粪便。
en: If you were to stretch your intestines vertically out in front of you (which we highly discourage), they 'd reach from the ground in your front yard up past the second floor and all the way to your attic window. That's twenty-six feet of tubing—and this is where the serious plumbing takes place. The small intestine comes after the stomach and is the tubing where most of foods' nutrients are absorbed; the large intestine, or colon, is wider and shorter than the small intestine and absorbs water to form feces.

zh: 大范围伸展的夹子。
en: Wide spreading caliper.

zh: 大范围伸展的夹子是用于测量胸廓的厚度的，但是，人体测量器或者宽范围的滑动夹子带有内弯的双臂可以作为替代之用。
en: The large wide spreading caliper (Siber-Hegner, GPM) is the instrument of choice for anteroposterior chest depth.However, anthropometers or wide sliding calipers with recurved branches may be used as a substitute.

zh: 新型的Campbell-10型夹子有备用的橄榄枝样的指示器，用于测量胸廓的宽度。
en: The new Campbell Caliper 10 has optional olive-tipped pointers that attach for this purpose.

zh: 大腿中部围度（mid-thigh girth)。
en: Mid-thigh girth.

zh: 在大转子上缘到胫骨头之间的中点处，与股骨长轴呈直角时的围度。
en: Perimeter distance of the right thigh perpendicular to the long axis of the femur at the marked mid-trochanterion-tibiale level.

zh: 将测量大腿围度的卷尺向下移动，用左手中指固定住，用左右手指确保卷尺是在标记的部位上并与股骨长轴呈直角。
en: Simply drop the tape from the upper thigh measurement, pin with the third left digit and use both left and right digits to assure the tape is at the marked site and perpendicular to the long axis of the femur.

zh: 在讨论了大众传媒构建从神坛上跌落下来的运动员引人注目的叙事过程之后，本章现在来探索运动员怎样通过大众传播恢复他们各自的形象。
en: Having discussed the processes through which mass media construct dramatic narratives about athletes falling from grace, the chapter now examines how athletes attempt to restore their respective images through mass communication.

zh: 关于危机传播的文献有助于阐释个体及组织所运用和实现的这些过程。
en: Scholarly literature in crisis communication helps toelucidate these processes, which apply to both individuals and organizations.

zh: 危机，一般而言，就是创造一个“ 信息空洞” （Coombs, 2007) ，利益相关者必须尽快给事件下定义。
en: Crises, in general, create "information voids" (Coombs, 2007), and stakeholders must scramble to define events as quickly as possible.

zh: 当知名运动员陷人法律困境或是经历个人逆境时，运动员和他们的经纪人必须快速行动，因为媒体会毫不犹豫地填补这一空洞（即报道新闻）。
en: When highprofile athletes get in trouble with the law or experience some type of personal adversity, the athletes and their agents must move quickly, as the media will not hesitate to fill the void (i.e., report the news) based on a limited set of facts.

zh: 他们通过观察运动员以同样的方式一个接一个地完成一系列短跑，解释了这一典型观察中功率逐渐下降的原因。
en: They interpreted the progressive decline in power typically observed when a runner completes a series of sprints, one after the other, in the same way.

zh: 反复短跑成绩下降的模式，实际上与先前描述的，单一的持续最大拇指肌收缩力量随时间推移产生下降的现象，是非常相似的。
en: The pattern of performance falloff in repeated sprints is, in fact, very similar to that observed in the model of force production over time in the single sustained maximal contraction of the thumb muscle described previously.

zh: 习惯上会把这种下降归因于局部代谢变化，但St.Clair Gibson和他的同事们认为，反复短跑总成绩的下降不一定与这些因素紧密相关。
en: Such decreases have traditionally been attributed to local metabolic changes, but St. Clair Gibson and colleagues contended that the decline in performance in repeated sprints is not necessarily tightly related to these factors.

zh: 目前，已经发表了内容广泛的MET值表（Ainsworth et al., 1993)。
en: Recently, an extensive list of MET values has been published (Ainsworth et al., 1993).

zh: 该表的大多数数据是用间接热量测定法得到的实际数值。
en: Much of the data in this list are derived from actualmeasurements by indirect calorimetry.

zh: 但是，在数据缺乏时，数值是依据经验推算出来的。
en: However, when data were not available the figures were based  upon educated guesses.

zh: 某些活动的数值不是从实际活动时得来的。
en: For someactivities the values are not those obtained during the actual execution of the activities.

zh: 然而，CFE是一项针对体育运动的训练。
布莱恩.麦肯齐研发的CFE跑步训练计划是为比赛型跑者量身打造的，训练内容组合了跑步训练、力量训练和CrossFit代谢调节训练。
en: A CFE running program, as Brian MacKenzie has developed it, prepares a runner for a race by combining specific running workouts, strength workouts, and CrossFit metabolic conditioning workouts.

zh: 正如麦肯齐所主张的，使用CrossFit训练计划— 具有极大的健康和运动益处— 可以让跑者拥有同样的训练成果，即使不是最佳的运动表现，也能大大降低受伤的风险。
en: As MacKenzie asserts, the use of CrossFit workouts—with their myriad health and athletic benefits—allows a runner to obtain equal if not greater performance results while simultaneously decreasing the chance of injury.

zh: 如果你自己随意服用合成代谢类固醇、减肥药或治疗其他疾病的速效药，你就是在跟你的激素瞎胡闹，就会让身体出现故障。
en: Anytime you try fiddling with your hormones on your own with anabolic steroids or fixes for weight loss or other ailments, you're causing your body to go haywire.

zh: 比如我们经常会了解到一些运动员通过服用代谢类固醇药或补充剂，使其代谢产生睾丸酮。
en: For example, we often read about athletes who take androgenic steroids or supplements that get metabolized through to testosterone.

zh: 这些多余的睾丸酮会导致非常具有侵略性的行为，所以千万不要给服用者手枪，或者什么辩题，更别提这些药产生所有的副作用，像心血管病和肾脏类病。
en: This excess tesfosterone can lead to very aggressive behavior—as in, don't give that man a gun or even an argument—not to mention all the side effects like cardiovascular and kidney problems.

zh: 肌营养不良、脑瘫、骨发育不全和脊柱侧弯儿童的肌肉耐力下降，反映在行走时能耗较高和活动过少。
en: Muscle endurance is also reduced in children with MD, CP , OI and scoliosis and may reflect the high energy cost of ambulation and resultant hypoactivity.

zh: 肌营养不良时，体力活动受限主要是由肌肉耐力因素引起的，比氧运输系统的缺陷更重要（Bar- Or, 1986)。
en: In MD, limitations on physical capacities are due to muscle endurance factors rather than due to deficiencies in the oxygentransport system (Bar-Or, 1986).

zh: 患杜兴型肌营养不良儿童的平均无氧功率减低，低于平均值2-4个标准差以上（Bar-〇r，1983)，“代谢指数” (最大无氧功率与最大有氧功率之比）下降（Bar-Or，1983)。
en: Mean anaerobic power is reduced by as much as 2 —4 SD below the mean (Bar-Or, 1983) and there is a reduced 'metabolic index' (ratio of peak anaerobic to peak aerobic power) (Bar-Or, 1983) in children with Duchenne's M D.

zh: 蹬起靠墙成倒立姿势，脚跟与墙壁接触，身体略微成弓形。
en: Kick up into a handstand against a wall.Your body should be slightly arched, with your heels in contact with the wall.

zh: 双手与肩同宽，距离墙根约15-25厘米，手臂伸直。
en: Your hands should be six to ten inches from the base of the wall, and shoulder width apart.

zh: 逐渐抬起一只手的手掌，将重心慢慢转移到身体的另一侧，另一侧的手掌会承受越来越多的体重。
en: Keep your arms straight.Now gradually press off with one palm, so that your center of gravity shifts towards the other side of the body.This will put more of your bodyweight through the opposite palm.

zh: 继续这种转移过程（持续几秒钟），直到略微抬起的手掌上只剩下几千克的压力。
en: Continue this transition over the course of a few seconds until there are only a few pounds of pressure left in the pushing palm.

zh: 现在轻轻抬起这只手，使之离开地面，并将它伸向远处以保持平衡。
en: Now gently lift that palm away from the floor altogether, and hold it away from your body for balance.

zh: 现在，你就是在以一只伸直的手臂支撑整个身体。
en: You will now be supporting yourself on one straight arm.

zh: 这是单臂半倒立撑的起始姿势（图121）。
en: This is the start position of the half one-arm handstand pushup (fig. 121).

zh: 摆出半俯卧撑最高点时的姿势，即将篮球放在髋部下方（见第四式）。
en: Get into the half pushup top position, with a basketball located below your hips, as described in Step 4.

zh: 将一只手撑在胸部下方的地面上，手臂伸直，另一只手背在身后。
en: Place one hand on the floor beneath your breastbone with your arm straight and your other hand in the small of your back.

zh: 这是单臂半俯卧撑的起始姿势（图15）。
en: This is the start position of the half one-arm pushup (fig. 15).

zh: 单手抓住高过头顶的横杆，要选择对你来说最容易发力的抓握姿势——有人是正握，有人是侧握或反握，但对大多数人来说，在吊环上做该动作可能最容易。
en: Grab an overhead bar with one hand, using your strongest gripping position.For some people, this will be an overhand grip; for others, side-on or underhand.Using a hanging ring is probably ideal for most people.

zh: 另一只手可随意放置，舒服即可。我的大多数学生喜欢将手臂悬于空中，我个人更喜欢像做单臂俯卧撑那样将手置于身后。
en: Place your other arm anywhere that seems comfortable; most of my students like to leave it out to the side in mid-air, but I personally prefer placing it in the small of my back, as for one-arm pushups.

zh: 哪种姿势都可以，只要不妨碍你做动作就好。
en: Any position that doesn’t interfere is fine.

zh: 将要锻炼的那只手臂（可以通过跳、蹬腿或借助一把椅子等方式）置于半弯曲状态，肘部弯曲成直角，即上臂与地面平行。
en: Set yourself (by jumping, kipping, using a chair, etc.) so that your lifting arm is bent halfway.The elbow should be at a right angle, with your upper arm parallel to the ground.

zh: 双脚离地，脚踝交叠在一起并置于身后。
en: Your feet should be clear of the floor and looped behind you as for previous steps.

zh: 发力的那侧肩部应该收紧，同时全身都要绷紧。
en: The shoulder of your lifting arm should be tightly braced, and your whole body flexed.

zh: 这是单臂半引体向上的起始姿势（图55）。
en: This is the start position of 1/2 one-arm pullups (fig. 55).

zh: 弯曲肘部，夹起肩部，平缓地将自己拉起来，直到下巴高过横杆。
en: Bend at the elbow and shoulder and smoothly pull your body up until your chin is over the height of the bar.

zh: 这是该动作的结束姿势（图56）。
en: This is the finish position (fig. 56).

zh: 在顶部暂停一下，然后慢慢放低身体，回到起始姿势。
en: Pause at the top, before slowly lowering yourself back down to the start position.

zh: 蹬起靠墙成倒立姿势，向一侧略微倾斜，直到仅用单臂支撑身体的全部重量，就像单臂半倒立撑（第八式）中那样。
en: Kick up into a handstand against a wall, and lean out to the side until you are supporting yourself with one arm, as in half one-arm handstand pushups (Step 8).

zh: 脚跟与墙壁接触，身体略微成弓形。
en: Keep your body gently arched with the heels against the wall.

zh: 这是单臂倒立撑的起始姿势（图125）。
en: This is the start position of the one-arm handstand pushup (fig. 125).

zh: 跪在地板上，一只手撑在你前方的地面上。
en: Kneel on the floor, with one palm out on the ground directly in front of you.

zh: 双腿向后蹬直，用脚趾支撑身体。
en: Stretch your legs out behind you, until they are straight and supported by the toes.

zh: 脊柱与髋部成一条直线，支撑身体的手臂在胸部下方伸直——不要在身体侧面或是靠前的位置。
en: Keep the spine and hips aligned, and shift your bodyweight so that your supporting arm goes straight down below your chest—not out to the side or in front of you.

zh: 稳定之后，把不起支撑作用的那只手背在身后。
en: Once you are stable, place your non-supporting hand in the small of your back.

zh: 这是单臂俯卧撑的起始姿势（图19）。
en: This is the start position of the one-arm pushup (fig. 19).

zh: 抓握毛巾的那只手的位置越低，就越难提供助力。
en: The further your hand is down the towel or rope you use, the harder it is to provide assistance.

zh: 如果你不能做5次反复，那就升高抓握毛巾的位置，使其更靠近横杆一点儿。
en: If you have trouble getting five reps on this exercise, hold the towel nearer up to the bar.

zh: 等你变得更强以后，就可以降低抓握毛巾的位置。
en: As you get stronger, hold the towel lower down.

zh: 最后，你会感觉到自己是在向下“推”毛巾，而不是“拉”毛巾，这样你的身体就能在单臂辅助引体向上中变得越来越强，并为练习最终式——单臂引体向上——做好准备。
en: Eventually you will feel you are pushing down on the towel, rather than pulling.This is a great way to advance on assisted one-arm pullups and eventually prepare yourself for the Master Step—one-arm pullups.

zh: 向上跳起，单手以最容易发力的抓握姿势牢牢抓住高过头顶的横杆。
en: Jump up and firmly squeeze an overhead bar using your strongest gripping position.

zh: 双腿离地，双膝弯曲，脚踝交叠在一起并置于身后，以防止腿部摆动。
en: Your legs should be clear of the floor, with your knees bent so that your feet are behind you.Loop one ankle over the other to keep your legs still.

zh: 另一只手可随意放置，舒服即可。（你在练习第八式单臂半引体向上时，应该已经找到了最舒服的姿势）。
en: Place your non-lifting arm in a comfortable position (you should have found your ideal position when you learned Step 8, half one-arm pullups).

zh: 发力的肩部要收紧，同时全身绷紧准备做动作。
en: Your working shoulder should be set tight, and your body tensed for action.

zh: 你将要做的可是高级力量技巧，所以你需要在心理上也做好准备。
en: You are about to perform an advanced strength feat, and this should be reflected in your psychology.

zh: 发力那只手的手臂几乎伸直，但略有弯曲以减少关节的压力。
en: Your working arm should be virtually straight, with just a little kink in it to take the stress of the joints.

zh: 这是单臂引体向上的起始姿势（图59）。
en: This is the start position of the one-arm pullup (fig. 59).

zh: 弯曲肘部，夹起肩部，将自己拉起来，直到下巴高过横杆。在整个动作过程中，尽量少用惯性。
en: Bend at the elbow and shoulder and pull your body up with as little momentum as possible until your chin is over the height of the bar.

zh: 这是该动作的结束姿势（图60）。
en: This is the finish position (fig. 60).

zh: 暂停一下，再缓慢地放低身体，回到起始姿势。
en: Pause, and smoothly lower yourself back down to the start position.

zh: 在最低处暂停一下，再重复动作——如果你行的话！
en: Pause at the bottom and repeat--if you can!

zh: 流感病毒就像一个想要赖在你的沙发椅上借宿的高中同学一样，会使你的生活混乱一些日子后扬长而去。
en: The flu virus, like a high school friend who wants to crash on your couch, makes your life miserable for a few days and then hightails it out of there.

zh: 至于其他像传染性单核细胞增多症，会使你非常累，但你需要更长时间经历其发展过程。
en: Others, like mononucleosis, which makes you extremely tired, take a little longer to run their course.

zh: 还有一些如疱疹病毒，它们会想办法存活下来并且安静地待在你的身体里，但是会偶尔突然发作（就像伤风发热时的疱疹来来去去的反复）。
en: Still others, like the herpesvirus, figure out a way to survive and be quiet within the body but then flare up occasionally (cold sores come and go).

zh: 其他控制内在效度威胁的方式包括安慰剂、单盲及双盲设计。
en: Other ways of controlling threats to internal validity include placebos and blind and doubleblind setups.

zh: 安慰剂（placebo)是用来评估观察到的效果是来自实验处理或心理效果。
en: A placebo is used to evaluate whether the observed effect is produced by the treatment or is a psychological effect.

zh: 通常控制条件是研究对象接受到实验者关注与互动程度一样，只不过采取的实验处理和依变项的表现无关。
en: Frequently, a control condition is used in which participants receive the same attention from and interaction with the experimenter, but the treatment administered does not relate to performance on the dependent variable.

zh: 在单腿半深蹲过程中，直立，只靠一条腿站立，另一条腿向前抬起，伸直或略微弯曲，抬起的脚大约处在另一条腿大腿的高度上，双手向胸前伸出。
en: In the 1/2 one-leg squats, stand straight, with one foot flat on the floor, and the other foot up in the air in front of you.Your elevated foot should be at about the level of your opposite thigh, and the leg should be straight, or nearly so.Place your hands out in front of your chest.

zh: 弯曲髋部和支撑腿的膝盖，直到膝关节几乎弯曲成90°，即大腿几乎与地面平行。
en: Bend the hip and knee of the leg which is supporting your bodyweight, until the knee is bent about ninety degrees.This will put your thigh approximately parallel with the floor.

zh: 在此过程中，抬起的那条腿应该始终在空中。
en: At this point, your raised foot should still be some way off the ground.

zh: 暂停一会，然后单腿发力把自己推回到起始姿势。
en: Pause for a moment under tension, before driving yourself up using the power of your single leg.

zh: 在动作过程中，背部始终要保持平直，而且支撑腿的脚跟始终不能抬离地面。
en: Keep the back flat and the heel of your supporting leg on the floor at all times.

zh: 把篮球放在要练的那条腿的外侧。
en: Place a basketball to the side of the foot of the leg you are planning to work.

zh: 直立，一只脚平放在地面上，另一只脚在你前方抬起——同单腿半深蹲（第八式）的起始姿势。
en: Stand up straight with one foot flat on the floor, and the other foot up in the air in front of you, as for half one-leg squats (Step 8).

zh: 抬起那条腿的同侧手臂向前伸出，另一只手臂自然垂于体侧（图37）。
en: Place the arm corresponding to your raised leg out in front of you, and let your other arm hang by your side (fig. 37).

zh: 然后弯曲髋部和支撑腿的膝盖，直到大腿后侧紧贴小腿，无法继续下蹲为止。
en: Bend at the hip and knee of your supporting leg until your hamstrings meet your calf, and you cannot go any further.

zh: 此时，你的手应该稳稳地放在篮球上，这是单腿辅助深蹲的最低点（图38）。
en: Place your hand firmly on the basketball.This is the finish position of the assisted one-leg squats (fig. 38).

zh: 起身时主要依靠腿部力量，但你也要用手按压篮球，以便在反向动作的最初阶段借力。
en: Return to the standing position using mostly leg strength, but press down on the basketball to help you over the first few inches.

zh: 注意，在动作过程中，支撑腿的脚跟始终不能抬离地面。
en: Keep the heels flat.

zh: 单腿深蹲时，直立，抬起一条腿，直到脚大约与髋部等高，腿要尽量伸直，双臂在胸前前伸。
en: In the one-leg squats, stand tall.Raise one foot in the air, until it is approximately level with your hips.Keep your elevated leg as straight as possible.

zh: 如果你在之前几式上已经花了大量时间，那么这些对你来说不会太难。
en: This will not be too difficult provided you have spent time mastering the previous steps.Place the arms directly out in front of your chest.

zh: 这是该动作的起始姿势。
en: This is the start position.

zh: 然后弯曲髋部与支撑腿的膝盖。
en: Bend at the knee and hip of the supporting leg.

zh: 你应该有控制地放低身体，不要一下蹲到底。
en: Control your descent; do not allow yourself to just drop.

zh: 缓慢地下蹲，直到支撑腿的大腿后侧紧贴小腿，无法继续下蹲为止。
en: Descend smoothly, until the back of the thigh of your supporting leg compresses against the calf and you cannot go any further.

zh: 此时，你的腹部应该与支撑腿的大腿紧贴在一起。
en: Your torso will also be tight against your working thigh.

zh: 这是该动作的最低点。
en: This is the finish position.

zh: 在紧张状态下，暂停一下，然后单腿发力把自己推回到起始姿势。
en: Pause for a count of one, under tension.Push yourself back up to the start position using leg strength alone.

zh: 注意，千万不要借助惯性起身。
en: There should be no momentum at all.

zh: 在动作过程中，背部始终挺直，抬起的腿始终离地，而支撑腿则应稳稳地踩在地上。
en: Retain a straight back, hold the elevated foot off the ground, and keep the heels firmly on the floor.

zh: 到达动作最高点时暂停一下，然后再下蹲。
en: Pause at the top, and repeat.

zh: 并非只有“胆结石”和“滚石”乐队这两种“石”会影响我们的生活。
en: Gallstones and the Rolling Stones aren't the only stones that can change your life.

zh: 还有一种“石”会让你痛得昏过去，像橄榄球运动员被对手在肚子上猛顶一下一样。
en: The other is the one that'll make you keel over like a rugby player who's been kneed in the groin.

zh: 尿液含水量过少，会形成小晶体，接着晶体会聚集形成结石，即肾结石。患者在排尿时，背部下侧和腰侧都会剧痛。
en: Kidney stones form when urine becomes so concentrated that small crystals and then stones are formed—creating intense pain in your lower back and side and when you urinate.

zh: 肾结石的主要防治方法是把自己的身体当成一个空的游泳池，将池子装满水，让水冲出来，通过用水稀释结晶体的方法来防止其进一步形成结石。
en: The main method of prevention is to treat your body like an empty swimming pool and flood it with water to flush it out, which inhibits the formation of the crystals by diluting them with water.

zh: 食道与胃部的相接角度很小，以减轻反胃现象，但是一旦相接处被打开（交角增大），我们就会由于胃食道反流而产生胃部灼热和消化不良。
en: The esophagus makes a sharp angle as it enters the stomach to reduce this regurgitation, but if the junction is opened (the angle is reduced), we get burning and indigestion from GERD (gastroesophageal reflux disorder).

zh: 胆囊储存着胆汁，当食物团通过胃部的时候，胆汁就会分泌到小肠里。
en: The gallbladder stores bile, which can be secreted into the small bowel once the food bolus has passed through the stomach.

zh: 有时，储存的胆汁会硬化，形成胆结石，人会感觉很疼。
en: The stored bile can harden and form painful gallstones.

zh: 弹震式俯卧撑也就是众所周知的击掌俯卧撑，是一种爆发力练习。
en: The plyometric pushup is also known as clapping pushup.This is the standard pushup, but done explosively.

zh: 动作过程中身体始终要挺直，快速下降到最低点后再用力将自己推起，当动作达到最高点时让手掌暂时离地。
en: Keeping the body ramrod stiff, descend quickly into the bottom position before driving up so hard that the hands leave the floor briefly.

zh: 在半空中快速击掌，然后让手掌着地，反复练习。
en: While in mid-air, clap the hands together in the split second before your palms meet the floor again and then repeat the exercise.

zh: 你将自己推起的力量越大，身体就抬得越高，用于击掌的时间也就越长。
en: The more powerfully you push, the further away you’ll be able to get from the floor, and the more times you’ll be able to quickly clap before coming back down.

zh: 许多人都能击掌三次，甚至四次。
en: Many guys are able to do triple or even quadruple claps.

zh: 最难的是单臂击掌俯卧撑，只用单臂推起身体，然后击掌。
en: An extremely difficult version is the one-arm clapping pushup, where you push up with just one arm before clapping.

zh: 击掌俯卧撑可以提高你的速度，你可以将其用作健身计划的补充，偶尔为之。
en: Clapping pushups add speed and are an excellent addition to your routine, once in a while.

zh: 但是击掌俯卧撑很容易让训练者受伤，所以你不要急于尝试这个动作——至少要等到攻克了偏重俯卧撑之后。
en: They can lead to injury.However, so work into them slowly and don’t even attempt them until you have at least mastered uneven pushups.

zh: 在健身房里，练习弹震式跳跃的健身者通常会使用稳固的平台来练习“跳箱子”——从固定站姿开始，跳到一个盒子上。
en: Plyometric trainees in gyms often use sturdy platforms for box jumps, which involve hopping up onto a box from a fixed stance.

zh: 但事实上，弹震式跳跃不需要任何器械。
en: You really don’t require any equipment to do plyometric jumping though.

zh: 在圣昆汀监狱，我的第一个室友教给我一种运动——立定跳远，这是他从军时学到的。
en: In San Quentin my first cellmate taught me a technique he learned in the military called dead leaps.

zh: 只需双脚并拢，快速下蹲，然后尽力向远处跳，落地时双脚依然保持并拢，而且身体不能向前倾倒，否则就算失败。
en: Just place your feet together and dip quickly, before jumping forward as far as you can.Keep your feet together as you land, and try not to topple forwards or the jump doesn’t count.

zh: 这个动作做起来比看上去要难，因为通常情况下，我们都要跑一段——至少跑一两步，然后才会起跳。
en: This is actually harder than it looks, as people normally take a run-up—at least a step or two—before they jump anywhere.

zh: 用跳跃练习增强爆发力时，要强调力量，而不是次数。热身之后，反复做2-3组，每组4-6次，就足够了。
en: When jumping for explosiveness, emphasize power rather than high reps. Warm up, and repeat the jumps for two or three sets of four to six reps—that’s all you need.

zh: 倒立臂屈伸是经典的上身力量特技，深受旧时大力士的喜爱，因为它既可以展示极好的平衡能力与协调性，又可以展示强悍的力量。
en: The tiger bend is a classic upper body feat favored by the old-time strongmen because it displays balance and coordination as well as enormous strength.

zh: 先成自由倒立姿势，不要凭借墙。
en: Get into a free handstand, away from the wall.

zh: 放低身体，直到前臂完全贴在地上，保持一会儿。
en: Drop down flat onto your forearms, and hold for a moment.

zh: 这时，你的双臂就像大型猫科动物的前爪一样，因此该动作也被称作“虎立”（见下图）。
en: In this position your arms will resemble the forepaws of a big cat—hence the name (see photo next page).

zh: 应该借助肌肉力量完成引体向上，而不是惯性。
en: Pullup movements should be performed using muscle strength rather than momentum.

zh: 但是肌肉缺乏力量的人在做引体向上时会不自觉地向上抬膝盖，以获得惯性来完成动作。这种作弊技巧有专门的名称——蹬腿。
en: But if you lack the strength, you’ll tend to kick upwards with your knees to give you the momentum to complete a rep. There’s a special name for this kind of cheating technique—kipping.

zh: 蹬箱选择一个 40 厘米或者 50 厘米高的箱子。
en: Box Step-up Use a 16- or 20-inch box.

zh: 面对箱子站立，注意使用核心力量蹬上箱子。
en: Face the box, engage your core, and step up onto the box.

zh: 保证双脚向前——不要向鸭子一样外八字。
en: Make sure your foot remains neutral throughout—don’t allow it to spin outward, ducklike.

zh: 使用臀部发力蹬上，然后回到地面。
en: Use your hips to drive yourself up on top of the box, and return.

zh: 实验室试验 -等动单关节试验：跨越单个关节（如膝关节或肘关节）的动作可以采用控制动作的力（动力性）或动作的速度（等动的）的测功器来测试。
en: LABORATORY TESTS - Isokinetic monoarticular tests: Movement across a single joint (e.g.knee or elbow) can be measured with ergometers which control the force of movement (dynamic) or the velocity of movement (isokinetic).

zh: 儿童的数据很少。
en: Few data are available for children.

zh: 等动试验的目的是测量最大力矩和平均功率。
en: The aim of isokinetic testing is the measurement of peak torque and mean power.

zh: 20s等动自行车功率计试验。
en: 20-s isokinetic cycling test.

zh: 前面提到过，只有外在负荷接近活动肌肉的能力时，才能测试到真正的最大功率输出，这时的肌肉是在它们最佳的速度下活动。
en: As mentioned earlier, true maximal power output can only be measured if the external load is closely matched to the capability of the active muscles so that they are functioning at their optimal velocity.

zh: 如在摩擦力负荷的功率自行车上（温盖特试验或力-速度试验）或在冲刺跑（跑楼梯）时所达到的那样，在自由加速度或减速度中，这些条件是很难满足的。
en: In freely accelerating or decelerating velocity, as achieved in friction—loaded cycle ergometers (Wingate test or force-velocity test) or running sprints (staircase running) these conditions are hard to fulfil.

zh: 自从正确追踪有生物学活性激素的较新的第三代LH检测法得到应用以来，人们发现在青春发育期的所有阶段都有促黄体生成激素（luteinizing hormone, LH)的脉冲释放。
en: Pulsatile release of luteinizing hormone (LH) is found at all stages of pubertal development, especially since the newer, third generation LH assays that faithfully track biologically active hormone have been used.

zh: 应用这些测定技术，真正的脉冲性LH(和FSH)的释放能够在青春期前(阶段I)和青春期早期的儿童中测试到。
en: With these assays truly pulsatile LH (and FSH) release can be detected in prepubertal (stage I) as well as early pubertal children.

zh: 这样，可以将激素分泌正常与患永久性低促性腺激素性腺机能低下症（permanent hypogonadotrophic hypogonadism)的儿童 加以区别（Haavisto et al.，1990)。
en: Such secretion could be distinguished from that in children with permanent hypogonadotrophic hypogonadism (Haavisto et al., 1990).

zh: 相反，在十几岁的运动员中，特别是女孩中铁蛋白水平下降的出现频率高得令人惊奇。
en: Conversely, the frequency of depressed ferritin levels among teenage athletes, most particularly females, is surprisingly high.

zh: 正如对高中运动员的研究表明 (表19.1),有1/3-1/2的女孩有低铁蛋白血症。
en: As outlined in Table 19 .1, studies of high school athletes indicate that approximately one-third to one-half of girls can be expected to have hypoferritinaemia.

zh: 对男性运动员的铁状况的检测尚不普遍，但已有的数据表明，低铁蛋白水平的发生率较低（0-17%)
en: Iron status in males has not been frequently assessed, but available data indicate a much lower incidence of low ferritin levels (0 -17% ).

zh: 当然，为青少年糖尿病患者选择运动活动时，需要了解健康儿童对运动的适应过程以及患糖尿病时发生的变化。
en: However, the choice of sporting activities for the young diabetic requires an understanding of the adaptation to physical activity in the healthy child and the changes caused by diabetes.

zh: 为使糖尿病儿童达到非糖尿病患者同样的运动水平，使肌肉活动在葡萄糖同化方面最有利，必须进行充分的胰岛素治疗。
en: Adequate insulin therapy is required to allow the full benefit of muscular activity on glucose assimilation for the child to reach the same level of physical performance as the non-diabetic.

zh: 如果代谢控制不足，运动能引起严重低血糖发作或产生高血糖并 导致酮酸中毒。
en: In the case of insufficient metabolic control, exercise can provoke severe hypoglycaemia episodes or produce hyperglycaemia and lead to ketoacidosis.

zh: 对于贝类动物过敏的人同时也会对医学检测的某些染色剂过敏 。
en: People allergic to shellfish are also allergic to some dyes used in medical testing.

zh: 这两者都含有的有害物质是碘。
en: The harmful ingredient: the iodine found in both.

zh: 这也就是为什么医生会在就诊中问你是否对贝类过敏。
en: That's why doctors often ask this question on screening questionnaires.

zh: 如果这两个计划中有任何你觉得困难的动作，那么请调整动作难度，保证可以安全完成练习。
en: If any exercise in either program feels out of reach, scale back the movement to something you can safely perform.

zh: 一个很好的办法是降低练习的强度，如减小阻力、减少总次数或者减少每组的重复次数。
en: A good way to do this is to reduce the intensity of the exercise by lowering the resistance or else dropping down the number of reps or the amount of time for which each exercise is to be repeated.

zh: 举例来说，引体向上的推荐代替动作是仰卧吊环划船：将一副体操吊环调整至接近地面的高度，仰卧并拉起身体视为完成一次动作。
en: For example, a recommended substitution for a pull-up is the supine ring row: Using a pair of gymnastics rings lowered to near the floor, lie on your back and pull yourself up for a count of 1.

zh: 不同于哲学论证，运动表现领域的问题至少是潜在的符合实验研究方法的。
en: Unlike the philosophical arguments, the question in the realm of athletic performance is at least potentially amenable to an experimental approach.

zh: 这本书后面的部分研究了这些调査。
en: The latter pages of this book examine some of these investigations.

zh: 即使天赋是基本的推动力，随着机体衰老对运动表现的影响，运动员能够使用认知策略来征服或克服生物因素限制，由他们自己来直接控制吗？
en: Even when nature is clearly a basic driving force—as in the effects of aging on performance—can athletes use cognitive strategies to subdue or overcome limits placed by biological factors that are out of their direct control?

zh: 这样做是安全的吗？
en: Is it safe to do so?

zh: 我现在认为最后三章中有8个问题没有任何明确答案。
en: I now count eight questions in the last three paragraphs without any obvious answers.

zh: 对于一些人来说，我也许像个偏执狂，但是总有人能理解我探寻 跑步艺术的热情和不断进取的精神，布菜恩• 麦肯齐就是其中之一。
en: To some people I might seem obsessive, but there are others who share my passion for understanding the act of running and for constantly seeking to improve.Brian MacKenzie is one of these.

zh: 对于全球新一代参与混合健身和混合健身耐力训练的跑者，麦肯齐可谓是天赐之人。
en: For a new generation of runners around the world who have taken up CrossFit and CrossFit Endurance, Brian has been a godsend.

zh: 麦肯齐对于跑步训练知识的渴求是从他自己的“逐龙” 之旅开始的，这条龙正是长距离耐力比赛。
en: His hunger for knowledge has been insatiable since he himself started “chasing the dragon,” as he likes to call the beast that is long-course endurance racing.

zh: 不论是参加超级马拉松比赛还是铁人三项比赛，麦肯齐一直热衷于不断更新训练计划，包括调整饮食计划、选择极简跑鞋和采用力量调节训练提高运动水平并避免受伤。
en: Whether he’s competing in ultramarathons or Ironman triathlons, Brian has feverishly tinkered with the many variables that go into the craft, from diet to minimalist footwear to the use of strength conditioning as a way both to improve performance and to ward off injury.

zh: 平躺在地上，弯曲膝盖，把脚拉向臀部，直到脚跟与臀部相距约15到20厘米。
en: Lie with your back on the floor.Draw your feet in, bending the knees until your heels are approximately six to eight inches from your glutes.

zh: 双脚与肩同宽或略窄，双手撑在头部两侧的地板上，手指指向脚，两肘指向天花板。
en: The feet should be shoulder width apart or slightly closer.Place the hands alongside the head, with the palms flat on the floor and your fingers pointing towards your toes.Your elbows should be angled towards the ceiling at this point.

zh: 尽力抬起髋部，使身体离地。
en: Now push the hips as high as you can, lifting the body from the floor.

zh: 手臂与腿继续用力推，直到背部形成优美的弧形，髋部高高抬起。
en: Continue pushing through your arms and legs until your back is well arched, and your hips are high.

zh: 头向下仰，头顶指向地板，这是“桥式”。
en: The head should be tilted down, with the crown of your skull pointing towards the floor.This is a bridge hold.

zh: 保持这个姿势一会儿，然后弯曲手臂与双腿，直到头部轻轻接触地板。
en: Retain this position momentarily, before bending at the arms and legs until the top of your skull very gently touches the floor.

zh: 这是该动作的起始姿势（图89）。
en: This is the start position of head bridges (fig. 89).

zh: 再次暂停一会，然后将背部向上推起成“桥式”。这是该顶桥的结束姿势（图90）。
en: Pause again briefly, before pushing yourself back up to the bridge (fig. 90).This is the finish position.

zh: 运动过程中要小心，以免撞到头部。
en: Go carefully, so that you don’t bang your head.

zh: 在整个练习组中，背部始终要保持弧形，并且尽量正常呼吸。
en: Maintain the deep arch in the back all the way throughout the set, breathing as normally as possible all the way through.

zh: 完成训练目标之后，慢慢地放低肩部、背部和髋部，直至整个身体接触地面。
en: When you have finished all your reps, smoothly lower your shoulders, back and hips to the floor.

zh: 你实际上有两种类型的汗腺，它们能产生看起来和摸起来类似汗液的物质。
en: You actually have two types of sweat glands that produce stuff that looks and feels like sweat.

zh: 大多数分泌出来的液体都对身体有益，并能起到排出身体毒素的作用。
en: Most of this secreted fluid serves a beneficial purpose by helping to flush toxins out of your body.

zh: 这两种汗腺中只有顶质分泌腺才分泌出臭味，这种气味成为我们的身份识别的一部分，它能吸引异性，还会让你为逃避汗臭宁愿选择在健身馆另一头的脚踏车。
en: It's only the apocrine sweat gland that secretes the odor—the smell that produces part of our identity, attracts mates, and makes you pick the treadmill at the other end of the gym.

zh: 人们已经了解清楚的是，儿童在生长和发育时他们的运动能力提高了。
en: It is clear that as children grow and develop their performance capabilities improve.

zh: 人们还不十分了解的是，这种提高在多大程度上是由身材大小的增大还是由相关组织结构的性质及其分布的变化引起的。
en: What is less clear is the extent to which these improvements are attributable to increases in size or to qualitative changes in the distribution and properties of associated tissues and structures.

zh: 为了评估这种性质上的变化，身材大小的差异必须分割出来，这种分割称为定标。
en: To assess qualitative changes, differences in size have to be partitioned out and this partitioning is called scaling (Schmidt-Nielsen, 1984).

zh: 几年来，人们依据计算步数或动作的原理开发了若干电子装置。
en: Over the years several electronic devices have been developed based on the principle of counting steps or motion.

zh: 虽然其中某些装置比其他的可靠，但是它们都没有考虑到动作的强度问题，因此不能很好地反映各种用力和能量消耗量。
en: Although some of them are more reliable than others, they all do not take intensity of the movement into account and thus do not reflect the forces and energy turnover well.

zh: 这类动作计数器给出的是动作的总数，而不能区别动作的强度。
en: These types of movement counters yield a total number of movements and do not make distinctions between the intensity of the movements.

zh: 此外，特殊的动作如骑车，计数器就无法使用。
各种便携式加速度测量仪 (accelerometer)能够较好反映每天的体力活动情况，加速度测量仪也叫动作记录仪 (actometer)。
en: A better reflection of daily physical activity is given by portable accelerometers also called actometer.

zh: 当一个人移动时，肢体和身体都在加速和减速。
en: When a person moves, the limbs and body are accelerated and decelerated.

zh: 在呼吸仓内用测力台进行的检测表明，加速度测量仪的结果与能量消耗量非常一致。
en: Measurements with force—platform in a respiration chamber showed good agreement with energy turnover.

zh: 与热习服相反，人体对冷环境的适应是有限的（Young, 1988)，适应主要表现在增加暴露在外的肢体皮肤的血流量(Krog et al., 1960)。
en: In contrast to heat acclimation, there appears to be only limited adaptation to cold (Young, 1988), which is mainly characterized by an elevated skin blood flow to frequently exposed extremities (Krog et al., i960).

zh: 这种适应能够帮助成年人预防冻疮，但对儿童是否有效还没 有研究过。
en: This adaptation, which may help to prevent frostbite, has been demonstrated in adults but has not been studied in children.

zh: 增强身体素质可以降低发生热损伤的危险，但对于预防冷损伤并无作用 (Adams & Heberling, 1958)。
en: Elevated physical fitness reduces the risk of heat injuries but does not appear to prevent cold injuries (Adams & Heberling, 1958).

zh: 确实，训练有素的人通常皮下脂肪层很薄，因此更容易发生冷损伤。
en: Indeed, well-trained individuals are usually characterized by a thin layer of subcutaneous fat and may therefore be more susceptible to cold injuries.

zh: 躺在地上，双手叠放在腹部。
en: Lie on your back, with your legs stretched out and your hands crossed on your stomach.

zh: 膝盖弯曲，将双脚拉向臀部，直到胫骨与地面接近垂直，此时脚跟距离臀部约15一20厘米，脚掌平放在地上。
en: Draw your feet in, bending the knees until your shins are nearly parallel to the ground and your feet your feet are flat on the floor.

zh: 双脚与肩同宽或略窄，依个人舒适度而定。
en: The feet should be shoulder width apart or a little less, depending upon your frame.Your heels will be around six to eight inches from your buttocks.

zh: 这是短桥的起始姿势（图83）。
en: This is the start position of short bridges (fig.83).

zh: 然后双脚用力下压，身体向上拱起，使髋部和背部离开地面，直到仅以双肩和双脚支撑整个身体。
en: Press down through the feet, lifting the hips and back clear of the ground until only the shoulders and feet are supporting the bodyweight.

zh: 此时，大腿和躯干应成一条直线，髋部不要下沉。
en: At this point, your thighs, trunk and torso should form a straight line, with no sagging of the hips.

zh: 这是结束姿势（图84）。
en: This is the finish position (fig. 84).

zh: 暂停一会，然后做反向动作，缓缓地放低身体，直到回到起始姿势，如此重复。
en: Pause in the top position for a moment, before reversing the motion, lowering your body back to the start position.

zh: 身体撑起时呼气身体放低时吸气。
en: Repeat the exercise for your target repetitions, exhaling as you go up, inhaling on the way down.

zh: 一场风暴会中断电力供应长达数分钟或更久，同样地，一次中风也会造成或轻或重的伤害。
en: Just like a storm can knock out power for a few minutes or indefinitely, a stroke can do the same, and have varying degrees of damage.

zh: 比如，短暂性局部缺血 (T1A)是一种轻度中风，在这种情况下， 动脉血管堵塞只会持续很短时间。
en: A transient ischemic attack (TIA), for example, is a ministroke in which the arteries are blocked only a short time.

zh: TIA实际上是真正中风发作的前兆（虽然T1A 较易治愈）。
en: A TIA is actually a precursor to a full stroke (though it's more easily treated).

zh: 对数线性模式(loglinear models) 通常用在分析多因子列联表上,将相对次数转换成对数的形式后相加,与单因子变异数分析中的平方和类似。
en: Loglinear models are used to analyze multivariate contingency tables.Relative frequencies are transformed to logarithms, which are additive and similar to the sum of squares in ANOVA.

zh: 并透过检定的方式来检定主要效果和交互作用的效果。
en: Main effects and interactions can be tested for significance.

zh: 并以对数比的基础所建构的罗吉斯回归方程式来预测每笔资料的机率(又称逻辑回归）。
en: The probability of membership in a particular category can be predicted as a function of membership in other categories using a logistic regression equation based on the logarithmic odds of member­ ship (called a logit).

zh: 对训练作用的研究通常是纵向的并且需要反复的测试。
en: Studies which investigate the effects of training are usually longitudinal and have a repeated measures design.

zh: 当研究对象是儿童和青少年时，生长和发育对运动能力的影响必须予以分开，这样才能对训练的影响进行评估。
en: When children and adolescents are the subjects, the effects of growth and development on performance have to be disentangled so that the effects of training can be assessed.

zh: 有一种技术可以满足这一需求，它就是多级回归模型的方法（multilevel regression modelling procedure) (Goldstein, 1986)。它曾经被用来研究优秀正常儿童和青少年运动员的心肺功能的变化（Baxter-Jones et al., 1993)，所采用的是多级模型项目 (Multilevel Models Project) ML3的分析程序（Prosser et al., 1990)。
en: A technique has been developed to meet this challenge.It is a multilevel regression modelling procedure (Goldstein, 1986) and it has been used to explore changes in cardiopulmonary function in élite standard child and adolescent athletes (Baxter-Jones et al., 1993) via the analysis program Multilevel Models Project ML3 (Prosser et ah, 1990).

zh: 它们似乎降低血液中甘油三酯水平（高水平导致动脉斑块形成），稳定心跳（重新调整不规则节律），使血小板减少粘性（减少凝血），并可能降低血压（如果你不喜欢鱼或鱼油，DHA支持）。一天一次吃一次鱼会降低心脏病发作的风险，其中一半的最好的鱼（那些最少的汞和多氯联苯[多氯联苯]）是野生的，钓到鲑鱼（几乎所有罐装的SA）。健康的鲑鱼，鲶鱼，鲽鱼（脚掌），和白鲑。
en: They appear to reduce triglyceride levels in the blood (high levels cause plaque buildup in the arteries), stabilize the heartbeat (re¬ducing irregular rhythms), make platelets less sticky (reducing clotting), and may bring down blood pressure as well (If you do not like fish or fish oils, DHA supple¬ments [600 milligrams a day] or echium oil may do the same thing.) Some studies have suggested that eating fish once a week cuts your risk of heart attack in half.The best fish (those with the least mercury and PCBs [polychlorinated biphenyl]) are wild, line-caught salmon (almost all canned salmon is wild, healthful salmon), mahi mahi，catfish, flounder (sole), and whitefish.

zh: 多元回归包含一个依变项（通常是某类别的效标）以及两个以上的预测变项（自变项）。
en: Multiple regression involves one dependent variable (usually a criterion of some sort) and two or more predictor variables (independent variables).

zh: 使用超过一个预测变项时，通常会增加预测的准确性，这应该是不证自明的。
en: The use of more than one predictor variable usually increases the accuracy of prediction.

zh: 如果欲预测PGA巡回赛的平均分数，应采用多种显示球员技术的方式（如：开球距离、上果岭成功率和平均推杆数）而非单一方式，这样可以获得更准确的预测。
en: This should be self-evident.If you wished to predict scoring average on the PGA Tour, you would expect to get a more accurate prediction by using several skill results (e.g., driving distance, greens in regulation, putts per round) rather than by using only one.

zh: 俄式转体就是坐在罗马椅上，或者采用其他姿势，只要能让躯干在没有任何支撑的情况下向后仰就好。
en: When doing Russian Twists, get into a Roman chair, or any position where your torso is horizontal and free of support.

zh: 双手在身体前方拿着一个重物——健身房里的很多家伙都使用20千克重的杠铃片，但在监狱里大家喜欢厚厚的书或是水瓶——然后慢慢向后倾斜躯干。
en: Grab a weight—in the gym a lot of guys use a 45 lbs.plate, but in the pen we liked a heavy book or water bottle in each hand—and incline your trunk slightly.

zh: 伸直手臂，然后从左向右扭转身体双臂的动作幅度无需过大——大约从10点钟的位置移到2点钟的位置，同时腰部也要随之转动。
en: Hold the weight at arm’s length, and twist from left to right.Your arms (and therefore your waist rotation) only need to go from about the ten o’ clock to the two o’ clock position.

zh: 如果你腹部两侧的肌肉开始疯狂燃烧，那就说明你的动作是对的。
en: You’ll know when you get this movement right, because the muscles to the sides of your abs will start to burn like crazy.

zh: 你很难增加该练习的难度，但这是一种很有趣的变式，可以偶尔将其加入你的训练计划。
en: It’s hard to make this exercise progressive, but it’s a fun variation to throw into your workouts once in a while.

zh: 这只左耳只有外部软骨，骨头受伤，就造成了花菜耳（因重复性重右而肿胀变形的耳朵）。
en: This left ear has external cartilage without bone that has been injured, causing cauliflower ear.

zh: 声波进人耳朵，震动鼓膜和三个相连的小骨。
en: The sound waves entering the ear vibrate both the eardrum and three attached small bones.

zh: 最后一根小骨将过滤后的声波传至耳蜗管。听觉神经会在此将信息转化成电流脉冲传达到大脑。
en: The last bone passes a filtered sound wave into the cochlear duct, where hair cells and your acoustic nerve convert the information to electrical impulses for the brain.

zh: 内耳的半规管有回转仪的作用，使我们保持平衡。
en: The semicircular conals work like a gyroscope to keep us balanced.

zh: 常见的瓣膜问题是二尖瓣脱垂。补充一句，“二尖瓣”（mitral）这个词源自“主教冠”（miter),它是主教戴的帽子，有两个尖。
en: The most common valve problem is mitral valve prolapse (the name “mitral” by the way, comes from miter, the two-leaved hat worn by popes), in which the valve between the left atrium and left ventricle doesn't slam closed fully just like in Figure

zh: 如图2.3所示，位于左心房和左心室之间的瓣膜不能正常闭合。
肌肉工作时骤然动用有氧和无氧代谢途径来补充肌肉做功时消耗的高能磷酸化合物，会导致细胞内二氧化碳生成的增加。
en: The sudden activation of aerobic and anaerobic metabolic pathways to replenish high-energy phosphates consumed as muscles do physical work is accompanied by increased cellular carbon dioxide (C02) production.

zh: 肌肉之所以能够工作是由于细胞内存在着精细的缓冲系统、底物代谢系统、氧气和二氧化碳的传输系统。
en: Muscular work is possible because of elaborate systems of intracellular buffering, regulation of substrate metabolism, and oxygen (02) and C02 transport.

zh: 在细胞水平上的能量代谢与呼吸和心脏功能之间的联系途径目前还不完全清楚。
en: The ways in which energy metabolism at the cellular level is linked to respiratory and cardiac function are not yet fully understood.

zh: 心脏里的窦房结和房室结快速接触时导电，控制着心脏跳动的节奏。这个电路系统，特别是肺静脉，会因心房其他部位和心血管系统的细胞反常“短路”。
en: The SA node rules your heart rhythm with quick conduction to the AV node; that electrical system can be shorted out by rogue cells from other parts of the atrium and cardiovascular system, especially the pulmonary veins.

zh: 其结果是心节律失常，比如纤维性颤动。
en: The effect: irregular beats, like atrial fibrillation.

zh: 另外一种心律失常是房性早搏(premature atrial contraction)。
en: Another dysrhythmia is the premature atrial contraction.

zh: 房性早搏是非常常见的，是心房中孤立的兴奋灶引发的过早的心房收缩。
en: This dysrhythmia is very common and results from a separate focus in the atrium initiating a premature atrial beat or contraction.

zh: 房性早搏在心电图上是很容易进行辨别的，它是良性的早搏,不需要进一步的检查，不需要限制运动。
en: This dysrhythmia is easily discernible on ECG, is benign and requires no further evaluation or activity restriction.

zh: 卡明斯基和劳夫报告了他们对100名10~14岁参加过体育竞赛的青少年所做的一项调查。
en: Kaminski and Ruoff (1979) reported an investigation on 100 10-14-year-old child participants in competitive sport.

zh: 他们将其生活方式和学习成绩同那些未参加体育运动但在年龄、性别、智力、社会地位、家庭成员和学校类型相一致的青少年进行了对比。
en: Their lifestyle and academic achievements were compared with those of non-participants in sport matched according to age, sex, intelligence, social status, members of family and type of school.

zh: 结果发现，尽管这些学生运动员积极参与体育活动，并对此花了很长时间，但是他们的学习成绩与其他学生并无差别。
en: Despite their very intensive involvement in sporting activities and long time spent in sport preparation, the student athletes did not differ from the other children in school achievements.

zh: 近日对阿司匹林所做的调查表明，阿司匹林能降低中风的发生几率。坚持服用阿司匹林（及其他非类固醇类抗炎药物，如布洛芬）也能减少痴呆症和阿尔茨海默病的发病几率，这可能是因为阿司匹林能保持动脉年轻。但是，不要在同一天内服用布洛芬和阿司匹林。
en: Recent studies on aspirin show a decrease in strokes, and the sustained use of aspirin (and other nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory medications, like ibuprofen) also reduces the incidence of dementia and Alzheimer's disease, presumably because it keeps the arteries young* But don't take both ibuprofen and aspirin on the same day.

zh: 简单来说，这是因为非类固醇类抗炎药会占住血管中的特定位置，阿司匹林就无法发挥效能，两者会互相抵消对方的动脉抗衰老的功效。
en: In essence, the nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory occupies the site in the blood vessels and doesn't let aspirin do its work.They cancel out each other’s effects on decreasing the aging of your arteries.

zh: 在急性损伤和手术后即刻，儿童和青少年可能需要使用药物来控制疼痛，用什么药以及用多大剂量取决于损伤的严重程度。
en: Immediately following an acute injury or an operative procedure, children and adolescents may require pain medication.The type and dosage of the medication depend on the severity of the injury.

zh: 儿童在单纯骨折时仅需服用一天左右的扑热息痛。
en: Young children with simple fractures rarely require medication other than a day or so of acetaminophen.

zh: 年龄稍大的儿童若发生伴有明显肿胀的严重损伤，可以服用非甾体类抗炎药，如布洛芬，奈普生，托美汀硫酸盐等。
en: Older children and teenagers with more severe injuries accompanied by marked swelling often benefit from non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) such as ibuprofen, naproxyn or tolmetin sulphate.

zh: 肺癌是一种对两性来说都最为普遍的致死的病因。它的发生大部分是由于吸烟引起的（虽然不是所有的肺癌都是如此）。
en: Lung cancer—the most common lethal cancer in both men and women—is overwhelmingly caused by cigarette smoke (though not all lung cancer is).

zh: 超过95%的患肺癌的人曾经吸过烟或者接触过大量的二手烟、氡、石棉。
en: More than 95 percent of people with lung cancer have smoked or been exposed to heavy doses of secondhand smoke, radon, or asbestos.

zh: 分泌这个词通常会让你想到脓、黏液和血。
en: Normally, the word secretion makes you think of things like pus, mucus, and blood.

zh: 他们当然不会像莫奈的画那么好看，但是分泌没有理由必须得跟那些属于恐怖电影或是身体组织的东西联系起来。
en: They’re certainly not Monet-worthy images, but there’s no reason why secretion has to be associated only with things that belong in horror movies or in a tissue.

zh: 原因是你的体内充满了各种器官、腺体，它们分泌出你全身的物质、营养以及激素。
en: That's because you are full of organs and glands that secrete substances, nutrients, and hormones all through your body.

zh: 几乎人人都尝试过这个伟大的热身练习。
en: Almost everybody has tried this great warm up exercise.

zh: 手臂向两侧伸展，然后开始画圈。
en: Simply hold your arms out to the side and begin to make circles.

zh: 风车是动态的，而且所需的柔韧性也比一般人所想的更大，所以你不要一开始就疯狂摇摆，否则可能扭伤那些还没有热起来的肌肉。
en: The windmill is dynamic and requires more flexibility than most people realize, so don’t just start wildly swinging or you might tweak cold muscles.

zh: 这种出于好意却很危险的进攻称作自体免疫反应。
en: This dangerous friendly fire is called an autoimmune response.

zh: 结果它不仅杀死了外来入侵者，也会消灭你的身体赖以正常工作的细胞。
en: So not only will it kill the foreign substance, but it will also kill the cells you need to function properly.

zh: 最糟的结果是它会导致器官瘫痪，也会导致其他自体免疫疾病，如狼疮、肠炎综合征、风湿性关节炎。
en: In worst cases, that can lead to organ failure, but it can also lead to other autoimmune diseases such as lupus, inflammatory bowel syndrome, and rheumatoid arthritis.

zh: 你往往会假定满足使用母数考验应具备的三个条件,而这样的假定可以藉由偏态(skewness)和峰度(kurtosis)的估计值来检验。
en: You frequently assume that the three criteria for use of parametric statistics are met.The assumptions can be tested by using estimates of skewness and kurtosis.

zh: (此处只解释这些检验的意义,任何基础统计教科书都会提供更详尽的说明。关于偏态和峰度的进一步讨论，请参考 Newell and Hancock, 1984) 。
en: (Only the meaning of these tests is explained here. Any basic statistics textbook provides considerably more detail. For a helpful discussion on skewness and kurtosis, see Newell and Hancock, 1984.)

zh: 佛雷堡氏不全骨折（Freiberg’s infraction)又称跖骨头无菌性坏死，是因反复创伤引起的一种缺血性跖骨骨骺坏死。
en: Freiberg's infraction is an avascular necrosis of the metatarsal epiphysis which may result from repeated trauma.

zh: 骨骺分离及跖趾关节继发性退行性变常与本病有关（Murray, 1991)。
en: Separation of the epiphysis as well as secondary degenerative changes in the metatarsophalageal joint are often associated with this injury (Murray, 1991).

zh: 本病常表现为前足疼痛，特别是负重时疼痛加重。
en: Pain is usually present in the forefoot and is particularly aggravated by weight bearing.

zh: 儿童和青春期的跑步运动员因其足部反复负重受压，为本病的高发人群，常受累的是第二跖骨。
en: Children and adolescent runners are at greatest risk due to the repetitive nature and forces or pressures involved in the activity.Most often, the infraction affects the second metatarsal epiphysis.

zh: 在计算鉴别度指标时，高分组与低分组的人数比例有几种常用的百分比，例如25、30、或33%。
en: Various percentages of high and low scorers, such as the upper and lower 25, 30, or 33%, are used in determining discrimination indices.

zh: 福乐兰根法则采用最高与最低的27%。
en: The Flanagan method uses the upper and lower 27%.

zh: 算出每组的答对比例后，使用常态化的二分系数表来换算信度系数。
en: The proportion of each group answering each item correctly is calculated; then a table of normalized biserial coefficients is consulted to obtain the item reliability coefficient.

zh: 因此，项目信度是指每一题的回答与测验总表现之间的关联。
en: Thus, item reliability is the relationship between responses to each item and total performance on the test.

zh: 20世纪70年代，俯冲轰炸机在美国海军陆战队中非常流行。
en: Divebomber Pushups  used to be popular in the Marine corps, back in the 70s.

zh: 它与折刀俯卧撑类似，只不过在回到起始姿势的过程中，双臂要弯曲（折刀俯卧撑是髋部向下移动时弯曲手臂，但是向上后退时双臂需要始终伸直）。
en: They are similar to jackknife pushups, except you bend your arms on the way back to the start position (in jackknife pushups, bend your arms as the hips move down, but you keep your arms straight when they go back up).

zh: 第二次弯曲手臂能够让上肢更多地参与到动作当中，却影响了增强身体柔韧性的效果。
en: Bending the arms a second time increases upper arm involvement, but lessens the effectiveness of the exercise as a flexibility movement.

zh: 在动作最高点保持片刻，然后有控制地放低双脚。
en: Hold the position at the top briefly, before allowing your feet to descend under control.

zh: 多次重复练习。我发现，大的沙发式扶手椅非常适合练习俯卧抬腿。横趴在椅子上，髋部在一侧的扶手上，胸部则在另一侧的扶手上。可以向下伸手抓住椅子以帮助稳定身体。
en: Repeat for high reps. I have found that big, couch-style armchairs make an excellent reverse hyperextension unit—drape yourself sideways over the chair, with your hips over one padded arm and your chest on the other, as you reach down to hook a hand under the chair for stability.

zh: 如果你家里有把舒服的椅子，那就可以尝试一下（一般的床太低，会大大降低该练习的效果）。
en: Try this if you have a comfy chair at home—unfortunately bunks and beds just aren’t high enough to make the technique worthwhile.

zh: 俯卧抬腿具有山羊挺身的全部好处，此外还不需要训练伙伴。
en: Reverse hyperextensions confer all the benefits of regular hyperextensions with the added plus that this variation doesn’t require a partner.

zh: 该动作对那些背部有伤的训练者来说可谓福音，因为它可以增加下背部的血液循环和力量，同时又不会给背部造成压力。
en: The exercise is of real therapeutic value to athletes with bad backs, because it increases circulation and tone in the lower back without the usual accompanying strain.

zh: 在做俯卧挺身时，趴在地上，双脚并拢，双手置于脑后。
en: When doing prone hyperextensions, lie face down on the floor with your feet close together and your hands behind your head.

zh: 尽可能低抬高胸部和双脚，双膝不要弯曲。
en: Simply lift your chest and feet as high as you can, without bending the knees.

zh: 其实，你的四肢只能向上移动几厘米，但这确实是很好的锻炼脊椎肌肉的练习。
en: In reality you will only be able to move your extremities a few inches, but this is an excellent exercise for the spinal muscles.

zh: 多次重复或在动作的最高点坚持10-30秒（就像浮在水面上的小船）。
en: Repeat for high reps, or go for ten to thirty second holds—whatever floats your boat.

zh: 我们的骨骼生长并不需要过多的压力。
en: Your bones don't need much resistance to grow.

zh: 事实上，骨骼生长所需压力根本就很少。
en: In fact, they don't need much resistance at all.

zh: 每周只要30分钟的负重训练，就可以维持和提高骨骼密度。
en: Just thirty minutes of weight-bearing exercise a week is all you need to maintain and build your bone density.

zh: 你不必一次就把30分钟做完，一次10分钟，就可以收到最大的益处。
en: What's better is that you not do it all at once; if you split it into three ten-minute sessions, you'll still gain the maximum benefit.

zh: 而且这种好处是呈指数级增长的。
en: And you'll be reaping the benefits exponentially.

zh: 每周30分钟的耐力训练几乎能让你年轻2岁。
en: Doing just thirty minutes of resistance training a week has a RealAge effect of making you nearly two years younger.

zh: 相反，力量训练却可以在不受伤的前提下更有效地帮助跑着增加骨密度。
en: Power training, in contrast, does a better job of increasing bone density without causing injury.

zh: 密歇根大学骨骼与关节损伤防治和复原中心的一项研究表明，包含体操、负重训练与弹跳练习在内的训练计划——所谓的“增强式训练”——可以改善骨密度分布。
en: Studies performed at the University of Michigan’s Bone and Joint Injury Prevention and Rehabilitation Center revealed that training programs that include gymnastics, weight training, and jumping and bounding exercises—known as “plyometric” training—improve bone-density profiles.

zh: 这正是CFE训练课程中所设定的内容。
en: These are exactly the types of training modes that CFE prescribes.

zh: 而且，由于包含类似长时间跑步的重复性动作，高强度／力量训练方法几乎不会造成疲劳性骨折。
en: Further, because these exercises don’t involve the level of repetition that hours of running require, the high-intensity/power method is less likely to cause stress fractures.

zh: 我们的骨骼生长并不需要过多的压力。
en: Your bones don't need much resistance to grow.

zh: 事实上，骨骼生长所需压力根本就很少。
en: In fact, they don't need much resistance at all.

zh: 每周只要30分钟的负重训练，就可以维持和提高骨骼密度。
en: Just thirty minutes of weight-bearing exercise a week is all you need to maintain and build your bone density.

zh: 你不必一次就把30分钟做完，一次10分钟，就可以收到最大的益处。
en: What's better is that you not do it all at once; if you split it into three ten-minute sessions, you'll still gain the maximum benefit.

zh: 而且这种好处是呈指数级增长的。
en: And you'll be reaping the benefits exponentially.

zh: 每周30分钟的耐力训练几乎能让你年轻2岁。
en: Doing just thirty minutes of resistance training a week has a RealAge effect of making you nearly two years younger.

zh: 因此，辛格倾向于以粗暴的风格和敌对行为（有时会招致纪律处分）来对抗澳大利亚队（以及其他球队，例如南非队）一直是他体育名流身份的一个重要元素。
en: Thus, the propensity of Singh to match the Australians (and other teams, such as the South Africans) in abrasive style and hostile conduct (on occasion leading to disciplinary action) has been a substantial element of his sporting celebrity.

zh: 在这里我所说的“后殖民复仇叙事”将哈巴杨•辛格定位为“坏男孩”，他帮助印度板球在其次级历史和当今的霸权之间实现一种突破。
en: What I call here the postcolonial revenge narrative has positioned Harbhajan Singh as a "bad boy" who has helped to make a break between Indian cricket's subaltern history and its hegemonic present.

zh: 因此，2008年当他在主场比赛中卷入与澳大利亚板球运动员的冲突招致官方处罚时，他在印度被广泛认为既是英雄也是受害者。
en: Thus, at the time in 2008 when he became embroiled in conflict with Australian cricketers on their home soil and then was disciplined by the authorities, he was widely seen in India as both heroic and victimized.

zh: 钾能促进动脉健康（最好从食物中摄取，每日四种水果，特别是香蕉、鳄梨和瓜类）。
en: Potassium promotes arterial health (get it from dietary sources: four fruits per day, especially bananas, avocados, and melon).

zh: 每日补充维生素A不应超过2500国际单位（不少于1500国际单位）。
en: And avoid more than 2,500 IU of vitamin A a day (minimum is 1,500 IU).

zh: 每天分两次正确补充复合维生素，会让你的生理年龄年轻6岁以上。
en: The correct multivitamin taken twice a day can make your RealAge more than six years younger.

zh: 55岁以上的人较少背痛，这可能是因为他们背部负重较少的缘故。
en: Back pain is much less common in older people, presumably because older people carry less tension in their back.

zh: 幸运的是，下背疼痛的患者有95%可以不用手术就能治愈。
en: Luckily, nearly 95 percent of lower back pain can be treated without surgery.

zh: 人们对骨盆和腹部进行局部锻炼，还能预防更多的疼痛的发生。
en: And even more can be prevented by doing exercises that center around the pelvis and abdomen.

zh: 腹部运动不仅能令骨骼和背部肌肉强健，还能锻炼身体的整个中部，这样就移走了背部所要承担的重量和压力。
en: Not only will abdominal exercises strengthen your bones and the muscles of the back, but also they'll also strengthen your entire midsection—which takes weight and pressure off your back.

zh: 那么，让我们把仰卧起坐加进日程安排里吧，还有抬腿运动和屈体运动。
en: So add exercises like the ones in the "Owner's Monnuol Workout".

zh: 坚持下去，也许未来的某一天，杂志封面上的健美人物就会是你。
en: Your magzine cover contract await you.

zh: 在一些大的五金商场，你会看见店员在拖重箱子时都戴着护腰保护腰部。
en: Go to one of the mego-hardwore stores, and the employees are all wearing  weight belts—those large beltlike straps that provide extra support to their waists when they haul heavy boxes.

zh: 但是你知道吗？
en: But you know what?

zh: 人体有一条天然的护腰，那就是你的腹肌。
en: You have a natural weight belt—your abdominal muscles.

zh: 如果腹肌足够强健，就可以对后背下部起到良好的支撑。
en: And if your abdominal muscles are strong enough, they'll give you the support your lower back needs.

zh: 有些癌症是由具传染性的病毐引起的，比如H1V(艾滋病病毒）。
en: Some cancer is caused by viruses that are contagious, like HIV.

zh: 所以在某种程度上来说，人人有可能传染上癌症。
en: So in a way, you can catch cancer.

zh: 癌症不会通过血液、唾液或是细菌传染，但是却会通过间接的方式传染。人们会通过一些身体有机物的传播患上癌症，对于宫颈癌、肝癌和淋巴癌来说尤其如此。
en: You can't swap cancer through bloodstream, saliva, or germs, but in a roundabout way, you can pass along some of the organisms that could cause cancer This is especially true for cervical and liver cancers, as well as some lymphomas.

zh: 尼古丁是头号毒品，这主要是因为它对人体各部分产生的生理效应。
en: Nicotine is a leader in toxicity—especially because of its physiological effect on the rest of the body.

zh: 成瘾本身不仅体现在对药物的心理依赖，还会表现为生理依赖。人脑告诉身体需要尼古丁，以防止良好的感觉消失。
en: The addiction itself is manifested not only in an emotional need for the drug but also in a physical need; your brain tells your body it needs nicotine to prevent the withdrawl symptoms.

zh: 尼古丁令脑部产生愉悦感，进而感到放松，以此发挥效力。
en: One of the ways it works is by creating pleasure in the brain, causing a feeling of relaxation.

zh: 显而易见，不同项目损伤发生率的排名取决于该项目的普及程度。
en: Clearly, the ranking of sports according to their injury rate depends on the participation rate and the extent of involvement.

zh: 如在美国，橄榄球与棒球非常流行，但在欧洲热衷于此者则很少。
