en: For instance in the USA , American football and baseball are very popular, but they are less so in Europe.

zh: 兰德里（Landry, 1992)对两年美国高中生损伤发生率的研究进行了比较（表11.1)。
en: Two prospective studies performed in American high schools were compared by Landry (1992) (Table 11.1).

zh: 橄榄球、女子体操以及摔跤是损伤发生率最高的项目。
en: Football, girl's gymnastics and wrestling showed the highest injury rates.

zh: 横断性研究的优点是个体(非仅是群体) 在生理上的差异可以进行比较。而且透过规画，调查者可进一步将可能干扰该研究变项关系的潜在因子予以控制。
en: An advantage of cross-sectional studies is that the physiological differences of individuals (rather than groups) can be compared, and with planning, investigators can control for factors that could potentially confound the relationship of interest.

zh: 当研究大小规模适当时，干扰因子(confounding factors) 可透过统计方法控制，或是在重要因素将两组予以配对(matching)。
en: Confounding factors can be controlled using statistical methods when the size of the study is adequate, or by matching the two comparison groups on an important 3.5 factor.

zh: 例如：欲控制体脂肪对于身体活动与血脂关系的干扰。研究者可招募高活动量与静态生活的两组受试者，但两组须拥有相近的体脂肪水准 (e.
en: For example, to control for the confounding effect of body fat on the physical activity-blood cholesterol relationship, one could recruit highly active and sedentary people with similar levels of body fat (e.

zh: g.
en: g.

zh: 蹬起靠墙成倒立姿势。
en: Kick up into a handstand against a sturdy wall.

zh: 像平常一样，双手距离与肩同宽，距离墙根约15到25厘米。只有双脚脚跟与墙壁接触，身体保持自然的弓形。
en: As usual, your arms should be shoulder width apart and your fingers should be six to ten inches from the wall with only your feet touching the surface.

zh: 如第八式那样，把身体的大部分重量（约90%）慢慢转移到一只手上。
en: This will leave a slight natural curve in your body.As with Step 8, slowly transfer the majority of your weight—approximately ninety percent—onto one palm.

zh: 然后翻转另一只手的手掌，使手背贴地，手心向上，手指朝前（视线方向为前）。
en: Now flip your other palm over, so that the back of hand is flat on the floor with the fingers pointing away from you.

zh: 将这只手臂在自己面前伸展，而这只手始终保持与地面的接触——部分体重的压力仍然要通过这只手的手指传递。
en: Straighten out your arm in front of you, maintaining contact with the floor as you go.Some pressure should still be flowing through the digits of this hand.

zh: 这是杠杆倒立撑的起始姿势（图123）。
en: This is the start position of the lever handstand pushup (fig. 123).

zh: 摆出做俯卧撑的姿势，身体成一条直线，一只手撑在胸部正下方的地面上，另一只手放在身体外侧的篮球上，靠双脚和撑在地上的那只手支撑身体。
en: Get into a pushup position, with your body aligned and supported by the feet and one hand flat on the floor directly below your breastbone.Place your free hand on a basketball which is out to the side of the body.

zh: 双臂伸直，放在球上的手要尽量向远处伸。
en: It should be as far away as you can reach while keeping your palm flat on the ball.Both your arms should be straight.

zh: 这是杠杆俯卧撑的起始姿势（图17）。
en: This is the start position of the lever pushup (fig. 17).

zh: 试试这个自测方法：单脚站立，闭上双眼。
en: Try this self-test: Stand on one leg and close your eyes.

zh: 坚持站得越久，脑部越年轻（如果年龄在45岁或以上，坚持15秒就是非常好的了）。
en: The longer you can stand without falling, the younger your brain (fifteen seconds is very good if you are forty-five or older).

zh: 这种平衡运动只是体现人脑力量的一种方法。
en: That balancing act is just one sign of your brain strength.

zh: 为了锻炼平衡机能，应该使用自由重物，如哑铃和杠铃，因为用重物锻炼可以训练“本体感受”（平衡能力）。
en: To develop better balance, you should use free weights—that is, dumbbells and barbells—because exercising with them works your proprioception (your ability to balance).

zh: 使用举重机无法收到相同效果，因为重物是被固定在一个平面上的，所以举重时无法锻炼平衡能力。
en: Weight machines don't have the same effect because the weights are attached to a fixed surface, so you don't develop your balancing abilities as you lift them.

zh: 性发育缺失的高促性腺激素性性功能低下症很少见。
en: The list of definable causes of hypergonadotrophic hypogonadism without sexual development is small.

zh: 绝大多数患该病的女子都有特纳氏综合征(Turner’s syndrome; 45，X性腺发育不全）或该综合征的多种变异之一。
en: The overwhelming majority of these females have Turner's syndrome 45,X gonadal dysgenesis) or one of its many variants.

zh: 患该病的女子在2~3岁开始生长减缓，可能伴随许多特征：出生时的淋巴性水肿 (lymphoedema at birth)，蹼状颈（webbed neck)，多重性色素痣（multiple pigmented naevi)，心脏、肾脏和大血管的异常以及小的过度凸起的指甲。
en: Girls with this condition grow slowly beginning in the second or third year of life; they may have many of the associated stigmata: lymphoedema at birth, webbed neck, multiple pigmented naevi, disorders of the heart (left-sided) and kidneys (horseshoe) and great vessels (e.g.coarctation of the aorta) and small hyperconvex fingernails.

zh: 高低桥需要借助一个与膝盖等高或略高的物体。
en: Angled bridges require an object which is about knee height or a little higher.

zh: 在监狱里，床铺是最好的选择。
en: In prison, a bunk is perfect.

zh: 美国人家里的普通用床稍高一点，但也可以。
en: The average bed in an American home is a bit taller, but still acceptable for our purposes.

zh: 坐在床的边缘，身体向后躺在床上，双脚平放地上，与肩同宽。
en: Sit on the edge of the bunk or bed, and lie back with your feet flat on the ground.They should be approximately shoulder width apart.

zh: 身体往前挪，以便髋部离开床。双手放在头部任一侧，手指指向脚。
en: Shuffle forwards a little so that your hips are off the bunk, and place your hands either side of your head, with your fingers pointing towards your feet.

zh: 这是该动作的起始姿势（图87）。
en: This is the start position (fig. 87).

zh: 双手用力下压，肘部打开，推起髋部，同时背部弯起成弧形。
en: Press down through the hands, straightening the elbows and pushing the hips up, arching your back as you do so.

zh: 继续平缓地尽力上推身体，至少让头部与身体完全离开床。
en: Continue smoothly pushing as far as you can, at least until your head and body are entirely clear of the bunk.

zh: 手臂不必完全伸直，肘部应该是弯曲的。
en: The arms don’t need to be fully extended; the elbows will be bent.

zh: 或许你只能将自己的身体推起几厘米，那就可以了。
en: You may only lift up a few inches.That’s fine.

zh: 有控制地向后仰头，以便能看见身后的墙壁。
en: Allow your head to tilt back under control, so that you can see the wall behind you.

zh: 这是该动作的结束姿势（图88）。
en: This is the finish position (fig 88).

zh: 然后反向运动，缓慢地放低身体，直到躯干与头部再次完全躺在床上。
en: Reverse the motion, lowering yourself until your torso and head are resting completely on the bunk again.

zh: 重复练习，保持正常呼吸。
en: Repeat as necessary, breathing normally.

zh: 处在青春期的女孩，垂体肿瘤引起的高泌乳素血症（hyperprolactinaemia)是非常罕见的。但是，如果存在这种疾病，下丘脑控制促性腺激素的释放功能就会受到抑制。
en: Hyperprolactinaemia due to a pituitary tumour is very uncommon in adolescent girls.However, if present it may inhibit the hypothalamic control of gonadotrophin release.

zh: 使用抗多巴胺能的药物如氯丙嗪 (chlorpromazine)疗法中，常可见到轻度的髙泌乳素血症。
en: A common cause of mild hyperprolactinaemia is therapy with antidopaminergic agents such as chlorpromazine.

zh: 若力量体操这一路不对你的胃口，那你可以尝试高位桥。
en: If this brand of strength-gymnastics just isn’t your shot of whiskey, try your hand at platform bridging.

zh: 使用高于地面的平台会使铁板桥（在无需增加负重的情况下）变得更难、更需要爆发力——鲜有人知道这点。
en: Using a platform is a little-known way to make stand-to-stand bridges harder and increasingly more explosive without adding any external resistance.

zh: 在平台（比如一级台阶）上直立，然后向后弯身，最后双手落地成桥。
en: Stand up straight on a raised platform.A step would be a good option.Now bend backwards, ultimately dropping into a bridge.

zh: 治疗的目的在于使糖尿病患儿或青少年摆脱生活中的各种糖尿病的副作用，如低血糖、高血糖和酮症，生长延缓和精神障碍。
en: Treatment should permit the diabetic child or adolescent to lead a life free from side-effects such as hypoglycaemia, hyperglycaemia and ketosis, growth delay and psychological difficulties.

zh: 最终目的是防止发生血管、肾脏和神经系统的合并症。
en: The ultimate aim is to prevent the vascular, renal and neurological complications.

zh: 理想的目标是从早到晚保持正常的血糖水平，但是，这在糖尿病儿童中几乎是不可能的（在缓解期除外）。
en: Ideally, therefore, blood glucose should be maintained at normal levels throughout the day and night; however, this is almost impossible in the diabetic child, except during the remission period.

zh: 在准备撰写本章时，我们总共阅读了48篇文章，但其中大多数被除外了。
en: In the preparation of this chapter a total of 48 published studies were reviewed, but for various reasons most of them were excluded from the set of papers on which conclusions were based.

zh: 有些被排除的研究文章是没有采用对照组，即没有考虑前面提到的生长发育的重要作用的影响，这是一个特别重大的缺陷。
en: Some of the excluded studies were limited by the failure to employ a control group — given the afore-mentioned importance of growth and development, this is a particularly critical limitation.

zh: 其他被排除的研究报告是因为训练负荷不能精确定量。
en: Other studies were excluded because the dose of training was not precisely quantified or described.

zh: 再有一些被除外的研究论文是因其使用了特殊的人群作为研究的对象（如患有高血压、哮喘或智力障碍的儿童）。
en: Some other studies were excluded because they used special populations of subjects (e.g.children with hypertension, asthma or mental handicap).

zh: 个案研究个案研究(case study)可对个人（或机构、社区…等）提供详细的资讯。
en: Case StudyThe case study is used to provide detailed information about an individual (or institution, community, and so on).

zh: 个案研究旨在了解某特定受试者或情况的独有特征，这种描述性研究技术广泛应用在医学、心理学、咨商和社会学等领域。
en: It aims to determine unique characteristics about the subject or condition.This descriptive research technique is used widely in such fields as medicine, psychology, counseling, and sociology.

zh: 此外，个案研究也是质性研究中所使用的一种技术。
en: The case study is also a technique used in qualitative research.

zh: 弓步是代替深蹲的经典动作。
en: Lunges are a classic squat substitute.

zh: 站立，双脚并拢，一只脚向前面迈一大步。
en: Stand with your feet together, and take a long step out in front of you.

zh: 双腿弯曲，背部挺直，直到前膝弯曲接近90°，后膝几乎接触地面。
en: Bend at both knees, keeping the spine straight, until your front knee is bent at a right angle and your rear knee nearly touches the floor.

zh: 双腿发力，将身体向后推，直到双腿伸直。
en: Now rise back up, pushing through your feet until your knees are straight.

zh: 接下来，你可以向后撤一步回到起始姿势，然后再重复，或者后腿向前迈一步再重复。
en: At this point you can either continue the motion into a step backwards to the starting position and repeat, or step forwards and through with your rear leg so that you can lunge ahead, switching legs.

zh: 囚室内没有太大空间，所以我们都是撤一步回到起始姿势，换腿，另一条腿向前，成弓步，撤回，再换腿。
en: Obviously confined to a cell we didn’t have much space, so we stepped back to the start position and alternated our legs, lunging forwards with the right, stepping back, lunging forwards with the left, and so on.

zh: 但是，如果你所处的空间很大，那就无需回到起始姿势，只需换腿继续向前即可。
en: But if you have a long stretch of space ahead of you, you don’t need to keep going back to the start position.You can just keep on stepping forwards with your opposite leg.

zh: 若你的双腿状态良好，那你可以这样走很长一段距离。
en: If your legs are in good shape, you can cover long distances this way.

zh: 我见过一位特别信赖这个方法的自由搏击选手，他通过数自己走过几遍足球场来判断自己的锻炼程度。
en: I once met a kickboxer who swore by this method.He didn’t even count reps—he judged his workout by lengths of his local football field!

zh: 弓步压腿是非常不错的弓步变式，每次只集中锻炼一条腿。
en: The leg press lunge is a nice variation of the lunge which focuses on one leg at a time.

zh: 将一条腿放在大约与膝盖等高的物体上。
en: Place one leg up on something at about knee height.

zh: 对我而言，床铺比较合适，你可以借助台阶——尝试不同高度的台阶，以帮助你找到适合自己的高度。
en: For me, a bunk is about right, but using stairs can help you find the best level for you.Experiment with different steps.

zh: 抬起的那条腿向前伸出，膝盖略微弯曲。
en: Your raised leg should be out in front of you, with a minor bend in the knee.

zh: 保持背部挺直，弯曲髋部以及抬起的那条腿，直到大腿后侧紧贴小腿。
en: Now—keeping your back straight—bend at the knee and hip of the raised leg, until your hamstring presses against your calf.

zh: 此时，抬起那条腿的大腿应该紧贴胸部。
en: At this point, your thigh should be close to your chest.

zh: 后面那腿的膝盖可以略微弯曲，以确保安全。但是，主要做动作的应该是前腿。
en: You can bend the knee of the rear leg a bit to ensure that you are secure, but the main motion should come from the front leg.

zh: 暂停片刻，然后前腿发力，将自己推回到起始姿势。
en: Pause for a moment before pushing back up again with your front leg until it’s back to where you started.

zh: 此动作看起来像是蹬腿，但速度更缓慢、更平缓。
en: This motion looks like a kick, but obviously a lot slower and smoother.

zh: 完成所定的目标次数，然后换腿。
en: Complete your target reps, and then switch legs.

zh: 练习几百次之后，第二天早晨你的股四头肌将会奇酸无比。
en: A few hundred reps will sear delicious pain into your quads the next morning.

zh: 在弓箭步这项练习过程中，保持核心、臀部和画绳肌收紧。
en: Throughout the exercise of lunge, one should focus on engaging your core, hips, and hamstrings.

zh: 尽量保证小腿和躯干垂直于地面。
en: Keep your shins and torso as vertical as possible.

zh: 以站立姿势开始，一条腿向前跨一大步，然后下蹲，用臀部的力量来控制动作的稳定性，另一条腿膝盖触地。
en: From a standing position, take a long step forward and drop downward—using your hips to control the movement—and touch the opposite knee to the ground.

zh: 使用躯干肌力撑起身体，回到站立姿势。
en: Now power your body upward with your trunk muscles, returning to a standing position.

zh: 换腿练习另一侧。
en: Repeat on the other side.

zh: 弓式这是经典的脊柱练习，可以提高背部的收缩能力，并训练脊椎及其周围的韧带。
en: Bow HoldThis is a classic spinal exercise that will develop the contractile ability of your back, as well as training the vertebrae and their surrounding ligaments.

zh: 趴在地上，双膝弯曲，脚跟接近臀部上方，左右手分别向后抓住同侧的脚踩。
en: Lie face down on the floor.Bend your knees, bringing your feet up over your buttocks, and reach back to grasp your ankles with their corresponding hands.

zh: 这本身就有一种拉伸感，但还没完，之后，纯粹使用脊柱的力量，同时将胸部和双膝尽量抬高并使之离地，保持此姿势 10 一 30 秒。
en: This in itself will provide a stretch, but we’re not done yet.Using pure spinal power, simultaneously lift your chest and knees as high off the ground as you can.Hold the position for between ten and thirty seconds.

zh: 一旦你觉得弓式太过轻巧，便可以尝试骆驼式。
en: Once you are comfortable in the bow hold, you can try the camel hold.

zh: 下面谈谈具体机理。假如一个人的动脉各处已举办了20年的“聚会”——即血小板聚集，血液通道不断变窄——那么其间至少也有几年人体在学习如何利用其他途径完成动脉的工作。
en: Here' s how it works: If an artery has spent twenty years throwing parties—that is, growing plaque and becoming increasingly narrow—its host body has spent at least some of those years learning how to do some of the artery's work somewhere else.

zh: 这称为供血备用方式。
en: It's called collateral blood supply.

zh: 宫颈在怀孕中发挥着重要作用。人体伸长宫颈让胚胎留在子宮里，然后宫颈缩短扩张，便于分娩生产。
en: The cervix plays an important role in pregnancy; it lengthens to hold the fetus in the uterus and then shortens and dilates to allow labor and delivery.

zh: 由宫颈病变细胞发展成的宫颈癌，也许是最易发现并预防的癌症了。
en: Cancer of the cervix, which develops from abnormal cells on the cervix, is perhaps the most detectable and preventable cancer.

zh: 这是一个艰苦卓绝的技巧，但如果你下定决心、身体力行，最终肯定能掌握它。
en: This is one  hell of a hard technique, and although you can master it with dedication and effort, don’t expect to do it overnight!

zh: 但也别梦想一步登天，你需要时间和耐心，在前九式中好好地发展身体。
en: Really take your time to milk the preliminary nine steps first.

zh: 你最初的目标是完成一次完美的单臂引体向上，当你做到了之后，再进行“巩固训练”(参见第 249 页)。
en: Initially,aim for just a single good rep, and practice consolidation training when you manage it (see page 268).

zh: 如果你真的在某个动作上碰到了问题，根本做不了几次，可以尝试巩固训练。
en: If you are really having a problem getting just a handful of reps on a particular exercise, try consolidation training.

zh: 这是我从一位狱友那里学来的。
en: Consolidation training is a handy little trick I learnt from a fellow prison athlete.

zh: 大多数时候，我们的训练应该集中于大约10到25次反复的范围内，这对力量、肌肉以及关节的发展都有好处。
en: Most of the time, you should focus on moderate to high repetitions, somewhere in the ten to twenty-five range.This is good for building strength, muscle, and joint integrity.

zh: 构念效度是指一个测验得分能测量到其假设性构念的程度，通常以此测验结果与某些行为的关连来代表。
en: Construct validity is the degree to which scores from a test measure a hypothetical construct and is usually established by relating the test results to some behavior.

zh: 例如，某些特定行为就被预期是来自在运动精神的测量中得高分的人。
en: For example, certain behaviors are expected of someone with a high degree of good sporting behavior.

zh: 这样的人被预期会在网球比赛中讚美对手的优秀表现。
en: Such a person might be expected to compliment the opponent on shots made during a tennis match.

zh: 在构念效度的指标上，测验编製者可以比较运动精神量表中高得分者与低得分者在比赛中赞美对手的次数。
en: For an indication of construct validity, a test maker could compare the number of times a person scoring high on a test of sporting behavior complimented the opponent with the number of times a person scoring lower on the test did so.

zh: 到目前为止，大部分重视效度 、信度 、以及项目分析的资讯都与所谓 的古典测验理论 ( classical test theory, convict conditioningT) 有关 。
en: Most of the information concerning the validity, reliability, and item analysis presented thus far pertains to what is called classical test theory (CTT).

zh: 近来有一些基 础性的改变出现在认知与情意行为测量的研究中 。
en: Some radical changes have occurred recently in the study of the measurement of cognitive and affective behaviors.

zh: 这个在教育与心理文献中引人注目的变化便是试题反应理论（item response theory, IRT) 。
en: The advance that has received the most attention in the educational and psychological literature is item response theory (IRT).

zh: 镁是一种矿物质，它能放松支气管，从而起到治疗哮喘的作用，每天应补镁400毫克。
en: Magnesium is a mineral that relaxes the bronchial tubes and can help with asthma.Take 400 milligrams a day.

zh: 如果你经常从肺部咳出黏液（并不是只有流鼻涕时才排出黏液，那通常是鼻窦炎引起的），那么请考虑补充N—乙酰半胱氨酸。
en: If you routinely cough up mucus from your lungs (rather than mucus coming out only when you blow your nose, which is usually from sinus conditions), consider N-acetylcysteine.

zh: 这种物质能够减少黏液分泌，促进谷胱甘肽的生成，有助于防止细胞受损。
en: It's a substance that loosens mucus and boosts production of a substance called glutathione, which helps prevent damage in lung tissue.

zh: 我们建议每日补充N—乙酰半胱氨酸两次，每次600毫克。
en: We recommend 600 milligrams twice daily.

zh: 在损伤后及其恢复期间，体格评估应该尽可能快进行。
en: Assessment of physique status should take place as soon as feasible after injury and during recovery.

zh: 人们必须慎重接受这一观点，即肌肉的丢失（经过皮褶校正后的围度的下降）是负氮平衡的一个提示。
en: Prudently one should accept that any indication of loss in muscle (decline in skinfold-corrected girths) is indicative of negative nitrogen balance.

zh: 这就要求重新对情况进行评估，并且对训练和营养计划进行调整。
en: This requires a reassessment of the situation and likely change in the training and nutritional programme.

zh: 体重下降可能伴随着骨骼矿物质含量不可逆转的缺失，这是对健康的一个严重威胁。
en: The possible concomitant irreversible loss in bone mineral content is a serious health risk.

zh: 由罗伯特·坎贝尔（Robert Campbell) 在美国申请专利的一种新型的骨骼宽度测量夹子带有两只滑动的测量臂，将骨骼宽度测量的精度提高了一步。
en: A new small bone caliper based on a US patent for a double-sliding branch principle by Robert Campbell provides for a new level of precision in measuring bone breadths.

zh: 测量臂末端的压力稳定，不紧也不松。
en: The design permits firm pressure on the ends of the branches without binding.

zh: Campbell 10夹子以发明人的名字命名，是按照独家专利协议由Rosscraft公司生产的。
en: The Campbell Caliper 10, named after the inventor, is manufactured by Rosscraft under exclusive patent agreement.

zh: 这种夹子有两个游标尺，可以从上下两个方向进行读数。
en: It has double vernier scales to permit reading in an up and down orientation.

zh: 最新的测试指标是骨骼矿物质密度（bone mineral density, BMD),经常测试的是髓关节和脊柱的骨骼矿物质密度，有时也测试全身的骨骼矿物质密度。
en: Most current measurements are of bone mineral density (BMD), typically for the hip or lumbar spine and sometimes for the whole body.

zh: 这就造成了文献中的某些混淆。
en: This has led to some confusion in the literature.

zh: 例如，妇女的最大骨骼重量小于男子，因为她们的骨架比较小，但骨骼矿物质密度的性别差异不是那么清晰，并且不同部位的骨骼矿物质密度也有所不同（Bonjour et al., 1991)。
en: For instance, women on average have a smaller peak bone mass than men because their skeletons are physically smaller, but a gender difference in BMD is not nearly as clear-cut and probably varies from site to site (Bonjour et al., 1991).

zh: 同时，在不同年龄不同部位有不同的最大骨骼矿物质密度值。
en: Also, peak BMD values for different skeletal sites are likely to occur at different ages.

zh: 人体关节就类似于袜子，一旦缺少了人体内的“袜子”，骨骼间就会丧失润滑的能力，出现骨头直接相互摩擦的现象。
en: Without the sock, your exposed skin would rub against the shoe, get irritated, blister, and become inflamed.It's the same concept with your joints.As you lose your internal sock, your bones lose their ability to slide, and they can rub directly against each other.

zh: 若是发生了这种情况，结果就是“硬碰硬”，人会感觉很疼。
en: When that happens, the effect is like stick on stick—and it hurts.

zh: 这也正是骨关节炎发展的简要过程。
en: In simple form, that's what osteoarthritis is.

zh: 在以下这些方面，高强度训练可以得到和LSD同样的训练结果。
en: Here’s how high-intensity training matches up to some of the claims of the LSD method.

zh: 増加骨密度。
en: Increasing bone density.

zh: LSD的支持者表示通过训练可以提髙骨骼健康水平, 但是LSD也会带来负面的影响：过度的训练会引起疲劳性骨折。
en: While proponents of LSD running claim improved bone health as a result of their training method, LSD running can also result in the opposite: a stress fracture caused by an excessive training load.

zh: 相反，力量训练却可以在不受伤的前提下更有效地帮助跑者増加骨密度。
en: Power training, in contrast, does a better job of increasing bone density without causing injury.

zh: 当然，任何年龄层人士都有可能患上抑郁症，但抑郁症会让人的感觉、行动和外表的衰老速度加快。
en: Of course, depression is associated with any age, but it can make you feel, act, and look older fast.

zh: 原因之一是，抑郁症与血管老化联系紧密。
en: For one, depression is tied to cardiovascular aging.

zh: 有调查显示，同时患有心脏病和抑郁症的男性和女性因心脏病死亡的几率，比那些只患有心脏病而没有抑郁症的病人要高出69%。
en: In one study, men and women who had heart disease and depression had a 69 percent higher rate of death from heart disease than those who simply had heart disease and no depression.

zh: 另一个调查表明，抑郁症女性患者骨密度低于正常女性，这估计是因为抑郁症患者血液中的“紧张激素”——皮质醇含量较高。
en: And in another study, depressed women were found to have lower bone density than those who weren't, presumably from high levels of the stress hormone cortisol, found to be increased in the blood of depressed people.

zh: 患骨软骨病的儿童，如奥-施氏病（胚骨粗隆骨软骨病）、朔伊尔曼氏病（脊柱骨软骨病）、潘纳尔氏病（青年崎形性跖趾骨软骨炎）、股骨头骨骺骨软骨病，可能会因为不同原因就诊。
en: Children with osteochondroses, e.g.Osgood-Schlatter disease, Scheuermann's disease, Partner's disease and Legg-Calvé--Perthes disease, may have different reasons for seeking health care.

zh: 每一种综合征均可能在运动时产生疼痛。
en: One symptom can be pain associated with sports activity.

zh: 在此种情形下，体育运动可能不仅仅是发生疼痛的原因，而更可能是诱因。
en: In such circumstances, sports activities are presumably not the cause but, rather, the provocative factor.

zh: 骨软骨炎导致骨骺异常骨化区域的分离。
en: Osteochondritis causes separation of abnormal ossification areas within the epiphysis.

zh: 骨软骨病是一种发育紊乱并与软骨骨化有关。
en: Osteochondroses are developmental disorders associated with anatomical sites undergoing transition from cartilage to bone.

zh: 此种紊乱的发生形式各异，帕帕斯（1989)）指出生物力学因素在其中起重要作用。
en: These disorders occur in different forms, but biomechanical factors can play a role in the course of the disorder as described by Pappas (1989).

zh: 成型过程是通过增加重量和改进几何结构在机械负荷最大的部位增加骨骼的强度。
en: Modelling increases bone strength by adding mass and improving geometric architecture where mechanical loading is greatest.

zh: 青年人对负重的体力活动的成型反应结果是骨质的贮备超出正常活动所需要的数量（Frost, 1989a)。
en: The modelling response to weightbearing physical activity in the young results in a reserve of bone beyond that needed for normal activity (Frost, 1989a).

zh: 因此，参加负重性娱乐活动的高中学生会在以后的生活中比同年龄的、骨质贮备少的弹钢琴的同伴更不容易发生骨折（Schultheis，1991)。
en: Thus, the high school student who finds recreation in weightlifting may be less vulnerable to fractures later in life than a comparable piano player with a smaller bone bank (Schultheis, 1991).

zh: 现在，对老年人骨豁脆弱问题的兴趣引起对骨质丢失因素的大量研究工作。
en: The current interest in skeletal fragility in elderly people has resulted in considerable research to identify factors underlying bone loss.

zh: 骨质疏松症（骨路随年龄增长而变薄）在某些地方已成为一个重大的公共卫生问题。
en: Osteoporosis (the thinning of bones with age) represents a tremendous public health problem in certain societies.

zh: 有三个决定性因素可解释老年人群骨骼重量下降的原因。
en: Three determinants have been advanced to explain the cause of dangerously reduced bone mass in the older population.

zh: 如果骨头密度降低的程度已很明显，那么就可能导致骨质疏松症。病症表现是骨骼密度低下，脆弱而易于断裂。
en: If that decrease in bone density is significant enough, it can lead to osteoporosis—a condition in which the bones have thinned and weakened to the point where they can break very easily.

zh: 对于骨质疏松症患者的骨骼来说，循环利用陈旧骨细胞和积累钙元素这两大生理过程都会很反常，陈旧骨细胞的衰变速度超过了新骨细胞的形成。
en: In people with osteoporosis, those two processes of recycling old bone cells and depositing calcium are thrown out of whack, and the deterioration of old bone cells outpaces the formation of new bone cells.

zh: 当然，测验有可能有信度却没有效度，但绝不可能有效度而没有信度。
en: Of course, scores from a test can be reliable yet not valid, but it can never be valid if it is not reliable.

zh: 例如，以一台损坏的体重器重复测量你的体重，就可能得到有信度却没有效度的结果。
en: For example, weighing yourself repeatedly on a broken scale would give reliable results but not valid ones.

zh: 测验信度在讨论时会以观察分数、真实分数、及误差分数这些名词来进行。
en: Test reliability is sometimes discussed in terms of  observed score, true score,  and  error score.

zh: 在上述类型的量表中，就像其他测量一样，效度与信度都很重要。
en: In these types of scales, as with any measure, validity and reliability are important.

zh: 但在体育课或竞赛中记录活动要取得一致性，比在实验室的作业中（例如线性滑轨）记录误差值要困难多了。
en: But it is usually much more difficult to obtain consistency in recording activities in a physical education class or sport than in recording error measurements from a laboratory task such as the linear slide.

zh: 因此观察型的研究重视的是编码者的一致性。
en: Consequently, observational researchers are concerned about coder consistency.

zh: 一般来说，编码者会受训到具有一定水平的信度，而且在整个计划中会固定的检视此信度。
en: Typically, coders are trained to a criterion level of reliability, and reliability is checked regularly throughout the project.

zh: 一种常在事件纪录或时间取样的方法中，用来估计编码者间信度的方法，被称为观察者间一致性( interobserver agreement, I0A )，其公式如下。
en: A common way of estimating reliability among coders, often used in event recording and time sampling, is called interobserver agreement (IOA), which uses the following formula.

zh: 观察者预期误差可以经由不同方式产生影响，其通常源自其他类型的误差，例如月晕效应或是观察者偏差。
en: Observer expectation errors  can operate in various ways, often stemming from other sources of errors such as the halo effect and observer bias.

zh: 观察者预期可能会对评分产生不当影响。因为当人们对某些特定行为有预期时，会更倾向于注意这些行为的证据，并朝着预期方向解释观察到的内容 。
en: Observer expectations can contaminate the ratings because a person who expects certain behaviors is inclined to see evidence of those behaviors and interpret observations in the expected direction.

zh: 现在我们有许多不同种类纠正限球屈光的外科手术，像光反射照相角膜切除术、激光手术和其他一些手术。这些手术能把角膜弧度重新塑造至完美，从而永久性纠正眼球的屈光问题。这种方法使光线能够聚焦到视网膜上。
en: Now, of course, we have many varieties of refractive surgery, like photorefractive keratectomy, Lasik, and others, which can permanently correct the refractory problem by reshaping the cornea back to perfect—so that the light focuses on the retina.

zh: 归纳推论同时有优缺点。
en: Inductive reasoning has both strengths and weaknesses.

zh: 其中，最初的清单建立是关键。
en: For one, the development of the original list is crucial.

zh: 如果提出的现象不具代表性(这里是「危险」但被接受的活动），那么结论就可能错误或误导。
en: If items are not representative of the phenomenon at hand (here it was "dangerous but permitted activities"), then the conclusions will likely be wrong or misleading.

zh: 同时提出共通性的过程也是困难的。
en: Also, the process of identifying generalities can prove challenging.

zh: 如果太明显（例如：这些活动都牵涉到人），那么归纳性概述可能是正确但既无趣也缺乏深意。
en: If too obvious (e.g., all of these activities involve people), the inductive generalization may be true but uninteresting and lacking helpful insight.

zh: 共通性同时也可能错误。
en: A generality might also be wrong.

zh: 腘绳肌柔韧性试验。
en: Tests for hamstring flexibility.

zh: 受试者仰卧，检査者屈一侧髋关节至90°。
en: The examiner flexes one hip of the supine youth to 90°.

zh: 保持髋关节屈曲，检查者被动的伸展同侧膝关节直至感觉到抗阻。
en: Maintaining the hip flexion, the examiner then passively extends the ipsilateral knee until resistance is felt.

zh: 若被试者在试验中试图伸展髋关节，则检査者会感觉到腘绳肌远端会向外侧滑动至坐骨结节粗隆处，腘窝成角会同时发生变化。
en: If the youth manages to extend the hip slightly during the test, the examiner will feel the proximal hamstrings slip slightly lateral to the maximum prominence of the ischial tuberosity, and the popliteal angle will appear to improve instantaneously.

zh: 消化系统有两种激素分别控制饥饿感和食欲。
en: Your digestive system has two main hormones that control hunger and appetite.

zh: 饥饿激素由胃部分泌，能够增强食欲。
en: Ghrelin is secreted by the stomach and increases your appetite.

zh: 胃部变空，就会把饥饿激素派出去索要食物。
en: When your stomach's empty, it sends ghrelin out requesting food.

zh: 瘦素则会告诉大脑饱了。当人进食的时候，脂肪细胞会分泌瘦素，让人停止进食。
en: Leptin tells your brain that you're full When you eat, your fat cells secrete it so that you stop eating.

zh: 对人进食危害最大的是高果糖玉米糖浆，它是一种代糖物，是软饮料和其他许多人工甜品的添加剂。
en: One of the biggest evil influences on our diet is the presence of high-fructose corn syrup (HFCS), a sugar substitute that is found in soft drinks and many other sweet, processed foods.

zh: 运动时，尤其是在热环境中运动时出汗率是上升的。
en: During exercise, especially in the heat, sweating rate is elevated.

zh: 如果没有足够饮水，就会造成纯体液的丢失以及过度缺水状态 (state of hypohydration)。
en: If not accompanied by sufficient drinking, it will result in a net fluid loss and a state of hypohydration.

zh: 当水的供应足够并可随意饮用时，儿童（Bar-Or et al., 1980, 1992)和成人（Pugh et al.，1967; White & Ford, 1983)常常并没有饮用足 够的水分来补充丢失的水分。
en: When water is available ad libitum, children (Bar-Or et al., 1980, 1992) and adults (Pugh et al., 1967; White & Ford, 1983) do not drink sufficiently to replenish fluid loss.

zh: 超过三分之一的美国人有过敏问题，但大多数人并没打算控制自己的症状。
en: More than one-third of Americans have allergies, but most don't have their symptoms under control.

zh: 身上起疹或双眼发红最多只是让你参加老同学聚会的时候扫兴而归，而过敏对肺部的影响就是致命的了。
en: While the worst a rash or red eye will do is crimp your enjoyment of the 1980s flashback party, allergies that affect your lungs can be life threatening.

zh: 这被称为过敏性反应。
en: This is called an anaphylactic reaction.

zh: 如果你自己随意服用合成代谢类固醇、减肥药或治疗其他疾病的速效药，你就是在跟你的激素瞎胡闹，就会让身体出现故障。
en: Anytime you try fiddling with your hormones on your own with anabolic steroids or fixes for weight loss or other ailments, you're causing your body to go haywire.

zh: 比如我们经常会了解到一些运动员通过服用代谢类固醇药或补充剂，使其代谢产生睾丸酮。
en: For example, we often read about athletes who take androgenic steroids or supplements that get metabolized through to testosterone.

zh: 这些多余的睾丸酮会导致非常具有侵略性的行为，所以千万不要给服用者手枪，或者什么辩题，更别提这些药产生所有的副作用，像心血管病和肾脏类病。
en: This excess tesfosterone can lead to very aggressive behavior—as in, don't give that man a gun or even an argument—not to mention all the side effects like cardiovascular and kidney problems.

zh: 最近加拿大的一项研究指出，在加拿大涉嫌使用合成类固醇的青年高达83000人。
en: A recent Canadian investigation suggested that there are up to 83000 young persons in Canada indulging in anabolic steroids.

zh: 目前还没有有关残疾儿童运动员使用禁用药物的资料。
en: There is currently no data available regarding child athletes with a disability.

zh: 儿童或青少年使用提高运动能力药物如类固醇的动机是什么？这些运动员为什么求助于它？
en: What would be the motivation for a child or adolescent to utilize performance-enhancing drugs such as anabolic steroids and will these athletes resort to this?

zh: 直立，双脚与肩同宽，身体后方的空地要足以让训练者平躺。
en: Stand up straight with your feet approximately shoulder width apart.The space behind you should be clear of objects for at least the distance of your height.

zh: 这是该动作的起始姿势。
en: This is the start position.

zh: 双手置于镜部两侧，并开始向前推骨盆（图101）。
en: Place your hands on your hips and begin pushing your pelvis forwards (fig. 101).

zh: 当骨盆移至你的极限时，开始弯曲膝盖，同时脊柱向后弯曲成弓形。
en: When your pelvis is as far front as it will go, begin bending your knees as you simultaneously arch your spine backwards.

zh: 然后头部向后仰，眼睛向后看。
en: Tilt your head back and look behind you as you go.

zh: 整个过程要流畅、一气呵成。
en: This must all form one smooth movement.

zh: 继续弯曲脊柱，直到你可以看到身后几厘米的地面。
en: Continue this arching motion until you can see the ground a few feet behind you.

zh: 一旦看到地面，就让双手离开髋部并将其举过头顶（图102）。
en: As soon as you see the floor, take your hands off your hips and pass them back over your shoulders, beyond your head (fig. 102).

zh: 这种姿势要求你有很好的柔韧性，前移的髋部加上弯曲的膝盖能够防止你向后摔倒。
en: This moving posture requires considerable flexibility, but you will find that the forwards shift of your hips combined with the bend in the knees prevents you from falling backwards.

zh: 继续向后、向下运动，手臂保持伸展，直到手掌接触地面。
en: Extend your arms as you keep the movement going, until your palms are resting on the floor.

zh: 这是合桥的结束姿势（图103），标准的桥式。
en: This is the finish position of closing bridges, the full bridge hold (fig. 103).

zh: 接着，弯曲手臂与双腿，直到背部着地。
en: From here, bend the arms and legs until your back is on the floor.

zh: 然后站起来，回到起始姿势，重复动作。
en: Now stand up into the start position again to begin your second repetition.

zh: 在整个练习组中，保持正常呼吸。
en: Breath normally throughout the set.

zh: 磷原子核磁共振谱学（phosphorus nuclear magnetic resonance spectra scopy, 31P MRS)的应用，减少了对儿童到底是无氧代谢能力低还是有氧工作效率高这一问题的研究难度。
en: The difficulty in determining whether children have reduced anaerobic capacity or increased aerobic efficiency may be lessened with the useof phosphorus nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy.

zh: 这项技术是一种无创性测定Pi、PCr和pH的技术，从而可用于对儿童进行研究。
en: This techniqueprovides non-invasive means of monitoring Pi, PCr and pH, that areacceptable for studies in children.

zh: 这些指标又可以用来评价骨骼肌的有氧代谢过程和肌肉内糖酵解的活性。
en: These variables, in turn, allow the assessment of muscle oxidative m etabolism and intram uscular glycolyticactivity.

zh: 最主要的三种皮肤癌〔基细胞癌、扁平 细胞癌和黑色素瘤）细胞形态不同因此也有不同表现。
en: The three main kinds of skin cancer (basal cell, squamous cell, and melanoma) originate from different cell types and therefore have very different behaviors.

zh: 真正活跃的是黑色素瘤，就像个流窜犯。
en: The one that really jumps around is melanoma, which is a peripatetic cell anyway.

zh: 基细咆和扁平细胞限于外部皮肤，所以癌症都是局部的侵袭。这些癌症都是与接触阳光有关，而黑色素瘤——与死亡联系紧密的癌症，却与阳光无关。
en: The basal and squamous cells are limited to the outer skin, so they invade locally; these are linked to sun exposure, while melanoma—the one most associated with risk of death—is not.

zh: 男性动脑、行动和解决问题的速度更快（这种情况可以追溯到男性必须用矛刺杀毛茸茸的猛犸象的那个时期），而女性则拥有较强的横向思维能力即分析复杂事件的能力。
en: Men use their brains faster to act and solve a problem (it stems back from the days when men had to spear the wooly mammoth), while women have better lateralization that is, the ability to analyze a complex topic.

zh: 为了便于埋解，这里有个好例子。男性购物时，他们知道白己要买剃须刀，在商店里搜索，找到剃须刀付钱走人。
en: Here is a good way to think about it: When men go shopping, they know they need shaving cream, so they walk into the store, find it, pay for it, and leave.

zh: 眼睛基本上是通过观察从外界获取信息，再传输给大脑。
en: To see, your eye essentially takes information from outside sources and passes it along to your brain.

zh: 正如你从图8.1看到的，信息穿过角膜即一层透明的覆盖物，到达虹膜，虹膜是眼睛的有色部分，负责调节光线，以使光线到达视网膜。
en: As you can see in Figure 9.1, information travels through the cornea, the clear covering of the eye, to the iris, which is the colored part of the eye charged with regulating the light that can hit the retina.

zh: 在虹膜的后面是晶状体，它的形状就像一个照相机的镜头。
en: Behind the iris sits the lens, which is shaped like a camera lens.

zh: 对于那些习惯后脚跟先落地的跑者,他们的小腿大多数都缺乏弹性。
en: For runners who are habitual heel strikers, elasticity forces of the lower legs are largely dormant.

zh: 比起积极蹬地,后脚跟落地意昧着脚部和地面接触的时间更长, 这是一种偷懒的跑步方式。
en: Rather than popping off the ground, a heel strike involves longer contact with the ground in the form of a land-to-rolling push-off.It’s a lazy way to run.

zh: 就像前面提到的，穿高科技的跑鞋并没有什么帮助，反而对脚跟部位的过分保护,这也导致了后脚跟先落地的跑步方式。这类跑鞋帮跑者避免了所有的伤害,包括脚跟接触地面所带来的自然的冲击。
en: As discussed earlier, the wearing of bulky running shoes does not help; often overbuilt in the heel, these shoes enable heel striking because they shield runners from the pain that would otherwise naturally ensue when the heel hits the ground.

zh: 在最具说服力的研究中，有一份2011年来自哈佛大学的报告，专家们对竞技长跑运动员的受伤概率进行了研究，受伤概率令人担忧:每年有3/4的跑者经历过中度至重度的跑步损伤。
en: Among the most persuasive research was a 2011 retrospective study in which researchers at Harvard looked at injury rates in competitive distance runners and found an alarming rate of injury: Three out of four of the runners experienced a moderate to severe running injury each year.

zh: 专家们发现，后脚跟落地的跑者占受伤者的大多数。他们在报告中写道：“在重复性压力损伤的概率方面，那些习惯用后脚跟落地的跑者的损伤概率是习惯前脚掌落地跑者的两倍。”
en: Particularly revealing was that heel-striking runners accounted for most of the injuries documented by researchers, who wrote, "Those who habitually rear-foot strike had approximately twice the rate of repetitive stress injuries than individuals who habitually forefoot strike."

zh: 后手翻动作快如闪电，需要亲身体验才能真正领会，所以动口不如动手，但我至少可以给你一些指点。
en: Back handsprings are a lightning fast move that need to be experienced to really be understood, so describing how to do them is kind of artificial, but I can at least give you a few pointers.

zh: 用力跳起，但不单单向上跳，而是既向上又向后跳。
en: Jump hard, but don’t jump up; jump up and back.

zh: 手臂随之尽快上摆，越过头顶向后摆。
en: Coordinate your arms with the movement, swinging up, overhead and back as fast as you can.

zh: 后背收紧成弓形，头部始终处于两臂之间，在地面上找个点放置双手。
en: Arch your back tight and keep your head back between your arms, looking for a place to plant your hands.

zh: 在发现这个点的同时，双腿也顺势上摆，惯性会完成其余的工作。
en: When you find one, continue swinging your legs as momentum carries you over.

zh: 一旦掌握后手翻，你可能就想尝试后空翻，后空翻与后手翻动作相同，只是双手不着地。
en: Once you have mastered the back handspring, you might want to try the backflip—which is the same move, but without placing the hands on the ground.

zh: 这需要腿和脊柱更具爆发力，同时腹部也要很有力才能把双膝带过去。
en: This requires much more explosive leg and spine power, as well as powerful abs to tuck the knees up and over.

zh: 后空翻还可以发展成其他特技（如果你想探索的话），比如蹬墙后空翻、后空翻踢、转体空翻等。
en: It’s a brilliant exercise which will lead on to other tricks like wall flips, flash kicks (i.e., overhead flip kicks), twisting flips and so on, if you wish to explore these kind of moves in your training.

zh: 其实，急于探索后手翻并不是坏事。除了看起来相当妙之外，在很多方面该动作都算是桥的“弹震式”版本：它能够让你以比桥更具爆发力的方式训练脊椎肌肉、髋部和腿部，还会迫使你的全身以迅疾的运动风格做动作。
en: In fact, the urge to explore this move is no bad thing; as well as looking damn sweet, the back handspring is in many ways the plyometric counterpart of bridging—it allows you to train your spinal muscles, hips and legs in a more explosive manner than bridging does, and it has the benefit of forcing the entire body to act in a rapid, athletic fashion.

zh: 其实，一旦你的髋部与脊柱通过桥练习被打开之后，后手翻就并非高不可攀了。
en: Actually, once your hips and spine are loosened up from bridging, learning the back handspring isn’t all that hard.

zh: 如果你坚持不懈，即便身体超重也能做到这个。
en: Provided you are fast and follow through, even heavy guys can pull it off.

zh: 我多次见到胖乎乎的武术家洪金宝表演后手翻，还是在他 40多岁时。
en: I’ve seen chubby martial arts star Sammo Hung perform the technique many times, well into his forties.

zh: 关键在于信心。
en: The real key to the move is confidence.

zh: 辛格显然没有“内心不甘”，他必须“承受暴力再保持沉默”。
en: Harbhajan has clearly not "seethed within," having to "listen to abuses and keep quiet."

zh: 后殖民主义复仇叙事从来不被允许在这之中采用，尤其考虑到殖民统治者“分而治之”的策略。
en: The postcolonial revenge narrative can never be permitted to be directed within, especially given the divide-and-conquer strategies of colonial powers.

zh: 这内外的二元结构清晰地勾勒了辛格对与斯里山特发生肢体冲突后的反应:
en: This outsider-insider binary structure is clearly delineated in Harbhajan's reflection on the physical confrontation with Sreesanth:

zh: 他们令患者安静时呼吸冷空气，气量与运动中气量相等，发现呼吸增强后呼吸道阻塞的程度和运动后相同（Deal et al., 1979a)。
en: They then had the patients at rest breathe volumes of cold air equal to those they breathed during exercise, and showed a degree of airway obstruction following the hyperpnoea equal to that which followed the exercise (Deal et al., 1979a).

zh: 而后，如吸入温湿空气，此反应就消失(Deal et al., 1979a)。
en: Again this response w as abolished if the inspired air was warmed and humidified (Deal et al., 1979a).

zh: 这些学者阐明，总的呼吸道热交换和呼吸道阻塞程度之间存在着密切的相关。
en: These investigators illustrated a close correlation between total respiratory heat exchange and degree of airway obstruction.

zh: 首先，将呼吸系统想象成一棵倒栽的树（见图5.1）。
en: To start, think of your respiratory system as an upside-down tree (see Figure 5.1).

zh: 我们要追踪吸进的一口空气的旅行过程。先从口腔和鼻子开始。
en: If we follow a breath of air, we’ll start with your mouth and nose.

zh: 空气进入体内，顺气管向下流动。
en: When air enters your body, it goes down your trachea.

zh: 这就是“树干”——呼吸过程开始处的一道通风管。
en: That's your trunk—the one airway at the beginning of the process.

zh: 接着，气管分为两条支路，将空气分开输送到两边的肺中。输送是由支气管完成的。
en: Then it quickly divides into two airways to feed into two lungs; those are your bronchial tubes.

zh: 打造自己的家庭健身房只需要一个壶铃、一副跳绳和一个安装引体向上单杠的地方。
en: You can start building your home gym with just a kettlebell, a jump rope, and a place to install a pull-up bar.

zh: 这些器械只能满足进行身体自重的CFE训练。
en: This will suffice for the many CFE workouts that use body weight only.

zh: 然而某些时候,你也希望做一些自由力量的练习。
en: At some point, however, you will want free weights.

zh: 虽然你可以在健身中心或 者商业健身房进行CrossFit训练,但是这些地方普遍没有高弹片(奥林匹克举重的必需品——进行更大重量的举重时,扔扛铃是很普遍的动作)。
en: Although it is possible to do CrossFit workouts at fitness centers and commercial gyms, they generally don’t have bumper plates (a necessity with Olympic lifts—dropping the barbells is routine when youpursue heavier lifts).

zh: Dennis Bramble (丹尼斯.布兰布尔）和Daniel Lieberman (丹尼尔•利伯曼）对这个问题思考了很多。
en: Dennis Bramble and Daniel Lieberman are two people who have  thought a lot about this.

zh: 他们在《自然》杂志发表的文章中，描述持续运动的解剖和代谢特征，促使了智人（Homo sapiens)的进化。
en: Writing in the journal Nature, they describe  the anatomic and metabolic features that enable sustained exercise that evolved for Homo sapiens.

zh: 文章中的数据包括了肌肉骨骼改造的化石证据：腿部弹性回缩力增强（腿部肌腱长，纵向足弓髙），躯干稳定性增加（骶骨变宽，扩大臀大肌），以及体温调节的优化以适应炎热的非洲大草原（有效的汗腺，缺乏体毛，直立的姿势），这些使能量使用的经济性得到了提髙。
en: The list includes fossil evidence for musculoskeletal adaptations that improve energy economy derived from enhanced elastic recoil of the legs (long leg tendons, high longitudinal foot arches), factors allowing trunk stabilization (widened sacrum, enlarged gluteus maximus muscle), and optimized thermo-regulation for hot African plains (effective sweat glands, lack of body hair, erect posture).

zh: 另一种形式是当视网膜下有异常血管形成时，会出现湿性黄斑变性。
en: "Wet" macular degeneration occurs when abnormal blood vessels form under the retina.

zh: 这些血管最终会渗漏出血细胞，并会毀坏视网膜。
en: The vessels eventually leak blood elements and damage the retina.

zh: 在有些情况下，激光治疗能够改善或延缓这种湿性黄斑变性。
en: In some instances, laser treatment can improve or slow the progress of wet macular degeneration.

zh: 另外，复合维生素能够推迟这一变性，或在某些情况下防止有些人的早期湿性黄斑变性转变成失明。
en: We also know that multivitamins can delay or in some cases prevent early wet macular degeneration from becoming ''eye blinding' in some people.

zh: 我们知道黄斑变性是一种基因状况，但更是一种生活方式造成。
en: We know that macular degeneration isn't as much of a genetic condition as it is one of lifestyle.

zh: 所以，选择正确的生活方式，保持血管年轻，你将会减少这两种形式的黄斑变性的发生几率。
en: So making lifestyle choices that keep your arteries young will reduce your chances of developing both forms of macular degeneration.

zh: 总体而言，现有的横向研究说明，经过大强度训练的年轻竞技运动员的月经周期长短同参照检验组相比并无明显差异。而短黄体期、黄体期不足（luteal phase insufficiency)和无排卵期的现象在年轻运动员群体中是比较常见的。
en: Cross-sectional studies in intensively training adolescents have revealed that menstrual cycle lengths are not different from controls, whereas luteal phase insufficiency, short luteal  phase and anovulation are much more common in young athletes.

zh: 不同的训练会引起不同的激素反应。当然，还要考虑其他的影响因素。
en: There is an indication that different types of activity evoke different hormonal responses, although selectioncriteria cannot be excluded.

zh: 采用活垒后的医疗费用支出比采用固定垒板减少了98%。
en: The medical costs for injuries with stationary bases would be reduced by 98% with the use of breakaway bases.

zh: 虽然活垒的售价是固定垒的两倍，但使用活垒后的医疗费用支出减少是非常明显的。
en: Unfortunately, breakaway bases are nearly twice as expensive as stationary bases; however, the health-care cost saving clearly justifies their use.

zh: 不同的活垒可满足不同年龄层次的需求。它们绝大部分是通过维可牢尼龙搭扣固定在地面垒板上。
en: Breakaway bases have been developed for different age groups, most of which attach via Velcro to a plate that is anchored at ground level.

zh: 活垒有不同的型号，可供青少年、成年和职业运动员使用，每一型号均需强大的冲力才能使其移位。
en: Youth, teen, adult and professional models are available, each of which requires increasingly greater force to dislodge.

zh: 卵巢释放出的一个卵子被输卵管抓住。
en: The ovary releases an egg that is grabbed by the fallopian tube.

zh: 一旦卵子与输卵管失之交臂或留在输卵管里，就 会发生宫外孕。
en: If the egg misses this tube or stays in it, ectopic pregnancy can occur.

zh: 当卵子穿过输卵管，向子宫运动时，为了争取与卵子结合，精子之间会发生激烈的生死竞争，如果精子数量少或活性低（怠惰不前），都有可能失败。
en: As the egg passes toward the uterus, sperm try to fertilize the egg in a savage competition for survival, but low sperm count or motility (lazy sperm) can limit their success.

zh: 卵子受精后，会嵌入子宫壁中进一步生长，但是子宫感染或有纤维瘤，就会妨碍受精卵着床。
en: After fertilization, the egg inserts info the wall of the uterus for development, but infections or fibroids of the uterus can inhibit implantation.

zh: 弹震式俯卧撑也就是众所周知的击掌俯卧撑，是一种爆发力练习。
en: The plyometric pushup is also known as clapping pushup.This is the standard pushup, but done explosively.

zh: 动作过程中身体始终要挺直，快速下降到最低点后再用力将自己推起，当动作达到最高点时让手掌暂时离地。
en: Keeping the body ramrod stiff, descend quickly into the bottom position before driving up so hard that the hands leave the floor briefly.

zh: 在半空中快速击掌，然后让手掌着地，反复练习。
en: While in mid-air, clap the hands together in the split second before your palms meet the floor again and then repeat the exercise.

zh: 消化系统有两种激素分别控制饥饿感和食欲。
en: Your digestive system has two main hormones that control hunger and appetite.

zh: 饥饿激素由胃部分泌，能够增强食欲。
en: Ghrelin is secreted by the stomach and increases your appetite.

zh: 胃部变空，就会把饥饿激素派出去索要食物。
en: When your stomach's empty, it sends ghrelin out requesting food.

zh: 瘦素则会告诉大脑饱了。当人进食的时候，脂肪细胞会分泌瘦素，让人停止进食。
en: Leptin tells your brain that you're full When you eat, your fat cells secrete it so that you stop eating.

zh: 1855年，德国军医布赖特豪普特 (Breithaupt)报道了在年轻新兵中发生的此类损伤，这是有关应力性骨折的第一篇医学文献（Breithaupt, 1855)。
en: The first report of a stress fracture in the medical literature was that of the German military surgeon Breithaupt in 1855 who noted the occurrence of these lesions in young military recruits (Breithaupt,1855).

zh: 因为多发生在军事训练中，此种损伤随后被命名为“行军骨折”。在以后的文献中还有多种关于此类病症的命名，如疲劳性骨折、自发性骨折（spontaneous fracture)、伪性骨折 (pseudofracture)、机能不性全骨折 (insufficiency fracture)。
en: These lesions were subsequently identified as 'march fractures' because of their propensity for occurrence with military training.This entity has been identified in subsequent literature by a variety of terms, including fatigue fracture, spontaneous fracture, pseudofracture and insufficiency fracture

zh: 身体发育程度对最大自主收缩力量的影响是独立的，这种影响可能是通过神经系统发育程度的提高和控制能力的增强所致。
en: Maturity might exert an independent influence on maximal voluntary strength, possibly through mechanisms of enhanced neurological maturation and control.

zh: 肌肉力量的大小与运动单元激活的程度有关，而运动单元的激活程度取决于自主神经发放冲动的水平和被募集运动单元的激活水平。因此与年龄大或早发育的男孩女孩比，较晚发育的男孩女孩很可能无法最大程度地激活自己的肌肉。
en: Less mature boys and girls are perhaps not able to maximally activate their muscles because the degree of motor unit activation, which is dependent upon both the level of voluntary neural drive and the level of activation of recruited motor units, is diminished in comparison with older or more mature boys and girls.

zh: 倒立撑可以靠墙做，也可以“自由”做（无任何凭靠），后者要求训练者在平衡训练上投入的精力和在力量训练上投入的一样多。
en: Handstand pushups can be done either with the back against the wall, or “free”—without support.The latter style requires that the athlete expend as much energy on balance as on strength.

zh: 本书（《囚徒健身》）的主要目标是发展肌肉与力量，所以这套系统将集中于有墙壁依靠的练习。
en: The main goal of Convict Conditioning is the development of muscle and might, so this system focuses on the wall-supported variety.

zh: 如果你对自由倒立撑感兴趣，那么先掌握前几式靠墙的动作，这将带给你绰绰有余的力量，使你能够应付自由倒立撑。
en: If you are interested in the non-supported version, master the early steps against the wall first; this will give you more than enough power to tackle the non-supported version.

zh: 以前对运动生理的理解很简单。
en: Once upon a time the understanding of exercise physiology was easy.

zh: 认为各种形式的运动表现的关键是心脏，心脏的功能决定人类跑步、游泳以及骑自行车能到多远和多快。
en: The key to all forms of exercise performance was the heart, whose function determined how far and how fast humans can run, swim, or cycle.

zh: 一旦达到心脏的能力极限，肌肉出现供氧不足，就会释放乳酸。
en: Once the heart’s limiting capacity is reached, the muscles become oxygen deficient, releasing poisonous lactic acid.

zh: 乳酸干扰正常肌肉功能，引起机体疲劳。
en: The lactic acid interferes with normal muscle function, causing the anguish we recognize as fatigue.

zh: 在俄勒冈州本德市的实验室里，迪查理对他研究的运动员进行了全面的测试，他想找出影响良好运动表现的不平衡点和弱点所在。
en: From his lab in Bend, Oregon, Dicharry studies each athlete he works with from the ground up, looking for imbalances and weaknesses that are allowing good performance to leak out.

zh: 显然，力量和协调性是良好运动表现的必要条件，但是迪查理指出，如果你不能保持正确的跑姿，核心力量也不能正常发挥作用。
en: Strength and conditioning are a big part of good performance, but Dicharry maintains that core strength work isn’t much help unless you are using good positions in your running.

zh: 他说：“更好的姿势意味着更好的肌肉控制力。”
en: Says Dicharry, “Better posture means better muscle recruitment.”

zh: 每一个年龄组，早熟男孩都比正常发育和晚发育男孩的肌肉力量大。早熟男孩与晚熟男孩之间的力量差异在13~16岁时最明显。
en: Early maturing boys have a larger muscle strength at each age than their average and later maturing peers.The strength differences between contrasting maturity groups are most marked among 13 and 16 year olds.

zh: 早熟男孩力量较大是他们体型和肌肉重量较大的反映。
en: The higher strength for the early maturing boys reflects their larger body size and muscle mass.

zh: 注意！
en: Caution!

zh: 不要将中央运动振荡器和我们前面章节提到的中央控制器混淆。
en: Don’t confuse this central motor oscillator with the alleged central governor we encountered in the previous chapter.

zh: 他们的名字相似，但它们主管完全不同的方向。
en: Their names are similar, but they’re altogether different directors.

zh: 它们在不同的房间工作，甚至在不同的楼层。
en: They work out of different cubicles, even on separate floors.

zh: 我们都拥有前者（中央运动振荡器），它控制肌肉收缩的模式和速度，从而让我们能够走、跑、游泳和骑自行车。
en: We all possess the former, which controls the pattern and rate of muscle contractions that let us walk, run, swim, and cycle.

zh: 中央控制器则主要负责提出策略，具有控制、制动功能，能决定我们比赛的速度，同时让我们避免过度发力造成的危险。
en: The other is a proposed strategizer (with a brake) that might determine our pace during racing and could keep us from dangerous levels of overexertion.

zh: 所有在本章被列举到的关于视觉运动时机掌控的技能（除了简单反应时间）也会通过训练得到提髙。
en: In sports where it counts, all the skills of visuomotor timing enumerated in this chapter (except simple reaction time) also improve with training.

zh: 尽管这样，请注意，这种技能的获得通常具有髙度的项目特异性。也就是说，一个棒球击球手可以很好地击打投球，但是他在篮球场上，为一个弹起的球分配跳跃时间的能力却是非常一般的。
en: (It is important to note, though, that such gains are typically highly task specific. That is, a baseball batter gets better at hitting a pitched ball, but his ability to time a jump for a rebound on the basketball court will remain limited.)

zh: 在这些运动中获得运动能力提髙的基础是大幅度提髙神经肌肉协调性和时间分配能力。
en: The basis for improvement in these sports, then, is largely that of enhancing neuromuscular coordination and timing abilities.

zh: 随后，提髙拦截能力——从而提髙运动表现——的唯一方法就是去进行大量的比赛和练习。
en: It follows, then, that one way to improve such perceptuomotor function—and thereby improve performance—is to simply play and practice a lot.

zh: 此外，肌纤维类型也是很重要的。
en: Important in this discussion, too, is a consideration of type of muscle fiber.

zh: 短跑运动员的腿部肌肉比我们其他人拥有更髙比例的快肌或II型纤维。
en: Sprinters tend to possess a higher proportion of what are called fast-twitch, or Type II, fibers in their leg muscles than the rest of us do.

zh: 这些肌纤维通过快速收缩和使用无氧代谢，是促进短时间高强度的运动专家。
en: These fibers are specialists in facilitating short bursts of high-intensity activities by their rapid contraction times and use of anaerobic metabolism.

zh: 非运动员的小腿肌肉（腓肠肌）由50%的快肌纤维组成，优秀短跑运动员的腓肠肌则是75%左右。
en: The calf (gastrocnemius) muscle of non-athletes is made up of about 50% fast-twitch fibers.The same muscle in a typical elite sprinter has about 75%.

zh: 身体活动领域的研究可以看成一条一端为应用性研究，另一端为基础性研究的连续线。
en: Research in our field can be placed on a continuum that has applied research at one extreme and basic research at the opposite extreme.

zh: 两极端的研究各拥有其特徵。
en: The research extremes are generally associated with certain characteristics.

zh: 应用性研究所侧重的为立即性问题的解决，使用真实的环境，以人为参与者，对研究环境做有限的控制，但研究的结果对实务人员具有直接的价值。
en: Applied research tends to address immediate problems, use so-called real-world settings, use human participants, and involve limited control over the research setting, but it gives results that are of direct value to practitioners.

zh: 另一端的基础性研究通常在探讨理论性问题，通常以实验室做为研究的环境、常常以动物做为参与者、审慎控制情况、所得到的研究结果较无法做直接的应用。
en: At the other extreme, basic research usually deals with theoretical problems.It uses the laboratory as the setting, frequently uses animals as subjects, carefully controls conditions, and produces results that have limited direct application.

zh: 在完成基础训练阶段后，接下来是为期一个月的坡度跑训练，这期间跑者将按照利迪亚德的“弹簧”模式训练。
en: Following this base-building phase came a month of hill work during which runners used a form Lydiard called “springing.”

zh: 本阶段的训练是为跑者下一阶段的速度训练做准备。
en: This was a kind of bounding that prepared runners for the speed phases of the program.

zh: 在4周的坡度跑训练后，采用利迪亚德训练计划的跑者将进行传统的速度训练，即在跑道上完成间歇跑训练。接下来是训练的峰值期，为的是带给跑者最佳运动表现。
en: After 4 weeks of hill training, Lydiard’s runners moved on to traditional speed work, running intervals on a track, followed by a peaking period that was intended to bring them to their best possible performance.

zh: 基因改造目前的研究对于线虫或者相近物种，有希望在延缓其衰老方面获得成功。
en: Genetic Manipulation                                                                                                If you happen to be a nematode worm—or are closely related to one—there is hope for you.

zh: 二十多年前就有报道称，线虫体内的单基因突变显著地延长其生命，在某些个体中，寿命延长多达六倍。
en: More than 20 years ago, investigators reported that a single gene mutation in C. elegans significantly lengthened the worm’s life span, as much as sixfold in some cases.

zh: 从那时起，抗衰老的基因突变在大量的生物体中被发现。
en: Since that time, antiaging gene mutants have been described in a large number of organisms.

zh: 在大鼠身上也发现了这类基因，而大鼠与人类的同源性约为50%到60%。
en: The most advanced in terms of evolution is the mouse (with increases that are much more conservative, at 50 to 60%).

zh: 一个著名的例子是职棒大联盟的投手托米• 约翰（Tommy John) 在经历了手臂的大手术之后变成了一个更好的投手。
en: A notable example is major league pitcher, Tommy John, who became a much better pitcher after undergoing extensive surgery on his arm than he had been before.

zh: 这样的情形在20世纪60年代兴奋剂出现之后变得更加引人注目。
en: The picture changed even more dramatically when performance-enhancing drugs became common in the 1960s.

zh: 时至今日，人们通过操纵基因工程并提高运动员的“天赋”可能会取代“熟能生巧”。
en: Today, advances in genetic engineering raise the specter that manufacturing athletic talent may overtake "practice makes perfect."

zh: 为了应对绝经期产生的健康问题，激素补充疗法成为一种常用的治疗手段。
en: To combat the problems associated with menopausal symptoms, hormone replacement therapy (HRT)—or, as its now called, hormone therapy (HT)—became a popular treatment.

zh: 由于人体激素含量随着年龄增长而下降，人们认为摄取激素可能会让我们保持年轻。
en: Since we lose levels of hormones as we age, it was thought that ingesting hormones could be a way of keeping us young.

zh: 激素补充疗法存在的缺陷是会产生非常严重的副作用，比如静脉堵塞现象增多，这会引发血栓转移至肺部（即肺栓塞），也可能引发癌症和心脏病。
en: The problem with HT is that it is linked to very serious side effects, including increased vein clotting, which can lead to a clot breaking off and traveling to the lungs (pulmonary embolism), cancer and heart attacks.

zh: 当然，每一块肌肉的功能各不相同， 不宜承受的外力方式也各不一样。不过，我们还是打算主要关注一种常见的与衰老有关的肌肉虚弱问题——背痛。
en: Of course, while every one of those muscles serves a different purpose and each is susceptible to its own form of strain, tears, and other kinds of injuries, we want to focus on the most common and debilitating muscle problem in terms of aging: back pain.

zh: 首先，我们简单回顾一下基础知识。
en: First, let's tour your back.

zh: 人的脊柱是弯曲的蛇形结构，由许多小骨头——椎骨组成，椎骨彼此相叠，构成脊柱。
en: Your spine is the snakelike curved structure made up of samll bones called the vertebrae, which are stacked one on top of another to form a column.

zh: 在相邻的椎骨间，是起到缓冲垫功能的椎间盘。
en: Between each two vertebrae, there's a disc that provides cushioning.

zh: 我们可以把脊柱结构想象成垒作一摞的果冻面圈，椎骨就是半硬的面圈，湿软夹心是椎间盘。
en: Think of the spinal structure as a series of jelly doughnuts ——with the vertebrae acting as the semihard casing and the discs as the squishy substances inside that casing.

zh: 在统计和数学运算中，有一部分比较容易理解的是关于分数的集中趋势（central tendency)和变异性（variability)之计算。
en: Some of the more easily understood statistical and mathematical calculations are those that find the central tendency and variability of scores.

zh: 当你有了一组分数，可以用一个数字来代表群体，这个数字通常就是平均数、中位数或众数。
en: When you have a group of scores, one number may be used to represent the group.That number is generally the mean, median, or mode.

zh: 这些词语都是用来表达集中趋势的方法。
en: These terms are ways of expressing central tendency.

zh: 此外，在这群分数中，每一个个别分数和前述呈现集中趋势的分数都会有某种程度的差别。
en: Within the group of scores, each individual score differs to some degree from the central tendency score.

zh: 事实上，莱昂纳多•达•芬奇已经设计了计步器来计算步数，测量距离。
en: In fact, Leonardo da Vinci had already designed a pedometer to measure distance by counting steps.

zh: 计步器记录的是腰部垂直方向的加速度和减速度。
en: The pedometer records the acceleration and deceleration of the waist in the vertical direction.

zh: 其工作原理是，由一条复杂弹簧平衡的一只机械臂在悬吊方向上受到轻微摇晃时上下摆动。
en: The functional principle is that an arm balanced by a delicate spring is displaced downwards by slight jolts in the direction of suspension.

zh: 各种便携式加速度测量仪 (accelerometer)能够较好反映每天的体力 活动情况，加速度测量仪也叫动作记录仪 (actometer)。
en: A better reflection of daily physical activity is given by portable accelerometers also called actometer.

zh: 当一个人移动时，肢体和身体都在加速和减速。
en: When a person moves, the limbs and body are accelerated and decelerated.

zh: 在呼吸仓内用测力台进行的检测表明，加速度测量仪的结果与能量消耗量非常一致。
en: Measurements with force—platform in a respiration chamber showed good agreement with energy turnover.

zh: 你无法计算在短跑过程中实际产生的马力，因为产生功率的矢量（身体 运动的方向）发生在多个方向（垂直、水平、横向），弹性反冲的贡献不能准确地量化，而且个人身体部分之间都发生能量转移。
en: You aren’t able to actually calculate horsepower production during sprinting since vectors of power production (directions of body movement) occur in multiple directions (vertical, horizontal, lateral), the contributions of elastic recoil can’t be accurately quantified, and energy transfer occurs between individual body segments.

zh: 此外，在推动身体朝向终点时，腿部肌肉功率产生的大小，取决于比赛的部分。
en: Moreover, the magnitude of the leg muscles’ power production in propelling the body toward the finish line depends on the portion of the race.

zh: 当达到一个稳定的速度，部分能量转移和弹性反冲主要负责推动力，但加速阶段则需要更多的功率输出。
en: Much more is required in the acceleration phase, although segment energy transfer and elastic recoil largely account for propulsion once a steady speed has been attained.

zh: 脂肪在咽喉后部积累，引起打鼾，在人入睡时，周边肌肉放松，还会引发睡眠呼吸暂停综 合征。
en: Fat accumulates in the back of the throat and causes snoring and sleep apnea when the surrounding muscles relax during sleep.

zh: 在舌后部的会厌不让贪物进入气管（主通风口），避免呛着。
en: At the back of the tongue, the epiglottis protects the trachea (windpipe) from food and prevents choking.

zh: 甲状腺就位于脖子上气符 前部。有些人的甲状腺清楚可见。
en: The thyroid gland, which is nestled just in front of the trachea in your neck， can be seen in some folks.

zh: 使用抗多巴胺能的药物如氯丙嗪 (chlorpromazine)疗法中，常可见到轻度的髙泌乳素血症。
en: A common cause of mild hyperprolactinaemia is therapy with antidopaminergic agents such as chlorpromazine.

zh: 但是，这些青少年多数 虽然没有月经初潮或发生继发性的闭经，存在着某些青春期的发育。
en: In most cases, however, these adolescents will show some pubertal development, although they may not attain menarche or may have secondary amenorrhoea.

zh: 库兴氏病 (Cushing ’s disease)和甲状腺机能低下(hypothyroidism)都被列人性发育缺失的青春期发育延迟的原因仅延缓性的发育或延长月经初潮前的时间。
en: Both Cushing's disease and hypothyroidism are listed as causes of delayed adolescence without sexual development.More often they merely delay sexual development or prolong the time before menarche.

zh: 研究表明提高钾的摄入量能够减少某种形式的动脉老化的发生。
en: Studies have shown that increased potassium intake can decrease the incidence of some forms of arterial aging.

zh: 钾是一种电解质，即一种保证适当的细胞功能的带电微粒。
en: Potassium is anelectrolyte-an electrically charged particle needed for proper cellular functioning.

zh: 钾尤其有助于携带电荷以帮 助神经或肌肉收缩，还能协助调整血压，使心脏和肾脏工作正常（每天吃相当三根香蕉的钾可以使你的生理年龄年轻0.6岁之多）。
en: Potassium specifically helps in carrying an electrical charge to help a nerve or muscle contract, and it helps regulate blood pressure and allow the heart and kidneys to  function properly.(Adding the potassium equivalent of three bananas a day can make your Real Age as much as 0.6 years younger.)

zh: 假设（hypothesis)指的是预期的结果。
en: The hypothesis is the expected result.

zh: 当研究者准备进行一项研究时，通常对可能得到的结果已经有想法。
en: A person setting out to conduct a study generally has an idea as to what the outcome will be.

zh: 这种问题的预期处理方式可能是依据理论的构念、先前相关研究的结果、或实验者过去的经验与观察。
en: This anticipated solution to the problem may be based on some theoretical construct, on the results of previous studies, or perhaps on the experimenter’s experience and observations.

zh: 由于先前已讨论过以非科学的方法取得知识之缺点，因此最后一项来源可能性较低或较不容易有说服力。
en: The last source is probably least likely or defensible because of the weaknesses of the unscientific methods of acquiring knowledge discussed previously.

zh: 当研究者想要了解与记录某一些特定间隔时段里，是否有发生所欲观察的一些问题行为时所采用的记录方式，就称为间 隔法（interval method) 。
en: The interval method is used when the researcher wishes to record whether the behavior in question occurs in a certain interval of time.

zh: 当个别事件或问题行为的发生较难计数时，这种方式是很有用的。
en: This method is useful when counting individual occurrences is difficult.

zh: 在间隔法中，有一个具有领先地位的标准化系统就是Handers交互作用分析系统工具（ Flanders’ Interaction Analysis System ) (Flanders, 1970)，观察者根据每个间隔内10个具体行为分类记录学生的行为。
en: One of the leading standardized systems for interval recording is the Flanders’ Interaction Analysis System (Flanders, 1970), in which the observer records the behavior of the student according to 10 specific behavior classifications within each time interval.

zh: 目前，已经发表了内容广泛的MET值表（Ainsworth et al.，1993)。
en: Recently, an extensive list of MET values has been published (Ainsworth et al., 1993).

zh: 该表的大多数数据是用间接热量测定法得到的实际数值。
en: Much of the data in this list are derived from actual measurements by indirect calorimetry.

zh: 但是，在数据缺乏时，数值是依据经验推算出来的。
en: However, when data were not available the figures were based upon educated guesses.

zh: 某些活动的数值不是从实际活动时得来的。
对任何开始练习深蹲的人来说，肩倒立深蹲都是完美的起点。
en: Shoulderstand squats are the perfect preliminary exercise for anybody who wants to start squatting.

zh: 由于做该动作时身体处于倒立姿势，所以膝盖和下背部无需承受身体的重量，这就使得该动作成为一个理想的恢复性训练动作——可以帮助那些背部和膝盖有伤的健身者，或是刚做完手术正处于恢复期的健身者重新开始腿部训练。
en: Due to the inverse position of the body, there is virtually no weight going through the knees and lower back.This makes them an ideal rehabilitation exercise to help those with back or knee injuries—perhaps coming out of surgery—to get back into sports where leg motion is crucial.

zh: 从力量角度来说，做肩倒立其实对健身者上身的要求更高。
en: In strength terms, shoulderstand squats are in fact harder on the upper body than the lower body.

zh: 但是这一动作能让紧绷的关节放松，增加关节的活动幅度，从而能让初学者为练就完美的深蹲打下基础。
en: But they do free up tight joints, increase range of motion and set beginners on the road to perfect form.

zh: 标准化的人体测量技术是很容易被忽略的。
en: Standardized anthropometry is an elusive goal.

zh: 不可以将名称相似的技术看做是同一个技术。
en: Similarly named techniques cannot be assumed to be identical.

zh: 例如国际生物学计划 (International Biological Programme, IBP)测量肩峰间距的方法是“当双肩向前成圆形时”进行的，所测到的数据比本章提倡的经典技术（受试者取站立位）要大些。
en: For example, the International Biological Programme (IBP) method for obtaining biacromial breadth 'when the shoulders are rounded forward' (Weiner & Lourie, 1981) is systematically larger than the classical technique advocated in this chapter where the subject stands erect.

zh: 建立题库是创造大量题目的资料库。这些题目可以用来建立在估计潜在特质时，具备特定精确度特征的测验。
en: Item banking is the creation of large pools of test items that can be used for constructing tests that have certain characteristics concerning the precision of estimating latent ability.

zh: 适性测验，有时又称为客制化测验，是指选择最合适每个人能力程度的题目（既不会太难也不会太简单）。
en: Adaptive testing, sometimes called tailored testing, refers to selecting items that best fit (are neither too difficult nor too easy for) the ability level of each person.

zh: 最后，必须将一般的力量训练和参加竞技运动和奥林匹克的举重严格区别开来。
en: Lastly, a distinction must be made between strength training and participation in the sports of competitive and Olympic weight-lifting and power-lifting.

zh: 如果在监督下，有正确的技术指导和对负荷的恰当选择，力量训练对于大多数儿童而言是一种快乐的、风险相对低的活动。
en: Strength training if done under supervision and with appropriate technique instruction and prescription of loads can be an enjoyable and relatively low risk activity for most children.

zh: 但是，像竞技性的奥林匹克的举重、大力举、健美运动（body building)对儿童可能是风险较高的活动，根据一些专业团体的规定，不宜向儿童推荐（American Academy of Pediatrics, 1990; American Orthopaedic Society for Sports Medicine 见 Cahill, 1988)。
en: Competitive and Olympic weight-lifting, power-lifting and body building however, may prove riskier activities for children, and according to some professional bodies should not be recommended for preadolescents (American Academ y of Pediatrics, 1990; American Orthopaedic Society for Sports Medicine — see Cahill, 1988).

zh: 健身球锻炼——以前，想要锻炼腰部的训练者往往会严重依赖健身球，但这个动作也几乎像恐龙一样灭绝了。
en: Medicine Ball Work—In the old days, athletes used to rely heavily on the medicine ball to train their waists, but this has largely gone the way of the dinosaur.

zh: 真可惜！其实投和接重球的动作能够锻炼所有的中段内部肌肉，比如膈肌和腹横肌。
en: It’s a shame, because throwing and catching a heavy ball works all the internal muscles of the midsection, like the diaphragm and transversus.

zh: 该动作会强迫腹肌快速有力地收缩，就像摔倒或受到撞击时，腹肌要快速收缩以保护内脏那样。
en: It forces the abs to contract quickly and powerfully in the way they need to fire when bracing for a fall or protecting the internal organs from a stout punch.

zh: 不过，你无需真正的健身球，如果你投掷时足够用力，篮球就可以了。
en: You don’t need a heavy authentic medicine ball, a basketball will do if you throw it hard enough.

zh: 你甚至都不需要训练伙伴，只要将球投向一堵墙，在其反弹回来时将其抓住即可。
en: You don’t even require a training partner—you can just shoot that sucker at a wall and catch it on the rebound.

zh: 在第十一章身体智慧这一章，我试着向你传授一点儿有用的健身哲学，这些都是基于我多年的经验而成。
en: In chapter 11: Body Wisdom, I try to pass on some of the useful training philosophy I’ve garnered over the years.

zh: 在有些问题上，我也会给你一些建议，从如何合理热身到如何不使用药物就获得进步。
en: I’ll give you tips on subjects ranging from proper warm up protocols to the best way to make real and permanent progress as a drug-free strength athlete.

zh: 这一章的知识与策略可以使你免于浪费数年努力进行毫无成效的锻炼。
en: The approaches and strategies  in this chapter could save you years of wasted efforts and yo-yo training.

zh: 7. B:有数据表明，要防治动脉血管疾病和癌症，两片或两片以上的幼儿用阿司匹林与一整片普通阿司匹林效果相同。
en: 7. B: The data show that you get as much benefit for preventing arterial disease and cancer from two or more baby aspirins as from a full aspirin.

zh: 防治动脉疾病，两片幼儿用阿司匹林比一片效果高两倍以上。
en: And two baby aspirins are more than twice as good at preventing arterial disease as is one baby aspirin.

zh: 8.B: 当你连有关阿尔茨海默病的最新信息也忘记的时候，健忘的情况就非常明显了，你都意识不到自己已经忘了。
en: 8. B: While you forget recent information with Alzheimer's, the forgetfulness is so profound that you can't recognize that you forgot.

zh: 心脏就像你家一样，也有“门厅”——心房，储存流入心脏的血液。
en: Now just like your house, your heart also has an atrium, which holds the blood coming into the heart.

zh: 当这种相对不太重要的房间发生纤维性颤动时，人们会感到心悸。
en: When fibrillation happens in this less critical chamber, folks feel palpitations.

zh: 与需要植入AICD的心脏病人不同，这种患者有时需要用其他方法治疗，比如植入起搏器、射频消溶手术或服用药品，药物治疗包括服用降低血液黏度的药品，能够防止不断运动的心房壁上因凝血累积而引发中风。
en: Instead of an AICD, these people sometimes need minimally invasive procedures like a pacemaker insertion, ablation, or medications including a blood thinner to prevent blood clots that accumulate on the quivering atrial walls and can cause strokes.

zh: 肾上腺也分泌降肾上腺素和肾上腺素。当你激动时，这两种物质的分泌水平就会上升。
en: Your adrenal glands also produce norepinephrine and epinephrine, levels of which rise when you get excited.

zh: 在正常的口常生活中，肾上腺素的水平维持在每毫升200至800毫微克（十亿分之一克）。
en: In normal daily life, your levels of epinephrine hover between 200 to 800 nanograms per milliliter.

zh: 你一定了解那种感觉，就是当你险些遇上车祸时，你会感到脸红、心跳，其至咒骂那些不长眼睛的并道行驶司机。
en: You know that feeling when you narrowly avoid a car accident—when your face feels flushed, your heart races, and you swear at the incompetence of no-look mergers?

zh: 范登堡等 (Vandenburgh et al., 1989)在覆盖有胶原蛋白的培养基上培养鸟骨骼肌时也证实了这一现象的存在。
en: Vandenburgh et al. (1989) also demonstrated this phenomenon using avian skeletal myoblasts grown on collagen-coated medium.

zh: 机械牵拉会引起蛋白质生成的增加。
en: Mechanical stretch led to an increase in protein production.

zh: 值得注意的是，若培养基中不含生长因子，则肌细胞的生长明显减慢。这促使研究者得出以下的结论，机械作用刺激细胞生长是依赖这些生长因子的作用。
en: It is noteworthy that muscle cell growth was significantly reduced in basal medium without growth factors prompting the authors to comment that mechanically stimulated cell growth was dependent on these growth factors.

zh: 有点令人不解的是，为什么人们认为训练会影响女孩而不是男孩的性发育成熟。
en: It is somewhat puzzling why one would expect training to influence the sexual maturation of girls and not of boys.

zh: 对于男孩和女孩来说，引起性发育成熟的基本神经的内分泌过程大致相同，其他和体育有关的环境压力如焦虑和睡眠， 都同样会影响女孩和男孩。
en: Underlying neuroendocrine processes that trigger sexual maturation are generally similar, and other environmental stresses related to sport, such as anxiety and sleep, undoubtedly affect boys as well as girls.

zh: 然而，除了摔跤，也许还有柔道和空手道外，男孩参加的运动的特征之一是不必过分强调控制体重的。
en: However, with the exception of wrestling and perhaps judo and karate, emphasis on extreme weight regulation is not characteristic of sports for boys.

zh: 回流其实是进化的最大恩赐之一。
en: Regurgitation is actually one of evolution's greatest gifts.

zh: 回流引起的反胃、呕吐保护了我们。
en: That ability to regurgitate protects us.

zh: 看看马吧，马不会呕吐，所以当它们吃了有毒的东西后，就无法将毒物排出体外。
en: Horses, for instance, can't vomit, so when they eat poisonous stuff, they can't get it out of their system.

zh: 这就带来了绞痛，或者说是由消化道受损引起的剧烈腹痛。绞痛是马死亡的主要原因。
en: That promotes a condition called colic—or severe abdominal pain caused by trauma in the digestive tract—and that's the leading cause of equine deaths.

zh: 这与前交叉是相同的脚步动作，但它更有挑战性。
en: This is the same foot action as the cross in front, but it is much more aggressive.

zh: 之前的练习是一个快速脚步训练，这个练习才是真正的变向训练。
en: Where the previous drill is a quick-foot drill, this one is a real change-of-direction drill.

zh: 在进行高难度交叉步练习时，我们提示用内侧的腿非常用力地蹬地，非常鼓励运动员向绳梯倾斜。
en: In the hard cross-over we cue a really aggressive push-off with the inside leg, really encouraging the athlete to lean into the ladder.

zh: 落地是非常积极主动地双脚落地停止，因此它不是1-2-3的节奏，它更偏向于一个两拍训练。
en: The landing is a very aggressive stop in a two-foot base position, so rather than a 1-2-3 rhythm it is more of a two-count drill.

zh: 该动作是向绳梯倾斜，内侧腿用力蹬地，跨进绳梯，双脚在另一侧稳健地落地。
en: The action is lean into the ladder, push hard with the inside leg to cross into the ladder, and land solid on two feet on the opposite side.

zh: 落地时应该模仿溜冰者的停止动作或双脚滑垒式移动的动作。
en: The landing should mimic a skater’s stop or the action of a two-foot baseball slide.

zh: 麦肯齐训练跑者练习提脚动作，尽可能短时间接触地面。
en: MacKenzie drills runners to practice a foot pull that spends as little time as possible on the ground.

zh: 跑者们的目标是落地轻，并做到几乎没有落地声音。
en: His runners aim to touch down with a light sort of tap that creates little or no sound.

zh: 脚步接触地面的时间越短，越会减少脚部向内过度翻转产生的麻烦，也就是所说的‘足内翻’。
en: The theory is that with less time spent on the ground, the foot has less time to get into the kind of trouble caused by the sheering forces of excessive inward foot rolling, known as “overpronation.”

zh: 其次，年轻运动员是一个经过充分筛选的人群，在筛选过程中不仅考虑了技术和运动能力水平，还考虑了运动员的身材大小和体形。
en: Second, young athletes are a highly selected group not only with regard to skill and performance level but also with regard to size and physique.

zh: 这种选择有可能是由运动员本人、家长、教练员、有影响的其他人或由这些人共同决定的。
en: The selection may be made by the individual, parents, coach, influential others or some combination of these.

zh: 而且，提早发育本身就与生长有关，而二者又都与运动能力联系着的。
en: Further, earlier maturation is intrinsically related to growth in size and both are associated with performance.

zh: 本能的动作，如吮吸动作就可以在未满月婴儿睡眠状态下看到（Wolff,1966)。
en: Spontaneous movement patterns, such as mouthing, can be observed in neonates in a drowsy state (Wolff, 1966).

zh: 这种动作常常是有节奏性的，被称为节奏定型动作（rhythmical stereotypies)。
en: They are often hythmical, in which case they are called rhythmical stereotypies.

zh: 婴儿在1岁期间表现出大量的节奏定型动作，诸如踢腿、身体波浪运动、身体弯曲、身体摇摆、跳跃等等（Wolff,1968;Thelen，1981）。
en: During their first year, infants perform a great variety of stereotypies, such as kicking, waving, banging, rocking, bouncing, and so on (Wolff, 1968; Thelen, 1981).

zh: 纤维是人体排污管道的神奇养料，目前我们还不能证明纤维可以预防结肠癌。
en: While fiber is the wonder nutrient for your tubing, it hasn't been shown to prevent colon cancer.

zh: 每天服用两小片阿司匹林，可以将结肠癌发病率降低40%，而服用大剂量的叶酸和（或）钙，结肠癌发病率会降低30%。
en: You can reduce the chances of getting colon cancer by 40 percent by taking two baby aspirins a day and by 30 percent by taking high doses of folate and/or calcium.

zh: 不过最好的预防方法还要包括定期接受结肠镜检査，观察是否有早期癌变特征的息肉，并要定期做粪便潜血检査。
en: But the best prevention also includes a regular colonoscopy to check for precancerous polyps and to check your stool regularly for blood.

zh: 传说罗马皇帝尼禄能借助一枚绿宝石聚焦，观察角斗士的格斗。人们认为这是最先发明的眼镜之一。
en: It’s said that Nero would look through an emerald to help focus on gladiator fights, and that’s thought to have been one of the first inventions of eyeglasses.

zh: 眼部的屈光问题造成的近视（你只能看见近处的东西）或是远视（你只能看见远处的东西）是因为光线在进入眼睛的过程中出了问题。
en: Simply, refractive problems like nearsightedness (when you can see only close things) or farsightedness (when you can see only faraway things)—stem from that process where light comes in.

zh: 手（茎突间线到指尖长度）。
en: Hand (mid-stylion line to dactylion length).

zh: 从茎突间线到第三指尖的最短距离。
en: Shortest distance from the mid-stylion line to the dactylion III.

zh: 受试者将右手伸展，手掌向上，手指完全伸直。
en: The subject extends the right hand supinated (palms up), fully extending the fingers.

zh: 将指示器末端放在茎突间线上，用右手将指示器的外鞘指针放在受试者中指的最远端皮肤上。
en: Place the end pointer on the marked mid-stylion line and apply the housing pointer held in your right hand to the subject's dactylion, the most distal point on the fleshy surface of the third digit.

zh: 手（茎突间线-中指尖长度）。
en: Hand (mid-stylion line-dactylion length)）.

zh: 从茎突间线到第三指尖的最短距离。
en: Shortest distance from the mid-stylion line to the dactylion III.

zh: 受试者将右手伸展，手掌向上，手指完全伸直。
en: The subject extends the right hand supinated (palms up), fully extending the fingers.

zh: 将指示器末端放在茎突间线上，用右手将指示器的外鞘指针放在受试者中指的最远端皮肤上。
en: Place the end pointer on the marked mid-stylion line and apply the housing pointer held in your right hand to the subject's dactylion, the most distal point on the fleshy surface of the third digit.

zh: 精神疾病既受化学因素影响，也受环境因素影响。抑郁症一方面是由于化学物质发生问题而引起的，另一方面也受到情感方面的影响。
en: Mental illness is both chemical and environmental—as much as it is a chemical problem, there's also an emotional basis of depression.

zh: 实际上，人脑扫描表明抑郁的情绪位于脑部负责处理情感的部分。
en: In fact, brain scans show that depression is localized to the parts of the brain that deal with emotion.

zh: 我们经常会询问医生，精神疾病有多大程度受心理因素影响，又有多大程度受脑部化学物质状况影响？
en: We’re often asked how much of mental illness comes from psychological factors and how much comes from brain chemistry.

zh: 医生们大多会如此回答：“两者都会产生百分之百的影响。
en: Many doctors answer one hundred percent of both.

zh: Paul向我介绍了一个我以前从来没有过的想法——精神节奏。
en: Paul introduced me to an idea I hadn’t thought of before—mental pacing.

zh: “就像你必须调节你的体能，不能在比赛中太早地力竭一样，你也必须保护你的精力。你只有那么多的生理和心理储备。比赛的最后将是艰难的。你必须有足够的坚韧不拔的精神去克服困难。
en: “Just like you have to regulate your physical effort to not become exhausted too early in a race, you have to conserve your mental effort. You only have so many physical and mental reserves. The end of the race will be tough. You have to have enough mental toughness left to push hard. That means staying really relaxed early on.”

zh: 这意味着赛程的前期要保持真正的放松。
那么学习这些动作需要多长时间呢？
en: How long will it take to learn the movements?

zh: 根据年龄、运动背景、灵活性、受伤史等问题，这个过程大约需要一个月，或者也许几个月。
en: Depending on age, athletic background, mobility issues, and injury history, among other factors, this may take just a month.Or it may take a number of months.

zh: 当你第一次尝试火箭推（一个单独的爆发力动作，组合了颈前深蹲和过顶推举）、过顶深蹲或者严格的引体向上（体操运动员标准的全身引体向上）动作时，你也许会觉得力不从心。
en: The first time you try a thruster (a taxing combination of a front squat and overhead press into a single, explosive movement), an overhead squat, or a kipping pull-up (pull-ups with a gymnast’s full-body kip move), you might think you’re in over your head.

zh: 反正我开始也是这么认为的。
en: That’s what I thought, anyway.

zh: 但是如果你保持谦虚、耐心和坚持的态度，你会惊喜地发现身体的改变。
en: But if you remain humble, patient, and consistent, you will be surprised at how well your body responds.

zh: 颈围。
en: Neck girth.

zh: 喉结上方的颈部围度。
en: Perimeter of the neck taken immediately superior to the larynx (Adam's apple).

zh: 当受试者的头定位在法兰克福平面上时，取坐位的受试者的颈部长轴要与卷尺呈直角。
en: The tape is located perpendicular to the long axis of the neck of the seated subject when his head is oriented in the Frankfort plane.

zh: 在卷尺上只施加轻微的压力。
en: The usual light anthropometric touch is applied to the tape.

zh: 患骨软骨病的儿童，如奥-施氏病（胚骨粗隆骨软骨病）、朔伊尔曼氏病（脊柱骨软骨病）、潘纳尔氏病（青年崎形性跖趾骨软骨炎）、股骨头骨骺骨软骨病，可能会因为不同原因就诊。
en: Children with osteochondroses, e.g.Osgood-Schlatter disease, Scheuermann's disease, Partner's disease and Legg-Calvé--Perthes disease, may have different reasons for seeking health care.

zh: 每一种综合征均可能在运动时产生疼痛。
en: One symptom can be pain associated with sports activity.

zh: 在此种情形下，体育运动可能不仅仅是发生疼 痛的原因，而更可能是诱因。
en: In such circumstances, sports activities are presumably not the cause but, rather, the provocative factor.

zh: 另外一个常见的功能性杂音是静脉的哼鸣声（venous hum）。
en: Another common functional murmur is the venous hum.

zh: 该杂音的特点是一种连续的吹风样杂音，在右侧或左侧锁骨上和锁骨下区域听得最清楚。
en: This murmur is characterized as a continuous rather blowing murmur best heard in the right or left supra-and infraclavicular areas.

zh: 当被检者取坐位时，该杂音听得最清楚，而当被检者仰卧时或通常无法听到该杂音，或者采取各种方法组织静脉血液从颈部回流到心脏（如轻轻压迫颈静脉）时杂音就消失了。
en: This murmur is best appreciated when the individual is sitting and generally is inaudible when the individual is supine or becomes inaudible with various manipulations that obstruct the return of venous blood from the neck to the heart (gentle external jugular compression).

zh: 因此，自尊是一个社会性结构， 受到个体如何评价别人对自己的看法的影响。
en: Consequently, self-esteem is a social construction susceptible to how individuals appraise the views of others about the self.

zh: 这种观点源于库利（Cooley, 1902) 提出的“镜像自我” （“ looking -glass self”），也就是人们通过其他人来认识自己。
en: This idea stems from Cooley (1902) who coined the phrase 'looking-glass self' suggesting that individuals come to see themselves through others.

zh: 我们可以想象，一个人可以通过选择 与欣赏自己的人进行交往，从而保护自己的自尊，因此一个人的价值观可以反映他对周围其他人对自己积极评价的觉察程度。
en: Conceivably, selfesteem could be protected by an individual surrounding him self or herself with select people who appear to view the individual favourably, so that one's personal evaluation of worth would reflect the perceived positive evaluation of others.

zh: 另一方面，纪录片展开了细井的救赎舞台。
en: On the other hand, the documentary developed Hosoi's redemption stage.

zh: 首先，是细井的女朋友珍妮弗•李（Jennifer Lee)在帮助他转变的过程中所起到的作用。
en: First, the role of Hosoi's girlfriend, Jennifer Lee, in initiating his conversion was addressed.

zh: 在服刑期间，他信仰了基督，并和珍妮弗结婚（Freedman & Montano，2006)。
en: While serving his time, he converted to Christianity and he and Lee were also married (Freedman & Montano, 2006).

zh: 切鲁迪认为，许多长跑运动员最主要的薄弱点在于缺乏上肢力量和高质量的跑步训练。
en: Cerutty believed that a major weakness for many distance runners was lack of upper-body strength as well as a lack of focus on quality running.

zh: 切鲁迪指导的跑者要进行一周两次的举重训练、体操训练和不同配速的跑步训练。埃米尔•扎托贝克于1922年出生于捷克斯洛伐克。
en: Runners in Cerutty’s program were directed to do intense weight lifting twice a week, perform gymnastics, and run at different paces.EMIL ZÁTOPEK was born in 1922 in Czechoslovakia.

zh: 16岁时他就辍学了，开始在一家鞋厂工作。
en: By age 16, he was done with school and working in a shoe factory.

zh: 某次参加工厂1.6千米跑步比赛时，他惊讶地发现自己居然拿了第二名，从那时起他便爱上了跑步。
en: When he was chosen to run a 1-mile factory race, he surprised himself by coming in second, and he caught the running bug.

zh: 你身体里的细胞有点像你的味蕾，它们会准确知道自己喜欢什么，不喜欢什么。
en: Your body s cells are a little like your taste buds in that they know exactly what they like and what they don't.

zh: 当免疫系统遇到葡萄状球菌时，你的身体把它当作一种外来物质，就像一个门卫在监视屏幕上注意到一个不受欢迎的入侵者。
en: When it encounters staphylococcus, your body rec-ognizes it as a foreign substance, just as a guard would notice an unwanted intruder on a surveillance camera.

zh: 当你的身体发现入侵者，一种白 色的血细胞——巨噬细胞就会发现并吞下细菌，将其消化掉，就像负贵安全的门卫阻止并质问外来者的方式。
en: When your body spots the intruder, a type of white blood cell—called a macrophage finds the bacteria, engulfs it, and digests it, sort of like the way the security guard would stop and question that intruder.

zh: 决定系数( coefficient of determination，又称r2)是最常用来诠释相关系数所代表的意义的效标。
en: The most commonly used criterion for interpreting the meaningfulness of the correlation coefficient is the coefficient of determination (r2).

zh: 透过此方法，得以了解影响两个变项的常见因素之间关联性的部分。
en: In this method, the portion of common association of the factors that influence the two variables is determined.

zh: 换句话说，决定系数代表能够透过一个测量方法的变异量(variance) 来解释或了解另一个测量方法中总变异量的部分。
en: In other words, the coefficient of determination indicates the portion of the total variance in one measure that can be explained, or accounted for, by the variance in the other measure.

zh: 在绝经后，女性的骨密度也会降低，因为有助于钙质累积的雌性激素此时分泌量减少。
en: Women also lose bone density after menopause, since they lose some estrogen, which is paramount in helping deposit calcium.

zh: 不过男性稍后的骨质疏松发病率也就和女性并驾齐驱了。男性一到75岁，雄性激素和窖丸激累分泌量普遍下降，不足以维持骨骼的密度和质璗。
