en: But men “catch up” later; as they reach seventy-five, they lack both the mass and sufficient estrogen and testosterone to help build bone.

zh: 军体俯卧撑与折刀俯卧撑的起始姿势相同——弯腰，髋部撅起，双臂与双腿几乎伸直。
en: In diagonal pushups, get into same the bent-over pushup position used to begin jackknife pushups.Your body should be bent well at the waist, with the hips high in the air, and your arms and legs almost straight.

zh: 双腿要并拢，这会增加动作的难度。
en: Keeping the legs together will make things harder.

zh: 弯曲手臂，肩部下沉，但做该动作时髋部并不像折刀俯卧撑或俯冲轰炸机那样紧贴地面，而是始终在空中成直角。
en: Now bend at the arms and shoulders, but instead of dropping your hips—as you would for jackknife or divebomber pushups—keep your body locked at a ninety-degree angle.

zh: 前额轻触地面，然后将自己推回到起始姿势。
en: Keep bending your arms until the top of your forehead gently touches the floor, and push back up.

zh: 注意，髋部的角度始终不变，直到完成所有反复次数。如果用脚跟抵住墙角，这个动作会更容易一些。
en: The body must stay at the same angle until you finish all your reps. It’s easier to do this if your heels are jammed up against a wall.

zh: 与标准俯卧撑相比，该动作能更好地锻炼肩部。
en: This exercise works the shoulders more than the conventional pushup.

zh: 这个动作做起来很有趣，但与下斜俯卧撑一样，如果你想更好地锻炼肩部，那么倒立撑是更好的选择。
en: It’s fun to do, but just like decline pushups, the handstand pushup is a far better alternative if you want to work your shoulders hard.

zh: 在主要降压药中，需要考虑的是P-阻滞剂，钙通道阻滞剂，血管紧张素转换酶 (ACE)抑制剂和利尿剂。
en: The major antihypertensive drug classes which require consideration are P-blockers, calcium channel blockers, angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitors and diuretics.

zh: 虽然在同类降压药中存在一些差别，但因篇幅所限，无法进行详细讨论。
en: Although some differences exist between antihypertensive drugs within the same class, the scope of this discussion does not allow for a detailed description.

zh: 故仅对各类药物进行概述。
en: An overall view of the drug class only will be presented.

zh: 在性发育的任何年龄阶段都能发生过早绝经。
en: Premature menopause may occur at any age or stage of sexual development.

zh: 虽然这时主要表现的是继发性闭经（见后），但是偶尔也会发生原发性闭经。
en: Although this presents mainly as secondary amenorrhoea (see below), occasionally primary amenorrhoea may be the presenting complaint.

zh: 这种病因可能包括循环中的抗卵巢抗体（antiovarian antibodies)所致。它可以是稀有的单独的疾病，也可以是更加常见的抗内分泌组织自我免疫综合征（阿狄森氏病，即肾上腺性青铜色皮病，Addison's disease)的一个扩张型综合征 (expanded syndrome)。
en: The patho­ genesis may include circulating antiovarian antibodies, either as a rare singular entity or more commonly as part of an expanded syndrome of antiendocrine tissue autoimmune syndrome (e.g.Addison's disease).

zh: 既然溃疡是由细菌感染引起的，那么病人就会把细菌传播给其他人。
en: If the ulcer is caused by a bacterial infection, you can pass the bacteria to other people you're living with.

zh: 通过接吻，细菌会在情侶间传来传去，而只有两个人都接受治疗，才能彻底摆脱溃疡的困扰。
en: Through kissing, you can ping-pong the bacteria forth between you and your partner, and you'll never get rid of it until you're both treated.

zh: 尽管我们可以用抗生素成功地治愈由幽口螺旋杆菌引起的溃疡，但是更大的担忧仍然存在：溃疡还可能是胃癌的前兆。
en: Though ulcers caused by H. pylori can be treated successfullywith antibiotics, the worry is that ulcers can also be harbingers of gastric cancer.

zh: 骨关节炎只是关节炎的一种。
en: For the record, osteoarthritis is only one kind of arthritis.

zh: 关节炎是涵盖了所有关节炎症的一个广义名词。
en: Arthritis is the broad name given to any inflammatory joint disease.

zh: 风湿性关节炎和其他种类的关节炎与年龄增长无关，而是一种免疫系统的自我紊乱，人体自身抗体攻击软骨，引起发炎及关节疼痛。
en: Rheumatoid and some other forms of arthritis are not diseases associated with aging but rather autoimmune disorders, in which antibodies attack your cartilage, which is what triggers that inflammation and joint pain.

zh: 每日补充31亳克的类黄酮化合物。
en: Get 31 milligrams of flavonoids a day.

zh: 类黄酮化合物是有效的抗氧化剂和消炎物质。植物类食品（包括坚果）中含有这种物质，如茶类（含绿茶）、红葡萄酒、葡萄、酸萄栗、100%纯天然橙汁、洋葱、西红柿及西红柿计。
en: Flavonoids are powerful antioxidants and anti-inflammatory substances that occur in certain plant foods, including nuts; any tea, including green tea; red wine; grapes; cranberries; 100 percent natural orange juice; onions; and tomatoes and tomato juice.

zh: 通过每日饮用两杯半酸梅果计或几杯茶，可以补充到足量的类黄酮化合物。
en: You can take in this amount by drinking two and a half glasses of cranberry juice or several cups or glasses of tea.

zh: 常常我们会因为从不同的角度来评量以往已经发表过的资料而产生新的见解。
en: frequently, new insights may be gained by evaluating previously reported data from a different perspective.

zh: 然而,不管是否由原作者或其他人著手再分析，这种类型的报告总是被归类为研究注记。
en: However, reports of this type are always classed as research notes whether the reanalysis is undertaken by the original author or someone else.

zh: 这并不意味著从大量的研究中所使用的数据的报告(如统合分析、考验力分析)会被归类为研究注记。
en: This does not mean that reports which use data from a number of studies (e.g., meta-analyses, power analyses) are classed as research notes.

zh: 找一面墙，双手手掌平放在距离墙根约15到25厘米的地面上，双手与肩同宽。
en: Approach a solid wall.Place your palms flat on the floor six to ten inches from the base of the wall, at about shoulder width apart.

zh: 手臂伸直或近乎伸直，膝盖弯曲，撑起身体。
en: Your arms should be straight, or nearly so.Bend at the knees, bracing the whole body.

zh: 提起一条腿的膝盖，让其靠近同侧的肘部（图111），然后使劲向下蹬地，同时让另一条腿向后上方摆。
en: Bring the knee of your strongest leg up towards the corresponding elbow (fig.111) and push down hard with that leg, kicking back and up with the other leg.

zh: 与此同时，让蹬地的腿也离地，紧随另一条腿向墙壁靠近，手臂保持伸展，双脚脚跟应同时接触墙壁。
en: As you rise, allow the foot of your strongest leg to leave the floor and follow your other leg as it approaches the wall.Keep your arms extended.The heels of both your feet should touch the wall at the same time.

zh: 刚开始练习时，上踢的力量如果过大，你的后背和屁股会猛地撞到墙上，但久而久之你就会掌握完美的上墙技艺。
en: At first your back and butt may also slam into the wall as you overestimate the power required to kick up, but over time you’ll learn the art of finding the wall perfectly.

zh: 最后，你的手臂应该是直的，身体摆正，背部略向内弓。
en: At this point your arms should be straight and your body aligned with a slight arch towards the wall.

zh: 这就是标准的靠墙倒立姿势（图112）。
en: This is the position for the wall handstand technique (fig. 112).

zh: 做靠墙顶立时，找一堵墙，在墙根处放置一个枕头（坐垫或叠好的毛巾也可）。
en: In the wall headstand, find a solid wall.Place a pillow, cushion or folded towel down by the base of the wall.This will be for your head.

zh: 双手和双膝着地，将头顶在枕头上，头部距离墙壁约15到25厘米。
en: Get on your hands and knees, and place the top of your head on the cushion.Your skull should be between six and ten inches from the wall.

zh: 双手稳稳地放在头部两侧，大约与肩同宽。
en: Set your palms down securely on either side of your head, about shoulder width apart.

zh: 抬起一条腿的膝盖，让其靠近同侧的肘部，同时伸直另一条腿，使膝盖离地（图107）。
en: Bring your strongest knee up close to your corresponding elbow, and straighten out your other leg so the knee is off the ground (fig. 107).

zh: 第1章旨在界定与回顾身体活动领域的各种研究类型与相关范例。
en: The introductory chapter defines and reviews the types of research done in physical activity and provides some examples.

zh: 我们把科学界定为系统性的探究，并讨论科学方法的步骤。
en: We define science as systematic inquiry, and we discuss the steps in the scientific method.

zh: 透过这种逻辑的方法，可回答下列四个问题，而这四个问题的答案，正是硕博士论文和研究报告的章节或内容。
en: This logical method answers the following four questions (Day, 1983, p. 4), which constitute the parts of a typical thesis, dissertation, or research report.

zh: 搜集资料是以科学方法解决问题时的基础步骤。因此，了解基础的测量理论是必要的（我们要强调，虽然在此将测量视为研究工具，但测量本身也是一种研究领域）。
en: A basic step in the scientific method of problem solving is the collection of data; therefore, an understanding of basic measurement theory is necessary.(We should point out that although measurement is discussed here as a research tool, measurement itself is an area of research.)

zh: 在本章中，我们将讨论一些基本准则，可用来评断研究数据测量结果的质量，就是所谓的效度与信度。
en: In this chapter, we discuss fundamental criteria forjudging the quality of measures used in collecting research data: validity and reliability.

zh: 我们会解释效度与信度的类型，以及建立效度与信度的方法（质性研究的可信度将在第1 9 章讨论）。
en: We explain types of validity and ways by which evidence of validity and reliability may be established.(The trustworthiness of qualitative research is discussed in chapter 19.)

zh: 本章总结了一些与动作测量、纸笔书写反应测量、情绪行为、知识、以及项目反应理论有关的议题。
en: We conclude with some issues concerning the measurement of movement, of written responses used in paper-and-pencil instruments, of affective behavior, of knowledge, and of item response theory.

zh: 第二个评估质性研究的重要概念是可转换性（transferability)，它可以用来审酌研究结果是否在相似或其他不同环境中也能派上用场。
en: Transferability, the second important concept in evaluating quality, addresses whether the results would be useful to those in other settings or conducting research in similar settings.

zh: 这个概念或许让你想到概化，有些方面确实如此，但其他方面又不尽然。
en: You may be thinking that this concept is like generalizability, and in some ways it is, but in other ways it is not.

zh: 所有研究者都希望他们的研究能帮助他人，但像我们这领域中许多的量化研究一样，大范围母体中的随机抽样，对于大多数的质性研究并无助益。
en: All researchers would like their research to help others, but like much of the quantitative research in our area, most qualitative research does not benefit from random selection from a large population.

zh: 表面上看，空气过滤器似乎是自有潜水通气管以来对人体肺部最好的发明。
en: On the surface, air filters sound as if they'd be the best things for your lungs since snorkeling tubes.

zh: 人们认为空气过滤器的原理是通过滤去空气中的过敏物，让人呼吸得到更清洁的空气。
en: Air filters are supposed to work by taking allergens out of the air so you can have cleaner breathing.

zh: 但是，许多空气过滤器工作得并没这么顺利，主要的原因不是技术上的问题，而是使用者的问题。
en: But many of them don't work that well, and the primary reason isn't a mechanical malfunction but an owner malfunction.

zh: 大多数人更换空气过滤器或空气加湿器的频率很不够，所以机器就并未有效工作。
en: Most people don't change air filters or clean humidifiers with enough regularity, so they're not that effective.

zh: 下面要谈的这个胃部问题与初次约会的失败联系紧密：有口臭。
en: The next stomach condition is the one most associated with failed first dates: bad breath.

zh: 有时口臭源自口腔，这时只要检查牙齿和牙龈，就可以很容易找到问题所在。
en: Sometimes bad breath originates from your mouth, and it's easy to check your teeth and gums for culprits.

zh: 不过我们的口腔通常只是胃部所存秽气的出口。
en: But often your mouth is only the porthole for bad stomach odors.

zh: 我们可以把口腔想成排污系统的主要开口。
en: Think of it as a sewer main breaking.

zh: 也许你是在地上闻到气味，但问题实际出在地下。
en: You may smell it aboveground, but the actual problem comes from underground.

zh: 口臭也是同理。
en: It's the same with bad breath.

zh: 严重的口臭通常是由于胃肠出了问题。
en: Severe bad breath—called halitosis—usually comes from your stomach and digestive problems.

zh: 库李的合理均等式(Kuder-Richardson [KR] method of rational equivalence) 以 KR-20 与 KR-21 这两个公式其中之一,来计算二分计分题型(例 如 :对或错)的内部一致性。
en: In the Kuder-Richardson (KR) method of rational equivalence, one of two formulas, known as KR-20 and KR-21, is used for items scored dichotomously (i.e., right or wrong).

zh: 此方式只需要施 行一次测验,而且不需要计算相关。
en: Only one test administration is required, and no correlation is calculated.

zh: 计算出的内部一致性系数代表所有可能的折半信度系数的平均。
en: The resulting coefficient represents an average of all possible split-half reliability coefficients.

zh: 在夜晚，我们的身体需要两样东西（如果算上按摩，那就是三样了）。
en: Your body needs two things during the night (three, if you count back massages).

zh: 人体需要快速动眼期睡眠和慢波睡眠。
en: It needs REM (rapid eye movement) sleep, and it needs slow-wave sleep.

zh: 为了实现快速动眼期睡眠，我们需要先有90分钟的持续睡眠。
en: To get into REM sleep, you need about ninety minutes of consistent sleep.

zh: 因此，假如你像典型的睡眠呼吸暂停综合征患者那样，每小时醒来10次，就绝对不会有快速动眼期睡眠，睡醒后也就不会有精力充沛的感觉。
en: So if you're waking up ten times an hour, which is typical for people with sleep apnea, you’re never getting into REM and won’t wake up refreshed.

zh: 宽范围的滑动夹子。
en: Wide sliding calipers.

zh: 像罗斯和马尔费尔-琼斯 (1990)所介绍的，躯干和肢体宽度偶尔是用人体测量器进行测量的。
en: Occasionally, torso and limb breaths are obtained using an anthropometer as described by Ross and Marfell-Jones (1990).

zh: 总而言之，Siber Hegner人体测量器的无关节末端用作宽范围夹子来测量躯干是不满意的。
en: The disarticulated end piece of the Siber Hegner anthropometer used as a wide sliding caliper for torso measurements is not altogether satisfactory.

zh: 每当压力施加在其末端而不是夹子的双侧时，它容易卷曲起来。
en: It tends to bind when pressure is applied to the ends of the branches instead of along the sides.

zh: 灰底黑字的标尺很难进行读数。
en: The black on grey scale is somewhat difficult to read.

zh: 与窄距俯卧撑相反，做宽距俯卧撑时你不是让双手相触，而是让双手之间的距离比做标准俯卧撑时的更宽，达到肩宽的两倍。
en: Wide pushups are the opposite of close pushups—instead of putting your hands together, you place them wider than usual, up to twice shoulder width.

zh: 这个变式减轻了肱三头肌和肘关节的压力，但是给胸肌造成了更大压力（就在胸肌接触肩部的那一点上）。
en: This variation takes much of the stress off the triceps and elbow joint and places more pressure on the pectorals at the point where they meet the front of the shoulder.

zh: 用外行话说就是锻炼胸部比锻炼肱三头肌更多。
en: In layman’s terms, it works the chest more than the triceps.

zh: 这个变式并不能提升你做俯卧撑的能力，因为胸部和上肢带肌本来就比肘部强壮，持续做这个练习只会强化这个差异而已。
en: This type of pushup won’t make you much stronger at doing pushups, because the chest/shoulder girdle is normally already proportionately much stronger than the elbow joint; doing this exercise consistently will only enhance that differential.

zh: 也就是说，如果你正在专门锻炼胸肌，那这个变式对你非常有用。
en: That said, it’s a useful exercise to master if you are specializing on your pectorals.

zh: 本书通过分析坠落体育英雄的形势带给我们一趟独特之旅。
en: This book takes us on a unique journey across the fallen sports hero terrain.

zh: 本论文集的特色是网罗了全球范围内有关体育、传媒与文化研究重要的学者团队。
en: Featured here is the work of an important group of scholars in sports, media, and cultural studies from around the globe.

zh: 每个案例都带来一个理解体育明星、英雄和名流起起伏伏的独特的观测点。
en: Each treatment brings a unique vantage point on understanding the rise and fall of the sports star, hero, and celebrity.

zh: 我们从开篇的“框架篇章”就深人研究一些著名体育人物沉沦时的肮脏细节，是要提醒大家这些道德传奇显著的多样性和他们对公众意识的影响。
en: From the "framing chapters" that open the volume to those that delve into the sometimes sordid details of a notable sporting figure's fall, we are reminded of the remarkable diversity of these moral sagas and their impact on public consciousness.

zh: 从1980~1990年以来，进食和体重障碍问题成为了临床医学的一个主要课题。
en: Eating and weight disorders have become a major focus of clinical medicine since the 1980s and 1990s.

zh: 在进食和体重障碍中，从20世纪90年代以来神经性厌食症被认为是一个临床综合征，那时对该术语进行过详细的描述（Strober, 1986)。
en: Of the two prim ary eating and weight disorders, anorexia nervosa has been considered a clinical syndrome since the late nineteenth century, at which time the term was coined and described (Strober, 1986).

zh: 神经性易饿症作为一个综合征于1976年最先被提出来的，虽然那时的作者们使用的是贪食-厌食症,以便与狂食，即易饿症和狂食-排泄综合征加以区分。
en: Bulimia nervosa, as a syndrome, was first introduced in 1976, although the authors used the term bulimarexia to differentiate between binge eating, i.e.bulimia, and the binge—purge syndrome .

zh: 做拉弓式时，两手抓住一根垂直于地面的栏杆，一手高度大约与脸部齐平，另一只手与胸部齐平。
en: In the bow pull, grab hold of a single vertical bar with both hands.One hand should be approximately face level, the other chest level.

zh: 两臂几乎伸直，肘部微微弯曲，身体与栏杆之间的距离大约是手臂长度的三分之二。
en: Your arms should be nearly straight, but with a little bend at the elbow.As a result, your torso will be about two-thirds arm length from the bars.

zh: 然后，让高处的手臂尽力推栏杆，低处的手臂则尽力拉栏杆，有点儿像拉弓射箭时的动作。
en: Now, push as hard as you can with the higher arm, whilst simultaneously pulling with the lower arm.The sensation is a little like the beginning motion of pulling back on a bow as in archery.

zh: 在狱中，囚徒借助囚室栏杆训练力量已有数百年的历史。
en: Convicts have been pulling on the bars of their cells to build strength for hundreds of years.

zh: 如果你有足够的创意.什么可以用结结实实的栏杆让全身都获得静力训练。
en: If you are creative, you can use solid bars to give yourself a full body isometric workout.

zh: 你可能觉得很奇怪，栏杆竟然能够用来健身！我有一个旧本子，上面列出了可以借助栏杆进行的100余种健身技巧。
en: You might be surprised at what a versatile discipline bar pulling can be; I have a list of over a hundred bar pulling techniques in an old notebook somewhere.

zh: 拉栏杆是训练背部的绝佳方法，我在此只描述几种最好的动作。
en: Bar pulls are an excellent method for training the back, so I’ll limit myself here to a description of just one bar pulling workout for the back, consisting of a handfull of the best techniques.

zh: 这个变式与标准俯卧撑很像，只不过双手要撑在位于身体两侧的、高于地面的物体上。
en: This is the standard pushup, but performed with the hands on two raised objects on either side of the torso.

zh: 你可以买专用的俯卧撑把手，不过使用椅子效果也一样。
en: You can buy specially made pushup handles for this, but placing the palms on two chairs will have the same effect.

zh: 双手放在平面（如地面）上做俯卧撑时，动作幅度会受到限制，身体下降到某一点时会受到地板的阻挡。而将双手撑在高于地面的物体上做俯卧撑，就意味着胸部可以降得更低。
en: When you do pushups with your hands on a flat surface (like the floor), your range of motion is limited by that surface; but doing pushups with your hands on raised objects means you can lower your chest further than the point where it would normally be stopped by the floor.

zh: 你可以根据自己的需要选择床、书桌、椅子等高度不同的支撑物。两脚的高度可以低于双手，可以与之持平，也可以比双手更高。
en: The feet can either be below the hands, or level (or higher) through being put on a bed, desk, another chair, etc.

zh: 我并不是拉伸俯卧撑的信徒，因为我觉得在阻力之下拉伸肌肉很痛苦。
en: I’m not a big believer in stretch pushups.

zh: 这样做确实会增加锻炼之后的肌肉酸痛感，但这完全是因为肌肉组织发生了轻微创伤，并不意味着肌肉将变得更大或更结实。
en: Stretching the muscles under resistance is painful, and does lead to increased soreness after the workout, but this is entirely due to microtrauma within the muscle tissue—it doesn’t mean the muscles will get bigger or stronger.

zh: 拉伸肌肉并不能让你变得更壮硕或更有力。
en: Stretching muscles won’t increase your size or strength.

zh: 如果你想使自己的胸大肌燃烧，那就做拉伸俯卧撑；如果你想让整个上半身都强壮有力，那就做我前面讲的十式，将拉伸俯卧撑抛到脑后吧!
en: If you want to make your pecs burn, do stretch pushups.If you want all-over upper body muscle and might, work through the ten steps and give stretch pushups a miss.

zh: 我们注意到有关衰老的第一处身体部位就是皮肤。
en: One of the first places we notice aging is in our skin.

zh: 我们从皮肤皱纹、皮肤癌和老年斑中看到了衰老。
en: We see aging in wrinkles, in skin cancer, in liver spots.

zh: 总的来说，对身体内部有好处的也对外部皮肤同样有好处。在任何时候都用防晒霜来保护你的每一处皮肤，以及避免吸烟（一天吸10支烟会使脸部皱纹加巨）都会起到保护皮肤的作用。
en: Generally, what's good for your inside is also good for your outside: protecting your skin with a 4 or more star UVA blocker and an SPF 45 on all exposed spots all the time and avoiding cigarettes (ten cigarettes a day can double facial lines).

zh: 当你深吸一口气时，横膈膜的大肌肉需要向下运动，才能将更多空气吸入肺中。
en: To inhale deeply, you must move your huge diaphragm muscle down to suck air into the lungs.

zh: 最好的吸气方法是：当开始吸气时，先鼓起肚子 。
en: This is best done by pushing out your belly when you start to breathe in.

zh: 大多数人呼吸时只用到很小的肋间肌，通过提升肋骨骨架帮助呼吸，这样效率较低。
en: Even though the much smaller intercostal muscles can help to a lesser degree by lifting the rib cage, most folks use only these muscles to breathe, which is very inefficient.

zh: 类别选项设计（categorical response)往往只提供填答者两种选择，答案就只有「是」和「否」〃同意」和「不同意」等二项。
en: Categorical responses offer the respondent only two choices.Usually, the responses are yes and no or agree and disagree.

zh: 这种题目比较明显的限制就是填答者无法表达像「有时候」和「不一定」等意见。
en: An obvious limitation of categorical responses is the lack of other options such as sometimes or undecided.

zh: 处理类别选项设计所收集到的答案虽然不会像量尺题目的费时，但却无法显示填答者对特定行为的同意强度或出现的频率。
en: Categorical responses do not require as much time to administer as scaled responses do but do not provide as much information about the respondent’s degree of agreement or the frequency of the behavior.

zh: 最广泛出现在媒体报道中的一个说法是医学或是生理学上的原因：类固醇。
en: The explanation that appeared most widely in the coverage located a medical or physiological cause: steroids.

zh: 这一解释将事件框架建构为一个“类固醇狂躁症”（roid rage)引发的悲剧，一次由滥用类固醇类药物导致的发狂。
en: This framed the tragedy as a case of "roid rage," a drug-induced frenzy associated with abusing steroids.

zh: 摔角选手在竞技场外具有超侵略性（hyper-aggressive)的行为长期以来就与使用类固醇类药物紧紧联系在一起。
en: Stories of wrestlers' hyper-aggressive behavior outside the ring had long been connected with the use of steroids.

zh: 许多人认为其中的有效成分，即造成这一惊人数字的成分，是番茄红素。这是一种类胡萝卜素，因其抗氧化机能而著名。
en: Many believe that the active ingredient—the ingredient responsible for such astounding numbers is lycopene, a carotenoid known for its antioxidant properties.

zh: 类胡萝卜素通过黏附在自由基（自由基会引起癌症）上，把它们聚集打包，好让它们集体被清理出身体，不再危害细胞和染色体而发挥其作用。
en: Carotenoids work by attaching to free radicals (which can be cancer-causing) and packaging them so they can be washed out of the body so they don't damage cells or chromosomes.

zh: 糖尿病会让动脉血管病情恶化。不过糖尿病主要是一种遗传性疾病，在患有肥胖症的成人中比较常见。
en: Diabetes makes disease of the arteries worse but is primarily a genetic disease made more evident by obesity in adults.

zh: 其他健康问题，如性功能障碍、皱纹和中风，像心脏病一样，它们主要都由动脉老化引起。
en: The others—impotence, wrinkling of the skin, and strokes—are like heart attacks: They are primarily caused by the aging of your arteries.

zh: 可可制成的纯巧克力对健康有益，因为它含有类黄酮化合物和较健康的脂肪。
en: The flavonoids and healthier fat in real cocoa-based chocolate make it healthy.

zh: 每天应该至少吃一把坚果。
en: Eat at least one handful of nuts a day.

zh: 坚果是健康脂肪和健康蛋白质的理想来源。坚果还富含类黄酮化合物，这是一种解毒剂。
en: Nuts are an excellent source of both healthful fats and healthful protein; they also can be concentrated sources of flavonoids, an antioxidant.

zh: “爱荷华州保健调查”和三次其他调查表明，每日食用28克坚果，会使心脏病发生的几率减少20%至60%。
en: In the Iowa Nurses Study and three other studies, one ounce of nuts a day decreased the incidence of heart disease between 20 and 60 percent.

zh: 骨软骨病的儿童，如奥-施氏病（Osgood-Schlatter Disease, 胚骨粗隆骨软骨病）、朔伊尔曼氏病 (Scheuermann’s disease,脊柱骨软骨病）、 潘纳尔氏病（Parmer’s disease,青年崎形 性跖趾骨软骨炎）、累-卡-佩三氏病 (Legg-Calve-Perthes disease),可能会因为不同原因就诊。
en: Children with osteochondroses, e.g.O sgood-Schlatter disease, Scheuerm ann's disease, Partner's disease and Legg-Calvé-Perthes disease, may have different reasons for seeking health care.

zh: 每一种综合征均可能在运动时产生疼痛（Pappas, 1989)。
en: One symptom can be pain associated with sports activity (Pappas, 1989).

zh: 在此种情形下，体育运动可能不仅仅是发生疼痛的原因，而更可能是诱因。
en: In such circumstances, sports activities are presumably not the cause but, rather, the provocative factor.

zh: 在制定训练计划和参加比赛时，要慎重考虑体温调节问题。
en: A critical consideration in the design of training programmes and during competition is thermo­regulation.

zh: 脊髓损伤时存在体 温调节不良（Bloomquist, 1986),体力活动、训练和（或）比赛可加重体温调节障碍。
en: Thermoregulatory dysfunction is a problem in SCI (Bloomquist, 1986) and may be exacerbated by physical activity, training and/ or competition.

zh: 体温调节问题可出现在低温或高温时，甚至在相对湿度和温度适中时也会发生（10〜15.5T；或50-60 °F)。
en: Thermoregulatory problems may present as hypothermia or hyperthermia even in relatively mild temperatures (10 -15 .5°C or 50—6o°F).

zh: 运动员应摄人足量的水，一旦出现热或冷损伤时， 应立刻脱离冷热环境并予以治疗（Peck & Mckeag, 1994)。
en: The athlete should take in adequate amounts of water and, at the first sign of heat or cold injury should be removed from the environment and treatment sought promptly (Peck & McKeag, 1994).

zh: 李克特氏量表(Likert-type scale) 在第15章的调查研究技术中会提到。
en: The Likert-type scale is referred to in chapter 15 in connection with survey research techniques.

zh: 通常有五个或七个点,并假设点与点的间距是等距的。
en: It is usually a five- or seven-point scale with assumed equal intervals between points.

zh: 量表用来评估对一个陈述的同意或不同意程度 ,广泛的用于态度量表。
en: The Likert-type scale is used to assess the degree of agreement or disagreement with statements and is widely used in attitude inventories.

zh: 李克特氏量表（Likert-type scale)在第15章的调查研究技术中会提到。
en: The Likert-type scale is referred to in chapter 15 in connection with survey research techniques.

zh: 通常有五个或七个点，并假设点与点的间距是等距的。
en: It is usually a five- or seven-point scale with assumed equal intervals between points.

zh: 李克特氏量表用来评估对一个陈述的同意或不同意程度，广泛的用于态度量表。
en: The Likert-type scale is used to assess the degree of agreement or disagreement with statements and is widely used in attitude inventories.

zh: 无论采用何种类型的测试方法，测试到的等长（静力性）收缩力量或动力性收缩力量反映的都是不同个体之间同一种相对力量。
en: Strength measured as isometric or dynamic force reflects the same relative strength between individuals regardless of the type of test method.

zh: 在肌肉力量与肌肉收缩速度之间存在着明确的关系。
en: There is a well-defined relationship between force and velocity.

zh: 等长力量的测量速度为0。
en: Isometric strength is force measured at zero velocity.

zh: 成人中的这种关系首先由阿斯穆森等（Asmussen et al.，1965)提出，并在后来由霍尔托巴吉等 (Hortobagyi et al., 1989，1990)所证实，他们在对一般力量构成成分进行研究时发现了这种关系。
en: This was first shown in adults by Asmussen et al. (1965) and has lately been confirmed by Hortobagyi et al. (1989, 1990), where evidence for a general strength component was investigated.

zh: 单独拘禁是一个严酷的计划。
en: Solitary Confinement is a brutal routine.

zh: 尽管由于该计划中缺少休息，力量的发展多少有点儿打折，但专注其中的话，你的全身都会得到绝好的锻炼。何况在力量的问题上，并非越多越好。
en: It will give awesome total-body conditioning and fitness benefits to the dedicated, although strength development will be compromised somewhat by the lack of rest built into the program—more is not better where strength is concerned.

zh: 该计划中，六艺会在三天中练完，在一周内循环两次。
en: It involves the Big Six performed over a three-day cycle, repeated twice over seven days.

zh: 这套密集计划还给受虐狂增加了一些补充练习。
en: To this dense routine, ancillary work is added for masochists.

zh: 只有苦练体操一年以上、恢复能力超好的人才可尝试。
en: It should only be attempted by individuals with excellent recovery ability who have been in hard calisthenics training for over a year.

zh: 每周至少需要空出六七个小时才能完成这套计划。
en: You’ll need at least six or seven hours free per week to finish this program.

zh: 另外，不要一整年都这么折腾自己。
en: Don’t abuse it all year-round.

zh: 如果要测量“真正的”最大功率输出，试验的时间必须很短（<1s)，因为作为时间的函数，功率输出会快速下降 (图36.1)。测量“真正的”最大功率需要测量力和速度的瞬间值。
en: If 'true' peak power output is to be measured, the duration of the test must be short ( <1s), because power output decreases rapidly as a function of time (Fig. 36.1).The measurement of 'true' peak power requires measurements of instantaneous values of force and velocity.

zh: 只有使用测力台试验或者使用几个单关节的力-速度试验才能达到这个条件。
en: This condition is only satisfied in tests which use a force platform, or several monoarticular force-velocity tests.

zh: 在其他功率试验中 (阶梯跑或者在阻力-负荷的自行车功率计上骑车），力和速度都是平均值，而不是瞬间值（Vandewalle et al.，1987)。
en: In other power tests (staircase running or cycling on friction-loaded ergometers), the forces and the velocities are averaged instead of being instantaneous values (Vandewalle et al., 1987).

zh: 记者讲述故事时沉浸在戏剧化中。在某些事例中，新闻叙事把一个个相对独立的事件联系在一起，从而在叙事过程中造成了一 种 “令人担忧的趋势”和“新的灾难”。
en: Journalists tell stories steeped in drama, and in some cases, news narratives link otherwise independent events to one another, creating "troubling trends" and "new scourges" in the process.

zh: 例证理论包括了聚合事例的描述从而暗示某种趋势的出现（Zillmarm，1999) ，以及通过识别所谓的道德失败从而在新闻受众之中引起情感的反应。
en: Exemplification involves aggregating case descriptions to imply the presence of a trend (Zillmann, 1999), triggering emotional reactions among news audiences by identifying supposed moral failures.

zh: 自 Glass从1976年引入统合分析以来，数以千计的统合分析文章陆续被发表，特别是在社会科学、行为科学，以及医学科学领域。
en: Since Glass introduced meta-analysis in 1976, thousands of meta-analyses have been published, especially in the social, behavioral, and medical sciences.

zh: 在1986年由美国国家卫生研究院所赞助的随机控制临床试验概述方法学议题工作坊(Workshop on Methodological Issues in Overviews of Randomized Clinical Trials)，与会者在以统合分析进行健康相关与医学研究之应用，皆投入可观的注意力。
en: At a national conference in 1986 sponsored by the U.S. National Institutes of Health, Workshop on Methodological Issues in Overviews of Randomized Clinical Trials, participants focused considerable attention on meta-analysis for health-related and medical research.

zh: 由 Cooper与 Hedges在1994年编著的《研究整合手册 (The Handbook of Research Synthesis)》，仍然是规划与实施统合分析综评(meta-analyticalreview)中最有用的资讯来源之一。
en: The Handbook of Research Synthesis, edited by Cooper and Hedges (1994), is still one of the most useful sources of information for planning and conducting meta-analytical reviews.

zh: 有些癌症是由具传染性的病毒引起的，比如HIV(艾滋病病毒）。
en: Some cancer is caused by viruses that are contagious, like HIV.

zh: 所以在某种程度上来说，人人有可能传染上癌症。
en: So in a way, you can catch cancer.

zh: 癌症不会通过血液、唾液或是细菌传染，但是却会通过间接的方式传染。人们会通过一些身体有机物的传播患上癌症，对于宫颈癌、肝癌和淋巴癌来说尤其如此。
en: You can't swap cancer through bloodstream, saliva, or germs, but in a roundabout way, you can pass along some of the organisms that could cause cancer This is especially true for cervical and liver cancers, as well as some lymphomas.

zh: 从你第一次感到喉咙痛开始，你就十分清楚地意识到你的免疫系统了。那时爸爸妈妈会在你的下巴下面摸你的淋巴，因为他们在寻找肿胀的淋巴结。
en: From your first sore throat, you were well aware of your lymph system -when your mom or doctor would feel under your jaw.Thats because they were looking for swollen lymph nodes.

zh: 淋巴系统是免疫系统活动的地方。
en: Your lymph system is where all the immune activity takes place.

zh: 体内血糖含量应低于100mg/dL。糖尿病患者的血液中含糖量过高，会降低一种特殊的磷激酶的活性，从而对动脉造成伤害。磷激酶能够让动脉自如地扩张收缩。
en: Keep it lower than 100 mg/dL The excess sugar in the blood that's caused by diabetes damages the arteries by inactivating a specific phosphokinase, a substance that makes it possible for your arteries to dilate smoothly and contract.

zh: 没有这种酶，不同部位动脉血管壁连接处出现裂缝坑洞的可能性就会大大增加。
en: Without that phosphokinasc, the risk of holes or cracks appearing at junctions in the arterial walls increases dramatically.

zh: 专家认为，蛋白质的每日摄入量如果超过140克（相当于一天吃450克鸡肉、鱼肉、牛肉或猪肉，或是吃1100克的坚果），则会给骨骼发育带来不良影响。过量的蛋白质会导致人体排出而不是吸收钙质。
en: Large amounts of protein eaten every day—in the amount of more than 140 grams a day (that's the equivalent of a pound of chicken, fish, beef, or pork, or two and a half pounds of nuts in a day)— are believed to be threatening to your bones because the extra protein can cause your body to excrete calcium rather than absorb it.

zh: 饮用含咖啡因的饮料或碳酸饮料时，也会引起同样的问题。咖啡因会在钙质发挥作用之前促其排出体外。
en: Same goes for carbonated and caffeinated drinks; the caffeine may actually make you excrete the calcium before your body's been given a chance to use it.

zh: 而磷酸盐对骨骼中钙质的存储可能更为不利。
en: The phosphates may be even worse for your bones' calcium stores.

zh: “你真为跑步做好准备了吗？拉伸并不重要，”凯利•斯塔雷特写道，他是国内知名的研究灵活性和运动表现的学者之一，“姿势和姿势的使用才是重中之重。
en: “Are you truly ready for this? Stretching is not important,” writes Kelly Starrett, DPT, one of the country’s foremost thinkers on the subject of mobility and athletic performance.

zh: 如果你因为动作受限或因为某些肌肉组织的约束而不能保证良好的姿势，单纯拉伸并不能给你想要的结果。”
en: “Position and the application of position are what matters most. If you can’t get into a good position because you’re limited or you have a tissue restriction of some kind, stretching alone won’t give you the results you want.”

zh: 刘易斯列线图试验：由于纵跳试验有作功的尺度（力x位移）问题，刘易斯列线图（Lewis nomogram)是用来与纵跳试验同时使用的 (Fox & Mathews, 1981),其目的是将“速度”加到体重和所完成的纵跳距离上。
en: Lewis nomogram test: Because the vertical jump test has the dimension of work (force x displacement), the Lewis nomogram has been designed to be used concomitantly with the former test (Fox & Mathews, 1981).The aim is to add 'speed' to the body mass and the vertical distance performed.

zh: 该试验尚无客观性和可靠性的数据，也没有试验的正常值。
en: There are no measures of objectivity or reliability and no norms are available for the test.

zh: 最近，哈曼等开展了对成年男子的有效性研究，结论是刘易斯的公式无法精确评估腿部肌肉的功率。
en: Recently, Harman et al. conducted a validation study on male adults and concluded that the Lew is formula does not provide accurate estimate of muscle leg pow er.

zh: 我们试图对比贝克汉姆在英国和美国的形象,是为了论证他的商业语料库的流动性。
en: Our intent in contrasting Beckham's image in the US and the UK has been to demonstrate the fluidity of his commercial corpus.

zh: 为了达到这个目的,我们指向了流动名流的建构以及在这些企业化的和有形的建构之中固有的缺陷。
en: In so doing we have pointed to the construction of liquid celebrity and the pitfalls inherent in such corporatized or corporeal constitutions.

zh: 在全球范围内,由西蒙•福勒所组织和经营的、贝克汉姆作为晚期资本主义商品化身的时刻,一直是相当精确而完整的。
en: Beckham's embodiment of the late capitalist moment on a global scale, organized and managed by Simon Fuller, has been quite exact and complete.

zh: 这一系列的观察性研究发轫于于1940年代后期与1960年代初期之间。
en: A series of observational studies was initiated between the late 1940s and early 1960s.

zh: 在这些研究中，有部分研究对身体活动流行病学（physical activity epidemiology）领域的发展尤为重要。因为这是首次透过研究发展身体活动测量方法，以及采用系统性的方式以分析身体活动及致命疾病间的关联。
en: A number of them were particularly important to the development of the field of physical activity epidemiology because they were the first to develop methods for measuring physical activity and to conduct systematic studies of the link between physical activity and a life-threatening disease.

zh: 在做绿巨人式时，抓住位于胸前的两根栏杆，前臂大约与地面平行，双手相距约15厘米——相当于两根栏杆的间距。
en: In the hulk pull, grab hold of two bars in front of your chest.Your forearms should be more or less parallel with the floor and your knuckles should be about six inches apart—the equivalent of one bar space.

zh: 手臂弯曲，使躯干与栏杆保持仅几厘米的距离：这是最有利的拉栏杆姿势。
en: Your arms will be well bent so that your torso is only a few inches from the bars.This is the strongest bar pull position.

zh: 然后尽全力拉，就像要把栏杆拉开一样。
en: Now pull as hard as you can, as if trying to pry the bars apart.

zh: 罗马椅仰卧起坐由下斜仰卧起坐演变而来，不过强度更大。
en: Roman Chair Sit-Up is a more intense modification of incline sit-ups.

zh: 双腿钩住固定架，双腿也在椅子上得到支撑，这样你的躯干和髋部就在无支撑的情况下向后悬空。
en: Hook your legs under something that will also support your thighs, so you can hang backwards with nothing supporting your torso or hips.

zh: 从这个姿势开始做仰卧起坐，这样中段就必须更加用力才能在动作的最低点控制身体。你也可以再向下倾斜一点儿，超过一般仰卧起坐的限制，这样就增加了动作幅度。
en: Doing sit-ups from this position means that your midsection has to exert much greater force to control the trunk in the bottom position; you can also go back further than in regular or incline sit-ups, so the range of motion is increased.

zh: 对数线性模式(loglinear models) 通常用在分析多因子列联表上,将相对次数转换成对数的形式后相加,与单因子变异数分析中的平方和类似。
en: Loglinear models are used to analyze multivariate contingency tables.Relative frequencies are transformed to logarithms, which are additive and similar to the sum of squares in ANOVA.

zh: 并透过检定的方式来检定主要效果和交互作用的效果。
en: Main effects and interactions can be tested for significance.

zh: 并以对数比的基础所建构的罗吉斯回归方程式来预测每笔资料的机率(又称逻辑回归）。
en: The probability of membership in a particular category can be predicted as a function of membership in other categories using a logistic regression equation based on the logarithmic odds of membership (called a logit).

zh: 逻辑效度有时被称为表面效度(face validity),但测验专家并不喜欢这个术语。
en: Logical validity is sometimes referred to as face validity, although measurement experts dislike that term.

zh: 当测量本身很明显地包含了想测量内容时,就被认为具备逻辑效度。
en: Logical validity is claimed when the measure obviously involves the performance being measured.

zh: 换句话说,逻辑效度表示, 从定义上来说这个测验就是正确的。
en: In other words, it means that the test is valid by definition.

zh: 骆驼式——双膝跪地，两膝相距几厘米。
en: Camel Hold——Kneel on the floor with your knees a few inches apart.

zh: 屁股不要坐在小腿上，大腿与躯干成一条直线，与小腿的夹角成90°。
en: Rather than sitting down on your calves, raise yourself up so that your hips are straight and your body forms an “L” shape.

zh: 由此姿势开始，脊柱慢慢向后弯曲成弓形，双手向后抓住脚踝。
en: From this position, slowly arch your spine back and reach behind you to grasp your ankles.

zh: 之后将髋部向前推，使脊柱的弯曲度最大化，坚持10-30秒。
en: Once you have hold of them, push your hips forwards, maximizing the bend in your spine.

zh: 说来容易，但这需要脊柱的深层肌肉有一定力量才能完成。
en: Although this sounds easy, it requires some strength in the deeper spinal muscles to complete the position.

zh: 我是从一位住在美国西海岸的瑜伽修行者那里学到这个绝妙动作的。
en: Hold for ten to thirty seconds.I learned this nifty stretch from a yoga guy living on the West Coast.

zh: 好像没人知道它为什么叫“骆驼式”，我一点儿也看不出哪里像骆驼。
en: Nobody seems to know why it’s called  “camel hold”——looks nothing like a camel to me.

zh: 用脚后跟先着地是不可取的，因为这个习惯会导致脚踝、脚后跟、臀部等部位受伤。
en: Landing on the heel is bad because the impact can cause a host of injuries to the ankles, knees, and hips.

zh: 即使是高科技跑鞋带来的支撑效果也不能永久地避免这类损伤。
en: Even the cushioning afforded by big running shoes can’t stave off injury forever.

zh: 逐渐地，这种落地方式还会导致软组织撕裂，进而继续磨损受伤部位，直到可能需要外科手术才能修复磨损的软骨或受损的肌腱。
en: Bit by bit, these cushioned impacts still tear away soft tissue, grinding their way toward injury and possible surgery to repair worn-down cartilage or shredded tendons.

zh: 纠正跑步的落地方式不仅是为了减轻不良后果，更是为了提高跑步的效率。
en: But correcting one’s foot strike is not just about reducing impact; it’s also about improving running efficiency.

zh: 如果你的跑步技术过硬，那么落地方式根本不是问题。就好比现在有一个球，你跳起来以后脚部可以不假思索地落在球所在的位置。
en: Foot strike is a nonissue when mechanics are sound, as the foot lands exactly where it is supposed to—on the ball—without thought.

zh: 马耳他俯卧撑与俯卧撑的渊源关系已经不太明显，它经常被体操运动员用来模拟吊环训练。
en: These are an obscure variation of the pushup often used by gymnasts, because they partially mimic training on the rings.

zh: 马耳他俯卧撑有点儿像标准俯卧撑，只不过双手要和髋部成一条直线，而且要远离身体。
en: Maltese pushups look a little like full pushups, but the hands are placed in line with the hips, and quite far out from the body.

zh: 如果你在某个做该动作的人身体正中画一条直线，然后以其双手为端点画一条直线，这两条线将构成马耳他十字，这个动作因此得名。
en: If you were to draw a line up the athlete’s torso and another from palm to palm in this position, the two lines would approximate a Maltese cross, hence the name of the exercise.

zh: 这个变式的具体做法很难理解，除非你亲眼看到有人做该动作。
en: The movement required by this type of pushup is difficult to appreciate unless you actually see an expert doing it.

zh: 马耳他俯卧撑能够锻炼肱二头肌和肱三头肌，但它对训练者肘部内侧的要求极其苛刻。
en: Maltese pushups work the biceps as well as the triceps, but the technique can be rough on the inner elbows.

zh: 除非你是体操运动员，否则我不建议你做这个。
en: Unless you are a gymnast, I’d disregard them.

zh: 对于一些人来说，我也许像个偏执狂，但是总有人能理解我探寻跑步艺术的热情和不断进取的精神，布菜恩• 麦肯齐就是其中之一。
en: To some people I might seem obsessive, but there are others who share my passion for understanding the act of running and for constantlyseeking to improve.Brian MacKenzie is one of these.

zh: 对于全球新一代参与混合健身和混合健身耐力训练的跑者，麦肯齐可谓是天赐之人。
en: For a new generation of runners around the world who have taken up CrossFit and CrossFit Endurance, Brian has been a godsend.

zh: 麦肯齐对于跑步训练知识的渴求是从他自己的“逐龙”之旅开始的，这条龙正是长距离耐力比赛。
en: His hunger for knowledge has been insatiable since he himself started “chasing the dragon,” as he likes to call the beast that is long-course endurance racing.

zh: 不论是参加超级马拉松比赛还是铁人三项比赛，麦肯齐一直热衷于不断更新训练计划，包括调整饮食计划、选择极简跑鞋和采用力量调节训练提高运动水平并避免受伤。
en: Whether he’s competing in ultramarathons or Ironman® triathlons, Brian has feverishly tinkered with the many variables that go into the craft, from diet to minimalist footwear to the use of strength conditioning as a way both to improve performance and to ward off injury.

zh: 马里恩俯卧撑是我在马里恩监狱中学来的，是下斜俯卧撑的高强度升级版。
en: Marion pushups are an intense, progressive form of decline pushup I learned in Marion Pen.

zh: 下斜俯卧撑需要把双脚抬起来，放在某些东西上。
en: Decline pushups are just pushups with your feet elevated—lifted up on something.

zh: 如果你的脚可以抬得足够高，那么该动作就不怎么锻炼胸部了，而是会转而锻炼肩膀前部的肌肉。
en: If you lift your feet high enough, the pushups stop working the chest as much and start working the muscles at the front of the shoulders.

zh: 双手大约与肩同宽，上半身挺直，膝关节微微弯曲。
en: Your hands should be about shoulder width apart, and despite the angle at the hips, your torso should be straight.

zh: 弯曲手臂，肩部下沉，放低身体，直到下巴轻触双手之间的地面。
en: Retain a gentle bend at the knee.Bending at the arms and shoulders, lower your chin until it kisses the floor at a point between your hands.

zh: 然后，髋部慢慢下降划过地面，下巴继续向前划出一条弧线，直到双臂和双腿伸直，此时肩部高于髋部。
en: Now continue moving your chin in an upwards arc, as your hips drop to brush the ground.You should finish the movement with your arms and legs straight, your shoulders high and your hips low.

zh: 双臂保持伸直的状态，臀部向后撅起回到起始姿势，重复练习。
en: Keeping your arms straight, push your butt out and back until you are in the starting position again,and repeat.

zh: 尽管这个变式中的弯曲和伸展动作可以练出强大、柔韧的髋部，但对上身肌肉来说，该练习比标准俯卧撑更容易。
en: This exercise is easier on the upper body muscles than regular pushups, although the jackknife bending and straightening motion builds strong, flexible hips.

zh: 因此，它在武术家和摔跤运动员中十分流行。
en: For this reason, the exercise is popular with martial artists and wrestlers.

zh: 该练习有时也被称为猫式俯卧撑。
en: Sometimes this exercise is known as a cat pushup.

zh: 大多数人更换空气过滤器或空气加湿器的频率很不够，所以机器就并未有效工作。
en: Most people don't change air filters or clean humidifiers with enough regularity, so they're not that effective.

zh: 如果不能定期清理空气加湿器，机器里的水会成为藏污纳垢的场所，滋生霉菌和真菌，最后你还会呼吸到这些东西。
en: Unless humidifiers are cleaned regularly, they’ll form a cesspool of water, which grows mold and fungi, and then you end up breathing it.

zh: 相反地，如果你坚持定期维护，这些机器就能有效地滤去空气中的过敏物，非常有用。
en: If you stick to regular maintenance, however, they can be useful for taking allergens out of the air.

zh: 由于多数成人对于牛奶、橙汁或麦片的摄入量不足，在饮食中补充维生素D就可以让我们吸收足量。
en: Since most adults don’t drink enough milk or orange juice or eat enough cereal to get the recommended dosages,supplementing your diet with D can give you the levels you need.

zh: 如果是60岁以下的人，我们建议摄入400国际单位的维生累D作为补充；如果超过60岁，摄入600国际单位为宜。
en: We recommend that you take 1,000 IU of vitamin D in a supplement if you're under sixty and 1,200 IU if you're over sixty.

zh: 这样的摄入量对钙质的最佳吸收是必要的，也有利于钙质很好地与骨骼结合。
en: That's how much is necessary for the optimal absorption of calcium and the optimal incorporation into the bone.

zh: 我们还建议补充400至500毫克的镁（一种在杏仁中发现的营养物质），因为镁能帮助平衡钙质对神经功能的影响。
en: We also recommend 400 to 500 milligrams of magnesium (a nutrient found in almonds), because magnesium helps balance the effects of calcium on nerve function.

zh: 顺便提一句，酒精是一把双刃釗。
en: Alcohol is a double-edged sword.

zh: 从好的方面看，酒精能缓解炎症，这其中的原因人们还不十分清楚。
en: It decreases inflammation, for reasons not fully understood.

zh: 但是，过量的酒精会造成免疫系统老化，也许这是由于酒精降低了免疫细胞的活性。
en: But too much of it can cause aging of the immune system, perhaps by inactivating the cells that defend you.

zh: 男性每天喝两杯半以上的酒，女性每天喝一杯半以上，都会构成对健康的直接威胁。
en: Anything over about two and a half drinks daily for men and one and a half drinks for women is a net increase in risk.

zh: 最简单的障碍是无孔处女膜 (imperforate hymen)，阻止子宫黏液和内膜血液的流出。
en: The simplest single disorder is that of the imperforate hymen, which does not permit the outward passage of uterine mucous and endometrial blood.

zh: 这些液体积聚造成阴道积水（hydrocolpos)或阴道子宫积水 (hydrometrocolpos)并使处女膜膨出和 (或）引起每月发作的腹部疼痛。
en: These accumulate in the vagina (hydrocolpos) or uterus (hydrometrocolpos) and produce a bulging hymen; and/or one may elicit a vague history of abdominal pain that m ay have monthly exacerbations.

zh: 苗勒氏管发育不全（Müllerian agenesis 或hypoplasia)会导致阴道和子宫上部的疾病，形成非常短的阴道并造成闭经；但是，必须与无孔处女膜、阴道的其他疾病和男性激素不敏感综合征加以鉴别。
en: Müllerian agenesis or hypoplasia leads to disorders of the upper portion of the vagina and uterus.These disorders produce a very short vagina ending in a blind pouch and primary amenorrhoea; however, the differential diagnoses include imperforate hymen, other disorders of the vagina and the androgen insensitivity syndromes.

zh: 强烈的负面情感状态对心脏有害，它带来的负面影响会让你的生理年龄增大8岁，因此不只是“情感丰富、敢感易怒”那么简单。
en: Powerful negative emotional states are bad for your heart and are important enough to make your RealAge effect eight years older, so this is not just touchy-feely stuff.

zh: 这样的情绪会引起高压，还会千扰人体修复机制的正常运作， 限制血管活动，造成血流不足。
en: These emotions can cause high blood pressure, as well as disrupt your body's normal repair mechanism and also constrict your blood vessels, making it even harder for enough blood to work its way through.

zh: 有几种不同的治疗方法会有助于你用比较健康的方式处理这些有害的感情，例如学习放松疗法、冥想、交些不会惹你生气的朋友，等等。
en: Various kinds of therapies—including learning relaxation techniques and meditation, and having friends you'd never think of getting angry with—can help you handle these damaging feelings in a healthier way (see below).

zh: 这种研究主要在了解不同母群体中健康与疾病情况的次数与分布。
en: This type of research pertains to the frequencies and distributions of health and disease conditions among populations.

zh: 流行病学研究的基本观念是发生率。
en: Rate of occurrence is the basic concept in epidemiological studies.

zh: 母群体的大小是检测损伤、罹病的盛行率或是处于特定危险族群的健康状况时，一个相当重要的考量因素。
en: The size of the population being studied is an important consideration in examining the prevalence of such things as injuries, illnesses, or health conditions in a specified at-risk population.

zh: 预测的其中一项限制跟概化效果(generalizability)有 关。
en: One limitation of prediction relates to generalizability.

zh: 一个以特定样本发展出来的迴归方程式被应用到其它样本时会失去相当淮确性，此在预测里称作缩小(shrinkage)。
en: Regression equations developed with a particular sample often lose considerable accuracy when applied to others.This loss of accuracy in prediction is called shrinkage.

zh: 母群体特异性(population specificity) 也跟此现象有关。
en: The term population specificity also relates to this phenomenon.

zh: 在急性损伤和手术后即刻，儿童和青少年可能需要使用药物来控制疼痛，用什么药以及用多大剂量取决于损伤的严重程度。
en: Immediately following an acute injury or an operative procedure, children and adolescents may require pain medication.The type and dosage of the medication depend on the severity of the injury.

zh: 儿童在单纯骨折时仅需服用一天左右的扑热息痛。
en: Young children with simple fractures rarely require medication other than a day or so of acetaminophen.

zh: 年龄稍大的儿童若发生伴有明显肿胀的严重损伤，可以服用非甾体类抗炎药，如布洛芬，奈普生，托美汀硫酸盐等。
en: Older children and teenagers with more severe injuries accompanied by marked swelling often benefit from non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) such as ibuprofen, naproxyn or tolmetin sulphate.

zh: 因此，这些教练揭示了当代体育越来越普遍的一个悖论：当他们成功时会被体育媒体创造为崇拜的对象；当他们深陷丑闻时又会被标记为谴责的对象。
en: Thus, these coaches reveal a paradox that is increasingly common in contemporary sports: created by the sports media as objects of admiration when they succeed, these individuals are subsequently marked as objects of condemnation when they succumb to scandal.

zh: 我们应该明智地考虑体育媒体报道所揭示的文化趋势，而不是将这些叙事仅仅当作变幻无常的大众传媒市场的产品。
en: Rather than see such narratives merely as products of a ficide mass media marketplace, we would be wise to consider the cultural tendencies revealed by sports media coverage.

zh: 用文内尔（W h a _ l ，2 0 0 2 ) 的话来说，“当体育传媒报道的强度越来越大，当体育明星系统成为媒体体育产业核心的时候，体育明星的形象就变成关于道德和男子气概的社会焦虑的聚合点”( P .1 ) 。
en: In Whannel's (2002) words, "as the intensity of media coverage of sport has increased, and as the sporting star system has become central to the media sports industry, the images of sport stars become the point of convergence of social anxieties over morality andmasculinity" (p. 1).

zh: 尽管文内尔的关注点在名流运动员，但是当名流教练们看上去越过了精力充沛的男性气概领导权的正常界限时，同样的焦虑也会发生。
en: Although Whannel's focus is on celebrity athletes, similar anxieties are in play when the behavior of celebrity coaches appears to exceed the normal boundaries of vigorous masculine leadership.

zh: 在月经来潮前，囊肿会变大变软，绝经后就停止生长。
en: Cysts, which stop with menopause, are larger and more tender just before periods.

zh: 激素含量失衡是一种可能的原因。为了防治囊肿，应避免食用含甲基黄嘌呤的食品，比如咖啡、红茶和可乐。
en: A hormonal imbalance is the likely cause; to help prevent cysts, avoid methylxanthines, which are found in coffee, black tea, and colas.

zh: 运动表现的内在昼夜节律-Youngstedt (扬斯戴特）和奥康纳（O’Connor)认为，一天中运动表现的变化（前面已经概括了的）可能是由于环境和行为的因素所致，正如是内在生物钟的命令一样。
en: Intrinsic Circadian rhythms of performance-Youngstedt and O’Connor argued that the changes in performance during the course of the day (outlined in the preceding section) were just as likely due to environmental and behavioral factors as to the dictates of an intrinsic biological clock.8

zh: 举例来说，吃饭的时间可以改变葡萄糖的存储情况（实际上，用餐时间的改变可以使短距离疾跑的最佳能力转移到下午的晚些时候，这一点已经被确认）。
en: Timing of meals, for instance, could alter glycogen stores.(It has been shown, in fact, that altera-tions in meal times can shift time of peak sprinting ability to later in the afternoon.)

zh: 一些人声称咖啡的摄入，或反之，咖啡因的排出也能影响表现的周期性。
en: Some have claimed that coffee intake or, conversely, caffeine  withdrawal can also affect periodicity of performance.

zh: 汉娜（Hannah)却与其队友相反，表现出渴望参加运动，刻苦训练，努力发挥自己的潜能，并为自己的成就感到高兴和自豪。
en: Hannah portrays a stark contrast to her teammate: she readily looks forward to participation, puts forth a high level of intensity during play, performs up to her potential and exhibits pride and pleasure in her accomplishments.

zh: 为什么她们两个人的想法、感觉和行为差别这么大？
en: Why do these two individuals think, feel and behave so differently?

zh: 一个可能的解释 就是在运动领域中她们的自我知觉 (self-perception)存在差异。
en: One possible answer is their self-perceptions in the domain of sport.

zh: 克里斯蒂娜的身体能力感较低，而汉娜拥有较高水平的能力感（competence perceptions)。
en: Christine perceives a low sense of physical capabilities, while Hannah possesses a high level of competence perceptions.

zh: 反过来，不同的自我知觉（self-perceptions)又导致参与体育运动的不同动机、运动表现以及不同的情绪体验。
en: These differing self-perceptions, in turn, result in variations in motivation, performance and emotional reactions to sport participation.

zh: 对于正在生长中的儿童来说，无氧代谢产生的能量非常重要，因为儿童参加的许多活动是属于爆发性的能量消耗活动（如短跑冲刺）而不是中等强度长时间的活动。
en: Anaerobic energy production is important for the growing child because many of the activities of children involve bursts of energy expenditure (or sprints) rather than activities of moderate intensity for extended periods of time.

zh: 因此，仅仅通过骨骼肌的有氧代谢是不能满足活动中的儿童的能量需求的。
en: The energy needs of the exercising child thus cannot always be met by the oxidative properties of the working skeletal muscles.

zh: 无氧代谢功能机制就对这类活动起着重大的作用。
en: Anaerobic energy production mechanisms must come into play to permit such activities.

zh: 色甘酸的预防效果持续约2小时，但与特布他林合用时，预防效果加倍。
en: Cromolyn’s protective effect lasts about 2 h, but in combination with terbutaline, protection lasts twice as long.

zh: 色甘酸钠有3种剂型：胶囊粉剂(每一个胶囊含20 mg)经粉雾吸入器吸入；定量吸入剂每次喷射1 mg;喷雾器溶液每瓶含20 mg。
en: Cromolyn sodium is available in three forms: a powder contained within a capsule (20 mg • capsule-1), inhaled via a Spinhaler, a metered-dose inhaler (1 mg • puff-1) and a nebulizer solution (20mg • amp-1).

zh: 尼多酸钠是含有色甘酸钠的合剂，有相似的作用和效力，也没有毒性。
en: Nedocromil sodium is a com pound related to cromolyn sodium, with com parable potency and efficacy, and comparable freedom from toxicity.

zh: 钙通道阻滞剂此类新药用于不同医学领域。
en: Calcium channel blockers.These new agents are finding use in m any different medical settings.

zh: 正如莱曼斯克等人（1989）和米德尔顿所指出的，哮喘患者呼吸道的病理过程是具有钙依赖性的：“在平滑肌中兴奋—收缩的耦合，在肥大细胞和黏液腺中刺激—分泌的耦合……和炎性细胞的移动和激活（都有钙的参与）。
en: As Lemanske and Middleton point out, the pathological processes in the airways of patients with asthma are calcium-dependent: ‘excitation—contraction coupling in smooth muscle, stimulus—secretion coupling in mast cells and mucous glands . . . and the movement and activation of inflammatory cells’.

zh: ” 钙通道阻滞剂尼非地平和维拉帕米（verapamil，异搏定）对阻断运动性哮喘都有效，而地尔硫卓（diltiazem, 恬尔心）却无效。
en: The calcium channel blockers nifedipine and verapamil have been shown to be effective in blocking EIA , while diltiazem has not.

zh: 手臂向两侧伸展，然后开始画圈。
en: Simply hold your arms out to the side and begin to make circles.

zh: 该动作是动态的，而且所需的柔韧性也比一般人所想的更大，所以你不要一开始就疯狂摇摆，否则可能扭伤那些还没有热起来的肌肉。
en: This exercise is dynamic and requires more flexibility than most people realize, so don’t just start wildly swinging or you might tweak cold muscles.

zh: 先以小圈开始，大约飞盘那么大的圆就行。双肩逐渐打开之后，再扩大旋转幅度，直到达到你的最大幅度。
en: Start with small circles—no larger than a Frisbee—and as your shoulders begin to loosen gradually expand your rotations to the maximum of your range of motion.

zh: 做上50次（即画50个完整的圈），再僵硬的上身也会热起来，但不要忘记要以相反方向重复相同的次数。
en: One set of fifty reps (i.e., fifty full circles) will warm up even the tightest upper body, but don’t forget to repeat the exercise for the same number of reps, circling in the opposite direction.

zh: 稍微难一点的是“逆转风车”，双臂要以相反方向旋转。
en: A slightly harder variation is alternate windmills, which involves the arms circling in different directions before switching.

zh: 当然，要完成呼吸过程，肺的其他组成部分也是必不可少的。
en: Of course, your lungs also have other parts that are integral to the breathing process.

zh: 支气管负责清理肺部坏境。
en: Your bronchial tubes are responsible for cleaning out your lungs.

zh: 肺就像小块的四岁生日蛋糕，表面包裹着黏液，黏附着灰尘和微生物。
en: Typically, they’re like a four-year-old’s birthday cake covered with mucus, which dirt and germs stick to.

zh: 肺部还有上万根被称为纤毛的细小绒毛。
en: Your lungs also have millions of tiny hairs called cilia.

zh: 纤毛的作用像小扫帚，将所有黏在黏液上的杂物统统扫走。
en: Cilia act like little brooms that sweep away all the stuff that’s caught in your mucus.

zh: 心脏就像你家一样，也有“门厅”——心房，储存流入心脏的血液。
en: Now just like your house, your heart also has an atrium, which holds the blood coming into the heart.

zh: 当这种相对不太重要的房间发生纤维性颤动时，人们会感到心悸。
en: When fibrillation happens in this less critical chamber, folks feel palpitations.

zh: 与需要植入AICD的心脏病人不同，这种患者有时需要用其他方法治疗，比如植入起搏器、射频消溶手术或服用药品，药物治疗包括服用降低血液黏度的药品，能够防止不断运动的心房壁上因凝血累积而引发中风。
en: Instead of an AICD, these people sometimes need minimally invasive procedures like a pacemaker insertion, ablation, or medications including a blood thinner to prevent blood clots that accumulate on the quivering atrial walls and can cause strokes.

zh: 农夫行走。
en: Farmer's Walk.

zh: 这是一项很棒的躯干力量练习。
en: This is an excellent trunk-strengthening exercise.

zh: 双手各拿一个哑铃或者壶铃，然后在指定距离内来回走动，通常距离是10-20米。
en: Start by lifting a dumbbell or kettlebell in each hand, and then begin walking a predetermined distance, typically 10 to 20 yards.

zh: 在当今流行文化下，像WNBA中那些女性一样的职业女性运动员依旧被市场化为后女性主义的英雄，她们大概成了女孩儿和年轻女性的正面形象模板，因为在她们举例证明了女孩儿的力量，一种显然无威胁的、非政治性的女权主义形式（Taft, 2004)。
en: In contemporary popular culture, professional female athletes like the women of the WNBA continue to be marketed as postfeminist heroes who presumably provide girls and young women with positive role models, given that they exemplify girl power, an explicitly nonthreatening and nonpolitical form of feminism (Taft, 2004).

zh: 让我们将目光从依然存在的意识形态和不公正的历史力量移开，后女性主义“女孩儿的力量”假定两性之间的平等已经实现。
en: Rather than focus on ideologies and historical forces of inequality that still persist, postfeminist "girl power" posits that equality between the sexes has been achieved.

zh: 这意味着，女孩儿和妇女可以庆祝和拥抱女性气质，而不是彻底地拒绝它们，她们开始享受第二次女性主义浪潮所带来的好处，尤其是她们可以打入由男性主导的领域的出口，例如体育。
en: This means that girls and women can celebrate and embrace femininity rather than rejecting it outright while still enjoying the benefits of second wave feminism, especially the achievement of access to male-dominated institutions such as sports.

zh: 狂食行为通常包括摄入高热量的食物（糖果），常常不引人注意或秘密地进食。
en: The eating binge typically includes high caloric density foods (sweets), usually eaten incon­spicuously or secretly.

zh: 通过呕吐来缓解腹部不适，但患者能继续狂食行为。
en: By using vomiting to relieve abdominal discomfort, the individual can continue the binge.

zh: 与神经性厌食症一样，神经性易饿症也是开始于青春期或成年早期。
en: As with anorexia nervosa, bulimia nervosa begins in adolescence or in early adulthood.

zh: 易饿症患者的家长常常是肥胖的，而易饿症患者在青春期通常也是肥胖的。
en: Parents of bulimics are frequently obese, and bulimics have often been obese during adolescence.

zh: 你的眼睛需要有较好的润滑从而准确聚焦。眼球通过泪腺及副泪腺和眨眼保持润滑。
en: Your eyes need to be well lubricated to focus; they stay lubricated through your three-layer tear supply and by blinking.

zh: 通过眨眼（这是一个上眼睑活动而下眼睑不动的过程），泪水薄膜会平均地分配到眼球的表面，尤其是甬膜。
en: With blinking (it's a process in which the upper lid moves but the lower one doesn't), your tear film is evenly distributed over the surface of the eye, particularly the ornea.

zh: 抛媚眼却是另一回事，它有增加你遭遇性骚扰几率的副作用。）
en: (Winking does the same thing but has a side effect of increasing your risk of sexual harrassment suits.)

zh: 如果是完美的关联，成绩应该会从图中的左下角开始，往斜对角方向出现一条笔直的线，直到右上端。
en: If it were, the scores would begin in the lower left-hand comer of the figure and proceed diagonally in a straight line toward the upper right-hand corner.

zh: 测量两个变项之间关联程度的一种方法是皮尔森积差相关系数（也称为组间相关，或是简单相关）。
en: One measure of the degree of association between two variables is called the Pearson product moment coefficient of correlation (also known as Pearson r, interclass correlation, or simple correlation).

zh: 当两个变项之间没有关联存在时，它们的相关趋近于零。
en: When two variables are unrelated, their correlation is approximately zero.

zh: 皮质酮是一种类固醇物质，用于治疗各种炎症如皮疹、关节炎、哮喘、背下部疼痛等。
en: Cortisone—a steroid used to treat all kinds of inflammatory conditions like skin rashes, arthritis, asthma, and lower-back pain—works by decreasing the inflammatory response and inflammation.

zh: 它可以降低感染反应和感染。但是服用过多的皮质酮也会有负面效果，它会增加你患高血压、感染以及骨质疏松的风险。
en: But taking too much cortisone can also have a negative effect, by increasing your risk of elevated blood pressure, increasing your risk of infections, and thinning your bones.

zh: 在墙边放一个篮球，用自己觉得最容易的方式在篮球旁边蹬起成靠墙倒立，然后将一只手伸出去放在篮球上。
en: Place a basketball by the base of a wall.Kick up into a wall handstand next to the basketball using whichever technique you find easiest, then reach out and place one of your palms on the basketball.

zh: 这个动作说来简单，实际做起来却非常难，这需要你在很短时间（你的手找篮球所用的时间）内用一只锁定的手臂支撑整个体重。
en: This motion sounds simple but is in fact very difficult; it will require supporting your bodyweight on one locked arm for a fraction of a second, or as long as it takes to find the ball.

zh: 手在篮球上放稳之后再调整球的位置，使双手间距大约与肩同宽。
en: Once your palm is secured on the basketball, position it so that your hands are about shoulder width apart.

zh: 支撑在地上的那只手臂要伸直，另一只手臂则是弯曲的。
en: The arm of the hand which is on the floor should be straight, but your other arm will be bent.

zh: 让双手尽量均匀地承担体重，平缓呼吸。
en: Apply your weight as evenly as you can through both hands, breathing smoothly.

zh: 在这时，肱三头肌、肱二头肌及肩部都需要非常用劲，否则很可能因为控制不住篮球而摔倒。
en: Your triceps, biceps and shoulders need to work very hard at this point, or you may lose control of the ball and crash down.

zh: 这是偏重倒立撑的起始姿势（图119）。
en: This is the start position of the uneven handstand pushup (fig. 119).

zh: 做经典俯卧撑姿势时，双脚并拢，双腿、髋部、上身成一条直线。双臂伸直，双手撑地，并处于上胸部的正下方。
en: Get into the classic pushup position; feet together, legs, hips and back aligned, and arms straight with the palms on the floor beneath your upper chest.

zh: 一只手稳固地支撑身体，另一只手撑在篮球上，双手都应置于肩膀以下保持平衡，这是偏重俯卧撑的起始姿势（图13）。
en: With one arm firmly supporting you, place the other hand on a basketball.Both your hands should be directly below your shoulders for stability.This is the start position of the uneven pushup (fig. 13).

zh: 在偏重深蹲中，直立，一只脚踩在地上，另一只脚的脚跟放在位于自己前方、距身体约一步远的篮球上。
en: In the uneven squats, stand up straight with one foot flat on the floor, and another resting firmly on a basketball located approximately one foot length in front of the other foot.

zh: 双脚分开，与肩同宽或略宽，双臂在胸前伸直。
en: The feet should be shoulder width apart or a little wider.Your arms should be out in front of you, directly opposite your chest.

zh: 弯曲膝盖和髋部，直到踩在地上的那条腿的大腿后侧紧贴小腿后侧。
en: Bend at the knees and hips until the back of the thigh of your non-ball leg touches the corresponding calf.You will not be able to descend any further, despite the fact that your ball leg is not compressed as much.

zh: 刚开始练习时，到达最低点后可能出现身体后倾的情况，所以要确保身后有足够的干净空间，这一点对所有全幅深蹲都适用。
en: While learning this position, you may tip backwards, so ensure that you have enough clear space behind you just in case.This applies to all deep squatting.

zh: 暂停一下，然后双腿发力把自己推回到起始姿势。
en: Pause briefly, before pushing yourself back up to the start position with both legs.

zh: 在动作过程中，脚跟始终不要抬离地面，身体不要向前摇晃，尽管你可能不自觉地想这样做。
en: At no point during the exercise should you raise your heel, rock forwards or bounce, despite the fact that you may instinctively want to do these things at first.

zh: 在做偏重引体向上时，单手抓住横杆，采用侧握或反握姿势会比经典的正握姿势舒服。
en: In the process of uneven pullups, grasp the horizontal bar with one hand.A side-on or underhand grip will be more comfortable than the classic overhand version.

zh: 用另一只手抓住握横杆那只手的手腕——大拇指位于那只手的手掌下方，其他手指则位于其手背下方。
en: Now take hold of the wrist of the hand which is gripping the bar, using your free hand.The thumb of the hand holding your wrist should be just below your opposite palm, with the fingers below the back of your hand.

zh: 双脚离地，双膝弯曲，脚踝交叠在一起并置于身后。
en: Your feet should be off the ground, knees bent, with your ankles looped behind you.

zh: 始终收紧上肢带肌，抓横杆那只手臂伸直，但肘部要略微弯曲。
en: Your shoulder girdle should be flexed at all times.The arm that is holding the bar should be straight except for a slight kink in the elbow.

zh: 另一只手臂由于位置较低，弯曲程度会比较大。
en: Your other arm, due to its lower position, will be bent more acutely.

zh: 你的双肘会朝向前方。
en: Your elbows will be in front of your torso.

zh: 弯曲肘部，夹起肩部，平缓地将自己拉起来，直到下巴高过横杆。
en: Bend at the elbows and shoulders to smoothly pull yourself up until your chin is over the bar.

zh: 暂停一下，然后慢慢放低身体，回到起始姿势。
en: Pause at the top, before slowly lowering yourself back down to the start position.

zh: 再次暂停并重复。
en: Pause again before repeating.

zh: 青少年运动员中贫血是不常见的。
en: Anaemia is unusual in adolescent athletes.

zh: 在佩特等（1979)的研究中，来自5个不同大学运动队的46名运动员中未发现贫血。
en: In their study of 46 athletes from five varsity college teams, Pate et al. (1979) could find no cases of anaemia.

zh: 罗兰和凯莱赫（Rowland & Kelleher，1989) 研究发现，在15名男性和15名女性高中游泳运动员中仅发现1名男孩贫血。
en: Rowland and Kelleher (1989) reported only one boy with anaemia among 15 male and 15 female high school swimmers.

zh: 如果值的范围较大时，我们就会使用分组频率（frequency distribution) 分布来呈现，也就是以小区段来区隔分数，称为频率间隔(frequency intervals)。
en: If there is a wide range of values, a grouped frequency distribution is used in which scores are grouped into small ranges called frequency intervals.

zh: 举例来说，图6.2a的直方图，呈现了 30位被挑选出来之PGA球员在2008年的平均分数。
en: For example, figure 6.2a is a histogram of the scoring averages of 30 selected PGA players in 2008.

zh: 球员的平均分数在x轴（底端），每一分数出现的 频率则是以长条的高度呈现在y轴。
en: The scoring averages of players are on the x-axis (bottom), and the frequency of each score is represented by the height of the column on the y-axis.

zh: 在图中你会观察到，有6位球员每一轮的平均杆数是70.25杆。
en: You can see by looking at the figure that 6 players averaged about 70.25 strokes per round.

zh: 体力活动是儿童和青少年日常游戏的一个重要组成部分，也许男孩比女孩更为突出。但是，随着人们近来对女孩和成年女性在优秀运动员中所扮演角色的认可，对女孩运动能力和女孩参加体育活动的价值的认识有了改变。
en: Physical performance is an important component of the behavioural repertoire of children and adolescents, perhaps more so for boys than for girls, although the recent acceptance of girls and women in the role of élite athletes may influence the views of and values attached to physical performance in girls.

zh: 运动能力一般是通过各种的运动测试取得的，这些运动测试包括检测诸如速度、平衡、柔靭性、爆发力和局部肌肉耐力等能力；而肌肉力量传统上是用测力计进行静力性力量测试，如握力、拉力、推力测试等。
en: Motor performance is most often measured in a variety of gross motor tasks which require abilities such as speed, balance, flexibility, explosive strength and local muscular endurance, while muscular strength is traditionally measured by static dynamometric tests such as gripping, pulling and pushing.

zh: 做平卧屈举腿时，平躺在地上，双腿并拢伸展，双手置于身体两侧的地面上。
en: In the flat bent leg raise, lie on your back with your legs together and stretched out on the floor.Your hands should be by your sides, and also in contact with the floor.

zh: 双腿抬起，膝盖弯曲，使大腿与小腿的夹角大约成45°，双脚距离地面约2-5厘米。
en: Raise your legs, bending them at the knee approximately forty-five degrees from the straight alignment.Your feet should be kept an inch or two off the floor.

zh: 这是该动作的起始姿势（图65）。
en: This is the start position (fig. 65).

zh: 该练习前半部分的动作包括平缓地抬起双腿和双脚，持续大约2秒钟，直到双脚位于骨盆正上方（图66）。
en: The positive portion of the exercise involves raising the legs and feet smoothly—over a count of two seconds—until the feet are directly above the pelvis (fig. 66).

zh: 在整个动作过程中，膝盖弯曲的角度应该保持不变——始终“锁定”。
en: As you move, the angle of the knee should not change; it must remain “locked” in the same position.

zh: 双手向下按压地板，这样有助于保持身体稳定。
en: Pressing down on the floor with the hands will help you stabilize your torso throughout the movement.

zh: 两脚位于骨盆正上方时，略作停顿，然后进行反向动作。
en: Pause at the top, before reversing the motion.

zh: 在回复到起始姿势时也略作停顿，然后重复以上过程。
en: Pause again in the start position before repeating as necessary.

zh: 双脚向上运动时呼气，向下运动时吸气。
en: Exhale as the feet move up, inhale as they are moving down.

zh: 在整组练习中，腹部始终都要收紧，双脚始终不能接触地面。
en: Keep the stomach tight at all times.The feet should not touch the floor at all during the set.

zh: 在做平卧抬膝时，平躺在地上，双腿并拢，双手置于身体两侧的地板上。
en: In flat knee raises, lie flat on the floor, with your legs together and your arms by your side.

zh: 膝盖弯曲近90°，双脚距离地面约2一5厘米（1）。
en: Bend your knees so that they are at approximately ninety degrees (i.e., a right angle)（1）, with the feet an inch or two off the ground.

zh: 双手用力向下按压地板，这样有助于保持身体稳定。
en: Pressing hard on the floor with your hands will help keep your torso stable.

zh: 这是该动作的起始姿势（图63）。
en: This is the start position (fig. 63).

zh: 然后平缓地抬起膝盖，越过髋部，直到大腿与地面垂直、小腿与地面平行，整个过程中膝盖始终接近900（2）。
en: Now smoothly bring your knees up over your hips, so that your thighs are perpendicular to the floor, and your calves are parallel to the floor.

zh: 在此过程中呼气，腹部肌肉保持收紧。
en: Keep the knees at a right angle throughout and exhale as you go, keeping your stomach muscles tight.

zh: 这是该动作的结束姿势（图64）。
en: This is the finish position (fig.64).

zh: 暂停1秒钟，进行反向动作。
en: Pause for a count of one, before reversing the motion by extending your legs as you lower your feet.

zh: 降低双脚，回到起始姿势，并在此过程中吸气。
en: Inhale as you return to the start position.

zh: 在整组练习中双脚都不能接触地面。
en: After you begin, at no point throughout the movement should your feet touch the floor.

zh: 做平卧直举腿时，平躺在地上，面部朝上。
en: In flat straight leg raises, lie on the floor, face up.

zh: 双脚并拢，双腿伸直，双手置于身体两侧。
en: Your feet should be together, your legs should be straight, and your arms should be by your sides.

zh: 抬起双脚，使其距离地面约2到5厘米。
en: Lift your feet an inch or two from the floor.

zh: 双手向下按压地板，以保持身体稳定。
en: Pressing down with the hands will help you keep your torso stable.

zh: 双腿锁定，抬起双脚直到它们到达骨盆正上方，即双腿与上半身的夹角成90°。
en: Now, keeping your legs locked, raise your feet until they are directly above your pelvis.

zh: 抬脚的过程中呼气，腹部保持收紧。
en: Exhale as you lift, keeping the stomach tight.

zh: 至少要用2秒钟平缓地完成该动作，不要用猛劲。
en: It should take you at least two seconds to smoothly accomplish this—don’t explode up.Your legs and torso will form a right angle at this point.

zh: 停顿片刻，然后反向动作，降低双腿的过程中吸气。
en: Pause briefly, before reversing the motion exactly, inhaling as you go down.

zh: 到达起始姿势后略作停顿，再重复。
en: Pause again in the start position and repeat.

zh: 在整个动作过程中，膝盖始终要锁定，双脚不能接触地面，直到一组完成之后方可。
en: At no point should allow your knees to unlock, and your heels shouldn’t touch the floor until the set is completed.

zh: 我们发现，在确定受试者的低强度运动（在AT水平下活动）和高强度运动 (在AT水平之上的活动）时，无氧阈是有实用价值的。
en: We have found it useful to consider low intensity exercise as work performed below the subject's AT and high-intensity exercise as above AT work.

zh: 与低强度运动比较，高强度运动会伴有儿茶酚胺和生长激素呈非线性增加的反应，而血糖却会下降（Cooper et al., 1989)。
en: High-intensity exercise is accompanied by non-linear increases in catecholamines, GH responses, and blood glucose turnover when compared with low-intensity work (Cooper et al., 1989).

zh: 这些研究结果是对运动强度进行相对简单分类的生理基础和实践基础。
en: These observationsform a practical and physiological basis for this relatively simple division of exercise intensity.

zh: 男性生殖器成熟状态的更直接的测定法是测量睾丸的体积。
en: A more direct estimate of genital maturation in males is provided by measurements of testicular volume.

zh: 用一系列已知容积的睾丸模型测定睾丸的大小（普拉德睾丸测量器，Prader orchidometer)。
en: It is estimated from the size of the testes using a series of models of known volume which have the shape of the testes (Prader orchidometer).

zh: 使用这种模型要求在临床检查时医生应直接接触睾丸，将睾丸与某一椭圆球体睾丸模型对照。
en: Application of the models requires direct manipulation of the testes at clinical examination as the physician attempts to match the size of the testis with the ellipsoid model that most closely matches it.

zh: 由特殊细胞（称为起搏细胞）发出的电流，由心脏顶部开始向下流动，刺激心肌，将血液挤出，通过主动脉瓣膜。
en: Electricity from special cells (called pacemaker cells)—starting at the top of the heart and moving down_stimulates the heart muscle to wring the blood out through the aortic valve.

zh: 这就像拧湿毛—样，把水扔出来。
从心脏中流出的血液自动注入主动脉，主动脉是人体最大的动脉血管，将富含氧气的血液输送到人体其他部分。
en: The wave of blood that has been twisted out of the heart is ejected into the aorta itself, the body's largest artery, which carries oxygen*rich blood to the rest of the body.

zh: 恰当的时机掌控（Coincidental timing )。
en: Coincidental timing.

zh: 这是使运动行为与一个物体的到达相匹 配的能力。
en: This is the ability to match a motor action with the arrival of an object.

zh: 当球飞过来时，三垒手必须精确计算起跳时机以接住平直球。
en: The third baseman must time his leap for a line drive at just the right instant when the ball arrives.

zh: 为了完成这个动作，他必须有一些估算球速的手段。
en: To accomplish this, he must have some means of estimating the velocity of the ball.

zh: 髂骨上缘外侧间距是指髂骨上缘最外侧点之间的距离。
en: Bi-iliocristal breadth refers to the distance between the most lateral points on the superior border of the iliac crest.

zh: 测试者面向受试者，用中指寻找骨性标志，并将夹子双臂对准部位。
en: Stand in front of the subject, locate the sites with your third digits and apply the branches of the caliper to the sites.

zh: 将夹子双臂向上与水平面约呈45°，测量髂骨上缘最外侧点之间的最大距离。
en: Position the branches to point upward at an angle of about 450 from the horizontal encompassing the largest diameter between the most lateral aspects of the iliac crests.

zh: 用食指沿着髂骨侧的两个夹臂施加合适的压力。
en: A pply firm pressure with your index finger to the branches over the iliac sites.

zh: 从盒子到髂前上嵴上缘骨性标志的高度。
en: Projected height from the box to the iliospinale landmark.

zh: 受试者双脚并拢站立，面向盒子的一个角，足跟并拢，双足放在盒子的任一侧。
en: The subject stands with the feet together facing a corner of the box, with heels together and feet on either side of the box.

zh: 测试者用左手将指示器末端直接与盒子接触，用右手将分段测量计的指示器外鞘垂直向上接触髂前上嵴下缘骨性标志。
en: Place the end pointer flush on the box with your left hand and extend the housing pointer of the segmometer vertically upward with your right hand to the marked iliospinale landmark.

zh: 不过还有一种常见的前列腺问题需要注意：前列腺肥大（BPH)。
en: But there's also another common prostate disease to be aware of—benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH).

zh: 从本质上看，就患有前列腺肥大的男性而言，位于尿道附近的前列腺会胀大。尿道是人体的主要管道，能将体内器官排出的废液，输送到体外。
en: Essentially, in men with BPH, their prostates enlarge around their urethras—the major road of fluid from the internal organs to the outside world.

zh: 前倾跳跃这项技巧训练可使你通过合理利用重力来保持前倾的姿势。
en: Hop with Forward Lean                                                                                                                                                This drill will help teach you how to properly use gravity with a falling forward lean.

zh: 这个练习可以帮助跑者逐渐掌握更紧凑的步幅，纠正原先迈大步和后脚跟落地的跑步方式，保持了重心的稳定性，更大程度上调动了臀部参与发力。
en: It transitions runners to a more compact stride; instead of reaching out with the leg and landing on the heel, midline stability is maintained and the hips become more central to the flow of power.

zh: 像跳绳一样，开始垂直跳动，注意使用核心力量。
en: Begin with small vertical hops, as if jumping rope, engaging the core.

zh: 跳动过程中保持身体前倾，保证从脚踝开始前倾，而不是从腰部开始。
en: Once you are hopping, allow your body to fall forward, hinging from the ankles instead of the waist.

zh: 继续跳动，利用重力使身体向前。
en: Continue to hop as you allow gravity to move you forward.

zh: 你可以把自己想象成弹簧高跷，并且注意利用双脚和脚踝的弹性推动身体。
en: Imagine that you are a pogo stick; focus on the elasticity in your feet and ankles to propel you.

zh: 不要让双脚蹭着地面，保持前倾跳动3-5次，稳定动作之后再跳3次。
en: Lean for 3 to 5 hops without scuffing the feet, and then level out for 3 more hops.

zh: 全国大学生运动联合会近来对大学运动员的进食障碍给予极大的关注。
en: The National Collegiate Athletic Association has recently taken a strong interest in eating disorders in collegiate athletes.

zh: 他们在1990年发表了有关进食障碍的包含三个部分内容的录像系列，同时发行书面的资料、文章和展板，准备散发给运动行政管理人员、教练员、训练师和运动员。
en: They have released a three-part videotape series on eating disorders with accompanying written materials, articles and posters, which are intended to be distributed to athletic administrators, coaches, trainers and athletes.

zh: 在这些资料中有一份专门为运动员准备的清单，列举了各种的前驱征侯。
en: Among these materials is a list of warning signs designed specifically for athletes.

zh: 在这本书中，我们花在说明药物治疗上的时间和大多数男性花在前戏上的时间大约是一样的：大约23秒。
en: In this book, we've spent about as much time on medication as most men spend during foreplay--roughly twenty-three seconds.

zh: 这不是对药物治疗的批评（尽管这是前戏的习惯做法之一），实际上，药品的发展是历史上最重要的医学进步。
en: That's not a critique of medication (though it is one of our foreplay customs); in fact, the development of pharmaceuticals is one of the most important medical developments in history.

zh: 然而在这本书里大部分是向你展示预防的方法，即在你担心需要逬行药物治疗之前就战胜疾病。
en: For the most part, though, we're here to show you methods for prevention--ways to beat the problem before you need to worry about medication.

zh: 面对墙壁站立，双脚并拢，双臂伸直，与肩同宽，双手平放在墙上，手掌与胸等高。这是墙壁俯卧撑的起始姿势（图1）。
en: Face a wall.With your feet together, place your palms flat against the wall.This is the start position of the wall pushup (fig. 1).Your arms should be straight and shoulder width apart, with the hands at chest level.

zh: 弯曲肘部，直到前额轻触墙面。
en: Bend the shoulders and elbows until the forehead gently touches the wall.

zh: 这是该动作的结束姿势（图2）。
en: This is the finish position (fig. 2).

zh: 从工程学的观点看，骨骼是一种非凡的结构材料。
en: From an engineering point of view , bone is a remarkable structural material.

zh: 它的强度比最硬的木头、砖块和混凝土还要大（Koch, 1971),同时 又轻巧得容易移动并且坚固得足以支撑物体。
en: It is stronger than the hardest wood, brick or concrete (Koch, 1971) and yet light enough to allow movementand solid enough to provide support.

zh: 它还柔韧有余，能够弯曲和吸收突然的冲击而不轻易破碎。
en: It is also flexible, which allows it to bend and absorb sudden impacts without shattering.

zh: 骨骼的构成主要有蛋白质（胶原蛋白，collagen),羟磷灰石 (hydroxyapatite)和水分，每一种成分各占 1/3。
en: Bone composition is primarily the combination of a protein (collagen), a mineral (hydroxyapatite) and water, with each constituent contributing about one-third by volume.

zh: 对于一些年轻人来说，青春期的变化提髙运动表现的现象发生的早，另一些则在青春期后期才出现。
en: For some youths, performance-enhancing pubertal changes occur early.Others experience them later in adolescence.

zh: 它们的出现也有着不同的速度。
en: They also occur at different tempos.

zh: 有些年轻人会以一种集中的方式很快经过整个过程，然而对于另一些，整个过程则是随着时间渐渐消失的。
en: Some youths go through the process very quickly in a concentrated manner, while for others, the entire process is drawn out over time.

zh: 性发育水平，它对于运动表现有自己的作用，但它并不是随着年轻人的实际年龄发展的。
en: Level of sexual development, with its implications for sport performance, does not follow the youngster’s chronological age.

zh: 下肢的迅速伸长是青春生长突增期的早期特点之一。
en: Rapid growth in the lower extremities is characteristic of the early part of the adolescent growth spurt.

zh: 只有少数几份研究报道了两侧肩峰(biacromial)间距和两侧肩脊（bicristal）间距的数据，且结果多不一致。
en: Only few studies report data for biacromial and bicristal breadths, and results are variable.

zh: 通常，这两者的最大增长速度均出现在PHV之后 (Beunen & Malina, 1988; Malina et al., 1988) 。
en: Generally, peak velocity in biacromial breadth occurs after PHV and also after peak velocity in bicristal breadth (Beunen & Malina, 1988; Malina et al., 1988).

zh: 屈臂撑是被认为是锻炼推力肌肉群的动作，的确，这个动作很锻炼胸肌和肱三头肌。
en: DipsDips are usually considered to be an exercise for the pushing muscles, and it’s true that they work the pecs and triceps hard.

zh: 但由于在这个动作中手臂会向下移动，所以背阔肌也会积极地参与发力。
en: But because the arms strongly move downwards during the movement, the lats become significantly involved as well.

zh: 我见过一些家伙在练完屈臂撑而不是引体向上后，背阔肌会酸痛。
en: In fact, I’ve met guys who get sorer lats from dips than from pullups.

zh: 双手抓住双杠或者让双手分别撑在两把椅子上，手臂在身体两侧伸直以支撑身体。
en: Grab some parallel bars—or position yourself between two chairs—and support your weight on straight arms.

zh: 弯曲肘部，直到肘部成直角，暂停一下，然后平稳地把自己撑起来。
en: Bend at the shoulders and elbows until your elbows are at right angles, and pause for a moment before smoothly pushing back up.

zh: 坐姿屈臂撑（将双脚放在高一点儿的稳固平面上）也能锻炼背阔肌，但这个动作的强度不大，因为你并不需要负担全部的体重。
en: Bench dips (dips with the feet up on a stable surface) also work the lats, but to a lesser degree because the total bodyweight isn’t moved.

zh: 在2009年，马丁•吉尔巴拉和加拿大的麦克马斯持大学(McMaster University)团队也对HIIT进行了深入研究。
en: 2009 study by Martin Gibala and a team at McMaster University in Canada also took a close look at HIIT.

zh: 他们的研究以学生为测试对象，测试内容包含3分钟热身、60秒高强度训练和75秒休息，每组重复8~12轮。
en: Their study on students incorporated a 3-minute warm-up, followed by 60 seconds of intense exercise and 75 seconds of rest, repeated for 8 to 12 cycles.

zh: 总训练时间为20~29分钟不等，参与测试的学生在2周内每周重复3次该项训练。
en: The total workout time ranged from 20 to 29 minutes, with the students repeating the routine 3 times per week for 2 weeks.

zh: 人体测量盒子（anthrvpometric box) 一只50cm x 40cm x 30 cm的盒子可以让受试者坐下来测量坐高、胸廓横径或者肱骨和股骨的宽度。
en: Anthropometric box.A 50 x 40 x 30 cm box may be used for seating the subject to obtain measures such as sitting height, transverse chest breadth or humerus and femur widths.

zh: 已知髙度的盒子配合分段人体测量器可以用于测量延伸身高。
en: A box of known height is part of the protocol for measuring some of the projected heights in conjunction with the segmometer.

zh: 有提手口的长方形盒子能够让测试者依据受试者的不同身材随意转动。
en: The oblong box with slotted handholds enable the anthro- pometrist to turn the box to accommodate sub­ jects of different size.

zh: 此外，它可以当做座位或者让受试者站在上面，便于测量。盒子还可以让检测者站在上面测量身材高大受试者的伸展身高和肩峰间距。
en: In addition to providing a place for seating or elevating standing subjects for convenience of measurement, the box also serves as a step for the anthropometrists who may stand on it to obtain stretch stature or biacromial breadth in tall subjects.

zh: 人体测量卷尺（anthropometric tape)。
en: Anthropometric tape.

zh: 人体测量卷尺最好是钢制的，最小刻度为mm级，能够容易读出cm数；1.5-2m长，在零刻度前有一个多余部分，卷缩在盒子里，有弹簧自动回缩装置。
en: Ideally, the anthropometric tape should be steel, calibrated in easy to read centimetres with millimetre gradation; 1.5 —2 m long with an end tab before the zero marking, enclosed in a case and incorporating a spring for automatic retraction.

zh: 这种卷尺之一叫做 Lufkin, Executive, Thinline 2m W606PM (Cooper Tools，Apex, NC, USA)。
en: One such tape is the Lufkin, Executive, Thinline 2 m W606PM (CooperTools, Apex, NC, USA).

zh: 认知节奏策略经验丰富的长跑运动员，清楚地明白他们比赛时的感觉。
en: Cognitive pacing Strategy Experienced distance athletes know how they feel during a race.

zh: 参加的类似距离的比赛使他们明白，目前的努力强度会造成终点时有怎样的疲劳程度。
en: From having competed in similar distances in the past, they know just how intense such perceptions of effort should be in order to predict exhaustion at the finish.

zh: lkm公路赛最初的一km出现的呼吸闲难、腿部肌肉紧张，会使跑步者意识到他们不能以此节奏完成比赛。
en: Breathing too hard and experiencing leg-muscle stress in the first kilometer of a 10K race cause runners to conclude that they will not make it at this pace.

zh: 因此他们有意识地降低跑速。
en: They consciously slow their velocity.

zh: 相反，如果在比赛早期阶段感觉很舒服，这种感觉会提示运动员加速。
en: Conversely, being too comfortable in the early phases of a race signals them to speed up.

zh: 当考虑形成框架的过程时，重要的是要意识到，框架不仅能应用到新闻报道的结构和内容上，而且可以应用到个体的认知上。
en: When considering processes in framing, it is important to recognize that frames apply not only to the structure and content of media reports but also to individual cognitions.

zh: 正如戈夫曼 (Goffmann, 1974 )解释道，框架是一种设备，这种设备能使受众成员“定位、感知、识别和标记”信息的出现(P.21 )。
en: As Goffmann (1974) explained, frames are devices that allow audience members to "locate, perceive, identify and label" occurrences of information (p. 21).

zh: 心理学家称之为“图式”的认知框架，能够被理解为个体在感知周围环境时所采取的精神捷径。
en: Cognitive frames relate to what psychologists term sche- mata, which can be understood as the mental shortcuts individuals take to make sense of their surroundings.

zh: 体育运动员受伤，大多会成为媒体报道的头条新闻。女性运动员前卜字韧带撕裂的几率是男性运动员的8倍。女性膝部的生理结构较男性松散，女性的骨骼也从整体上比男性脆弱，这就对稳定性造成了负面影响， 致使女性的韧带更易于撕裂。
en: Athletes get all the headlines when they get injured, but women are up to eight times more likely than men to tear their ACL The looser construction of the female knee—ond overall weaker skeleton—can compromise stability and predispose women to ligament tears.

zh: 韧带受伤还与月经前后的雌性激素含M变化有一定联系，因此在高中、大学、娱乐界和职业的运动员中，女性韧带撕裂的情况远远多于男性。
en: The injuries are also linked to hormonal changes around the time of menstruation, so female high school, collegiate, recreational, and professional athletes end up suffering many more tears than men do.

zh: 为了帮助保持湿润，你可以用易溶于水的润滑剂安全地增强润滑作用，如润滑剂或溶脂类的软膏。
en: To help add moisture, you can increase lubrication safely with water-soluble lubricants like K-Y jelly or lipid-soluble gels.

zh: 对于有些女性来说，雄性激素润肤乳每天两次直接 外用于阴蒂，有助于增强刺激、性欲和性兴奋强度。
en: And for some women, testosterone cream—applied directly to the clitoris twice a day—helps increase stimulation, libido, and intensity of orgasm.

zh: （雄性激素驱动着男性和女性的性活动。
en: Testosterone is a driver of sexuality in both men and women.

zh: 随着年龄贈长，雄性激素自然减少，我们将在第章深入探讨激素疗法。
en: It naturally decreases as age, and we‘ll discuss hormone therapies in depth in Chapter 11.

zh: 然而人们还证实雄性激素对性激素含量低的男性也有效。
en: But testosterone has been shown to be effective in men whose testosterone levels are judged as low.

zh: 体力活动是儿童和青少年日常游戏的一个重要组成部分，也许男孩比女孩更为突出。但是，随着人们近来对女孩和成年女性在优秀运动员中所扮演角色的认可，对女孩运动能力和女孩参加体育活动的价值的认识有了改变。
en: Physical performance is an important component of the behavioural repertoire of children and adolescents, perhaps more so for boys than for girls, although the recent acceptance of girls and women in the role of élite athletes may influence the views of and values attached to physical performance in girls.

zh: 运动能力一般是通过各种的运动测试取得的，这些运动测试包括检测诸如速度、平衡、柔韧性、爆发力和局部肌肉耐力等能力；而肌肉力量传统上是用测力计进行静力性力量测试，如握力、拉力、推力测试等。
en: Motor performance is most often measured in a variety of gross motor tasks which require abilities such as speed, balance, flexibility, explosive strength and local muscular endurance, while muscular strength is traditionally measured by static dynamom etric tests such as gripping, pulling and pushing.

zh: 在柔式深蹲过程中，单手抓住某个稳固的物体，以保持平衡。
en: In the process of sissy squats, grab something sturdy with one hand, for support.

zh: 站立，双脚并拢或几乎并拢，双膝弯曲，髋部锁定，踞起脚尖，上身微微后仰。
