en: Stand up straight with the feet shoulder width apart, or slightly wider.

zh: 手臂向斜下方伸出，双手放在比自己的大腿略高的稳固物体上，书桌、高脚凳或椅背都可以。弯曲髋部与膝关节，身体慢慢下降，背部尽可能保持挺直，直到大腿后侧紧贴小腿，无法蹲得更低为止。
en: Your arms should be out straight and angled down, holding onto a sturdy object higher than your thighs.A desk, robust basin or the back of a chair will do.Slowly lower yourself down by bending at the hips and the knees, keeping your back as straight as possible, until your hamstrings meet your calves and you cannot descend any further.

zh: 暂停一会，然后主要靠腿部发力站起来。为了分担双腿的一部分压力，尤其是在最低点时，你要通过向下按压面前的物体，来借用手臂的一部分力量。
en: Pause for a moment, before pushing yourself up using mostly leg power.To take some of the pressure off your legs—particularly in the bottom position—pull yourself up slightly with your arms, by exerting downward force on the object you are holding.

zh: 手臂要尽量伸直，在整个支撑深蹲过程中都不要让脚跟抬离地面。
en: Try to keep the arms fairly straight.Your heels should remain flat on the floor throughout the supported squat.

zh: 证据显示，那些已经在音乐上取得成功的人，其神经肌肉系统的运行与你我不同。
en: Evidence indicates that the neuromuscular systems of those who have achieved musical success operate differently than yours and mine.

zh: 令人惊奇的是，在实验室测试中，技艺熟练的钢琴家比普通人似乎拥有更优越的运动和知觉的时机掌控能力。
en: To no one’s surprise, skillful pianists are seen to possess motor and perceptual timing in laboratory testing that is superior to nonpianists.

zh: 音乐家也比普通人在时间估算方面更精确。
en: Musicians are also more accurate than nonmusicians in estimating time.

zh: 但是，同时这些有才能的人在练习上比你我投人了更多的时间。
en: But, then again, these talented people put in a lot more hours of practice than you or I do.

zh: 其次，如果腰部有赘肉，会更加危险，因为腹部脂肪 的脂肪细胞会分泌一种激素，直接增加血管发炎的几率。即使只减去5%的体重，也能显著提高人体综合健康素质，改善心血管健康状况。
en: Second, that extra weight that's carried around your waist places you at an even higher risk, because the fat cells in abdominal fat secrete a hormone that directly increases inflammation in your blood vessels* A weight loss of even 5 percent of body weight will significantly improve your overall and cardiovascular health.

zh: 运动的另一个作用是缓解紧张，而紧张压力是人体衰老的重大原因之一。
en: Another way exercise can help you is by reducing stress, which is one of the greatest agers of your body.

zh: 坐在地上，双腿伸直，双脚与肩同宽。
en: Sit on the ground with your legs stretched out in front of you.Your knees should be straight, with your feet about shoulder width apart.

zh: 手掌平放在髋部两侧的地上，手指朝前。
en: Place your palms on the floor on either side of your hips, with your fingers pointing towards your toes.Sit up straight.

zh: 坐直，此时腿和上半身之间的夹角成90°。
en: Your body will now form a right angle, with your trunk perpendicular to your legs.

zh: 这是该直桥的起始姿势（图85）。
en: This is the start position of the straight bridge (fig. 85).

zh: 双手用力下压，双臂绷紧，同时将髋部向上推起，直到双腿与躯干成一条直线。
en: Press down through the hands, tensing the arms as you simultaneously push your hips upwards until your legs and torso form a straight line.

zh: 下巴向上抬起，看向天花板，此时只用手掌和脚跟支撑身体。
en: Draw the chin up and look towards the ceiling.At this point your bodyweight will be passing through your palms and heels.

zh: 这是结束姿势（图86）。
en: This is the finish position (fig. 86).

zh: 暂停一会，然后反向运动。
en: Pause before reversing the motion and repeating as necessary.

zh: 身体撑起时呼气，身体放低时吸气。
en: Exhale as you press yourself up, inhale as you go down.

zh: 当下，媒体总是用情怀去描述早期体育事业的发展和体育文化，强调诸如公平竞争、内在报酬、性格培养(如体育精神、自律他律和领袖能力)以及高水准的自控能力等价值观念，谈及早期体育事业中的运动业余主义，往往会带上一种怀旧甚至忧郁的论调。
en: Today, the era of athletic amateurism in sports is often viewed in a nostalgic (even melancholic) fashion, with the media describing earlier sports phases and cultures in romantic ways concerning values such as fair play, playing the sport for intrinsic rewards, the cultivation of positive character traits in players (such as sportspersonship, discipline, and leadership), and players possessing high levels of self-control.

zh: 这样一种业余主义情怀尽管带有刻板印象的色彩，与当今的职业化时代与形象却形成了鲜明对比。当下，欲望、胜利第一、公平竞争第二的态度占据了主导地位。
en: Such an amateur ethos, however stereotypical, contrasts starkly with the current era, and image, of professionalization—where greed, disregard for fair play, and an attitude of winning above all else predominate.

zh: 为了参加比赛，摔跤选手必须符合某一体重级别的要求。
en: Scholastic wrestlers must meet a certain weight classification in order to compete.

zh: 通常的做法是在整个赛季摔跤选手都限制食物和液体的摄取量，以便参加低于其正常体重以下的1到3个级别的比赛（Steen & Brownell, 1990)。摔跤选手一般都相信这种被称为“制造体重”的方法，使他们在同比自己体重轻的对手比赛时有竞争优势。
en: It is a common practice throughout the competitive season for wrestlers to restrict food and fluid intake in order to compete at one to three weight classes below their normal weight (Steen & Brownell,1990).Wrestlers typically believe that this practice, known as 'making weight', gives them a competitive edge over smaller opponents.

zh: 只有很少的摔跤选手、教练员和家长了解这种方法可能对身体产生不良的生理影响。
en: Fewwrestlers, coaches and parents realize the negative physiological impact this practice may have on their bodies.

zh: 我们也以较哲学性的讨论科学与求知的方法，提出从事研究的另类方式。
en: We also present alternative approaches for doing research relative to a more philosophical discussion of science and ways of knowing.

zh: 尤其是，我们探讨使用质性研究、实地研究，与以内省的方法做为回答研究问题的策略。而非依赖传统的科学典范架构做为研究问题探讨的唯一方法。
en: In particular, we address qualitative research, the use of field studies, and methods of introspection as strategies for answering research questions instead of relying on the traditional scientific paradigm as the only approach to research problems.

zh: 运动心理学和体育教育文献中经常强调智力在体育运动中的重要性。
en: The importance of intelligence in sports activity is often emphasized in the literature of sport psychology and physical education.

zh: 参与体育运动除体力外对智力也有要求。
en: In addition to the physical strain, participation in sport also demands intellectual effort.

zh: 为了学会如何正确使用运动技能，参加运动的孩子需要了解这些动作的组成，了解使用技巧的条件，分析和评价动作的结果并根据具体情况调整动作。
en: To learn to use motor skills appropriately, the athlete needs to understand their structure and the situations in which they have to be utilized, to analyse and evaluate the movement execution and to adapt it to the requirements of the situation.

zh: 很少有人对运动员的智力特征剖面图进行过研究。
en: Intelligence profiles of athletes are rarely studied.

zh: 杰龙（1979)和莱文（Levin, 1981，1984)曾尝试用Meili智力测量表 (Analytischer Intelligenztest)来构建儿童运 动员的智力剖面图。
en: Geron (1979) and Levin (1981, 1984) attempted to construct intelligence profiles of child athletes using the Meili's intelligence test — the Analytischer Intelligenztest (1971).

zh: 这一关系图后来发展成职业选择的一项方法，它包括6个子测验，其中5个是非言语测验。
en: This test was developed as an instrument for vocational selection.It includes six subtests, five of which are non-verbal.

zh: 在准备撰写本章时，我们总共阅读了48篇文章，但其中大多数被除外了。
en: In the preparation of this chapter a total of 48 published studies were reviewed, but for various reasons most of them were excluded from the set of papers on which conclusions were based.

zh: 有些被排除的研究文章是没有采用对照组，即没有考虑前面提到的生长发育的重要作用的影响，这是一个特别重大的缺陷。
en: Some of the excluded studies were limited by the failure to employ a control group — given the afore-mentioned importance of growth and development, this is a particularly critical limitation.

zh: 其他被排除的研究报告是因为训练负荷不能精确定量。
en: Other studies were excluded because the dose of training was not precisely quantified or described.

zh: 带有这种缺陷的论文采用参与体育运动或体育课作为运动介入的内容。
en: Many of the studies that carried this limitation used either sport participation or physical education classes as the exercise treatment.

zh: 再有一些被除外的研究论文是因其使用了特殊的人群作为研究的对象（如高血压、哮喘或智力障碍的儿童）。
en: Some other studies were excluded because they used special populations of subjects (e.g.children with hypertension, asthma or mental handicap).

zh: 内层还能对中层起到保护作用。中层称为中膜，负责支撑动脉的整体结构。
en: This inner lining also helps protect the middle layer, called the media layer, which supports the structure of the artery.

zh: 中膜是肌肉层，因此它能对腕或身体其他部分发生的某些事作出反应。中膜在人紧张焦虑的时候会痉挛，运动时则会张开，让更多血流通过，为局部肌肉供能。
en: The media is muscular, so it can respond to what's going on in your head or somewhere else in your body: it spasms when you are depressed or anxious, and opens up when you exercise to allow more blood through to supply the individual muscles.

zh: 早发育和晚发育孩子之间在身高、体重和身体成分上的差异归结到一起就是体格方面的差异。
en: Differences in stature, weight and body composition between early and late maturing children can be translated into physique differences.

zh: 男孩的内胚层 (endomorphs)发育早，而外胚层 (extomorphs)发育晚。
en: In boys, endomorphs tend to be early maturers while ectomorphs tend to be late maturers.

zh: 男孩骨龄和身体成分之间的相关性证实了这种趋势，并且也说明中胚层（mesomorphy)与提早发育也有关系（图1.4)。
en: Correlations between skeletal age and somatotype components in boys confirm this trend and suggest that mesomorphy is also associated with early maturation (Fig. 1.4).

zh: 然而，也有些对中胚层体形者的研究结果不大一致，虽然在15~ 18岁男孩中，年龄比较小就出现最大身高生长速度的孩子的中胚层比例较高。
en: However, results are not consistent for mesomorphy, although boys with an early age at PHV have higher mesomorphy ratings from 15 to 18 years of age (Beunen et al., 1987).

zh: 在《运动员的时钟》这本书中，Rowland要展现的不是一个自大的作者。
en: In The Athlete’s Clock, Rowland plots the assassination not of an autocratic emperor.

zh: 相反， 他启发我们去质疑一些人类运动最神圣的概念。
en: Instead, he invites us to question some of our most hallowed concepts of human athleticism.

zh: 他希望了解，运动科学领域的研究可 以如何帮助我们更好地理解时间、衰老和体内的生物钟以及相关的控制机制，如中枢模式发生器（ttie central pattern generator, CPG)如何影响人体的运动表现。
en: He wishes to understand how research in sport science helps us better understand how time, aging, our internal biological clocks, and associated controls like the central pattern generator (CPG) influence human athletic performance.

zh: 第一，降低中枢指令，大脑信号沿着脊髓传递到收缩肌，控制肌肉收缩强度。
en: First, it reduces central command, the signals descending down the spinal cord from the brain to the contracting muscle that control strength of contractions.

zh: 第二，创造出一种熟悉的痛苦感觉，我们称之为疲劳（fatigue)，大多数人都无法忍受这种感觉，而再做出进一步的努力。
en: And, second, it creates that familiar set of agonizing feelings we call fatigue, which for most of us makes further effort intolerable.

zh: 第二种方式中，这种感觉是由中枢神经系统创建的一种症状，而不是一种生理或物理状态。
en: In this way, such feelings are a symptom created by a guardian central nervous system, rather than a physiological or physical state.

zh: 中位数（median) 是指中间的那个值，也就是当所有数字按照大小排列时，顺序位于（n + l) / 2 的那一个值。
en: The median is defined as the value in the middle; the middle value is the value that occurs in the place (N+ 1) / 2 when the values are put in order.

zh: 在我们的例子中，将所有数字由最低排到最高一1,2,3,5,5,5,6,8,46— 接着找出从第一个数字起的第（9+1) /2 = 5个数字，得到中位数是5 ，是比较能代表整个数列的分数。
en: In our example, arrange the numbers from lowest to highest— 1, 2, 3, 5, 5, 5, 6, 8, 46—then count (9 + 1) / 2 = 5 places from the first score; the median is the value 5, which is a much more representative score.

zh: 当N 是奇数时，中间值就可能是小数，例如数字1,2,3,4的中位数是 2.5。
en: If N is an even number, the median value may be a decimal.For example, for scores 1, 2, 3, 4, the median is 2.5.

zh: 我们的中央运动振荡器（central motor oscillator)是高度智能化的，例如，它为长跑运动员选择最佳的步频和步长组合，使其最节能、最优化。
en: Our central motor oscillator is highly intelligent, able to select for the distance runner, for example, an optimal combination of stride frequency and stride length that is most energy efficient for optimizing performance.

zh: 这个控制器，如果不受干扰，会相当的稳定。
en: It’s a controller that, left unperturbed, is amazingly stable.

zh: 最重要的是，它都没有引起我们的注意。
en: And, best of all, it does this all without causing us to think about it.

zh: 注意！
en: Caution!

zh: 不要将中央运动振荡器和我们前面章节提到的中央控制器（central governor)混淆。
en: Don’t confuse this central motor oscillator with the alleged central governor we encountered in the previous chapter.

zh: 在统计和数学运算中，有一部分比较容易理解的是关于分数的集中趋势（central tendency) 和变异性（variability)之计算。
en: Some of the more easily understood statistical and mathematical calculations are those that find the central tendency and variability of scores.

zh: 当你有了一组分数，可以用一个数字来代表群体，这个数字通常就是平均数、中位数或众数。
en: When you have a group of scores, one number may be used to represent the group.That number is generally the mean, median, or mode.

zh: 这些词语都是用来表达集中趋势的方法。
en: These terms are ways of expressing central tendency.

zh: 稳定性（stability)系数是以在不同期间的重测法来确定。
en: The coefficient of stability is determined by the test-retest method on separate days.

zh: 这个方法经常用于体适能及动作表现的测量，但较少用于纸笔测验。
en: This method is used frequently with fitness and motor performance measures but less often with pencil-and-paper tests.

zh: 这是对一致性最严格的检视，因为当两个测验在不同日期中执行时，与测量有关的误差会更为明显的。
en: This is one of the most severe tests of consistency because the errors associated with measurement are likely to be more pronounced when the two test administrations are separated by a day or more.

zh: 随着时间的推移，运动员的重复运动表现也很有趣。
en: Athletes are also keenly interested in their repeated performances over time.

zh: 他们的击球率，比赛记录，或射门命中率等方面都变得稳定下来。
en: They become fixated on batting averages, fighting records, or field goal percentages.

zh: 当重复运动表现异常差时，我们说运动员处在低迷状态。
en: When repeated performances are unexpectedly poor, we talk about athletes being in a slump.

zh: NBA总决赛中，对战波特兰队，迈克尔•乔丹连续投中6个三分球，我们称之为手热。
en: When Michael Jordan sinks six three-pointers in a row in the NBA finals against Portland, he’s on a hot streak.

zh: 在回顾了有关危机应对和形象恢复的文献（Allen & Caillouet，1994；Benoit，1997) 之后，库姆斯提出了组织采取的四种“姿态”：否认、缩减、重建以及支持（Coombs，2007)。
en: Reviewing scholarship in crisis response and image restoration (Allen & Caillouet, 1994; Benoit, 1997), Coombs (2007) proposed four "postures" taken by organizations: denial, diminishment, rebuilding, and bolstering.

zh: 在这些姿态中，到底哪一个更易于应用到运动员个体上？十种策略便应运而生了。通过这些策略所告知的方法，运动员成功或是不成功地应对困境。
en: Within these organizational postures, which one can readily apply to individual athletes, 10 strategies emerge, each of which informs the manner in which athletes may succeed or not succeed in responding to adversity.

zh: 想象一下，有一条重心线从你的身体穿过直达地球的中心。
en: Think of the line of gravity as it flows downward through your skeleton toward the center of the earth.

zh: 现在 再想想你跑步时身体的重心，并对比一下落地的方式。
en: Now think about your center of gravity as you run, in comparison with where your foot is striking.

zh: 如果你每一次落地脚都在重心线之前—— 也就是所说的“过大的跨步”—— 那么这就如同你每跑一步都在踩刹车。
en: If you reach out ahead of that line of gravity with each stride—known as “overstriding”—you are hitting the brakes with each step.

zh: 这种落地方式是非常费劲的。
en: That’s a monumental waste of energy and momentum.

zh: 根据极简跑和赤足跑拥护者们的观点，极简跑鞋和赤足跑可以纠正这种动作。
en: Minimal shoes and barefoot running would, according to this school of thought, correct that.

zh: 在他意识模糊的时候，他被抬回了地上，他的折磨终止了。他对在洞穴里发生的 事情的估计已经被严重扭曲。
en: After he was dragged semiconscious to the surface when his ordeal  ended, his estimation of duration for events in the cavern had become wildly distorted.

zh: 但是不仅没有变，反而实际上保存的相当稳定的是他的昼夜节律，周期性持续地的醒来和睡觉结合在一起，是在24h之内的。
en: But what had not changed, and in fact had remained quite steady, was his nycthemeral rhythm, the periodic duration of  combined waking and sleeping periods within 24 hours.

zh: 冠状动脉位于心脏表面，让血注入心肌。
en: The coronary arteries, which lie on the heart's surface, drip blood into the heart muscle.

zh: 通过与心肌相连的筋腱，二尖瓣控制血液正常流入左心室。
en: With strings attached to that muscle, the mitral valve regulates blood into the left ventricle.

zh: 如果筋腱过长，瓣膜位置会偏移得过远，以致血液回流入左心房。
en: If those strings are too long, the volve leaflets slip too far up—allowing blood back into the left atrium.

zh: 这种现象即二尖瓣功能不全。
en: That's a condition called mitral valve prolapse.

zh: 这样主动脉瓣膜会拉扯收紧，因日久磨损而撕裂，造成合拢不严；或者正相反，瓣膜张开过小。
en: Aortic valve leaflets can tighten and tear from wear and tear, causing leakage or, conversely, too narrow an opening.

zh: 经过一段适应期后，你可以逐渐恢复食用牛奶或者黑豆，然后关注身体的反应，检査能量水平、肠胃反应、训练表现、睡眠质量等。
en: After a period of adaptation, you can reintroduce a food such as milk or black beans and then pay attention to how your body reacts, monitoring energy levels, stomach comfort, performance in workouts, sleep quality, and the like.

zh: 如果没有任何不良反应，那么这种食物就可以继续食用。
en: If there’s no detrimental reaction, then the food gets a pass.

zh: 类似的检测方法同样可以用来判断合适的食物量、每餐中主要营养素的比例和进餐时间等。
en: The same sort of testing process would be employed to determine ideal quantities of the food, proportions of macronutrients in a meal, meal timing, and more.

zh: 转体举腿是专门锻炼躯干两侧肌肉的终极动作，但只有在你足够强壮时才能尝试。
en: Twisting Leg Raise is the ultimate specialist exercise for the flanks of the torso, but you need to be pretty strong to even attempt it.

zh: 通过练习侧抬腿与举腿系列十式来增强你的力量。
en: Build up to it with side leg raises, and by working your way through the regular leg raise series.

zh: 抓住横杆，使身体悬垂，双腿伸直，然后举腿。
en: Hang from a bar, and raise your legs.

zh: 双腿举到最高处时，将一侧髋部转向前方，骨盆则尽量向高处扭转。
en: They should be fairly straight.At the top of the movement, turn one hip out to the front and twist the pelvis up as high as you can.

zh: 然后反向运动，接着重复练习另一侧。
en: Reverse the motion before repeating on the other side.

zh: 这样一组动作，比1000组卷腹或转体更有效。
en: One set of this exercise—when you are up to it—will do more than a thousand sets of side crunches or broomstick twists.

zh: 它能使你的腹外斜肌像手指一样突出，使你的转体动作更灵敏，让你拥有杰出的扭转力。
en: It’ll make your obliques stand out like fingers, and improve all your athletic twisting motions, taking your torque strength to stellar levels.

zh: 个中原因，就是该动作的强度极大。
en: This is because it’s big, intense and painful.

zh: 转体仰卧起坐其实就是普通的仰卧起坐，只不过训练者要在向上的过程中转体，让一侧的肘部接触另一侧的膝盖，每次反复都需变换转体方向。
en: Twisting Sit-Up is the regular sit-up, but done with a twisting motion on the way up so that your elbow makes contact with the opposite knee, alternating the twisting direction with each repetition.

zh: 很多健美运动员（以及拳击手——其实他们不该这么无知）都会练习转体仰卧起坐，以期强化腰部两侧的肌肉，即腹外斜肌。
en: A lot of bodybuilders (and boxers—who should know better) do this exercise in the hope of strengthening the obliques, the muscles at the side of the waist.

zh: 可是做仰卧起坐时，转动躯干所需的力量实在太小，因此该变式与普通仰卧起坐其实相差无几。
en: Unfortunately there is very little force required to turn the torso during sit-ups, and as a result this variation adds little to the regular sit-up.

zh: 苏联的训练者几十年前就深谙此道，所以发明了更有效的练习来锻炼腰部的扭转肌肉，这就是俄式转体。
en: Soviet trainers got wise to this fact decades ago and created a much more effective exercise for the twisting muscles of the waist; the Russian twist.

zh: 大家经常提到的问题是为什么马拉松运动员在比赛中会“撞墙”。
en: The central question being asked is why a marathoner tends to hit the wall during a race.

zh: “ 撞墙”指的是大约在32千米时，跑者会感觉不能保持原来的配速，甚至不能继续跑步。
en: Hitting the wall, or bonking, is when, somewhere around mile 20 in the race, a runner feels unable to maintain his or her pace, or even to continue at all.

zh: 许多提倡LSD的教练认为，“撞墙” 的原因在于训练的跑量不够。
en: Many coaches who advocate LSD training believe the fault lies in the runner’s failure to log enough miles in training.

zh: 然而，研究指出，比赛中马拉松运动员调动的身体运动单位不到20%, 所以 “撞墙” 的原因并不是因为跑者没有建立好耐力基础。
en: However, research indicates that fewer than 20 percent of motor units are recruited in a marathoner’s legs at any time during competition, so it’s not a matter of the runner having failed to build an endurance base.

zh: 运动生理学家最近提出了一项假设，“撞墙”的根本原因在于跑者不能在训练中完全调动这些神经连接。
en: Instead, exercise physiologists now hypothesize that the source of the problem is the failure of the runner to more fully engage these neural connections during training.

zh: 传媒重视坠落的体育英雄有很多原因。
en: There are many reasons why media treatment of the fallen sports hero is important.

zh: 这些有关坠落的故事是多样的、有争议的和引人注目的。
en: These stories are diverse, controversial, and compelling.

zh: 正如洛弗（Rowe, 1997, p. 203 ) 提到的，每个事件的情节都在“一个熟悉的、充满敬意的和愤怒的、庆贺的和中伤的、道德主义和虚无主义之间的小报线路径之中”。
en: As Rowe (1997, p. 203) noted, each case plots "a familiar, tabloid-lined path between homage and outrage, celebration and vilification, moralism and nihilism."

zh: 如果想找到无氧训练的感觉的话，你可以试试用最快的速度冲刺跑。
en: To get a feel for what an anaerobic workout is like, try sprinting at your top speed for as long as you can.

zh: 大概1分钟以后，你就会上气不接下气，还能感觉到双腿和肺部的灼热。
en: After a minute or so, you’ll be gasping for air and feeling burning in your legs and lungs.

zh: 但是这种极限的强度不能保持很久。
en: There’s no keeping up such maximum intensity for long.

zh: 在传统模式的耐力训练中，进行大量LSD训练是为速度训练和最终的比赛做准备。
en: In the traditional model of endurance training, a heavy load of LSD running is recommended to prepare the body for speed work and eventually racing.

zh: 我们在前言中讨论过，这个方法是根据特殊性原理制定的。
en: This approach supposedly relies on the principle of specificity, discussed in the introduction.

zh: 在出生时和出生第一周内能够被诱发出来的并能够正常消失的反射动作称为简单反射（primitive)。
en: Reflexes that can be elicited at birth or during the first weeks of life and normally disappear were often called primitive.

zh: 有些姿势性反射（postural reflexes)也是在出生后的第一年里消失。
en: Some postural reflexes also disappear during the first year.

zh: 例如，不对称的张力性颈部反射（asymmetrical tonic neck reflex, ATNR)在出生后2～3个月时减弱，但是多数姿势性反射并不减弱，反而变成更复杂的成熟的动作行为。
en: For instance the asymmetrical tonic neck reflex (ATNR) declines at around 2 or 3 months of age.However, most postural reflexes do not decline, instead becoming integrated into mature motor behaviours.

zh: 我能大量地接触并学习他们的锻炼哲学真是非常幸运。
en: I was lucky enough to learn a huge amount about their training philosophies, too.

zh: 比如，乔就强调了这样一个事实：过去很多人都是用自身体重训练来真正强壮体魄的。
en: For example, Joe emphasized the fact that a lot of the old-timers focused on bodyweight training to get really strong.

zh: 当然，为了展示力量，他们也要借助外物——如钉和铁桶，但大多数时候，他们都是通过控制自己的身体来增强自身的力量。
en: They might have demonstrated their power by unleashing it on external objects like nails and barrels, but in many cases they actually built that basic strength through control of the body.

zh: 更糟的是，如果一部分细菌或是病毒看起来与你的身体里的其他部分，比如心脏细胞，只有一点点不同，那么你的身体就有可能在杀死入侵者的同时也对你身体里那些酷似入侵细胞的正常细胞也发起攻击。也就是，你自身的免疫系统实际上开始攻击你的身体，并摧毀你的心脏细胞。
en: Even worse is when a portion of the bacteria or virus looks just a little different from something else in your body—say, heart cells.Your body may kill the invader but may also initiate an attack on the normal tissues of your body that simply look like the invader cells—that is, your own immune system may actually start attacking your own body and destroy your own heart cells.

zh: 这种出于好意却很危险的逬攻称作自体免疫反应。
en: This dangerous friendly fire is called an autoimmune response.

zh: 毫无疑问，大部分有关术语的讨论都是围绕着自我概念和自尊进行的。
en: Undoubtedly, most discussion regarding terminology has revolved around the two terms self-concept and self-esteem.

zh: 这两个术语的含义以及它们之间的联系，一直是人们争论的焦点。
en: The meaning of the two terms and how they are related continues to be the focus of considerable debate (Berger & Mclnman, 1993).

zh: 传统上认为自我概念与自我描述有关，而自尊则与自我评价相联系。
en: Traditionally, self-concept has been aligned with self-description, while self-esteem has been identified with the process of self-evaluation (Weiss, 1987; Fox, 1988).

zh: 我们再看一下在运动员时间知觉的其他方面上，自我决定论和潜意识大脑行动这两个进退两难的问题。
en: We see this quandary of self-determinism versus the actions of the subconscious brain in other aspects of time perception in athletes.

zh: 第一章在讨论长跑运动员的速度策略时，概述了一个同样的形而上学的难题。
en: Chapter 1 outlines a similar metaphysical muddle in discussing pacing strategies for long-distance runners.

zh: 正如在传统上认为的，运动员从起跑线就自己选择了合适的步速，而这个步速会在疲劳到来之前，刚好把他带到10km跑的终点线吗？
en: As has been traditionally supposed, does the runner select, from the start, the proper pace that will deliver him to the finish line of a 10K race just before marked fatigue ensues?

zh: 自我决定论会控制吗？
en: Does self-determinism rule?

zh: 毫无疑问，大部分有关术语的讨论都是围绕着自我概念和自尊进行的。
en: Undoubtedly, most discussion regarding terminology has revolved around the two terms self-concept and self-esteem.

zh: 这两个术语的含义以及它们之间的联系，一直是人们争论的焦点。
en: The meaning of the two terms and how they are related continues to be the focus of considerable debate (Berger & Mclnman, 1993).

zh: 传统上认为自我概念与自我描述有关，而自尊则与自我评价相联系。
en: Traditionally, self-concept has been aligned with self-description, while self-esteem has been identified with the process of self-evaluation (Weiss, 1987; Fox, 1988).

zh: 关注一下氧化过程是如何发生也是十分重要的。
en: It's also important to note how the oxidation process occurs.

zh: 在许多方面，氧化是你体内一种良性的、目然发生的过程。
en: In many ways, oxidation is a good, naturally occurring process in your body.

zh: 你的身体需要氧化使你的免疫系统工作起来，并让你的身体能保护自身。
en: Your body needs oxidation for your immune system to work, for your body to protect itself.

zh: 氧化还能帮助清除掉老的细胞，为新的细胞腾出地方。
en: It helps kill off old cells to make room for new ones.

zh: 所以，氧化不是坏事，但是却有变坏的潜能。
en: So it's not a bad thing, but it has the potential to be bad.

zh: 癌症是受到了一定扭曲的正常生理过程的一部分。
en: Cancer is part of the normal biological process that has gone a little awry.

zh: 当氧化成为坏事，也就是身体里的氧化过度 (即身体生了锈），氧化所产生的物质自由基就会损坏DNA,造成恶性细胞的产生，或者阻止清除你体内癌细胞的生理反应。
en: When oxidation turns bad, there's too much of it (your body's version of rusting); its products—free radicals—damage the DNA to cause malignant cells or inhibit the mechanism that can clear cancer cells from your body.

zh: 许多人认为其中的有效成分，即造成这一惊人数字的成分，是番茄红素。这是一种类胡萝卜素，因其抗氧化机能而著名。
en: Many believe that the active ingredient—the ingredient responsible for such astounding numbers is lycopene, a carotenoid known for its antioxidant properties.

zh: 类胡萝卜素通过黏附在自由基（自由基会引起癌症）上，把它们聚集打包，好让它们集体被清理出身体，不再危害细胞和染色体而发挥其作用。
en: Carotenoids work by attaching to free radicals (which can be cancer-causing) and packaging them so they can be washed out of the body so they don't damage cells or chromosomes.

zh: 壁厚的子宮比举重运动员的二头肌还大，可以形象地说，子宫这时就会吸住阴茎，最终将精子拉逬房间等待与卵子结合。
en: The thick walled uterus, which is actually larger than a weight lifter's bicep, literally sucks on the penis and ultimately pulls the sperm into its chamber for fertilization.

zh: 此刻，只要精子一鼓作气冲到终点，就能最先与卵子结合。
en: At that point, it's a dash to the finish to see which sperm cell can fertilize the egg first.

zh: 如果结合成功，受精卵会嵌入一处子宫壁，着床生长。
en: If one does, the fertilized egg reaches an area of the uterine wall (womb) where it gets planted.

zh: 通过子宫颈涂片检查，我们能够在疾病发病早期就发现HPV和子宮颈癌。
en: HPV and cervical cancer can be detected early with a Pap smear.

zh: （女性在性成熟后，都应该定期接受子宫颈涂片检查和骨盆检查。没有发现HPV的女性应当一年检查一次，曾经因患HPV接受过治疗的女性则应当每隔半年检查一次。
en: (Pap smears and pelvic exams should be regular after a woman becomes sexually active. That should include once a year for women with no signs of HPV and every six months for women whove had MPV treated,)

zh: ）有些HPV种类的发病似乎是毫无理由的。女性中超过50%的人有在初次性接触时染上HPV的可能。
en: While some forms of HPV seem to occur for no reason, more than 50 percent of all women have a chance of acquiring HPV with their first sexual encounter.

zh: 纵跳。
en: Vertical jumping.

zh: 自从马雷早期记录了充气测力台纵跳时（图36.2）同步的力和位移之后，众多的作者建立了纵跳的各种方案。
en: Since the early work of E.J. Marey who recorded the simultaneous measurement of force (pneumatic force platform) and displacement during a vertical jump (Fig. 36.2), numerous authors developed vertical jump protocols.

zh: 今天，复杂的仪器（测力台）可以记录下地面的反作用力和身体重心的加速度。
en: Today, sophisticated instrumentation (force platform) allows the recording of the ground reaction forces and acceleration of the body centre of mass.

zh: 最大功率输出可以从受试者对测力台产生的瞬间用力和身体重心加速度推算出来。
纵向研究( longitudinal studies) 可说具有相当的影响力,因为纵向研究主要是长时间地研究同一群研究对象在行为或兴趣上的改变状况 。所以 ,这种类型的研究也非常耗费时间。
en: Longitudinal studies are powerful because the changes in behavior across the time span of interest are seen in the same people.

zh: 举例来说,之前说过当要去比较同一群分别为6岁、8岁及10岁儿童的垂直跳表现,很明显地就需要5年的时间来完成这个研究,而这种需要长时间研究的类型对于硕士学生来说,可能就不是一个聪明的选择。
en: Longitudinal designs, however, are time-consuming.A longitudinal study of children’s jumping performances at ages 6, 8, and 10 obviously requires 5 years to complete.That choice of design is probably not wise for a master’s thesis.

zh: 若要获得线性关系中近似常态的样本分配，最佳的方法是将相关系数转换成Z值。
en: The most satisfactory method of approximating normality of a sampling distribution of linear relationships is by transforming coefficients of correlation to Z values.

zh: 此方法通称为费雪尔Z转换。
en: This is often called the Fisher Z transformation.

zh: (请注意，此Z不应该与用来表示常态曲线纵坐标高度的z搞混 。）
en: (This Z should not be confused with the z used to refer to the height of the ordinate in the area of the normal curve.)

zh: 米切利与爱尔兰（Micheli & Ireland, 1987)曾报道，足球、篮球和体操是跟骨牵拉性骨突炎发病率最高的运动项目。
en: Micheli and Ireland (1987) reported that soccer, basketball and gymnastics were the sports most likely to present the disease.

zh: 一项针对85名儿童的研究发现，足背伸无力和跟腱挛缩是跟骨牵拉性骨突炎最常见的临床表现症状，在跑步减速期和跳跃落地时症状会加重（Warner & Micheli,1991)。
en: Dorsiflexion weakness and heel cord contracture were the most common conditions affecting the group of 85 children studied.Symptoms are particularly aggravated during the deceleration portion of a run or landing from a jump (Warner & Micheli, 1991).

zh: 此症在生长突增期更常见，并能导致跟腱紧张。
en: The condition is more likely to be found during a growth spurt which results in a tightened heel cord.

zh: 足过度旋前与跟骨牵拉性骨突炎也有关。
en: Foot overpronation is also associated with Sever's disease.
When a test is given twice, the scores on the first test are correlated with the scores on the second test to determine their degree of consistency.

zh: 此时，两个测验分数是对应同一个变数，因而使用组间相关是不正确的。
en: Here, the two test scores are for the same variable, so interclass correlation should not be used.

zh: 应该使用组内相关 （intraclass correlation)才是正确的统计方法。
en: Rather, intraclass correlation is the appropriate statistical technique.

zh: 可采用变异数分析(ANOVA)来取得信度系数。
en: This method uses ANOVA to obtain the reliability coefficient.

zh: 除了要研究青春期运动能力快速增长的发展时间之外，更重要的是还要观察运 动能力快速增长与最大身高增长速度出现的时间关系，即与生物学尺度的关系，而不是与 日历年龄的关系。
en: In addition to documenting the occurrence of adolescent spurts in performance, the timing of the spurts is ordinarily viewed relative to the timing of peak height velocity (PHV), i.e.relative to a biological milestone, rather than to CA.

zh: 这样，可以大大缩短沿日历年龄轴的时间跨度，能更准确获取青春期运动能力快速增长的时间和幅度方面的信息。
en: By doing so, the time spread along the CA axis is reduced considerably and better information is obtained about the timing and magnitude of adolescent spurts in performance.

zh: 鲍斯首次实现了这种想法。
en: This concept was first realized by Boas (1892).

zh: 最大有氧能力运动员利用氧的能力对有氧耐力运动是非常关键的。
en: Maximal aerobic power The athlete’s ability to utilize oxygen is critical to aerobic endurance performance.

zh: 正如在实验室运动测试中测试的结果，V02max是一系列与氧运输和氧摄取有关的生理因素的复合表达。
en: As measured during laboratory exercise testing, the maximal aerobic power (VO2max) is a composite expression of a myriad of physiological factors that define oxygen transport and uptake.

zh: 每一个因素都有其自身内在的生物节律。
en: Each has its own intrinsic biological rhythm.

zh: 男性还可以考虑服用2克左旋精氨酸（L-arginine )，南瓜子和下文提到的其他食物里含有这沖氨基酸。另外还可补充左旋瓜氨酸（L-citrulline ),每天两次，每次500毫克。
en: Men might also consider taking 2 grams of L-arginine, an amino acid found in pumpkin seed and other foods listed below, and 500 milligrams of L-citrulline twice a day.

zh: 据说这两样一起服用（我们当然还是希望凋查数据能比传言更有力）会促进动脉内壁产生一氧化氮，进而促逬血液循坏，有效防止勃起功能障碣，同时增加精子数目。
en: It's been rumored that taking these together (we wish the data were stronger than rumor) will increase nitric oxide production by the inner layer of your arteries, thus increasing blood flow, which can prevent erectile dysfunction as well as increase sperm count.

zh: 坐骨神经经过人体的脊柱下部，直达双脚。突出的椎间盘压迫坐骨神经时，会导致腿疼，这一情况可以帮助我们解释背痛的起因和严重性。
en: The sciatic nerve passes from your lower spine to your feet; when a bulging disc compresses it, it causes leg pain, which helps indicate the cause and severity of back pain.

zh: 医生不愿意切除突出的椎间盘来使脊柱恢复正常，因为这样附近椎间盘会承担多余的重量，使磨损提前。
en: Doctors do not like removing a disc and fusing the spine because the extra pressure on surrounding discs can cause premature damage.

zh: 在做坐姿屈膝时，坐在椅子或床的边缘，身体略微向后倾斜，双手抓住边沿，两腿伸直，双脚并拢，脚跟距离地面几厘米。
en: In the process of knee tucks, sit on the edge of a chair or bed.Lean back a little, grip the edge of the seat with your hands, and straighten your legs.Your feet should be together with the heels raised a few inches from the floor.

zh: 这是该动作的起始姿势（图61）。
en: This is the start position (fig. 61).

zh: 平缓地抬起膝盖，直到膝盖距胸部约15一25厘米。
en: Smoothly bring the knees up and in until they are approximately six to ten inches from your chest.

zh: 在此过程中呼气，动作完成时呼气结束，腹肌保持收缩状态。
en: Exhale as you draw the knees in.By the time the motion is complete, you should have exhaled fully and your abs should be tightly contracted.

zh: 这是该动作的结束姿势（图62）。
en: This is the finish position(fig. 62).

zh: 暂停1秒钟，进行反向运动并回到起始姿势。
en: Pause for a count of one before reversing the motion and finishing again in the start position.

zh: 伸展膝盖的同时吸气。
en: Inhale as you extend.

zh: 双脚应该始终沿着一条直线移动，而且始终保持悬空，直到一组动作完成方可接触地面。
en: Your feet should follow a straight line backwards and forwards, and should not touch the floor until the set is completed.

zh: 腹部要始终收缩，动作要慢，要抵制快速完成动作的冲动。
en: Keep the stomach tucked in at all times.Resist the urge to pump out reps quickly.

zh: 如果需要，可以在两次动作之间喘几口气（所有中段练习都一样） 。
en: As with all waist techniques, take extra breaths between reps if you need to.

zh: 随着年龄的增长，表皮制造新细胞开始缓慢。随着时间的推移，阳光的破坏使得活表皮的厚度从20个细胞减至2个。
en: As you grow older, your epidermis makes new cells more slowly, and sun damage thins living epidermis from twenty to two cells deep over time.

zh: 使你的皮肤年轻的方法之一就是诱导你的皮肤，使它认为需要制造新的细胞。
en: One of the ways you can help make your skin younger is to trick your skin—to make it think it needs to produce new cells.

zh: 用α径基酸（AHA)，—种在许多护肤霜里都含有的物质就可以做到这一点。
en: Use glycolic alpha hydroxy acid (AHA), a substance found in many skin creams.

zh: 它发挥作用是通过增加皮肤的周期率，即刺激表皮去除死细胞，使皮肤认为它需要更新并制造新细胞，这样就会使皮肤显得更加年轻。
en: It works by increasing skin turnover—that is, it irritates your epidermis, removing dead cells, causing your skin to think it needs to rejuvenate and produce new cells, which has the effect of making your skin look younger.

zh: 补充锯齿蒲葵已被证实能减少患前列腺肥大的可能。
en: The supplement saw palmetto has been shown to decrease the risk that benign prostatic hypertrophy will wake you up at night.

zh: 不过在选购锯齿蒲葵制品时，你需要先看看它是否含有β-谷甾醇（betasitosterol)与消除肿大有关的物质。
en: But when you look for it, you need to check for ones with the ingredient beta sitosterol—the substance that's correlated with decreased swelling.

zh: 市场上50%的锯齿蒲葵产品其实并不含β-谷甾醇。
en: Half of the saw palmetto products on the market don't contain any.

zh: 每天两次，每次补充160毫克锯齿蒲葵。
en: Take 160 milligrams twice a day.

zh: 这是桥系列的最终式，它需要不可思议的柔韧性、强大的关节、强有力的肌肉以及极好的平衡能力和协调能力。
en: This is the ultimate bridging technique of the series.It requires incredible flexibility, strong joints, powerful muscles, balance and coordination.

zh: 经常练习铁板桥，可以增强敏捷性、按摩内部器官，调整脊椎和肌肉系统，让你精力充沛。
en: When performed regularly, stand-to-stand bridges increase agility, massage the internal organs, align the spine and muscular system and increase energy.

zh: 达到高次数练习后，它还会为你的新陈代谢“加油”。
en: When worked for high repetitions, they supercharge the metabolism.

zh: 本章提供了研究方法的综观，其主要部分包括参与者、研究工具或设备、实验步骡，以及实验设计与分析。
en: This chapter provided an overview of the method for the research study.We identified the major parts as participants, instruments or apparatuses, procedures, and design and analysis.

zh: 研究方法中的四个部分以及它们的主要目的在于排除对立假设或虚无假设，并排除研究结果的任何解释，除了研究者想要探讨的假设之外。
en: The major purposes of the four parts of the methods section are to eliminate alternative or rival hypotheses and to eliminate any explanation for the results except the hypothesis that the researcher intends to evaluate.

zh: MAXICON 原则点出了达成的方法：(a)最大化真正的或者是设计的变异数来源；（b )最小化任何的误差或者是非设计的变异数来源，以及(c)控制任何的外在变异数来源。
en: The MAXICON principle shows the way to accomplish this:(a) Maximize the true or planned sources of variation,(b) minimize any error or unplanned sources of variation, and(c) control any extraneous sources of variation.

zh: 在后面的章节里，我们将从统计、测量( 第二部分）与实验设计（第三部分） 的观点来描述如何达成这些原则。
en: In later chapters, we detail how to do this from the viewpoints of statistics and measurement (part II) and of design (part III).

zh: 我们会在第四部分中描述论文的最后段落。
en: We explain the final sections of the thesis or dissertation in part IV.

zh: 在有氧耐力训练中也获得了同样的结果。
en: The same thing is observed with aerobic endurance training.

zh: 如果让60岁的人加入规律性的散步或者跑步项目中，他们的V02max会增加20%~30%。
en: If  you put sexagenarians into a regular walking or running program, their maximal oxygen uptake increases by 20 to 30%.

zh: 在肌肉氧化能力上也可以观察到相同的增长幅度，这个增长幅度与进行相同锻炼的年轻人是一样的。
en: You’ll also see the same magnitude of increases in muscle oxidative capacity that young adults experience under the same regimen.

zh: V字举腿在健身房里极为罕见。
en: V raises are very rarely seen in gyms.

zh: 除了偶尔有一些武术家表演过V字举腿（李小龙的最爱之一），通常只有高手级的体操运动员才能做到这种动作。
en: You might witness the occasional expert martial artist performing them—they were a favorite of Bruce Lee—but they are usually the province of advanced gymnasts.

zh: 它需要训练者经过数年、认真的、循序渐进的身体中段训练，尤其要专心于最难、最有成效的技巧，方可培养出做该动作所需的肌肉力量、神经力量、协调力与柔韧性。
en: They require a level of muscular strength, nervous power, coordination and flexibility that can only be cultivated through years of serious, progressive midsection work, specializing in only the hardest, most productive training techniques.

zh: z分数是最基本的标准分数。
en: The basic standard score is the z score.

zh: z分数将原始分数转换为标准差单位，以平均数为0，每个标准差为1.0。
en: The z score converts raw scores to units of standard deviation in which the mean is zero and a standard deviation is 1.

zh: 公式如下：z=(X-M) /s。
en: 0.The formula is z=(X-M) /s.

zh: 假设垂直跳高的平均数与标准差分别为40公分与6公分，伏地挺身的平均数与标准差为20次与5次。
en: Suppose the mean and standard deviation for vertical-jump scores are 40 cm and 6 cm, respectively, and for push-ups they are 20 and 5, respectively.

zh: 并非所有的失忆都是由阿尔茨海默病引起的。有些失忆可能由血管问题引起，或者是因为神经细胞丧失功能。
en: Alzheimer's is not to blame for all memory loss; some can be caused by vascular problems or a loss of neuron function.

zh: 下面介绍一个快速自我诊断的检测方法，它可以发现阿尔茨海默病的前期症状。
en: Here's a quick self-diagnostic test to help detect the first signs of Alzheimer's.

zh: 让你的爷爷记住一个七位数的电话号码。
en: Give Gramps a seven-digit phone number to remember.

zh: 有失忆问题的人可能很难在短时间内记住所有的数字，不过测试还没完。
en: People with any kind of memory loss may have trouble remembering the whole thing immediately, but that's not the test.

zh: 5分钟后，阿尔茨海默病患者和其他类型的失忆患者可能记得4个数字。
en: After five minutes, both an individual with Alzheimer's and someone with another type of memory loss may remember zero to four numbers.

zh: 这时，再给两个人包括原来的电话号码在内的三组不同号码。阿尔茨海默病患者不会分辨出哪一组号码原先看过，而其他类型的失忆患者则能分辨出来。
en: But you give both three different phone numbers, including the original, the person with Alzheimer's won't recognize the original phone number, while others will.
